1b1(rgyud): #/rgya gar skad du/sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta gu h+ya dz+nyA na ar+tha gar+b+ha badz+ra ka
1b2(rgyud): ku la ta na tra pin b+hUn+da bi d+ya so ga sid d+hi nA ma ma hA yA nA smr-i tAM/bod skad du/de bzhin
1b3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs gsang ba'i ye shes don gyi snying po khro ba rdo rje'i
1b4(rgyud): rigs kun 'dus rig pa'i mad rnal 'byor grub pa'i rgyud ces bya ba theg pa chen
2a1(rgyud): #po'i mdo//bcom ldan 'das dpal sgrol byed thugs rje'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo//
2a2(rgyud): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bcom ljon 'das dpal
2a3(rgyud): kun tu bzang po rdo rje sa nga he ru kaM gsang ba mchog gi bdag po byin gyis brlabs kyi dbang phyug/mi zad mdzod
2a4(rgyud): kyi bkod pa/che ba'i don la ngan pa'i spyod pas bstod pa de/rmad du byung ba'i don 'di nyid bshad pa'i gnas
2a5(rgyud): gsang ba'i yang gsang ba kun gzhi chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang thig le bdal ba'i klong /ye 'byam rmad du grags
2b1(rgyud): pa'i gzhal yas rgyu phyog sa yongasu ma chad pa/chos nyid kyi na mkhA'u las cho 'phrul gyi sprin kun tu 'thibs/byang chub kyi chur mngon par
2b2(rgyud): 'babab/na ma ga ba 'angs par myur pa/yo shes m+b+ha guman par /mtha' dang tshu med pa/mo kun tu
2b3(rgyud): rgyu mnyam pa/rin po che'i rgyal pos rnam par brgyan pa/mu tig gri lcing lo dang /chun 'chang dang /lnga ldis mdzes pa/nyi mtshon
2b4(rgyud): pas gsal btab pa/zla bo chen pos phra bkod pa/skar me dang shin tu skar ma dag gis gzer smras pa/rdo rje rin po che'i 'od snang bas
2b5(rgyud): kun tu mdangs phyung ba'i mkha' la/rlung nag gi phung blo rgyu yongasu ma chad par mnyam pa/khrag gi phung po dpa'i klong du 'khrug pri/rgyu
2b6(rgyud): phyog su yong su mi chad pa/ma tang gi gnas dang /bris ma 'bur 'bang bar chags pa/rus pa phung po rgya kun tu mnyim pa'i gzhol
3a1(rgyud): 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang 'od zer kun tu 'phro ba/gA bu cung brtsegs pa'i rtsig pa la gnam lcags kyi gzer/
3a2(rgyud): ta le bAr btab bya/rtsibs kun du nyi ma dang zla ba rangs par 'phyo ba nye chen po'i klo gdung la nya phran drab gtams pa/zla ba'i ka rten
3a3(rgyud): dang /nyi ma'i ka lo dang /sbrul rgyun b+h+r-i ka rgyun la sogs pa/hU~M gau zlog dang /mo'i cha mngon par 'bab po/chos nyid kyi bla res
3a4(rgyud): rnam par brgyan pa/ye shrI saM ky-i ldu ldis mngon par bres pa/rdo rje'i rgyan dang 'phan gyis klubs pa/sbrul nag gi zar tshogs dang /
3a5(rgyud): sprin na gi gribo so lta bus gzhol ba'i ber bar thams cad na rin pa che dang /mu tig dang /me tog gis mdzes pa/'khor ba'i maN+Dal
3a6(rgyud): yi bkram le/baM ma rel che chung dang /khog skam stong smad dang /yan lag ring thung dang /dbang po'i phreng ba dang /rdo rjes kun tu spras
3b1(rgyud): pa/sgo dgus kun tu gsal bar gyur pa'i gnas na rdo rje rgyal 'tsha ba zhes bya ba'i zhe sdang rdo rje dang /rdo rje go phur zhes bya ba'i nga rgyal rin chen dang /rdo rje ging zhes
3b2(rgyud): bya ba'i 'dod chags pad+mo dang /rdo rje karma zhes bya ba'i phrag dog sna tshogs dang /rdo rje bya rog ces bya ba'i drod kyi rtags 'dzin dang /rdo rje dus mtshams zhes bya
3b3(rgyud): bo'i 'thun 'jug gi bka' sdod dang /rdo rje spun thams cad dang /rdo rje ming thams cad dang /rdo rje rig 'dzin thams cad dang /rdo rje lus thams cad dang /rdo rje
3b4(rgyud): rnal 'byor thams cad dang //rdo rje ngag thams cad dang /rdo rje las thams cad dang /rdo rje yid thams cad dang /rdo rje ma thams cad dang /rdo rje ging thams cad
3b5(rgyud): dang /rdo rje mkha' 'gro thams cad dang /rdo rje shugs kyis 'gro ba thams cad dang /rdo rje phra men ma thams cad dang /rdo rje kun tu 'bar ma thams cad dang /
3b6(rgyud): rdo rje gnod sbyin thams cad dang /rdo rje srin mo thams cad dang /rdo rje slas dang /byi mo dang /bran mo la sogs pa bud med tha~Md dang /rdo rje mngag pa la sogs pa'i
3b7(rgyud): rdo rje khro bo thams cad 'du bar gyur pa/rdo rje rigs kyi sangs rgyas thams cad dang /'gying bag gi tshul gyis bsnyengs pa mi mnga' bar rdo rje'i gdan la 'khor
4a1(rgyud): @mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa ni 'di lta ste/cho 'phrul chen po na mkha'i dbang phyug ces bya ba'i sangs rgyas dang /cho 'phrul
4a2(rgyud): chen po rnam grol sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas dang cho 'phrul chen po rnam grol sgrogs pa zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas dang /cho 'phrul chen po thams cad grub pa zhes
4a3(rgyud): bya ba'i sangs rgyas dang /na mkha'i bu mo dbang mo zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor mtshan mo dang /na mkho'i bu mo dga' sdud ma zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma chen mo dang /nam
4a4(rgyud): mkha'i bu mo rnam par gdung ma zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor mo chen mo dang /na mkha'i bu mo sgrol ma zhes bya ba'i rnala'i byer mtshon mo la sogs te/shin tu gsang
4a5(rgyud): ba chen po'i 'khor dang /gzhan yong dam tshig chen po'i 'khor 'di lta ste/dam tshig chen po rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba'i sang+yas dang /dam tshig chen po nor bu'i
4a6(rgyud): snying po zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas dang /dam tshig chen po pad+ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas dang /dam tshig chen po bkod pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas dang
4a7(rgyud): dam tshig tshon mo rdo rje dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma chen po dang /dam tshig tshon mo nor bu'i dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma chen mo dang //
4b1(rgyud): dmachog chen mo pad+ma'i dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba'o rnal 'byor ma tshun mAM dang /dam tshig chen mo rgyan gyi dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor mtshon mo la sogs te/shin tu mi
4b2(rgyud): 'da' ba chen po'i 'khor dang /gzhan yod tshad med pa'i 'khor 'di lta ste/gsang ba chen po byams pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas dang /gsang ba chen po snying rje'i snying
4b3(rgyud): po zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas dang /gsang ba chen po dga' ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas dang /gsang ba chen po btang snyoms kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas dang /gsang
4b4(rgyud): ba chen po badre ba'i dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma chen mo dang /gsang ba chen mo 'joms byed dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor mo chen mo dang /gsang ba chen
4b5(rgyud): mo dga' ba'i dbang phyug mi zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor mo chen mo dang /gsang ba chen mo khyab pa'i dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor mo chen mo dang /shin tu tshad med
4b6(rgyud): pa'i 'khor dang /gzhan yang rol pa chen po'i 'khor 'di lta ste/rol pa chen po'i sangs rgyas yak+Sha ha ru ka zhes bya ba dang /rol pa chen po'i sangs rgyas rak+Sha he ru ka zhes
4b7(rgyud): bya ba dang /rol pa chen po'i sangs rgyas b+hi ga sha he ru ka zhes bya ba dang /rol pa chen po'i sangs rgyas po shwa he ru ka zhes bya ba dang /rol pa chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma yat+na
5a1(rgyud): shro ri ka zhes bya ba dang /rol pa chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma rak+Sha sho ri ka zhes bya ba dang /rol pa chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma b+hi bA pa/sho ri kA zhes bya ba dang /rol
5a2(rgyud): pa chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma bi shwa shor ka zhes bya ba dang /shin tu rol pa chen po'i 'khor dang /gzhan yang 'jigs byed chen po'i 'khor 'di lta ste/'jigs byed chen po'i sang+yas
5a3(rgyud): te sha he ru ka zhes bya ba dang /'jigs byed chen po'i sangs rgyas ke sha he ru ka zhes bya ba dang /'jigs byed chen po'i sangs rgyas pa sha he ru ka zhes bya ba dang 'jigs byed chen
5a4(rgyud): po'i sangs rgyas bi shwa he ru ka zhes bya ba dang /'jigs byed chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma te rash+ma sho ri ka zhes bya ba dang /'jigs byed chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma ke sha sho ri ka zhes bya ba dang /
5a5(rgyud): 'jigs byed chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma pe shwa sho ri ka zhes bya ba dang /'jigs byed chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma bi shwa sho ri ka zhes bya ba la sogs pa shin tu 'jigs byed chen po'i
5a6(rgyud): 'khor dang /gzhan yang 'joms byed chen po'i 'khor 'di lta ste/'joms byed chen po'i sangs rgyas trag sha he ru ka zhes bya ba dang /'joms byed chen po'i sangs rgyas hri sha ha
5a7(rgyud): ka zhes bya ba dang /'joms byed tshon po'i sangs rgyas ka sha he ru ka zhes bya ba dang /'joms byed chen po'i sangs rgyas pag sha he ru ka zhes bya ba dang /'joms byed chen mo'i
5b1(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma thag shA sho ri ka zhes bya ba dang /'joms byed chen mo'i rnal 'byor mo hr-i sha shau ri kA zhes bya ba dang /'joms byed chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma kra shA sho ri kro zhes bya ba dang /
5b2(rgyud): 'joms byed chen mo'i rnal 'byor mau ka sha sho ri ka la sogs te/shin tu 'joms byed chen po'i 'khor dang /gzhan yang za byed chen po'i 'khor 'di lta ste/za byed chen po'i sangs
5b3(rgyud): rgyas ru tI he ru ka zhes bya ba dang /za byed chen po'i sangs rgyas rag ti he ru ka zhes bya ba dang /za byed chen po'i sangs rgyas kha hI he ru ka zhes bya ba dang /ze byed chen po'i sangs rgyas sa hA
5b4(rgyud): he ru ka zhes bya ba dang /za byed chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma ru ti sho ri ka zhes bya ba dang /za byed chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma tag ti sho ri ka zhes bya ba dang /za byed chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma kha hi
5b5(rgyud): sho ri ka zhes bya ba dang /za byed chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma sa ha sho ri ka zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor rab tu mang zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i he ru kA mtha' yas pa sha stag
5b6(rgyud): rnams dang /gzhan yang gsang ba'i bu mo'i 'khor 'di lta ste/gsang ba'i bu mo dkar mo zhes bya ba dang /gsang ba'i bu mo rkun mo zhes bya ba dang /gsang ba'i bu mo rmongs mo zhes bya ba
5b7(rgyud): dang /gsang ba'i yum ro langs ma zhes bya ba dang /gsang ba'i bu mo lbos mo zhes bya ba dang /gsang ba'i bu mo gtu mo zhes bya ba dang /gsang bu'i bu mo sme sha can zhes bya ba dang /
6a1(rgyud): gsang ba'i bum mchogs ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa shin tu gsang ba'i bu ma'i 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /gzhan yang dga' ba'i/mo'i 'khor r+N+Na
6a2(rgyud): dga' ba'i bu mo seng gdong ma zhes bya ba dang /dga' ba'i bu mo bya rgod gdong ma zhes bya ba dang /dga' ba'i bu mo stag gdong ma zhes bya ba dang /dga' ba'i bu mo wa gdong ma zhes bya
6a3(rgyud): dang /dga' ba'i bu mo khyi gdong ma zhes bya ba dang /dga' ba'i bu mo dur bya gdong ma zhes bya ba dang /dga' ba'i bu mo khwa gdong ma zhes bya ba dang /dga' ba'i bu mo mun gdong ma zhes
6a4(rgyud): bya ba la sogs shin tu dga' ba'i bu mo'i 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /gzhan yang shin tu gus pa'i bu mo'i khor 'di lta ste/shin tu gus pa'i bu mo rta gdong ma zhes bya
6a5(rgyud): ba dang /shin tu gus pa'i bu mo phag gdong ma zhes bya ba dang /shin tu gus pa'i bu mo spre'u gdong maM zhes bya ba dang /shin tu gus pa'i bu mo thal byed ma la sogs pa shin
6a6(rgyud): tu gus pa'i bu mo'i 'khor dang /gzhan yang shin tu bstod pa chen po'i sras kyi 'khor la 'di lta ste/shin tu bsod pa chen po dpal stug mgrin zhes bya ba dang /shin tu
6a7(rgyud): bsad pa chen po dpal g.yog mgrin zhes bya ba dang /shin tu bsod pa chen po dpal sha ba'i mgrin zhes bya ba dang /shin tu bsod pa chen po dpal gzig mgrin zhes bya ba dang /
6b1(rgyud): shin tu bsod pa chen po dpal rtswa'i mgrin zhes bya ba dang /shin tu bsod pa chen po dpal spyad kI'i mgron zhes bya ba dang /shin tu bsod pa chen po dpal sang+ge'i mgrin zhes bya ba dang /shin
6b2(rgyud): tu bsod pa chen po dpal don gyi mgrin zhes bya ba dang /shin tu bsod pa chen po dpal phig mgrin zhes bya ba dang /shin tu bsod pa chen po dpal dred mo'i mgrin zhes bya ba dang /shin
6b3(rgyud): tu bsod ma chen mo rdo rje bsod ma zhes bya ba dang /shin tu bsod ma chen mo rdo rje dur khrod ces bya ba dang /shin tu bsod ma chen mo rdo rje gtun khung zhes bya ba dang /shin tu bsod ma
6b4(rgyud): chen mo rdo rje ga tu mo zhes bya ba dang /shin tu bsod ma chen mo rdo rje mda' snyems me zhes bya ba dang /shin tu bsod ma chen mo rdo rje skye 'byin ma zhes bya ba dang /shin tu bsod ma
6b5(rgyud): chen mo rdo rje za byed ma zhes bya ba dang /shin tu bsod ma chen mo rdo rje 'dren ma zhes bya ba dang /shin tu bsod ma chen mo rdo rje spor ma zhes bya bo dang /shin tu bsod ma chen mo'i 'khor rab
6b6(rgyud): tu mang po rnams dang /de dag la sogs te rdul phra rab snyed dang thabs gcig go//yum rdo rje kun tu bzang mo sa nga sho rI kas kyang nyid kyi sku la rnam par 'khriya te/mdun gyis bltas
6b7(rgyud): nas thabs gcig/de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des chos thams cad dgongs pa mnyam pa nyid la shar bar mekhyen nas sku mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs pa
7a1(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ngang la snyoms par zhugaso//gsung mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ngang la rnam par zhug so//thugs mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs
7a2(rgyud): ba zhes bya ba'i ngang la rnam par bzhugs te 'jug pa 'am/ldog pa 'am/rnam par ldog pa mi dmig so//de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog bdag po des dbyings kyi
7a3(rgyud): ngang la mi g.yo bar man la bzhin du yum rdo rje kun tu bzang mes stong pa nyid kyi klu 'di blangs te/rnam par bskul to//yod ming stong pa shin tu rnal 'byor mthus//no mkha'
7a4(rgyud): bzhin las dam tshig nye bar gshegs//ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par grol ba'i klong //mi gnas mi dmigs na mkha'i dbyings nas gzhengs zhes bskul nas bcom ldan 'das
7a5(rgyud): gsang ba mchog bdag po des chos thams cad byang chub sems la shar bar mkhyen nas stong pa nyid kyi ngang las rdo rje'i sku mngon du phyung ste/dper na na mkha' dngas pa las zla ba dri
7a6(rgyud): ma med par shar ba lta bu'o//de nas yum saM pa sha ri kA la gzigs te/'dzum pa rnam par mdzad//dper na nyi ma stong las 'od kyi zer bkye ba lta bu'o//de nas 'od kyi zer
7a7(rgyud): de dag las byang chub kyi mngon par 'khrigs te/rol pa'i char mngon par phab pas rol pa sna tshogs kyi 'brug dang /rol pa sna tshogs kyi glog dang /rol pa sna tshogs kyi
7b1(rgyud): mchod pa dang /rol pa sna tshogs kyi glu dang /rol pa sna tshogs kyi gar dang /rol pa sna tshogs kyi rnga drang /dung dang /kor kor dang /gling bu dang /rol pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang /
7b2(rgyud): rol pa sna tshogs sgeg pa dang /steg pa dang /'khyud pa dang /steng pa dang /sbyor ba dang /bstim pa dang /mnyes pa dang /rol pa sna tshogs kyis gsol pa dang /myang
7b3(rgyud): ba dang /'cha' ba dang /bde ba dang /spro ba dang /'jo ba dang /'jug pa dang /rol pa sna tshogs kyis dga' ba chen po la 'jug pa rnam par mdzadado//de nas yum kun tu/
7b4(rgyud): bzang mo des spyan zim bag gis rnam par 'dud pa'i tshul du bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog 'drag po la rnam par bltas te/rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i phyag lus kun tu sa la brdabs/
7b5(rgyud): nas rol pa chen po'i grwa 'dis gsol ba btab po//chags chen gnyis rdzogs thugs dam dbyings kyi lha//long spyod rdzogs mdzad rol po chen po'i sku//rdo rje sems dpa'
7b6(rgyud): skal bzang dpal khyod bdag/thabs kyis rol pa bde chen dbyings nas bzhengs//de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang po mchogi bdag po des glu des bskul bar thugasu chud nas
7b7(rgyud): bde ba chen po'i ngang de las cho 'phrul chen por rnam par bzhengs te/rnam par bgying ba dang /rnam par brjid pa dang /gar gyi phyag rgya chen po dang /rnam par bshad
8a1(rgyud): pa sna tshogs zhabs kyi brkyang bskum dang /sku'i 'gyur bag dang /smin ris kyi 'bri ku ta bsgyur ba dang /sprul pa'i 'od zer gyis na mkha' thams cad kun
8a2(rgyud): tu khyab par mdzad do//de nas thams cad dang /thams cad la mtshan ma dang /rnam pa dang /yod pa dang /med pa thams cad la gsang ba mchog bdag po des kun la
8a3(rgyud): khyab par mdzad do//de dag gi rang bzhin du rnam par gnaso//de nas rdo rje kun tu bzang mo de ngo mtshar du gyur te/yang rnal 'byor pa'i phyag lus kun tu sa la brdabs te
8a4(rgyud): cho 'phrul 'byung ba'i glu 'dis gsol ba btab po//ye shes sgyu ma rnam par rol pa'i sku//thabs dang shes rab tshe la mnga' brnyes pa'i//'phags rje sprul pa mang po 'byung ba'i
8a5(rgyud): gnas/bad gshegs bde bar gshegs mdzad bzhengasu gsol//de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchogi bdag po des rdo rje rol pa'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
8a6(rgyud): par zhugs nas cad mi gsung bar bzhug so//de nas yum rdo rje kun tu bzang mo dang /dam tshig chen po rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa la 'khor shin tu mang po rnams ngo mtshar du
8a7(rgyud): gyur te/de dag thams cad mgrin gcig tu rdo rje rol pa'i de kha ni'i glu 'dis bskul te gsol ba bta'o//e ma ho//yid bzhin sku mchog na mkha' lta bu las//khyab pa'i
8b1(rgyud): skyon su rdzog ma //kun spyod na pa ma s+yA skyes pa sgra//grags pad 'dus spyan//Am ta//srid 'dzin ga mchog smra brnyan lta bums
8b2(rgyud): snron de'i sbyin bams rdo rje mngon ning 'i nI la rgyu mtshom zad 'gang pa'i spyad //si sgra yis klas sngags ma d+han/to//mi shes snying nyim hU~M sa/
8b3(rgyud): yi shes sbyin mas rdo rje med kying+ge//theg ste skyes sbrul rnam 'a mig gi glus//rnam la de nyid ngos tsho la sbyin//mA shes rdzun rmongs 'dis
8b4(rgyud): rnams sdug bsngal rgya mtshos bcings pA thAb+hAs kyis khrol//ma rig mun pa sa ljongs pa'i don gyi phyir//'khor ba'i rgyu mtsho rol pa'i glu yis sprul//de bo zhi gshegs
8b5(rgyud): bye kun gyi thugs chen po//ye shes don gyi snying po mchog dang ldan//rnal 'byor theg chen rdo rje kun 'dus rgyud//'dus pa'i tshogs la rgya cher ba shadu gsol//a la
8b6(rgyud): ni zhes nges par 'a gsal ba brtag/de nas pa ma ldan te su gsang po mchog ni 'den du na d+hi Sh+T+r-ikrA sa gal tu mi mkhyen nas ma
8b7(rgyud): thams cad la rnam par gzigs te 'dzum pa mdzod//'dzum pa mdzad pas thugs rnam par dge pa'i klong nas rig pa'i nyi ma brjod kyis mo lang 'i'i khyod zer dang bcos pa 'bya
9a1(rgyud): klas pa khyab par shwar bar mdzad do//'od zer de dag re rI las rdo rje he ru ka rab tu mang ba'i tshogs shar bar mdzad//de dag re re las kyang sangs rgyas
9a2(rgyud): 'bum phrag 'khor so'i zha 'bring bcas pa lhun gyis grub par mdzad//de dag las rig pa'i nyi ma'i char mngon par phab pras mun pa'i klong thams cad gsal bar mdzad//rig
9a3(rgyud): pa'i chos kyi 'brug sgra dang /rig pa'i chos kyi char dang /rig pa'i chos kyi glu sna tshogs dang /gar sna tshogs dang /rig pa'i chos kyi mchod pa sna tshogs byung ste/'byam klas
9a4(rgyud): pa'i nam mkha' la sgra sna tshogs phan tshun dang /yan man dang /snrel bzhi la sogs pa thams cad du khyab par ling long chad par byung //mchod pa'i char yang mngon par phab
9a5(rgyud): rma du byung ba'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang ling long chad rma du byung ba'i thugs kyang lhang nge'o//rma du byung ba'i gsung bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang a la la ho//zhe sgra sgrogs
9a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas 'bum phrag kyang gsung dbyangs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sgra gcig tu oM ma ho//rmad byung rol pa'i chos kyi don byung zhe sgrogs/'khor 'bum phrag dang gdul bya
9a7(rgyud): sna tshogs spro ba'i ngo mtshar bskyed/rig pa'i rtsal sbyangs don gyi phye ba phyung ngam zhing mtshar bar gyur te thams cad nye bar gnaso//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gsang ba
9b1(rgyud): mchog bdag po des 'khor rnam par sbyor ba'i rdo rje rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la smos par zhug so//snyoms par zhugs nus rdo rje sngags kyi tshig 'di gsungaso//hUM hUM hUM rdo rje 'du bar
9b2(rgyud): bsdus pa yi//dam tshig chen po'i ro ga 'dzin rnams/bla 'og rim pa ji bzhin du//rdo rje gsang ba'i bral 'khod//rigs ma yin pa rigs min 'gyur//bskal pa bzang po'i dam
9b3(rgyud): tshig 'dri//skal pa ngan la 'bab mi 'gyur//de las 'das na de rlag byed//hUM kro d+ha dzI la sa ma ya/rak+Sha dzA la sa ma ya/yak+Sha dzI la sa ma ya/tsid ta dzI la sa ma ya/zhes gsungs pa/
9b4(rgyud): tsam gyis zhal ljags kyi dbang po 'od me dpung chen po las khro bo 'od kyi phreng ba 'bar ba dang /srin po 'od kyi phreng ba 'bar ba dang /gnod sbyin 'od kyi phreng ba 'khrug pa dang /za byed 'od
9b5(rgyud): kyi phreng ba 'bar ba rgyud mar byung bas ru tra can dang /bdud dang /srin mo dang /gnod sbyin dang /srin po dang /'jug sred dang /sred med dang /dbang phyug dang /stobs ldan dang /
9b6(rgyud): spre'u dang /ra dang /lu 'di dang /sbrang ma dang /bya rog dang /me khyer dang /'khor ba dang /chu dang /se dang /na mkha' dang /me dang /sgra dang /bsam ngan la sogs pa brlag ste/
9b7(rgyud): mi gnas par gyur cing /rma du byung ba nyi du mdzad//de nas 'od zer de dag mkha' la 'khyil pa dang /'khor mang po dag shin tu skrag ste gsol ba btab pa/e ma ho/e ma bdag
10a1(rgyud): cag bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlab du gsol zhes gsol ba btab pa las/bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog bdag po des zhal gyi mdangs phyung
10a2(rgyud): ste/'od zer de dag ye shes kyi 'od zhi zhing 'khyil ba dang /mdzes shing bde ba dang /ldan pas thams cad rangs par byas pas sno du rung bar rnam par sbyangs nas/'od dag 'ad
10a3(rgyud): kyi gan su thim par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog bdag po des mi gnas pa'i ye shes chen po'i klong nas nges par bzhengs nas seng ge rnam par rgyal ba'i
10a4(rgyud): sgra lta bus don gyi bkod pa/gsang ba'i nges pa rgyud mi 'grel pa/rtags kyi rol pa/rdo rje rnam par bsgyings pa'i gzhung chen po sgra 'dis bshad//a o a~M/sA ma ya/a d+hi
10a5(rgyud): gu h+ya pu ti a ho ku la ma tong byid ta ba dra a mo b+ha aM shwa ra sa ya na gu ti a la la ho zhes cing mi gsung ngo //kun tu mi gsung/rab tu mi gsung/gsungs pa mi 'gog/'ag
10a6(rgyud): pa ma yin/ma gsungs pa nyid na rgya cher bshad pa'i ngo bor bzhugs//rnam par bzhugs nas dam tshig chen po rdo rje sems dpa' la zhal gzigs te/'dzum pas bskul pa rnam
10a7(rgyud): par mdzad//de nas dam tshig chen po rdo rje sems dpa' des bskul bar rnam par rig nas rang gi stan las langs nas/rang gi mtshan ma gnas lngar reg par byas nas/lce
10b1(rgyud): smra naganas sus la sa /rgyal phrul gyi nas smranas/spyo sas rgyas byas nas stong nal du Sh+TA d+ha/ rgyum 'dzugs pad/
10b2(rgyud): dgongasu gas so//chos kyi rgyal po me g.yo rgyal tshul mdzod//rgyal mchog rgyal pa chos kyi rgyal po'i mthus//'dus pa'i tshogs la rgya cher ba dugs pa//yul
10b3(rgyud): haMzhes gsol ba btab pa las//bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog bdag po des rdo rje las kyi bka' ba de byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir rdo rje rnam par spro ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin
10b4(rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//badz+ra kam tsakra sa twA raM zhes gsungs te//rdo rje rgyu gam gyi 'khor lo gtsug sems dpa' rdo rje'i lag du babs par
10b5(rgyud): gyur nas/las kye rdo rje'i dbang thob par gyur te/rnam par rol pa chen po shin tu bla brgyal ba'i spobs pa can du gyur to//byin gyis brlabs nas kun tu mi gzob rab tu
10b6(rgyud): ga dang ldan pa chen por gyur to//de nas sems drapa' rdo rje des las kyi mtshan mi de lag tu blangs te/stobs sna tshogs dang /gar dang klu sna tshigs rdo rje tshig tu len cing
10b7(rgyud): raM rje rgya gam las kyi 'khar lo de lan rnam pa bcu gnyisu bskur nas grangs gnyis dang lde bsgyur bas zhing khams mthir dag rnam par g.yos te//gams rab tu g.yas pa kun
11a1(rgyud): du rab tu g.yos/'gul rab tu 'gul/kun tu rab tu 'gul/ldeg rab tu ldeg/kun tu rab tu ldeg/'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/kun tu rab tu 'khru
11a2(rgyud): 'ur rab tu 'ur//kun tu rab tu 'ur/chem rab tu chem//kun tu rab tu chem par gyur te/zhing khams thams cad ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor shes dag du gyur/bcud yul
11a3(rgyud): thams cad ni phyag rgya chen por gyur/rnam par rngam pa'i tshul gyis ston pa'i mdun log su seng+ge rdo rjes mtshan ma'i gdan la 'gying bgi tshul gyis rnam par gnaso//de nas
11a4(rgyud): 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs phal mo che rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das lnga 'di skad ces gsol to//e ma bcom ldan 'das sems dpa' rdo rje 'di ni 'di ltar mthu che ba/'di
11a5(rgyud): ltar byin rlabs che ba/'di ltar rgya che ba/'di ltar mkhas pa/'di ltar gsal zhing zab pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las skyes pa lagaso//zhes gsol pa dang /badz+ram
11a6(rgyud): kyis dka' stsal pa/'dus pa tshon pa'i tshogs sems dpa' rdo rje 'di ni byang chub kyi sems thams cad kyi phyi mo//snying rje thams cad kyi bdag po//sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
11a7(rgyud): rje btsan/byang chub sems dpa' rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi yab/rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyi mes tshon po//mya ngan las 'das pa thams cad kyi dong dpon/bdud tha~Md
11b1(rgyud): kyi yang bdud chen po/chos thams cad kyi mdzod//ye shes thams cad kyi 'byung gnas chen por gyur pa yin//de ci'i phyir zhe na/thog ma dang tha ma med pa mnyam pa 'dus/
11b2(rgyud): mtha' las kyang pha mtha'/dpag tu med cing bsam du med pa/'byam klas pa'i dus nas bya ba byas shing byed pa byas pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa yin te/chos thams
11b3(rgyud): cad kyi rang bzhin du sbyor zhing gnas pas na/rgyal ba thams cad kyi thugs las skyes shing thams cad kyi yab tu gyur pa yin te/de 'dra'o zhes bka' stsal pa las 'dus pa'i khor
11b4(rgyud): thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur te/bcom ldan 'das 'dis ni 'di ltar ngo mtsharu lags bde bar gshegs pa 'di mtshar lag so//sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa la logasu btude lus
11b5(rgyud): sa la brdabs pa'i phyag rnal 'byor lugasu byas te/rma du byung ba'i me tog dang /tshogs kyi mchod pa sna tshogs byas te/'di ltar rmad byungango mtshar khyod//sangs rgyas thugs las
11b6(rgyud): rgyapa skyes pa//tso ltar zhing 'dir snang zhigu/rnal 'byor yab gyur rgyal ba'i sras//ngo mtshar khyod kyis spyod pas na//bka' yi 'khor lo rab bskor ba//bsgrub pa'i la mchog
11b7(rgyud): dam po dag/tshigs mtshon te gsal bar mdzod//oM la la ho zhes gsol ba bta'o//de nas dam pa rdo rjes rdo rje bskor te bsgyur nas brjid bag du mtshon de smras pa/oM AM hUM
12a1(rgyud): a la la to//rgyal ba'i sras pos cang mi gsung //mi gsung bas ni rgya cher ba shad//ba shu du med pa'i chos 'di ni//rgyal ba rnams kyis ma bshad
12a2(rgyud): de ltar ston pa rgyal mchog kyang //rnam par brjod par mi bzhed//rgya cher bshad par dgongs pa'o//skye ba med pa'i chos rnams ni//ma skyes par yang snying por bzhed//
12a3(rgyud): ngo'i don du gang gyur pa//tshig tu smra ba legs pa yin//spros pa nyid na grol ba zhes//rgyal ba rnams kyis yang dag bshad//de bas rdo rje rgyal po nyid//bka' ma sprul par
12a4(rgyud): dgongs pa'o//dgongs pa'i don rnams gang 'byin pa//ji ltar me long gzugs brnyan+da ltar//dgongs don rig la snang gyur pa//ma skyes snying po'i don gyis na//tshig tu spyo ba
12a5(rgyud): ma yin na'ang //mtshan ma tshig rnal 'byor po//tshig la zhib cing don la rtsing //tshig phyir blo 'brang rtsal zhan rnams//dkri phyir bsam pa rangs bya ba//mi dmigs pa
12a6(rgyud): las dmigs pa yi//cho 'phrul tshigs mtshon pa ni//bder gshegs rgyal ba kun gyi thugs//gsang ba de nyid snying pa'i don//mnyam nyid byang chub thag chen po//
12a7(rgyud): gsal bar bkod nges brjod kyis//rgya chen 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams nyon//nga ni dus gsum bzhugs pa yi//rgyal ba kun gyi snying po ste//stong par sbas pa'i don 'di la
12b1(rgyud): dbes mtshon tshigi lde mig gis//mnyam nyid rig pa'i sgo dbye byas//sbas pa'i don 'byin gsal byed pa//sA lu phub khrod snang me bzhin//gsal bteg snang rnyed sa ler 'dug/zab
12b2(rgyud): mer spyod pa lnga 'os pas//gang zhig don la 'dris pa yi//gsang sngags spyod pa'i rang bani ni//mthun pa'i dmigs bcu dper bzhag ste//rnal 'byor can gyis shes par bya//
12b3(rgyud): sgyu mi sgrog rgyu rmi lam dang //gzugs brnyan dri za grong khyer dang //b+hag cha chu zlo mig yor dang //chu bur 'khrul dang mgal mer snang //sgrub dang gsong sngags spyod pa dang //grub
12b4(rgyud): paM dang ni gnas dag dang //bzlas pa'i sgra dang phyag rgyar rtog/ting 'dzin lta ba cho 'phrul brtag/ji ltar sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid ni//skyes bu dag gi rtsol ba dang //smon dang sngags
12b5(rgyud): kyi sbyor ba las//dbang po yid 'phrog cer snang yang //dro la 'gro 'ong ga la yod//de ltar sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid kyang //yig 'bru rdzas kyi sbyor ba lngas//grub par snang
12b6(rgyud): yang rang bzhin med//ji ltar smig rgyu'i mtshan nyid ni//zhing pa'i dus kyi zla ba la//drod dang nyi ma'i sbyor ba lngas///byis pa gdungs pa'i rang bzhin gyis//chu yis 'du
12b7(rgyud): shes ci bskyed kyang //tshim pa'i rgyud ni ga la 'gyur//gsang sngags ming gi khyad par yang //rang bzhin mi dmigs stong pa la//mtshan ma'i tha snyad ming du btags/
13a1(rgyud): de nyid stong pas ming mi dmigs//dpe na rmi lam rang btsun ni//skyes bu gnyid kyi dbang gyur na//thang cig ska cig yud tsam dang //l-i la sogs pa
13a2(rgyud): de bzhin du//bde dang sdug bsngal de bzhin myong //sangs nas ci yang mi dmigs ltaro//de bzhin sngags kyi spyod pa dag/stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la//spyod pa'i rnam pa
13a3(rgyud): cir snang yang //brtags ni dmigs pa kun dang bral//gzugs brnyan snang ba'i mtshan nyid ni//dper na gdong dang me long las//brten nas bzhin gyi gzugs byung yang /
13a4(rgyud): red par gyur pa ga la yod//de bzhin sngags kyi dngos grub kyang //sgrub dang ting 'dzin yo byad las//brten nas dngos grub tshul byung yang //gsol thob dmigs pa
13a5(rgyud): ga la yod//dri za gnas pa'i rang bzhin ni//mkha' 'am yid kyi mkha' dngos la//dri za'i gzugs ni gar byung yang //grong khyer de yang de nas byung //byung nas
13a6(rgyud): de yang mi rtag ltar//gsang sngags grub pa'i gnas dag kyang //chos sam yid kyis mkha' ngos la//rnal 'byor gsang badreg gar bskyed pa//de nyid gnas pa'i
13a7(rgyud): gzhal med khang //byung yang de la gnas mi 'gyur//brag cha grag pa'i mtshan ma ni//dper na ngos la sgras rkyen pas//ci bzhin sgra ltar brag cha 'byung //byung yang
13b1(rgyud): sgrar thos dmigs pa med//de bzhin sngags tshig bzlas pa'i sgra//dper na med las yod btags pa'i//mtshon ma la dz+nyAn stong pa'i sgra//badz+rod pa tsam du bstan par
13b2(rgyud): zad//ji ltar chu yi zla ba ni//sgrib med mkha' las zla shar ba//gzugs brnyan dang ba'i chu nang snang //snang yang gzung bI rtog med pa//de bzhin gzugs snang phyag rgya
13b3(rgyud): yang /sems kyi mkha' las skur gsal ba//phyag rgya rigs 'dzin ngo la snang //de ltar snang yang 'dzin rtog bral//ji ltar char gyi rgyun bzhin du//chu las chur bur
13b4(rgyud): rnam par 'byung //de yang cigs rnam pa las//mang po'i rnam grangs du mi 'byung //sdud cing phyir yang dumi bur 'chad//de bzhini rnal 'byor sgrub pa yi//ting 'dzin
13b5(rgyud): rnam pa mang por 'dod//'khrul pa snang ba'i rang bzhin ni//spros bral dngos po stong pa las//srog dang shed can byed pa po//sems can pa la sogs par snang //mig
13b6(rgyud): nang ngo la rdzas ltar snang //'khrul pa kho na snang bar zad//de bzhin sngags kyi lta ba yang //cho 'phrul mang po cir 'phrul pa//snang ba med pa'i rang bzhin la//'khrul pa
13b7(rgyud): sna tshogs snang bar zad//rnal 'byor rgyan kyis de ltar lta//ji ltar mgol mo'i rang bzhi ni//gang dag lag na mgal ma thogs//bskor na 'khor lo'i rgyun ltar snang //de
14a1(rgyud): la 'khor lo rang+ga bzhin med//de bzhin sngags kyi cho 'phrul yang //mo mnyam mnyam pa'i rang bzhin las//ji ltar dmigs pa'i don 'byung ste/
14a2(rgyud): 'phrul sna tshogs rgyun mi 'chad//de phyir mtshan me'i chos thams cad//mtshan med ngang du gcig pas na//rtogs pa'i bag chags ci byung yang //chos kun dbyingasu
14a3(rgyud): gcig pa'i phyir//rtog 'jug spros pa'i mtshan ma kun//ma byung ma skyes dbyings nyid la//g.yos pa med cing cho 'phrul 'byung //yon tan sna tshogs cher 'byung ba'i
14a4(rgyud): gter gyi dbyig 'di gang mthong ba//sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan yang //skad cig gcig la de la 'dus//de bas yid bzhin rini chen 'di//ldog pa med pas dang du blang/
14a5(rgyud): don dam yang dag gter gyi mchog/rnal 'byor kun gyi nor mchog ste//gang rtags de 'thob gcig pu nyid//'brel med gzhan gyis thob par dka'//bdag med
14a6(rgyud): gnyis bral bde chen slong //sangs rgyas kun gyi bde ba che//ye nas lhun grub 'dus ma byas//thig le chos nyid ye 'byam pas//kun khyab brdal bas snying por
14a7(rgyud): 'dus/ mi dmigs spros bral byang chub sems//zab mor snang ba'i nges don 'di//mkha' la mdud pa gting dpag dka'//rnal 'byor dmigs ldan blo chung zhing //
14b1(rgyud): g+ha ts+li/dz+wa la zhan de rtog pa//glu sa rna ma'i tshul du bdag rtag pa//rtags kyang rtogs par mi 'gyur//dper na nyi ma'i snying po la//mi g+ha dbadA sA rab rtags na//de rtags dran
14b2(rgyud): mi rtogs kyi//'od kyi zer gyis mig jil 'gyur//de 'drar byis pa'i rang zhon gyis//rnan ma'i don la cir brtags kyang //yang dag don de mi mthong gi/blozhin byos pa ga
14b3(rgyud): chad brgyal//brtag tu med pa'i chos rnams ni//rtog pa can gyis mi rtogs te//gang zhig de don mi rtogs phyir//g.yang sar ltung ba ci tshwa yod//gdod nas ma thos shin tu
14b4(rgyud): dge bsam dang bral bas de bzhin gzhag/mi rtag bzhag pa'i chos 'di gang //byis pa rnams langs ma bstan//bstan kyang go bar mi 'gyur te//bstan du med cing rga
14b5(rgyud): bar dka'/tshi gas brjod pa kun dang bral//'di zhes bstan du ga lnga yod//med pas bstan pa'i dmigs mi phyed//mi dri migs chos la blo skyengs shing //yid kyi me long
14b6(rgyud): gsal byas na//namakha' dag la rab brtags na//srang ba med pa'i rang bzhi ni//na mkha' lta bur de nyid 'gyur//chos nyid na mkha' lta bu ste//namakha' la yang mtshan
14b7(rgyud): nyid med//nam mkha' gang min brjod byed po//brjod pa de nyid dngos po ste//dngos po de yi ming brjod kyang //na mkha' de la 'gag mi 'gyur//de bzhin mi rtog rjod byed
15a1(rgyud): bang nyi na k+ko/rnam nadamo myong brjod kyang //martag do la 'gag mi 'gyur//de 'drar sems ca do ltar bya//sems nyid gzhan
15a2(rgyud): du ma grub ste//de bzhin chos kyang phye ma yin//sems dang chos nyid gnyis med//sems nyid gang yin chos nyid//chos nyid kyang ni de bzhin//chos sems gnyis med
15a3(rgyud): ldan gyur pa//bla med byang chub chen por bshad//sems ni na mkhra' lta bu ste//rnam par rtog bral grang mi rtogs//de bzhin sa gzhi chen po ltar//bla med byang chub
15a4(rgyud): myu gu skyed//me yi rang bzhin ltar snang bas//rmongs pa'i bud shing sreg par byed//rlung gi rang bzhin yin pas na//mi shes pa yi rdul kun sel//chu yi rang
15a5(rgyud): bzhin yin pas na//nyon mongs gdung ba kun sim byed//sman gyi rang bzhin yin pas na//'khor ba'i gcod rnying rnam par 'byin//de ltar rtsa'i rang bzhin pas//
15a6(rgyud): 'tsho ba rnams kyi gsos su 'brab//de bzhin rno dpal rang bzhin pas//sdug bsngal rgya mtsho rnam par gcod//nyi ma lte bur snang ba yis//mun khang snang ston sel bar/
15a7(rgyud): byed//ri rab lta bu'i rang bzhin pas//brtan po mi 'gyur g.yo ba med//rgya mtsho lto bu'i rang bzhin pas//mi g.yo ba la byin rlabs che//sems ni 'di ltar tshe 'phrul
15b1(rgyud): de phyir 'khor dang mya ngan 'das//gnyi su snang ba ma yin te//sems kyi rang bzhin bzung ngan las//gnyis kyi 'du shes phye ste bstan//sems las yang dag ye shes 'byung //de bzhin bde dang /
15b2(rgyud): sdug bsngal 'byung //chos dang sangs rgyas ye shes 'byung //dge 'dun yang ni de bzhi no//'di las pha rol phyin tshogs dang //byang chub dang ni pad+mo 'byung //'di las rdo rje sems dpa' dang
15b3(rgyud): dri med rin chen dpa' sbyin 'byung //de bzhin rdo rje dpag med dang //sna tshogs rgyal ba 'di las 'byung //'di la sa phyag rgya sna tshogs dong //rigs pa'i snying po thing 'byung //'di las 'dod chags//
15b4(rgyud): zhe sdang dang //sdug bsngal nga rgyal phrag dog 'byung //gti mug dag kyang de bzhin te//'di las khams gsum thams cad dang //skyes pa bud med mo ning 'byung //'di las 'dod dang 'dod
15b5(rgyud): gzir dang //nyon mongs gdung 'dod chags pa 'byung //rI dang skye bo de bzhin du//nam mkha' dang ni rlung dag dang //sreg pa'i me ni rab tu 'byung //'di las sa dang chu dang ni//rdo drang sa bon mya
15b6(rgyud): gu 'byung //de bzhin grog dang skar ma drang //nyi ra zla la sprin rnams 'byung //de bzhin spyod dang mi spyod kun//thams cad thams cad 'byung ba 'gyur//dper na na mkha'i rang bzhin las//
15b7(rgyud): sprin dang na bun khug rlangs dang //zla ba nyi ma skar tshogs dang //snang yang na mkha' bzhon du gnaso//de bzhin sems kyi na mkha' las//mtshan ma'i cho 'phrul ci byung yang //chos nyid na
16a1(rgyud): mkha' bzhin gnas par//rnal 'byor can gyis lta bar bya//de lta bu yi sems nyid ni//rtog dang ma rtogs rang bzhin la//lta ba'i khyad par sor blta//rtog pa can gyi
16a2(rgyud): ga lang rtog pa 'khrul pa'i ngo bor snang //kun tu nye ro 'jog la mtshor la//kun tu rdul gyi phung por snang //tshogs spyod snying rje nyer 'jog la//thams cad sgyu ma'i rang bzhin ltar//de nyid
16a3(rgyud): mnyam par shes gnas na//na mkha'i rang bzhin mthong bar gnas//ye shes rang snang na mkha' la//nam mkha' nyi du snang bar zad//brjod bral mthong med dri migs dang bral//mthong ba
16a4(rgyud): med pa'i don 'di ni//sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis bshad//bde gshegs snying po byang chub la//dgongs pa 'di las gang minga'//lta ba de dang ldan bzhin du//dam tshig na mkha' lte
16a5(rgyud): bu lad dang srung dang mi bsrung phyogs dang bral//'di'o zhes ni bsrung du med//bsrung ba'i rnam grangs ji snyed cig/dus gsum rgyal bas gsungs mod kyang //bsrung ba'i mdo ni gcig tu
16a6(rgyud): 'dus dngan mkha' lta bu'i rnal 'byor pas//na mkha' dra ba'i dam tshig bsrung //de yang bsrung du med na bde//gzhan pa theg pa chung ba rnams//bsrung ba'i mtshams dag bsrungs nas
16a7(rgyud): ni/skyon yon chos la blang dor byed//bsrung dang bral ba'i chos rnams ni//bsrung du med pas de bzhin gzhag/de bzhin pa yi dam tshig la//ji bzhin pa yi blo gzhag ste//rjed pa med
16b1(rgyud): pa'i sems nyid kyis//bsrung ba med pa'i ngang du bsdam//bsrung myed na mkha'i dam tshig 'di//ji ltar grags pa'i rang bzhin la//sdom dang tshul khrims saur snang //byis pa rnams ni tha tshig sngo/
16b2(rgyud): bden gnyis rgyu la ston par grags//bla med mchog lnga dam tshig spyod//gcig don las ma g.yos kyang //'dul dbang la so sor grags//kho na nyid ldan dom tshig mchog/de dang gang//
16b3(rgyud): ldan dam pa ste//de las 'dis na tshig par 'gyur//de phyir dam tshig chen po ni//na mkha 'dra bar dpa' bos bshad//rgyal ba dpa' bo tha~Md la//dam tshig 'di las yod ming 'a//spyod
16b4(rgyud): pa dag gi khyad par yang //chos nyid bya ba rtsol kun bral lo//bsgrub dang bsgrub pa'i dmigs pa med//'khrul pa gcod pa'i skye bo dag/dmigs med byang chub bde chen la//sdug bsngal
16b5(rgyud): rtsol sems bcug pas nor//bya ba med pa'i chos nyid las//nyon mongs bya med spyad pas 'khrul//rang byung lhun grub gnas bzhin du//byis pa'i spyod pas ci btsal dgos//gang zhig
16b6(rgyud): 'dod ci zhig sgrug/ci spyad ci bsgrubs ci brtsil yang //sdug bsngal nyid byang chub meng //dmyal ba sangs rgyas chen po la//sdug bsngal byang chub lo mo nyid//nyan thos rang rgal sa di
16b7(rgyud): theg pa'i khyad par ci bstan pa//byed brtsol bcas pa thams cad 'khrul//bla med byang chub gagasu che//gang zhig brtsal med bde chen do ni//sems kyi kong 'dis ma mthong na//
17a1(rgyud): sgrub dang rtsol ba ci spyad kyang //byis pa don med kyi ni 'khyam//brtsal du med pa'i rang bzhin la//rtsol ba'i spyod pas ci zhig bya//'dzin pa med pa'i chos nyid la//tshig
17a2(rgyud): nor pa'i rtsol byar med//bgra du med pa'i chos nyid la//bgrod pa'i dkyil 'khor ming dang bral//bsam du med pa'i chos nyid la//rtog sems bsam pa'i dmigs dang bral//brtul med
17a3(rgyud): pa yi chos nyid la//brtsal med ye nas lhun gyis grub//mtha' dbus med pas brdul ba che//phyi nang med pas ye gsal khyab//skyon yon med pa lhun gyis rdzogs//bsgrub du med pas
17a4(rgyud): brtsal sems bral//gzung du med pas dmigs dang bral//thams cad mkhyen pas byin brlabs che//gdod nas byang chub snying poraro gnas//spyod pa'i khyad par 'di lta bu//des na gcig
17a5(rgyud): las med bzhin du//spyod 'thun rtsal ba'i rang bzhin la//rnam rtog spyad pa ser snang //'khrul pa tha~Md 'khor bar spyod//rgyu 'bras mi slu bden den spyod//mi dmigs pa la na mkhar spyod
17a6(rgyud): de ltar spyod pa kun spyad kyang //dam pa'i den de spyod mchog nyid//dam par gyur pa tha~Md la//dam pa'i spyod pa de las med//skyes bu mcho gas de skad bshad//the tshom med par shes par gyis
17a7(rgyud): ma spyod byang chub de bzhin nyid//bsgom du med pa'i chos nyid la//bsgom pa dmigasu med pa ste//ting 'dzin zhes ni go dag su med//bsgoms kyang rnyed pa ma yin la//de bzhin ma sgom
17b1(rgyud): maman aH/a pa thathamaHsa sa mamams ma am pa tha.a mthaH/Shasam can/ma thamamatha sa mamam thamanaH thamamam/ma paSha
17b2(rgyud): stor ba med//bsgom tshe sna tshogs cir slar yang //bsgoms nas de yi ngang mi gnas//de bas byis pa'i spyod yul yin//dper na byis pa'i rang bzhin gyis//sa la sogs pa gzugasna tshogs//
17b3(rgyud): mdzes par byas nas skad cig mthong //mthong ba nyid na ma grub ste//skad cig khe nas zhig gyur nas//sa la sogs pa'i rdul du snang //de bzhin rnal 'byor byis pa yis//gzugs la sogs pa
17b4(rgyud): sna tshogs bsgom//sems kyi bye brag skad cig la//yid kyi rgyu ba sna tshogs 'byung //byung ba bzhin du de ma grub//sems kyi skad cig dran pa la//yid kyis dmigs pa rgyun chad nas//byung
17b5(rgyud): cher chad pi mtha' spangs te//chos rnams na mkha' lta bur ni//brjod med rgyun mi 'chad par dmigs//de don phyin ci ma log par//rjed med ting 'dzin sgom pa'i mchog/ci phyir chos kyi dbyin/
17b6(rgyud): nyid ni na mkha' lta bur 'dus ma byas//bsam du med pas na mkha'adra//brjo du med pas gzugs dang bral//kun bzhi kun tu na mkha' la//yid ni mkha' la nyi shar 'dra//rnam shes nyon
17b7(rgyud): mo sprin gyis khebs//'du byed rlung gis kun bskyed//gsal dang byung 'jugs ngas drang 'gag/rnam shes mtshan ma'i rtag pa yis//kun gzhi na mkha' mthong mi sbyar//kun gzhi mthong
17b8(rgyud): nyid tshe sku ste//'di don na mkho'am brjed pa//ting 'dzin chen pa rgyun mi 'chad//gang zhig 'di don yid 'chang ba//gzugs kyi dngos po tsor snang yang //sems ni ye nas mya ngan 'das
18a1(rgyud): bde tshan sangs rgyas thams cad la//dgongs pa 'di las yong meng+gal//snang ba na mkha' di//ting 'dzin chen por gnas bzhin du//'di las blugs te ci zhig //
18a2(rgyud): rgyal bas brtsal kyang yong mi rnyed//'di las gzhan du gang tshol ba//bcol ba nyid na chi chad 'gyur//gzhan nam dman pa'i sgo rnams ni//ting 'dzin med pa'i chos nyid la//'dzin pa'i
18a3(rgyud): ting 'dzin bcug pas nor//de dag la ni gang spyod rnams//then tsher mig ni na mkha' la//phra rab thun thag 'dzud pa ltar//byis pa las gang byed pa de//shed can dag gis byar mi rung //
18a4(rgyud): shed can spyod pa'i na mkha' de//ben tsher na mkhar shong mi 'gyur//de bas gzhan la ston pa min//bstan na byis pa go chad 'gyur//chos nyid na mkha' lta bu'i dngos//gsal bar//
18a5(rgyud): 'od stong nyi mos 'grub//byin rlabs 'od kyi zer phreng tsam//sgyu ma ltar snang mtshan mar thob//mi g.yo mtshan mod rang bzhin dngos//skye med sems kyis ma mthong ba//byis pa 'dring bI
18a6(rgyud): rtsed mor snang //dngos grub chen pa'i sems nyid//yid bzhin 'byung ba rin po che//ji ltar dmigs shing bsgyur bar 'gyur//grub pa'i don chen thaMd rdzogs//se mos kyis sems
18a7(rgyud): kyi tshul mthong na//dngos grub ces de dag las 'ong //gang gi stsol ti su yis blang //stsal dang stsol bar byed mi dmigs//dper na chu dang me long dang //mkha' dang ral gr-i shel la
18b1(rgyud): sdigs//gsal bar byed pa'i rang bzhin la//rnyog med la sogs bltas gsal ba//chu la sogs pa'i rang bzhin yin//de la ngo mtshar che mi 'byung //sems kyi chu gas la na mkha' la//nyan mang sbyin/
18b2(rgyud): kyis rnyog med na//dngos grub nyi zla skad tshogs bkram//sgrib med byin brlabs dang gis 'char//kun bzhin mkha'i snying po de//nyon mong sprin gyis gting spungs pa//shes rab rlung gis ma gto
18b3(rgyud): gzhu mkhan gyi spyo 'dri yis//sgrib bsal chos nyid gsal 'dod pa//ji ltar chus ga sher byis pa dag/nyi ma sprin ldan grib ma yis//shin tu sgribs par gyur pa na//sprin chen 'dus pa'i phung po la
18b4(rgyud): kha yi dbugs kyis dus byas ni//sprin gsal nyid 'od gsal 'dod 'dra'o//de phyir rnal 'byor dbang phyugs//sems nyidon la rnam brtags te//kun bzhi rtsa ba shes par bya//sems nyid la
18b5(rgyud): bltas gsal ba//rtswa bo dang ni gang ldan pa//dus dang tshig dang lor gyur yang //yal go lo 'dab 'bras bur bskrun//rtsa ba'i sa bon med mi 'gyur//ci ltar sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor rnams/nan
18b6(rgyud): gyis mtshan pa'i dngos grub dag/byis pa'i sems kyis blang 'dod na//de yang mtshan mas de rangs 'gyur//dper na me yi rang bzhin dag/sa dang nags che la sreg byed pa//rgyu rnams tsher
18b7(rgyud): pa'i bden pa las//med las yod pa'i bden par snang //de ltar mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor yang //mtshan ma'i cho 'phrul thob 'dod pa//mtshan ma'i rgyu rnams tshogs pa las//mtshan ma ra
19a1(rgyud): mtshan mar snang //shin tu skar ma rgyal rnams la//byang chub spyod pa cher spyod pa'i//dam pa'i don la cher dmigs pas//gsang mchog rig pa'i dngos grub myur//
19a2(rgyud): mtshan mar mi rtog rang bzhin gyis//zab mo'i don chen go ba ni//nges pa'i don gyis thag bcad//mnyam pa'i don la yid ches bya//ji ltar mkha' la tshig tsam du//drang du brjod pas
19a3(rgyud): brjod byed kyi//brjod pa'i tha snyad dang bral bas//ji ltar 'khrigs kyi smig rgyu dag/snang ba nyid na med pa ltar//cho so tsagi ring bzhin gsal//gsal ba nyid na de mi dmigs//
19a4(rgyud): thabs chen gting zab shes rab lam//spros bral mtshan ma'i 'phreng las 'das//gtos ches yangs pas lam gnyis bral//dbus mtha' mi dmigs mnyam pa'i lam//gcig
19a5(rgyud): tu mnyam par chus nas ni//yul med tshol ba'i sems bral de//blang dor gnyis kyi mtha' spangs nas//gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas//chos nyid dbyingasu ro gcig phyir//
19a6(rgyud): shes dang shes bya gnyis med//ye nas shes nyid chos shes na//chos nyid gzhan nas bcol ci dgos//dper na sgyu mo'i bde sdug kyang //bsal nas gAnyi ga ma dmigs
19a7(rgyud): ltar/'khor po 'gyur ba'i bde sdug kyang //mnyam par rang bzhin don gyis mnyam//ji ltar dus rnams thams cad dag/mnyam pa nyi du rtogs nas ni//sgros tshig rje su
19b1(rgyud): ma 'brang na//mnyam 'gyur dus rnams ga la dmigs//mkha' la ngang gis gzugs med phyir//dmigasu zin par mi 'gyur bzhin//sems kyis ma skyes don mi dpogs//skyon dang ston gnyis
19b2(rgyud): 'byed pa//rtogs nas gnyis kyi don spangs te//rang bzhin mnyam par don gzhag na//bsgom zhes ming du brjod par zad//gnyi su lta ba ma skyes phyir//gnyis kyi 'du shes tso byung yang //rang
19b3(rgyud): byung zhi ba ma bkag chos//ye nas ma bcos don gyis gsal//ma skyes rnam dag byang chub sems//mi gnas ye shes thugs dang mnyam//rig dang ma rig khyad par las//'khor 'das rten
19b4(rgyud): dang 'brel par snang //rnam rtog med phyir zhi ba med//'dzin par ma yin spros bral min//drang ba'i don bstan ma gtogs par//don la tshigs brjod med//snang yang med pa'i rang bzhin la//sa/
19b5(rgyud): blo yod pa'i sems mi 'byung //mnyam nyid stong pa'i don 'di la//don ldan stong pa'i sgro mi 'dogs//ma bcos rang bzhin zhi ba yi//mtshan ma'i rtog bral shes ldan pas//mdo tsam du'ang mi dmi
19b6(rgyud): nadabyung tshor 'dzin par ga la 'gyur//thams cad mi gnas byang chub pas//brtsal nas grub pa ma yin yang //sgyu ma sangs nas 'khrul bral bzhin//spros bral ye she snying por gnas//'khor bar
19b7(rgyud): rtogs pa dug yin te//'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mi shes ni//dug 'thungs bde ba ga las 'ong //sbyar legs dug nyid sman du 'gyur//'khor ba'i las rnams de ltar snang //'khrul snang dug
20a1(rgyud): gzer bzod dka' ltar//ma rig 'khor ba'i sdug sngar snang /rmi lam sgyu 'phrul mi zad pas//shin tu nyam thag gdungs pa'i tshe//'chi bdag bdud kyis zin 'dra la//mgon btsun
20a2(rgyud): gzhan gyis mi phan ta//bdud sal rtsi dang 'dra bar ni//yang dag lam mchog rtogs par bya//dug nad skyo sangs 'byang ba la//skad cig ma la mi bzod cing //sman dang sman pa'i rtsol bsgrubs pa//
20a3(rgyud): sangs nas de dag mi dmigs ltar//'khor ba mi dmigs 'khrul pa la//rmi lam nad sel brtsol sgrub ltar//sgrub dang ting 'dzin rtsol byed kyang //'khor ba steng rtogs nyid byang chub//sgyu ma rgyu
20a4(rgyud): 'bras mi slu bzhin//blun rmongs de la de ltar snang //mnyam nyid rig pa'i rtsal can dag/'khor ba 'khrul pa'i tshig tsam du//ma nor lam rig blo la gsal//de la rtsol thob rlom sems med//
20a5(rgyud): sems nyid don dang ma mnyam nA//tsho gas mnyam pas don mi dpogs//'khrul 'khor mnyam las mA g.yos kyang //log rtogs sgyu ma'i tshul tsam snang //sems nyid ye sa d+yas rig nas//
20a6(rgyud): rig pa'i don la brtson sbyor zhing //rang byung yon tan rtsal bsdud pa//'khrul par 'brel pa ga la yin//byang chub sems ldan bsam rdzogs ni//ye shes mchog ldan mnyam nyid sra
20a7(rgyud): ting 'dzin mchog ldan bla mo'i dbang //dge bsags mchog ldan lus spyod pa'i//bsod nams mchog ldan gzugs kyi sku//rnam smin tshul gyis 'grub mi lta//brtsal nas thob par mi
20b1(rgyud): rgyu yi dus ting 'bras bu'i mchog stod pa'i sems nyid cing 'dzin//sems can dus na dan la skyo//rdzun grums la bzang mi byed//'khor ba'i sa shes 'di ldan gnas//mi gnas 'khor ba'i sdug pa /
20b2(rgyud): yid de dbyung chub 'khor ba'i lam dang 'bral//sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid ma ba'i chu'o//r-i byung rtags dril gaN+DIg tu mastos//mnyam pa nyid kyi don brtan par//chos nyidu la yang chos nyid gsal/
20b3(rgyud): pas mnyam zhes tshig brjod kyang //mnyam po'i don dang 'thun mi 'gyur//byang chub de yang mi dmigs te//mi gnas zhes ni gang brjod cing //gnas dang dmigs pa'i gnas 'dzin pa//gzung 'dzin
20b4(rgyud): zhes ni dul bya//rgyu 'drang byang chub sems med na//dngos bral yul med stong pa dag/mkha' la rang bzhin mi gnas zhes//bstan pa de ni yod ma yin//bsam gtan lus ni gtsor byed dang //
20b5(rgyud): gnas de lus kyi phyag rgya kun//mtshan mar mngon par zhen las byung //mtshan med sems la bya ba rtsol med//smig rgyu bzhin du lus rangad na//gnas dang phyag rgyar dmigs pa med//byed
20b6(rgyud): spyod che du sngon byed cing //bya med bya ba'i dmigs pa'ang med//de nyid ma skyes gzhi med pas//gnas bder lus btsos kha na med//zhan par 'chos lam spyod byed pa//de nyid gzung 'dzin
20b7(rgyud): rnam rtog ste//bsam gtan lus dben dben ma yin//mkha' la sems dben dben pa'i mchog/sems nyid dben pa'i gnas yin te//'di ni rnal 'byor spyod mchog gnas//
21a1(rgyud): gabar thug gzhal med min//sems nyid dpag yas gzhal med mchog/'di ni rmang byung nor bu'i gzhal//phyi dang nang med kun tu 'ang //'dra bar 'dus pa tshogs ma man/
21a2(rgyud): sems la ye shes tshogs 'dus mchog/chos kun 'dus pas lus pa med//dpag med rgyal ba mnyes pa'i tshogs//kun rdzob 'byor pa yo byad min//sems nyid 'byor pa rdzas dang ldan//
21a3(rgyud): lhag pa'i rdzas mchog 'di shes na//bsgrub 'grub 'di la the tshom med//sgom par byed pa sgom pa min//bsam bya dmigasu med po ste//'di ltar sems kyi gsang sgom pa//don la sems
21a4(rgyud): sgoskam ting 'dzin mchog/bsrung zhes bsrung bar bya mi dmigs//stong par skyes pa'i sems nyid//mtshan mar 'das nas chog shes na//bsrung ba'i gsang ba dam pa'o//tshig tu ma
21a5(rgyud): brjod mnyami dmigs//sems nyid rang dag mnyam pa las//mnyam pa'i don nyid lhag par med//'di don mnyam shes mnyam pa'i don//brtul zhugs spyod pa spyod min te//sems la
21a6(rgyud): sems gzhol rol spyod pa//thabs che yangs pa spyod pa'i mchog/byang chub don gyi phye mo ru//sems kyi phyi mor ye gnas pas//gsol thob me chen mo'i ming mi dmigs//dngos
21a7(rgyud): bub chen po rgyun mi 'chad//da ltar sems kyis sems mthong na//ye shes kyis ni chos nyid mthong //dus kun tu ni skye 'gag med//sngon ma mthong ba'i don mthong 'gyur/
21b1(rgyud): yang dngos po cang mthong //thad rang bzhin med pa zhig/blo la 'gyus pa kho nar zad//de lta bu'i don mthong na//mtshan mar mthong ba ci yang med/sgyu matsam du tshul shes nas//nam mkha' ma
21b2(rgyud): paba'i don snang 'gyur//kha cig dag ni dngon la//mthong ba ci yang med 'gyur na//snang ba zhes ni ci phyir gdags//med pa'i don dang 'gal 'gyur zhes//the tshom za 'gyur de dag la//mthang
21b3(rgyud): ba med pa'i don de nyid//yid kyi ngo la snang 'gyur na//snang zhes de phyir brjod par bya//de bas 'khrul pa ma zad par//nam mkha' mthong ba med pa de//de nyid yid la snang 'gyur yang //gzu
21b4(rgyud): la snang bar 'gyur ba min//sems nyid bden par mi mthong na//yid le mtshan med don gsal dang //mtshan ma 'khrul par rgyu ba gnyis//'dren mar rgyu byad 'bral 'gyur min//de
21b5(rgyud): nyid bden par mthong 'gyur na//de nas de ma thag du yang //yid kyi rgyu ba rgyun chad nas//sngar 'khrul mtshan ma'i chos bral te//des ni bden pa mthong ba yin//de bas 'dus pa
21b6(rgyud): chen po'i tshogs//sems ni yang dag lam nyid de//mkha' la bya lam rjes med bzhin//gol med lam zhes 'dren pas bshad//de ltar bshad pa'i lam de yang //kun gyi rto/
21b7(rgyud): par bya ba'i phyir//tshig tu mtshon te bshad mod kyang //dmigs med me gi yul bral ba//de yi rang bzhin de yin na//rang bzhin gzhi las mtshan mar g.yos//de la ming mang
22a1(rgyud): ming btags rgyus//yin dang ma yin the tshom skyes//de nas rjod pa'i gzhir gyur te//de bsel don phyir mtshan ma yi//tshig tshogs kyi rnam grangs las//sgo mo dpag tu med par
22a2(rgyud): bshad//de yis ngas don rjes bcad pa//thugs kyi klong nas badzin pa yi//tshigi sgrom mas don btsal ba//lam nyid ji ltar yin zhen//dran byung rjesu 'brangs nas ni//'khor ba'i gnasu 'ja
22a3(rgyud): bar 'gyur 'dran 'byung gAs ba ci bkag pa//de dag 'gog pa nyid du 'gyur//dran byung med par thun pa ni//mu stegs can lam mun par 'gyur//'di zhes semasu gcig gzung na//mtshan
22a4(rgyud): ma rtog pa'i ri bo yin//snga phyi med ces 'phyang bcad na//med chad pa'i mu can yin//gzhi yi don la yud tsam zhig/cir g.yos skye 'gag byung ba de//rnam grangs lam de 'phel 'gyur gyi
22a5(rgyud): lam gyi chos nyid pa la 'gyur//dper na 'gro gang byis pa dag/grib ma spangs nas rnam dag tshol//rang las byung ba'i rang bzhin gyis//brtsal na grib med dag mi rnyed//don nyid yi nas
22a6(rgyud): gnas bzhin du//sems nyid sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis//sha thang bar ni don tshol ba//don med bdud kyis las yino//don la tshig tu brjod pa ni//na mkha' dag la brtsod pa 'dra//
22a7(rgyud): tshig tu sman dang spyad bshad kyang //nad pa'i tshigs la mi drano//sems nyid don du ma shes na//tshig tu don brjod don mi rtogs//'khor ba spangs nas 'das tshol ba//gzugs btang na
22b1(rgyud): ni grib tshol 'dra//lam nyid ji ltar yin zhe na//ma rig ye shes tha dad min//ma rtags rtogs pa lam du gcig/sems 'di sna tshogs par snang bas//sna tshogs semasu gcig pa yin//dper na gas //
22b2(rgyud): du gcig pa las//dbyibs dang gzugs ni tha dad par//byis pas so'i yid du grags//grags kyang gser gyi ngor gcig/de bzhin sems kyi rang bzhin la//'khrul dang ma 'khrul khyad par gyis//
22b3(rgyud): ji ltar bltas dgu der snang yang //snang yang sems las gzhan mi dmigs//sgron mar 'bar badzin che ni//gal te ngan khung sbas gyur kyang //de nyid yon tan rang snang bas//'od ni mkha' la
22b4(rgyud): gsal bar 'gyur//de bzhin sems nyid rin chen sgron//lus ngan 'khor par bying gyur kyang //rang byung rang zhi rang snang bas//shes rab chos nyid mkha' la gsal//sems nyid na mkhar 'drar
22b5(rgyud): mtshungs te//kun khyab stong gsal sna tshegs 'byung //byung tshor g.yo 'gog thams cad kyang //rang bzhin gyis 'byung dang gos zhi//mdor na ji ltar brtags bsams bzhin//'gyur bas tha~Md ngor
22b6(rgyud): snang /ma bcos g.yo ba med nyid la//sna tshogs rgya 'byung mi skyon zhing //cho 'phrul mi 'gag nyam nga med//ji bzhin na mkha'i rang bzhin la//blo bzhag ma g.yengs kho nar zad//de ni skyes
22b7(rgyud): mchog don po che//de sems dus gsum thams cakyi//sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i ngo bo yin//de lta'i don la ring zhig nas//shes shing 'dris par gyur pa na//nges don mthong ba'i nyam drod ni//don dang
23a1(rgyud): /mjal ba'i rtags canu yang //man dgu lung gis brdzun 'char te//ngas dang rngan gsum myong bar 'gyur//da dku /tu phabs pa sa//da kun rtag cu
23a2(rgyud): bstan pa yin//de yi zhar las byung ba'i drod//'khor ba'i chos la snying rje yi//byang chub sems kyang skye bar 'gyur//mtshan ma rtog pa'i chos rnams la//yid mi ches pa'i 'du she skye
23a3(rgyud): chos rnams 'di ltar yin pa las//'di ltar 'khrul pa ngo mtshar che//ya mtshan dpyod pa'i 'du shes 'byung //'di don ma shes 'gro ba rnams//rtsol grub dka' ba'i thabs chen gyis//
23a4(rgyud): yang dag don tshel lam re ring //bsags pa'i bras bu yod 'gyur yang //don de mthong bar yong mi nus//de 'dra'i 'du shes 'byung bar 'gyur//de ltar shes pa'i nyams drod ni//
23a5(rgyud): skal dang ldan pa'i skyes bu gang //rgyus 'dros tshigs ma bkrol bar//sems las chos byung 'bum phrag yis//smra ba'i sgo mor thams cad gsol//de na la nges pa'i gtan tshigs dag/
23a6(rgyud): tshig tu mtshon te 'byin par nus//de ni cho sku mnyam nyid dang //dbyer med gnyisu med pa yin//rten pa'i gsung thug sku brnyan dang //de ni mtshungs pa yod mino//zhe lus mthar 'gog
23a7(rgyud): skyon gnyis dang //de ni mtshungs pa yod ma yin//sa la slob pa'i sems dpa' dang //de yang mi mtshungs rgyal bas gsungs//rigs dang drang srong don dpyod dang //lus 'dra sa
23b1(rgyud): ni yang ma tshungs//de phyir rnam dag la mche ni//sems kyi gsang 'di yin pas na//skal ldan 'dus pa chen po'i chags//lam 'dir shes par bya ba las//brtsal bar bya ba sems ma'o//lama'
23b2(rgyud): shes pa de nyid kyis//dka' ba'i brtsol sgrub ma byam par//thams cad thams cad sgrub par 'gyur//'dus pa chen pa'i tshogs de bas na seras 'di ni lam zhes bya'o//la ba zhes byar//son
23b3(rgyud): zhes bya'o//gru zhes bya'o//bgrod pa zhes bya'o//byang chub ces bya'o//sems shes bya'o//shes rab ces bya'o//ting 'dzin ces bya'o//gnas shes bya'o//rab ces bya'o//mchog ces bya'o//phul
23b4(rgyud): zhes bya'o//bla na med pa zhes bya'o//zab po zhes bya'o//gsang ba zhes bya'o//gting dpag dka' ba zhes bya'o//chos shes bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o//sangs rgyas shes bya'o//de ci
23b5(rgyud): phyir na na//'jug pa'i phyir ni la mo//'khrul po'i phyir ni 'khor ba'o//ma shes pa'i phyir ni sems can//sgrol pa'i phyir ni gru'o//bskyod pa'i phyir ni dgrod du'o//bde ba'i phyir ni byang chub
23b6(rgyud): dran pa nges pa'i phyir ni sem so//mkhas pa'i phyir ni shes ra'o//gsal ba'i phyir ni ting 'dzino//phyin pa'i phyir ni gnas//zla sde bI phyir ni rig/ngo mtshar ba'i phyir ni mchog/'phags pa'i
23b7(rgyud): phyir ni phu lo//dbang byed pa med pa'i phyir ni bla na med pa'o//gting ring ba'i phyir ni zab pa'o//gab pa'i phyir ni gsang ba'o//phra ba'i phyir ni gting dpag dgaka' ba'o//kun 'byung ba'i phyir
24a1(rgyud): cho so/sa non pa'i phyir ni byang chub sems dpa'o//mthar phyin pa'i phyir ni sangs rgyas te//sems dpa' chen po de'i phyir nA rnal 'byor gyi lam 'di shes par bya stang
24a2(rgyud): lam 'di ni chos thams cad kyi gzhi'o//sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yu mo//de ci'i phyir zhe na//chos thams cad 'di las byung ba'i phyir no gzhi'o//mthar phyin pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lam
24a3(rgyud): 'di nas gshegs par gyur to//da ltar ston pa nyid kyang lam 'di nas gshegs pa ste//de'i phyir lam 'di shes par bya'o//de ltar na de'i phyir lam 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa tha
24a4(rgyud): kyi yab ces kyang bya'o//de bzhin du yum zhes kyang bya ba dang sras zhes bya ba dang /bdag po zhes bya ba dang /gdung zhes bya ba dang /srog ces bya ba dang /nor zhes bya ba dang /bran
24a5(rgyud): zhes bya ba dang /sku zhes bya ba dang /gsung zhes bya ba dang /thugs zhes bya ba dang /yon tan zhes bya ba dang /phrin las chen po zhes bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/thabs chen po dang /
24a6(rgyud): shes rab chen po dang /byang chub chen po dang /dbang chen po dang //de bzhin nyid dang /'da' bar dka' ba dang /chos nyid la zad mi shes pa dang /snying rje chen po dang /rnam par
24a7(rgyud): brjirjod pa dang /sna tshog su ston pa dang /thams cad mkhyen pa dang /cir yang 'byung ba dang /mdzad pa sna tshogs pa'i phyir de dag ni de ltar yin par shes par bya'o//de'i phyir yang
24b1(rgyud): 'di yongasu shes par bya'o//de bzhin du 'dod pa chen po zhes kyang bya'o//'tsho ba chen po zhes bya ba dang /long spyod chen po zhes bya ba dang /yo byad chen po zhes bya ba dang /chu zhes bya ba dang /rkyen zhes
24b2(rgyud): bya ba dang /'bras bu zhes bya ba dang /spyod pa zhes bya ba dang /cho 'phrul zhes bya ba dang /phyag rgya zhes bya ba dang /bsnyen pa zhes bya ba dang /nye ba'i bsnyen pa zhes bya ba dang /bsgrub pa zhes bya ba dang
24b3(rgyud): sgrub pa chen po zhes bya ba dang /tshogs chen po zhes bya ba/kun tu rdzogs pa zhes bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/yul la 'dod pa sna tshogs pa dang /dmigs pas 'tsho ba dang /'jol tog tu spyod
24b4(rgyud): pa dang /dgos pa bsgrub pa dang /'bras bur byed pa dang /kun tu log pa dang /don grub pa dang /smin par bsags pa dang /rang bzhin du gyur pa dang /bya ba byed pa dang /sna tshog su 'byung ///
24b5(rgyud): ba dang /mtshan mar bstan pa dang /rnam par 'dud pa dang /shin tu mijed pa dang /'dod pa byed pa dang /lhag par 'dod pa dang /kun tu 'byor pa dang /lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir yongasu
24b6(rgyud): shes par bya'o//gzhan yang 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs 'di la ni thaMd yod/chos thams cad ni rnal 'byor rnam pa gsum du 'dus par shes par bya'o//gsum gang zhe na/rgyu'i rnal
24b7(rgyud): 'byor dang /rkyen gyi rnal 'byor dang /'bras bu'i rnal 'byor rnam pa gsum yang 'di nyid yin zhing 'di las 'byung bar shes par bya ste/de yang ji ltar zhe na/rgyu ni 'dul pa ni cig shes
25a1(rgyud): te chub par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di nyid shes par bya'o//de bzhin du mtshan ma gnyis dang /rtog pa gsum dang /log pa bzhi dang /nyon mongs pa lnga dang /phung po lnga dang /
25a2(rgyud): dbang po lnga dang /rgyu drug dang /rkyen bcus dang /skye ba bcus dang /rang bzhin bco brgyad dang /spyod pa bcug dang /smon pa bzhi dang /lam lnga dang /gnas drug dang /mu gsum shes
25a3(rgyud): te chub par 'dod pas kyang la mo 'di nyid shes par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'dod pa'i 'bras bu'i gzhir gyur pa'i phyir te/lam de nyid ma rig pa'i phyir 'khrul pa zhes bya'o//yul dang
25a4(rgyud): gnyisu gyur pa'i phyir na mtshan mA zhes bya'o//dus gsum dngos por rtog pa'i phyir rtog pa zhes bya'o//nges pa lngas log pa'i phyir don las gol ba dang /mnyam pa las gol ba dang /
25a5(rgyud): phyogs las gol ba dang /gzhi las gol ba'i phyir log pa zhes bya'o//rgyu 'bras kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyir mun pas 'thibs pa dang /sred pas gdungs pa dang /sdong pas non
25a6(rgyud): pa dang /mi phyed pas 'thas pa dang /kun nas 'khrugs pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa zhes bya'o//kunas 'dus pa'i phyir rgyu 'dus pa dang /rkyen du tshor ba dang /mtshan mar shes pa dang /thung
25a7(rgyud): nas byed pa dang /rnam par rig pa'i phyir phung po zhes bya'o//sgor gsal zhing kul la dbang byed pa'i phyir mthong por dbang ba dang /thos par dbang ba dang /tshor bar dbang ba dang /myong
25b1(rgyud): bor dbang ba dang /reg par dbang ba'i phyir dbang po zhes bya'o//'bras bur byed pa'i phyir 'dzin par dbang ba dang /mnyen par byed pa dang /chags par byed pa dang /g.yo bar 'dud pa dang /skyed par
25b2(rgyud): gsal ba dang /du su red pa'i phyir rgyu zhes bya'o//rkyen du 'brel pa'i phyir so bon dang /rtsa ba dang /myu gu dang /ldum bu dang /yal ga dang /sdong po dang /'dab ma dang /me tog dang /'bras bu dang
25b3(rgyud): snying po dang /skams pa'i phyir rkyen zhes bya'o//mtshan ma skye ba'i phyir mthong ba skye ba dang /snang ba dang /thos pa dang /sgra bsnyen dang /tshor ba dang /dri dang /myong ba dang /ro dang /reg pa dang /
25b4(rgyud): pa dang datsho skye ba'i phyir skye ba zhes bya'o//mtshan ma'i chos nyid can gyi phyir mthong ba'i chos nyid dang /snang ba'i chos dang /lhung ba'i chos dang /thos pa'i chos dang /grags pa'i chos dang /gsal bI tshwa/
25b5(rgyud): dA tshwa bI chos dang /dri'i chos dang /tshim pa'i chos dang myong ba'i chos dang /ro'i chos dang /bro ba'i chos dang /reg pa'i chos dang /reg bya'i chos dang /nges pa'i chos dang /shes pa'i chos dang /chos kyi chos
25b6(rgyud): dang rtogs pa'i chos nyid 'dzin pa'i phyir chos nyid ces bya'o//mtshan mar spyod pa'i phyir 'du she sgyur ba'i spyod pa dang /dbang du spyod pa'i spyod pa dang /rnam par g.yo ba'i spyod pa dang /sgro su 'dogs//
25b7(rgyud): pa'i spyad pa dang /zla las gal ba'i spyod pa dang /kun tu 'tshig pa'i spyod pa dang /bla bkyil 'tshal ba'i spyod pa dang /chags pa 'dzin pa'i spyod pa dang /kun tu bdud kyi spyod pa dang /phyin ci log/
26a1(rgyud): pa'i spyod pa dang /gnyis las rten po'i spyod pa'i phyir spyod pa zhes bya'o//'bras bur smin pa'i phyir rdzogs par smin pa dang /rim par smin pa dang blo bur dang smin pa dang /
26a2(rgyud): bsgyur te smin pa'i phyir smon pa zhes bya'o//bgrong par byed pa'i phyir gdung pa'i lam dang /'gog pa'i lam dang /mun pa'i lam dang /'dam gyi lam dang /yang ba'i phyir lam zhes bya'o//brte
26a3(rgyud): par byed pa'i phyir bzod ldan gyi gnas dang /yid ldan gyi gnas dang /mnyam ldan gyi gnas dang /'dod ldan gyi gnas dang /rtsod ldan gyi gnas dang /dga' ldan la gnas pa'i phyir
26a4(rgyud): gnas shes bya'o//bde bar mu bzung ba'i phyir ngo bo nyid kyi mu dang /byed pa dang /dbang phyugi mu bzung ba'i phyir mu zhes bya'o//'dus pa chen po'i tshogs rkyen gyi rnal 'byor ni 'di lta ste/
26a5(rgyud): pa gcig shes te chub par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di shes par bya'o//de bzhin du dran gnyis dang /tshul gsum dong /thabs bzhi dang /chos lnga dang /rigs drug dang /mdzad pa/
26a6(rgyud): chen po bcus dang /cho 'phrul chen po bcu sa dang /ye shes bco brgyad dang /sa'i khyad par bcug dang /sku bzhi dang /lam lnga dang /'bras bu chen po drug dang /byang chub chen
26a7(rgyud): po gcig shes te chub par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di nyid shes par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rang rkyen tsam du spyod cing 'bras bu'i rkyen du 'gyur ba'i phyir te/lam de nyid ma nor bar
26b1(rgyud): pa'i phyir de shes pa gcig shes bya'o//bden pa gnyi su snang ba'i phyir don gnyis pa zhes bya'o//mtshan nyid gsum gyis sbyor ba'i phyir kun brtags 'thun pa la yod pa'i tshul dang /gzhan dbang ma
26b2(rgyud): 'thun pa la med pa'i tshul dang /rjesu dpag pa gnyi ga ma yin pa'i phyir tshul zhes bya'o//mkhas pas zin pa'i phyir khad kyis 'jug pa'i thabs dang /rkyen la sbyor ba'i thabs dang /mngon par 'jug gi/
26b3(rgyud): thabs dang /thams cad rdzogs pa'i phyir thabs shes bya'o//rang bzhin la gnas pa'i phyir rgyu'i chos dang /lam gyi chos dang /rtogs pa'i chos dang /'bras bu'i chos la gnas pa'i phyir chos zhes bya'o//phyis
26b4(rgyud): 'byung bar shes pa'i phyir rgyu'i dran pa dang /'bras bu'i dran pa dang /sgra'i dran pa dang /sbyor ba'i dran pa dang /gnas kyi dran pa dang /mngon sum pa'i dran pa dang /rig pa'i phyir rig pa drug ces
26b5(rgyud): bya'o//gzhan gyi don du mdzad cing 'gro ba'i don la 'jug pa'i phyir ngo bo'i tshul dang /bltams pa'i tshul dang /rol pa'i tshul dang /mnga' dbang chen po'i tshul dang /thor bar gyur pa'i tshul
26b6(rgyud): dang da dka' thub chen po'i tshul dang /sangs rgyas pa dang /bdud btul ba dang /'khor lo bskor ba dang /bdud btul ba'i tshul dang /cho 'phrul ston pa'i tshul dang /mya ngan las 'das
26b7(rgyud): pa'i tshul gyi phyir mdzad pa chen po zhes bya'o//sna tshog su 'phrul pa'i phyir ti nge 'dzin gyi cho 'phrul dang /snang ba'i cho 'phrul dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang /kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul dang
27a1(rgyud): rje su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang /bsam gtan gyi cho 'phrul dang /byin brlabs kyi cho 'phrul dang /skye ba'i cho 'phrul dang /stobs kyi cho 'phrul dang /yon tan gyi cho 'phrul dang /
27a2(rgyud): 'bras bu'i cho 'phrul dang /de'i phyir cho 'phrul zhes bya'o//phyi nang gi chos thams cad shes pa'i phyir nang gi chos thams cad shes pa dang /phyi'i chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang /
27a3(rgyud): phyi nang gi chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang /stong pa'i chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang /don dam pa'i chos nyid shes pa'i ye shes dang /'dus byas kyi chos thams ca
27a4(rgyud): shes pa'i ye shes dang /mtha' mi dmigs pa'i chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang /dus gsum gyi chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang /blang dor mi dmigs pa'i
27a5(rgyud): chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang /rang bzhin gyi chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang /chos can gyi chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang /mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i
27a6(rgyud): chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang /dmigs pa med pa'i chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang /mtshan mar mi rtog pa'i chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang /ngo bo nyid
27a7(rgyud): kyi chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang /dngos po mi dmigs pa'i chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes dang /brten te gnas pa'i phyir mi gos pa'i rig pa dang /mi nyams par ri/
27b1(rgyud): pa dang /mi sgrib par rig pa dang /rdzogs par rig pa dang /ma g.yos par rig pa dang /mnyam pa nyi du rig pa dang /gnyisu med par rig pa dang /yongasu dag par rig pa dang /kun tu legs par
27b2(rgyud): rig pa dang /de ma thag par rig pa dang /rdzogs par chub pa'i rig pa la brten pa'i phyir sa zhes bya'o//kun tu brjod cing ngo bo nyi du gnas pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid dang /chos nyid dang rdzogs long spyod
27b3(rgyud): ba dang nga 'dren par sprul pa'i phyir sku zhes bya'o//bgrod cing 'jug pa'i phyir chags dang /sbyor ba dang /mthong ba dang /sgom pa dang /mtha' za du phyin pa'i phyir lam zhes bya'o//rgya la don
27b4(rgyud): yod pa'i phyir gcig tu rdzogs pa dang /thams cad du mkhyen pa dang /yongasu khyab pa dang /tshogasu 'byung ba dang /kun tu dbang ba dang /dgos pa tshang ba'i phyir 'bras bu zhes bya'o//mngon/
27b5(rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i phyir byang chub chen po zhes bya'o//'dus pa chen po'i tshogs 'bras bu'i rnal 'byor ni 'di lta ste/ma nor ba gcig shes te chub par 'dod pas kyang lam
27b6(rgyud): 'di rishes par bya'o//de bzhin du nges pa gnyis dang /yon tan gsum dang /dgongs pa bzhi dang /chen po lnga dang /tshogs pa drug dang /'byung tshul bcus dang /ting
27b7(rgyud): 'dzin bcos dang /ye shes chen po bco brgyad dang /rnal 'byor chen po bcug dang /bsgrub pa chen po bzhi dang /sbyor ba lnga dang /dngos grub chen po drug dang /rdzogs pa men po gcig
28a1(rgyud): shes te chub par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di shes par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rgyu nyid 'bras bur grub pa'i phyir gtan la phebs pas na ma nor bar zhes bya'o//the tsho mi za d+d+ha/
28a2(rgyud): phyir thabs kyis nges pa dang /shes rab kyis nges pas nges pa zhes bya ba'o//'dod pa 'byung ba'i phyir yang yongasasu khyab pa dang /rlab su che ba'i yon tan dang /rtsis las 'das pa'i/
28a3(rgyud): phyir yon tan zhes bya'o//thabs kyis ldem por dgongs pa'i phyir mnyam nyid la dgongs pa dang /mtshan nyid kyi phyir dus gzhan la dgongs pa dang /gnyen po'i phyir grangs gzhan la dgongs pa dang /bsgyur te/
28a4(rgyud): phyir don gzhan la dgongs pas na dgongs pa zhes bya'o//lhag par 'phags pa'i phyir mngon pa dang /bdag nyid chen po dang /de yin pa dang /thams cad che ba dang /kun tu rdzogs pa'i phyir chen po
28a5(rgyud): zhes bya'o//kun nas tshong ba'i phyir mnyam pa chen po dang /'byor pa chen po dang /'dus pa chen po dang /rig pa chen po dang /dbang chen po dang /'dres pa chen po'i phyir tshogs shes bya'o//gzhan gyi don/
28a6(rgyud): du 'byung zhing 'gro ba'i tshul dang 'thun pa'i phyir gan su bskyod pa dang /mnyam par gyur pa dang /mdzes par gshegs pa dang /spro bar spyod pa dang /gsang bar sbyor ba dang /mtshan ma bcom pa dang /
28a7(rgyud): mdzad pa med pa dang /seng+ge'i gsung sgra dang /nges par rdzogs pa dang /tsham ngam chen po sprul pa mdzad pa dang /yong su dag pa'i phyir rje drung tshul chen po zhes bya'o//gsal zhing mi gtong ba'i phyir
28b1(rgyud): sems kyi spyod pa ste/rnam dag dbyings kyi ting 'dzin dang /snang gsal yol 'byo'i ting 'dzin dang /mi zad mdzod kyi ting 'dzin dang /mngon par rtog pa'i ting 'dzin dang /thams cad rdzogs pa'i ting 'dzin/
28b2(rgyud): dang 'byung chen sprul pa'i ting 'dzin dang /dbang sgyur thabs kyi ting 'dzin dang /rtse gcig 'phros pa'i ting 'dzin dang /tshogs chen rdzogs pa'i ting 'dzin dang /rin chen myu gu'i tI nge 'dzin dang /dukra
28b3(rgyud): 'joms sman pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /bya ba byed pa'i ting 'dzin gyi phyir ting 'dzin ces bya'o//stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /rgyu'i ye shes dang /tha~Md 'byung ba'i ye shes dang /yo ge'i ye shes dang /phyag
28b4(rgyud): rgya'i ye shes dang /sprul pa'i ye shes dang /cir yang mdzad pa'i ye shes dang /me long lta bu'i ye shes dang /na mkha'i lta bu'i ye shes dang /sgyu ma lta bu'i ye shes dang /rin po che lta bu'i yis
28b5(rgyud): dang rtanyi ma lta bu'i ye shes dang /snang stong gsal ba'i ye shes dang /mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang /bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes dang /chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shesu
28b6(rgyud): gsal ba'i phyir ye shes chen po zhes bya'o//'dun pa sems dpa'i rnal 'byor dang /bka' sdod las kyi rnal 'byor dang /rigs tshon byed pa'i rnal 'byor dang /rtags kyi rnal 'byor dang /gsang sgo
28b7(rgyud): lung gi rnal 'byor dang /spyod pa rgyun gyi rnal 'byor dang /mtshan ma rtags kyi rnal 'byor dang /lung chen thob pa'i rnal 'byor dang /rig pa 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor dang /rtsal chen spyod pa'i rnal 'byor
29a1(rgyud): dang /yongasu rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor dang /lhun gyis grub pa'i rnal 'byor du gnas pa'i phyir rnal 'byor zhes bya'o//mnyam pa nyi du grub pa dang /bde ba chen por grub pa dang /yo/
29a2(rgyud): su rdzogs par grub pa dang /thams cad lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir grub pa chen po zhes bya'o//rgyu dang 'bras bur sbyor ba dang /thabs dang shes rab tu sbyor ba dang /dbyings dang ye shesu sbyor ba
29a3(rgyud): dang sems dang chosu sbyor ba dang /las dang thugs rjer sbyor bas sbyar ba chen po zhes bya'o//srid pa rgya mtsho dbyingasu tshim par grub pa dang /'khor ba rgya mtsho bdagos grub par gyur pa dang /
29a4(rgyud): bdag nyid chen po ldan gyis grub par gyur pa dang /dmigs pa gang yin pa de bzhin grub par gyur pa dang /cho 'phrul rdzu 'phrul thogs pa med par grub pa dang /don dam bcud kyis rnam shes
29a5(rgyud): rgyas par grub pa'i phyir dngos grub chen po zhes bya'o//rnam grangs thams cad byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen por rdzogs par grub pa'i phyir rngon pa chen po gcig ces bya'o//gzhan yang
29a6(rgyud): 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs sa'i khyad par chen po bcug non par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di la bslab par bya ste gang zhe na/'gyur dbang ma nges pa'i sa dang /brten pa bzhi'i sa dang /gal chen
29a7(rgyud): sbyor ba'i sa dang /mi ldog gnas pa'i sa dang /bslab pa rgyun gyi sa dang /cho 'phrul sprul pa'i sa dang /brten pas khyad par du 'gro ba'i sa dang /dmigs pas 'bras bu skye ba ri sa dang /kan+tha
29b1(rgyud): pas mi 'gyur ba'i sa dang /bdal ba chos nyid kyi sa dang /rdzogs pa spyir chib kyi sa ste/sa 'di dag non par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di la bslab par bya'o//gzhan yang 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs 'di lta
29b2(rgyud): ste/rnal 'byor bslab pa'i mtha' bcu tshib par 'dod ngas kyang lam 'di la bslab par bya ste/gang zhe na gzhi dam tshig 'dis bzung bar bslab pa dang /rgyud thos pas bgrol bar brlab pa dang /dul du
29b3(rgyud): mkhas par dbyung bar bslab pa dang /sgo kunas bsdud par bslab pa dang /rim pa dbang gis bgrod par bslab pa dang /la spyod pas dor bar bslab pa dang /thag lta bas gcad par bslab pa dang /
29b4(rgyud): nyam su ting 'dzin gyis blang bar bslab pa dang /don man nga gis bsgrub par bslab pa dang /mdo gcig tu bsdu bar bslab pa'o//'dus pa chen po'i tshogs gzhan yang 'di lta ste/yon tan gyi che ba sgo
29b5(rgyud): par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di la bslab par bya ste/gang zhe na/che bo nyi shu dang /rol pa nyi shu dang /cho 'phrul nyi shu dang /rngom pa nyi shu dang /brjid pa chen po nyi shu dang /tog chen po'i nor bu'o//
29b6(rgyud): gzhan yang 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs 'di lta ste rmang du byung ba'i mthu chen po nyi shu thob par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di la bslab par bya ste/nga yang gang zhe na/'jig rten chen po drug 'phang bar
29b7(rgyud): 'dod pa dang /chu'i phung po chen po brngubs te bstan pa'i 'dod pa dang /rlung gi bskal pa bcing bar 'dod pa dang /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'bum dgye bar 'dod pa dang /bsre pa'i bskal pa
30a1(rgyud): chen po gsum gzhil bar 'dod pa dang /na mkha' thams cad pa spu gtsigs dgang bar 'dod pa dang /ba spu gcig las sangs rgyas bye ba dgye bar 'dod pa dang /sang+yas
30a2(rgyud): ba ba spu gcig nang du shong bar 'dod pa dang /'khor ba thams cad ba spu gcig du rngub par 'dod pa dang /ba spu gcigs 'khor ba thams cad la khyab par 'dod pa dang /bskal pa'i blo/
30a3(rgyud): lo chen po ring du bsrub par 'dod pa dang /thung ngu bskul par 'dod pa dang /dus kyi 'khor lo chen po mnyam par bskor bar 'dod pa dang /'khrul par bskor bar 'dod pa dang /las kyi
30a4(rgyud): 'khor lo chen po rgyun du bskor bar 'dod pa dang /rgyun gcad par 'dod pa dang /srid pa'i khor lo bzlog par 'dod pa dang /lugasu bskor bar 'dod pa dang /sdug bsngal gyi 'khor lo chen
30a5(rgyud): po rgyun gtsang bar 'dod pa dang /dmyal ba'i 'khor lo chen po dong sprugs par 'dod pas kyang lam 'di la bslab par bya'o//'dus pa chen po'i tshogs gzhan yang 'di lta ste/rnal 'byor/
30a6(rgyud): rtog pa'i ri bo brgyad cu rtsa gcig gzhol bar 'dod pas kyang lam 'di la bslab par bya ste/dngos bzhi'i rtog pa dgu dang /mtshan ma'i rtog pa dgu dang /brtags kyi rtog pa dgu dang /rkyen
30a7(rgyud): phyi rtog pa dgu dang /las kyi rtog pa dgu dang /spyod pa'i rtog pa dgu dang /bskyong ba'i rtog pa dgu dang /zhon pa'i rtog pa dgu dang /mngon par rtog pa dbu'o//'dus pa chen pa'i tshogs/
30b1(rgyud): gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ltung ba'i sgo dgu shes pas kyang lam 'di la bsgrub par bya ste/de yang gang zhe na/bdud chen po'i ris ltung ba'i sgo dang /mu stegs kyi khamasu ltung ba'i sgo dang /srin po'i khas/
30b2(rgyud): su ltung ba'i sgo dang /gnod sbyin gyi ri su ltung ba'i sgo dang /ru tra chen por ltung ba'i sgo dang /bkrigs chen por ltung ba'i sgo dang /lha chen po'i ro suM lhung ba'i sgo dang /sho gam gcan chen gyi ris
30b3(rgyud): ltung ba'i sgo dang /dmyal ba chen por ltung ba'i sgo'o//'dus pa chen po'i tshogs gzhan yang 'di lta ste/lam 'dri shes par 'dod na sangs rgyas kyi chos shes par bya'o//ci lta ci ltar sa ng+yas kyi
30b4(rgyud): chos rnams ni rtag par yang blta'o//chad par yang blta'o//skye bar snangango //dmigs par yod//sangs rgyas kyi chos 'di ni 'dod chags dang bcas pa'o//zhe sdang dang bcas pa'o//gti mug dang
30b5(rgyud): bcas pa'o//nga rgyal dang bcas pa'o//phrag dog dang bcas pa'o//mchims med pa lnga dang bcas pa'o//de dang nye ba lha dang bcas pa'o//lci ba bzhi dang bcas bye'o//log pa brgyad dang bcas pa
30b6(rgyud): log pa brgyad dang yang bcas pa'o//gzhan yang 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs 'di lta ste/srog gcod pa dang bcas pa'o//ma byin par len pa dang bcas pa'o//'dod pas log par g.yem par
30b7(rgyud): bcas pa'o//rdzun dang bcas pa'o//phra ma dang bcas pa'o//ngag chub mo dang bcas pa'o//tshig khyal pa dang bcas pa'o//lnga ba sems dang bcas pa'o//gnod sas dang bcas pa'o//chog
31a1(rgyud): bu dang bcas pa'o//'dus pa chen po chags de bas na sangs rgyas kyi chos de rnams la spyod par 'dod pas lam 'di la bslab par bya'o//shes par bya'o//goms par bya'o//klong du/
31a2(rgyud): gyur par gyis shin ces sems dpa' rdo rje dam pas gsung so//rgyud pa'i rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las rnal 'byor rang bzhin gyi le'u stodang po'o////de nas
31a3(rgyud): deng 'dus par gyur pa'i 'dus pa phal mo che'i tshogs kyis rmad byung gi phyag rnal 'byor lugasu byas nas/sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa la 'di skad ces gsol to//sems dpa' chen po smra bar
31a4(rgyud): sang+ge khyod la bdag cag shin tu zhu bar spobs na snang ba'i skabs dbye ba gsol//de skad ces gsol pa dang /smra ba'i seng+ge des 'dri skad ces bka' stsal to//'dus pa chen po'i tshogs ji ltar zhu
31a5(rgyud): ba'i don snang gis kun tu spongs pa skyed la zhu ba'i don gsol cig/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /'dus pa chen po'i chags kyis a la la ho//zhes gsol to//smra ba'i seng+ge chen po khyad
31a6(rgyud): kyis rgya cher bshad pa'i rnal 'byor rang bzhin chen po'i don gyi rjes bdag cag 'jug par 'tshal na/'di la 'jug pa'i sgo du mchis/thabs ji ltar lags/lam gang ltar bde/songar
31a7(rgyud): chen po 'di'i don rgya cher ba shad du gsol//de skad ces gsol pa dang /smra ba'i seng+ges bka' stsal pa/grogs po dag leg so//shin tu leg so//nges par leg so//khyod kyis zhus pa'i don 'di
31b1(rgyud): rnams ngo mtshar che ste/chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i sgo gsal zhing rgya cher byed/rna logs la gus pA n+don cig gsal bar bshad par bya'o//de nas 'khor gyi nang du seng+ge'i gsung sgra yas chas r+b+ba/
31b2(rgyud): kyi sgo 'byed pa 'di gsal bar bshad par bya'o//sangs rgyas chos kyi sgo mo 'di//grangs mang bsam gyis mi khyab kyang //mdo ru bsdus na gsum du gsal//rtsol bas 'jug pa'i sgo mo dang //grub pa
31b3(rgyud): thabs kyi sgo mo dang //mthar phyir 'bras bu'i sgo mo'o//dang po la yang gsum yod//mtshan nyid thabs kyi sgo mo dang //thub pa rigs kyi 'jug sgro dang //grub pa lung gi sang sgo'o//de dag sgo mo re re
31b4(rgyud): la'ang //gsum gsum yong bar 'dren pas bshad//gnyis pa'i sgo la'ang gsum yod//shes rab rtogs pa'i sgo mo dang //ting 'dzin goms pa'i sgo mo dang //smon lam grub pa'i sku mor gsal//tha
31b5(rgyud): ma mthar byin sgo mo laM//rnam thar gsum gyi sgo zhes bshad//'jug pa'i lam la'ang 'di lta ste//dam pa gsum du gsal bde bshud//'dren pa chen po'i bde snod dang //thub pa chen po'i 'jug /
31b6(rgyud): dang dadam pa chen po'i mdzod gsu mo//'jug pa'i thabs kyang 'di lta ste//thabs las thabs byung thobs gsum ste//don dang yi ge ting 'dzin gyis//rje su gang gis rtags byas na//'jug pa'i thabs kyi
31b7(rgyud): dam pa'o//don gyi rje su 'jug pa yang //don chos nyid snying po la//rje su 'jug pa'i sems yin te//sems nyid chos la sbyor ba'i skabs//rnam pa bcu zhes 'dren pas bshad//bcu nyid gang dang gang/
32a1(rgyud): zhe na/'dun pa skye ba'i gnas skabs dang //rtsol ba sbyor ba'i gnas skabs dang /bslab pa 'jug pa'o gnas skabs dang //'dud shes 'gyur ba'i gnas skangs dang //sbyor chen/
32a2(rgyud): la 'jug gnas skabs dang //ro nyid tshor ba'i gnas skabs dang //yul la 'jug pa'i gnas skabs dang //rtog chen nyid la phebs skabs dang //de nyid gdong du gyur pa'i skabs//la su rung ba
32a3(rgyud): skabs dang bcu//bcu po de dag re re yi//skabasu sems dang chos phrad pas//rig pa byang chub sems re 'byung //byang chub sems ni gang zhe na//'di yi grangs kyang rnam pa bcu//g.yo ba byang
32a4(rgyud): chub sems nyid dang //de bzhin smon pa byang chub sems//ldang ba byang chub chen po'i sems//de bzhin sbyor ba byang chub sems//'jug pa'i sems dang dge ba'i sems//mi 'gyur ba dang
