32a5(rgyud): rog pa dang //gnas pa dang ni rdzogs pa'o//byang chub sems shos grags pas na//sems bcu dag du rgyal pos blo shad//byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin de//skabs bcu dag tu sbyor bla
32a6(rgyud): na/gzugs brnyan chos nyid ngo la snang //gzugs brnyan rang bzhin ci ltar snang //phra mo tsam gyi skar ma dang //de bzhin skar ma tha mal pa//skar ma chen po dag dang ni//zla ba tshes gcig ni/
32a7(rgyud): pa dang //gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi dang lnga//brgyad dang bcu drug rnam pa yi//gzugs brnyan dag tu snang ba ste//dngos par snang bcang ma yin//chu zla lta bur gzung du med//sems kyi na//
32b1(rgyud): brnyan snang ba dang //chos nyid gsal ba'i nyi ma gnyis//yul dang dbang po'i tshul lta bur//dbyings dang ye shes rang bzhin gsal//'di ni rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i lam//bgrod par byed pa'i thabs/
32b2(rgyud): chen yin//lam 'di gams par bslab blun//rdul 'byir bsgrub par bya ba'i mna'//gnas bcu dag kyang 'di lta ste//ji ltar sra gzhi gshin pa 'o//brti nas sa bon btab pa la so//'bras bur
32b3(rgyud): smin par gyur pa yis//'tsho bar byed pa'i srog 'dzin lhor//chos nyid kun gyi gzhir gyur pa'i//dam tshig 'di la brten nas ni//dngos grub lo tog smin pa yis//dge ba'i srog 'dzin dam
32b4(rgyud): pa'o//bslab pa 'di yid dmachog ste//bslab pa kun gyi gzhi 'dzin du//goms par bya ba rab tu gces//ji ltar cang shes kyi ling dag/sdom byed sgrogs bcing 'gyur ba//bkrol byas
32b5(rgyud): bde blag byung 'gyur na//ci la'ang thugs med 'gro ba lhur//sems kyi cing shes dbang po 'di//mi shes bcings pas bcings 'gyur ba//rnam grol thos pa'i sgo mo yis//shes rgyud kun
32b6(rgyud): grol thogs mad 'gro//'di ni mi shes rgyud 'grol ba'i//bcing bar bya ba 'gro ba ste//rgyang nas dgral ba'i bslab pa ru//goms par bya ba rab tu gces//ji lta mthon rtse mo'o//sgying rmi/
32b7(rgyud): lug par brtson 'dzegs ni//mtho sar phyin cing rtse non pas//yul khams rtogs shau lam la mkhas//de bzhin shes rab mthon r-i la//sgyid mi lugs pad+ma nyan bsams na//kun gyi
33a1(rgyud): phul du shes rab phyin//mkhas pa'i ye shes tshad med//don la mkhas par bya ba de//phul du dbyung ba'i bslab pa ste//shes rab chen po 'di dag la//goms par bya/
33a2(rgyud): ba rab tu gces//dper na bung ba khung tshol ba//kun tu 'jug cing byung nas ni//rang gi 'dzul khung gang yin par//nges par 'jug cing gnas pa ltar//rnal 'byor don gyi rjes tshol po//
33a3(rgyud): spyod sgo ci yod bstun te bsdu//lta sgor 'jugs cing rtags bskur na//ma nor nges pa'i dbu ma la//chos nyid don gyi rjes gcad phyir//sgo mo kun nas bskur ba yi//bslab par bya bA/
33a4(rgyud): mtha' yin te//goms par bya ba rab tu gces//ji ltar rgyal rigs rgyud byung ba//mang po'i dbang por dpon bstabs te//'khor lo la sogs rin chen gyis//kun la dbang bsgyur thob pa
33a5(rgyud): ltar//de bzhin rnal 'byor rgyud byung ba//chos kyi dbang por dpon bstabs te//phyag rgya la sogs rtags chen gyis//rim par kun gyi thog mar 'gro//'di ni dbang gi khyad par te//sa la
33a6(rgyud): rim par 'byung ba yis//rtsal byas bgrod cing bslab pa'i mtha'//goms par bya ba rab tu gces//ji ltar glang po chur 'jug pa//tsham chom chags thogs yod med par//dga'
33a7(rgyud): ba'i long spyod brod tshul gyis//mi ldog pha rol phyin pa ltar//rnal 'byor nges par spyod pa'i blo//brtul zhugs rgya mtsho'i chur 'jug pa//rtsal chen sbyong ba'i drod tshul gyis//chags tho/
33b1(rgyud): maumed par la dor ba'o//bslab par bya ba'i mtha' yino//spyod pa'i bslab pa dam pa ni//goms par bya ba rab tu gces//ji ltar khyung chen mkha' lding pa//gshog pa'i rtsal gyis nAm 'phangs
33b2(rgyud): gcod//ngam grog chu klung mtha' yas kyang //gshog rlabs 'og tu kun chung ltar//rnal 'byor mnyam nyid mkhar lding ngo //theg pa'i spyod sgro mtha' yas kyang //mnyam pa chen po'i don gyis ni//
33b3(rgyud): lta 'phang rlabs kyis thag gcad pa'i//'di ni re dang dogs pa yi//the tshom gcod pa'i lta bo ste//don la sems kyi lta ba ste//bslab po 'di dag goms pa gces//dper na rgya mtshor nor len
33b4(rgyud): mamed sbrul dang chu srin sbrang ma las//sogs pa gdug pa'i sdug bsngal kun//dka' bo nyam su blangs nas 'grub//de bzhin rnal 'byor bde tshol ba//rnam rtog bying rmugs phyir yang dgran ni//
33b5(rgyud): rdzadaka' ba'i lus 'di dag/nyam su blangs na bde thob rnyed//'di ni ting 'dzin dam pa yi//nyam su blangs pa'i bslab pa ste//sems kyi goms par bya ba'i las//'dres par bya ba rab tu
33b6(rgyud): gces//ji ltar mun pa dug dang rdzas//sman snang gser du bsgyur bas na//'gyur rtsi man ngag med pa'i mis//dka' ba'i las chen sna tshogs pas//sdug bsngal spyad kyang mi grub
33b7(rgyud): sde na su zhig man ngag ldan pa'i mis//tshegs med kyi na'i tshu l-i gyis ni//bsgyur bas sman snang gser 'gyur ltar//rnal 'byor chen po'i don sgrub pa//kun gzhi gnas 'gyur
34a1(rgyud): man ngag dang //gang dag mi ldan pas kyang ni//dka' ba spyad kyang 'grub pa min//sems kyi glusang 'di sus mthong ba//de dag man ngag ldan pa ste//'ad pa'i don mchog sa/
34a2(rgyud): yin pa//de dag tshegs med kyi nas 'grub//don rnams sgrub par gang byed do//nam ngag can gyis 'grub pa'i phyir//don rnams 'grub par 'gyur ba yi//bslab pa 'di dag rab tu
34a3(rgyud): gces//dper na kun tu rgyu 'i mi//'dod pa'i yul du 'gro byed na//yul gyi rnam pa mtha' yas kyang //bgrod pa'i lam nas gcig las med//de bzhin bsami gyis mi khyab pa'i//brgyad khri bzhi stong tsho stan
34a4(rgyud): kyang //bkri zhing drang ba'i tshig yin te//bsam pa'i yul ni gcig pa'o//don rnams gcig tu sdud pa yi//bslab par bya ba dam pa ste//nges par gcig las med pa'i phyir//'di dag gomos par
34a5(rgyud): ba yin//bslab pa 'di la goms gyur na//lobs pa'i yon tan mtha' yas te//lobs pas lam la mkhas par 'gyur//sngags kyi yon tan chen po yang //rma du byung ba thob par 'gyur//
34a6(rgyud): gsang sngags chen po'i khyad par ni//thams cad thams cad bya'o cog/byin gyi rlabs kyi spyod pa 'ami//dbang sgyur thabs kyi spyod pa ste//dper na na mkhar rgya 'tsho'am//ji ltar me dpung rgyal po
34a7(rgyud): 'dra de yang de yul che chung gis//khyad par nyid kyis brlabs pa yi//rgyal po de yang khyod par gyis//dbang sbyor bya ba'i khams rnams/che chung rim pa yod pa yin//rnal 'byor sngags tshul de
34b1(rgyud): ltar snang //thabs chen spyod la 'jug pa yang //bab chod tha du 'jug pa ste//dper na glang chen chur 'jug pa//rab dang glang chen bab mi bab//de yang rtsal skying drag zhan gyis//la la thadu gcod pa la//2
34b2(rgyud): laM bsreg pu 'gro ba yin//lal chung zhig bshan thabs 'bri//de ltar rnal 'byer rgyu nyid ni//'bras bu'i don la ba'i chod kyang //rtsal 'bang mthod dman khyod par gyis//ji ltar nus che der snang byur/
34b3(rgyud): sa dang gnas skabs ye shes dang //sgrib dang gol sa rtog pa dang //spyod dang dam tshig tong 'dzin dang //dus dang dngos grub mthar phyir dang //lta ba'i khyad par gnas kyur rnams//thams cad gcig lus
34b4(rgyud): med na yang //grangs dang dbye ba'i bye brag rnams//snod kyi rtsal dang sbyor nas ni//chos rnams kun gzhir gcig pa la//kun gzhi gnas 'gyur nom pa lngas//bye brag lam gyi chos snang //gzhi
34b5(rgyud): nyid rgyu yi kun gzhi dang //sbyor ba 'dun pa'i kun gzhi dang //snang ba don gyi kun gzhi dang /'gyur ba med pa'i kun gzhi dang //brtsal med gnas pa'i kun gzhi lnga//skabs lnga drug tu
34b6(rgyud): gnas 'gyur bas//sA yi khyad par bgrod pa yin//de yang gnyis kyi chom 'di dge/kun kyang yongs kyis rnal 'byor dang //'gro don gsum gyi 'gro ba ste//dge don dang ni sgrub pa po//rig
34b7(rgyud): 'dzin zhes ni rdzogs pa yin//des na rtsal gyis khyad par gyis//dang po las kyi rnal 'byor las//sogs pa'i rnal 'byor chungu rnams//rang rang rtsa ba bor nas ni//rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i rnal
35a1(rgyud): 'byor las//sogs pa'i rnal 'byur chen po'i tshul//spyod par byed dang don 'dod pa//skal bus mkha' lding las spyad kyang //baphrul ba'i yul ni chad pa yin//nar du/
35a2(rgyud): kyi 'phang dmas pa//rang skal 'tsho ba'i ched bor nas//rgyal po thabs kyis 'bring mtho ba'i//long spyod che la dmigs bcas kyang //de dgo sa 'thob 'tsho bral bzhin//bskal ldan can gyi don
35a3(rgyud): 'di dag/skal zhan dag gis 'grub par dka'o//sna tshogs gter gyi khang pa dag/rgyal po'i mdzod du gyur pas na//spyod sgo 'jug pa thams cad kyang //dka' thub phyi nang khyad par gyis//rin
35a4(rgyud): chen snga dgu'i rim pa dag/so'i las thabs mtho dman gyis//yul de gcig las med na yang //yig tshang sgo dgu sor spyod//rgyal por gyur na de kun la//dbang sgyur byed pa'i bdag
35a5(rgyud): po yin//mi gnas chos kyi dbyings nyid dag/blta ba'i yul du gyur pa na//rig pa rtsal gyi khyad par gyis//bal yul gcig las med na yang //so sor 'jug sgo kunas spyod//
35a6(rgyud): kyi rang bzhin gcig pa la//rtsal 'phang 'thon dman khyad par byas//skyes kyi gdung bu rtsi ba ltar//sa dang theg pa'i khyad byar du//'thon dman rim par snang ba yin//mnyam por gyur
35a7(rgyud): pa'i gzhi gcig la//'thun dang mi 'thun don gyis no//dper na khang pasgo mangs bzhin//sa dang theg pa so'i sgo//mi 'thun sor snang ba yin//si'i theg pa'i sgo rnams la//'jug pa la seM
35b1(rgyud): ma sbyangs kyang //kun gyi rtsa ba 'drir gcad pas//gcig ta tha dad yongs kyis med//de ni ri dang ldan pa 'am//kun tu rgyu dang gzhan ltung //mthong zlos ston pa'i khyad par ni//don gyis de ltar yang
35b2(rgyud): des ni chos rnams thaMd kyi//rtsa ba'i sems 'di yin pas na//nam mkha' lta bu'i dpes mtshon te//kun gyi rtsa ba shes par bya//'di ltar shes pa'i rnal 'byor pa//lam gyi thabs la mkhas pa ste//lam
35b3(rgyud): stosbyor lam bcwa la yam rnyed pas//nye lam bde rnyed grub pa'o//rnyed pa'i lam nyid gang zhe na//rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa yin te//sa bcu rims kyis bgrod pa'i phyir//sa yi khyad par bshad par bya//'di yi phan+ta/
35b4(rgyud): 'dzin spyod pa'i sa//rnam pa bcu phrag gci gis rdzogs/'gyur dbang ma nges sa 'di la//bcos mo 'phro med spyod pa dang //tshul rtags 'dzin dang mos pa dang //dge la 'dun pa'i rnal 'byor lnga//'jug ldog
35b5(rgyud): ltung dang bcas pa yis//kun tu 'khor zhing ma nges pa'o//'dun pa sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pa//gnas shing spyod pa'i sa zhes bya//bsten pa gzhi'i sa 'di la//dang po las can rnal 'byor dang //bslab pa
35b6(rgyud): sgyi nga dang nges pa la//dag dang ma dag gis spyod pa'o//dka' sdod las kyi dang po pa//gnas shing spyod pa'i sa zhes bshad//gal chen skyong ba'i sa 'di la//gnas shing spyod pa'i sa yin te//rigs chen 'byed ni/
35b7(rgyud): rnab 'byor nyid//dge dang mi dge'i las rnams kun//gcod skyeng sbyor ba'i tshul nyid kyis//legs nyes stobs chen byed pa'o//bslab pa rgyun gyis 'di la//g.yo dang thob dang brtan pa'i drod//de bzhin rta/
36a1(rgyud): chen g.yo ba dang //thob pa nyid dang brtan pa yi//rnal 'byor rnam pa drug pa dag/bsgrub pa'i gnas bcu mthar 'byin cing //ji ltar zla ba yang gsal bzhin//bslab pa'i ye shes
36a2(rgyud): 'phel 'gyur te//don la mi skrag ngo mtshar skye//dpyod sems 'jug pa'i shes pa des//ngan song me log dgon par 'jug/bor chad dag kyang de la byung //gsang sgo lung gi rnal 'byor dang /
36a3(rgyud): spyod pa rgyan gyi rnal 'byor dang //mtshan ma rtogs kyi rnal 'byor gsum//gnas shing spyod pa'i sa zhes bshad//bsod nams gter gyi sa 'di la//spyod pa rgyan gyi rnal 'byor nyid//mos
36a4(rgyud): po dag cing 'dun pa'i gnas//brtsal can blo yi bsti gnas so//bslab pa'i mtha' bcu spyir chib pa'o//bsten pas khyad pa gro 'di la//dbugs chen phyin pa'i rnal 'byor dang //rigs chen
36a5(rgyud): 'dzin dang mnyam rdzogs che//nges par spyod dang rtsal chen skyong //yul la 'jug dang rig par sbyor//bdun nyid rdzogs par 'gro ba ste//bslab pa'i rgyu 'bras 'di bcu la//goms par byed pa'i tshul/
36a6(rgyud): du sbyor//ngal bsngo ba la thams cad mthong //mi ldog so la goms char med//'di dag sbyor ba gzhi gcig kyang //sau thun mong ma yin pa'i//sgrib la sa zhes rtsi byed cing //ye shes re re 'char
36a7(rgyud): ba'id des na bslab pa'i mtha' gcig la//mi ldog la sogs rdzogs chen rnams//mnyam pa la gzhag re re la//ye shes re re 'char ba ste//tha ma rang byung nyid kyis rdzogs//mthar phyin
36b1(rgyud): pa dang thob pa dang //mi ldog rnams la rim pa bzhin//rmi lam dag dang sgra brnyan dang //mngon sum ngos paci rigs par//rnam chung du rje gral lkog/ s+ho//zhes ni nyid dang sgra khams dang //zheng kham
36b2(rgyud): kun tu bsgrags byas nas//rnal 'byor lung rab stan pa'o//dmigs pas 'bras bu skye 'di la//grub pa'i rnal 'byor rnal 'byor che//nges par 'byung ba'i rnal 'byor gsum//rgyal ba'i thugs las rgyal skyes
36b3(rgyud): shring /nga rgyal ba'i sras po gdung 'tshob pa//khyad par rtsal 'phang kun rdzogs shing //ting 'dzin gyi sbyor ba'o//gnas pas mi 'gyur sa 'di la//tsho gas chen 'dus po rtsal chen rdzogs//gsum du
36b4(rgyud): rdzogs par shes bya ste//phyag rgya chen po rgyu ma yin//'khor lor sbyar ba'i rgyal chen po//mthong ba'i gnas nas bcu drug pa//rdzogs pa'i gnas na longs pa'o//bdab ba chos nyid sa 'di la/
36b5(rgyud): ril pa brgyan gyi rnal 'byor dang //bde ba tsho dang thig ler rdzogs//ga sum nyid ni rdzogs pa la//yul don ye shes dri sbyar ba//shes par byas pas thams cad rdzogs//rgyu ma 'ang sgyu ma yin
36b6(rgyud): 'du rdzogs pa spyir chibs 'di ni//bcu yi tha me dang po las//mthar rdzogs su ni b+h+ya nag yin te/klung yangs nam kha'i stong po la//sprin med nyi ma'i 'bus kyi bad 'i/cir snyi N+DI yong ma yin mi/
36b7(rgyud): me skye mi 'gag nga bo la//ji ltar bltas dgu der snang ba//theg mchog hU~M kyai'i drangs kyis btsod//de yang lta ba'i khyad par gyis//de dag nyid chen po'i rnal 'byor dang //kun gyi grub dang rma
37a1(rgyud): yangs chub//gsum rdzogs rang byung bdal ba'o//'di ni rnal 'byor spyod pa'i lam//rnal 'byor can gyis bgrod par bya//gzhan yang 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor rnams//don gyi//
37a2(rgyud): rjes ni tshol 'dad na//tshig 'ga' thos pa tsam gyis ni//chog pa'i 'du shes ma bskyed cigo/khyed kun rnal 'byor yin mod kyi//yang dag don la rnal mi 'byor//spyod par 'gyur bar byed s+ho//
37a3(rgyud): kyi yang dag don du yong ma gyur//chags sdang las la zhen mod kyi//dam pa'i don la yong ma zhe na//long spong rgya cher byed mod kyi//chos nyid don gyi ro mtsho ro//bdag med phyogs bral zor
37a4(rgyud): mod kyi//nyon mongs lnga dang yang ma bral//brtul zhugs rtog pa tshems mod kyang //gzung 'dzin rtog pa yang mchoms//de bas 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor rnams//thos po cho gi sgron ma yis//
37a5(rgyud): yang dag don gyi gser btsal na//rtogs 'dod spre'u 'di bzung nas kyang //rkun mo byi la btags byos te//gse khung skar khung kun dgag cing //khang stong phang phung ba shig nas ni//rgyal
37a6(rgyud): bopo'i skor mdzod kha phye na//de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas yin//yang dag don gyi lam tshol na//rtog pa'i skyon lnga spang bar bya//rtog pa rags pa'i ri bo dang //mtshan mu rgya batshor ba dang //
37a7(rgyud): byung tshor skyon lnga gsal ba bya//rtog pa la yang gnyis yod//rags dang phra bar snang ba yin//de bzhin mtshan mche chung gnyis//rgyu ba ring mo thung gnyis//de bzhini tshor ba gsal mi
37b1(rgyud): gsal byung tshor gnyi sa snang ba yang //myur ba dang ni bul ba'o//'di ni don la sgrub pa yi//rtog pa chen po'i gags chen yin//ci phyir don de mthong phyir//mun pa dang ni 'khrigs pa dang //kun tu
37b2(rgyud): la thibs dang sprin phung dang //na bun lta buri bsgribs pa yis//yang dag mi gsol mthong mi 'gyur//'di yang bye brag gnyis gnyis te//mun pa mun nag chen po dang //kunas 'thibs pa lta bu dang /
37b3(rgyud): kun tu 'khrigs dang bsgribs pa dang //'thibs pa chen po chu ngu gnyis//sprin chen 'thibs dang 'al 'ol dang //na bun gtams dang ban bun gyis//gnas ngan gsum dang mi'i gnas dang //'dod/
37b4(rgyud): khams bzhi yi lha gnas dang //gzugs kyi khams dang gzugs med khams//nyan thos rang rgyal gnasu lhung //lhung bar 'gyur ba'i skyon che ni//mtshan ma'i g.yeng ba rnam drug yin//rang
37b5(rgyud): bzhin yul la g.yeng ba dang //de bzhin phyi rol g.yeng ba dang //nang mtshan ma'i g.yeng ba dang //yid la byed dang gnas ngan len//'di dag rab tu gsal bar bya//bsal nas don la mnyam
37b6(rgyud): bzhag che//mnyam pa'i don la sgrib pa'i skyon//rnam pa lnga 'byung 'di lta ste//byung tshor dbang gis g.yeng ba dang //byang rmugs dbang gis 'thibs pa dang //'dzin chags dbang gis 'gog pa
37b7(rgyud): ther zug dbang gis rtog pa dang //phyal pa'i dbang gis med pa ste//'di ni mnyam pa'i skyon yino//skyon chen de dag glan pa'i chos//sems kyi lon 'di rgyal bas bshad//'dus pa chen po'i
38a1(rgyud): rnal 'byor bya//rnam par mi rtog don chal na//gcig pu dben pa'i sa bzung ste//chud ma gsum dang ldan pa'i bras//rnam par rtag pa'i rjes gcad pa//'od med sngon thos
38a2(rgyud): galas byung //brtags pos rtog pa rtas las byung //rtog pa rgyu mar rab shes na//rtog pa'i ri bo zhi bar 'gyur//des ni gnas ngani gsumi ltung //rtog pa gang las byung zhe na//mtshan
38a3(rgyud): ma'i chos las byung ba yin//mtshan ma sgyu mar rab shes na//mtshan ma'i chos rnams zhi bar 'gyur//des ni 'dod khams tha mar min//mtshan ma gang las byung zhe na/dran pa rgyu ba
38a4(rgyud): dag las byung //dran pa skyon du shes gyur na//rgyu ba'i skyon rnams sel bar byed//mthu des 'dod khams gnyis par min//rgyu ba gang las byung zhe na//tshor ba dag las byung ba yin/
38a5(rgyud): dag cing skye bar bya ba med//tshor ba sgyu mar shes gyur no//skyon gyi tshor ba sel bar byed//'dod khams gsum par ltung mi 'gyur//tshor ba gang las byung zhe na//byung tshor phyi nang
38a6(rgyud): ngadag las byung //dag cing skye bar bya ba med//de nyid skyon du shes 'gyur na//de ltar shes pa'i mthu yis ni//'dod khams bzhi par mi ltung //byung tshor gang las byung zhe na//sems
38a7(rgyud): kyi chos las byung ba ste//sems nyid rgyu mar rang shes na//sems kyi chos rnams zhi bar 'gyur//phung po gzugs brnyan 'dra ba la//sems nyid smig rgyu lta bu yin//yod med
38b1(rgyud): gnyis kyi mtha' las 'das//de ltar shes pa'i rnal 'byor pa//'dod khams lnga par lhung mi 'gyur//sems nyid yod pa'i dngos pa 'am//mad ces bya bar mi lta bar//mu stegs can du ltung
38b2(rgyud): 'gyur//bying rmugs can du ma gyur pas//'du shes med par lhung mi 'gyur//'du shes rje su ma 'byangs par//sems can gnasu de mi 'khor//kun gzhi'i don la goms pas ni//nyan tho
38b3(rgyud): gnasu de mo ltung //stong zhing zhi bar mi byed pas//rang rgyal lta bar de mi ltung //rnam dag stong par mi byed pas//byang chub spyod par ltung ma yin//mnyam nyid stong pa'i don dag la//so tha dad mi//
38b4(rgyud): 'byed pas//sa yi rim par mi ltung zhing //rims kyi sbyang zhing 'phan+da med//yang dag don gyi rang bzhin//ci la mi gnas mo len cing //ci yang mthong thos pa med//cir yang mi byed byed dang
38b5(rgyud): bral dade ci yang thos pa rdul tsam med//cir yang snang po med pa de//de ni snang ba dam pa yin//bsam du med pa'i chos nyid ni//bsam du med pas de bzhin gzhag/rang bzhin med pa'i chos
38b6(rgyud): nyid la//sems kyi gyin 'da' skad cig mas//mI g.yo rgyun du dran par bya//de ltar don la mnyam bzhag na//rtags kyi tshor ba 'di ltar 'byung //drod dang rtags dang cho 'phrul dang //mngon shes dang ni ye
38b7(rgyud): shes 'byung //drod ni g.yo dang thob pa dang //rtags ni byung ngo nga brtan pa dang //cho 'phrul byung dang rdzogs pa dang //rig pa phra mo thams cad gsal//des ni don rnams rdzogs pa yin//dper na mun pa
39a1(rgyud): sangs pa dang //snad ba rgyad drung na mkhar drung //kun tu mthong dang thams cad gsal//de ltar shes pa'i mthu yis ni//bag chags mun pa kun bsngal to//dzI myur rlung gi
39a2(rgyud): phyophyags ltar//skad cig tsam gyi ting 'dzin gyis//sgrib pa'i phung po'i phyag par 'gyur//ji ltar mar mes mun bsal na//mun nyid snang bar 'gyur ba bzhin//skad cig ma yi//nr-i rig pas/
39a3(rgyud): sngonas bsags pa'i mun pa sel//de ltar rig pa'i skyes bu ni//don la rig pa'i sgo bya zhing //chos kyi mig dang de ldan pas//mthong thos tshig le'u tshig bzhir bsdebs//sa pa yin pas don
39a4(rgyud): le spyod//chos kyi mig dang ma ldan na//mu mtha' yas pa'i tshig rnams kyis//don gyi tha snyad ci brjod kyang //nor ma nor gyi don mi dpogs//tshig phyir blo 'brings dmu rgodade//bslag pa'i/
39a5(rgyud): sa dang lam pa yin//tshig don 'bum phrag ci brjod kyang //gzhan la ston par ma byed cig/bstan na rdo rje bka' rkun de//dmyal ba rdo rjer de ltung 'gyur//gang dag tshul 'phyos mkhan
39a6(rgyud): dgra gi/don la blo sheng ma bye bar//tshig dang yi ges khrid nas ni//mi shes bzhin du chos bstan na//sems can thams cad srog phrogs pas/mi shes chos ston de bas lci//de bas mnyam
39a7(rgyud): pa'i don 'di la//bstun te cig car 'jug shes na//bsgom pa'i yu ni ring thung dang //las 'phro yod dang med pa dang //nam gru snyam pa'i khar ma lus//mnyam pa'i don la mnyam ngan
39b1(rgyud): nang de ma thag tu rig pa 'tshar//mnyam pa'i don las ma g.yos na//gzugs khams gnasu de mi ltung //mnyam pa nyid la ma chags na//gzugs med khamasu ltung mi 'gyur//mnyam nyid mngon du gyur pas/
39b2(rgyud): nadar nyan thos gnasu da mi ltung //ci yang med pa'i don mthang na//sangs rgyas zhes ni de la bya//des ni ting 'dzin khyad par 'di//rnal 'byor can gyis 'dris par sgom//thams cad mi rtog skye med cing //rtog pa'i
39b3(rgyud): mtha' spangs na mkha'i dbyings//ji bzhin mi g.yo mnyam pa nyid//mtshan ma'i rtog pa yul las 'das//yul med na mkha'i rang bzhin las//snying rje chen po'i byang chub sems//nyim stong gi dkyil
39b4(rgyud): 'khor shar//mtshan mo'i chos rnams kun la khyab//nyi ma 'bar ba snying po las//'od zer yig 'bru'i mchog tu gsal//thams cad 'byung ba'i yi ge a//ci yang 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin las//sprul
39b5(rgyud): pa'i cho 'phrul thams cad 'byung //de yang rtsal gyis khyad par las//dbugs kyi yul dang tshor ba dang //thos dang mthong ba la sogs te//sems kyi yul dang na mkhwa'i dbyings//chos kyi dbyings
39b6(rgyud): kyi mthas klas par//rang bzhin yi ge bsgyur yi ge/yan lag yi ge so so yi//rtsa ba la sogs gzhi gcig bcas//'phro 'du chad kyang phyag rgya yi//tshom bu'i grangs kyang de bzhino//'di ni
39b7(rgyud): dang po'i 'jug rings te//mthar gyis 'dris shing goms byed pa'o//yi ge'i ye shes las skrun te//don byed pa dang phyag rgyar bskyed//rgya mtsho ga non dang na mkha'i skas//rlung bcing ba dang rgyun bzlog//
40a1(rgyud): dang dad bsreg pa'i bskal pa gzhil ba dang //nyin zla zhon dang 'jig rten 'phang //sa la 'dzul dang ri rab 'dregs//stong gsum yungs 'brur 'jug tshul dang //gzhig dang spang
40a2(rgyud): ba la sogs te//bsam bya bsam gyis mi khyab pa//goms pa la su rung ba yi/rnal 'byor rtsal chen skyong bar zad//bzlas pa'i mthar phyin grub pa dang //btsod pa yongs rdzogs pa dang //bsar
40a3(rgyud): pa la su rung ba dang //don mthong ba dang tshig grub pa//bya ba yong su dag pa dang //don cig yul la sor snang //des na ting 'dzin khyad par yang //dbyings nyid gcig la sgomo gyi//rnal 'byor rtsal gyi khyad
40a4(rgyud): bar gyis//bsam pa'i yul ni sna tshogs te//dang po'i sa la gnas pa yi//brje pa la sbyirnal 'byor pa 'dun pa sos pa'i rnal 'byor las//so/TI rnal 'byor rna drug/shes rab rtsal gyi 'phang ngoms pas//ting
40a5(rgyud): 'dzin rtsal yang chung ba ste//don la mthong bar ma 'gyur te//rang gis mos pa'i lha sgom ni//lha yi sa bon gang yin pa//kha dog tshon gyis phye nas ni//sna yi dbugs la rgyu byas te//dbugs
40a6(rgyud): kyi yul dra gyur tshe du//zung bsgril par 'phrogasal ba las//'phro 'dra'i gnasu bskyed par bya//rang gi chag tshad dang sbyar ba'o//sku yi khyon yang de tsamaM//nanyes pa'i so la gnas pa yi//
40a7(rgyud): bka' sdod las kyi rnal 'byor las//sogs pa'i rnal 'byor rnam bzhi pa'o//ting 'dzin rtsal gyi khyad par ni//sa boni rang bzhin yi ge la//'od zer 'bar bar bcas pa de//dri chung
40b1(rgyud): yul ni tshun cha ru du//'phro du gsal bar bskyed pa las//rang gi chag tshad gnyis bsgyur ba'i//sku yi khyon yang de na mo//gsum pa'i sa la gnas pa yi//rnal 'byor lung gi bka' bsgo las//sogs pa'i/
40b2(rgyud): rnal 'byor rnam gsum po//dmigs pa'i ting 'dzin 'di ltar 'dod//lha yi sa bon gang yin pa//rang bzhin yi ge rabasgyur byas te//'od zer 'bar dang bcas po yi//thos pa'i yul ni tshun chad du//'phro 'du
40b3(rgyud): gsal par byas pa lam//rang gi chag chad bzhi bskur tsam//sku yi khyon yang de tsam//de bzhin rnal 'byor rim pa bzhino//l-I ye khyad par gang yin pa//yi ge'i rim pa bzhin byas nas//'phro 'du'i tshad kyang
40b4(rgyud): nga bzhin te//rim pa bzhin du sbyar nas kyang //'phro 'du gsal bar gyur pa dang //sems kyi lhogs tshad tshun chad du//sku yi byin gyi byang bar yang //chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' klas pas/U yi byin gyis
40b5(rgyud): gang bar bsgom//gzhan yang 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor rnams//yi ge'i rjesu don dpags na//yi ges don rnams ston par 'gyur//ci phyir don nyid yi gar snang //dbyings las a byung e las me//yi ge'i
40b6(rgyud): tshogs kyu sna tshogs sa phros//sa ni rang bzhi na yi ge ste//rten dang bral bas rgyu rkyen med//kun la khyab pas na mkha' 'dra//a ni chos nyid cho 'phrul te/chos nyod zab mo'i ngang lam ni/cho 'phrul yi
40b7(rgyud): ge a byang bas//am ni chos nyid mtshon par byed//aM las yig 'bru'i tshogs 'phros te//tshig tshogs bstan pa rgya mtshor grags//yi ge'i sgra skad kun bzung ste//sna tshogs yi ge'i skadadu bsgyur/
41a1(rgyud): yig 'bru'i yan lag mang po rnams//rang bzhin a yi ngang du 'dus//thugs kyi klong nas a byung bas//a yi 'od zer 'phro 'dulas//mgur gyi gsang bar shar ba las//gsung sgra ya
41a2(rgyud): ge ltar 'bros pa//a ka kha ga g+ha rang /de nas a yi 'od zer de//ljags kyi zla gam pad+mor 'phros//ljags kyi mthil du 'khyil pa las//'od zer yig 'bru lngar shar ba//tsaM tsha dza d+ha nya/de nas
41a3(rgyud): sa yi 'od zer de//ljags kyi rtsel 'bros pa las//'od zer yig 'bru bcu pa shar ba//Ta wa DA nA N+Da ta b+he da d+han//de nas oM yi 'od zer de//zhal gyi sgronas 'bros pa las//cho 'phrul yi ge wa
41a4(rgyud): shar ba//pa pha ba b+ha me//de nas a yi 'od zer de//phyi rol yul du 'bros pa las//cho 'phrul yi go sna tshogs 'phros//ya wa ra la sha Sha sa hA k+Sha/i I/mu U/e ai/oM o/aM aH/a
41a5(rgyud): las cho 'phrul 'od 'bros pas//yi ge'i phre ba tshogs byung ste//yi ge'i yan lag ye shes la//sangs rgyas sku yi sa bon byung //dpag med pa'i rgyal ba rnams//sku dang gsung dang thugs sprul bI
41a6(rgyud): tshogs//phyag rgya sna tshogs mdzes par snang //des na yi ge'i rang bzhi ni//rgyal ba'i sku nyid yin par bshad//a ni thugs kyi sa bon te//ka la sogs pa dang po lnga//mgur gyi gsang ba'i ring
41a7(rgyud): bzhin yin//gnyis pa ca la sogs pa lnga/zla gam ljags kyi rang bzhin yin//gsum pa Ta la sogs pa bcu//ljags kyi rtse mo'i rang bzhin yin//bzhi pa pa la sogs pa lnga//zhal gyi sgros
41b1(rgyud): can anas samasasamathas ma/thasamam yamaHthamamam#
41b2(rgyud): las byung bang bshad//lnga pa ya la sogs pa yi//bcu tshan gnyis kyi yi ge dag/sku las 'phros par rab tu bshad//zhabs kyi 'khor lo'i 'od zer las//sgrib pa sreg pa'i yog 'bru ha//gsang ba'i
41b3(rgyud): mkha' mi 'od zer las//cho 'phrul 'byung ba'i yig 'bru kA//sku yi khrun tshad lte ba las//'dod pa 'byung ba'i yig 'bru hA//thugs khar 'khyil pa'i dpal be'u las//mtshan ma dag pa'i yig 'bru
41b4(rgyud): sha phyag 'khor lo'i 'od zer las//cho 'phrul ston pa'i yig 'bru shu//skyes bu chen po'i dpung pa las//rtog pa 'joms pa'i yig 'bru la//skyes bu chen po'i lha zur las//'dod chags sreg pa'i yi
41b5(rgyud): ge ra da skyes bu chen po'i dashwak+sha pra las//gti mug sel ba'i yi ge wa//skyes bu chen po'i byin pa las//'khor ba gnan pa'i yig 'brul//skyes bu chen po'i spyan gnyis las/rab bzhin yi ge yi
41b6(rgyud): /gnyis shar//skyes bu chen po'i snyan gnyis las//rang bzhin yi ge u gnyis shar//skyes bu chen po'i shangs gnyis las//rang bzhin yi ge e gnyis shor//skyes bu chen po'i tshems gnyis las//
41b7(rgyud): rang bzhin yi gau oM gnyis shar/skyes bu chen po'i spyi gtsug nas//rgyal ba'i swa bana~M aM du shar//des na yika 'bru'i yan lhag kur//rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i sku gdung thugs//oM ni sku yi rang bzhin teng
41b8(rgyud): AHnI thugs kyi mtshan nyidado//yi go'i phreng ba mang po kun//gsung brjod gsung gi rang bzhi no//AHni tsha sku'i rang bzhin te//oM na long spyod rdzogs pa'i sku//yig 'bru 'bar ba'i phreng ba rnams//sprul
42a1(rgyud): pa 'dren pa'i sku zhes pa shad //a ni chos kyi dbyings yin te//oM ni rig pa'i ye shes yin//yig 'bru 'bar ba'i phreng ba rnams//chos dpos nyid rang bzhin yin//a ni brjod pa'i chu
42a2(rgyud): yin te/oM ni tshig tshogs 'byung ba'i rgyu//tshi ga tshogs nyid yi ge yin//yi ge ring ba'i tshi gi mdzod/yi ge 'od zer 'bar 'phros pas//chos dang chos ma yin pa rnams//ngagi dbang po kha phye ste/
42a3(rgyud): don dang tshig du rgyas par 'gyur//sgra skad kun gyis sdus pa'i tshogs//yig 'bru phreng ba'i ngang du rdzogs//tshig dang yig 'bru thams cad kun//oM gyi rang bzhin ngang du rdzogs//oM gyi cho 'phrul tha~Md kun//
42a4(rgyud): a yi rang bzhin dbyingasu zha//a ni yig 'bru kun gyi gter//a ni chos kyi dbyingasu thim//des ni rgyal ba sangs rgyas rnams//sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje de//'dul ba'i dbang gis khyad par gyis//
42a5(rgyud): yang 'gyur zhing cir yang snang //sa dang na mkha' me dang rlung //chu la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams kyis//'dul ba'i 'gro ba de rnams la//sa dang na mkha' la sogs pa'i//chu dang rlung gi ngo bor snang //gang
42a6(rgyud): dag sku yis 'dul ba'i tshe/sku dang gzugs brnyan ring bsrel dang //rten la sogs pa tha dad par//'jig rten kun tu ston par 'gyur//gsung gis 'dul dri dus byung na//dbyangs kyi yan lag drug
42a7(rgyud): cu las//sogs pa sgra skad sna tshogs dang //yi ge'i gzugasu bstanas ni//'khor ba'i kham su snang bar byed//ci'i phyir zhe na yi ga ni//de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yin to//de bzhin gshegs hUM/
42b1(rgyud): rang bzhin te//thugs rje'i rang bzhin yin byas na//thabs kyi bye brag sna tshogs kyis//thams cad grol bar mdzad pa'o//de bzhin yi ge'i tshogs 'di yang //yan lag sbyor sdud sna tshogs kyis//tha~Md chab du go bar/
42b2(rgyud): byed//yi ge rang bzhin ye shes ni//so'i don rnams bshad parari bya//a ni ma skyes ye shes yin//rang bzhi thams cad stong par ston//ka ni bya ba'i ye shos de//lam gyis thams cad grol bar rdzo
42b3(rgyud): kha ni khyab par byed pa'i sgo//mi dmigs thams cad grol bar ston//ga ni don du gyur pa'i sgo//yul med thams cad grol bar ston/g+ha ni gnas pa'i sgo yin te//gcig tu ma nges grol bar ston//nga nI 'a
42b4(rgyud): pa med pa'i sgo//'dzin bral thams cad grol bar ston//tsa ni 'gag pa med pa'i sgo//cir yang snang bas thams cad 'grol//tsha na 'da' ba med pa'i sgo//'bral ba med pas zed 'grol//dza ni me byung ba'i sgo/
42b5(rgyud): mi gnas pas ni thams cad grol//dz+nyA ni rnyog ma bral ba'i sgo//dri ma dag pas thams cad grol//nyan spyod dang bral ba'i sgo//bya ba med pas thams cad grol//Ta ni nga rgyal med pa'i sgo//ri bo med pa ma tha~Md grol//
42b6(rgyud): ni sgra rtsal med pa'i sgo//byed pa med pas thams cad grog/Da ni 'dres pa med pa'i sgo//rtsod pa med pas thams cad grol//d+hu ni srub med pa'i sgo//sgyu ma thams cad grol bar byed//Na nI yul drA
42b7(rgyud): ba'i sgo//'dzin pa med pas tha~Md grol//ta ni tha snyad med pa'i sgo//brjod pa med ngas thams cad gror//tha ni rten dang bral ba'i sgo//gnas pa med pas thams cad grol/de ni stong dang bral ba'i sgo//pen pa
43a1(rgyud): med pas thams cad gol//d+ha ni rang bzhin med pa'i sgo//mtshan nyin med pas thams cad grol//na ni yul dang bral ba'i sgo//'dzin pa med pas thams cad grol//pa ni nges par 'byung
43a2(rgyud): sgo dang 'gag pa med pas thams cad gre la//pha ni dngos po med pa'i sgo//ci yang med pas thams cad grol//ba ni brjod pa med pa'i sgo//brjod pa med pas thams cad grol//b+he ni rdul dang bral ba'i sgo///
43a3(rgyud): rtog pa med pas thams cad grol//me ni chags pa med pa'i sgo//rtag pa med pas thams cad grol//ya ni chags pa med pa'i sgo//gos pa med pas thams cad gol//wa ni rgyu rkyen med pa'i sgo//'bras//
43a4(rgyud): bu med pas thams cad grol//ra ni rkyen dang bral ba'i sgo//dor ba med pas thams cad grol//la ne blang ba med pa'i sgo//yon tan med pas thams cad gro'o//sha ne spros pa myed pa'i sgo//zhi bas thaMng
43a5(rgyud): brel bar byed//la nI khur dang bral ba'i sgo//lci ba med pas thams cad grol//sa ni yang dgra gsang ba'i sgo//nges pas thams cad grol bar byed//he ni rgyu dang bral ba'i sgo//rkyen dang bral ba//
43a6(rgyud): grol bar byed//a ni khams dang bral ba'i sgo//mtshan nyid med pas grol bar byed//i ni mthong ba med pa'i sgo//gzugs dang bral bas thams cad gro lI//u ni thos pa med pa'i sgo//sgra dang
43a7(rgyud): bral bas thams cad grol//e ni tshor ba med pa'i sgo//dri dang bral bas grol bar byed//oM ni tshor ba med pa'i sgo//rig dang bral bas thams cad grol//oM ni tshe 'phrul 'byung ba'i sgo/tsi
43b1(rgyud): yang snang bas thams cad grol//mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba'i chos//yod mthong snang grags chos thams cad//yi ge'i tshogasu mngon sangs rgyas//yi gar ma gyur gang yang med//chos nyid rnyeng pa nye
43b2(rgyud): ma la//'od zer yig 'bru'i tshe gosu 'bar//chos nyid na mkha' lta bu la//yig 'bru sna tshogs phra bkod pa//dus gsum rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs//nyi ma 'bar ba'i 'od zer las//'od kyis 'bar
43b3(rgyud): ba'i rdo rje 'brar//yi ge hU~M gis 'od 'phros pas//rdo rje snying po'i sa bon zhes//rdo rje rigs kyi zhing du grags//nyi ma'i 'od zer rin chen las//yig 'bru 'od kyi sra 'phros pas//rin chen snying po'i sa
43b4(rgyud): bon zhes//rin chen rigs kyi zhing du grags//nyi ma pad+mo 'bar 'bros pas//cho 'phrul yi ge'i aM du 'bar//pad ma rigs kyi zhing du grags//sna tshogs nyi ma'i 'od 'phros pas//cho 'phrul yi ge ha ra gsal bu/
43b5(rgyud): sna tshogs snying po'i sa bon te//las kyi rigs kyi zhing du grags//dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyi//thugs ni rdo rje ye shes yin//ye shes dam pas sprul pa yi//rgyal ba dpag tu med pa la//rdo rje
43b6(rgyud): rigs shes bya bar bshad//yon tan ye shes rin cheni yin//rin chen de los sprul pa yi//rgyal ba dpag tu med pa la//drin chen rigs shes bya bar bshad//gsung gi ye shes pad+ma ste//pad+mo yis
43b7(rgyud): las sprul pa'i//rgyal ba dpag tu med pa la//pad+ma rigs kyi zhing du grags//phrin los bya ba sna tshogs te//sna tshogs ye shes sprul pa yi//rgyal po dpag tu med pa la//las kyi rigs shes bya bar
44a1(rgyud): bshad//sku ni ma bcos de bzhin nyid//de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes la//sprul pa rgyal ba dpag med la//de bzhin rigs shes bya bar bshad//de bas rigs kyi gtan tshi/
44a2(rgyud): ninam bco sku ni de bzhin nyid//mI 'gyur rigs ni rdo rje'i rigs//yon tan kun 'byung rin chen rigs//chags med gsung gi pad+mo'i rigs//bya ba byed pa las kyi rigs//sku yi sprul pa thad
44a3(rgyud): nide bzhi ni rigs kyi gdung rgyud 'dzin//thugs las sprul pa'i sangs rgyas ni//rdo rje rigs kyi gdung rgyud 'dzin//yon tan yul gyi sangs rgyas rnams//rin chen rigs kyi gdung rgyud 'dzin//
44a4(rgyud): gsung las sprul pa'i sangs rgyas rnams//pad+ma rigs kyi gdung rgyud 'dzin//mdzad pa sprul pa'i sangs rgyas rnams//phrin las rigs kyi gdung rgyud 'dzin//ci phyir rigs shes bya zhe na//drang
44a5(rgyud): po de las byung ba dang //bar du de yi bya ba byed//tha mar dre yi rgyu 'dzin phyir//de phyir rigs shes grags pa yin//dper na me dang chu dag dang ///nam mkha' dang ni sa dag la//gnas pa'i
44a6(rgyud): sems can mtha' dag kun//gnas rgyud nyid kyi ming 'dzin to//me la gnas pa'i sems can la//me yi yi dgas ma zhes zer//tshu la gnas pa'i sems can la//chu srin tra ra na zhes zer//
44a7(rgyud): ci phyir lnga zhes bya zhe na//rgyal ba sangs rgyas thams cad la//sku dang gsung thugs yon tan dang //mdzad pa phrin las nyid dang lnga//rig pa lnga dang lnga nyi //thams cad kun tu gsal bar snang
44b1(rgyud): de nas lnga zhes nges par bshad//ci phyir zhe na sangs rgyas kun//lnga po de las ma gtogs pa//gzhan las byung zhing gzhan na med//sangs rgyas mtshan gyi khyad par yang //mtshan med pa las mtsha
44b2(rgyud): rtags pa//thams cad lnga po nyid las btags//mtshon gyi bye brag thams cad kun//tha snyad tsam du gdags par zad//rigs med pa las rigs smos pa//'dul ba'i dbang du lhur snang yang //dran
44b3(rgyud): pa'i don de dngos gzhi med//ci yang med las ci snang ba//mkha' la 'ja' tshon byung ba wa//chos kun na mkha' 'dra ba zhes//gsang ba mchog bdag par bshad//mnyam dang mi nyi ma mnyam pa yin
44b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas med cing sems can med//'khor ba med cing chos nyid med//dmigs pa med mi dmigs med//de ltar shes pa mkhas pa yin//rig dang ma rig tshul gcig ste//de ltar shes pa
44b5(rgyud): rgyal ba yin//sems can rang bzhin sangs rgyas nyid//sangs rgyas rang bzhin sems can de//sems can sangs rgyas gcig pa yin//de ltar shes pa'i rgyal ba'i skyes//byang chub phyir ni grang ma
44b6(rgyud): brnyes dam brnyes gang yang de ma brnyes//brnyes pa med pa'i don mthong na//de ni brnyes pa'i mchog yin//gzhan yang 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor rnams//lam gyi ngo bo tsha la 'dod ni//lam gyi rtag nyi
44b7(rgyud): dpos mtshon to//lam gyi don la goms par bya//mi gnas mig ldan sgron ma yis//lam gyi rgyal mas par bya//bag chags rtogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams//sna tshogs dngas por
45a1(rgyud): mod kyang //na mkha' dag la smig rgyu 'dra//de yang gtan tshigs nges pa yi//dpe yis mtshon te rtogs bya na//mkha' la sprin phung 'ja' tshon dang //char la sogs pa'i rgyun snang
45a2(rgyud): yang 'dan mkha'i cho 'phrul gcig tu zad//rtag tu de ltar snang ba min//dper na sgyu ma'i rang bzhin yang //slu zhing 'drid pa tsIr snang yang //sgyu ma'i 'phrul pa snang bar zad//rtag tu de ltar snang ba bzhin//
45a3(rgyud): dper na rdo yi dngos po yang //sra zhing mkhregs pa'i dngos po yang //btags so ma phye mar byas nas kyang //rlung gi mthu yis gtor byas ni//de la rang bzhin grwa la yod//dper na me yi rang bzhin
45a4(rgyud): dag/tshang tshing sber sbur kun sreg cing //'bar 'phro snang gsal mchod byed na//chu yi mthu yis brlag 'gyur na//de la rang bzhin ga la yod//dper na rdzas kyi dngos po yang //me yi mthu yis sreg/
45a5(rgyud): 'gyur na//de la rang bzhin ga la yod//shes pas zin pa'i sems can rnams//gzugs dang dran pa sna tshogs kyi//dbang po la sogs mdzes gyur kyang //phung po mi rtag shi 'phos na//dngos po/
45a6(rgyud): brtan par mi 'gyur te//gzugs rnams sor zhig nas ni//rus pa dag kyang mi snang ste//zhig dang rul la sogs pa yis//tha mar ci yang mi snang 'gyur//ri bo chen po la sogs pa//dngos po
45a7(rgyud): brtan g.yo'i 'jig rten rnams//bsreg pa'i bskal pa la sogs pa//bskal pa gsum gyis brlag byas na//de la rang bzhin ga la yod//des na dngos po'i chos rnams kun//dngos por
45b1(rgyud): brtags pa ma yin pas//chos rnams rang bzhin med par shes//'di ni rnal 'byor lam gyi mchog/'dus pa'i tshogs rnams goms par gyis//zhes sems da'i rdo rje smra ba'i seng+ges rnal 'byor mcho
45b2(rgyud): lam gsungs pa'o//rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las rnal 'byor rje su 'jug pa'i le'u gnyis pa'o////de na smra ba'i seng+ge sems pa'i rdo rje de cho 'phrul chen po sna tshor
45b3(rgyud): ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs//ting 'dzin de'i byin gyi rlabs las zhing khams thams cad g.yos par gyur te//don yongasu rdzogs pa'i lnga ltas byung bar gyur to//'khor der
45b4(rgyud): 'dus par gyur pa rnams la la ni nyi zla'i steng na gnas shing chos nyid kyi na mkha' la lding bar gyur to//la la ni ri rab rgyang mar 'phol//la la ni stong gsum chen po'i khams 'phen par gyur to//
45b5(rgyud): la la ni chos nyid bden pa'i don mthong bar gyur to//la la ni seng+ga'i khri la 'dug par gyur to//de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje dri cho 'phrul gyi ting 'dzin do las bzhengs te//'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor
45b6(rgyud): gyis shin tu ngo mtshar che bar gyur nas/sems pa'i rdo rje de la rnal 'byor gyis phyag lus kun tu sa la brdabs nas 'di skad ces gsol to//sems dpa' chen po cho 'phrul rgya cher gda' ba 'di
45b7(rgyud): don ji lta bu lags/rtags ci lta bu lags/bdag cag rnams la rgyo cher ba sha du gsol zhes zhus pa las/smra ba'i seng+ge chen pos bka' stsal pa/'dus pa'i rnal 'byor rnams 'di dag
46a1(rgyud): ni don yongasu rdzogs pa'i ltas chen po yin te/snga ltas kyi mtshan ma 'di dang sbyar na 'dus pa chen po'i rnams sa nas sar shin tu 'phar zhing yang dag nges pa'i don mthong ba'i
46a2(rgyud): snga ltas yino zhes gsungs pa las/rnal 'byor kyi tshogs kyis gsol pa//sems dpa' chen pos non pa'i snga ltas ni ji lta bu lags//don mthong ba'i snga ltas ni ji lta bu lags//bdag cag
46a3(rgyud): rnams la bsha du gsol zhes zhus pa las//sems dpa' rdo rjes bka' stsal pa//'dus pa chen po'i tshogs leg so//khyod kyis zhus pa'i don rgya chen bshad par bya'o//rna ba lhogs la gus
46a4(rgyud): par nyon cig/sgrub pa don gyi rnal 'byor pa//rnal 'byor don la sbyor ba'i tshe//spyad pa'i las kyi khyad par gyis//khams dang sa ni gar 'gro ba//mdo don tshul lngas lung bstano//nges pa'i snga
46a5(rgyud): ltas byung ba'i//'bras bu don gyi khyad par yang //cho 'phrul sna tshogs sten par nus//de nas yang dag bden pa 'thob/nges pa'i snga ltas rngam pa lnga//rgyu yi dus na 'byung ba ni//tshig
46a6(rgyud): brjod pa 'di lta ste//blo rtsal las kyi khyad par yang //snang ba lus kyi snga ltas dang //ngo mtshar rdzas rnyed tshul rtags dang //mtshan ma pra ya rma ltas dang //'dun pa mang po'i snga ltas kyis//
46a7(rgyud): 'bras bu gang dang gang 'grub pa/mtshon ma gsal bar rgyud las//dper na me yi snga ltas ni//du ba'o mtshan ma rgyas par 'byung //du bo gar byung gnas de na//me nyid yod par nges pa
46b1(rgyud): na du de bzhin chu yi s+tha ltas kyang //rmangs dang stangs dang srog chags 'byung //den chu nying yod par ngas//rlung gi lhas kyang 'di lta ste//sprin rnams rgyu gcing dum bur 'chad//des na rlung chen 'byung /
46b2(rgyud): denges rdzi 'tsha lo mi gang byung ba//de na gser khung yod pa ltar//snga ltas mtshan ma 'di dag gis//'bras bu 'thon dman gar 'gyur ba//rgyu la mkhas par byas nas ni//mtshan ma tse byung de la sbyar/khar/
46b3(rgyud): med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis//srog la bab kyang mi lta bar//rnal 'byor yul la 'jug pa dang //ting 'dzin rig pa'i rtsal sprugs pa//gnyen po kun bston sa sbyangs nas//rnal 'byor sa la brtson du
46b4(rgyud): byad 'dis ni gdon mi za ba dang //la la the tshomi skye zhing //ma nges la zhugs the tsom med//dper na 'jig rten byis pa dag/yun rings ma la spro ba ltar//snga lngas byung ba'i sgra thos na//shin tu drang
46b5(rgyud): mdun bsu ltar//lhas chen byung ba'i drod tshul gyi//shin tu brtson pas bde thob 'gyur//de bas snga ltas mtshan ma rnams//shes nas brtson par 'byud pa'i rigs//bre rtsal las kyi khyad par
46b6(rgyud): gyis da ting 'dzin drod kyi snga ltas 'byung //yang dag bden pa'i don bstan na//mi skrag me dang dga' ba skye//yang /don la nges bltas na//'khor ba'i chos la skyo ba ste//yang dag don la 'dris
46b7(rgyud): pa dang de rnam grangs chos la dad mi 'gyur//yang dag don nyid mthong ba ni//tshig la dga' ba mi skye zhing //don nyid nye bar 'dzin par byed//don mthong ba dang ye she ste//ye shes skyes par gyur pa/
47a1(rgyud): dang /dngos por snang ba thams cad kun//sgyu ma bzhin du shes par 'gyur//sgyu ma tsam du shes pa la//brtenas chos nyid don bltas na//snang ba med pa'i don nyid ni//snang ba med par mtho//
47a2(rgyud): bar 'gyur//snang med srid pa mthong ba'i tshe//cho 'phrul rgyu ba thams cad 'byung //de nyid ba den pa'i snga ltaso//de nas nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis//rdul phran 'dra ba'i mtshan ma 'byung //de ni g.yo ba'i snga
47a3(rgyud): ltas/de na smig rgyu lta bur 'byung //dang po'i drod ces bya bar bshad//de nas mtsho yi rlabs ltar 'byung //bar gyi drod ces bya bar bshad//de nas rlung chen lta bur yang //thogs pa men par 'byung //
47a4(rgyud): bar 'gyur//tha mo'i drod ces bya bar bshad//de nas yig 'bru'i drod spros pas//char chen 'bab pa lta bur 'byung //de ni thob pa'i drod ces bya//de nas mkha' la sprin ldings bzhin//ting 'dzin
47a5(rgyud): rtsa 'phangs mtho bar 'gyur//de na shin tu brtan pa'i drod//de nas ta la gcig tsam du//bdagi lus ni dbang med par//mkha' la 'phar zhing 'phags par rtsol//'di ni shin du gsal ba'i drod/
47a6(rgyud): de nas sa chen g.yo ba ltar//shin tu yam yom mar mer 'byung //'di ni dang po'i rtogs shes bya//de nas ting 'dzin rtsal sbyangs na//ci ltar dmigs pa der 'grub ste//me ya skye mched der//
47a7(rgyud): bsgoms na//me yi rang bzhin nyid 'gyur//chu yi skye mched der bsgoms na//chu yi skye mched nyid du 'gyur//rlung gi skye mched der bsgoms na//rlung gi skye mched nyid 'gyur//yi go 'bru'i skye
47b1(rgyud): mched der bsgoms na//yig 'bru'i gang ltar gsal bar 'gyur//de ltar rdzas kyi skye mched du//gang ltar bsgoms pa de ltar 'gyur//de ni rtags chen thob pa yin//blo yi ting 'dzin rtsal rdzogs na//ngag gi
47b2(rgyud): bden pa'i rtsal 'byung ste//sreg pa'i me chen mthong ba na//zhi bar gyur cig byas pa yis//de nyid ni zhi bar 'gyur//chu klung gnod pa'i rgyun byung na//tshad par gyur cig brjod pa yis//de nyid ni 'chad
47b3(rgyud): 'gyur/nga rlung chen gnod pa'i rgyun byung na//zhi bar gyur cig brjod pa yis//de nyi du ni chad par 'gyur//nad pa'i tshogs ni mthong ba ni//gang na na ba'i dmigs der ni//sil gol gtogs pa'i tsam
47b4(rgyud): gyis kyang //nad rnams zhi bar gyur ces brjod//nad kyi tshogs rnams zhi bar 'gyur//de bzhin nga gis brjod byas pa//thams cad ma lus grub par 'gyur//nga gi bden pa'i rtsal rdzogs na//lus kyi drod la
47b5(rgyud): rtsal 'byung ste//gnyid kyi rtog pa tshoms pa dang //lus kyi bzod pa thob pa ni//'di ni dang po'i drad yin//khams kyi zas dang bral ba dang //mdangs dang dbang po gsal 'gyur ba//'di ni gnyis pa'i
47b6(rgyud): drod ces bya//shing bal lta bus yang ba dang //khams bde mi bde mi 'byung zhing //nad kyi tshogs dang bral 'gyur ba//'di ni drod chen bstan pa yin//kham gyi zas lam bsten yang //dbang po gzi
47b7(rgyud): mdangs shin tu gsal//'di ni ting 'dzin ro tshor rtags//gzhan yang lus kyi snga ltas ni//mnyam pa'i skyil krung bcas nas ni//khru gang tsam du 'phar ba dang //ta la gang tsam bar du 'phro//'di yang
48a1(rgyud): ltas chen rtags yin//gzhan yang snang ba'i na mkha' la//goms pas 'bring 'gro ba dang //chu la mi 'dzings sa la 'dzul//ma yis mi 'chog rlung bcing //'di yang snga//
48a2(rgyud): lhas chen po yin//lus kyi bden pa'i rtsal rdzogs na//mthu yi rtsa la yang 'byung ba ste//mthu yi byin brlabs bas mi khyab//gal te dgos sam 'dod pa na//sa 'am rdo 'am bye ma dag/gser
48a3(rgyud): dang dngul la sogs par bsgyur//skams dag le chu 'byin cing //sol ba dag la ljon shing 'byung //de la sogs pa'i dgos pa rnams//ji ltar 'dod pa de ltar 'grub//spyod pa'i mthu dang rtsal
48a4(rgyud): rdzogs na//'byor pa'i yon tan rdzogs 'gyur te//yi du 'ong ba'i nor 'byung zhing //'dod pas bsam pa thams cad 'grub//rdzas kyi mchog tu gyur pa yi//ngo mtshar can du brnyed par
48a5(rgyud): 'gyur//de dag rung ba'i snga ltaso//'gro gang 'du ba'i snga ltas kyang //kun gyi bkur zhing dga' ba dang //kun gyi yid du 'ong bar 'gyur//thams cad 'dul zhing thams cad la//dbang sgyur byed pa'i
48a6(rgyud): mchog tu 'gyur//de dag sde lngas chen po yin//mtshan ma pra yi r+m+ma lces kyang //shin tu rgya cher 'byung ba ste//rnal 'byor can gyis shes par gyis//bag chags byang ba'i sde ltas kyang //
48a7(rgyud): rtag par cer bur 'byung ba dang //khrus chen rtag tu byed pa dang //dri ma'i tshogs rnam dag pa dang //chu bo dag la rgal ba dang //mtsho chu dag la brgyal ba dang //char gyi rgyun gyi 'khru ba dang /
48b1(rgyud): gzhan gyis bum pa gang ba'i chus//bad gis lus la ldugs pa dang //me dpung chen pos sreg pa dang //shin tu mthon po'i rtse dag las//rlung gis shin tu g.yeng zhing 'thor//'di dag bag chags
48b2(rgyud): byang ba'i ltas//'jigs dang bral ba'i snga ltas ni//g.yul 'gyed pa las slar log dang //nad las thar te sos pa dang //btson ra dag la thar la dang //gshed ma'i lag nas shor ba dang //gcan
48b3(rgyud): zan nang nas bros pa dang //dug nad dag las sos pa dang //bcings pa dag las grol ba dang //thag pa bcad par gyur pa rnams//mtshan ma bzang po'i snga ltas yin//sa rnams thob pa'i snga ltas
48b4(rgyud): nikhri rkang dag las 'dzeg pa dang //phal ba'i skas la 'dzeg pa dang //ljon shing dag le 'dzeg pa dang //byen du shin du 'gro ba dang //ri bo'i rtse la 'jog pa dang //rin chen skas la 'jig pa
48b5(rgyud): dang /mchod rten dag la 'jog pa dang //na mkha'i sgras la 'jog pa rnams//'di dag don gyi snga ltas yin//sna rnams non pa'i sde ltas kyang //khri mthon steng na 'drug pa dang //glang po che la zhon/
48b6(rgyud): pa dang //seng+ge dag la zhon pa dang //khyung chen ldang la zhon pa dang //mchod rten kha la phyin pa dang //ri bo'i rtse la 'dug pa dang //nam mkha'i dbyings na 'dug pa dang //lus la sprin phung 'byung ba
48b7(rgyud): dang //zla ba'i steng na 'dug pa dang //nyi ma'i steng na 'dug pa rnams//rnal 'byor sa la gnas pa'i rtags//sangs rgyas sras kyi snga ltas ni//rgyal po'i bka' la btags pa dang //bka' yi dpa
49a1(rgyud): por bskos pa dang //gzhan la dbang bsgyur byed pa dang //'jig rten skos la 'bebs pa dang //gzhan gyi sde pa dbang sdud dang //g.yul chen dag las rgyal ba dang //bdag nyid
49a2(rgyud): rgyal por gyur pa dang //mgo la me tog skye ba rnams//rgyal po'i srasu gyur pa'i lhas//chos la dbang thob snga ltas ni//glegs bam zab mo rnyed pa dang //de bzhin 'dri ba mang po dang //de dag la ni///
49a3(rgyud): dpyod pa dang //gzhan la 'chad cing ston po dang //don nyid gtan la 'bebs pa dang //me long dag la lta ba dang //shel gyi bum pa gang ba la//lta zhing brtags te 'thung ba dang //rin chenor//
49a4(rgyud): dubu thu ba dang //'khor lo lag tu babs pa dang //nyi zla lag pas zin pa dang //ri rab klad la sbyor ba rnams//chos la dbang thob snga lta so//bden pa mthong ba'i sgo ltas kyang //sngon ma mthong
49a5(rgyud): gi yul mthong dang //stong gsum rgya cher mthong ba dang //gling rnams gzhan du phyin pa dang //ri rab kha la phyin pa dang //nam mkha' rgya cher mthong ba dang //rgya mtsho'i gting du phyin pa dang //
49a6(rgyud): lag na sgron me thogs pa dang //nyi ma'i snying po lta ba dang //snang srid dpyod pa byed pa rnams//chos la dbang thob ltas chen yin//lung bstan thob pa'i snga ltas ni//rol mo'i sgra rnams thos pa dang /
49a7(rgyud): 'brug sgra ni grag pa dang //seng+ge'i nga ro grag pa dang //chos kyi sgra yi gtam thos dang //gzugs brnyan zhal ni 'dzum pa dang //sa ng+yas gsung thos sku mi thong //lha mo glu dbyangs sgregs pa dang
49b1(rgyud): gzhal yas dag la sgyu 'byung dang //grogs po grogs po zhes brjod cing //chos kyi 'gro ba byed pa rnams//lung bstan 'byung ba'i snga lta so//de la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams//ltas chen kun tu snang
49b2(rgyud): gang zag las kyi dang po rnams//rigs 'dzin so'i sa pa ni//'gyur ba'i snga ltas bshad pa yin//rnal 'byor las kyi dang po la//lhas chen 'di dag gang byung yang //'khor ba'i 'du 'dzi kun gsal nas/
49b3(rgyud): don la rtogs shing sa rnams skyong //des ni don la reg par 'gyur//don la reg pa'i byin rlabs kyis//rig 'dzin rdo rjer lhun gyis grub//rig 'dzin sa la gnas pa dang //sa la rtsal chen skyong ba'i tshe//
49b4(rgyud): rtsal gyi cho 'phrul sna tshogs 'byung //nyi zla zho nas 'gro ba dang //ri rab skyes nas gsor ba dang //'jig rten rgyang mar 'bang ba dang //sreg pa'i skal pa gzhil ba las//sogs pa'i cho 'phrul thaMd kun
49b5(rgyud): khyad par rtsol gyis ston par nus//de la sogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnams//rdzu 'phrul+lI ni cho 'phrul yin//rjesu bstan pa'i cho 'phrul ni//'dul ba'i 'gro ba thams cad la//sau'i skad dang chos 'thun par//'dul ba'i/
49b6(rgyud): /sgo ni sna tshogasu//so'i skadadu ston par nus//de dag rje su bstan pa yin//chos kyi sgo rnams snang ba yi//nges pa'i cho 'phrul bstan pa ni//ting 'dzin rtsal gyi khyad par gyis//'jig rten khams rnams g.yos nas kyang /
49b7(rgyud): thod ngo ma her skye 'gyur te//sems kyi bsam pa rangs byas nas//sau dga' ba'i ra myong 'gyur//chos rnams snang ba'i cha 'phrul yan//kunas kun tu brjod pa ni//gsang ba'i yi ge'i phreng ba las//rdzung phyu
50a1(rgyud): kI sgra sgrogs pas//mdzang yod snang glags chos rnams kun//kun kyang sngags kyi sgrar grag pas//sngagasu ma gyur gang yang med//des na rtsal gyi khyag par las//sogs pa'i stan/
50a2(rgyud): thams cad 'byung //zhe sme ba'i seng+ge chen po sems dpe'i rdo rjes gsung so//rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus reg pa'i mdo las cho 'phrul bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//
50a3(rgyud): de nas sla ba'i sang+ge sems dpa'i rdo rje mi 'da' bri dam tshig gsang ba mchog tI nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugaso//de nas ting 'dzin de las bzhengs par gyur pa dang //'dus pa'i rnal 'byor chen po rnaMs
50a4(rgyud): kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//smra ba'i seng+ge sems dpa' chen po khyod nyid ni//dam tshig chen po'i bdag nye du bdag cag rnams kyis mthong //de skad ces gsol pa dang /sems dpa' chen po des
50a5(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/'dus pa'i rnal 'byor rnams chos thams cad kyi srog ni dam tshig yin par shes par gyis shig/de nas 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs kyis sems dpa' chen po la 'di skad ces gsol
50a6(rgyud): to//sems dpa' chen po dam tshig mcho gi gsang ba rnams bdag cag rnams thos par 'tshal/thos nas kyang rtogs pa 'tshal/rtogs nas kyang de la gnas par 'tshal na//sems dpa' chen pos
50a7(rgyud): rgya cher ba sha du gsol/de skad ces gsol pa dang /sems dpa' chen pos bka' stsal pa/'dus pa chen po'i tshogs dam tshig rnams 'di lta ste/shin du gsal ba'i dam tshig ni//snod ma yin par
50b1(rgyud): gyur pa las//phye nang gsang pa gsum dag du/lta ba'i thab tu spyad nas kyang //gsang ba'i chos rnams gsang byar bya//bstan pa'i gan min snod ngan dang//rnam pa bzhis 'asus bye brag rnams//mya'o
50b2(rgyud): 'byor bcud can gyis//shes nas spang bar bya phyir ba shad//'jig rten pa dang thag dman dang //mu stegs log lta'i sbru la dga'//ded me blo na na ga yeng rmugs shing //pisla ba nyin mi brtson byol song
50b3(rgyud): dad log dam nyams don las grol//byang chub thag pa gting nas chad//sems kyi myu gu'i rtsa tshig pa//ngan 'gro'i 'dam du kha sbub yin//snod med kha sdug de dag la//gsang ba smra bar bya ba min//smras na//
50b4(rgyud): de nyid kha sbub 'gyur//gsang ba'i tshig rnams khar smra yang //gab pa gsang ba'i don mi shes//skyon can spa lo sgrogs rnams la//gsang ba'i don rnams lhag par smra//bsnyen bsgrub gsang ba'i tshigs
50b5(rgyud): lasgra la nyan kyang don mi gnyer//snying po'i don gsang mi thub pa//bcud med 'khor bar zag pa yin//gsang don mi thub snod ngan la//gsang ba smra bar gang byed pa//de dang snod med snod ngan gnyis//'khor
50b6(rgyud): khamasu zag par mnyam//lha dang dam tshig sgrub pa yi//dam pa'i mdzad gsum smra shes kyang //goms pa'i mthu med gnas ma gyur//ngan rgya phrag drog ser snas gdungs//bya med chos la blo gtod cing //
50b7(rgyud): spyod rtsing dam ral rdeng med par//rnal 'byor spyod la lta dman zhes//zer ba pham 'gyur 'khor bar 'pho//snod dan 'khor bar 'ab ba la//gsang ba'i don rnams smra byed pa//gsang ba nyams pa'i dngang
51a1(rgyud): gri na nyams pa de dang de 'drar 'gyur//zla ngan nyams sod can lan 'dren/kha gsag lce gnyis sgyur byed cing //sems la nyon mongs lnga bcangs te//chu dang sgyu spyod rdzun la dga'//tshe
51a2(rgyud): cig grags pa ched phyi ru//gang zag phyir 'bring tshig 'ga' la//mnyan te brjod 'dang tshul 'chos pa//log smra dug can tha rams ltungs//dug can ltung ba'i snod la//gsang ba'i dmigs rnaMs
51a3(rgyud): smra ba ni//rnal 'byor nyams pa chen po ste//'khor ba'i tha mar de ltung 'gyur//'di ltar pham 'gyur snod ngan la//gsang ba gsang chen la sogs pa'i//don dang rang bzhin gang yin pa//bstan
51a4(rgyud): kyang pham ltung geg su 'gyur//de bas bstan par bya ba min//gal te bstan par gyur na ni//ston smra nyan byed dag rnams//mthong yun phub byed gnyis skrag 'gyur//rnal 'byor mkhas gsal
51a5(rgyud): don ldan la//rnal 'byor mi shes gang dag gis//dregs pa'i dbang gi phag deg/sems kyi rnam grangs ci snyed pa//de snyed bskal pa'i grangs mnyam par//'bras bu mau zad myong bar
51a6(rgyud): 'gyur gal te las kyi 'phro len na//de snyed bskal par bzod 'jug dgos//mkhas gsal don ldan gyis kyang ni//gong ma bzhin du ngan bsams na//de yang gnas ngan len pa ste///
51a7(rgyud): mkhas pa de la skyo mi nus//rnal 'byor don ldan tshul 'thun la//ngan pa'i tshigs sems dkrugs shing //sgro skur rku dang brlang btab na//dmyal ba rdo rjer de ltung 'gyur//zhar las
51b1(rgyud): byung ba'i rnam smin yang //ji ltar rgyu 'thun dri 'drar 'gyur//bskal pa dman pa'i rnal 'byor pa//rtsa nyams skyo can rang bzhi ni//ngan sems khro gtum ldan pa drang //mi zad phra men la sbyong byed//gang dag
51b2(rgyud): mi shes ngang tshul can//byis pa'i rang bzhin blo zhen pas//shin tu dman pa'i lha sems kyis//tshul bcos mkhan la bkur bar byed//gang dag dam tshig ston ldan//byams la gnas shing rtag
51b3(rgyud): du bzod//tshul shis don gyis gzhung rnams srong //de dag la ni 'dun pa med//dam tshig spre'u ltar spyod bzhin du//byang chub snying po thob pa yi//sangs rgyas rnams kyang mi 'byung //'byung bar yangs
51b4(rgyud): ngas ma mthong //rgyal po 'bras gyur rnal 'byor pa//lam ston skyon sel mkhas pa la/kha tsug dregs dang phrag dogis//khro spong thabs kyi smod par byed//de ni 'khor ba'i gting rdo ste//nams kyang thar/
51b5(rgyud): pa'i khar mi 'byung //mi shes pa yi rnal 'byor pa//yang dag don dang ljon pa'i mi//rjesu 'gro bar mi byed cing //long spyod 'du 'dzi gang ldan pa'i rjesu 'gro zhing de la 'dud//de ni log pa'i lam pa yin//
51b6(rgyud): rnal 'byor lhang dang byang chub khe//'ban thag chad par blo mi 'byung //zang zing nor dang g.yo sprul khe//chung yong ci 'grub srog dang sngo//rnal 'byor mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can//bum snod nang gi
51b7(rgyud): gsal ba ltar//shes rab mdzod kyi gter ldan yang //srog chags num mo'i sder mo ltar//khong nas gab spab don stan la//blun de rnams kyis cir mithong //dper na 'di 'drar tshul gcig ste
52a1(rgyud): pus la gtor 'chang mi dang ni//blun por gyur pa'i mi drug gnas//'grogs kyang gnyis mtshungs khyad med 'dra//ting 'dzin bsngags pa rjod byed cing //ting 'dzin don du gnyer ba
52a2(rgyud): med/yang dag bsngags pa rjod byed cing //yang dag don du gnyer ba med//dam tshig bsngags pa rjod byed cing //dam tshig don du gnyer ba med//ji ltar 'gro gang la la dag/nor bu rin chen
52a3(rgyud): 'di 'dra ste//'dod pa'i yon tan kun 'byung zhes//rin chen dag gi yon tan brjod//de la 'gro gang gzhan dag gis//de ltar 'dod pa 'byung gyur na//de ltar cung
52a4(rgyud): zad yod dam zhes//dris kyang med pas slar smras pa//gang zhig dgos pa skong ba yi//yon tan cung zad smos par zad//de nyid bdag la med ce smra//de bzhin rnal 'byor mi rtson
52a5(rgyud): pas bslab par bya ba'i chos bral la//chos nyid bsngags pa rjod byed kyang //de dag la ni chos nyid med//de las spyod pa'i log spyod rnams//dam tshig can gyis spang bar bya//rnal 'byor/
52a6(rgyud): chos 'dzin gang dag gis//rnal 'byor nyams 'gyur log sred ce na//gsang ba 'jigs pa'i dgrar mthong nas//de dog sdig pa mthong ba ltar//skrod cing chad pas gcod byed po//skyes bu daM
52a7(rgyud): ni rgyal ba'i sras//dper na blon po gang dag gis//nyes byas khrims dang 'gal 'gyur na//'gal bar mi gtong khrims dang sbyor//bka' yi yi slong blon po de//rgyal po'i thugs 'dzin
52b1(rgyud): dam pa zhes//kun du rgyu cher grags par 'gyur//ldum rar dug sbyong skyes na//bdag pos dug du shes ma thag/rtsad nas phyung ste med par byed//ci phyir ldum zas de dag las//dug 'phrul gyur na/
52b2(rgyud): 'chi phyir//de bzhin nyams 'gyur dug can dau//rdul zhugs can gyi rdul 'byor des//gnas sem lo yi sprugs te snang //gang dag mi slong mgron byed po//de dag gsang ba'i dum sbyi yin//don le rnam
52b3(rgyud): 'byor gang zhigs//tha tshigs zab mar bcas rnams las//bsrung ba'i bsam pa mi g.yo bzhin//rtsa ba yi nA lag bcas rnams lnga//gal te mtshor zhig gyur kyang //rnam smin yod kyang rtse mi nyams
52b4(rgyud): ji ltar glang po e ne ya/shrI nas ro ru gyur mod kyang //'gre'u waM rtsis ni don byed ltar//rnal 'byor nyams de ror gyur yang //gzhan gyis bkur ba'i gnas yin zhing //de yi doni byed nus pa yin//da ltar
52b5(rgyud): mod kyang 'di kun rnams//rmi lam du yang mthong mi bya//ci phyir 'o ma nyudu zhig/rul bas 'o ma kun rul bzhin//rnal 'byor nyams gyur gcigs ni//rnal 'byor can kun mi rung 'gyur//'khor ba'i
52b6(rgyud): g.yul rgyal byed pa yi/log pa'i rnal 'byor thaMd kun//don la mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor pas//thams cad bsgrims te sdang bar bya//gal te ma spang log spyad nas//'khor ba'i g.yul ni rgyal
52b7(rgyud): 'gyur te//bden pa'i byin rlabs mthu chung 'gyur//kun kyang dge sbyong don chung zhes//yang dag don las yid byung zhing //lol po'i chos la spro bar byed//kun kyang log pa'i las spyad pas//yi du
53a1(rgyud): ma 'ong sna tshogs 'byung //des ni b+ho srur gnyisu 'gyur//bka' yi chad pa gang yin pa//ye shes can lta rang bzhin gyis//nams kyang gnod pa yod pa mjug/de yi
53a2(rgyud): na gnas pa yi//gang dag ma rungs mthu chen rnams//rnal 'byor log par spyod rnams kyi//skyon mthong tsaman chad pas gcod//thams cad don 'gror spyi'u tshugs lhung //sgrub pa'i smod mchog
53a3(rgyud): gcig yod//'di dang mi 'thun kun rdzogs pa'i//rgyud mnyen don ldan dang tshu lo bzang //ci la tshogs med gtong ldan sems//shes rab rnam grol lde mogs//gti mug tha rim blo phye nas/chos
53a4(rgyud): kyi snying po'i mig ldan pas//rtag chad phrad mthong dbu ma'i yul//mA nor yam du 'jug shes pas//sdong po chen rab dul ba'o//tha tshig lung las byung ba bzhin//bzhung srong thub par byed pa de//
53a5(rgyud): rgyal ba'i sras po yin pas na//de la gsung sgo dbye bar bya//ji ltar dam tshig thub pa ltar//de bzhin yid bzhinar bu ste//yid 'ang 'dod dang bde ba 'byung //rigs 'dzin rgyal ba kun yu mo//de bzhin de
53a6(rgyud): tshig thub pa ltar/gnas par byed pa'i rten yang yin//dam tshig kun gyi smig yin te//dam tshig kun gyi nor mchog//dam tshig 'di ni 'jigs pa'i skabs//dam tshig bgrod pe ldem gyi ma
53a7(rgyud): dam chog chu bo sgrol ba'i grwa//dam tshig dngos grub dam pa yin//dam tshig grogs kyi mchog yin te//dam tshig long ba'i mig bu yin//ji ltar dam tshig thub pa ltar//gzhan gyi sde pa 'jom
53b1(rgyud): payin//'khor ba'i g.yul las rgyal bar byed//des na dam chog rgyun bzhin bsrung //mdor na bdage sgo gsum po//dag pa gsum gyi mtha' gzung nas/lha dang phyogs dang slob dpon dang //bdag nyid dag pa
53b2(rgyud): mkhrel ba'i//tshul gsumi gnod dam bcas gsum//yongasu ma nyams mdo bzhi po//mthar phyin rgya rtags rnam bzhir bcas//mdo don dran pa la bgrang bsngo//brtul zhugs spyod pa'i dam tshig ni//dam//
53b3(rgyud): tshig kun gyi thog mar 'gro zhwa dang cang shes kyi lding dang //blang dor mi 'bral khro tshan bdag/shing du glang chen smos 'dra'i sems//dpa' rtul steg mchog rngam zhing gtum//mkha' lding khyung chen lhag ma lta/
53b4(rgyud): /gtum thung dom chen sdong gcig pa//yid thub mi ldog rgya mtsho'i gser//gti mug lkug pa'i blo tshal ldan//ri bo mi 'gyur brtan pa tshe//mkha' ltar yangs dogs kun dang bral/gnam lcags
53b5(rgyud): /lce'i drag shul can/phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs bdag/zon bag khu 'phrig kha rogs sems//nges pa'i nga rgyal glang tshul ldan//zla bral seng+gi ri dgas rgyal//rwa 'jam bya ltar chags 'grogs blo/
53b6(rgyud): g.yo ldan lhag chen sgyu ma'i rgya//gtsang sme med par kun spyod cing //thog mid gsod spyod lce spyang kha/che ba'i nga rgyal stag ma chog blo/kun 'dzem blo ldan na mkha' lding //sa thub byug len rgyal 'khor sbyang
53b7(rgyud): rnal 'byor brtul zhugs chen po ni//bcus dang ni gsum blor ldan//goms nas nyam su rin byed pa/rnal 'byor gsang ba'i bka' ba yin//dal ba'i rgyud ldan tha tshig can//sku dang gsung thugs rdorje
54a1(rgyud): yoM/bsrung dang brjod dang gsang ba dang //yan lag spyad pa'i dam tshig dang //yid 'od dang du thang ba dang //brtul zhugs zab mor spyod pa dang //rnal 'byor rnal 'ar zad k+Sha/ma /
54a2(rgyud): mi spong sbyar ba yi//rig ldan shes par bya ba dang //thob cing grub par bya ba yin//re re la yang lnga lnga ste//rtsa ba dang ni yan lag las//bcus dang ni brgyad ldan pa//spyad par bya ba'i nor mchog
54a3(rgyud): yin//rnal 'byor byang chub sems rgyud la//nges par brtags te spyod pa'i bu//zab mor rdzogs mchog bde ba yi//blo la nges pa'i lung 'di bstan//'di ni sngar 'gro tho tshig ste//zab mo sgrub pa'i
54a4(rgyud): sngon logasu//rdo rje tha tshig drag po'o//gcan 'phrang lam rnams bsrung ba'i phyir//spyi dang khyad par dam tshig rnams//nges pa'i don gyis bsrung byas nas/de ni dbyig snod chen yin//de ltar spyi
54a5(rgyud): yaM sdom pa la//gnas nas dus kyi skabs 'dri ru//bsrung bya thub par bya ba ni//mi shogs pa ni sed+be ste//gcan zan rgyal po yin paso//za ma tog ni 'dod pa'i gter//dug spyo ba ni der mi raiDo//
54a6(rgyud): rin chen myu gu'i lcug phran dag/da ni breg pa'i rigs ma yin//gangs kyi zhun tshwa khol ma dag/mkhas pas btung bar bya ba min//pad+ma ze'u 'bru kha ma bye//zla zer ma yin kha mi dbye//ma brtags
54a7(rgyud): bug rdol can gyi snod//kha mi dbye zhing bcud mi blug//don dang mi ldan bcos ma'i brtags//bsrel zhing spyad par bya ba min//shel dkar rin chen sgo ba dag/'dam rdzab khung du bsub mi bya//ser+the
54b1(rgyud): dkar mo'i 'o ma dag/dug can snod blugs pa min//yid bzhi nor bu rin po che//bsreg par bya ba yong ma yin//khyung chen gshog pa mkhar brkyang ba//de dag gcag par bya ba min//gnam lcags me ya
54b2(rgyud): dur mo dag //brdab par bya ba ma yino//stag gzig 'drol bas las byas pa'i//las kyi lhag ma bsdu mi bya//rdo rje brag chen gtams pa'i gzhi//de dag gzhig par bya ba min//rdo rje ra ba'i go chags ni//
54b3(rgyud): bsdam bya bral bar bya ba min//bud shing sreg pa'i sgron ma dag/g.yeng ba'i klung gis bskyod mi bya//rdo rje tshig chu rgyun dag/'ol dkar gcad par bya ba min//rgyal po bka' rtags phyag rgya dag/nam zhar dpyi//
54b4(rgyud): bar mi bya'o//rdo rje pha lam gtams pa'i mkhar//rmang nas bzlog par mi bya'o//gtsug nor bu 'bar ba dag/rgyal mtshan rtse las dbog mi bya//rnal 'byor las kyi khyad par can//sbrul can rnams
54b5(rgyud): dam tshig ste//skal par ldan pa'i nor mchog yin//rgyun du spyad pa'i nor mcho gA ni//rdo rje los kyi thun tshags dag/rdo rje go phur trom chen gyis//srog lo bar chad byed pa'i dgra/nyon mongs 'thibs pa
54b6(rgyud): de zhom b+ha/snyoms las le lo'i dpung bskyed pa//thugs thub ra chod nga rgyal gzhi//dregs byed dbang po myos pa'i bcud//dpa' byed rkyen yang bsdam par bya//rdo rje gsang tshig ma gtogs pa//'dres pa/
54b7(rgyud): gang zag byas pa'i tshig zur yang brjod par mi bya zhing //thams cad rdo rje gsang bas bya'o//ji ltar gsod pa'i mi rnams dang //gaushed ma'i mis ni gsod pa'i tshe//thar pa'i thabs la brtson pa bah+ni//
55a1(rgyud): lo lo'i dgra bcom brtson par 'bad//rnal 'byor sgrib pa'i gags bsal ba//dka' thub sgom pa'i mdud pa can//'dod dang long spyod mthun dang //spyi mthun nang du mi gcig pa//hU~M nang
55a2(rgyud): can dang gnod byed dang //'dod myos bying rmugs brkam pa dang //dad med rtsa nyams 'phyar g.yeng can//mkhas pas bsgrims te spangs par bya'o//de ni rnal 'byor gags yin te//dngos grub chu bo'i//
55a3(rgyud): gcod par byed//rnal 'byor nges por spyod pa la//bar du gnod pa'i bdud lnga 'byung //rnam rtog 'phrog pa'i bdud nyid dang //de bzhin btang snyoms le lo'i bdud//long spyod 'du 'jig yeng ba'i
55a4(rgyud): bdud/tshig chub mtshan cha rnon po'i bdud//khro gtum dang thung 'khrug pa'i bdud//rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i bdud lnga po//yang dag don la sgrib pa ste//gnyen po byang chub sems mchogs//zhi bo chen po'i ngang du
55a5(rgyud): bzlogan/ rnal 'byor spyod pa'i dgra bzhi po//thabs la mkhas pas gdul bar bya//rdo rje brnog pa gsang 'phel bas//ngagi dbang po nyams 'gyur te//kha na ma thos phrog par 'gyur//de dag bcas kar
55a6(rgyud): 'gyur ba'i dgra/lha do man spyod rtsing 'chol ba yis//dka' yi gzhung por log par spyad//nor bas bar chad 'byung ba'i dgra/dam gtsor spyad pa'i las rnams yin//'da' bka' rdo rje mcho gsum
55a7(rgyud): pad btang snyoms phyal bar shor ba ni//rtsa bdul ba'i ljon shing bzhin//bka' chad chen po 'bab pa'i gnas//brtsams pa las la sbyor ba'i tshe//'bad pa'i rtsa shugs chungs pa yis//don rnam
55b1(rgyud): grubs par ma yin te//'bras bur mi 'gyur 'phrog pa'i dgra/rna lnga 'byor chen por spyod pa la//'dod pa'i nor mchog 'phrog pa'i dgra/thabs la mkhas pa'i skyes bu yis//skyon gyi dgra bzhi spang bar bya//srid/
55b2(rgyud): gsum sgral ba'i zhing 'di dang //sangs rgyas zhing du rtogs pa ni//sa rnams gcig car sbyangs pa ste//zhing rnams dag pa'i mchog yin//khams gsum mchod pa'i rgyu 'di dag/yo byad chen po'i mchog
55b3(rgyud): yin te//rgyal ba thams cad mnyes pa'i rgyu//rma du byung ba'i mchod pa'o//'khor ba dur khrod gnas 'di dag/bde ba chen po'i gnas yin te//ma nor ma bcos chos kyi dbyings//brtsal med lhun gyi
55b4(rgyud): grub pa la//dug lnga rgyu ba'i rtsa ba dag/ye shes lnga yi rtsa ba te//kun shes kun rig gsal ba'o//rang rig ye shes rang las byung //rnal 'byor chos mig ldan pa yis//nges pa'i don du 'di ltar blta'o//
55b5(rgyud): 'di ni rgyun gyi dam tshig te//brjod med pa bsrung ba'o//bsrung ba thub par bya ba la//dam tshig rtsal gyi khyad par ni//gang dag rig pa 'dzin pa yi//blo la nges pa'i lung du bstan//'dod pas chags dang
55b6(rgyud): 'joms pa dang //gti mug nga rgyal phra dog rnams//rnal 'byor chen po'i dam tshig ste//don dang ldan pa'i skyes bus spang //sbyor dang grol bar byed pa dang //ma byin len dang ngag sprul byed//rnal
55b7(rgyud): 'byor dam tshig spyod pa'i mchog/spyad par bya ba'i las yi no//rgyal ba sems can thams cad dang //dngos por brtags pa thams cad kyang //don gyi ngang du gnog pa ste//de nyid sku gsung thugs kyi
56a1(rgyud): bdag/mtshan ma'i chos rnams thams cad ni//mnyam pachen po'i ngang dugasal//theg pa 'om mya'i khyad par rnams//kun kyang rang rig blo lags la//yon tan ci 'byung ma
56a2(rgyud): brjod cing na 'og ma rnams la mi smod cing //thams cad mnyam pa'i dam tshig ste//'di ltar shes na tshogs mchog rdzogs//gzugs rnams rnam par snang ba mdzad//tshig rnams brjod pa snang
56a3(rgyud): mtha' yas//rnam rtog kun tu sems rdo rje//rig dang tshor ba rin chen 'byung //yid g.yo byed pa don kun rdzogs//stan 'gan rang bzhin sbyor ba'i gnas//zhing bcu dge dang ldan pa na//bde ba chen po'i///
56a4(rgyud): loyong spyod//thog med phrin las rnam bzhir rdzogs//phyi'i yul dang nang gi sems//thams cad mnyam pa nyid gnas//de la sgri ba dang mi sgrib ces//mnyam pa'i rgyal pos yong ma gsungs//tha~Md mnyam
56a5(rgyud): nyid dbyings gyur pas//phung po lnga don ye shes lnga//sku gsung thugs kyi dbang phyug ni//phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin yin//yul dang ye shes rang bzhin las//gzhan gyi rang bzhin med
56a6(rgyud): pas no//mtshan ma'i rnam btsir snang yang de la chad pa'i gnas med//dam tshig dam pa gang zhe no//rtogs pa dam pa dam tshig ste//rtogs par byed pa gang yin pa//de ni dam tshig chen po'o//
56a7(rgyud): mnyam pa'i ngang la gnas//ting 'dzin gyi cho 'phrul las//dngosu spyad pa thams cad bya//de ni dam tshig chen po yin//snod gyur pa yum gyi dbyings//chud rnams rgyal ba yab kyi mkha'
56b1(rgyud): /'byung nga 'jug rig pas yong spyadado//'di ni rdo rje tha tshig yin//srid pa'i sems can thams cad dang //thar pa chos kyi rnam grangs kun//sor thams cad snang ba ste//kun kyang mnyam pa'i ngang du gsal//spyod pa'o//
56b2(rgyud): las dang rtog pa dang //mtshon mar gyur pa thams cad kyang //sems kyi phyi nang spyod yul de//rtags na long spyod tshogasu 'gyur//ma skyes stong pa sku'i rgya//rang bzhin smon med gsung gi don/mtshon med//
56b3(rgyud): yid las 'das pa'i thugs//rnam gsum bde chen sangs rgyaso//mnyam pa'i lte bas dbang bsgyur na//'khor ba thams cad dbyings la snang //las kun rdzogs pa'i mchog yin te//gzhan du 'phrin /
56b4(rgyud): lus pa med//sdug bsngal byang chub chen po ste//'khor ba ye nas mya ngan 'das//sgrib pa rnam dag chos kyi dbyings//nyon mongs kun kyang byang chub don//snang ba med pa'i don mthong dang //sa dang sa yi rim
56b5(rgyud): par ni 'di dang 'od zhes gzung du med//'di ni snang med thob pa'i gnas//sku dang gsung thugs mi g.yo ba'i//ji bzhin nyid kyi ngang la gnas//ji ltar bsgyur yang chos nyid pas//chad pa'i gnas zhes
56b6(rgyud): brjod dang bral//med dang phyal ba gcig po dang //lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i dmo cheg che//'di zhes ri su chad med pa//'di ni srung ba'i dam tshig/spyad par spyod par bya med pas//srid dang mu stegs 'jig rten//
56b7(rgyud): pa'idaspyod par snang ba thams cad kun//lhun gyis grub pa'i mdzad spyod//ma spangs sbyin grub dbyer med pas//dbyings las gzhan na lha yul med//'di ni lte ba'i dam tshig/sa nu mo rlung snod btsun/
57a1(rgyud): bcas kun kyang rang bzhin chos nyid//chos nyid don la gzhan med pa//rang thung ye shes gsal ba'o//yid bzhi nor bu rin po che//ma bcol rang la yod pa yin//'dod pa'/
57a2(rgyud): ba'i long spyad//bde chen long spyod tshogs yino//ngan song mtho ris thams cad dang //'phags lam 'khor ba'i chos rnams kun//rang bzhin sor mi dmigs te//sangs rgyas kyi ni rang bzhin hrI//
57a3(rgyud): spyod dang gzugs rigs thams cad kun//phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin te//sku gsung thugs tshig rgya cher ston//don rig thugs kyi rang bzhi no//ma skyes pa dang ma byung ba//mi gnas pa la chags pa
57a4(rgyud): med don gyi khyad par rtogs chud na//kun tu bzang po'i mchog sa'o//mtshan dang dpe byad kun rdzogs te//thams cad sku gsung thugs kyi don//bdog nyid chen por thams cad rdzogs//lhun rdzo Da//
57a5(rgyud): bde ba chen po yi//khyab pa chen por kun bdal bas//sgrib pa kun byang tshogs kun rdzogs//rnam grol bcings pa kun dang bral//lhun grub bde ba'i gnas chen yin//zhe smra ba'i se ng+ge chen pos
57a6(rgyud): gsung so//rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las dam tshig gsang ba mchogi le'u zhes bya ste bzhi pa'o////de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje de chos thams ca
57a7(rgyud): brdas mtshon pa zhes bye ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs//de nas ting 'dzin de las bzhengs pa dang //'dus pa chen po'i 'khor rnams kyis gsol pa//sems dpa' chen po chos thaMd/
57b1(rgyud): ni bdag cag rnams kyi brda' rig pacom gyi ngor mthongango //de nas sems dpa' chen pos bka' stsal pa/'dus pa chen po'i tshogs chos thams cad ni brda' dang /tha snyad dang /btags pa tsam du shes par
57b2(rgyud): gyis shig/btags pi chos thams cad ni phyi nang gang du yang mi gnas te/chos thams cad la ming gizhi med cing btags pa'i tha snyad dang bral ba yino//brda zhes bya ba ni spras pa btags pa'i tha snyad
57b3(rgyud): yino/ sbas pa'i chos rnams gsang ba'i phyir//thams cad sba zhing brgyad par bya//'di ltar brda' yi sbyor ba la//rnal 'byor can gyis shes par bgyis//de nas 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor rnams kyi gsol
57b4(rgyud): pasems dpa' chen pos brda'i chos rnams rgya cher bsha du gsol/bdag cagis kyang chos thams cad//brda yi don gyi brgyud par bgyi//brda zhes bgyi ba ji lta bu//sbas pa'i chos ni gang dang gang
57b5(rgyud): mi bstan gsang ba gang gang lags//de skad ces gsol pa dang //smra ba'i seng+ges bka' stsal pa//nyon cig 'dus pa chen po'i tsho gas//brda zhes bya ba sbas pa'i tshig/spus ste gsang ba'i chos rnams ni//
57b6(rgyud): rnal 'byor chen po'i spyod pa yin//mi bstan gzhan la gsang ba ni//mu stegs la sogs sde pa rnams//rnal 'byor spyod pa 'phya ba las//shin tu blan zhing sba ba'i phyir//sbas pa'i brda' yas
57b7(rgyud): bstan par bya//brda yi yon tan chen po ni//grangs kyang bsam gyis mi khyab na//mdor sdus rnam pa bzhi yod//gzhan gyi spyod yul ma yin dang //rnal 'byor rigs pa'i spyod yul dang //
58a1(rgyud): smras pas g+ha jug nA ba dang //glasang pa'i dam tshig mi nyams shing //brda' la dga' ba'i ma sring rnams//nye zhing gdung pa'i thang su 'gyur//da bas smras pa'i brdar rnams ni//tshogs
58a2(rgyud): mtshon tu rjod par bya//a la la to//a ti pu he/pA ti pu ho/mahA go rus dkram/gu ya de bi sa ma ya/mahA tsan+tu/mahA pu ra sha/pu ya b+hA ga~M/mahA badz+ra/sa ma~M ya s+t+wa~M/ra ho ya haM/ra ga s+yA me/sa ma ya
58a3(rgyud): g+han/oM AM hUM/sa ma ya/sa ma ya/e h+ye hi/oM h+ye ti/ha he ha/ha he ha/ma ti kha/ma taM kha/ka ru k+She/ka ruk+Sha/k+ShaM ba ri/k+ShaM ba ri/re hi hi/sa ma ya hi/a la ste/a la stau/kha kha le kha kha
58a4(rgyud): le/sha da pa/shra da pa/kha raM khA hi/khA raM khyA hi/kha le b+h+yo/khe le b+h+yo/kha ka kha kha ka kha/khA hI ha he/rak+Sha khA hi/rak+Sha khA hi/ha ha he raM/gu h+ya bu h+ya/sa ma/sa ma/ma le mu le/ta le du le ma tsa
58a5(rgyud): metse ku h+ya sid ti/pa ra ma/pa ra ma/shi ri hai/shi ri ti/ma ma kha kr-i t+taM/e e e e/hU~Msl-i b+h+yo b+h+yAM/kha kha le le/kArma ma te b+h+yo/rak+Sha kA ma b+h+yo/rak+Sha gram b+h+yo/kar+m+ma le kar+m+ma lek+Sh+ya ti sha na/
58a6(rgyud): rak+Sha karma/rak+Sha karma/kro d+hA k+ShaM/khA hi d+hA/khA hi b+h+yo/tsa le yaM/tsa le yaM/pra tsa le/pra tse le/bu ra ba yaM/gur ba yaM/bi gur ti/bi gur ti/mos haM/ma ma hi/ngag brda dam tshig phyag n+yA/
58a7(rgyud): bya gr-i tsar+m+ma/bya brenarma ba yak+Sha ga ra~M/ba yaM k+ShaM gau ri/ba bya dz+nyo ba ba te/na ra ha sa/na ra ha sa/ban+d+ha kA pA la/ban+ta kA pA la/tsarma na ga tr-i/tsarma na ga traM/ra ga ra ga ta ma ra ga ra ga ta tsi/ru tir
58b1(rgyud): ma tA ru ti ra mA ta/ka ru ga tsa/ka ru ga mA ba bya ba ti/da bya ba ti/gang 'gro na/gang 'gro na/thar pA ta/thA ra pa ta/dpa' byed kha/dpa' byed kha/zla ba rgyas dang rdzogs pa dang /zla ba dkar dang zla brom ma/
58b2(rgyud): tshe 'dzin kun gyi gtsomo dang //'jam po thar po chen po dang /gal zhes bya ba'i ri mchog dang //gzo brjid chen po dri zhim dang //dran mo dang ni g.yog 'chang mo//'jam dpal rnon po'i ke tar dang /
58b3(rgyud): ma tha ya/ma tha ya/pa ra pa ti/pa ra pa ti/rA tha ma/rA tha ma/kha ta ma nya/kha ta ma nya/ra ti hU ra ti hUM/shi nya ma tha/shi nya me tha/ka ra ma the/ka ra ma tha/shag ti kha/shag ti kha/ro ga tsarban/l-ig tsarbanas+yA brda da/
58b4(rgyud): tshig phyag rgya'o//lagi phyag rgya chen po ni//brar thabs g.yas g.yon bskor nas kyang //se gro pa brdabs pa 'dren pa'i brda//bskor nas thal sbyar phyag rgya'i brda/shin tu bskor nas spyi bor dgrol//
58b5(rgyud): 'di mchod pa bzhes pa'i brda//bskor nas snying khar bcangs pa ni//ting 'dzin rdo rje bstan pa'i brda//gar bskor shin tu gnyis bstab pa//mchod pa stobs par byed pa'i brda//gar bskor dbang mo'i
58b6(rgyud): spyi bor gzhag/sbyor ba'i don la 'jug pa'i brda//thabs kyis spyi bor gzhag pa dang //shes rab dbang mo'i snying kha ro//thabs kyis gsang ba g.yas bcug na//shes rab thos byed gsang ba yi/
58b7(rgyud): thobs kyi na sa g.yas btan na//shes rab nas g.yon bteg po'o//thabs kyis rdo rje phyag rgya bstan//shes rab pad+mo'i phyag rgya bstan//thabs kyi smin ma g.yas bskyod na//shes rab smin ma ga'i /
59a1(rgyud): ha ga bya//thabs kyis phyag g.yon brkyang ba dang //shes rab g.yas kyis 'khrud tshul bstan//phyag rgyu gang bskor thal brdabs shod//dbang mau lce la dag pa ni//tshogs mchod du//
59a2(rgyud): la bab pa'i brda//lag gnyis bskor nas dbang mo 'thor//de nas dbang mo lce la reg/'ja' gdi'i drim pa'i brda thab so//ma hA ging chen karma dang //rdo rje drod kyi rtags 'dzin las//sogs pa'i \u0f7f
59a3(rgyud): yi dam tshig rnams//rnal 'byor can gyis spyad na 'grub//lus brda dam tshig phyag rgya'o//zhes smra ba'i seng+ges gsung so//rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las rnal 'byor//
59a4(rgyud): brda'i le'u ste lnga pa'o////da nas yang smra ba'i sing+gi sems dpa'i rdo rje do rnal 'byor rol pa'o tshogs zhes bya ba'i ti 'dzin la snyom bra zhug so//de nas ting 'dzin de las bzhengs par gyur
59a5(rgyud): ba dang /'dus pa chen po'i tshogs kyis gsol pa//skye ba'i seng+ge chen po chos thams cad ni rdo rje tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du bdag cag rnams kyis mthong //zhes gsol pa dang /smra ba'i ses
59a6(rgyud): stal pa 'dres pa chen po'i tshogs chos thams cad kyi rang bzhi ni rdo rje tshogs yin par shes par gyis shig ces bka' stsal pa dang //'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsol pa/sems dpa' chen po/
59a7(rgyud): chos thams cad kyi rang bzhi ni/rdo rje lta bu'i dkyil 'khor gyi don bdag cag rnams la rgya cher ba sha du gsol/sems dpa' chen pos bka' stsal pa//nyon cig 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs
59b1(rgyud): rdorje tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor 'di//rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs dam ste//rnal 'byor kun gyis spyod pa'i lam//sa mchog bgrod pa'i las 'di dag/'dus pa'i tshogs la bshad par bya//brtsam pa las kyus
59b2(rgyud): dang po pa//rdo rje tshogs la 'jug pa na//khyad par rim pa ci bzhin du//las mchog 'di yi rang bzhin gyis//ji bzhi ni ram par sbyangs nas kyang //sa rab mchog tu bgrod pa lo//thabs mchog lnga yis
59b3(rgyud): bgreng bya ste//rdo rje tshogs dang bsnyen pa dang //nye ba dang ni bsgrub pa dang //bsgrub pa chen por sbyar bar bya//ji ltar grangs dang dus tshon dang //mtshan ma byung bar bcas rnams las//gab pa'i sra thabs
59b4(rgyud): de sbyar nas//yus mi rig pa'i thabs chen bya//de dag gsang po'i bdag po yin//gnas 'dir 'jug pa'i byis pa dag/'jig rten rdul las grangs nas kyang //'gyur dbang ma nges sar gzhag ste//ci
59b5(rgyud): phyir dang po yin pas na//byis pa blo shes ma bye bas//bzang ngan bde sdug mi shes shing //bstan dang gsang ba'i dmigs mi phyed/rnal 'byor spyod pa'i bka' sgo 'dir//gsang sgo me dpya skrag par
59b6(rgyud): 'gyur/darang bzhin ngang tshul ma rtags pa'i//so'i skye bo'i byis pa las//snod med snod byas bdud nyid kyis//rnal 'byor 'tsho ba'i srog gcod cing //ma nges ldeg 'jug bcas pa yis//gsang ni
59b7(rgyud): bcas dkar 'gyur phyi ro//des ni 'di yi spyod pa yang //ji ltar 'tsham par bde thabs sbyar//de nas smra ba'i seng+ge de thabs kyi rdo rje chags kyi ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/rnal byor ma chen mo rnan
60a1(rgyud): mi snang bar gyur to//de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsol pa dang /smra ba'i sing+ge chen pa chos thams cad kyi rang bzhini thabs kyi phyag rgya'i rang bzhin du bdag cag rnams kyis mthong
60a2(rgyud): ngodo/sems dpas bka' stsal pa/'dus pa chen po'i tshogs 'di dag ni brgyu de sbas pa'i tshogs yin par shes par bya'o//rdo rje rnal 'byor tshogs ldan lta//thabs chen phyag rgya sras tshogs lnga
60a3(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin stsogs bcu drug dang //bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje can//bri bya yang na bsam pa 'am//brjod dam bsngos sam mtshan ma la//'jig rten dbang po'i chos lugs kyis//mos
