60a4(rgyud): pa la bskyed dran bya ste//rang bzhin yul nas phab nas ni//phyag bya la sogaso mchod pa yis//rdo rje sman dang rtsir sbyar ba'i//yo byad chen po la sogs pas//rdo rje thabs kyis tshogs la
60a5(rgyud): dbul rdo rdo rje rnal 'byor bla blangs te//mnyes byas las grub grangs rdzogs nas//mchod dang dam skongs 'dod pa bya//sno du rung ba'i slob ma dag/dpa' mkhyen la sogs bya ba yis//'jug
60a6(rgyud): /tshul dbang dang dngos grub stsol//rdo rje tha tshig rnam lnga yis//bslab pa'i gnyer rnams ci rig par//rtsal gyi rim par bye nas ni//rdo rje gal chen mna' 'do ro//de nas sgrub pa che chung rnams//ji
60a7(rgyud): ltar 'dod pas nan tan gyis//rdo rje rnal 'byor bkar bya'o//mi nus la sogs mi gnang ba'i//dam tshig dag gis nan chags bya//rmongs pa gsang phyir sems bskyod//ngo mtshar che gi 'du
60b1(rgyud): shes bsgyur//shes nas mig la shes bya'i yul//thams cad rim gyis bstan par bya//drod can 'khyil ba'i blo ldan la//rnal 'byar na spar mdzod sgo dbye//rtsing po sgos kyi dmu rgod la//gcan phrad 'a
60b2(rgyud): ba'i g.yong rnams bstan//rdo rje lung gyi tshad can la//ji ltar nus pa de dbang bskur//brtsel med mi nus yul can la//phan po 'ba' zhig sngags pa yin//gnas 'dir yod dang med pa dag 'od mi//
60b3(rgyud): bsum cing ljid mi dpab//rdo rje blo yi yul can la//rtsal chen sbyangs shes gdams par bya//rdo rje 'dus pa'i dbang bral du//rdo rje don gyi lteng chen pa shar//rtsal dang rim pa khyad par dbye//
60b4(rgyud): rigs kyi phyag rgya dag//smi 'am yang na re re'o//de nas smra ba'i song+ge de shes rab gzungs kyi tshogs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so//ting 'dzin de las bzhengs pa dang //'dus pa'i
60b5(rgyud): rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin she ba chob kyi dkyil 'khor du ganga' bar bdag cag rnams kyis mthong //de skad ces gsol pa dang //sems dpa' chen pos pa//
60b6(rgyud): stsal pa/'dus pa chen po'i tshogs chos thams cad ni shes rab tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du sangs rgyas par shes par gyis shig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/chos thams cad shes rab kyi rang bzhin las
60b7(rgyud): byung zhing /shes rab kyi rang bzhin du gas lo//de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsol pa/sems dpa' chen po zla ba gzungasad+d+hi rang bzhin bdag cag rnams la rgya chen ba sha du gsol/de skad ces
61a1(rgyud): gsol pa dang //sems dpa' chen pos bka' stsal ba/'dus pa'i rnal 'byor chen po'i tshogs//shes rab gzungs kyi rang bzhini//rgya cher bshad kyis shes par gyis//ji ltar/
61a2(rgyud): thabs kyis tshogs sbyar ltar//gang dag rnal 'byor mar ldan rnams//rdo rje 'dzin ma la sogs pa//lha mo'i tshogasu sbyar nas kyang //gnas 'dir 'jug dga' la sogs pa//thabs kyi phya
61a3(rgyud): rgya mtshan mar spras//rdo rje snyam pa'i gzungs rnams la//mnyam pa'i mchod pas mnyes par bya//bro gar klu tshig la sogs pas//rigs 'dzin rnal 'byor ma sgrub ces bka' stsal to//deH/
61a4(rgyud): yang sems dpa'i rdo rje de chos thams cad thabs drang shes rab phan tshun dra bar 'brel ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so//de nas ting 'dzin de las bzhings po dang //'khor rnams kyis
61a5(rgyud): gsol pa//bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi rang bzhi ni/thabs dang shes rab 'du 'bral ba'i rang bzhin can du bdag cag rnams kyi mthong //zhes gsol to//de skad ces gsol pa dang //
61a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa chos thams cad ni thibs dang shes rab du 'brel ba ste/gnyi su med par shes par gyes shig/de nas 'dus pa/
61a7(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis gsol pa/sems dpa' chen po ches thams cad dra bar 'brel ba'i don pa sha du gsol/sems dpa' chen po bka' stsal pa/'brel pa'i don 'di lta ste/chos
61b1(rgyud): rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid ni//phan tshun 'brel ba'i tshul du snang //chos kun na mkha'i mtshan nyid las//sprul pa bye ba cir yang snang //gnyis med dra ba'i tshul du 'brel//rnal 'byor gsang ba'i mchog yin te//rgya
61b2(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i gsang sgo ba/'di la gsang sgo dbye bar bya//gsang 'di chud pa'i bu rnams la//rdo rje gsang ba'i bka' 'di bsgrags//gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa 'di//rdo rje rgyal po rgyal mor bcas//lnga nyid drung
61b3(rgyud): du 'khrol ba ni//g.yas nas g.yon du 'khrel 'khyod sbyar//g.yas nyid byang chub rdo rje dang //rang rang mtshan ma 'bar ba'o//g.yon gyi sgra bsnyan dril bu dang //rtags kyis mdzes par gsal ba la//'byo zhing
61b4(rgyud): 'dud pa'i mdangs ldan pas//chags shing g.yo ba'i tshul gyis ni//seng chen khyu mchog la sogs pa//rdzogs pa'i tshul gyis bsgyings bcas te//kha dog lnga yis 'od 'bar bas//bcu drug chas ni sgeg pa
61b5(rgyud): rnams//rims kyis skyed dang gcig car bskyed//dbang po'i rim par sbyar bar bya//gsang nyid tshogs kyis 'khor rnams kyang //gnas nas gyur pa'i rang bzhin gyis//phyag rgya rgyal blo rgyal mor bcas
61b6(rgyud): brgyad gnyis zung sgril 'khrel 'khyud sbyor//sa dang na mkha'i sngan rdo rje//byams dang rdo rje kun bzang dpal//nang dang phyi yi yo byad ni//gzhi gnyis dag gis mnyes sbyor ba//bsam bya la sogs de
61b7(rgyud): bzhin//rdo rje sgo dang bcas pa ni//rdo rje'i khril 'khyud gsang ba'i tshogs//rnal 'byor long spyod che sbyar bas//mnyes nas skongs phyir rim bzhin dbul//gsang ba'i 'jug tshul la sogs kyis//
62a1(rgyud): bsang ba'i don rnams sgrib par byed ces bka' stsal to//de nas bcom ldan 'das sems dpa' rdo rje kun tu 'brel ba'i dbyings zhes bya ba'i ti 'dzin la snyoms par nug so//na
62a2(rgyud): la 'dus pa'i 'khor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//chos thams cad kyis rang bzhi ni rdo rje dra ba'i dbyingasu bdag cag rnams kyis mthong //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'dus pa chen po'i
62a3(rgyud): tshogs dra ba'i dbyingasu shes par gyis shig/chos thams cad ni thugs kyi rigs pa las byung la thugs kyi rang bzhi ni rdo rje kho na yin pa'i phyiraro//'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan
62a4(rgyud): 'das rdo rje dra ba tshon pa'i tshogs bdag cag rnams la rgya cher ba sha du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa'i rdo rje chen po rig pa'i don//dra ba 'brel
62a5(rgyud): pa'i dbyings nyid ni//nges par gshad kyis rtse gcig nyon//thugs kyi gsang chen rig pa 'di//nges pa'i rdo rje yin pas na//rdo rje dbang yul 'brel pa'i don//thams cad 'byung bas dbyings shes
62a6(rgyud): bya'o//rdo rje 'dzin ma 'dzin sogs bcas//'khril mnyam pa yang de bzhin te//gzugs brnyan ting 'dzin rang bzhin gnas//rim pa'i tshul bzhin sbyar byas nas//ji ltar 'dod pa de lta ro//zhe
62a7(rgyud): ka' stsal to//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rje de thams cad dus bzhi mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so//de nas ting 'dzin do las bzhengs par gyur/
62b1(rgyud): tsham mas sa ma thamasa.a pa/thasam/Tha sa# ma yam#ma#
62b2(rgyud): pa dang 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis chos thams cad ni dus bzhi mnyam pa nyi du gcig par mthong zhes gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'a
62b3(rgyud): kyis bka' stsal pa/'dus pa chen po'i tshogs chos thams cad ni dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid rtogs pa yin te/chos thams cad ni dus bzhi'i dang du rdzogs par shes par gyis shig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/ma
62b4(rgyud): pa nyid kyi nga la dus snga phyir snang ba medado//de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mnyam pa chen po dus nyid bdag cag rnams la rgya cher bsha du gsol/de skad ces
62b5(rgyud): gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'dus pa chen po'i tshogs//mnyam pa nyid kyi dus rig na//dus shes bya ba'i ming yang med//dus bzhi mnyam par rab shes na//chos nyid//
62b6(rgyud): mnyam pa'i rang bzhi no//rdo rje dus kyi lha mo'i tshogs//'das dang de ltar byung ba dang //mi 'byung ba yi cha rnams la//dbang sgyur mnyam pa'i rgyal mo rnams//'jig dang skye dang smin pa dang //'gag par
62b7(rgyud): gyur pa de dag tu//rdo rje rnam thar tshad mod dang //sems dang de bzhin mnyam pa yi//shes rab 'khor rang dpal gyi dkyil//de bzhin rim par rdo rje yi//glu gar la sogs yo byad kyis//mchod dang
62b8(rgyud): 'jug tshul gong ma bzhin//cha rnams dus las mi 'da' bar//lha'i nyi ma rnams la'o//bde ba chen po la sogs pa//tshom bu'am yang na phyag rgya rnams//spyir ra ma re rer sbyang bar bya//'das la/
63a1(rgyud): namya thar tshogs bskul to//da ltar byung dang mi 'byung la//chang med sems dang mnyam par bskrun//mnyam pa'i rgyal po rad 'gyur te//dadre gshegs dus kyis rgyal por 'gyur/
63a2(rgyud): zhes paka' stsal to//de nam yang bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rje de nyi zla'i tshogs zhes bya ba'i ti 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so//de nas yang ting 'dzin de las bzhengs par gyur pa dang /
63a3(rgyud): 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs kyis 'di skad ces bsol to//bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni nyi zla'i cho gsu mthong //de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'dus
63a4(rgyud): pa chen po'i tsho gas chos thams cad kyi rang bzhi ni byang chub sems dang snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin yin par shes par gyis shig/chos thams cad ni byang chub sems las byung zhing snying rjel
63a5(rgyud): rang bzhin can yino//de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das snying rje dang byang chub sems kyi don bdag cag la ba sha du gsol//bcom ldan 'das kyis maka' stsal
63a6(rgyud): pA chos rnams kun gyi yo byad ni//snying rje byang chub sems yin te//yo byad de dang ma ldan no//don rnams 'grub par mi 'gyuraro//rnal 'byor byang chub sems rdzogs par//byang chub
63a7(rgyud): pa'i zla rgyas tshul//snying rje ye shes shar ba ni//mkhar la nyi gsal shor ba'i tshul//de na gnyis rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa//rna la 'byod ngas pa 'as pa yin//nges pa'i sa la bgrod poni/
63b1(rgyud): rdorje kyi rgyun tshogs kyis//tshogs chen rnams gnyis bskrun par bya//skar tshogs drabu na zla nya ba na drug zhigs rdzogs pa bzhin//bcu gsum rgyal chen rdzogs pa'i sa//bcu dru chags kyis rdzo/
63b2(rgyud): pas ni//mdzes pa'i nyi ma bcu dgis//zla dkyil 'od kyi phyag rgya la//mdzes par sbas pa'i bde ba de//bcu drug tshogs kyis bsod nams bskrun//byang rdzogs tshogs 'phel de phan chad//me dmigs chos
63b3(rgyud): la blo sbyangs yin//ji zhi rje ni mo migs par//mtshan ma nas bya ba dwa srabs pa ste//bsod nams tshogs kyang mi dmigs pa//mnyam pas stong par gyur pa na//thams cad tshe skur rdzogs pa ste//sdug bsngal
63b4(rgyud): byang chub gnyis med//'di la rmad 'byung sems bskyed//zla ba bdun gyis mtshan ma dang //gsang ba gnyis kyis mchod pa bya//phra mo'i drod du byung ba dang //sbyar te rang las byung rnams la//rtsa ba gcad
63b5(rgyud): phyir ra yongs rdzogs pas//the tshom med par dang blangs nas//dus de nyid du nyam 'char//dus 'di rgyun gyi bar chad na//bsnyen pa dag gis zlog par dka'//bar chad byung na gso zhing bskad//mkha' la/
63b6(rgyud): zla gsal gra rgyas na//sa la rnal 'byor grar rgyas pas//bsod nams spel ba chen po dang //bsngo ba chen po'i las rnams bya//de ni 'bras bu chen po yang //nyi zla zhon nas 'gro ba yi//rigs 'dzinas
63b7(rgyud): la slebs phan chad//dpal chen bcu drug sa la 'grub ces bka' stsal to//de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje de rgyun du gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin pa snyoms par zhugs nas bzhengs pa dang /'dus pa'i
64a1(rgyud): kyis gsol pa//bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni yi ge rgyun gyi dkyil 'khor du gnas par mthong //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//chos thams cad ni rgyal ba'i kyi
64a2(rgyud): 'khor rang bzhin yin la/rgyal ba thams cad ni yi ge'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin du shes par gyis shig/gsol pa/yi ge'i phyag rgya'i don gang rigs pa bdag cag rnams la rgya cher ba shA
64a3(rgyud): gsol zhes zhus pa la/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//chos kun rgyal ba'i rang bzhin te//rgyal ba sku gsung thugasu gsalo//sku gsung thugs dang phyag rgya dag/yi ge'i phreng ba nyid brjo/
64a4(rgyud): yi ge'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor rnams//rgyun du bsgrub par bya ba yin//des ni rgyun gyi ting 'dzin 'thog/rgyun gyi rgyun tu me gcad pa//rdo rje nu ma dang nyi tshod la//yi ge'i tshogs bskyed chog sbyar
64a5(rgyud): la/phud lta ga bcas sbyar de bzhin//'don don la nye ba'i lam//bsod nams bskrun par de myu ro//kun rdzogs tshogs kyi rgyu des ni//yang dag tshogs chen ci 'dra ba//mchog bde ba dam pa dang /
64a6(rgyud): de nyid chen por de nyid 'gyur//'jug sgo spyod dang lta ba 'thun//thams cad gcig par gyur pa yi//rgyu dang rkyen ldan phun sum tshogs//'ja' 'phrod sman dang dgyes sbyor ldan//lha dang rigs
64a7(rgyud): 'dzin rnal 'byor ril//ma lus tshogs pas chos 'di spyod//skad cig yud ngam thang cig gam//yud tsam nyin zhag zla re 'am//lha yi nyi ma bkra shis kyis//tshogs la babs pa'i dus 'di
64b1(rgyud): dag/byin gyis brlabs bzhi dus chen yin//ji ltar 'byor pa'i yo byad rnams//phyi dang nang gi khyad par gyis//gtsang ma'i kha zas 'byung ba la//rnam rtog rtog bral rgyal ba la//ji ltar 'byor bzhin nan/
64b2(rgyud): bya//bdag dang gzhan dang gnyi ga dang //chos kyi don du mi 'gyur ba'i//skyon bzhi po dag spangs nas ni//de las bzlog pa'i tshul ldan pas//rnal 'byor snying dang mig lta bur//gdung ba'i dri shes nyer gzhag
64b3(rgyud): sta ti bzhin 'dod par nye bar sbyar//lha rnams nye bar bya ba dang /bgegs rnams zhi bar bya ba dang //don grub shi ba gso ba'i phyir//las 'dir spyad par shin tu gtses//tshogs 'di blo chung gsapa
64b4(rgyud): zhugs pa'i//mdun du brjod par bya mi rigs//rdzas dang yo byad thams cad kyang //cis 'dul de ltar stobs kyis sbyar//des na las 'di khyad par yang //tshogs la tshogs bskyed sgrib sbyangs te//bstan
64b5(rgyud): pa bdag goms byas nas//bsgrubs pas 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'o zhes bka' stsal to//rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun/'dus rig pa'i mdo las rnal 'byor bde ba'i tshogs kyi le'u ste drug
64b6(rgyud): ba'o//de nas yang spro ba'i se sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'das pa brjod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so//de nas ting 'dzin de las bzhengs par gyur pa dang /'dus pa chen
64b7(rgyud): ro'i tshogs rnams kyis 'di da ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das sngags zab mo spyod pa'i skyon dang yon tan tsi lags pa bdag cig rig pa la snang bar gyur to//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis
65a1(rgyud): //bka' rgyal pa/'dus pa chen po'i tshogs pas sngags chen por don 'di mu ta da pa da dka' bar shes par byas shig/cu'i phyor zhen/gsang sngags kyi chog ni shin tu po dang //
65a2(rgyud): meni rgyun tu bcangs shing spyad legs na ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du rgyun tu spya yang //mIny+dzi ri lta ba bzhin du spyad na me'i phung por 'gyur te/spyod par byed pa nyid kyang bsregs//khyim nas khyim yang
65a3(rgyud): rdzas kyi dngos pa thams cad kyang bsregs par 'gyuraro//de bzhin du gsang sngags 'di ni chu dang 'dra ste/chu thabs kyis zan cing spyad logs na ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du dga' ba der spyad yod/chu la dge'
65a4(rgyud): bder thar chu chen po la 'bogs pas nu so//chu'i rang bzhin dang thabs la mgoms pas na spyod par byed pA de g.yeng zhing 'chi bor byed//gzhan yang gsang sngags chen po 'di ni gcan zan gdug pa
65a5(rgyud): can dang 'dre ste//gcan zan gyis sos can gzhan gyi srog gcod par byed pa yang thabs la mkhas pas ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du dbang du 'dra'o//thabs kyis ma zin na srog gcod par bye'o//shA
65a6(rgyud): gsung stug sde chen po 'di ni sbrul gyi mgo la 'dug pa'i nor bu rin po che dang 'dra ste//sbrul gyi mgo la 'dug pa'i nor bu thabs kyis yongasu zin na ni dbang du 'du zhing srudu yod la//thabs kyis ma zin/
65a7(rgyud): ni 'chi ba'i srog dang 'brel bar bye//de sen gsang ba chen po 'di ni spyod par dka' bas sngon gyi dus kyi chen yang spyad nyes bing log pa'i lam pa can mang por byung //don dang lam lam
65b1(rgyud): bi'i skyes bus thabs kyis zin cing spyad legs na//ma nor ba'i lam du zhugs pa yang mang por byung bas 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs spyad pa'i thabs la yong su mkhas par gyis shi ga de skad ces bka' stsal pa d+ma/
65b2(rgyud): dus pa chen po'i tshogs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags log pa'i lam las byung ba ni gang gang logs/spyad legs pa'i thabs las byung ba ni gang gang lags/bdag cag
65b3(rgyud): lnga rgya cher ba sha du gsol/de skad ces gsol po dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa/'dus pa chen po'i tshogs nyes legs kyi rim pa bshad par bya yis nyon/
65b4(rgyud): cig ces bka' stsal pa dang //da ni dran pa thog ma'i tshe//gsad pa spyod pa'i don 'di dag/nges don phal cher nub par gyur//tshul 'dra tsam zhig gnas pa la//kun kyang phal cher spyod mod kyang //don
65b5(rgyud): dang phrad pa ngas ma mthong //kun kyang lag pa'i lam spyod//log pa can nyid gang zhe na/'di la mi gnas 'di nyams dang //'di las log dang log tshul spyod//'di tshul ma yin 'dir mnges//g.yo
65b6(rgyud): sgyus bden bcos 'gal ba'i lam//de yang ji lta bu zhe na/bskul pa kun bkod bya ba'i tshe//sangs rgyas mngon byung rgyal po de//pangan 'das par gyur 'og tu byung ba'i rnal 'byor bzang rgan te/ma
65b7(rgyud): mo shes byis pa'i 'khor rnams la//tshul 'chos 'og pa'i tshogs bskyangs pas//tshom bu lnga brgyar bcas pa zhig/don los gol zhing 'khor bar log/de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cig//rmad
66a1(rgyud): byung gsang ba'i bstan pa 'di//rnalnga 'byor dbang phyug tshad ma rnams//phal cher mi gnas skabs dag tu//mi shes ngan rtog can rnams kyis//dkrugs 'gyur bka' bslad gzhung //
66a2(rgyud): bor te nor bas bdag nyid sun 'byin cing //bdag yin gzhan 'di ma yin zhe na//bdag stod gzhan pa smod pa log/de yang ji lta bu zhes na//bskal pa de nyid dus dag la//rnal 'byor dpa' sbyin bya ba/
66a3(rgyud): zhig/don la blo shed ma byed zhing //lam gyi thabs la mkhas pas//nges don bka' yi bzhung por nas//chos ma yin pa'i chos spyod cing //gzhan dag nges don spyod pa la//khyod kyi de ni don ma hrI
66a4(rgyud): don mchog bdud rtsi gang yin pa//de ni nga yi chos 'di yin//zhes ni bdag stod gzhan la smod//'di yang srid pa log pa'i lam//de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cig/sngar ro byung rgyud kyi rjes gnas pas//rjeng//
66a5(rgyud): med bzhin du dpon bstabs na//tshig gnyer dregs pa'i dbang des ni//mi shes bzhin du ras gcod pa'i//tshul 'chos sems kyi gya gyu can//smon thabs blun pa'i sdig can yin//de yang ji
66a6(rgyud): lta bu zhe na//dge slong dri med spyod pa zhes//bya ba'i rnal 'byor tshul 'dra zhing //don la mkhas pa'i rjesu byung //tshom bu 'bum gyi 'khor rnams kyis//rgyud kyi rje su byung ba yis//don med dge/
66a7(rgyud): /slong de nyid la//tshig gnyer chen ldeng phab pas//gdung 'tsho ba ces ni dpon bstabs te//che ba chen po'i dregs pa skyes//mi shes bzhin du tshul bcos te//'dre tshul log pa'i chos spyad pas//chom
66b1(rgyud): sh+tsa bum dang bcas bya zhog/drags pa chen por ru tAr lhung //dro 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cig/mdza' 'drin bslang stor skrong rnams dang //rnyod dang bkur stos 'tsho ba'i 'khor//gzhan gyi dbang du gyur dogs rgyas
66b2(rgyud): sgo ris rgyang chen sor gcod//'khor 'di bdag gis smin bya yi//gdul bar bye ba'i zhing yin gyis//gang dag 'di dang ma 'brel zhes//nyon mongs tshigs sgo byed nor//de yang ji lte bu zhe ni//rnal /
66b3(rgyud): na zhi gnas pa zhes//bya ba'i tshom bu lnga brgya zhig/shin tu gsang sngags sod sras//dgon pa'i gan su 'jug nas ni//yul khams chen po de dag gis//gnas par gyur pa'i mi rnams kun//gang /
66b4(rgyud): bar bya ba'i zhing du spyod//gzhan gyi sde ba de gyur pa yi//dge slong don dang ldan pa zhig/yul der che du 'ongs nus ni//rnal 'byor nges pa'i lam mchog cig/rgya cher bstan par bsams pa las//de/
66b5(rgyud): slong dgon par gnas pa des//nyon mongs che gi sgo ba byas//'khor 'di bdage zhan yin gyis//khyod ni 'di la ma gtig shos//sgro dang tshad dang ris bcas pas//nyon mongs 'khor bzhi lam du /
66b6(rgyud): de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cig/rnal 'byor chen por bsngos gyur la//sna 'grags ci rgyal gsog 'jog byed//gcig yid gtsigs 'byin byed pa//nam zhar long spyod thob pa min//de yang ji lta
66b7(rgyud): bu zhen//rnal 'byor bde ldan shes pa zhes//bya ba'i tshi mgur bcas pa zhig/gsang ba'i rgya cher spyod po lnga//'khor na gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ma//bud med bzad ldan bya ba zhig/tshigs sbyor/
67a1(rgyud): gong du bskos pa las//'byor pa'i yo byad dag la//sang sde'i sems kyis gsog 'jog byas//las kyi rnam smin de yis ni//yi dgas khyi yi lus skyes//da 'dra'i tshul du//
67a2(rgyud): ma spyod cig/gzhan yang rnal 'byor chen de'i tshogs//log par spyod pa'i rnal 'byor ni//log lta spyi btil gtum khro che//sdig spyod don dang mi ldan yang //bdashi ni yang dag yin zhing //
67a3(rgyud): bab tshol bka' rku slu byed bslad//de yang ji lta bu zhe na//chos skyong pa yi rnal 'byor pas//bra ma de zhes bya ba zhig/don dang lam la mikhas par//bdag ni mkhan po yino zhes//kun la /
67a4(rgyud): cher sgra bsgrags nas//rgyal ba'i bka' brkus 'gro ba rnams//bslus par gyur pa'i rnam smin gyis//log pa can gyi 'jig rten pa//mu sngags spyod pa'i khamasu lhung //de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod//
67a5(rgyud): cig/tha tshig nyams shing don la rdugs//dregs pas don la khos 'ches phyir//rdo rje rgyal dbang thab 'dod pa//khrel mod spyi gtol mun sprul 'tshal//de yang ji lta bu zhe na//rnal 'byor//
67a6(rgyud): sngags kyi tshul spyod pa//be na ya zhes bya ba zhig/tshom bu rgya dang bcas pa byung //rtsa ba nyams shing don la rmugs/dregs pa chen po'i nga rgyal gyis//don la mkhas pa'i tshul bcos
67a7(rgyud): phyir nga rdo rje rgyalo po'i dbang mnos pas//ri bos srog chags mnan pa bzhin//nga rgyal dregs pa'i ri bo yi/'khor ba'i las spyod las ngan pa'i//srog chags phag pa'i rigasu lhung
67b1(rgyud): do 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cag//mnyam pa 'don nyid ma rtogs par//tshig tu mnyam zhes brjod byad cing //chags sdang gnyis la mngon 'phel ba//rnal 'byor las kyis 'khor ba'i lam//de yang ji lta bu zhe na//dag
67b2(rgyud): bde sbyin bya bzhi//chem bu stong dang bcas pad de//rnal 'byor gsang ba'i las la spyod//la la chags pa mngon par 'phel//pa las sdang chen gsod par spyod//chags snang las kyi rnam ldan rgyas//
67b3(rgyud): sbyin pa'i khams snang //de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod ci//gang dag rnal 'byor blo chung rnamaso//rdo rje gral tshogs don glengs na//de la 'jigs shing skrag 'gyur te//sI zhu me ga' 'byo byed drun//de yang ji lta
67b4(rgyud): zhe na/dge slong lha sbyin bya ba zhig/rnal 'byor dang po'i sar slob tshe//rnal 'byor don ldan mang po rnams//bal chere tshogs par gyur pa la//nges don gsang ba'i don glengs na//lce byin 'khor btsas
67b5(rgyud): de las byol//don glongs pa la mi dga' zhing //ngan pa'i sems kyis phrag dog skyes//rang gi gnas song nas ni//mkhas pa de la mi skar brjod//las kyi rnam smin de yis ni//bskal pa dpag tu med pa
67b6(rgyud): yang dag don las gol bar 'gyur//'khor ba don med gan su 'khyams//de 'dri'i tshul du ma spyod cig/rnal 'byor nyid kyis rnal 'byor la//shin tu gdug pa'i dug mangs te//kha mig gtsun po rjo
67b7(rgyud): lta bur 'joms byad rnal 'byor ring 'geg go//de yang rje khron no//rna ma'i khyod rnam dag po kris nas bya ba'i don ldan pa las panon/ma 'dzi bri gros zhes bya 'i'i//khabs dang ngan la mings
68a1(rgyud): /sde ba mang po'i skyong ba'i sar//rnam dgra blo gros 'khor bcas 'ongs//mkhas pa don ldan pazang thob lnga//rngan sems phyar ka'i sgo skur btag//las kyi rnam smin de yis ni//myi 'jigs
68a2(rgyud): blo gros mnar med ltung //de 'dra'i tshul du mi spyod cig/lta ba dmigs bu dang bral bas//yang dag de bus ma'i la mi gsal/spyi yul tsam la ltos spyod pa//de ni rnal 'byor long ba'i tshogs//de lnga
68a3(rgyud): ji lta bu zhe na//rgyal po rab gsal 'dzin pa zhes//bya ba'i rnal 'byor can zhig byung //shes rab lta ba'i mig med par//rnal 'byor ming tsam tshul bzung nas//sgra thos tsam gyis gzhung spyad pas/
68a4(rgyud): mig med 'khor pa'i khamasu lhung //de 'dra'i tshul du ma spyod cig/de la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pos//logs pa'i tshogasu 'gyur gsung //des na 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor rnams//shin tu gr-is /
68a5(rgyud): chos 'di rnams//golas che bar rgyas par bshad//thabs la mkhas pa'i spyod pa yis//don dang ldan par bya ba ces//thabs la mkhas par spyad pa yis//legs pa'i lam gyi rnal 'byor pa
68a6(rgyud): sngon 'das dus na byung ba yi//rdul can rnams kyi don bshad pa//skyes bu mchog spyod pa 'di//ston sgra bsgrags sus thos pa//ming tsam gyis kyang de thob cing //dran pas ngan 'gro la b+h+yoH
68a7(rgyud): yin/de yang ji lta bu zhe na//shin tu gsal ba'i spyod pa 'di//lha gnas gsum du grags pa las//lha'i bu ni 'od ldan te//mi rtag 'chi ba'i dus bab nas//'chi ka'i lnga ltas byung ba'i/
68b1(rgyud): mi dga' bar ni 'du shes gyur//phyi ma'i 'du shes bskyed pa las//mi gtsang zasu za ba yi//blun pa'i srog chags lus len par//rang gi mngon par shes pas mthong //shin tu 'jigs pa'i du shes kyis//sgyus/
68b2(rgyud): kyi yul rnams yid la byas//gzhan gyi dran pa mi gsal bar//gsang ba chen po'i tshogs chen gyis//mtsha ni rna ba'i dbang pos thos//thos pa yid la dran byas pas//ngan 'gro'i lam las slar log ste//
68b3(rgyud): chen spyod pa'i skal ldan pas//gsang ba 'dzin pa'i gnasu skyes//de bzhin thos pa dag par spyod//rgyal ba mnyes pa'i tshogs 'di la//gang zhig dga' zhing 'dun skyed pa//gzhan gyi bar chad mi 'byung bar//ji
68b4(rgyud): ltar mos pa de myur 'thob//de yang ji lta bu zhe na//bram ze'i bu ni byams ldan te//gsang ba chen po'i tshogs 'di dag/spyod par mos nas kun tu btsal//btsal bas rnyed par ma gyur te//sa phyogs zhig tu 'dus rba
68b5(rgyud): ne/shin tu ngus nas smras pa ni//e ma ho bdagi las re pha ma//skyes nas rgas par gyur bar du//tshogs chen zab mo'i don btsal na//don dang ma brang las re ngan//da 'ong ji ltar bcal na rnyed//btsal byas red
68b6(rgyud): par yong mi 'gyur//thugs rje bdag la skyab su mchi//gdung ba sgra cher phyung ba las//na mkha'i khams la sgra phyung ste//skal dang ldan pa'i bram ze khyod//de ltar yid dam la brten pa//khyod ni don gyi skal pa/
68b7(rgyud): can du dus gsum rgyal badzad kyis//khyod la byin gyis rlob par mdzad//de bas lta ba ma g.yel bar//sgrib pa sbyang ba'i thabs dag la//mkhas shing brtson par bya dgos te//rang gi rtsa rnams bkros nas
69a1(rgyud): ni/khrag chen dag gis mchod pa de//'dod chags dag btsun chus//dmigs nas rgyal ba kun mchod nas//de ma thag tu don thob 'gyur//de skad lung bstan thob nas ni//dga' ba'i bas pa
69a2(rgyud): cher g.yos te//lung bstan pa ltar de spyad pas//rigs 'dzin rgyal ba'i srasu 'gyur//de bzhin mos pa dag par spyod//mthong la skal ldan 'dir zhugs pa//thams ca du yang de bzhin te/tog ni rtse mor
69a3(rgyud): gyur pa bzhin//yongs kyi nub pa ma yin//de yang ji lta bu zhe na//lha'i bu zhes bya ba ni//dge ba'i rgyal po bya ba de//tshom bu 'bum dang bcas pa zhig/gsang ba rgya cher spyad pa las//lha'i bu rin chen 'od/
69a4(rgyud): ldan de/shin tu dad pa cher g.yos te/lha rdzas yo byad mang po dang //bcas nas gsang ba'i gnas der phyin//dga' zhing 'dun pa'i tshul gyis ni//gus par gyur te der gnas pas//cho 'phrul chen po bzhi
69a5(rgyud): thob ste lha gnas kun tu bgrod pa dang //'byung chen lus la skal pa dang //ri bo 'degs dang 'phang ba dang //mi 'chi tshe la gnas pa thob//rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i tog bzhin du//mthong ba dag gi chos de nyid//
69a6(rgyud): bskal par nud par ma gyur to//de bzhin 'jug pa dag par gyis//mthong bas chos 'di yongs dag pas//ye she sgron ma'i mig rnyed nas//bla med snying po can rnams kyis//lam rnyed lam du zhuDa pa bzhin//
69a7(rgyud): de yang ji lta bu zhe na//bram ze kun ri bya ba zhig/chos kyi mig ldan don mthong nas//gsang chen gzhung bzhin spyod pa la//bram ze ke ni bya ba zhig/dad pas don gyi rjes 'brengs//gsang chen 'dus pa'i tshog
69b1(rgyud): mthong ba chos kyi mug dang ldan 'gyur te//don gyi skying po mthong bar 'gyur//lhun brub rtsal chen rdzogs pa no//rlig 'dzin chen po'i sa nyid thob//de bzhin mthong bas dgra par gyis//gzhan dag 'dir nim sna
69b2(rgyud): spyod la//dga' ba'i yid kyis phyogs byed pa//de ni dngos dang 'dra ba de//'bras bu la yang mtho dman med//de yang ji lta bu zhe na//rgyal po dbang phyug 'od ldan zhes//bya ba'i rnal 'byor can zhig la//chom/
69b3(rgyud): bcu dang bcas pa'i khor//rig 'dzin spyod pa'i don la zhugs//sngags spyod 'bras bu cher thob ste//ngo mtshar cho 'phrul mang po dag/thob pa kun tu grags par gyur//de la gzhan gyi sngo pa yi//bram ze dge slob bya
69b4(rgyud): bzhig/shin tu dag pa'i sems bskyod nas//'jug cing bslab par zhugs pa las//rgyal pos ma gnang gsang sgo bsdams//bram ze dad pa ma ldog par//'byor pa'i yo byad ci yod rnams//rgyal po'i 'khyo//
69b5(rgyud): du phul nas kyang //rgyal po gnas pa'i yul phyogasu//yid kyi phyogs te smon lam btab//rtse gcig par ni smon lam btab//rje su yi rang dam par ni//yid la byas pa'i bsod nams kyis//bsgrub par byed bI/
69b6(rgyud): rgyal po dang //sgrub dang mi ldan bram ze gr-i nas//'bras bu mthon dman med par thob//'di ni tshegs med don po che//thabs la mkhas pa'i rig 'dzin yin//de bzhin spyod pa gzhan dag la//dga' bas rje
69b7(rgyud): yi rang gis//dge ba spyad dang ma spyod gnyis//'bras bu mnyam par thob par gyur//bsam yas bsam gyis mi khyab pa//rgyal rnams 'dir bslabs 'dir mkhyen pas//srid gsum 'gro ba ba shes ba
70a1(rgyud): du kun gyi bdag por gyur pa yin//de yang ji lta bu zhe na//sngon gyi bram ze gsal byin gyis//gsang chen 'di yi don bslabs nas//rang gi sems la goms byas nas//sems
70a2(rgyud): nyid bden pa'i don mthong ste//chos rnams kun la mkhas par 'gyur//kun gyi rtsa ba sems yin pas//sems las chos byung 'bum phrag yas//chos kyi rgyal por der gyur nas//sang+yas smra ba'i
70a3(rgyud): zhes zhing khams kun tu grags par 'gyur//de bzhin bslab pa dag par gyis//tshogs chen gcig bsod nams ni//skye la nyan thos bsam yas la//sbyin pa'i tshogs chen spel bas ni//
70a4(rgyud): 'bum gyi char yang mi bodo//ci phyir zhe na gcig mnyes pas//rgyal ba thams cad mnyes pa yin//nam mkha' khyab pa'i rgyal ba dang //nyag gcig spang ba'i rgyal ba gnyis//so ma yin tha mi dad /
70a5(rgyud): sku dang gsung thugs gcig las med//'dul ba'i ngo grang khyad par+ya las//bsam gyis mi khyab bstan par zad//des na khyad par de ltar snang //de yang ji lta bu zhe na//las rnams dag pa'i blam
70a6(rgyud): ze ni/ dge ldan gsal ldan bya ba gnyis//dga' ba'i dad pas sor skyes//gcig la gcig ni tha tshig byas//gcigs nyan thos bsam yas la//mchod sbyin bya ba rgya cher byas//gtsigs
70a7(rgyud): tshogs mchod rgya cher byas//tshogs la spyod pa'i gsal lnga ni//'di tsho gcig la mngon sangs rgyas//sbyin pa spel ba'i dge lnga ni//bskal pa grangs med gsum gyis grub//de bas gnas
70b1(rgyud): na na/ drug chu nod s+ho// /gar+b+ha ga/nga rlos sa dpa'am dgas du nan bya /na gyi gzugs dang nas pa co/
70b2(rgyud): zhen rdo khyim midag med sbyin bya ba de//tshe me nu rgyud de 'argyas pa dag/rgyun gyi sartag pade 'di spyad byas//sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa na//'khor dang brgyas pa ci 'dra bar//skye ba de yis nges
70b3(rgyud): sgyu dang gsung thugs rdo rje yo//don du nges par sgrub pa'i tshogs//rtogs na sgra dzA'i gang byed do//goms dang brjod dang smos pa yis//chos kyi rgyal por de 'gyur zhes//ston spyi gtsug nyid 'gyur/
70b4(rgyud): dr-i ya d+hi lta bu zhen//rlung srong rnal 'byor kal y-inas//drang srong rnam pa ma bo la//tshogs 'di yon tan rgya cher bsgrags//don rnams nges par bshad pa las//drang sring med pos rigs 'dzin
70b5(rgyud): ston par byed pa'iri ka sa yin//gosang bdag chos kyi rgyal por gyu ru//'on kyang gsang ba'i don 'di dag/snod dang ldan pa'i 'gro ba la//bstan tam+ba hA shad dam brjod par gyis//des ni ston chen
70b6(rgyud): po da dr-i rang yi stobs pa 'thob par 'gyur//des na 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs//rgyal ba kun gyi thug sa dmi//rnal 'byor gsang ba'i tshogs 'dri yin//rnal 'byor gang zhig blo ldan pa'o//
70b7(rgyud): skad cig tsam 'amathang cig la//rgyal po'i tshogs 'di rab bskrun na//rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas tha~Md dang //rigs 'dzin rnal 'byor mtha' dag dang //tha tshig thas ma skong sa nas kyang //chos kyi min
71a1(rgyud): thob par 'gyur//des ni cho ga spyad yon tan drang //log par spyad pa'i skyon rnams ni//sngon byung glengs gzhi bshad pa yin//zhes sems dpa'i rdo rjes gsung so//rgyud kyi rgyal
71a2(rgyud): rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las 'das pa sngon byung gi le'u zhes bya ste bdun pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rje de bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog bdag po de'i
71a3(rgyud): zhal du shin tu re zhing bka' sdod pa'i tshul gyis lta zhing kun tu brjod par 'khor gyis bskus pa'i se la sta gon du gnas shing cang mi smra bar gyur to//de nas 'khor phal mo ches rnam par bskul
71a4(rgyud): bar rig nas rnal 'byor gyi phyag lus kun sa la brdabs nas a la la ho zhes bya ba'i sgra byung nas mgrin gcig tu gsol ba btab pa//e mi rdo rje sems chen po//rang rig mkhyen pa'i ye
71a5(rgyud): 'brar mgon po yon tan bsam pa las 'das//rgyal thob khyod la phyag 'tsha lo//e ma rang snang dbyer med sku//rnam dag bsod nams mtshan gyis brgyan//dpe byad 'bru bkod lta mi ngoms//sku
71a6(rgyud): lnga'i mchog la phyag 'tsha lo//e mra rnam dag ra mkha'i dbyings//gcig gsung sna tshogs sgrar rig mkhyen//bsam 'das brjod med rdo rje'i gsung //gsung lnga'i mchog la phyag 'tshalo//a ma/
71a7(rgyud): gsang ba na mkhar thugs//mnyam nyid mi g.yo sor gas la//kun rig snying po ye shes mchog/thugs lnga'i mchog la phyag 'tsha lo//i ma mdzad mdzad pa che//ma chags chags dral 'od chags
71b1(rgyud): mdzad thams cad sgrol ba'i las chen po//phrin las mchog la phyag 'tshal//rgyal 'chab khyod la gsol 'dri//byams mgon thugs 'i byin rlabs kyis//sprul pa'i go chags ru bsnams te//'khor ba'i skyes
71b2(rgyud): chen po la//sdug bsngal shin tu gsad pa'i phyir//thams ca dur khrod chen po ru//byin gyis brlabs pa'i las chen mdzod//e ho zhes gzhol ba btab pa las//sems dpa' rdo rje chen po des//rnal 'byor hUM//
71b3(rgyud): phyag byas te//bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog bdag po la zhus pa//a la la ho bde ba chen po'i mchog gsang ba kun gyi rgyal po/yang gsang bla na med pa'i bdag nyid/'dus pa chen po'i tshogs rma du
71b4(rgyud): byung ba'i tshogs shin tu rtul phod pa gsol pa 'tshal ba 'di shin tu ngo mtshar lag so//'di dag 'dul ba'i dbang du dgongs te//ji ltar 'tshal ba'i bsam pa rangs par mdza du gsol zhes gsol ba btib
71b5(rgyud): pa las//bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchogi bdag po des kun tu 'dul ba'i dus mkhyenas bka' gsang rma du byung ba'i 'khor gyi skor ba//dur khrod rgyan gyi rol pa lus rma du byung ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms
71b6(rgyud): par zhugaso//snyoms par zhugs nas 'khor byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga 'di gsungaso//hUM he he phaT/hUM hUM biM shwa badz+ra kro d+ha dz+wa la maN+Dal a ra le aM u li ta pa li trAM staM/kha le to/na sha staM b+ha ya hU~M
71b7(rgyud): bruM phu tsi khA hi phaT phaT ha la hU~M zhes gsung so////'jig rten drug phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa tha~Md dur khrod kyi dkyil 'khor du gyur nas/g.yos/rab tu g.yos/shin tu rnam par 'thor/
72a1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldana'ang snga gsang ba mchog bdag po des sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po la 'khor gzhan gyis yod tshe du mi 'gyur ba'i sku'i chos bstan pa ni sku kun tu dur khrod kyi
72a2(rgyud): bdag po chen por bsgyur nas dur khrod kyi gnas brgyad dang /he ru ka'i gnas bcu dang /dpal gyis chas brgyad dang /dur khrod kyi rkyen chen po dgu dang /don gyi rtags chen po bco brgyad dang /dung
72a3(rgyud): khrod kyi long sprod sna tshogs pa bstan pas zhal 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis gzigs pa las sems dpa' rdo rje des me khyen te/bka' gsang dbyung chen po 'dis don du ni bshad//tshig tu bsgrags par rigan
72a4(rgyud): 'dus pa'i tshogs la shin tu ldem dgongs kyi tshig tu smras pa/bka' gsang rmad byung chen po 'di//sbas pas zab cing rtogs dka' ba//mtshon pas don 'byin mi shes pas//nyon mongs rang dga' spyon
72a5(rgyud): mnyam pa'i//shin tu byis pa'i bro zhen pa'i//nges pa'i shes rab mgo ldongs te//don gyi rtsal shugs tshungs pa yis//dga' ba de'i long spyod bskrun snyam nas//mtshan ma rang dka' spyad bsgrubs kyis
72a6(rgyud): rang bzhin 'grub par mi 'gyur te//rgyud phung 'bras bu tshig gyur nas//myu gu brlag ste ga la 'byung //gtan tshigs de bas 'di don dog/rtsol gzhan dag la bstan min zhes//gas de ba dag
72a7(rgyud): rgyal po kun gsung na//ci khyed rnams kyis mi shes sam//zhes rnam par spras pa las//'dus pa'i tshogs kyi slar gsol pa//e ma he sems dpa' chen po de lta bu'i rgyu tshig chen po dag 'a
72b1(rgyud): rgya dkyil 'khor gyi dang dam pa 'dir gsung ngam/'on te mi spyod dngam/cang ma lags grang /ci blang dor mdzad dam/e ma snodu ma gyur pa ni gang mchis/thams cad byang chub kyi snying po can lags na/thod kun tu
72b2(rgyud): rab tu thong //rnam par rab tu gsungs/'gag pa yinga'am 'gog gsungs//ca phyir ma gsung thogs med sras//rgyal po'i sras po dus 'di lags//gsang ba'i snying po snang 'di lags//bka' gsang dgyen
72b3(rgyud): 'khor gnas 'di lags//gsang ba'i dur khrod tshul 'di lags//snying rje zher sems khyod la 'dud//gsang ba yang gsang khyod la 'dud//gsang ba ye gsang khyod la 'dud/dkyil 'khor rgyal po khyod la
72b4(rgyud): 'dud 'khor la snying po khyod la 'dud//gsang chen snying po tshul ci lags//bka' gsang dkyil 'khor thabs ci lags//'bras bu bde ba'i don ci lags//ma 'ongs pi ya rnal 'byor dag/bsgrubason dang
72b5(rgyud): len 'tshal ba yi/rigs par 'gyur ba'i thabs ci lags//'byung chen rgyal pos pa sha du gsol//zhes gsol ba btab pa las//sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa de shin tu bzhad pa chen pos rnam par bzhad//
72b6(rgyud): a a he he'i gad rgyangs bsgrags pas 'khor thid kyang gang rgyangs kyi sgra chen po sgrogs par mdzad/dgyes pa'i 'od zer las shes rab kyi dpal de dgyes pa'i rol mo sna tshogs ling long phyed par byung //de nas
72b7(rgyud): sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa des lus kun srang ste/dur khrod kyi cha sna tshogs pas mi ning rtags bco brgyad 'bar bar byas nas brjed pa'i gsung gis gsang sngags rgya mtsho dang /rnam grangs sna tshogs don//
73a1(rgyud): kyi bsgrub pa brtags kyi rol pa gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di dag pa sha//gcig tu yang dag nges grub pa'i//don la rten byed rnal 'byor rnams//thog myed nyid 'grub 'dod pa/
73a2(rgyud): ji ltar tso blag mkhan dag gis//ras kar sbyangs pas chen 'dzin ltar//rnal 'byor las rnams dang por ni//sgongs dang sbyong ba'i las rnams gtses//zab mor 'jug pa'i sngon logs nas//sems nyid
73a3(rgyud): gtang nas tsher gcad phyir//theg pa dman pa'i skye bo dang //lhan cig ci la'ang mi brnalo//de las gyur pa'i yo byad dag/rus sbal mgo la 'ongs pa dang //shin tu 'khrugs pa'i sems chen gyis
73a4(rgyud): brgya mtshos bshugs te spang bar bya//gal te gong zag dbang gis ni//nyams pa'i chad pa byung ba na//mgon tshun chos nyid chu phab nas//skong zlog cho ga rgya cher bya//sgrub rtsom sngon nam yang sngon nam//
73a5(rgyud): zhag grangs dag gi sngon logs nas//sdig sbyangs byang chub sems bskyed//dge ba'i don la 'dun par bya//slongs mo dang slong la dga' ba//slong la 'tshe ba'i tshe spyod rnams//sde dang mtshan dang grar
73a6(rgyud): byas te/da snying rje khud pa'i zhing du bya//sman dong 'bru dang rtsi rnams dang //btsud kyi mchog tu gyur pA dag/btags sam phye mar sbyar nas kyang //klung nga ma chu klung mtsho tshon du//don te chags med pa
73a7(rgyud): sbyin par bya//dge ba'i yon bdag dang blangs te//nad gso shes slob skyed skem grwa/btsugs te bsti gnas mchog bya zhing //dus kyi 'khor lo'i mchod chen bya//gsung sgra rgya mtsho sgrogs pa yang
73b1(rgyud): glegs bam zab mo kun bsten te//brjod dang bsnyen bkur bsti gnas kyis//rgya cher yangs pa'i las rnams bya//ye shes tshogs rnams rdzogs bya'i phyir//shes rab tshogs kyi sbyin mchog dag/bstan tam
73b2(rgyud): glegs bam la sogs pa'i//blo mchog ldan pa rnams la sbyin//bsgoms dang goms par bya ba yin//kun gzhi dag par bya ba'i phyir//ting 'dzin bye ba mang po la//blo mchog yid kyi rtsal de sbyang //chos
73b3(rgyud): kyi 'khor lo rab bskor to//rgyad sbyangs lhag pa'i shes rab blta//sho gam sad dang sho gam lam//mi bde'i gnod pa kun gsal te//tshad med snying rje'i 'khor lo bskor//sbyin pa'i khor lo rgyan
73b4(rgyud): mi gcad//chu 'am pa 'am na mkha' 'am//me 'am de bzhin rlung rnams la//sku gdung spel mchod ring bsrel rnams//brtsam pa'i las chen 'khor lor bya//mtshams med bzlog par byed pa yi
73b5(rgyud): lus sems rgyud la rdul rlags te//'phags pa'i sprin tshogs yo brang du//rdul skad lus kyis mchod sems bshags//rgyal mnyes las ni gyis shig pa//thabs chen spong ba'i las chen las
73b6(rgyud): rnam bzhi me yaM las mchog bya//des ni mtshams med bzlogs pa yin//thugs rjes 'byung ba'i 'khor lo dag/gang ltar goms ltar 'bad rtsol bya//bstan pa skyong ba'i tshigs rnams la//sbyin
73b7(rgyud): mchod spel ba'i las rnams bya//de la sogs pa'i dge ba'i tshogs//don du mi 'gyur kun spangs la//nan tan tshogs kyi dpu chen bskyed//'di ltar las chen stang sog pa//gzhan du bskyed pa
74a1(rgyud): ma yin te//rtse gcig don ldan rnal 'byor pa//rgyud ldan snod ldan bya phyir dang //gal ta rtsal zhan ma grub na//dge bsags ljang chun kun bsdoms de//las kyi bsags pa den
74a2(rgyud): bgrangs shing //gdung po'i shugs phyung rtsa la sngags nas//nyi sher chu klung zla brnyan ltar//rang bzhin shugs kyis 'grub par gcas//de phyir phra mo yan chad kyang //bdags den du 'gyur
74a3(rgyud): bapar byed/de ltar sbyang ba spyod pa yi//phra mo'i rnal 'byor blo 'phel bas//chu ngu tshung sogs mthar zad nas//skong ba'i rnal 'byor 'khor lo yis//zhig dang ral dang chag 'dres dag/bskang
74a4(rgyud): gso gzhug pa'i las 'od bya//las chen bskong ba'i khyad par gyis/gan su brtag par ngas med//mi sdug skyon can bkra mi shis//spangs te med par gyur pa yi//shin tu sar pa'i gnas chen
74a5(rgyud): dag/bskang ba'i gnasu de 'gyur//de ltar yid 'ongs gnas gtsal nas//drod ldan bla ma spyan drangs te//sri zhu rgyal chos spyi ber bkur//dri yang dmigs kyis zhu ba drag/maN+Dal khar sil cem
74a6(rgyud): dadapa me long snying po ltar byas te//bcing ma'i rgyu las rdzas byas pa//yid 'ongs rnam lnga'i mchod pa la//rkyen gyi rnal 'byor sna tshogs kyis//rgyan te klubs pa'i sprin phung rnams//mnyes
74a7(rgyud): nas bskongs phyir rgyal la dbul//phye 'khor skyong ba'i mgon po la//'dod yon lnga la sogs pa yi//yid bzhin long spyong rkyen dang bcas//yon tan tshe las snod bcol mchod//mnyam nas
74b1(rgyud): skongs pa'i stong su 'gyur//khams gsum snying rje'i gnas rnams la//yo byad sbyin tshogs chun po las//'dod pa'i bsam pa rangs byas nas//mgu bas skongs pa'i stongasu 'gyur//ba'i gsu gyur pa
74b2(rgyud): bgags rlos kyang //mnyam pa'i don gyis sems mi 'byung //dmigs kyis kha zas sna tshogs las//dgegs rnams mgun thams cad kyang //mnyam pa'i don gyis snyengs pa'i rgyur//cung zad ce
74b3(rgyud): du snang ba yin//de ltar skong ba'i las rnams kyis//bskang bar bya ba'i dmigs rnams ni//rnam pa lngar ni snang ba ste//kun tu nyams pa chen po dang //rtsa ba nyams dang yan lag nyams//de bzhin zlas/
74b4(rgyud): nyams kar nyams lnga//bskang ba'i thabs kyang lnga yod//spyad pa'i las kyis bskang ba dang //rdzas drang nor dang ting 'dzin dang //man ngag gsang bI thabs tsha no//de dag la yang lnga lnga ste/spyodapa
74b5(rgyud): tshul gyis bskang ba la/rnam pa lnga ru bshad par bya//dang po 'bum lnga khri gsum ste//rtsa nyams khri lnga stong gsumo//yan lag nyams par gyur pa la//stong lnga brgya gsum thon par bya//zlas
74b6(rgyud): nyams brgya lnga bcu gsumo//zhar gyis nyams par gyur pa la//bcu lnga gcig gsum dag gis skongs//rdzas kyis rkang pa'i thabs mchog ni//gal te bsrung ba 'ga' zhig la ste//byang chub
74b7(rgyud): tha tshig ra lo gyur na//gti mug rigs kyi tha tshig bskang //mdangs rigs snga ma spyan drangs la//nyes 'gal mi bcab stong du bshad//gser la sogs pa'i rdzas chen gyis//tha tshig gang
75a1(rgyud): brlabs nar des glu//byang chub sems bskyed rgyud sbyangs mnyan//rdo rje tha tshig ral gyur na//zhe sdang rigs kyi tha tshig bskang //rje'u rigs bla ma spyan drangs te//nyes byas ma bca ba 'dum du
75a2(rgyud): shel la sogs pa'i rdzas chen gyis//tha tshig gang brlag nar dos bru//bsam gtan ting 'dzin bsgom brtson bya//rin chen tha tshig nyams gyur na//nga rgyal rigs kyi tha tshig bskang //rgyal rigs bla ma spyan
75a3(rgyud): drangs te/nyes byas mi bcab brgyad khrir bshags//bai DUr+ya la sogs rdzas chen gyis//tha tshig gang brlag nor de blu//sku gdung ring bsrel rnam par spel//pad+ma'i tha tshig ral gyur na//'dod chags rigs
75a4(rgyud): kyi tha tshig bskang //gdol rigs bla ma spyan drangs la//nyes byas mi bca ba brgyar bshags bya//byi ru la sogs rdzas min gyis//tha tshig gang brlag nor des blo//bshad bya zab mo'i glegs byam brjod//
75a5(rgyud): kyi tha tshig ral gyur na//khrag dog rigs kyi tha tshig bskang //bram ze rigs she spyan drangs la//nyes byas mi bcab bcu lngar bshogs//in+d+ra la sogs rdzas rnams kyi//tha tshig gang brlag nor des blu//
75a6(rgyud): mchod sbyin bsod nams las chen bya//des ni bskang ba'i las chen 'grub/don gyis bskrad pa'i thabs mchog kyang /rnam lnga'i tshul du bshad par bya//chos kun na mkhar bsgoms nus kyang //
75a7(rgyud): bag chags bzang ngan thams cad kun//ci yang med par blo la gzhag/de la goms byas nyes pa med//kun la mkhas pa'i bla ma la//rgya che yangs pa'i chos nyan te//bsam pa'i las rnams rgya cher
75b1(rgyud): bya yod kyis dmigs pa'i las dag na//rtsa ba nyams pa skong bar 'gyur//gal te yon lag nyes gyur na//chos nyid na mkha'i don ston pa'i//glegs bam zab mo kun brtags te//don rnams rgya cher
75b2(rgyud): brtag par bya//des ni yan lag nyams pa med//zlas ni tha tshig nyams 'gyur na//bla med skyes bu mkhas pa la//gzhung chen tshugs pa'i bstan pa zhig/ston pa'i yon bdag gter blangs te//bro yi rtsa
75b3(rgyud): tsan kun bsdus te//dam chos bsdud rtsi bstan pa bsgrags//gal te zhar gyis nyams gyur na//bstan pa'i glegs bam rgya cher rnams//khris nas chos kyi sbyin par bya//des ni zhar nyams bskongs par 'gyur//
75b4(rgyud): ting 'dzin rtsal gyi thabs mchog ni//bag chags can gyi spyi gtsug tu//rtsa dmar 'od ni me long tsam//shin tu 'bar zhing 'tsher gsal bas//chagaso dang bcas pa'i phung po bsregs//rnam grol sem gyi
75b5(rgyud): rang bzhin dang //'od kyi rang bzhin gcig pa las//dkaro drang dmar dang mthing ka yi//'od kyi thig le gsum du 'gyur//dkar por spros pas khyab par che//dmar por spros pra chags pa che//mthing ka thub
75b6(rgyud): kyi sa bon te//rnam gsum gcig tu 'dus pa las//ngag yid gsum gyi bag chags bsregs//sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig bskongs//dkar po rlung zla'i dkyil 'khor la//dmar po 'bud pa'i rlung
75b7(rgyud): byung bas//mtshan ma'i bag chags rnam par gtor//dmar po chu zla'i dkyil 'khor las//mthing kau ye shes chu byung bas//dngos po'i ldan ljin thams cad bkrus//de ltar gsal bar gyur pa dang //
76a1(rgyud): rnal 'byor can gyis tshig 'di brjod//rdzas srog pa la mo dgos kyang //bag chags tshig la mo mi dgos//rnyog pa'i ye shes mo byung bas//mtshan ma yon bud shing bsregs//'jug
76a2(rgyud): rten gtor la rlung dgos kyang //mtshan ma gtor la rlung mi dgos//rig pa'i ye shes rlung byung bas//mtshan ma'i rdul tsho gas rnam par 'phyag/lus bkru ba la chu dges kyang //sems bkru ba la chu
76a3(rgyud): mi dgos//mnyam nyid chu ro khrus kyi rdzing //ye shes chu bo'i rgyun byung bas//bag chags ldan ljin thams cad bkrus//oM kro d+hi shwa ri sarba pA bi sho d+hA ya/oM AHhUM/raM yaM khI/de skad chag tu
76a4(rgyud): brjod pa yis//nyams pa'i chad pa mi 'byung //gcig tu bskang ba'i las chen yang //rigs kyis rdzas dang yo byad rnams//gan su bsags nas byin brlabs te//phyi ngan mchis bcwa brtan byas
76a5(rgyud): nas so rigs kyi dam tshig la//'gal bar gyur pa gang dang gang //mchod dang bshags dang gnong bkur te//yan lag brgyad kyi tshul bzung nas//bsam gtan gnas sbyangs rdzas bsab pa//gti
76a6(rgyud): mug rigs kyi dam tshig la//shes nas rtogs par bya rgyu las//ma rig lag pa'i mthu yis ni//tha tshig drag po yal gyur na//pho brang na mkha'i ling+ga la//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa//
76a7(rgyud): yi rang bzhin 'od gsal bar//gsal 'phro 'khrug par gyur pa na//phaT kyis drag tu brdebs pa yis//'od 'dris bskal pa'i mkha' gsal bas//gti mug ri bo'i mun gsal te//byang chub myu gu
76b1(rgyud): 'bar bar 'gyur//de ltar gsal bar gyur pa dang //rnal 'byor can gyis tshig 'di brjod//oM ma'o bde gshegs tha tshig las//byang chub sems bdo gsal 'bar ba//don du mi gtor gzhi skyed
76b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas gdung chen rgyud snyam las//ji ltar zla ba re ri ltar//rgyu las byung ba'i rang bzhin las//byang chub myu gu nub ma khang //gzugs kyi phung po'i zheng kham su//bde mchog mkha' mnyam dpyod/
76b3(rgyud): chen gas pa//gnyen pos 'joms pa'i thabs chen las//bsgreng ba skal pa'i thugs dam bskang //gsang bden gyi rdzas mchog 'dis//byang chub bskal pa'i thugs dam rnams//stongs gyur pas
76b4(rgyud): pa'i don du sbyangs//sarba ta thA ga ta pu ta sa ma ya ho//de skad tshig tu brjod nas kyang //spyi bo brda'i tshul phyag rgya sbyar//zhe sdang rig kyi tha tshig las//blo byung rnam shes ling+ga la//rdo rje bum pa'i dbus gas
76b5(rgyud): par hUM gi rang bzhin 'od gsal 'bar//gsal 'phro 'khrug par gyur pa na//phaT kyis drog tu brdabs pa yis//'od 'dril rdo rje pha lam gyis//zhe sdang ri bo blugs nas kyang //shes rab me long 'od gsal/
76b6(rgyud): 'brur de ltar gsal bar gyur pa na//rnal 'byor can gyis tshig 'di brjod//e ma'o rdo rje the tshig rnams//sems chen ye shes gsal 'bar ba//thugs mchog gdung chen rgyud snyam lngas//ji ltar ral/
76b7(rgyud): briso rgal ltar//de las gyur pa'i rang bzhin las//shes ral me long nub mkhad//rnam shes phung po'i ning khams//gsal 'bar ye shes thig le 'phro//gnyen pos 'joms pa'i thabs chen
77a1(rgyud): //bskang bskal ba'i thugs dam bslang //gsang ba don gyi rdzas mchog 'dis//thugs mchog bskal nga'i thugs dam bskang //bskongasu 'gyur bsam pa'i don du sbyang //oM sarba ta thA da ta
77a2(rgyud): sa ma ya ho//de skad tshig tu brjod nas kyang //snying gi 'ja yi tshul phyag sbyar//nga rgyal rigs kyi dam tshig las//snyoms nas dang du blang rgyu las//log pa'i nga rgyal de mtshoms//tha tshig drug po yel gyur
77a3(rgyud): na pho brang skye rgyu'i ling+ka'i dkyil//rin chen 'bar ba'i dbus gnas par//swa yi rang bzhin 'od gsal 'bar//gsal 'phro 'khrug par gyur pa na//phaT kyis drag tu brdabs pa las//'od 'dril rin
77a4(rgyud): chen 'khor lo yis//nga rgyal de'u chen brlag 'gyur nas//bsod nams ljon shing me tog 'bar//de ltar gsal bar gyur pa na//rnal 'byor can gyis tshig 'di brjod//e ma rin chen tha tshig
77a5(rgyud): bsod nams yon tan 'od 'bar ba//don du mi gtong bzhir bskyed//rgya mchog gdung chen rgyud bsnyams las//ji ltar mkha' la 'khrigs 'thibs ltar//rgya las gyur pa'i rang bzhin gyis//myog
77a6(rgyud): 'od mdzes yal ma khang//tshor ba'i phung po'i zhing khaM su//che ba'i ye shes mnyam 'bar bas//gnyen pos 'joms pa'i thabs chen las//bskang bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang //gsang ba don gyi
77a7(rgyud): rdzas mchog 'dis//sku mchog bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang //skongs 'gyur bsam pa'i don du sbyang //oM sarba ta thA ga ta rad na sa ma ya ho//de skad tshig tu brjod nas kyang //phral ba brda' yi
77b1(rgyud): tshul phyug sbyar//'dred chags rib kyi dam tshig las//rtogs nas spyad par bya rgyu las//'dod log rgya mtsho ma ngoms te//tha tshig drug po yul 'gyur nas//pho brab ba'i ling+ge'i dkyil//pad+mo 'bang ba'i dbum gar+b+ha
77b2(rgyud): pad/oM gyi rang bzhin 'od gsal 'bar//gsal 'phro 'khrug por gyur pa ni//phaT kyi drag tu brdabs pa las//'od 'dril pad+mo'i mtshon cha las//'dod chags rgya mtshod skams gyur nas//pad+ma chos kyi ye/
77b3(rgyud): shes 'bar//de ltar gsal bar gyur pa na//rnal 'byor can gyis tshig 'di brjod//e ma'o pad+mo'i tha tshig las//pad+mo'i ye shes 'od 'bar bas//don du mi gtong bzhi bskyed//gsung mtshig gdung rgya
77b4(rgyud): rgyud bsnyams nas//ji ltar pad stong char ma ltar//rgyu los gyur pa'i rang bzhin gyis//pad+mo'i ye shes nub ma khang//'du shes phung po'i zhing kham su//rtogs pa'i chos nyid 'od 'bros pas//gnyen byos
77b5(rgyud): 'joms pa'i thabs chen las//bskra bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang //gsang ba don gyi rjes mchog 'das//gsung mchog bskal ba'i thugs dam rnams//skongs gyur bsam pa'i don du sbyangs//oM sarba
77b6(rgyud): ta thA da ta d+harma sa ma ya ho//de skad tshig tu brjod nas kyang //lce'i brda yi tshul phyag sbyar//phra dog rigs kyi dam tshig las//rtogs na spad par bya rgyu las//phrag dog log bzung dbang gis na//tha tshig
77b7(rgyud): drag po yal 'gyur ba//pho brang gsang ba'i ling+ga'i dkying//rdo rje ral gri dbus gnas par//ha yis rang bzhin 'od gsal 'ang //gsol 'phro 'khrug par gyur pa na//phaT kyis drag du brdangs pa
78a1(rgyud): las 'od sgris rdo rje'i rag+na g+hi yis//drag dgu mngon chu ba srings gyur nas//rdo rje ral gri ye shes 'bar//de ltar gsal bar gyur pa na//rnal 'byor can gyis tshig 'di brjod//
78a2(rgyud): ma'o phrin las tha tshigA las//rdo rje ral gri 'od 'bar bas//don du mi gtong bzhi bskyed//byin las gdung chen rgyud bsnyams las//ji ltar nyigs la sprin pi sgribs ltar//rgyu las gyur pa'i rang
78a3(rgyud): bzhin gyis//rdo rje 'od chen nub ma khad//'du byed phung po'i zhing kham su//e shes mtshon cha'i 'od 'phros pas//gnyen pos 'joms pa'i thabs chen las//bska ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam
78a4(rgyud): bskang rna gsang ba don gyi rdzas mchog 'dis//phrin las bskal pa'i thugs dam rnams//skongs gyur bsam pa'i don du sbyang //oM sarba ta tha ga ta karma sa ma ya ho//de skad tshig tu brjod nas kyu
78a5(rgyud): lus kyi brda yi tshul phyag sbyar//des kyang skong ba'i las chen 'grub//man ngag thabs kyi don mchog ni//rtsa ba yan lag de rnams las//gang dag nyams par gyur pa la//mun ngag thabs ma/
78a6(rgyud): lnga yis bskang //nyam sa pa chen por lhung 'gyur na//tha mar gyur pa'i skyes bu dag/rgyal po dgu yi spyan lam du//bsgrub pa chen po dgu brtsam zhing //mchog tshan dgu yi brtul zhug spyad//
78a7(rgyud): rang gi gzungs ma gang yin pa//bla ma dgu la gzungs mar dbul//de bzhin rtsa ba yan lag dang //zla dang zhar las nyams pa la//bsgrub pa don gyi khyed par rnams//bdun nam lnga 'amo gsuM
78b1(rgyud): 'am gcig/rim pa bzhin du sbyar byas na//des ni skong ba'i mchog tu 'gyur//bskang ba'i yul yang rnam lnga ste//bder gshegs rgyal bu mtha' dag kyang //ma rdu ba u na rnam lnga ste//gti mug zhe sdang nga chu
78b2(rgyud): dang 'dod chags phrag dog 'di lnga dag/rtsa bar gyur pa'i don gyis na//gzhi yang thams cad 'dis bsgyur bas//nyams dang ma nyams tha tshig dang //long spyod spong len tha~Md rnams//yid rgyu yin par rig bya
78b3(rgyud): rgyu nyid rgyur brtags dbang gis na//bsgyur bas dug 'gyur sman chen ltar//de nyid tha tshig btsan por sbyor//'dul ba'i dbang gis khyad par gyis//de bzhin rdo rje rin chen dang //pad+mor las lnga'i rigasu 'dus//de//
78b4(rgyud): dag thugs do mchog nyid kyang //rnam lngar 'dus par bstan pa la//rtogs nas bsrung bsgrub dam bcas pa//so 'gal zhing chag nyams na//sau nyid bsab par bya//sku yi chag nyams gnasu gzhug/gsung
78b5(rgyud): gi 'gal 'khrul so ru bsab//thugs kyi 'gal 'khrul gsor mod//rdo rje snying pa'i tha tshig la//bskangs pas skongs par gyur pa yi//rtags tshon dag kyang 'di lta ste//rgyal ba sang+yas rigs 'dzin gyin/
78b6(rgyud): gdung chen dag las byung ba yi//sha ri ram zhes bya ba de//thams cad ltas ston par byed//shel gyi za ma rtog nang du//dag par bcug ste bcas pa las//nyams pa'i chud pa byung ba'i tshe//kha dog/
78b7(rgyud): gnag cing 'angos par 'gyur//nyams pa skongs sam sor chud cing //gal te dam tshig ma nyams na//kha dog dkar zhing 'tsher bar 'gyur//legs pa'i lton 'byung ba'i tshe//grangs med rgya cher 'phag
79a1(rgyud): bAr 'gyur//gal te gnag gam mi gsal na//sgyur te bsgribs nas bskang bzlog b+h+ya//'on tang nyams pa mi phog cing //de dag sno gas 'an//rtag tshon 'don ston byato//dog shi/
79a2(rgyud): tu brtags nas ni//dkar la 'chor bar gyur pa na//rtsa ba yan log nyams pa rnams//skyongs te sor chud rtags yino//des na rnal 'byor las kyi gtsor sbyong dang skong ba'i las rnams bya/badz+ras
79a3(rgyud): sems dpa'i rdo rjes de skad ces gsol pa dang /'khor der 'dus par gyur pa'i bdud kyi sde pa las/lha'o rigasu gyur pa sangs rgyas kyi 'khor 'phags pa'i rigs 'dzin pa nyon mongs pa lnga'i bad
79a4(rgyud): bo lha chen po lnga la sogs pa bka'i snod rung bar byin gyis brlabs te 'khod pa las/'dod chags thams cad kyi gtso bo rdo rje bram ze thod pa can zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'di skad ces gsol
79a5(rgyud): to/bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' ltar mi gyis na ma dod ma gus 'gal 'khrul du gyur pa'i chas pa'i skye gnas dang rnam par smin pa ji ltar 'gyur/bdag cag rnams la rgya cher ba shA du gsol zhes
79a6(rgyud): zhus pa las/bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/'dod chags kyi bdag po la sogs pa rnams dam tshig nyams de'i chad pa'i skye gnas 'dri ba legs kyis yid tshim /
79a7(rgyud): byed pa bshad kyis nyon cig/rtsa ba yan lag 'di dag las//gal te zhig gam nyams gyur na//rnal 'byor las kyi dang po las//lung gi gsang sgor zhugs pa'i tshe//don dang ldan pa'i//
79b1(rgyud): zlu ma yis//rdo rje tha chog byin brlabs nas//lce la dmachog chu bzhag pa//dmyal ba rdo rjer da mod bcug nas//yi ge hUM du byas pa des//snying gi dkyil tu thir nas kyang //lcags kyi sdig pa mdo dbu
79b2(rgyud): khro bo rat+na zhes bya ba'i//khrag 'thung chen por gyur nas ni//snying khrag gzhi pas te 'thungs nas ni//sdug bsngal chen por bsad nas kyang //dmyal ba rdo rjer de ltung 'gyur//gal te tha tshig mnyis
79b3(rgyud): nalce la bzhag pa ar+tha ste//snying gi dkyil du thim nas kyang //ye shes sems dpa' tshon grang bar//gyur te sgrib pa kun sbyangs nas//sangs rgyas sra su skyes par byed//'dod chags dam tshig
79b4(rgyud): nyams gyur na//mngal rtsi grong khyer chen por 'gro//zhe sdang dam tshig nyams gyur na//rak+Sha srin po'i rigasu 'gro/gti mug dam tshig nyams gyur na//mi gtsang za su za ba yi//rmongs pa'i bag r+b+he//
79b5(rgyud): lusu ltung //nga rgyal dmachig nya mos 'gyur na//rul sbal nag po'i lusu ltung // dog dam tshig nyams gyur na//chu sen mgo dgu'i lusu ltung //dam cheg chen po'i kun nyams na//ru tra nag
79b6(rgyud): bo lu su lhung //las kyi rkyen dang ma phrad na//thar pa'i skabs ni me srid do//sems dpe'i rdo rjes de skad ces gsungaso//nyon mongs pa lnga'i bdag po rig 'dzin rnams kyi shin tu cho nges chen po 'byin tri/
79b7(rgyud): dus der oM ma'o bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ltar na/bdag la ltung rgyu mchis te/dang po bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' la btags pa'i tshe/bka' la ma dad mo gus
80a1(rgyud): pas bka' la skur cing spras long btags pa dang //ston pa dang grogs la smad cing spyad long btags pa la sogs pa lhung ba'i rgyu mang po bgyis pas//da ni bdag kyang chung pa'i sgo/
80a2(rgyud): gnasu mchi bar nges na/bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs rje chen pos bzung ste/bka'i khor du bkod pos da ni thar pa thob lags grang /'on kyang 'gyod pa drag po'i dbang gis yid kyi sgrib pa ni
80a3(rgyud): byang chub sems kyis bshags/ngagi sgrib pa ni tshig tu 'den cing smos te bshags/lus kyi sgrib pa ni lus gdan khril phul te bshags na/bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rjes gzung 'chal
80a4(rgyud): na/gnyen po ni gang lags/thabs ni ji ltar bshags/yul ni gang la bshags/rgyu ni gang mchis bcom ldan 'das kyis bsha du gsol/bde bar gshegs pa thugs rjes bsgrub du
80a5(rgyud): gsol bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rig 'dzin chen po mi thod can rnams nyon cig/ltung bar gyur pa'i gnas rnams la 'gyod par gyur nas zhus pa leg so//ltung ba gnyen po ni gang
80a6(rgyud): zhe na/nyes byas rnams bshags par 'dod na gang 'gyod pa drag po skyes nas ba spu ni gzings mchi ma 'byin pa yin//thabs ni rnam pa bzhi yod/gang zhe na/shes rab chen po'i rgyud kyis bag cha
80a7(rgyud): thams cad rang bzhin med par shes pa dang /ting 'dzin chen po'i mis bag chags thams cad bsregs te med par bya ba dang /byang chub sems kyi 'od zer gyis bag chags kyi mun nag thaMd pas
80b1(rgyud): ting dag dag par bya ba dang /spyod pa brlangs po che'i chus dkru 'o//de la bshabs par bya ba'i grub ni 'di lta ste/sangs rgyas dang /rig 'dzin dang /lha dang bla ma dang /glegs pam dang /grags po dang /rkyen du
80b2(rgyud): pa rnam//bshugs par bye shi rgyu ni 'di lta ste/sgrib po che chung bshags pa'o//nyan mongs pa rigs pa mngon du rgyub ba shags pa dang /big la nyal drang shis bya'i slo ba bshags pa/da /
80b3(rgyud): ltung bar gyur pa'i las rnams 'dzid pa drag pas brtan la thabs la mkhas pas smid /sgrib pa che chu cha shAs kyi ste b+h+yAM la bu sgra bang bshags pa gyis shig/de/ ces bka' stsal pa dang /rits+tsha/
80b4(rgyud): chen po mi'i thod pa can rnams mgu zhing rangs te/rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i phyag byas naso//'gyod cing gdung ba'i glu 'di byung so//oM ye shes mchog rang bzhin kyil 'khor//zla rgyas bzhin du spros pa
80b5(rgyud): mIng la yang //thugs rjes nyi gsal 'od bzhin snyoms mdzad lta//bder gshegs bzhugs shing bdag la dgongasu gso'//brjod med shes rab mi g.yo chos mchog dbyings//bde chen long spyod rnog sku/
80b6(rgyud): rigs lha'i ba ni//chu 'phrul sprul pa'i naDa la phyag 'tsha'o//dngo su 'byor dang yid kyi sprul pa yis//kun tu bzang po'i bla med mchod sprin gyis//mkha' dbyings rnam dag rgyu tshor yongs pakang na so//phyin gyi
80b7(rgyud): gsang ba'i mchod pa rgya chen mchod//kun tu bzang mo'i yum gyi b+ha go la//'du 'dri la med pa'i dang dur gcig pa'i//gnyis med byang chub sems kyis mnyes gyur cig se mas kyi rang bzhin cho
81a1(rgyud): na mkha' che//chos nyid rnam dag rgya tshe 'odugs pa bas//rnal 'byor nyid dbying smra ba sa mA la 'das pas//mnyam nyid byang chub sems la rtag tu 'dus//kun bzangs rdzogs chen yan/
81a2(rgyud): bdal ba la//phyi nang gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bkod pa ni//snang sring rnam dag kun bzangs yum gyi dbyings//'byung dang 'byung 'gyur yab yum lhun rdzogs rnams//gsang chen rab rdzogs gzungs che//
81a3(rgyud): bdag nyid ma//gnyis med thig le chen por 'od gsal bas//cir yang snang bas bde chen g.yung drung lha//'dra 'bral med pa gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni//bdag nyid chen po bcom ldan yab yum
81a4(rgyud): dang byang chub lcam dral khro bo khro mo'i tshogs//rdo rje lha mo'i tshogs rdo rje tshogs kyi bdag/ma ltar byams zhing sring ltar gdung la sogs//nyes legs ltang 'dzin dam tshig rjes gcod ma//dbang
81a5(rgyud): gyur rdo rje dam can dgongasu gsol//thugs rjes gdung 'tsho ba rdo rje thod pa can//bdag cag dregs po'i bdag po 'dir cho gas kun//'gro ba'i don phyir byang chub sems bskyed//bla med gongs 'phang//
81a6(rgyud): thob par bya ba'i phyir//bstan pa rgya mtsho sau'i 'dul khyams dang //sku gsung thugs dang mnyam sbyor sdom pa'i mchog/'da' dka' rdo rje dam tshig gau tan gyi de nyer//spyi dang lhog pa'i khyad par dmar+g+haM
81a7(rgyud): rnams sngo phyi mnos shing gnyer du rma'o tshal//don las gol zhing ldog sems ma mchis kyang //gdod bya long yod snyam pa'i la lo dang //klod du ma gyur rtsal shugs chungs pa yis//shes
81b1(rgyud): bzhin mi ldan dam tshig 'gal 'gyur te//dang por tha chog bka' la btags par che//bka' las ma gus 'gal bgyis dpyas long gtags//bar du bslab pa'i gnyer chen phog po'i che//bslab la//
81b2(rgyud): mi brtson dron la g.yel ba dang //tha ma 'dri tshe 'bras bu sgrub pa na//bka' dang gzhung bzhin ma lcogs don las 'gal//tshor dang mtshor sgrib pa che chung rnams//shin tu mi shes ma rig dbang gi
81b3(rgyud): na ston pa'i bka' dang dam las 'gal bgyis pa//dpa'o thugs kyi bdag la bzod par gsol//'khor ba thog ma med pa'i dus mtha' nas//las kyi dbang gis bdag cag ring du 'khyams//nyon
81b4(rgyud): mongs log par lta ba'i drug 'thungs te//sdug bsngal nad kyis shin du gdungs pa la//bde gshegs thugs rje sman pa'i rgyal po yis//dam tshig bdud rtsi thar pa'i sman stsal bas//nyon mongs
81b5(rgyud): 'khrul pa'i nad rnams zhi mdzad cing //bla med byang chub snying por 'tsho mdzad pa//byams mgon thugs rjes bdag la skyabasu mchi//zhes ngus nas/a la la ho zhes brjod gi nyen po drag por bstenas
81b6(rgyud): lus gdan khrir phul te/byang chub sems kyis rnam pa 'dud pa'i don la rnam par sbyangs pas lus gcer bu zang mar phyung //gnod pa drag po'i 'gyod pa byas pas bde bar gshegs pa rnas
81b7(rgyud): mnyes par gyur to//des sgrib pa byed zhing bsod nams kyi tshogs rdzogs pa'i rtags lu so gos dang phral nas ldan pa'i thod pa yang zla ba tshes brgyad par gyur te//sa thob pa'i rtagasu de bzhin gash+ye
82a1(rgyud): nan rgyun du gnas byang chu na/rnanas sems na n+ya/ta ga/'a stsal pa/me dzad pa can rnams 'gyod pa'i las kyis bshags pa logs te/nyan mongs smra
82a2(rgyud): rnam par dag par gyur to//de ni shes bya'i sgrib po dag cing ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir nyan pa'i dbang pos sangs rgyas kyis gsungs la gsang sngags kyi sgra rnams nyon cig/
82a3(rgyud): des ni sa nas sar 'bar zhing 'bras bu yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//de skad ces gsungs pas 'khor bsam par nges par gyur to//rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo/
82a4(rgyud): las skong ba las kyi bsgrub lugs kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog nyid ting 'dzin rgyas shing rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ti nge'i dzin la snyoms
82a5(rgyud): par zhug so//sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po yang Sh+Ti 'dzin rnar 'phrul pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhug so//'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyang sna tshogs 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms
82a6(rgyud): par zhug so//de nas 'dus pa bal mo che'i khor gyis chos thams cad ci yang med par mthong //chos thams cad ci yang med par gsal bar gyur pa dang /chos nyid stong pa'i na mkha' las
82a7(rgyud): brag che'i tshul du sgra 'di byung //mi gnas mi rtog bsam dang dra la//ma chags chags bral yul las 'das//ci yang mi 'byung cir ma yin//rang byung rang gi brjid dang bral//zhes byung
82b1(rgyud): rgyu/ ma sas rlon ma / na su gas pa chad can du nga /rgyun gyi ti dzin
82b2(rgyud): bar zhug so//de nas ches nyid kyi rnamakha' la snying rdo nga chub sems kyi gzugs brtan rdzo rgyal 'kho nan shar bar gyur te//de nas 'dus pa pa'i po che'i khor rnams yang dag par rtog pa di sgyu
82b3(rgyud): skyes te/e mchos thams cad kyi rang bzhin 'di ltar yin pa las 'di ltar ma shes pa 'gro ba rnams 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor bying po 'di yod snying rje zhes snying rje byang chub kyi sems skyes par gyur to//de nas
82b4(rgyud): mo'i snying po'i 'od zer las cho 'phrul gyis byung //yongs la khyabs pa'i nyi ma'i 'od//snying rje byang chub sems yin te//rnam rtag mun pa sel bar snang //yid bzhin rin chen 'bar ba'o//zhes byung ba las rma
82b5(rgyud): zeng byang chub sems kyi 'od zer du gras la bar gyur to//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i mchog bdag po de N+Di tsha 'phrul 'byung ba'i rgyu zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so//de nas 'du
82b6(rgyud): ba rol mo che'i khor rnams kyis nyi ma'i snying po las chos thams cad kyi rgyu yi ge aM dkar po shar bar mthong //de nas ya la cho 'phrul sgra byung //oM ni rmugs med yi ge'i mdzod//cha 'phrul rtog pa kun
82b7(rgyud): kyirgyung nyon mo skyon bral zla ba'i mdog/cho 'phrul sna tshogs 'byung ba'i rgyu//zhes byung bas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams kyis/chos tha~Md tshe 'phrul gyi rang bzhin du gnas par mthong //de nas bac+doMs gas
83a1(rgyud): ba mchog bdag po de ci yang mdzad pa cho 'phrul sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin du snang bar gyur to//de nas yum chen mo na mkha'i dbyings phyug ma zhes bya ba de chos thams cad na mkha' b+ha gAr
83a2(rgyud): byin gyis brlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so//zhugs par gyur pa dang 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor gyis chos thams cad nam mkha' khyab pa'i rang bzhin du mthong //de nas yum gyi b+ha ga'i
83a3(rgyud): /snying po las 'od zer mthing ko 'phros nas nyi ma'i snying po'i a la la bskul bas yi ge e mthing ka 'phros te lding gnas pa las cho 'phrul gyi rang sgra 'di byung //a ni e yi rang bzhin te//a las
83a4(rgyud): byung mkha' khyab bdal//mi 'gyur thog med bsam las 'das mtha' dang dbus med kun du bdal//zhe sgra byung bas thams cad na mkha'i rang bzhin du cham chad par gyur to//de nas yang yum chen
83a5(rgyud): mo las kyi dbyings phyug mas yang zhing g.yo ba rlung gi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhug so//des 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor gyis chos thams cad rlung gi rang bany+tsi dugan+da pa mthong//de nas rlung
83a6(rgyud): de las cho 'phrul gyi sgra byung //a yi byin brlabs ye shes las//rlung gi cho 'phrul yaM du shar//thams cad 'degs pa'i stobs ldan zhing //rang bzhin g.yo zhing thogs med 'phyo//zhe sgra byung bas
83a7(rgyud): rlung gi dkyil 'khor du 'khyil bar gyur to//de nas yum chos kyi dbyings phyug ma zhes bya ba des 'bar 'phro mo'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so//'dus pa phal mo che'i khor gyis chos thaMd ma'i
83b1(rgyud): rang bzhin du gnas par mthong //don sa ma'i 'od zer la tsho 'phrul gyi sku byung ba//A yi byin brlabs la shes las//oM 'phrul ma yo d+hA po rA sha //byang bsags su d+hAd ye shes 'dra//dngos pa smyan/
83b2(rgyud): zad me klong 'tshub//cesgra byung bas me'i bskal pa 'byam klaso//de nas yang yum rin chen dbyings phyug ma zhes bya ba des sdud pa rgya mtsho'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so//des 'dus pa phal po che'i khor/
83b3(rgyud): gyi chos thams cad chu'i rang bzhin du gnas par mthong //de nas rlab kyi 'od ner las cho 'phrul gyi sgra 'di byung //rgyu yi yi ge 'od zer las//chu yi snying po'i cho 'phrul shar//na mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'o//
83b4(rgyud): rlung mtsho thed rgyas par 'gyur//zhe sgra byung bas thams cad yum rin chen dbyings phyug ma'i rang bzhin gyis khyab par gnaso//de nas yum chen mo rdo rje dbyings phyug ma zhes bya bas zhing khams thod
83b5(rgyud): byin gyis brlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so//de nas 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor gyis chos thams cad sa rnams yongasu rdzogs po'i rang bzhin du mthong //de nas sa rdo rje 'bar ba/
83b6(rgyud): bya ba las cho 'phrul gyi sgra byung ba//mi dmigs pa la sna tshogs par//snang ba'i cho 'phrul 'di byung ba//rnal 'byor sa bcu rdzogs po'i don//lhun gyis grub pas bde ba che//zhes sgra byung bas sa dgu 'du
83b7(rgyud): ba'i bye brag du thugasu chud par gyur to//de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de ri bo brtsegs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so//des 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor gyis chos thaMd rdo rje 'bar ba'o//
84a1(rgyud): ri bor mthong //de nas de'i 'od lus cho 'phrul gyi sgra 'di byung //rnam dag shes rab mkha' glong nas//rdo rje 'bar ba'i ri bo shar//rgya che gting zab nam 'phang gcod//rtog pa'i ri bo
84a2(rgyud): 'joms par byed//ce sgra byung bas rdo rje 'bar ba'i ri bos nyon mongs pa'i ri bo thams cad zil gyis man no//de nas dbyings phyugs ma chen mo lnga//shes rab zab mo'i gzhal yas yum gyi mkha'
84a3(rgyud): klong rnam dag ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugaso//b+ha ga'i snying po las cho 'phrul gyi sgra 'di gyungo //b+ha ga gsang ba'i 'od zer las//bde gshegs bzhugs pa'i gzhal yas khang //nam mkha'i
84a4(rgyud): mtha' ltar dpag tu med//dus gsum rgyal ba'i rgya mtsho'i dbyings//zhe sgra byung //byung bas na mkha' thams cad pho brang gi zhal yas 'byam klas par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog
84a5(rgyud): de nyid chos thams cad sku la yongasu rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin nam phyag rgya thams cad rnam par spro ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugaso//de nas 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor rnaMs
84a6(rgyud): kyis 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchogi bdag po'i zhabs kyi gdan khri yan chad nas/dbu'i gtsug tor man cha du rdzogs par mthong ngo //de
84a7(rgyud): nas yang 'khor ba 'dod pa khams ni chags pa khrag rgya mtshor rdzogs//'khor ba gzugs kyi khams ni zhing chen gyi sa gzhi bdal ba la rdzogs par mthong //keng rus la gzugs med pa'i///
84b1(rgyud): khams rdzogs par mthong //ri rab kyi kha mu ti gi btsal dang /as ma gar ba'i 'bar ba'i 'od 'khrigs pa'i nor bu rin po che 'bar ba'i brag gtams pa la/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub/
84b2(rgyud): sems dpa' rnams rdzogs par mthong //nor bu rin po che'i steng du rdo rje rtse gsum dang rtse lnga'i brag gtams pa la kri ya dang a pa ya dang ya ga rnams rdzogs par mthong //rdo rje brag chen gyi steng na
84b3(rgyud): pad+ma dkar po'i maN+Dal la bskyed pa'i rnal 'byor pa thams cad rdzogs par mthong //pad+ma'i steng na nyi ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang /zla ba nyi shu rtsa bzhi kha sbyor du bkod pa la/dbang phyug po nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang /
84b4(rgyud): mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi rdzogs par mthong //dbang phyug pho mo'i steng byol song gi tso bo brgyad ni rig 'dzin chen po'i rnal 'byor nyon mongs pa sbyangs nas shes bya'i sgrib pa sbyang ba'i phyir dpal brtun stag bla/
84b5(rgyud): 'jigs byed seng+ge dang /gdug pa'i gzig dang /gtum po'i dom dang /stobs kyi glang po dang /brjid pa'i ma he dang /'dzin pa'i chu srin dang /zhe sdang gi sbrul rnams la rigs 'dzin thams cad sa la
84b6(rgyud): yongasu rdzogs par mthong //gzhal yas chen po 'bar ba la yum kun tu bzang mo rdzogs par mthong //me dpung chen po dgu la ye shes kyi sgo dgu gartsegs du yongasu 'bar bar mthong //zhaH
84b7(rgyud): brgyad la gsang ba'i yum bzhi dang /sgom bzhi rdzogs par mthongango //dur khrod kyi rgyan chen po bco brgyad ni ma mo chen ma bco brgyad yongasu rdzogs par gsalo//phyag mtshan bzhi bcu rtsa
85a1(rgyud): gnyis ni 'phra men ma bcu dbyug pa 'phyar ba'i lag na khyung bcu 'bar ba'i kha nas mtshan cha sna tshogs 'phro ba/mkha' 'gro brgyad dbyug par 'phyar ba'i lag na seng+ge kha glal ba brlad
85a2(rgyud): kyi kha nas ral gre 'bar ba brgyad 'phro ba/shugaso 'gro brgyad dbyug par 'khyer ba'i lag na stag mche ba brtsegs pa brgyad kyi kha nas rdo rje sna tshogs 'phro ba/ma mo brgyad dbyug par 'phyang gi/
85a3(rgyud): lag na mgo brgyad rdo rje lu gu brgyud kyis btags nas klad la bskor ba 'bar mo brgyad dbyug par 'phyar ba'i lag na me dpung 'bar ba brgyad las mthu lum 'phro ba ste/ba ni bcu rtsa gnyisu
85a4(rgyud): gsal//phyag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ni khrag mthung 'bar ba bzhi/ging pho dgu mo dgu/za byad po bcu gsod byed ma bcu ste bzhi bcu rtsa gnyi su gsalo//zhal nyi shu rtsa gcig ni sred pa za byed
85a5(rgyud): gsang ba'i dur khrod nyi shu rtsa gcig tu gsalo//spyan 'bar ba drug cu rtsa bzhi ni he ru ka yab yu ma drug cu rtsa bzhir gos lo//dbu nyi shu rtsa gcig ni dus gsum gyi sa d+yas nyi shu rtsa gcig
85a6(rgyud): du gas lo//g.yas kyi dbu bdun gyi skye gtsug nas sangs rgyas kyi sku re re byung ba'i dbu la 'khor 'od zer dang bcas pa re re 'bar ba//dbus kyi dbu bdun las dbu rgyan sangs rgyas kyi
85a7(rgyud): dgu rer byung ba'i sku la rin po che'i mchod rten 'bar ba bdun du gsol ba/g.yon gyi dbu bdun las dbu rgyan sangs rgyas kyi sku re re byung ba'i dbu la nor bu rin po che bdun du gsal
85b1(rgyud): 'khor lo dang mchod rten rma/rin po che de dag gi lte ba dang /bum pa dang /rtse mo las rgyal mtshan chen po bcu 'bar ba ni rgya bye'u lcags kyi rgyal mtshan dang /gdul bya sha ba'i rgyal mtshan dang /gcan
85b2(rgyud): zan gzi gi rgyal mtshan dang /sprul pa rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan dang //rin chen sbrul nag rgyal mtshan dang //dpa' stig rgyal mtshan dang //gzi mdangs mi'i rgyal mtshan dang //dmar gsal khrag rgyal
85b3(rgyud): mtshan dang //rtsal chen seng+ge'i rgyal mtshan dang //gtum chen dom gyi rgyal mtshan dang //rgyal mtshan de rnams kyi rtse mo gcig tu 'dus te//gser gyi gtsug tor rtog stong 'bar ba'o//de nas 'dus
85b4(rgyud): ba phal mo che'i khor gyis zhabs kyi gdan khri yan chad nas dbu'i gtsug tor man chad tu yongasu rdzogs par mthong //dbu las byung ba'i sang+yas nyi shu rtsa gcig dang //rgyal mtshan chen po brtul
85b5(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor yongasu rdzogs par mthong //dbu'i gtsug tir rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la gser gyi tog gtong ni rdzogs pa chen po'i rnal 'byor nyid gsal bar mthong //de ltar mthong zhing
85b6(rgyud): gsal bar gyur pa dang //chos tha~Md sku la yongasu rdzogs pa'i don lo 'khor thams cad dam zhi ngo mtshar skyod par gyur to//rnal 'byor chen po rnams kyi sku la yongasu bstod pa//e mo'o chos kun sku la
85b7(rgyud): yangasu rdzogs pas chos kyi sku//rdo rje che mchog phyag 'tshal he ru ka/chos nyid mkha' la skar tshogs rgyas pa'i sku//sku dbyar gyi char sprin gtibs pa lta bu'i gzugs//chu brlabs lta bur brjod
86a1(rgyud): pa'i zhal gdangs shing //nyi ma 'bum gyi 'od zer bdal ba bzhin//theg chen dgu dgu 'khor ba'i chos rnams kun//phyag rgya gcig rngu bkod nas rdzogs pa'i sku//sku gsum lhun grub//
86a2(rgyud): /chos sku tog stong 'bar//dbu skra khams nag ral pa'i gcod pan tsan+da//klu rgyal 'bum gyis klubs shing mchod kun 'bul//rdo rje gsung gi ljags sgra brdabs pas kyang //hUM dang phaT gyi sgra skad
86a3(rgyud): 'jigs par sgrogs//theg chen don dam gsang sngags sgrogs pa'i tshig/'bar ba'i smin ma mun rum glog ltar 'gyu//spyan dmar bzlog pa'i sdad mig nyi ltar 'bar ba'i shangs nas bskal
86a4(rgyud): pa'i tshub nag 'khyil//rdo rje thog dang gnam lcags ser chen 'bebs//rno dpal che ba zang yag gtsigs po yis//nyon mongs log lha'i cho ga lnga ngam zhing 'khrul//thod rus sha khrag rkang pu/
86a5(rgyud): 'bru dang rnag/za byed rngam pa'i zhal du che mchem gsol//sbrul gdug ko rlon la sogs 'jigs pa'i rgyan//rngam pa'i sku la shin du brjod par rgyan//za byed rngam dang 'jigs byed mang po'i tshe//
86a6(rgyud): 'bar ba'i phyag mtshan sprul pa'i pho nya mdzad//'khor ba kun dang thar pa'i chos rnams kun//dpa'o chen po'i gdan du brjid cing rol//'gran gyi zla med che bcan gcig pu nyid/gsang mchog 'bar
86a7(rgyud): ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod//de skad ces bstod pas chos thams cad sku la yongasu rdzogs shing sangs ma rgyas pa med par gyur to//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog da
86b1(rgyud): de nyid phyag rgya thams cad phyag rgya bkod pa'i pho brang du gyur to//spro ba rgyun gyi ting 'dzin zhes bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i mchog bdag po chos nyid rgyun gyi ting 'dzin zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin lnga//
86b2(rgyud): snyoms par zhug so//chos kyi rgyun gyi ting 'dzin 'di gsung so//na mkha'i' don gyi glegs bam la//skar tshogs rig pa'i yig bris te//'byung chen bzhi yi sgra bsgrags pas//gsang sngags chos kyi rgyun
86b3(rgyud): 'chad chos kyi rgyun gyi ti 'dzin zhes bya ba yongasu rdzog so//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog bdag po des bdud rtsi rgyun gyi ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug ste/'di skad ces gsung so//stong
86b4(rgyud): gsum ban+da'i bzang khong du//srid gsum sems can dug chen las//dus gsum sangs rgyas rtsa sbyar bas//bdud rtsi dkyil 'khor lhun gyis rdzogs zhes gsungs//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das
86b5(rgyud): sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de mchod pa rgyun gyi ti nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/'di skad ces gsung so//'khor ba rgya mtsho'i yo byad rnams//mchod pa rgya mtsho'i rgyan yin te//srid pa rgya mtshog/
86b6(rgyud): mtha' yas kun//kun bzung mchod pa'i sprin mchog tu rol zhes gsungs//de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de bzlas brjod rgyun gyi ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/'di skad ces gsu so//
86b7(rgyud): 'khor ba chos kyi dbyings nyid las//sems can sangs rgyas snying po shar//sgra skad bsam gyis mi khyab pa//thams cad bzlas brjod sngags kyi tshig ces gsung so//de nas yod sems dpa'i rdo rje
87a1(rgyud): snying po des sbyor ba rgyun gyi ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/'di skad ces gsungaso//'khor bar shes rab yum nyid la//snying rje thabs kyi rgyal po yis//'du 'bral med par da/
87a2(rgyud): bas ni//thams cad rgyal ba'i sra su bskyed cing gsung so//de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de sgrol ma rgyun gyi ting 'dzin zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te/'di skad ces gsung so//'khor ba
87a3(rgyud): bsgral ba'i zhing 'di dag/ye shes 'bor ba'i mtshon chen gyis//rang bzhin med par bsgral nas ni//mnyam nyid tshe sku chen por bston zhes gsungaso//de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de sku
87a4(rgyud): gsung rgyun gyi ting 'dzin zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te/'di skad ces gsung so//'dod khams rmang gi ri rab la//gzugs khams pang rim khri 'phang brtan//gzugs med bum rten bum par bcu
87a5(rgyud): bdung chen tshe skur rgyun du gnas zhes gsungaso//de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungaso//na mkha' me chus rlung rnamasu//rmang gzhi ri rab rten du snang //bang rim ri bdun bcas pa
87a6(rgyud): de nyid bang rim khri 'phang brtan//ri bo bum rten bum par bcas//'di yang chos sku rgyun mi chad//sems dpa'i rdo rje des yang 'di skad ces gsungaso//'jugs pa'i yan lag bzhi rmang
87a7(rgyud): rten/'khor lo tshigs chen khri 'bang brtan//yan lag dang po bum rten bcas//lcang lo cod pan phreng bas klubs zhes gsungaso//de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po des shing yongasu slong ba bre/
87b1(rgyud): bya bar ting 'dzin pa snyoms par zhug so//ra yi sgrub lugs chen po ni//dur khrod chen po'i gnas rnams//ro yi rdzas rnams btsal nas kyang //'dod pa bsgyur ba'i sngags kyi gdab//ro yi gnyen par bdag bsams
87b2(rgyud): nas ro sngags rgyun mi 'chad pas bzlas//drol bsgrag dang mdangs drung na//grub par 'gyur ba'i rtags yin te/rgyun me 'chad par ting 'dzin bya//ro ni 'gul bar gyur pa dang //gser 'gyur rtsis ni byug par bya//
87b3(rgyud): raM mi yan lag kun bcings nas//sngags ni drag par zlas par bya//re nyid langs par gyur pa dang //ro yi cho 'phrul ston par byed//brtul zhugs ldan pa'i skyes bu yis//de tshe ro yi lce gcod nas//ri la badzag
87b4(rgyud): nA gser du 'gyur//de bzhin ji ltar 'dod pa yi//rkyen gyis bsgyur na de ltar 'gyur//lce bcad ras gri mtshon cha des//ro yau ban+da bcas pa dang //ji ltar 'dod pa'i rdzas 'grub ste//ban+da go ru bzung nas ni//
87b5(rgyud): yi ras gri thog nas ni//lha min g.yul yang bzlog par 'gyur// ro langs grub pa'i rkang 'gyogs ni//dpa' ba'i tshad las 'das pa ste//skyes bu rtsal dang ldan pa bzhis//phyogs bzhi dag tu kha bltas nas/
87b6(rgyud): dus gcig mnga' yi rgyang 'phangs nas//mnga' ni sa lam 'babs par//bzhi ka bar snang las blangs nas//skad cig tsam gyis 'jig rten skor//skyes bu lag tshod maM yal bar//de ma thag tu gnas
87b7(rgyud): slengs rol 'dod pa kun 'byung zhes/dus gsum rgyal ba rnams kyis bshad ces gsungs//ro langs bsgrubs pa'i ting 'dzin to//de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de rdo rje rnam pa'i thom na/
88a1(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs//na mkha' rdo rjer skams nas kyang //ting 'dzin rang par gyur pa na//phan phun grwa g+hu'i thabs rgyal du/
