88a2(rgyud): la bgrod nas ni//na mkha'i dbyingasu song nas kyang //snang sring 'jig rten khams la blta//des ni sems yul yangs par 'gyur zhes gsungs//de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de rgya mtsho che
88a3(rgyud): po gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/'di skad ces gsungaso//rgya mtsho rdo rjes gtams par ni//ting 'dzin gsal bar gyur pa dang //rgya mtsho chen por bgrod na ni//rgya mtshor
88a4(rgyud): gnas pa'i sems can rnams//ting 'dzin rdo rjes bsgral bar bya zhes gsung so//de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de thogs med rlung zla'i dkyil 'khor la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad n+d+he
88a5(rgyud): gzhung so//nam mkha' dag gau ling+ga la//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//sgom ste ting 'dzin rtas pa dang //zhing khams kun tu bgrod par bya zhes gsung so//de nas yang sems dpa'i
88a6(rgyud): rdo rje snying po des nyi ma rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungaso//nam mkha' dag gi ling+ga la//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//bsgom ste/
88a7(rgyud): ting 'dzin rtas pa dang //mun pa'i gnas rnams thams cad gsal zhes gsungaso//de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po des sred bI bak+kal+la gzhi la ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par/
88b1(rgyud): ga//rna la nga drug rdubartse mo la//zla ba'i dkyis 'khod 'odags su 'ab//sgoms twe ting 'dzin rtas pa dang //chu rgyun babs twA gal bar bya zhes gsung so//de nas yang sems da 'dun
88b2(rgyud): po des steng gi 'jig rten rgyang mar 'phel ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di skad ces gsung so//rnal 'byor las kyi dkyil 'khor du//stong gi 'jig rten 'khor yug bcas/
88b3(rgyud): shin tu gsal bar bsgoms pa dang //ting 'dzin rtsal can rab sbyang phyir//na mkha'i khamasu 'phangs nas ni//sa nas sa ru sbar bar bya//de skad ces gsungaso//de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje de nyi ma'i dkyil
88b4(rgyud): 'khor 'bum 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungaso//rnal 'byor sdig pa'i 'dzub mo la//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'bar ba las//'od zer 'bar ba 'brum 'phros rba/
88b5(rgyud): 'od zer de dag re re las//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'bum 'phros pas//des ni mun pa thams cad sel zhes gsung so//de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de 'byung ba chen po bskal pa'i chu rgyan zhes bya ba'i
88b6(rgyud): ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsung so//rnal 'byor lag pa'i 'khor lo las//chu ba'i snying po rab shar ste//bdud rtsi chu bo'i tshun babs pas//seM N+DI bskal pa'i mtshan gsong
88b7(rgyud): gsung so//de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje cu'i byang rgya ming bzhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di ces gi //rin chen 'bar ba'i 'anal//sangs rgyas pa /
89a1(rgyud): gyi sku/rin chen 'bar ba'i ngos brgyad la//rig pa'i ma mo dpal 'bar ba//brgya du gsal bar gyur pa dang //ye shes rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs zhes gsung so//de nas yang seM de'i
89a2(rgyud): rdorje snying po des gsung gi phyag rgya 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungaso//pad+ma 'bar ba'i ling+ga la//rin chen 'bar ba'i yig 'bru brgyad//shin tu 'bar ba
89a3(rgyud): 'du ba//gsung gi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya yin zhes gsung so//de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje de thugs kyi phyag rgya 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsung so//rdo rje 'ab
89a4(rgyud): lIng+ge la ye ge hUM gi 'bru yis bskor//mtha' ma ran chen yig 'bru brgyad//kha dog mthing kas bskor ba ni//thugs kyi gsang ba'i ye shes yin//zhes gsungaso//de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje des ti
89a5(rgyud): 'dzin gyi mdo 'di gsung so//sems ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin te//ji ltar brtags pa de ltar snang //mdo bzhin snang bar ma gyur kyang //sems nyid brtags pa de ltar 'gyur//gdos bcas da ma
89a6(rgyud): bus mthong yang //mngon shes yid gzugs can gyis mthong //gang ltar brtags par yun brtags ni//rtog pa ltos pa'i 'bras bu ni/mngon sum gsal bar red par 'gyur//dge dang /
89a7(rgyud): ming ge'i bag chags dang //yod dang med pa'i rang bzhin rnams/bag chags rtas pa kho nar zad //de bas ting 'dzin sems nyid gtso zhes gsung so//rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkodapa
89b1(rgyud): kun+na dus rig pa'i mdo pa brgyun gyi ting 'dzin gyi le'u ste dgu pa'o////de nas sems dpa rdo rje snying po des gsang skyor chen po sgrub pa 'di gsungs//dus pa chen po'i rdul bad+mor rnams//shin dus//
89b2(rgyud): ba'i sgrub pa 'di//bde gshegs rgyal ba'i gshegs shul te//'jig rten gang zag lam yang yin//ma rtogs pa dang log par rtags//phyogs rtogs yang dag nyid ma rtogs//log pa'i lam bzhis/
89b3(rgyud): bsal nas//bde gshegs rgyal ba'i lam la 'jug/des na sgrub pa'i lom mchog 'di//'dus pa'i tshogs la bshad par bya//shin tu gus pas mnyan par gyis//de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor
89b4(rgyud): rnams kyis gsang ba sbyor ba'i phyag byas nas 'di skad rjes gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i dbang phyug chen po bdag cag rnams la gsang ba'i yang gsang ba/bka' gsang ba chen
89b5(rgyud): po ye shes rma du byung po/sangs rgyas gshegs pa'i shul yang dag pa'i don bdag cag rnams la ba sha du gsol zhes gsol ba btab pa las sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po de btsun mo'i
89b6(rgyud): tshogs lnga dgyes par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungaso//b+ha ga gsang ba'i pad+ma ni//bde gshegs rgyal ba'i pho brang ste//sngon 'das rgyalnga pa
89b7(rgyud): brnal ba'i dbyings//da ltar bzhugs pa gnas pa'i rten//slad kyis byon pa gshegs pa'i shul//rgyal ba rnams la de ltar snang //de ltar ma shes 'khor ba'i lam//rnal 'byor can gyis/
90a1(rgyud): @shes par gyis//yul gyi mchog ni 'dir bzung ba//mtshan ldan bkra shis gsang ba'i yum//sbyin dkyus ring la lag sor phra//tshigs mig zlum la phra bar bshad//kha nas ut+pal dang ldan
90a2(rgyud): zhing /yid 'ong mtshan ldan ske skabs phyed//skra 'jam mthon ting ljang lor 'khril//sod kar chags dam sbyin dkyus ring //zar ma'i me tog rgyal 'dra'i spyan//dpral ba'i dbyes che skra mtshams 'khyug/
90a3(rgyud): sna bzang mdog gsal pad+ma'i rigs//lus drang ske ring sems ma'i tshul//nu ma'i dkyil 'khor zla rgyas 'dra//sha dkar chags dam 'khril bag can//khong del 'gro na gom pa 'jam//skad ni ngangal
90a4(rgyud): /gzhon sgrogs//ci yang mdzes pa'i stabs tshul ldan//skyes bu bla mas yum du gzung //gzugasu byin gyis brlabs pa ni//de yi gzugs kyi phung po la//bde bar gshegs pa'i sa bon lnga//'phro 'dugs /
90a5(rgyud): bar gyur pa de//rgyas btab byin rlabs dbang bskur nas//bde gshegs yum lnga'i sku mdog gsal//rdo rje thabs la'ang de bzhin te//de ltar gsal bar gyur pa dang //yul gyi mkha' la me yis bsgom//
90a6(rgyud): gsang ba dbus kyi zla gam la//byang chub sems kyi spro snga bya//gzugs brnyan ji ltar gsal ba bzhin//chags pa'i mkha' la de bzhino//ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa//rig pa rang snang mnyam pa'o//mkha'
90a7(rgyud): dbyings rnam dag bde chen klong //mi gnas bde ba chen po'i lung //rig pa thabs kyi rang bzhin las//byin brlabs rang dbang dang gis gsal//bzhin mdog mang po sogs ka la//dpral ba'i dbyes tshe smin dkyus
90b1(rgyud): ring mig mdang sa gsal dus ring //dung cen thags dam shel mdog chags//bzhin gyi bzangs ring ko/pra//lus la zhom pa 'dro ldang zhing //ba nas gapur dad ldang ba//nu ma'i dal mngonu mar 'aN+Dal/
90b2(rgyud): can zhes bya bar grags//rlung can ma nes bstan pa ni//dkar mo zla ba'i mdang su gsal//bzhin lus dung ltar gil su g.yo//gtsug pud mthon ting g.yasu 'khyil//snyid che gdang snyan tshig du gsel//bang chu lus ni/
90b3(rgyud): mdzes par snang //bu mo migi rings zhes bya ba//shes rab gsal zhing 'dod pa che//gtso bo nges pa'i brtul zhugs can//zla gsang dkar dmar rlung kAr lci//rnir brdig cing 'khyil pas ni//kun gyis drod ni yang mits+tsha/
90b4(rgyud): gsang ba smras pa'i thabs la mkhas//phyi nang rlung kar gser ltar lci//rtog pa med cing don la gzhol//bzhi ni gru bzhi'i dbyibs ldan la//mig ring phra bshad 'khyil bag chags//dkar dmar mdzes pa'i/
90b5(rgyud): brgyan gyis brgyan//ljon pa dgi rig smos pa//sdong po yal ga mang po'i dkyil//shin tu 'dab rgyas yal gar legs//mthon 'thing sgra yi rang bzhi ni//byang chub sems 'drar lcang lor bshad//stod smad kun
90b6(rgyud): tu phra la legs//sri du ring zhing ldem bag can//lcug phran zhes bya'i mtshan ma ni//bcus nyi shu rtsa lnga pa//rdo rje'i mtshon gyis ma phrog cing //mu la rag tor ldan pa la//phra zhing bshad la bzangasu ring //bani//
90b7(rgyud): blaglang sor mo bru bzhi la//kham la mig 'bur smin tshigs che//sgra kham ma la so che zhing //sna ring 'gram stongs ring ba yin//ri ma can gyi bud med ni//nag mo grwa gsum gyid mgo ma//khro gnyer can lags
91a1(rgyud): bag chags//sdong gcig yan lag gtan med pa'o//skye ba'i rgyu med bkra mi shis//mi rib yul ga mes tshig yin//spyir ni de ltar bstan mod kyang //gang dag dang ldan brtul zhugs /
91a2(rgyud): yid 'ong dang mi 'ong rnams//dad pa chags shing lus 'bul na//thugs rje'i yuli bAs kun snyoms bya//rnam rtog spong lan gang byed pa//de dag sgrib pa mu mtha' yas//rma du gsang ba'i mchod pa li//gas de//
91a3(rgyud): ba'i phyag chad grang byed pa//las kyi sgrib pa kun bsal te//man ngag gsang ba'i dmigs bu 'thob//de ltar brtags pa'i yum do la//dri spos tsAr la sogs pa//a ka ru dang sbyar ba'i chu//khrus kyi tshogs
91a4(rgyud): dag par bya//dri zhim la sogs sna tshogs kyis//lus la byug pa sna tshogs bya//de nas nang gi khrus tshon yang //shin tu dag par bya ba ni//rdzas kyi chu dang rdza sbyar bas//ning gi rdzas rnams dag par
91a5(rgyud): byad bur shing snying po la sogs pa//ro yi mchog tu gyur pa kun//rtsi 'am bcud dang sbyar nas kyang //nang gi rdzas rnams sbyar bar bya//rdzas kyi cho ga rdzogs pa dang //byang chub mchog du sos bskyed
91a6(rgyud): do mi dmigs chos la blo sbyangs phyir//rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi don//rgya cher shin tu bshad par bya//phung po sgyu mar snang bas ni//sems la rang bzhin med par nges//snang srid na mkhar
91a7(rgyud): gcig pas na//'khor ba skyo ma yin par nges//kun gzhi chos kyi mdzod yin pas//sangs rgyas gzhon na med par nges//byams la dang ma chags pas na//sdang la sems mi 'khrug par nges/
91b1(rgyud): gnas lA nges pa med pas na//sa rnams bgrod pa med par nges//sems la skyo shi med pas na//'pho 'gyur dag la nya ming //des na thams cad sgyu mur snang //sgyu ma rang bzhin med shes pas//thang chos
91b2(rgyud): snying po yin//mtshan ma rtog pa'i dri ma dag//chos nyid chu bo des bkrus no//'dzin pa'i dri ma dag par 'gyur//de nas rgyan gyi cho ga ni//rdzas kyi yo byad yin pas na//rlob cing 'phur ba'i chas gos dang /
91b3(rgyud): rin chen phog dang rna char bcas//'jol sgeg mgul rgyan la sogs pa//dpung rgyan do shal se mo do//nor bu rin chen la sogs brgyan//rkang gdub lag gdub la sogs pa//gser dang dngul la
91b4(rgyud): sogs pas brgyan//rol mo sgra dbyangs sna tshogs pa'i//mchod rdza sna tshogs thogs par bya//de nas 'dren pa'i cho ga ni//gsang ba'i tshigs bsre ba na//rdo rje lce yi dam tshigs//tshig brdas ni mtshon
91b5(rgyud): byaHna sa ma ya ho zhes brjod na//sa ma ya snyom zhes kyang bsri//re ga ya mi zhes brjod na//ra ho taM zhes brjod par bya//ti pa su ki zhes brjod na//gan+da de tsi ta zhes pas mtshon//a ti pu ho zhes
91b6(rgyud): brjod na//pra ti bu ho zhes pas mtshon//g.yos kyi smin ma bskyed byas na//g.yon gyi smin mas mtshon par bya//na sa g.yas kyi mtshon byas ni//de bzhin na sa g.yon gyis mtshon//gtsug tor
91b7(rgyud): btsug du mtshon byas na//de bzhin dpal le'u ling+gari mtshon//rdo rje ling+ga 'od 'phro na//pad+ma ze 'bru 'bar 'phro'o khyil//zhes pa'i tshig don rnams bsre//bskul ba'i cho sa khyad par yang //don gyim 'i
92a1(rgyud): ltang bskul bar rigs//shes rab nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis//thabs mchog zla ba'i 'od la bskul//bskul ba'i cho ga rdzogs pa dang //mchod pa 'i yo byad dbul bar bya//de nas sang+yas thod
92a2(rgyud): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi ngang du gsal bar gyur to//shes rab nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang du gsal bar gyur te//de nas nyi ma'i zer gyis 'di skad ces bskul to//mi g.yo mchog rgyal po
92a3(rgyud): dgongasu gsol//rnam par mi rtag shin tu dri mod sku//'od zer mdangs ldan zla ba rgyas 'dra'i zhal//dgyes pa rol pa'i don la bzhengasu gsol//de skad ces bskul ba dang /zla ba'i 'od zer lnga
92a4(rgyud): 'di skad ces bsku'o//yid 'ong 'byor ldan rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i dbyings//shes rab zab mo'i rnam dag pad+ma'i mdangs//sgyu 'phrul rabs la mkhas pa'i spyod mchog ma//yid 'od 'byor ldan tshe
92a5(rgyud): 'phrul sna tshogs bstan//zhes gsungaso//de nas yo byad kyi tshogs thams cad shin tu 'bul ba zhes bya ba'i cho 'phrul byung ste/nyi ma'i 'od zer la sgra byung ba//pad+ma'i ze 'bru 'bar ba 'di///
92a6(rgyud): pa'i mdangs kyis 'brel lags na//dgyes pa'i rdo rje tshe 'phrul las//byang chub char sprin dbab du gsol//zla ba'i 'od zer las cho 'phrul gyi sgra byung ba/e ma yid kyi dga' bde mo//gdung
92a7(rgyud): ba'i snying phreng shes rab gzungs//pad+ma'i galur khyil pa la//bde ba'i rdo rje byang chub 'bar zhes sgra byung bas//phyag rgya sna tshogs kyi cho 'phrul 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur to//de nas sems dpa'i
92b1(rgyud): ma 'a dos pa na ma smras rgyas yod smra sa nas rgyu ba byu na sa rnams par du nag sa chon bla canas sa sgyu du byu// nga nga/
92b2(rgyud): yo ni//chags pa'i dbyung bzhin ma yin//chag rnam pa byung 'i pa/di pa gan ba //zhes zung ba hU~M ba thams nA sa 'i snying ba'i kyi
92b3(rgyud): //denapa ste ma nga 'dzi rji sgrib pa sgeg gnas b+hU b+h+ri 'dzin la rloms pa zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsung //rdo rje 'ab ba'i yin la//a yi ye shes 'od 'dra sems /tshigs
92b4(rgyud): sgrib pa'i bung shing rnams//me yi ye shes kyis dbyung so//de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des//b+ha ga byin gyis rlob pa la snyems par zhugs nas gsungs pa/'khor bar snang ba'i chos rnams
92b5(rgyud): kun b+ha ga'i snying po rA rab gsal ba//yum gyi lus kyi yan lag rnams//yum lnga'i rang bzhin nyid du gsalo//zhes gsungs//de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po des chags pa thams cad gcod/
92b6(rgyud): ba zhes bya ba'i ti 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsung sa//chos nyid namakhar rtogs gyur na//sbyod sgrol mang po ci byas kyang //chags hU~Mng drang ba'i thabs yin te//rdul /
92b7(rgyud): tsam yong sdang ba med ces gsu 'o//de napa sangs rgyas thams cad 'atsun ma tshags thams cad la gyis pa'i rim pa la zhugs pa 'gyur te/mi dmigs pa'i 'dapal ci yang mig sa
93a1(rgyud): /bAr gyur to//de nas byang chub sems kyi char chen po pad+ma'i snying po rgyun mi 'chud par 'bab par gyur to//'khor ba thams cang ni rgyal ba'i sras por bskyed//rgyal ba 'gog pa pa na byung /
93a2(rgyud): chub sems kyis brlan par mdzod cing srid pa'i myu gu mngon par bskyod/rmi du byung ba'i mchod pa'i yo byad ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ling long phyed par byung //rigs 'dzin gyi sems dpa' tha~Md
93a3(rgyud): na shes bya'i sgrib pa sbyangs nas chos kyi sku'i nang du brlan par gyur to//de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'gro ba thams cad la dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so//dpag
93a4(rgyud): tu med po'i rgyal ba rnams//'khor ba'i sems can rgyu las byung //'khor ba'i sems can rgyun chad na//sangs rgyas rgyun yang 'chad par 'gyur//'khor ba chos nyid rang bzhin du//shes
93a5(rgyud): nas smra bar gang byed pa//rig pa'i ye shes rang dbang ngo //chos kyi rgyal po rgyal ba'i sras zhes gsungaso//de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje dam pa des chos thams cad grub pa smon lam gyi sgo nas
93a6(rgyud): 'jug par mkhyenas smon gnas chen po'i lam 'di gsung so//'gro drug rgyal ba'i sras po 'di//ma rtogs log pa'i 'khyams pa rnams//rgyal ba'i srasu bskyed nas ni//'khor ba'i rgyun
93a7(rgyud): rnams gnad par bya//nyi zla'i nang du bzhag nas ni//bcu drug sa la rdzogs par 'gyur//des na rigs ldan mtshan bzang la//don dang ldan pa'i mkhas pa yis//sbyor ba'i yan lag kun
93b1(rgyud): rdzogs nas//yum gyi mkha' dbyings zla gam la//grub pa'i gzhal yas khang du skyes//rtsibs brgyad zla gam dgur gsal la//byang chub sems las phyag rgya'i tshogs//lha dgu gsal ba'i ye shes
93b2(rgyud): skyed/des ni thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur zhes gsungaso//rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa'i kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las//gsang sbyor sgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o////de nas sems
93b3(rgyud): dpe'i rdo rje snying po de mi 'gyur ba gtan 'pho ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungaso//rnal 'byor rig 'dzin gang zhig rnams//ma 'pho bar ni gnas 'dod pa/
93b4(rgyud): lo gcig gam ni rnga gcig gam//de bzhin zhig rnam grangs kyang //bco lnga 'am yang na bdun par du//thaM rangs thun tha'i dang po'i tshe//rig 'dzin rnal 'byor sgrub pa po//shar gyi phyogasu kha rak+tas
93b5(rgyud): te/shar phyogs na mkhas bsdus pa yi//lha klu gnod sbyin 'jig rten bcas//thams cad khong du bsdus nas kyang //dbugs de slar la mi dbyung bar//rang gi khong du bstim par bya//tha mar
93b6(rgyud): sna yi nang du sI//de ltar mang por bsgrubs pa dang //dpal che gzi brjid thams cad 'thob ces gsung so//de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje snying po des rten pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par
93b7(rgyud): zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsung so//gang zhig rten la gnas 'dod pa//mtshan ma bzang po'i gnas mchog tu//thams cad 'byor par byas nas ni//sa las byas pa'i steg bu ba sham//dbus kyi
94a1(rgyud): pad+ma 'das brgyad la//zla gam dmar po sgo ban du ldan//mtha' ma rdo rje rabs bskor//dpal ldan tshe'i phyag rgya dgong//rlon tshon lugs kyi bum pa la//tshe rdzas rgyas par byas nus mi/mtsha
94a2(rgyud): ldan snod kyis kha dgab bya//rdo rje gsungs kyis brtags nas ni//tshe tshad med par mnga'i gsol la//dbus de bzhin bzhog par bya//rin chen bum pa bzhi rnams la//gsang ba'i bu mo bzhi bkod gnag/
94a3(rgyud): ya mtshan byung ba'i bum pa la//rigs bzhi sangs rgyas yab yum dang //so'i 'khor gyi sems dpa' rnams//thabs dang shes rab sdebs nas ni//phyogs phyogs gnas tshum bur bri//sgo bzhir
94a4(rgyud): sgom bzhi rnams gzhag/sems kyi phyag rgya kun bkod nas//nyi zla ga'ur A yu ni//'khyil 'bar 'tshir zhing gsal bar bya//sne yu byang chub sem su zhu//rgyal mtshan mchog ldan rin ches
94a5(rgyud): gtar//dbang srur dpal ldan mdzod ldan mo//gsang ba'i bu ma che gter 'dzin//A yu yum bzhi'i thugs kar 'phros//de bzhin num bu rim par brgyud//rdo rje tshe mchog kun bsdus nas//dkar
94a6(rgyud): dmar 'od kyis bdag la bstim//de nas rdo rje tshe 'phreng bzlas//nub phyogs tshe yi dbyings mchogs//pad+ma dbang gi zhing khams//byams ldan ye shes che dpag med//thugs kyi dpal be'u chen
94a7(rgyud): po ni de gnyis gsal 'od kyi gzhun//byang chub sems kyi sku yuM bar//dam rigs pa 'dza tsho mchog de//rig na rnal 'byor rnamase la 'gro//'phros pa dgu slong dam pa yis/tsi'i
94b1(rgyud): dbugs la bkrag du bslan//tshe nyams rgyu drug kun spangs nas//gzi byin skye ba'i rgyu lnga bsgom//byang chub sems kyi A yu de//skye med dbyingasu sbas nas kyang //phyag rgya'i tha mar bdun gyis bshad//dang
94b2(rgyud): po sku gsung thugs kyi rgyu/gnyis pa gnon pa'i rgya gram 'bar//gsum pa rta mchog dpal gyi rgyo//bzhi pa rin chen dpal be'u ste//lnga pa gser gyi 'gu h+ya'o//drug pa zla gam dmar po la//'dun pa
94b3(rgyud): nyi zla ga 'ur 'bar//tshe yi ngo bo rgyud gsum po//srogi ngo bor gzhal yas khang //leb rgan 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du//A yu dmar po 'od 'phro ba//'chi ba med pa'i srog btsugs te//'gyur ba
94b4(rgyud): med pa'i g.yung drung yin//chos nyid dbyings tshe sbas pas//dus gsum rgyal ba dgar langs kyang //de la gzung zhing bstan du med//de nas ci bde spyad par bya//rdo rje tshe sgrub pa'o//de nas so de'i rdo/
94b5(rgyud): rje dam pa de rdo rje khro bo che kun tu 'phrog pa zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungaso//gnas 'gyur ma tra maN+Dal bar byas la//ye shas khro bi 'bar ba yi//thugs kyi
94b6(rgyud): dpal be'u'i 'od zer las//dbang gi lha mo mang po 'phros//za ma tog dang bcas pa yis//lcags kyu dkar dmar lag na thogs//de yi 'gro drug thams cad kyi//tshe dang gzi byin thams cad
94b7(rgyud): phrogs da za ma tog tu bsdus nas kyang //tshe yi rigs 'dzin rnams la bstim//ji ltar 'dod pa gong ltar sbyar//rdo rje gzi mdangs 'phrog pa zhes bya ba'i mdo'o//rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje bkod pa kun
95a1(rgyud): 'dus rig pa'i mdo las rdo rje che bsgrub pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcug pa'o////de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje dam pa de tshogs thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin/
95a2(rgyud): la snyoms par zhugaso//snyoms par zhugs nas dur khrod gsang ba mchog dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba 'di rgya cher bshadado//dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi//rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor de
95a3(rgyud): pa 'di//'khor ba thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir//rnal 'byor can la bcad par bya//nyon cig 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs//sgrub pa'i gnas mchog dam pa dag/sngon yon gnyis kyi bye brag la//
95a4(rgyud): nges par brtags te shes pa las//blang dor gnyis sbyar bar bya//ri bo chen po 'dus pa'i rtse//gangs dkar shel gyi 'dab tshe ni//seng 'phrug 'khro ba'i gnas yin te//thams cad zhi bar
95a5(rgyud): byed pa'i gnas//rdo rje brag chen gtams pa'i dkyil//dgon pa chen po'i phug che ni//gcan chen 'khra ba'i gnas yin te//mngon spyod chen po sgrub pa'i gnas//dur khrod ngam grog pa shud
95a6(rgyud): pa'i gnas//sum mdo grog gle rtsub pa'i ri//dur gcan 'khra ba'i gnas yin te//chags pa bsgrub pa'i gnas yino//nags tshal dro bas gtibs pa'i nang //shin tu bcan zhing 'jigs bI
95a7(rgyud): ngogs stag gzig 'khri bo'i gnas yin to//'dod pa bsgrub pa'i gnasu shis//chu mdo chu 'jigs rgya mtsho'i gleng //chu yi rabs kun bskor ba//chu gcan 'khra ba'i gnas yin pas/
95b1(rgyud): bya ba med pa'i las la bya'o//der ni yo byad phun sum tshogs//ci 'dod bltas te ma thogs par//kha na ma tho bcas drang bral//'byor pas nan tan mchog bskyed pa//khams la 'gyur pa'i nad chen
95b2(rgyud): bcud kyi mcho gis zlog bya'i phyir//rtsi 'o ma bcud dam thar pa rnams//nyer rdzogasu ni gzhag par bya//'dus pa'i nad dang dus kyi nad//dug las gyur pa nad rnams kyis//rkyen gyes bar cha
95b3(rgyud): 'byung srid phyir//sman dang mkhas pas bcas te sbyar//ka pA la dang lcang lor bcas//ga'u chung la sogs pa'i rdzas//phyag rgya tshe dang ldan byas la//dngos grub 'byung ba'i rten du bya//sgrub
95b4(rgyud): mchog gsong ba'i rnal 'byor pa//skyo ba'i yid rnams gsang phyir dang //gti mug mun pa gzhom pa'i phyir//dung dang khor rdo rje rnga dang //tsang teru pi waM ko ki la//snyan par rdzogs pa'i rdzas rnams
95b5(rgyud): kun/sna tshogs 'byung ba'i rol mo ste//nyer rdzogasu ni 'byor par bya//shin tu gtams pas tshogs che ni//bla mra rdo rje 'khor lo rgyal//gsang ba sbyor ba'i dus chen du//grub chen sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor
95b6(rgyud): rnams//snying rje byams dang dga' snyoms dang //gdung ba'i byang chub sems bskyed//de yang shes dang shes bya yi//rtsal chen kun tu rdzogs pa ni//rdo rje snying po 'brumatshig dang /shin tu gtums
95b7(rgyud): pas tshogs pa ni//bla ma rdo rje 'khor lo rgyal//yon tan mcho ga gter gyur cing //srid pas zhus kyang zod mi shis//rkyen thub dbang lung rdzogs par gzung //rdo rje kun gyi gzugs 'dzin pa
96a1(rgyud): kun sdud kun 'byung 'khrug med cing //nam mkha'i khyon lngar kun la khyab//mA ltar byams pa'i yum mchog bzung //rgyud sbyangs brtul zhugs mchog 'chang zhing //thogs med
96a2(rgyud): /the tshom som nyid bral//'dzin chags med cing blang dor med//brtan ldan gzungs thub rdo rje ging //rdo rje drod kyi dus 'dzin cing //tshi gi 'dzi na sdud skabs sbyor//yon tan rlabs kyis 'phang bcad//
96a3(rgyud): legs nyes dmi gsug la 'jug so//rdo rje tshig gdangs skad can//rdo rje mthong ba rnam par dag/ngagi dbang phyug tshig la mkhas//las kyi phreng ba rdzogs byed pa//'di ltar sbyar ba'i dus chen
96a4(rgyud): yang //nges par brtags te mdo gzung ba//rigs byed dag gi yan lag las//shes par bya ste legs sbyar ba//bkra shis lha yi nyi ma dang //'byor dang dus tshigs bzong po rnams//
96a5(rgyud): 'jig rten mtshan ma'i rtog pa ste//rtag na bkra shis mtshan ma 'byung //dus cha bzhi yi dang po ni//mchog nyid mngon spyod ro langs yin//dbyar tshe ston sman shis pa ste//zhi dang rgyas pa de
96a6(rgyud): bzhin sbyar//dbang du bsdus pa'ang dbang yin te//bam chen gsang ba'i dus bshad//nor 'dod rdzu 'phrul thams cad kyang //cha bzhir khyab par sbyar bya'o//bsgrub pa chen po'i rdzas mchog
96a7(rgyud): dag dgal te dus la ba'i gyur na//dus 'di dngos grub dus chen te//dus 'di mkhas pas yod mi bcag/rnal 'byor las kyi dang po rnams//tso ste 'dod pa'i mtshan ma dag/yid ngong
96b1(rgyud): 'byung zhing rtags rnyed pa//dam tshig gzungs 'du dus chen yan//sbyangs pas rtsal gyis mthar phyin cing //shes pa yon tan tshogs rgyas pa//'dri dag chad la bab pa ste//dus kyi mchog 'di nye
96b2(rgyud): brtag/'di ltar rgyu bzhi 'byor pa las//'bras bu'i dngos por grub pa ste//klu dang mnyan pa mkhas pa la//brten pas rin chen lon po 'dra//ji skyid gnas pa'i rgya mtsho rnams//rang bzhin medapa
96b3(rgyud): kun gcig pa'o//bdag med tshogs bral ldan gyis grab//gcig las rnam grangs dang gis med//tha snyad dag par yongs chud na//nges pa'i don chen de nyid//thams cad dag par 'gyur ba
96b4(rgyud): bdag dang gzhan nu mi gnyis pas//bdag nyid bdag gi rang bzhin te//sangs rgyas zhes bya gzhan na med//bdag nyid ldan grub dbang phyug che//gang 'dod pa yi dngos po dag/ji lta ba bzhin grub
96b5(rgyud): 'gyur te//rdza mkhan 'phang lo srub pa ltar//gang ltar dmigs pa de ltar 'gyur//'gro ba'i khamasu gzi che zhing //'byung chen lnga la dbang sgyur ba'i//ngo mtshar rtsal gyi khyad par dag/gdon
96b6(rgyud): mi za bar 'byung ba yin//de ltar brtson pa'i bsgrub pa dang //rdzas dang yo byad la sogs te//shes dang yon tan phun sum tshogs//gzhan du reg las med pa nI//thams cad chang bar rdzogs
96b7(rgyud): bas na/phun sum tshogs shes de la bya//gsang chen rtsub pa'i las 'di dag//'khor ba'i las dang 'thun spyad cing //nyin mongs lnga ltar spyod snang yang //'od kyis mun pa snang 'gyur ltar/
97a1(rgyud): skyon yon tan chen po la//g.yo mtshang dngos grub chen por 'gyur//de ltar 'khor ba'i rka bzlog pas//mi gnas ye shes rgya mtshor 'khyil//gnas rab brtag pa'i gal chen//
97a2(rgyud): yang dan mkha' 'khor lo rdo rje dang //rin chen zur brgyad pad+ma'i dbyings//rgya gram la sogs 'dra bar brtag/sa gzhi yang ni de bzhin te//ri bo brtsegs dang bzur ba dang //de bzhin sgreng dang
97a3(rgyud): gtams pa'i tshul//'dra bar mkhas pas brtag par bya//de yang rigs kyi khyad par ni//lnga la sogs pa sau yi//gnas gnas dag tu rtogs nas ni//nor bu rin chen de bsgrub bya//skyon gyis gnas dag spang
97a4(rgyud): ba ni gshin rje gdug pa'i gdung rtse dang //ma mo rngam pa'i sbar shad dang //srin mo ngus pa'i mchi rjes dang //gnod sbyin khro bo'i rbab shul dang //'byung po kun gyi 'dzal la sogs//gnas kyi skyon no/
97a5(rgyud): dgra dang kun//mkhas pas nges par spang bar bya//kha na ma thor bcas pa dang //nyams pa las byung nyen dang bral//ma dag pa yi yo byad rnams//gdug can spang du 'ongs pa ltar//wa yi bortul /
97a6(rgyud): zhugs chen po yi//bskal bas bshugs te spang bar bya//dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs sam//bkra shis mtshan ma 'byung ba dag/dga' ba skye bar 'gyur ba yi//yid 'od gnasu 'dug nas ni//
97a7(rgyud): rtsod pa nye bar zhi bya'i phyir//snying rje ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis//bsgrub pa brnag pa mthar dbyung phyir//rgyal po rten dang 'khor bcas la//bden pas bsgo ba 'am yang blang ba//dgongs shig thu
97b1(rgyud): rdorgyal bar lha//g+ha k+Sh+ma gnad sbyin sna dpung bcas//gangs ri d+d+ha dang rin chen ri//kun dga' ldum ru bskyed mos 'tshal//mtsha rdzing lum 'bab chu'i gnas//'jig rten 'jig rten thams cad kyi//gang dag/
97b2(rgyud): bdag por gyur pa rnams//rnal 'byor dbang phyug bdag nyid kyis//sa 'di lhun gyis grub bya'i phyir//dza m+bu'i grub pa'i sa slong ni//'khor dang bcas pa 'dir 'khor la//rin chen gter gyi sa gzhi bsti
97b3(rgyud): zhes pas rin chen sna tshogs kyis//sa la gnas pas de mgu bya//des ni bdag gis de 'gyur zhing //nyes pa de dang bral ba yin//byang chub spyod pa g.yo ba dang //bsod nams dpa' bskyed pa la/
97b4(rgyud): sman b+hu phrul can sa//ma sgrab pa dag yong sa ste//rnal 'byor mchog bsgrub pa 'o//dud 'dus phyag tu rdzogs pa'i na//drod tshogs kyi rnal ba la//skyes bu las kyi na grongs te//danas/
97b5(rgyud): dbang ba'i phyir sman pa//rgyal ba dbang phyug thams cad kyis//don mchog yang dag mdzad pa'i tshe//skyes bu rtsal gyi khyud b+ha las//'di cha dbang mkhyen dmigs 'byed ma//sngon cha dpal chen ga
97b6(rgyud): dbang gis//chu ts+yai sde bzhi bsgral nus ni//gsang ba bstan pa'i rgyal mdzad nas//'gro drug thugs rjes bskul ba ltar//rnal 'byor sa la sbyor cha 'dod //lha mos mkhyen par mdzad nas kyang //da
97b7(rgyud): chen sa la bgrod pa 'tsho//ru dra'i rgol ba 'byung ba 'am//spyan ldan khyod kyis dbang mdzod cig/sgrub pa'i las mchog khyad par gyis//brtsam par bya ba'i las rnams kun//mtshan mas mtshan/
98a1(rgyud): ma gzhom pa'i phyir//ro lnga'i mtshan ma brtag par bya//dge bar gyur na der gnas bya//gal te shis par ma gyur na//skyes bu thabs la mkhas pa yis//gnan num sgo ba'i wa
98a2(rgyud): kyis sbyar//der ni bsod nams gtor ldan phyir//rin chen lnga la sogs pa'i rdzas//sa gzhi gter tshon rgyas par bya//bkra shis mchog tu bsngags pa yin//sa zhag spos che ni rnam lnga'i bu//
98a3(rgyud): bsres pas kun du gru bzhi ni//maN+Dal rgyas pa'i dbyibs 'dra la//ting 'dzin phyag rgya sngags ldan pas//mtshan ma'i dngos po kun sbyangs te//rgyal ba bzhugs pa'i rten du bya//rdo rje byin rlabs
98a4(rgyud): 'byung gnas dang //gnas rnams shin tu brtan bya'i phyir//mchog sbyor ba dag pa yis//sa gzhi gzung zhing byin gyis rlabs//de dong der ni swA sbyangs te//thigs yul bcad skabs dag du//
98a5(rgyud): rgyal ba bzhugs pa'i pho brang der//rdo rje drag po'i gong chen gyis//lce bog nag po'i dud pas bdug/rgyun mi 'chang du byas nas ni//khro ba drag po'i sngags zlos shing //rdo rje khro bo'i stabs kyis
98a6(rgyud): bskod shes rab yul gyi 'jo tshul gyi//rnam gnyis rdzas kyi 'ang gu dag/smin bal ye'u sbyar ba yis//kun tu zla ba'i thig le bya//rdo rje rgyal po 'phags rnams kyis//sgo'i sngags dang rtswa b+hI
98a7(rgyud): rgyad so'i stang stabs sbyar nas kyang //de dag gnasu byin gyis rlob//gsang ba'i don la zhugs bya'i phyir//gsang ba'i las kyi sngon log su//bstan pa skyong ba'i mgon po la//sbyin mchod bsrung
98b1(rgyud): las chen bcol//gzhal yas gnas kyi phyi rol du//mgon po'i gnas pa'i rten gzhi dag/rin chen 'bras sam 'byung khungs sam//shing ngam pa so de dag las//lugs sam phyag rgya'i gzugs bya/
98b2(rgyud): temagon po bzhi ru mngar gsol te//gnas kyi sgo srung so bar bya//ri rab gling bzhi'i phyogs phyogs nas//rdo rje gsang bdag dbang gis mthus//'jig rten skyong ba tha tshig can//mthu chen mgon
98b3(rgyud): mgon po sde bzhi rnams//sde'i bgegs ris 'dul la mkhas//tshe skyong long spyod rdzogs pa'i sku//'phrin las rnam bzhi mthar phyin pas//rigs bzhi kha dog sor gsal//rang rtags lha'i mtshan
98b4(rgyud): ma thogs//phyi 'khor skyong ba'i rdzu 'phrul can//bdag cag rnal 'byor rtsal sbyong gis//rang rang 'khor rnams thub par mdzod//bsgrub pa'i rtsal 'di mthar dbyung zhing //rkyen gyi bar chad gsal ba dang
98b5(rgyud): gsang ba'i man ngag spyod pa'i phyir//'jug srid dam sri gnan par bya//du ro khrod chen po'i gnas dag tu//rnal 'byor gsang ba'i gnas dag tu//dngos po'i chu la rdul 'jug cing //khro ba hUM chen
98b6(rgyud): kun 'dus nas//gsad cing gnan pa'i las bya ste//ri rab chen po'i rmang du gtang //ya mar dza'i zasu sbyin//chu srin 'bar ba'i kha ru brdzangs//'khor lo 'bar ba'i phyag rgyas gnan//bdun rgyud
98b7(rgyud): ni brlag gyur nas//nams kyang ldang bar mi nus te//byang chub sems ni skyes na btang //badz+ra mu s+t+ri ba oM/ma ma be sham gu ru na na//sum ni sum+b+ha nI//de ltar drag po'i sbyor ba yis//sgo nas phyi rol
99a1(rgyud): khar khang du//mkha dril khung bu byas nas ni//dug dang rtsub pa'i phye ma dang //khrag sna tshogs dang ma rA yis//shin tu bsrub cing gnan par bya//de nas rdo rje nang dag du//seng+ge/
99a2(rgyud): bas bltas nas ni//rdo rje gom pas phyogs nas ni//khro mig 'bar bas phyir bltas te//'gyeng bag tshul du brjid pa yis//'bar ba'i rdo rje spar nas ni//phyi nang rdul chen gsal bar bya//hUM stong
99a3(rgyud): gsum stong gi 'jig rten na//skye 'gro rtsi shing na/tshal dang //yod mthong snang grags ji snyed pa//kun kyang 'bar ba khrag mthung ste//rngam chen gtum thung she dag 'bar//dur khrod dkyil 'khor lhun gyis
99a4(rgyud): grug ra ShA yak+Sha he ru ko rak+ta kro d+hi dz+wA la kha//ha la ha la tiSh+Tha phaT//zhes pas khro bo rol pa yi//stabs dang ma mo'i rngam tshul dang //phra men lhags pa'i rngam stabs kyis//'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor
99a5(rgyud): bskor bar bya//rdo rje dkrigs pa'i phreng ba dang //tho ba lcags kyu 'bar ba dang //'khor lo ral gri la sogs rdzas//kun gyi phyag rgya mtshan mas bskor//de las 'bar ba'i phyag rgya dang //mig las
99a6(rgyud): 'bar ba'i me mchod pas//me 'od 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'dis//dmigs sam dngos sbyar nas kyang //'bar ba drag po'i yi ge las//sreg pa'i dpal chen gur du gtams//hUM raM rdo rje me yi ri/
99a7(rgyud): lhun po 'bar ba'i rtse brgyad la//'bar ba'i lha brgyad bsgyel nas kyang //dbang chen rdo rje bda' sdod gnas//shin tu mi bzad 'bar ba yi//gtum chen ha la rngam pa'i gzugs//lha chen khyab
99b1(rgyud): 'jug pag ba shus nas//zhing chen gra yang gzhi'i na bza' bsnams//gshin rje ma trang 'bar ba yi//ro dbyug chen po phyag na 'phyar//'phra men dgu khri mang po dag/'bar ba'i tshogs ni gtibs thag bcad//
99b2(rgyud): gang la cis 'dul der ston pa'i//tsi tA 'bar ba'i me phreng gis//do shal mgur chu 'phreng bas sbrengs//bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar ba'i klong //srid pa'i rtse mor 'khyil zhing 'phro//na mkha'i khams kun me/
99b3(rgyud): dpung gtibs//rdo rje 'khor lo me lce 'phro//dur khrod dgon pa'i sa phyogs dag/me yi ri bo 'bar ba la//me yi yi dgas ma dag las//gang yang gnas par mi phod pa//steng gri me lce 'bar ba ni//
99b4(rgyud): 'og phyogasu 'phro zhing 'khrug/'og me lce 'bar ba yang //gyen du 'khyil zhing steng du thal//me lce dgu phreng 'bar ba dag/'ur chem 'chad pas 'thab cing 'khrug/dur khrod me ni spug cing 'bar//
99b5(rgyud): zhe sdang 'joms pas mthang nag 'tshub//nga rgyal sreg pas ser nag 'phro//'dod chags bsnyams pas dmar nag 'phro//phra dog sogs pas ljang nag 'khyil//gti mug sel bas smug nag
99b6(rgyud): 'khyil//'bar chen klo gi 'khor los gtam//dz+wa la maN+Dal ha la ha la raM//me'i ri lag chu'i phyag rgya yis//gnas sam dkyil 'khor bskor bar bya//chos nyid bdal ba'i na mkha' la//yu~M
99b7(rgyud): lnga yi 'byung chen brtsegs//kun gzhi bdal ba'i nam mkha' la//bskyed ma'i 'byung chen rnam lnga brtsegs//bruM las rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal//mtha' dang dbus med kun tu khyab//ta la'i
100a1(rgyud): sbed cing gsar por 'dril//zla gam dam po dbang gi rgya//bruM kho tra~M kha la ti blo//zhes pas rnam lnga'i byug pa yis//gtor zhing kun tu byug par bya'o//sgrub mchog spyod pa'i rnal
100a2(rgyud): 'byor rnams//rdo rje tshi gis btab nas ni//rgyal sras rig 'dzin bka' 'khor lo//'bras bu reng phyir byin gyis rlob//rdo rje rgyal dbang chen po des//sgrib pa sreg pa'i yi ge no//phreng bar
100a3(rgyud): byas te gan su 'phro//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhag te//rig 'dzin pho mo'i mtshan mas gdab//rnam lnga'i byug pas kun la gtor//rtags kyi phyag rgya lag du sbyin//rnal 'byor chen
100a4(rgyud): papo'i lugasu spyad//'jig rten spyad tshul thams cad ni//sgyu ma yin phyir shin tu yang //'jig rten 'das pa'i spyod tshul dag/ji ltar 'byung ba de ltar spyod//e ma dur khrod gsang ba yi//rmang/
100a5(rgyud): byung zhing khams dga' 'tshal 'dir//bskal ldan dbang phyug rgyal po'i sras//'dus pas tshogs b+hi dag 'dzin rnams//a ma hA//dgo' mchog bad chen grogs//dam tshig srogi lu gu N+ya
100a6(rgyud): thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa yis//sprul pa'i gshag spyugs grwa rgyas pa'o//tshogs gnyis rtsal gyis rlabs sbar nas//chos nyid mkha' la lding bar rigs//a yaM dza la khaM ldan//de ring po
100a7(rgyud): tshang rgyal ba'i sras//dbang phyug yin pas ci bder spyod//rnal 'byor long skyed bskyed pa dang //dug rnams bdud rtsir 'gyur ba yi//maM las skyes pa'i ye shes kyis//zangs kyi dngos po 'ju
100b1(rgyud): 'dul bya/dam rdzas yo byad long spyod rnams//gang nas cha gsums nas//sham mA 'dres par sta ston bya//phye po chu la 'jug pa yi//mchod sbyin sbal ba'i yo byad bya//de gnyis gnyis pa'i chang ga/
100b2(rgyud): las//'dzug rgyal chos leng spyod bya//rmad 'byung nang gi cha dag na//thams cad gcig tu byas nas ni//ras som shing khyon dag tu ni//bsdus te bsgrub pa'i rdzas kyis drag ba//dbyug pa chen pos
100b3(rgyud): gter lce pog nag po'i dung pos bdug/rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya dang //'bar ba'i lta bas brjid par bya//tsham ngan chen po'i stabs kyis bskor//sna tshogs gsur gyi dri chen gdan//de nas rgyal
100b4(rgyud): pa'i byin brlabs kyis//yo byad de dag bdud rtsi lnga//da mo rdzas ngor bsdus nas ni//de la 'bru lnga'i 'phro 'du las//zhu nas phyag mtshan rnam lhur 'bar//dag pa'i bdud rje chen por zhu//shes pa
100b5(rgyud): lha mo'i rigs 'dzin ma//bzhi 'am yang na rnam pa brgyad//rdzas sam yo byad rang bzhin pas//zas mchog gar gyis spyod blangs te//long spyod spel ba'i dbyangs 'dis bstan//bdag cag
100b6(rgyud): rig 'dzin shes rab ma//rgyal sras lha yi dngos grub 'dzin//dgyes pas tshim pa'i long srung dag//ji ltar yid bzhi nor bu 'am//dpag bsam shing ljon 'dod 'dzi'i ba//ma rmos le teg rgyas pa
100b7(rgyud): ltar//rnal 'byor long spyod chen po dag/na mkha'i kham su gtibs nas kyang //rdo rje dgyes chags kun 'dus nas//skal ldan rnams kyis rab sprul cig/rdo rje gar gyi dbang bsgyur nas//sdig pa
101a1(rgyud): lha mo 'jo tshul dag/'dud cing sdod pa'i tshul gyis ni//rol mo'i tshogs kyis dga' ba bskyed//oM shrI badz+rA lA s+ye hUM hUM//badz+re mA le dzA traM/badz+ra gi rat+na tri tre/badz+re nir ti a a dzaH
101a2(rgyud): dkArma'i thabs mchogs//rdo rje glu 'dis gzi byin skyed//rdo rje bdud rtsi long spyod 'di//rtsi mchog bcud kyi snying po ste//gze mdongs rgyas par byed pa'i mchog/bkrag 'dzin gzugs mchog dran
101a3(rgyud): ba'i dpal//rdo rje can gyis byin stobs kyis//bskal pa can gyis zasu bya//skol med rnams kyi dug du 'gyur//dper na sbrul las 'am bzhin//sa ma ya dzaHku su rtsa ma ma//smug zil lha me
101a4(rgyud): gnyen gsal ma//rlan rnams bdud cir sbyar byed ma//bdud rtsi chu rgyan dngos grub 'dzin//rang gnyer las skal chu rgyan 'bebs//shing lo mdab las bdud rtsi sgyur//'bru thogs sna tshogs
101a5(rgyud): /dngos grub 'dzin//rang gnyer las skal 'bras bur spyad//lha mo sra bstan dbang sgyur ma//khu ba bcud las bdud rtsi re'i gyur//bdud rtsi zhun chen dngos grub 'dzin//rang gnyir las skal bstan
101a6(rgyud): par byed//rdo rje lha mo shal mdog ma//nyi zer bdud rtsir sbyar byed ma//gsal bi mdangs kyi dngos grub 'dzin//rang gnyer las skal gze byin skyed//lha mo khro gnyer sngo bsangs ma/dur khrod
101a7(rgyud): rdzas las bdud rtsir sgyur//sha chen sna tshogs dngos grub 'dzin//rang gnyer las bskal byin 'bebs ma//rtse yi lha mo blo gros ma//rtsi thog bdud rtsir sgyur byed ma//rtse mchog kun gyi dngos
101b1(rgyud): grub 'dzin//rang gnyer las skal tshim byed ma//sman gyi lha mo nar gyi rgyur//dug rnams bdud rtsir sgyur byed ma//dud rtsi sman gyi dngos grub 'dzin//rang gnyer las skul 'di kun yang //rdo rje glu yi brtenas//
101b2(rgyud): ni/rnal 'byor chen po'i yo byad//rol mos dga'i ston long spyod bya//de nas las kyi gnas skabs 'dir//phyi nang 'thun 'jug bka' sdod pa'i//gshin rje chos kyi phyag rgya yis//bran gyi byi bar dbang
101b3(rgyud): bsdus nas//phyi mtshams bsrung bar dbang bskur to//'bur rim lugs sam ri mo 'am//ci 'dra bar ni byas nas kyang //phyi khyams sgo yi phyi rol du//ma he khri la bzhag nas ni//'thun po'i rdzas kyi
101b4(rgyud): mgu byas la//de tshe 'di yis bsgo bar bya//gisang chen lhun grub po brang nab//lus kyi gshin rje'i phyi drang nas//bcom ldan tshwas rjes bka' stsal pa//de bzhin rig 'dzin sgrub pa pos//ba'
101b5(rgyud): gsang gzhung chen 'di sgrub cing //yang dag don la nges 'jug na//'di dag nor bu rin chen te//'di la rjod cing bar gcod pa//lha srin sri brgyad 'byung po kun//khyod kyi 'khor dang g.yog yin te///
101b6(rgyud): par smin po'i chos nod la/gsang ba mchog rnal 'byor pas//bla med 'bras bur ma gyur cher//sa 'di yan chad ma gtang bar//dpal chen mi 'pham bka' mo 'angal//bdag cag ye nas gnyis
101b7(rgyud): med//de tsam ngon gyi dbying bu gcig/phyi la skyong ba'i mu ngan la//rdo rje yal dam thub par mdzad//badz+ra ya ma ra dza sa ma ya swA//zhes pas gshin rje mnas bklags te//gal te 'das na kho bangs
102a1(rgyud): 'tshig/brtsam par bya ba'i las chen po//dngos grub 'byung bar byed pa'i rten//phyag rgya che dang gzugs mchog/stegs bu legs par sbyangs na 'grub//mtshon pas khrid par byed//
102a2(rgyud): pa yi//rdul tshon 'dus byas rgyu rnams la//brnyan ma'i dkyil 'khor ba shrad bgyi ba//sor brtags te bshad bgyi ba//brtan zhing ngos 'jam khang gu la//'dur khur khod snyoms 'phang mtho tI/
102a3(rgyud): kha dog lnga yi gzugs byas nas//des ni mtshan ma'i dngos grub ster//shing shun ras sam dur khrod kyi//zhing chen ras la kha dog lngas//phyag rgya 'bar ba'i gzugs bris na//de yang mtshan/
102a4(rgyud): ma 'byung ba'i rten//rdo dang shel rdo la sogs pa'i//dung ngam pa so'i rgyu las ni//mkhas pas 'bur du gtod byas nas//mtshan ma 'byung ba'i rten du 'gyur//gser dngul rin chen la sogs pa/
102a5(rgyud): zangs lcags khar ba'i rga dag las//mkhan gyis blugs te ma nyams na//de yang mtshan ma'i rten du 'gyur//blag sha byang chub shing la sogs//rgyud shing yal ga mnyen pa las//phyag rgya'i gzu
102a6(rgyud): de legs sbyar na//de yang rten du mkhas pas bshad//mnyen cing sbyin pa'i mchog rnams lo//bzhin dang 'dril khugs legs sbyar te//phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs byas na//de yang brten pa'i 'os///
102a7(rgyud): 'gyur//de la sogs pa'i rgyu rnams la//yi ge 'am yang na mtshan rtags sam//ming ngam thig ler rdzas la bri//bsgrubs na mtshan ma'i rten du 'gyur//de las re zhig 'dir bshad nga //stegs pu la
102b1(rgyud): rten mtshan ma dag/bsgrub pa'i don du brtag bzung ba//bcom pa'i thabs ni 'di lta ste//gong du smos pa'i rgyu rnams la stogs bu mdzes shing mnyam byas te//kun tu gru bzhi cha snyam la//bdud rtsi lnga yi sbyor ba ste//
102b2(rgyud): me long lta bur snying par bya//snang byung yang dag byin brlabs can//ye shes rang byung grub pa'i rdzas//bka' gsang rmad byung pho brang du//dur khrod rdzas lngas brkyang nul bya//rdo rje srad bu'i thig gdab pa//tshi ga rnam sa
102b3(rgyud): bshad bgyis//gsang po'i snying po 'khril mang po dang //rdo rje rgyun thag la sogs pa//r-ing thung maN+Dal 'khor khyud la//'jur mdud can du ma gyur pa'i u me sgril snyoms pa'i tshad ldan la//ye shes lnga yi ra
102b4(rgyud): bzhin gsal//rgyu de byin gyis brlab pa'i thabs//thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa yi//yi ge gnyis kyi 'phro 'du las//dkar dmar 'od kyi gser phreng 'phro//rdo rje gsang ba'i thabs kyis da//byang chub sems
102b5(rgyud): 'dren 'khal ba'i yum//nges par brtags te 'dir bzung ba//mtshan ldan bkra shis gsang ba'i yum//sprin dkrungs ring la lag sor phra//tshigs mig zlums phra bar bshad//kha nas ut+pal ngad ldang ni
102b6(rgyud): /lum la gsu can dro//yid 'ongs mtshan ldan ded skabs byed//zla la mi mngon 'ding dgas su 'khyi'o//mau dag chags dang dag dmang byed//mi shi kyis ring sbyin dgrus legs//pang ma'i me tog rgyam 'a
102b7(rgyud): spyan/la ba'i dbyis kyi sgra marnams 'ju'o// tha~Mng mdag gsal bad+ma rigs//lus drang sterang sems ma'i tshul//nu ma'i kyi la mtho ga rgyas 'dra/sha dga'i tshigs dam 'khril pag chags//yang
103a1(rgyud): 'gro na gom pa 'jam//skad ni ngang pa gzhonu sgrogs//cir yang mdzes pa'i stabs tshul ldan//skyes bu bla mas yum du gzung //gzungs mar byin gyis brlab pa ni//yum gyi phung po
103a2(rgyud): gnas lngar ni//bde bar gshegs pa'i sa bon lnga//'phro 'du gsal bar gyur pa dang //sangs rgyas byin brlabs dbang skur nas//bde gshegs yum lnga'i sku mchog gsal//rdo rje yab la
103a3(rgyud): 'dod bzhin te//de ltar gsal bar gyur pa dang //yum g+hi mkha' la me dri bsgom//gsang ba dbugs kyi zla gam la//byang chub sems kyi 'phyo 'du bya//gzugs brnyan ji ltar gsal ba
103a4(rgyud): bzhin/yum gyi mkha' la de bzhi no//de nas rdo rje tshig 'di yis//lus kyi yum la nges par bsgo//shes rab lha mo gsang ba'i yum//'dod dgur sgyur ba'i 'phrul mo che//chags pa'i
103a5(rgyud): tshul gyis thabs la 'dud//g.yon du la khril cing g.yasu 'khyud //'dzum phi'i mdangs kyi zla gam sbyor//gsang ba'i byang chub sems 'dren pa//khyod ni lha mo rgyal ba'i sras//rang bzhin chos
103a6(rgyud): gyi mtshan ldan ma//rdo rje lus kyi yum yin gyis//gsung ba'i las rnams kun byos shog/lag pa 'khor lo'i gozhwa lA ya su//nyi zla 'bar ba'i tshogs bkod//gsang ba'i byang chub dkar
103a7(rgyud): dmar 'di//thig le yi ge'i ngo bor gdag/las kyi rdo rje 'bar ba yi//rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya yis//byang chub sems kyi thig 'di drongs//rdo rje gsang ba'i las 'di drongs//rdo rje gsang ba'i//
103b1(rgyud): las 'di gyis//oM tsan+d+ra d+ha ra hri zhes pa'i//gsang ba'i thabs kyi sbyong ba yis//rdzas mchog 'bor ba'i thig le yis//gnas lnga dag gi gzhal yasu//gsang ba'i thabs kyi thig le bya//srad bu'i sbyor//
103b2(rgyud): bde rdzogs nas//gaul sgrib rtag chad skyon bral ba'i//che chung ya yo med pa yi//rdo rje dbu ma'i thig 'di dgye//chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhalnga ya su//mi dmigs bdal ba'i maN+Dal la//ye shes//
103b3(rgyud): lnga yi theg 'phros pas//bdo chen rnam thar phyag rgya'i tshogs//kun gzhi na mkha'i gzhal yasu//nyon mongs rtog pa'i maN+Dal la//ting 'dzin 'od zer thig 'phros pas//phyag rgya rdo rje 'bar ba'i
103b4(rgyud): tshogs//mkha' dbyings gsang ba'i gzhal-i ya su//zla gam pad+ma'i maN+Dal las//byang chub sems kyi thig 'phros pas//ye shes sems dpa' gsal ba'i tshogs//bkra shis dben
103b5(rgyud): pa'i gzhal ya su//mtshan ma rten gyi maN+Dal la//rdo rje srad bu'i thig 'phros pas//cho 'phrul gzugs brnyan phyag rgya 'bar//stong gsum gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du//rmad byung rdo rje'i thig
103b6(rgyud): 'gyed nad gsang ba'i dam la gnas pa yi//'byung po skye bo gdol pa can//rdo rje tsal gyi hUM rings las//rdo rje mtshon cha'i bu yug 'tshug/phyogs mtshams bla 'og khro bos gdams//'brang
103b7(rgyud): ba gsang ba'i mtshams gzung ste//phyi rol sde ba'i 'dru lo rnams gcad//rdo rje mtshon cha 'bar ba'i tshogs//sreg dang 'joms pa'i drag shul can//rdo rje lce yis 'dir bdeg bya//rdo rje nyi
104a1(rgyud): ma'i gzhal ya su//rdo rje dpal be'u 'od kyi thig/me long ye shes rang bzhin can//rnal 'byor can gyis gdab par bya//de bzhin rin chen 'brar ba'i gzhal//pad+ma b+hU ta'i 'khor lo ye//dang ga/
104a2(rgyud): med na mkha'i gzhal yasu//rigs kyi dpal be'u 'od kyi thig/ye shes bzhi yi rang bzhin can//rnal 'byor can gyis gdab par bya//rdo rje mkha' la 'khor lo bskor//thubs dang shes rab zung ya bzhis/
104a3(rgyud): so'i phyag du gnas nas ni//na mkha' dbus kyi snying po la//srad bu bzhi yi rgyar ma bre//de nas rdo rje brtan pa'i sa//dbus kyi pho brang dgu pa ni//rdo rje sras bu'i thig chen gyis//phyag rgya bzhugs pa'i gnas
104a4(rgyud): rnams kun//che chung med par snyoms par bya//'dir ni rdo rje mu khyud bdun//'byung ba'i rim pa drug par du//'khor lo drug brtsegs snying por 'bar//gru chud brtsibs mtshan me ri 'phro//mu khyud
104a5(rgyud): chechar gsum 'bar ba'i phreng //bair khyams bzhis mdzes phye khyams dang //lngar gsal sgo dgu shar du brdzogs//pho brang de'i gnas kun su//phyag rgya'i tshul rnams 'byung ba ni//mu khyud mthal
104a6(rgyud): zad yan cha du//yab yum drug cu rtsa bzhi yi//cho 'phrul dam tshig tshad med pa//rol pa 'jigs byed 'jigs byed che//ka tsa li lA sogs par bri//de bzhin za byed yab yum bzhi//lus
104a7(rgyud): kyi lha ste he draH/'khor lo mtha' mo'i rtsibs la dgod//gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dag/dru chang phyo dang nang la dgra ma//hUM chen bcu yi yab yum dag/shin tu mdzes par dang po la'o//de nyid
104b1(rgyud): la ni ma brgyad dang //ging chen bcwo brgyad rgyas par dgod//gnyis pa'i khyams la mkha'agro brgyad//shugs 'gro brgyad kyang de bzhi no//gsum pa'i khyams la 'phra men brgyad rnams bri//bzhi pa'i khyams/
104b2(rgyud): la phor thogs brgyad//de bzhin srin mo gzhong thogs brgyad//kun tu mdzes pa'i bri bar bya//lnga pa'i khyams ni tha ma la//rdo rje slas dang bran mo dang /pho nya la sogs rgyas par dgram//de yang tshul du
104b3(rgyud): dgod pa ni//gong ma dag ni rgyu rnams las//ka tsa li la sogs pa dang //ji ltar 'byor pa de ltar bri//mchod pa'i yo byad thams cad dang //rmad byung ba'i rdzas mchog dang //rdo rje gsang ba'i rims kyis
104b4(rgyud): dkod//rdo rje gsang sgo phye nas ni//ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor kun rdzogs nas//rang bzhin yul nas phab nas ni//bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor der rdzogs bya//'dir yang don gyi khyad par gyis//rigs 'dzin
104b5(rgyud): /che ba'i sa s+phar ga/shar gyi gdan gyi khyad par la//rdo rje seng+ges btags 'khor lo//zla ba nyi ma g.yas g.yon gyi//zhabs rten tshul gyi maN+Da la ni//rdo rje rgyal po yab yum bzhugs//lho'i gdan gyi
104b6(rgyud): /khyad par la//glang chen rdo rjes btag 'khor lo//pad+ma g.yas g.yon zhabs brten tshul//rdo rje rgyal ba yab yum bzhugs//byang gi gdan gyi khyad par la//pad+mas rdo rje gteg rgya gram//rdo rje karma yab
104b7(rgyud): /yum bzhugs//nub 'am phyogs sam mtshams gzhan du//gzhi rnams gcig tu gyur pa lo//maN+Dal rgyun ma chad pa la//rdo rjes gtams shing sbrel byas nas//nga yi phyogs gcig che 'bar ba
105a1(rgyud): kha dog 'bar ba'i 'od kyis dkrigs//rtsal 'phang che chung khyad par gyis//bskal dang ldan na mi ldan pa'i//la la dag la zla ba ni//rangs pa'i gdan gyi mtsham ma la//de yang rtsal
105a2(rgyud): 'phang che chung la//la la rtse gsum rdo rjes mtshan//la la rdo rje phyed mas mtshan//la la ma rangs zla gam kha//nang du bstan pas mtshan par bya'o//la la rtses 'bigs rnam par mtshan//la la pad+ma rme/
105a3(rgyud): pas mtshan//la la dag la mtshan ma med//la las gdan do mi non te//nar ma gang zag mi yi rdzas//sau'i bde ba'i thab su sbyar//kun tu bde bar sbyar ba'i phyir//pi par stan zhes grags pa ste/kun/
105a4(rgyud): tu khyab par lus bder sbyar//rmad byung sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor du//'jug dang dngos grub gsol ba dang //dbang bskur ba yau las rnams bya//'dod par bya ba sgrub pa dang //gtor ma la sogs rdzas//
105a5(rgyud): kyi rnams//cha gsum dog la dgos nas kyang //gcig ni sbyin bsreg las mchog bya//gcig la rnal 'byor long spyod gter//gcig ni mkha 'gro'i 'khor tshogs bskyang //gnasu bkra shis la
105a6(rgyud): sogs kyis//bsgrub pa rdzogs pas mthar dbyung //dur khrod gsang mchog dbyings nyid la//dkyil 'khor dgu brtsigs dpal gyi rgya//ye shes dgu yi khong gseng gosal//me ri 'od kyi thig
105a7(rgyud): thag gcad//'khor lo tshogs chen bsgrub pa'i sa//rnal 'byor rtsa yi dkyil 'khor te//dur khrod gsang ba mcho gi mdo//rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las
105b1(rgyud): tshogs tshon 'dus pa'i bsgrub lugs kyi le'u ste bcus pa'o////de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje dam pa des//'di skad ces bka' stsal to//'dus pa chen po'i tshogs rigs 'dzin thaMd nges par 'drun/
105b2(rgyud): par 'dod na 'di ltar rig par bya'o//de bzhin thams cad kun rdzogs nas//rigs kyi khyad par 'di dag dbye//so'i rigasu bsgrub par bya//rdo rje can la dpal bebu ni//dkyil 'khor rdo rje 'bar ba'o//de bzhin
105b3(rgyud): rin chen rin chen te//pad+ma dmor po 'od kyi dkyil//las ni kun tu rgya glam 'bar//de bzhin rin chen 'khor lo 'byar//so so'i rigs rnams gtsor gzhag ste//'khor ni de bzhin mi 'gyur ba/rnir bkod le/
105b4(rgyud): sbyar nas//bsnyon pa dang ni nye bsnyen pa//bsgrub dang bsgrub tshun rdzogs par bsgrub//ting 'dzin rtsal gyi khyad par ni//so'i rigs ni gang yin pa//ting 'dzin bye brag mang po la//yid kyi sbyor ba gsal bar bya//dri
105b5(rgyud): no rig 'dzin gang 'dod pa//gsal bar nges par 'grub pa yin zhes gsung so//rgyud kyi rgyaSh+mag+na rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las rdo rje rigs 'dzin bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//
105b6(rgyud): de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje gokong 'di skad ces gsungs//'dus pa chen po'i tshogs chos thams cad ni blang dor med par rig par bya'o//chos nyid mnyam pa'i rang bzhin la//bzang ngan rtog pa'i tshig dang bral/
105b7(rgyud): bdag dang gzhan du dbyer med//gtsang ngam mi gtsang gnyi su med ces gsung so//de nas 'khor der 'dus par gyur pa'i rigs 'dzin ma'i thod pa can mang po dag rnam par bgod pa rnal 'byor gyi bral nas langs
106a1(rgyud): te da ya lA la ho zhes bya ba'i sgra chen po brjod nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/bdag cag shin tu gnas par 'tshal na//bdag cag rnams kyi rdo
106a2(rgyud): tshig ni bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gsung so//zhes gsungs pa las/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mi'i thod pa can rnams rang rang ji ltar dga' ba'i dam tshig rnams slob pa skyed la/phul
106a3(rgyud): cig ces gsungs pa wa/'dod chags kyi rigs 'dzin bram ze mi'i thod pa can rdo rje thal ba'i dbyangs shes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag dam tshig ni 'di lto ste/ma dang
106a4(rgyud): sring mo bu mo dang //rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten gyi//bud med thams cad thams cad la//'dod pa'i chags pa ci spyad kyang //yang dag rig ni mi go so//zhes gsol to//de nas rig 'dzin rak+Sha mi'i thod pa
106a5(rgyud): can zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdagi dam tshig 'di lta ste//bdag ni gsod la dga' ba ste//sems can thams cad bsad nas kyang //zag pa mi gtsang snyings me dang /mi sha
106a6(rgyud): sogs thams cad kun//zos na dam tshig mchog lags te//ma thu dang gaN+DI byin 'phel bar 'gyur//rad gi dam tshig de lag so//zhes gsol to//de nas yang gnod sbyin rig 'dzin yak+Sha ma'i thod pa can no
106a7(rgyud): ba 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ngad gi dam tshig 'di lta ste//mi yi bdag po than cad la//'dod pa thams cad 'phrog pa dang //gser la sogs pa bcu spyod kyang /yang dag rig na mi gos te/
106b1(rgyud): 'dod pa grub pa'i mchog du 'gyur//bdag dam tshig de la gso zhus gsol to//de nas yang mu stegs rig 'dzin 'od bsrungs ral pa can zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdad//
106b2(rgyud): tshig ni 'od lta ste//mi yi mgo ba bcad nas kyang //bzang dang nga ni bye byug rnams//rig pas brtags te shes byas nas//bzang ba'i rtags can bsten bya ste//dkar por ri lcang lo can//'di dag rtag tu su
106b3(rgyud): 'chang bar 'dod pa thams cad 'grub pa ste//rgol ba thams cad 'joms par nus//yid bzhi nor bu ci 'dra bor//de'i ston 'di las byung //bdagi dam tshig de lagaso zhes gsol to//de nas yang bram
106b4(rgyud): ze sha la dga' ba dang /sha za mo'i rigs 'dzin rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag dam tshig 'di 'di lta ste//ba glang khyi sha rta sha dang //mi sha glang chen sha la sogs
106b5(rgyud): shra rnams 'dra bar gtsang smra med//zos na yon tan sna tshogs 'grub//bdagi dam tshig de lagaso zhes gsol to//de nas yang srin mo'i rigs 'dzin khrag 'phog ma zhes bya ba la sogs pas
106b6(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cig dam tshig ni 'di lta ste//srog chags sems can thams cad kyi//bsad pa'i khrag ni dron mo dag/mthungs na gzi byin 'bar bar 'gyur//
106b7(rgyud): bdagi dam tshig de lagaso zhes gsol to//lha mo klu mo rigs ngan mo la sogs pa bud med kyi tshogs thams cad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bdeg cag rnams kyi dang tshig 'di lta ste//blo bur zla chi
107a1(rgyud): #/chen po ni//thams cad brten pa'i mchog lags te//bro yi 'jo tshul stabs chen dang //glu yi snyan dang gras don bsgrags nas//yid kyi dbang po thams cad 'phrog//bstan pa'i thabs/
107a2(rgyud): kyis 'khrig spyod pa//'di ni dga' ba'i dam tshig ste//bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig lags te zhes gsol to//de nas rig 'dzin de kun gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag
107a3(rgyud): rnams kyi spro'i dam tshig ni 'di lta ste//dkar nag las ni ci spyad kyang //rnam par smin pa'i bras bu dang //rab 'bring tha dad bye brag med//de bzhin 'di la bde sdug gam//dge dang mi dge'i rtsod pa
107a4(rgyud): med rnon po'i mtshon gyis gca med//ci phyir rnam pa bdun stong pas//thog pa med pa'i don phyira'o//srog kyang bcad cing gas du med//ci phyir rdzas 'di 'jig paso//sdig pa chen po'i las rnams
107a5(rgyud): kun ba gis byas sam gzhan byed bcug/gal te gang+gA'i bye snyed kyi//sems can de la sbyin byin dang //de bzhin gang+gA'i bye snyed kyi//sems can thams cad gsad pa gnyis//yang dag rig
107a6(rgyud): tha dad med//nam mkha' dag la rdul dang chus//ji ltar mi chags pa bzhi no//gang zhig khrel dang 'dzem ldan na//dogs pa'i rtog pa de gzung bas//dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur//char
107a7(rgyud): pa'i spyod pa la sogs kyis//lus rnams gdung bar byed pa yi//sems can de ni 'du shes chung zhes gsol to//de nas bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsungs//e ma ho/
107b1(rgyud): thod pa can gyi tshogs//khyed kyis smras pa'i tshig 'di rnams//mdud pas bcings pa'i tshig yin te//khur dang bral bar mi 'gyu ro//yang dag yang dag ces smra ba//yang dag nyid kyi mdud pa//mdud d+hi
107b2(rgyud): dkrol ba ma byas na//thar ma phyed par mi 'gyuraro//chags pa'i las rnams sbyor ba dag/chags pa'i dbang gis der sbyor na//de dag de'i grong khyer du//gnas 'gyur de'i sems can yini//'du shes
107b3(rgyud): sbyar ba'i las chen dag/sdang ba'i dbang gis sems shor nas//shin pa gsod pa'i rig 'dzin du//lhung 'gyur sdig pa'i ri bo yin//rgyal ba rnams ni gtsang ba ni//gang tshe bder gshegs rgyal gyi
107b4(rgyud): zhal/ mi gtsang rnam pa sna tshogs kyis//yongasu bstabs par gyur na ko/de tshe las kyi rnam smin gyis//thar med nad kyis bzung nas ni//'dam du bying bar mi 'gyur ram//sha dang khrag la so/
107b5(rgyud): pa'i zas//bku ba'i rngad zas chen po ste//gang gis zos pa'i lus rnams la//'byung po dri za kun 'dus nas//dri snom ro dang bcud rnams 'byin//des ni gzi mdangs yal 'gyur na//ci phyir ci ste de
107b6(rgyud): rnams bza'//sems nyid rin chen yid bzhin du//gzhan gyi rin chen spyod byed pa//log pas log pa ldan pa'i chos//'di dag mdud pa dam po yin//dkar nag las la khyad med ces//thams
107b7(rgyud): khro bos spyod pa ni//rigs med rigs chad log pa'i las//'bras bu log po'i kham su 'gyur//bde gshegs mnyes bya'i las rnams la//yan lag tshig tu ma dag na//nyes byas las kyi rgyu des ni/
108a1(rgyud): dang gi dus rnams thams cadadu//dbang po'i yan lag ma tshang zhing //dran pa'i snying po nyam par 'gyur//rig pa 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor pas/bder gshegs rgyal ba sgom
108a2(rgyud): zlos pa//cho 'phrul khro tshul bstan pa ltar//mtshan ma nyid du der gon//las kyi srin po'i rig 'dzin yin//rgyan dang cha lugs thams cad kun//mtshan ma nyi du brtags gyur na//ci la'ang
108a3(rgyud): rtog cing chags pa yi//'dzin pa'i phur pa chen por 'gyur//a dang hUM la sogs pa yi//rgyu yi yi ge thams cad kun//mtshan ma nyi du der rtags na//tsAn sbrul gdug la sogs par//ltung
108a4(rgyud): 'gyur rtog pa'i gags chen yin//khrag la sogs pa'i rdzas chen lnga//de nyid dngos por de rtags na//'byung po khrig dri snom pa'i//lus len rigs ni 'dzin pa yi//ma bdun rngam pa'i tshe
108a5(rgyud): lugasu//gang zhig rtog par der gonA//srin mo mi sdug sha za mo//lang+ka'i yul du de dag 'khor//mtshan ma'i bla thabs mgo brnyan can//der brtsan der bzung dmigs pas ni//sho gi/
108a6(rgyud): gnas kyi gcan chen rigs//'dzin cing gnas der rtog par 'gyur//las kyi dbang brtsan bran mo'i tshogs//de 'dra nyi du de brtags na//gnod sbyin chen mo'i tshogasu 'gyur//gzhan gyi
108a7(rgyud): tshecho la 'tshe ba yin//des na mdud pa chen po 'di//khur du bshal ba'i gdos yin te//'chal pas lta ba'i mig long ste//sems kyi nor bu rin chen de//rtag chad khamasu ster bar 'gyur//
108b1(rgyud): de lta'i skyon chen sbyang bar byas//de skad ces bka' stsal ba las/thod pa can gyi tshogs rnams rtog pa'i 'du shes kyis zin cing rang rang gi spyod pa la skyo ba skyes par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'ang
108b2(rgyud): rked ce so gsol to//e ma he//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyi dam tshig ni log pa'i do//thub tu 'gyur ba lags na/'di dag yong dag po'i dko 'thub tu gan mtsha//chos thams cad ni sgyu ma lta
108b3(rgyud): bu sted/cir yang 'gyur ba lag so//gsang sngags chen po'i sgo ni bskal pa me dpung lta bu ste/bdag cag rnams kyis rtag pa so sor ji ltar mos pa ltar bsha du gsol/zhes zhus pa las/bcom ldan 'das
108b4(rgyud): kyis dbyeb pa chen po'i gzud pa mdzad nas/rigs kyi bu rnams ni de ltar zhu ba legs kyis shin tu nyon cig/khyed rnams kyi spyod pa mi dgrag par ji ltar dga' ba'i byasam pa
108b5(rgyud): sor rangs par bya ste/'jig rten mtshan ma'i spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams gsang sngags kyi dka thub chen por bya'o//rang rang gi spyod pa mi bkag par sgo gsum lhug par spyod cig/de nas
108b6(rgyud): sems dpa'i rdo rjes yang 'di skad ces gsung so//i ma ho thod pa can gyi tshogs//bud med bud med thams cad kun//bskyed par byed pa'i rten yin te//'bras bu smin pa'i zhing yang yin//bsgral zhing /
108b7(rgyud): gdon pa'i gnas yin te//shes rab dga' ba'i yul yino//'di la sems gsum gnas pa ste//be nas dag po chos nyid semamo//mkha' dang sbyor ba byang chub sems//snying rjes sgrol ba gsum sbyar te/
109a1(rgyud): chos nyid gsang ba nyi shar khyab//snying rje sgo ba gsum gyis sbyar//ting 'dzin byin brlabs ye shes kyis//chos nyid dur khrod mkha' la sgral//bsgral ba'i rgyu mchog man chad na//
109a2(rgyud): shal chen tsa ra la sogs pa//de la rgyu drug sa bon gdab//rang bzhin ye nas de gzhom bya//khyad par 'das pa'i yi ge lnga//gnas bkod 'phros pas mtha' ya sA bkang //thams cad stongs
109a3(rgyud): shing zad byas nas//'dus pa'i yi ge lnga ru gsal//de las phyag mchen ye shes lnga//mi gnas ye shes dang du thim//sgrib pa'i phung por smin pa de//rdo rje rol pa'i rngam tshogs kyis//'jo
109a4(rgyud): tshul stabs kyis sbyar bar bya//kha T+wAM la sogs sngags bcas pas//bsgyel te ma rig sgo dbye bya//rnam shes dbugs kyi sgrom drangs la//rdo rje rgyal po'i rlung sgrom du//bsdus te rdo rje dbugs
109a5(rgyud): can la//hUM byas sgril ma de la basmin//gsang ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du//mtshon gang 'dod du bstim par bya//yu ti u haM gis sbar te//gsal na de dang mnyam du gsal//rdo rje tshe lA
109a6(rgyud): bslan par bya//rdo rje rlung gi dbugs sbar te//thugs las rlung sgrom lam du sbar//na mkha' chos kyi gzhal ya su//nyi ma'i steng du hUM du gsal//ye shes sems dpa' tshon gang pa//nyi zla
109a7(rgyud): ga 'u'i bar du gsal//a yang phaT kyis bskyod 'phangs pas//rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs dkar 'phros//ye shes sems dpar gsal ba la//dngos por snang bar 'dzin dang bral//
109b1(rgyud): g.yo 'gul 'phar 'phrig ma chad par//rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur te//rigs kyi lha dang snying po sbyin//rdo rje gdung ba'i glu blangs te//man ngag gnas kyi smon lam gdab//bzhi tshal dag tu byas nas ni//
109b2(rgyud): sman gyi bstabs te phung por brtsal//'khor ba'i phu po de sdus la//rdo rje stabs dang klu yis sbyang //gnas gnas dag tu sngo bar bya//phung po mchod pa'i rdza su bstim//rdo rje pra yi las rnams gradag/des
109b3(rgyud): ni mnyes dang skongs pa dang //rdo rje las rnams 'grub pa yin//rnal 'byor las kyi dbang phyug che//mtho gtsang shes rab gangs rum nas//rig pa'i sder mo sbar shad can//nga rgyal dregs pa'i glang po 'dzi
109b4(rgyud): rnal 'byor rtsal rgyas seng 'phrug rnams//rdo rje rgyal tshwa 'di sbyangs pas//rnal 'byor lha mchog gshegs pa'i rten//dngos grub 'byung ba'i rin po che//mthu stobs skye ba'i thabs chen po//byin brlabs
109b5(rgyud): phebs pa'i dbang mchog 'dris//rgyal ba'i dngos grub mon chad nas//mkha' 'gro'i cho 'phrul thams ca dang //dregs pa mu rungs sde pa rnams//thams cad dbang du 'gyur nges na//'byung po gzhan lha
109b6(rgyud): smos ci dgos//'khor ba'i skam gling chen po la//rigs drug 'khor ba'i sems can rnams//rgyud drug 'das pa'i rnam shes srog/dus gsum mtshon gyis bsad pas na//rtag chad mthar shi'i///
109b7(rgyud): ro gling nas//gti mug bam chen ro blangs nas//bdud rtsi sman chen ye shes kyis//rtag chad mthe' las ro blangs shing //byang chub semasu gsal ba'i phyir//ro yi rdzas rnams btsal bar bya//
110a1(rgyud): khra chog rngam par bdag byas te//rdo rje 'bar ba'i mi gnang nas//mthing nA ga hUM gi sor che ni//'khor ba'i ro gling khamasu spro//bsgral ba'i dur khrod mtha' dag kun//yis/
110a2(rgyud): rol pa'i zhing du blta//khro bo gyad kyi 'dor thabs kyis//mtsham ngam chen po'i rngam tshul gyis//dpa'o rdo rje'i 'dzur 'gros sbyar//thabs chen bco brgyad stabs kyis sbyar//'jo tshul thazla
110a3(rgyud): kyis 'gro stabs kyis//'dzem tshu lta zhing rnam par brtsen//sgra skad bsgyur zhing he hes sgrags//'thab cing brtsod pas rnam par rngam//'bri tshugs lta zhing 'drog tshul spyod//gA ya su lta zhing
110a4(rgyud): g.yon du 'gyur//yid mched te phyir yang lta//sdang mig legs kyis khyab par blta//rdo rje 'gro su rgyug cing 'gro/ha ha ru lu'i rngam sgra sgrags//saM'i brda' skad 'byin byed cing //bstod d+hi/
110a5(rgyud): tshul gyis mching zhing rgyug/yid bzhin gter chen kha phye nas//'dod 'byung rin chen phung po de//'khor ba'i rnam smini dpyis phyung nas//rnam gsum dug chen gtan sprugs nas//thugs rje rngam pa'i kha long/
110a6(rgyud): rdo rje 'bar ba'i tshogs chen gyis//dngos grub lo tog phral nas kyang //rdo rje bzhin phyogs ma nor bar//shel phur gnyis kyis gsang nas bzung //nges par gshin pa'i gzhi ma la//cung zhig brtodanye
110a7(rgyud): 'khor bsgyur//bzhin phyogs gang ltas legs nyes brtag/phyi yi bzang ngan de nyid ni//nang du nges par gsal ba yin//nyes pa'i mtshan byung mkhas pas gnan//gal te dri bas blang slong na//de'-i'i
110b1(rgyud): bsal ba dag/dngos por spyod la zhugs rnams kyis//mtshan mar rtog pa 'di dag rnams//'jigs byed bka' las rtags pa yi//'dod chags bdag pa nga la gsal//ji skad smras pa da bshad kyis//mtshan mar
110b2(rgyud): rdzas rnams rtogs par gyis//'jig rten mgron khyod bdag la gson//bdag cag spyod pa gsol bar bgyi//snod kyi mtshan nyid bzang ngan gyis//nyes dang legs pa 'di las byung //skyon gyi mchen ma bdun pa/
110b3(rgyud): kha sbub pa dang gdan las bskyod//rgyud mi 'dzel dang mtsham sugs//ra chad 'byung dang bgegs ldang ga//mchen ma ngan pa 'byung ba'o//dI dag mkhas pas yongs mi 'chang //legs pa'i rgyu ni btsug ste/
110b4(rgyud): gsum gyi dngos grub thob pa dong //rig 'dzin lam 'gro na mkhar 'phur//khams gsum dbang ba rdo rje spyan//pha rol g.yul zlog zil gyis gnon//mthur dang byin rlabs tshe 'phel dang //mtshan ma gsalapa
110b5(rgyud): 'byung ba dang //sgrub mchu yi rgyud 'phel dang //dmigs pa'i bsam pa 'grub pa dang //phyi mar sangs rgyas myur ba dang //dngos grub rnams gsum thob pa ste/smon lam bzhin du 'grub pa'o//de yang rgya
110b6(rgyud): brag 'di ste/byu byer ni tha~M bang yin//ma saHsa stu ta rnam //da yang sa mtshan rtags// ming du rjod byeg/ do me T+Te swA/ ma na rtags pa na
110b7(rgyud): di'i rgyun/sa da /ma sa pa'i/ la gas shes du ga sbyid med te byeg / kyi rgyal pa
111a1(rgyud): @dkor pho brang rtags ldan snod bcud rdzogs//'phrul zhal yid bzhin 'dod zho'i ba//rkang med mkha' la 'gre ba'i mchog/ngo mtshar thog thog dkan sgra can//rmad 'byung gsang ba'i rang sgra
111a2(rgyud): dag/rig 'dzin rtsal can kun la sgrogs//nga ni skyes mchog rtsal can gyi//rmad byung bsgrub pa'i rdzas yin pas//su zhig dngos grub gang 'dod pa//the tsom med par dus 'dir long //gang dag bka' ltar mi
111a3(rgyud): byed cing //su zhig dam la mi gnas par//nga yi gzugs mthong tsam gyis 'tshig/sgra thos tsam gyis brlag par 'gyur//zhes pa'i sgra byung cho 'phrul ni//rgyal ba'i gzhal yas kun las bsgrogs//'di
111a4(rgyud): dag don dang ldan par spyod//'di ltar grags pas nges do ni//rnal 'byor can gyis shes bya ba//thaMd dang ldan lcang lo can//la la bkra shis mtshan ldan te//de bzhin pa tsa ku la yin//la la dpyad
111a5(rgyud): kyi nA sha yin//de bzhini mi 'gyur sra 'khregs yin//ma hA ke sa dpal dang ldan//ye shes lnga ldan zhes ni bya//A yu pA la tshe'i mchog/la la me le de bI brtan//la la de bzhin kha swa kha//kha hu/
111a6(rgyud): pa yi dpal dang ldan//bkra shis don 'byung de lta'o//bde gshegs mtshan ldan rdzogs pa yin//gtsug pung dge gtsug dpal dang ldan//dz+nyA na mUrti de bzhi no//la la dz+nyA na kuN+Da li//de bzhin khroH
111a7(rgyud): kuN+Da li/e ka dza Ti mtshan ldan pa//a hri mu ka rdzogs pa'o//'dod pa brtan zhing bde ba skye//gnyis med don ldan thob pa'o//pu tra mang 'phel lcug phran rgyas//rdo rje bas phor mtshan rdzogs ma/
111b1(rgyud): shel por gsang ba'i don 'byung ba/sku gsung lhun grub ka pA la//thaMd re ba yid bzhin bskor //de bzhin yon tan rdzogs kun rdzogs//bkra shis mtshani kun ldan pa//de bzhin mi 'gyur g.yung drung
111b2(rgyud): brtan dmi shigs mdzod yin kun 'byung ba'o//cho 'phrul rtags 'byin dam+ba 'byung //srid pa yod sgrol las kyi mchog/khams gsum dbang sdud khyad par ldan//drug gsum gtan sprugs las mchog
111b3(rgyud): tsan mtshan ma'i spros bral nges pa'i don//rigs drug mdog drug dbyibs drug dang //yon tan skyon rnams sbyar bar bya//mang dang nyung ba'i gsung ba ni//bcas dkar 'phel dang mgon mi'i byung //rjes 'dra la
111b4(rgyud): sog skyon rnams spang //dug gsum stongs mdzad rgyal ba'i bka'//sku gsum smin pa'i g.yu drong rtags//sgra thabs gsang ba'i man ngag 'di//skra ldan rnal 'byor rnams kyi ni//skal med kun gyi rtog /
111b5(rgyud): bdud ming tsam 'dzin la ga la brtan//mkhas pas brtag cing bzang po brtan//dngos grub 'byung ba'i dus tshan yang //gcig dang gsum ni rab tu bshad//de bzhin lnga bdun 'bring du grags//dgu ni dngos
111b6(rgyud): grub tha ma ste//bcig phan chadu yul bar bshad//de bas rnal 'byor rtsal chen gyis//nges par brtson de brtag par rigs//'dod chags bdag pos de skad bshad//mtshan ma yin phyir der nges pa//
111b7(rgyud): mtshan ma can dang 'thun bya'i phyir//thabs kyis de dang 'thun spyod la//yang dag don la kha lo sgyur//de dag rnam par spyad pa dang //'gro drug shin tu g.yeng ba can//yid rnams drang te brten byas nas//thabs
112a1(rgyud): kye don la sbyar ba'i tshig/rgyu drug 'dus pa'i sa gzhi la//zla bro gar phyi rol pa yis//srid gsum zol gnon dbang sdud pa//'jig rten 'thun 'jug spyod par bya//dper na 'jig rten /
112a2(rgyud): dag na//'gro bas 'gro ba 'dul byed pa//de dga'i las la de zhugs te//de dang bsam pa 'thun spyad pas//de dang 'bris nas de dka' byas//de nas de yi dred lon so//de yi 'du shes sgyur ba'i tshig de//
112a3(rgyud): snga bdag grogs khyod kyi//las lo zhugs pa shin tu nor//'dir nyes las kyis bsags pa bgrang //nyes kyi bdag gis khyod dgar bya//da ni bdag dga'i las 'di la//grogs khyod shin tu 'jug
112a4(rgyud): dge so//byis pas de'i snga sems de//zin pas gcig phye sems kyang //'dzin cing de dag ri las la 'jug/spyod pa'i las kyang 'di lta ste//rgyu drug 'dus pa'i phung po la//ngan song gnas 'jom
112a5(rgyud): rdo rje'i brtags//ye shes thabs kyi snyan pa'i glu//rmad 'byung gsang chen sgrogs pa'i tshig/nyon mongs lnga'i sa gzhi la//yi ge ye shes sde gsal bas//'bar ba khrag 'thung sprin phung bzhin
112a6(rgyud): khyu mchog lnga yi stobs kyis rol//seng+ged ro rngom pa'i sgra//rdo rje don rab stegs pa'i tshig/rmad byung rol pa'i don byung ba//a mya ngo mtshar ye mtshan che//dgyes pas rol pa'i byin rlabs la
112a7(rgyud): rgyud drug rtsad gcod ngo mtshar che//mnyam pa chen po'i namakha' las//ye shes 'bar ba mo byung bas//'khor ba'i khrig rgya mtsho skams//sdug bsngal dbyingasu zad mdzad//mi gnas glong na
112b1(rgyud): cho 'phrul pa//gtumu rngam 'khrug pa'i ngor 'bar//khrag 'thungs 'bar ba'i sprin 'phros pas//srid gsum khrag mtsho rdo nas skams//dang 'o tsham ngam gyad kyi stabs//srin po ma grangs khrod pa'i glu/theg chen
112b2(rgyud): rmad byung gsang ba'i tshig/chags pa'i rtod phur gting nas phyung //mkha' bzhi dbyings kyi bde klong nas//tshom bu 'bum gyi cho 'phrul 'phros//dgyes mchog rol pa'i phrin las las//la la shes rab thabs la/
112b3(rgyud): rol//la la thugs rje las la rol//la la gdul bya'i yul la rol//la la ye shes dbyings la rol//thabs kyi rgyal po rtogs pa'i dbang //che ba lung gi khyad par las//rgyal ba kun dang mnyam par
112b4(rgyud): sbyor du rdo rje pad+ma rol pa'i stabs//chags med mkha' la gsal ba'i tshig/dus gsum zil gyis gnon pa'i glu//'jig rten rim gyi spyad pa'i phyir//'jig rten kham su rol pa byung //'jig rten drug
112b5(rgyud): snying la rol//bdag po gtso bo zil mnan nas//'khor ni snyan pa'i tshigs bsten//'khor ba'i lam lnga rgyud gtsang nas//rnam thar na mkha'i ngang du bslan//gar mchog glog lhur 'gyu bo yi//rmad
112b6(rgyud): byung gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nas//yi ge 'bar ba'i cho 'phrul 'phros//'phro 'du skar ltar 'khrug pa las//khams gsum bud shing rdal bar blags//rdo rje bu yug skar mda'i skabs//rdo rje 'brug
112b7(rgyud): chen lding ba'i glu//don grub rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig/gdug pa'i dpung rnams rnam par 'joms//rdo rje sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor bas//thabs kyi byang chub sems sprin spros//dbang sdud chags pa'o//
113a1(rgyud): khyad par byas//lagro rten su mi drug dang //sani rnam par sos pa'i stabs//d+h+r-irje khyu skad 'gyur ba'i sgra/chags pa mad nas gcod pa'i tshig/ rom pa'i don chen gro yor/
113a2(rgyud): lo 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas//mtshon cha 'bar ba'i yig 'bru 'phros//rgyu drug do byed nas gcod//dugan+d+ha'i phung po rnam par spros//ye shes rno dpal mtshon chen po//chos nyid bdal ba'i glong nas/
113a3(rgyud): 'phror thabs mchog dbyig rtsal shugs las//'bar ba'i mtshon che cha ri lhor 'bab//yi ge ye shes mtshon cha'i char//rdo rje lce yi shugs kyis dbab//rin chen gter gyis long spyod rnams//rnyog
113a4(rgyud): pa'i ri bo gzhom pa dang //dug gsum phung po gzhig pa'i phyir//'khor lo lcags kyu la sogs pa//rten dang gsang chen til mchog dang //dngas ma la sog sgo kun rnams//sau'i tshe ru phye nas ni//
113a5(rgyud): thugs rjes nyon mong skyong ba yaM//so so gnyer gyi rang skal du//phyag rgya so'i ska su gdab//de ltar rdzogs par gyur pa dang //maN+Dal kun gyi tshad 'dra la//dbusu thig bzhi le tshe dgu//mtha' bskor
113a6(rgyud): 'khor lo'i brtsibs brgyad bya//de la sgo bzhi sgo khyud bya//mtha' zad bskal pa'i me ri bri//dbusu dkar dmar kha sprod bri//phyogs mtshams brgya du khaM brgyad gI/'khor lo'i bar mtshams mu
113a7(rgyud): khyud la//nang du bltas pa'i khri brgyad gsal//rtsibs la nang du lta ba brgyad//mu khyud brgyad la phyir lha brgyad//gru chad bi nau la nang du lta//thig le rnam bzhi bri bar bya//phyi rim par khyams
113b1(rgyud): dodas//thog ts+tsha shA btsun no// ru m+b+ha 'a khro bar b+ha//bal batshan pa mo ldams la//thag la byur ste btsu dngul gro//dol d+hAgats+tsha sa pa d+mo///maN+Dal sgon baman du co//klu slod/
113b2(rgyud): sa rnas sbyangs //dbu bzhag ste shod du bsnun//de la phung po gzhal yas kha //b+h+rUM las bskyed gzil bai d+d+ha//de phyug brgya'i tshogs chen nom//rdzas kyi gnas rnams so la/
113b3(rgyud): rim par dgang //de nas rdo rje bsnyen pa //byin pibs rtags lung mgu ba na//bam de byed shar mtshos su bsku'o//rdzas rnamos sor sngos nas kyang //phyag rgya bzhugs pa'i gnas rnams man
113b4(rgyud): bapar yang dgo skye ba/dpal dang ldan pa'i snod dgu la//rma du byung ba dgu bkod//'bar ba chen po'i gnas gan su//brjid pa'i tshul du gsal bar bsgom//phyag rgya gzhan yang rdzogs par dgod//mi
113b5(rgyud): shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du//dpeng che ni zla ga ma skor tshogs dkram//rdo rje mi byed dgur 'bar bya//che ba dgu yi khyad par las//dpal chen dgu ni sku la rdzogs//yum chen dgra ni dbyangs la
113b6(rgyud): rlod dpal ba'u dgu ni thugs la 'dor//'byung chen dgu ni klong du 'khyil//khru ga dokri nI rnyeng skad rdzogs//dz+haiM da na pa du stan//zug sa de bu na yum dbyangs//thig la dbun rgya
113b7(rgyud): sems//nyi zla dgu ni 'ad sa 'bad//de ltar dgu dgur gos le ba yi//dgu slong b+ha ga gi cig dang //dgu bkag gcig phye thig le ri da na//thaMd 'byor bi rgyas byas la//bam dgu phan cad smon
114a1(rgyud): sbyar/rdzas kyi dngos grub blangs te spyad//ces bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rjes gsungs so//rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mad las rmad byung rdzas kyi
114a2(rgyud): le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o////de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsung so//'dus pa chen po'i tshogs chos thams cad ni mngon sum du shes shing rig par bya'o//mngon sum
114a3(rgyud): glagrang zhan/dran pa mngon du bzhag pa'i yul la mi gnas pa'i chos thams cad dang /phyis 'byung ba'i chos thams cad dang //sngon du byung ba'i chos thams cad mngon sum mar rig pa'o//tsi
114a4(rgyud): phyir zhe na/mngon sum mar shes pa ni yid shes chen po'i rgyu yin pa'i phyiraro//de yang ji lta zhe na/chos thams cad rgyu ma'i rang bzhin du dran pa mngon du gzhag na mngon du gyur pa ni chos nyid phyin
114a5(rgyud): tsam ldog par shes pa yi no//chos nyid byin ci ma log par mngon du gyur na mi gnas pa'i ye shes chen po nyid yino//de bas na mngon par shes pa rnams dran pa mngon sum mar yid la
114a6(rgyud): byos shig/de skad ces gsungs pa dang /mngon shes rig pa'i drang srong chen po rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa ni bdag cag rnams kyis dam tshig
114a7(rgyud): logs//bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag rnams kyis dam tshig bshad gsol zhes zhus pa las/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//rigs 'dzin chen po rnams ye shes chen
114b1(rgyud): po'i rgyu mngon par shes pa ni rnam par lngar rig par bya'o//mig dbang po tha~Md las//zhing du btags pa'i bye mar bya//bcud kyi snying por sbyar byas nas//mthong ba'i snying po 'bum bzlas na//thams cad ma lus
114b2(rgyud): mthong bAr+ya 'gyur//'di ni migi mngon sheso//rdo rje lce yis rjod pa'i tshi dra//dus sam rgyun tu brjod par bya'o//badz+ra tsak+Sha gar+b+ha bid+yA hU~M//rna ba'i dbang po thams cad kyang //btags sam phye mar byas nas ni
114b3(rgyud): bskur kyi snying pa sbyar byas te//thos pa'i snying po 'bum bzlas nas//sgra yi bye brag thams cad thos//'di ni rna ba'i ma ni shes//rdo rje tshig du rtag pa ni//badz+ra gar+b+ha sta ma si ho//sna yi dbang po thaMd kun//
114b4(rgyud): bskams sam phye mar byas nas ni//bcud kyi snying por sbyar byas te//dri sna tshogs dang bsres pa las//tshor ba'i snying po 'dum bzlas na//sna yi mngon shes thob par 'gyur//rdo rje tshig tu gzung ba ni//
114b5(rgyud): badz+ra sa ma si taM hU~M/lho yi dbang po thams cad kur//bsgoms sam phyi mar byas nas ni//bcud kyi snying por sbyar byas te//ro yi mchog la sogs pa las//ro yi snying po 'bum bzlas te//sgra byed skye
114b6(rgyud): yaM dkyil 'khor ni//stegs bu khyu gang gru bzhi la//dbusu gsang ba'i rdo rje bri//mtha' ma lce yi pad+mas bskor//lci la tshi gi 'od zer 'phro//smra ba'i bsgrub pas 'di rdzogs na//smra ba'i dbang po kha dbye
114b7(rgyud): zhing daro rnams thams cad shes par 'gyur//'di ni lce yi mngon shes yin//rdo rje tshig tu rtag pa ni//badz+ra ba sha sid+d+h+ya hUM/snying gi dbang po thams cad kun//bskams sam phye mar byas nas
115a1(rgyud): kyang /snying po mchog dang sbyar byas shing //dran pa'i snying po 'bum bzlas shing //dpal be'u rdzi ta'i dkyil 'khor nas//dran pa'i rten gyis yongs bskor te//snying gi dkyil laN+Da/
115a2(rgyud): rdzogs pa dang //dbang po thams cad gsal ba dang //thams cad ma lus shes par 'gyur//gzhan gyi sems ni shes pa'i mchog/badz+re tsi ta ta sid+d+ha hUM/lus kyi dbang po thams cad kun//btags/
115a3(rgyud): phye mar byas nas ni//sra mkhregs bcud dang sbyar byas te//reg bya'i snying po 'bum bzlas na//lus kyi mngon shes thob par 'gyur//mngon shes 'di dag kun rdzogs na//mi gnas ye shes
115a4(rgyud): chen po'i rgyu//phra mo'ang nan tan mchog tu bya'o//zhes gsung so//rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las mngon shes rig pa'i bsgrub lugs kyi le'u zhes bya ste bco
115a5(rgyud): lnga pa'o//de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungaso//'dus pa chen po'i tshogs mechog chen po'i bsgrubs lugs ni//'di ltar rig par bya'o//don la brtson pa'i rnal 'byor//
115a6(rgyud): pas/las kyi stegs bu chag phyed pa//me ris bskor te 'brar bar bya//dkyil 'khor de'i maN+Dal ni//sum rtsegs byas pa'i dbus zla gam//brgyad kyis mdzes par bya ba'o//phyi mtha' thod pa
115a7(rgyud): phreng bas bskor//de mtha' me dpung 'bar bas bskor//de'i phyi mtha' dmar chen rgyas//zla gam dbusu dpal chen 'bar//zla gam brgyad la gnas bdag brgyad//mthing na gau ya tha me rir/
115b1(rgyud): 'brar/de rog thod pa tshar gsum dang //sgo khyams dur khrod rdzas kyis bskor//sgo rtseg sgo khyud tha ma bran//tha~Md gang yin de ltar sbyar//phun sum tshogs par gyur pa na//rnam bzhi las kyi raN+Dal brtsam//
115b2(rgyud): 'jigs byed bskal pa'i dkyil 'khor du//za byed 'bar ba'i phyag rgya yis//thar pa tsa ri bsgral ba'i phyir//drod ldan man ngag 'chang ba des//mchogi byin brlabs bzhag par bya//dag pa gsum gyi
115b3(rgyud): gzhung bsrang nas//gnas mchog dben pa'i ri bo rtse//rna nyan phag sag can dang bral//'du 'dzi 'gro 'ong chad pa dang //gsang chen spyod pa'i gnasu shes//rnam bzhi las kyi rtags nyung na'ang //gcig/
115b4(rgyud): gnyis ldan na 'bring du bshad//bsgrub pa'i rgyal po gdong ldan pa//shin tu brjod cing sran tshugs pa'i//khu 'phrig rtog bral brtul zhugs can//las kyi phreng ba lhag chad med//dri zhim dag pa'i sman
115b5(rgyud): dag gis//phyi bkru shi ne 'da' hu las//nA yA dag pa chen por bya//tshad mar sbyar ba'i bka' dang ni//ldanas dus btab shin tu brtsam//de yang rtag pa'i gal che ni//bkra shis mdzes dang ldan 'gyur
115b6(rgyud): ba bong tshod lo ni dar la bab//rigs lnga'i mtshan dang ldan pa la//bsgral ba'i rdzasu rung ba dang //yid 'ong 'byor ldan btsal nas ni//bsgrub pa'i rdza su bya ba de//de 'dra'i mtshan rtags yod pa ni//ma
115b7(rgyud): sbyangs sa la slebs pa'o//bsgrub pa'i rgyu mchog de dag ni//'da' du man 'das dbang po bsgyur//rdo rje phra mkhan phab nas ni//snang sad thams cad dri ba 'am//legs nyes thaMd dri bar bya//dbang po
116a1(rgyud): sgo lnga'i dkyil 'khor du//bdud rtsi rnam lnga'i thig le gdab//rnam shes 'byung ba'i sgo lnga ru//sau 'byung ba'i rdzas rnams gdab//so rigs kyi phyag rgyas gdab//phyag rgya bkod
