116a2(rgyud): nyon mongs bsgral//bsgral sbyar thams cad sbyangs nas ni//mchod dang mnyes dang dam skongs dang //dngos grub rnam gsum gang thob blang //thob nas thams cad ci bder spyad//ces gsungs/
116a3(rgyud): de nas sems dpa'i rdo rjes yod 'di skad ces gsungs//'dus pa chen po'i tshogs bar du gcod pa thams cad bzlog pa'i bsgrub pa chen po ni 'di ltar rig par bya'o//gong ma bzhin du wa
116a4(rgyud): brtsams nas//thar pa'i rgyu mchog de dag ni//rus pa rdo rje thal bar bsgrub//rus pa'i tshogs ni thams cad kun//bsregs dang lce po ga nag po sbyar//khyab 'jug ga'u kha sbyar du//tsu
116a5(rgyud): ste 'joms pa'i phyag rgya dang //drag po sngags kyis bsgrub byas nas//grub nu rnal 'byor don ldan gyi//bar chad zlog pa'i gnyen por sbyar zhes gsungaso//rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje
116a6(rgyud): bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las rdo rje thal chen gyi bsgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o////de nas yang sems dpe'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsung so//'das pa chen
116a7(rgyud): bo'i tshogs pra thams cad ni 'di ltar rig par bya'o//maN+Dal gru bzhi pa gcig la//zla kham sgo cig rdo rjes bskor//mtha' khyud sgo bzhi ldan par bri//rgya mchog dbang po phyed ldan
116b1(rgyud): shis//phyis khrus rnams byas nas ni//shar du kha stan dbus bzhag//lce la gzungs thag sna lngas gdags//rnal 'byor rnams kyis bskor bar bya//phyag rgya rdzas dang bcas par dgram//de yi khong du gzhal yas
116b2(rgyud): bskyed//rim par brtsegs pa'i dkyil 'khor ni//'bar ba'i drung chen 'bar ba lnga//don gyi lha mo lnga ru gsal//kun gzhi kun tu bzang mor gsal//de yi thugs kyi khong thag tu//thig le zla ba nya rgyas la/sme
116b3(rgyud): sems dpa'i tshon gang ba//thugs kar nar bu rin chen 'bar//dbus nyi ma'i gra'u la//dpal be'u yungs 'bru'i bum pa la//hUM dmar til 'brur gnas pa ni//bad chen byang chub sems zhes bya//rdo rje gsang thag rgyun mi
116b4(rgyud): bcad//rdo kha pra gdab par bya//de nas mtshan ma byung gyur na//dngos grub blangs te de bsgral la//bskams te bdud rtsi rtsa bar bya//zhes gsungs//rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkad pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las mchog
116b5(rgyud): phran thabs kyi bsgrub lugs kyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o////de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs//'dus pa chen po'i tshogs thad ni rgyu ma'i rang bzhin du shes par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/
116b6(rgyud): rgyu ma ni dngos por snang yang rang bzhin med pa yin te/rang bzhin med pa'i don ni chos nyid rdo rje yi no//de bas na sgyu ma'i chos thaMd khong du chud par bya'o//de nas 'khor der 'dus par gyur pa'i lha ma yin gyi tshogs
116b7(rgyud): bdag rgyu ma mkhan zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis dam tshig ni sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul la gnas shing sgyu mche du bgyid lan kyis bdag cag rnams kyi don ched
117a1(rgyud): du sgyu ma'i chos thams cad bsha du gsol zhes gsol pa las/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//tshogs bdag chen po sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul ni 'di ltar rig par bya'o//
117a2(rgyud): chos rnams thams cad sgyu mar snang //sgyu ma'i rang bzhin stong pa ste//stong pa'i don rnams gang yin pa//mi 'gyur mi shigs rdo rje'i don//stong pa nyid la sgyu ma yi//cho 'phrul bye ba mang po
117a3(rgyud): 'byung da de bzhin sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul yang //gyin da tsam gyi rgyu rkyen lnga//cho 'phrul gzugs ni tha dad snang //snang yang dngos por ma grub ste//'gyur 'jig med pas rdo rje'i don//kun rdzob sku sI
117a4(rgyud): mtshan nyid kyang //rde'u dang shing bu'i rgyu dag las//sman dang sngags kyis rkyen sbyar nas//'bras bu sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul 'byung sgyu ma'i gsang tshig sbyor ba ni//sgyu ma'i bdag pos 'di skad bshad//sgyu la 'dod po'i gzu
117a5(rgyud): byas la//sha'u re'u sman gyis btab nas ni//gsang sngags 'di yi sbyor ba bya//she'u re'u i ni ya//a mo kha au 'brus sa 'gus//chag shi de ngag gis brdabs byas na//ji ltar 'dod pa sna tshogs bya
117a6(rgyud): bsdu bar 'dod na slar zlog bya//de na sgyu ma'i g.yang ba can//drang ba'i thobs kyis dkri bar bya//rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo la sgyu ma rdo rje bsgrub lugs kyi le'u ste bco ba
117a7(rgyud): pa'o//dade nas yang sems dpe'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungaso//'dus pa chen po'i tshogs chos thams cad la dbang sgyur bar 'dod na 'di ltar rig par bya'o//phun sum tshogs pa kun ldan ka/ste
117b1(rgyud): bu kun tu gru bzhi la//mu khyud gcig tu bskor nas ni//zla ba kham pa'i dbyibasu sbyar//sgo bzhi gru chad bzhir ldan bya//dbyibs kyi thig le zlum po la//rdo rje dang ni nyi mas bskor//dbus ban+da dpa man la//dpal tshwa/
117b2(rgyud): yab yum sbyar la gzhag//tshal bu brgyad la gnas brgyad sbyar//lte ba bskor te rim par bzhag/thig le shar gyi sgo gang du//rdo rje rnal 'byor gsang ming dang //dngos grub gsol bya bris la gzhag/mchod rje
117b3(rgyud): khyamasu gyur pa la//bsgrub pa'i rdzas dang mchod pa rnam//rim pa bzhin du mdzes par dgram//rdo rje rnal 'byor de dag rnams//rdo rje lhag pa'i rtags kyis mtshan//ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor rdzogs byas nas//
117b4(rgyud): spyan drangs mchod pa kun bsogs te//'jug dang dngos grub gsol ba dang //dbang bskur las rnams kun rdzogs nas//rma du byung ba'i gtor ma dang //cha gsum dag po sbyin bsreg bya//bar ma mi zad
117b5(rgyud): go ter du sra//byang chub sems kyi chu bo dang //chos nyid na mkha'i dbyings chen dang //b+ha ga yum gyi sa gzhi la//shin tu sba ba'i tshul du sbyar//cha cig gzhal yas shar sgo nas//bcu gsum gcal
117b6(rgyud): bar stegs bu bye//der ni gnas bdun gtso rnams kyang //de bzhin bcu gsum la nA ra la//gnas kyi 'gro ni ma srid rnams//bdun cu bar du kun rdzogs bya//tha mar maN+Dal zla gam la/nus ni mkha' bri
117b7(rgyud): namakha'i hom//rdzogs byam lus daM mgu gyi/lhag mar gyur pa kun rdzogs bya//stegs mar gyur pa thams cad kyang //sba 'am bsreg gam chu klung 'dod//rdo rje gnas chen de bsrungs te/gnas ni su skye/
118a1(rgyud): mu dgagasang //me rig phyir na mtshan ma dag rang rang gan bu slebs par bya//gang dag 'du 'tsha rang de bzhi no//'di ni theg le gcig pa yi//bsgrub lugs yin par rgyal bas bshashud/
118a2(rgyud): 'di dag sgrub pa'i skyes bu ni//zla ba'i 'khor lo la gnas nas//nyi ma'i khor lo thogs nas ni//yang dag chos kyi dbyings nyid la//dbang sgyur byed pa'i rgyal por 'gyur zhes gsungaso//yang so de'i rnga
118a3(rgyud): des 'di skad ces gsung so//'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa//'di yang rims kyi gong ma ltar//thams cad tshul bzhin sbyar byas nas//phyi ru kun tu gru bzhi la//thig le zla ba gcig tu bya/de ya sra
118a4(rgyud): /bu bzhi bsnol bas//le'u che dgu ru gyur bar bya//phyi rol mu khyud thod pas bskor//gru bzhi gru chad rab mdzes brgyan//de yi mtha' zad khyims gcig la//sgo gdong sgrub pa po la lnga//dbusu theg le//
118a5(rgyud): /dkar dmar la//Sha sbyor bar dag rdo rjes pab la//der ni dpal chen yab yum bzhugs//phyi mtshams le'u tse de brgyad la//zla gram brkyang ba brgyad byas te//ye shes gnas kyi ma brgyad dgod
118a6(rgyud): phyi rol sgo gcig khyams de la//bsgrub pa'i rdzas kyis mdzes par dgram//bsam bya bsgrub pa la sogs kun//thams cad bzhin 'dir sbyar bya//ji ltar tha pa'i skyes bu gang //chos kyi rgyal por
118a7(rgyud): byur pa ste//thaMd kun la dbang sgyur ba'i//skyes bu chen por de 'gyur ro//zhes gsung so//de nas yang sems dpe'i rdo rje nges cho 'phrul thaMng la dbang ba zhes bya ba 'di gsung so//'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa/
118b1(rgyud): 'di 'a zang chu bkun dru shid ldan 'gyur ba//'khar la bas brgyad dag drug//d+hA tshang ngan yo phyo la du// no dag rdzun byung // khyams dmang dan chu da//shod du
118b2(rgyud): cing 'jigs par bri//zag le dbul kyi snying po la//zla ga ma 'bar bas mtshan par bya//rtsi bas mchog brgyad la zla gam+ba ni//nang du lta ba de brgyad dri//brtsibs mtshan brgyad la'ang de bzhin te//rdo rje ska ma
118b3(rgyud): rnams te/phyag rgya rim par dkram byung nas//bsgrub pa'i las rnams kun rdzogs bya'o//de ltar grub pa'i rnal 'byor pa//'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las//'das pa'i cho 'phrul thams cad las//dbang ba sgyur byed /
118b4(rgyud): pa'i rgyal por 'gyur//zhes gsung so//rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las thig le sgrub pa'i ro'u zhes bya skye bcu dgu pa'o///de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di ska
118b5(rgyud): gsung mo//'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byur rnams dregs pa can gyi tshogs tha~Md la dbang bsgyur bar 'dod na 'di ltar rig par bya'o//'di ni byas la sogs pa'i las//'di ltar sbyor dang phun sum tshogs/
118b6(rgyud): la mkhas dang yo byad dang //ji ltar rig par 'di smra bya//de nas maN+Dal 'dra cig la//dur khrod mgo ma yang du bya/zur bzhi maN+Dal bani byas la/bzhi las de bzhis chags ros postong/de nyid ma tang gzugs/
118b7(rgyud): b+ha/snying ka man tshadong dbusu bsnol//dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'og tu gzhug 'khor mo'i bar ba'i thid btang to//dpal chen rje yi phyag rgyag//khyams gnyis dag gis mdzes pa la//gnang dang yul gyi phyi//
119a1(rgyud): rgya bkod//sgo bzhir rdo rje sgo ba bzhi//yan lag sprul pa'i mgo brnyan gnas//phyi khyams rdo rje mo ri bya//de yi phyi rol phreng chen gtams//skam dang ra ra rlon pas bskor/de yi phyi
119a2(rgyud): rol me gur 'tshug/bskal pa'i bu yug bri bar bya//rdo rje sgo khyud sgo gang du//bu gu thul dang za ra tshogs//zhing dang sbrul kyi chun po bri//de nas ban+da dang ldan la//rdo rje dpal gyi yi ge drag/bris
119a3(rgyud): la kha sbyar spug ste gzhag/ga'u chung la ral pa can//brgyad bris 'byung ba'i gan su gzhag/las byed brgya dang bcu gnyis la//las byed bcus bris la 'god//thar pa gnas kyi dkyil 'khor
119a4(rgyud): du gdol pa 'byung po nga rgyal can//chag sdang rnams kyis bslad pa'i rgyu//de yi du gsuMgasheg pa'i phyir//don gyi bsgrub pa chen po bshad//ru dra lnga yi tshogs chen te//ting 'dzin ye shes lngas ba/
119a5(rgyud): nas rdo rje drod kyis rnam par sbyar//mdo yi se la stabs gcig tu'o//bgegs kyi bgegs te bgegs chen po//dugo lnga rtog pa nyid la skyes//phyed dang gsum gyi dur khrod nas//gzhi rtsa ngag dang
119a6(rgyud): lus semaso//brjid ldan dpol chen dur khrod bdag/bdag rtog rtog 'joms tid 'dzin gyis//srid gsum ru dra dur khro du//tshogs bdag chen po de brgyad bya//ma rig mun khang sgo phyed nas//glang ste
119a7(rgyud): smon pa de bzung nas//gzung 'dzin dam po'i rtod thag gcad//dug gsum rnam rtog rtod phur dbyung //ngan song 'dam nas drangs nas ni//nyon mongs dpung rked btul nas/ya shes thabs kyi rnam
119b1(rgyud): /rnamapa'i slong du nags med pas//dI chen mad pa'i tshogs dz+nyAn+da dka/dum rgyag lnga dang mnyam sbyar bas//chos kyi yod stod rgyas par sbyar//mnyam nyid 'ad da spyong rdza mas//dag
119b2(rgyud): po gzhom pa dang //'khor ba'i dra ba gcad pa'i phyid//khro tshogs 'bar ba'i sprin 'am pas//ke mi zung rdum pa ma tshogs pa chog sa/b+h+ya ban tshong chen pab nas naM/'khor ba'i bri ba snangs nas /
119b3(rgyud): bde ba chen po'i zhing bzlog ste//byang chub myu gu bskyed nas ni//byang chub sems dpa'i lo rtog bskyed//dur khrod chen pong bzhin phyogs ni//mag ni lho nub marnam su bting /rkang du byung shAr mtshom su pat+ti
119b4(rgyud): dan+si dur khyod dbang phyug che//sangs r+b+ba m+me b+hA ya~M shos yin//thugs rje rnon po'i dmag rdzogs lo//ye shes rnon po'i mtshon tshwa yis/lo tog 'khor ba'i rgyun gtsang //gru bzhi kha bzhir rdo d+hA yi//
119b5(rgyud): 'drir thib ni brtsigs nus kyang //snying khyer 'khor lo'i thab tu bya//rigs kyi yam shing lnga brtsigs te/ho ma lnga 'brel pa'i las chen bcig/thabs tshon lnga yi tom khung du//'khor pa'i sdug bsngar
119b6(rgyud): yamra shing la//ye shes chen pa'i me g+hong du/nyon mongs lnga yi bsregs sbyangs rdzogs//bye bar sbyor ba mtha' dge kun//ji ltar 'byod cing 'tsham par 'os//zhes gsung //rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po
119b7(rgyud): bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las dregs pa can gcan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste hi shu pa'o///de nas yangasems depa'i rdo rje nges 'di skad ces gsungs/'dus pa chen po 'tsho 'khor ba gyu/
120a1(rgyud): zad par byed pa'i DU gyi gyur zhes bya ba bsgrub pa'i don 'di ni 'di ltar rigs par bya'o//di yang de 'drar kun sbyar nas/'khor khang nas kyi gzhal yamra//khyu gang bya bzhi na nga
120a2(rgyud): bshi na 'khor khang khyams dri dag/phyogs bani dag tu brtsam bai ra ba//dri zhim n+dan 'ad gu gtang //dri sgras tsham bu rin chen 'phro//sbyin mchog rgyas par de bsham bya/lho yi dge bsnyen rnam pa ni//
120a3(rgyud): phyogs mtshams bsrung ba'i lus rnams bsgo//khyams kyi nang rim phyogs mchim su//chog phyed pa yo stegs bu bcu//bskal pa'i mi dpung 'bar bris la//sna tshogs rgyu las byas pa yi//mthun pa'i ga
120a4(rgyud): bcu dbang bskur te//khro bo gar gyi nang mtshams btsod//de nas ma trang gnan par bya//dregs pa ru de sdig can 'di//nams kyang bsgral ba'i zhing yin te//dzAHhUM baM ho/mihA shri he ru ka ma trang ru dra ha ha br-i//
120a5(rgyud): sha phaT kha T+wAM phyag rgyas bsgyel nas ni//ma rig mun pa'i sgo phye nas//rnam shes e ru byin rlabs te//gsang chen thugs kyi klung du bstim//sbubs ni gau zhal yas 'bar bar bya//stegs du
120a6(rgyud): mabyung gzugaso 'dra la//'khyil thabs bzhin phyogs ci 'drar bya//kha dog sngo s+yA gan rgyal zlabs//tshe chung chad med gnas kyi sbya //de yi snying khar bang rim gsum//dang por dmar po gra
120a7(rgyud): rtsig/gnyis pa mthing nag gru gsum bya//gsum pa smuganag zla gam bye//yan lag bzhi dang mgo mtshan drug/gsang sgo gnyis te brgyad dag la//stegs bu chag byed gru bani brgyad//
120b1(rgyud): ye mtha' rim yongs zadadu//zla gam gsal ba'i maN+Dal bya//de dag me klod 'bar bar bskor//ya thog zla gam steng dag tu//dpal dang ldan pa'i lha mchog bzhugs//mthing nag gru gsum dpung bri//glu
120b2(rgyud): bzhi'i dmar po bang rim la//rigs bzhi lha mchog dang ldan gzhag/yan lag mgo mtshan g.yas g.yon brgyad//dbang phyug gnas kyi bdag mo brgyad//bri bya yang na mtshan ma gzhag/tshigs
120b3(rgyud): chen brgyad la yul bdag brgyad//ji ltar 'os pa de ltar bya'o//sgo bzhir gsang ba sgo mar gzhag/mtha' zad yongs kyi zla gam la//bud med nyi shu rtsa brgyad gzhog/ming dam mtshan ma brten te
120b4(rgyud): gzhag/de ye kha la thab tu brtsigs//pad+ma dpal be'u dbyings 'dra thab//mkhas pas yam shing brtsam par bya//bya bar bya ba thams cad kun//rgong du sbyor ba de ltar sbyor//zhes gsung so//rgyud kyi
120b5(rgyud): rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las 'khor ba thams cad sgrol ba bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o///de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des dug suM//
120b6(rgyud): thugs dbang sgyur ba zhes bya ba'i mdo 'di gsung so//'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa//dug gsum dbang du sgyur ba yang //'di ltar khong du chud par bya//dug gsum rang bzhin gang yin pa//sku gsum
120b7(rgyud): nyid kyi ngo ba ste//gzhanas btsal ba ci yang med//de ltar shes par 'gyur ba dang //kun rdzob tshul du 'di ltar bsgyur//thams cad gong mo bzhin sbyar lo//stegs du 'dom gang bzhig la//phyir
121a1(rgyud): dmar po rgyas par bya//de nas zing nag gru gsum brtsig/de nas dmar nag zla bam bya//zla gam dbu su dpal chen 'bar//dbang phyug gnas brgyad zla gam mtha'//bang rim par/
121a2(rgyud): la dur khrod 'bar//mtha' mar dmar po gru bzhi la//sgo bzhi sgo srungs bcas par bya//de yi mtha' ma me ris bskor//khro bcu 'bar ba'i rtags rnams dgod//bsgrub dang 'jug dang dbang bskur
121a3(rgyud): rnams//gong ma bzhin du sbyin par bya//des ni thams cad rdzogs pa yin//dug gsum thams cad zil gyis gnon//zhes gsungaso//rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo//
121a4(rgyud): las dug gsum dbang sgyur ba zhes bya ba sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o////de nas sems dpa' rdo rje dam pa des bud med thams cad dbang bsgyur ba zhes bya ba'i kyil 'khor chen po
121a5(rgyud): 'di gsung so//'dus pa chen po'i tshogs chags pa thams cad dbang du 'du bar 'dod na 'di ltar bya'o//bud med chags pa'i rang bzhin te//chags pa khrig rgya mtsho yin//las kyi 'khor ba'i seMn
121a6(rgyud): rnams chags pa khrag rgya mtshor bying //chags las rnam grol 'gog pa ste//chags pa de nyid khrag ces bya//khrag rgya mtsho bskum pa'i phyir//bud med khrag rgya mtsho rnams//'tsho ba bdud
121a7(rgyud): rtsi'i rgya mtshor bsgyur//de ltar shes par gyur pa dang //kun rdzob tshul du 'di ltar sbyar//las kyi brtsam pa phun sum tshogs//rim pa bzhin du brtsams nas kyang //maN+Dal 'dom gang gru bzhi
121b1(rgyud): la 'khor ma bani yi thig tA byung ba//mu khyud phyi rim gru chad bzhi//de nas sgo khyams dmar por bya//kun b+h+yo phyi rimI lag chu hA'i//mi ri 'bar bas gti thag gcang //dbus shar lho zla gam bre//ban+d+ha dpa Sh+ra
121b2(rgyud): yab yum dgod//'khor lo bzhi la rigs bzhir ldan//bar khyams gnyis la gnas yul rnams//zla gom thig ler ldan par bya//sgo khyam sgo bzhi zla gam bcas//phyi khyams leg chu tre yi me/
121b3(rgyud): ye khro bo thig ler bcas//du khyod rgyan gyi kun brgyan bya//ting 'dzin rdzogs dang dngos grub dang //'jug pa dbang skur dngos grub rnams//gnas gsung la sogs rdzogs par bya//zhes gsungaso//
121b4(rgyud): rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las 'khor lo dbang sgyur gyi sgrub lugs kyi luste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o///de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje dam pa des 'di
121b5(rgyud): skad ces bka' stsal to//'dus pa chen po'i tshogs chos thams cad ni bdud rtsi sman gyi rango bzhin du shes par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na//'di ltar snang ba'i chos thams cad kyi don rtogs na ni 'tsho ba
121b6(rgyud): nyid kyi rtse yin//ma rtogs na ni 'chi ba 'khor ba'i dug yin///de bas na chas 'di dag thams cad bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du shes par bya'o//de ltar shes nas kun rdzo/
121b7(rgyud): du 'di ltar bsgrub par bya'o//ji bzhin 'byung ldan bde sbyar nas//ma trang khog pa'i snying ka ru//mdom gang ched dang 'thun pa la//rtsibs brgyad 'bar ba'i khor lor gdang //me yi 'od
122a1(rgyud): bskor bar bya//rdo rje rabs bskor ba yi//mtha' ma blo khyud 'bar bar bya//dbus rin tshon zur brgyad bya//deng ni phyag rgya 'bar bar dragod//lang+ka bsgral ba'i gnas mchog 'drir/
122a2(rgyud): rul pa can gyi tshogs 'dus te//rak+Sha 'joms pa'i mthu chen kun//srid pa gsum ril 'dir sgrol ba'o//dus bzhi mchod pa'i ngam rdzos kyis//de dag ji ltar reg par mchod//dus bzhi bcud smin/
122a3(rgyud): snying po yis//dngos grub chen po'i rjes bya//phyogs bzhi dbus kyi rdzas chen rnams//rma du byung ba'i ral pa can//'byung ba lnga la dbang bsgyur mdzad//'byung ba lnga yi cho 'phrul sgrub//dpyir//
122a4(rgyud): chu ston me dgun sa ste//dpyid rlung na mkha' gsang bar sbyar//cho 'phrul de la dbang thob nas//de dag ral ba can la bsgrub//ting 'dzin rnam pa lnga gsal bas//'byung lnga las byung sha
122a5(rgyud): rigs lnga//khyi sha ba lang rta sha dang //bya dang ri dgas sna tshogs ni//rdzu 'phrul shugasu sgrub pa'i rdzas//bsgrub pa'i rdzas tshan 'byung chen lnga//'jig rten kun la dbang bsgyur ba'i//de
122a6(rgyud): ltar rdzas rnams 'byor pa dang //ting 'dzin sgom dang bsgrub pa dang //thams cad gong dang 'thun sbyar nas//'jug dang dngos grub dbang chen rnams//ci rigs par ni bde bar sbyar//zhes
122a7(rgyud): gsungaso//bdud rtsi rang byung dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i mdo bshad pa'o//de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsung so//'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa//gzhon yang bdud
122b1(rgyud): na du ni//dong ma bshin du lags sgyur nus//maN+Dal tshad dang 'dun pa la//bad+ma dang za 'od kyi ma /phyi ma zla dam par ba ni//rdo rje 'bar byas mdzes pas paskor//me lce 'bar pa'i/
122b2(rgyud): byeng ba ni//nAgs tha 'di bri bar byo// chen go par phreng ba sna na//baN+Di lce la~M bai skor bar bya//blo bani don chen yang sa bya//byA m+b+hi ba bye'i rtswa bkod na//dbu sug ser por su med la/rang
122b3(rgyud): chen lakhong panan+da DI myur//shid du shes khor sul 'asgreng la//rin chen mdzad sngagasal bar spyod //lho dri na chen sul ma sa lo//don chen lo 'di rgyas pasmra sbyar//nub tu rgya bar zabs /
122b4(rgyud): bzhin mtshams rin chen 'byung ba ny-i k+Sha rA/byung du skye bi d+ha drAmA la//gtsug te ri can 'du bzhi n+yai swA//rtsa ba d+hA ni phyogs phyogs skyed//sgo lnga'i gtsu ba rig su sna //da nas shang
122b5(rgyud): dud ka ko la dang du //'dza ta ba la kha dr-in mo//lci pog dkar gis rim par sbyor//de bzhin gong gi rim gro bzhin//a ru ro dang ga pur dang //zur bum pad+ma li gtung //de nar sa yAn rnams//
122b6(rgyud): rishes dang kha dog dang //las dang 'thun par sbyar bAr bya//sa bon lnga ni rim par sbyar//dpal dang ldan pa'i snod nang du//yab lum snying po ma bzhin bye//dbus dang pad+ma lce la dgod//gnas yul
122b7(rgyud): la so mdzes tha gzhag/dur khrod rdzas dang kro shis rjes//'byor pa'i yo byad thams cad bshams//de nas byin phab dang grub gsol//thams cad rnam par sbyar bar bya//dam pa de nyid gtsang /
123a1(rgyud): chan gyi//rigs brgya rigs lnga rigs gtsigs//thams cad sbyang ba'i mchog tu bya//de nas tshul bu sbyang ba na//bsal bsngo bsdu dang dbye ba dang //khrus bya ba dang bshag pa dang //yon tan
123a2(rgyud): brjod dang byin dpab bya//de nas skad cig thang cig gam//zhag cig dag gis sbyar bar bya//rtags dag byung na der 'byings pa'o//phyed ma'i mchog tu sbyar ba ni//snod kyi sman rnams shes rab mas bsdus te
123a3(rgyud): btag pa'i cho ga yang //yum gyis bzung zhing yab kyis btag/rigs 'dzin rtsal can dbab cing drang //so so las kyi sngags brjod cing //gtan go tun thabs dang shes rab ste//sman nyid byang chub sems
123a4(rgyud): sbyar//rdo rje glu 'di lha mos blangs//kun tu bzang me'i gzhal ya su//thabs dang shes rab ldan pa na//'khor ba bdud rtsi sman du sbyar//ye shes lnga ru gsal ba las//'bras bu sku gsung thugasu rdzogs
123a5(rgyud): 'chi med bdud rtsis gcod rnying sbyang //mtshan ma btag phyir gcal nas ni//rdo rje dang ldan kha sbyor blugs//kha dog rigs lnga'i ras kyis le kri//rdo rje dbang gi rgyu yis gdab//rdo rdo sngags kyis gzung
123a6(rgyud): kyis gdags//dpal chen sku lhor mnga' gsol te//ye shes lnga yi dbang bskur bya//paN+Da la dag tu dgod par bya//kun gyis bskor zhing dngos grub dbab//rtsi dang sman gyis bdag po dang //rtags
123a7(rgyud): ldan rigs 'dzin phra mo dag/rol mo cha byad mang pos bsten//bsgrub pa 'bru mchog gtams pas dgang //dkra shis gos kyis rgyas par klub//gzus thag gnyer can rig su dbul//ting 'dzin
123b1(rgyud): mo yos rnam par sbyang //rtags chen lda ni gang byung yang //mAr ti dngos grub blang bar bya'o//bdud rtsi sgra las drangs nas no//dang ldan pad+ma ldan pa ru//thams cad bdud rtsir su ma ya//mkha' klung yangs par //
123b2(rgyud): bde chen rdzogs//rang nyid bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs//gzhanas bsgrub pa ci yang med//'jug pa la sogs thams cad kyang //tshul bzhin du ni rgyas par bya//zhes gsung so//bdud rtsi phye ma'i bsgrub pa rnam pa
123b3(rgyud): bshad pa'o//de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs//'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa//thams cad 'drar sbyar nas kyang //maN+Dal 'khor lo brtsibs brgyad pa//phyag rgya'i lha rnams rdzogs
123b4(rgyud): byas nas//sman sbrang btags btsags btsal nas kyang //spang chang 'o mas gong bur bya//bse phor mtshan ldan nang du bzhag/logs par kha sbyar ngas kyis dki//gong ma bzhin du kun sbyar nas//dngos grub
123b5(rgyud): mchog rnams bdag gis bya//zhes gsung so//bdud rtsi ri lu'i cho ga rnam par bshad pa'o//de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsung so//'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa//skye ma'i tshig
123b6(rgyud): 'di lta ste//thams cad gong ma bzhin sbyar nas//mtshan ma gsal po 'byung ba dang //phye mchu tshags nang nas dbyung //bye ma'i mchog tu gyur pa dang //phye ma'i rgyal mo de dag ni//bos por kho sbyar nang du
123b7(rgyud): thugs//rgyas btab byin brlabs dbang bskur nas//bzlas brjod 'phro 'u rgyun mi chad//sbrang chang rgya chang bu ram tshang //rgun chang 'o ma la sogs pa//bcud gi khu ba thams cad sbyar//rin chen ga'u
124a1(rgyud): mtshan ldan du//blugs te /bskur rgyas btab nas//'phro 'du bzlas brjod grong ma bzhin//byas te mtshan ma byung ba dang //dngos grub chen po blang bar bya//phye ma'i bsgrub rdzas de dag ni//
124a2(rgyud): cha lnga dag tu dgas nas kyang //rnal 'byor so so'i tshe rnams las//ci ran tsam gyis cha gcig dang //sbyar tshong cha ldang bgos pa nas//rnal 'byor so so'i cha rnams lnga//sbyar te dngos grub rten du bya bla
124a3(rgyud): bong dra ni/bsku rangs shing gter ma /zla ba nyi sa seMs byas/ga'i mad pad 'bru bar 'gyur zlab b+hU sngond kyi bskol pa dag las thar//zla bzhi pan chad gang zag/zas drang ma 'dres brtson bsgrubs na//gzhan gyi
124a4(rgyud): nad rnams 'joms par nus//drug dang bdun dang brgyad rnams la//bdud rtsi bcud kyis 'tsho bar 'gyur//dgu dang bcu la zag pa zad//bcug rigs 'dzin na mkhar 'phur//zhes gsung so//
124a5(rgyud): bdud rtsi skyo ma'i bsgrub pa rnam par bshad pa'o//de nas yang sems dpe'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsung so//'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa//rdo rje rig 'dzin rtsal lnga'i zad//'di gu'i cho ga chen po ni/
124a6(rgyud): 'di ltar khong du chud par bya//sbrang rtsi bu ramarkun 'brum rnams//lo yi 'tsho bar sbyar nas kyang //kha dog mtshan ldan dmar po'i ba//lo ye 'tsho bar gzung zhing bsrel//sman gyi rgyal mor ma mnye bas//
124a7(rgyud): rgyun tu gsos po'i 'o ma'o//rigs 'dzin zas kyis mchog tu 'gyur//bdud rtsi rgyal mo rab mnye ba//phye ma'i mchog tu byas nas kyang //le yi 'tsho ba'i sbyar byas te//su si mthong ba'i sa phyogasu//
124b1(rgyud): brdzus de dag bkram nas kyang //bdud rtsi bsgrub pa de bzhin b+ha//dubu blab 'i tshod rnams la//'byub rdzas de dag thams cad kyang //ba yi'om+ba pA lte gur gyur//chu res skyed cing bza' bar bya ma
124b2(rgyud): ston pas mi khyab//zag pa zad nas na mkhare 'phro zhes gsung so//bdud rtsi lde gu'i bsgrub pa rnam par bshad pa'o//de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsung so//'dus pa chen po'i rna
124b3(rgyud): 'byor pa/'di yang grong ma ltar byas te//de dang mi thun bsgrub rdzas rnams//bdud bi rtsi r+ya 'gyur ba'i sman rnams kun//thams cad thams cad bsdu bar bya//til chen la sogs zhun gyi mchog/
124b4(rgyud): thams cad bsdus shing sbyar byas nas//gnas kyang gong mo bzhin btsal te//bdud rtsi bkra/ma nas bsgrub par bya//'gro 'du bzlas brjod rgyun mi gcad//grub pa'i rdzasu gyur pa dang //sman rnams
124b5(rgyud): phye mar btags par bya//de dag phye mar gyur pa dang //zhun chen dag drang sbyor bar bye//sbyor ba'i cho ga rdzogs pa dang //dngos grub mchog ni blang bar bya//gzhan nam gzhan gyi sde pa dang //lo
124b6(rgyud): yis pa shugs te 'phrang mi bya//'tsho ba bdud rtsi zhun gyis sbyar//bdud rtsi grub pa'i rtags che ni//ba su langs dang gzi mdangs 'bar //kham gyi zos bral bde bar 'tsho/shes rab gsal
124b7(rgyud): zhing thogs pa med//dag pa zad nas rnam pa 'gri/zhes gsung ngo //rjin rtsi sbyin chen gyi bsgrub pa bshad pa'o//de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje ngas 'di skad ces gsung so//dus pa chen
125a1(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa//rlon pa'i rdzas la sman bsgrub na//thams cad gong ma bzhin sbyar nas//maN+Dal thig le lnga pa la//bkra shrIs dang ldan lnga bzhag nas//gtso bo lnga dang 'bras bu lnga//
125a2(rgyud): rlon par bkod nas yi ger spyong //ting 'dzin bzlas pa'i me spar bas//dang po ro 'byung skams po dang //de nas btags btsigs gong ma bzhin//sbyar nas rigs kyis bsnyen pas sbyang //des na
125a3(rgyud): mtshan ma byung ba dang //de bzhin gong ltar cir bder spyad//ces gsungaso//bdud rtsi rlon sbyor gyi sgrub pa bshad pa'o//rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las bdud rtsi
125a4(rgyud): sman gyi bsgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o////de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje chen po des bsgrub pa thams cad kyi snying po gsang chen thugs kyi bsgrub pa zhes bya ba 'di bshad //'dus pa
125a5(rgyud): chen po'i rnal 'byor pa thams cad ni dbyingasu shes par bya ba ste/'khor ba'i chos thams cad ni dbyingasu 'dus la/mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad ni ye shesu 'duso//de gi nyi/
125a6(rgyud): med pa ni chos nyid byang chub sems kyi bde ba chen por 'dus par shes par gyis shig/de bas na chos thams cad ni thugs ye shes kyi rang bzhin du 'dus te gnyi su medo//de ltar na kun rdzog
125a7(rgyud): tu'adi ltar rig par bya ste/gnyi su med pa'i don la 'jug par bya'o//'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa//dam pa'i don gyi chos rnams kun//thams cad rang gi sems la rdzogs//kun rdzo'i
125b1(rgyud): chos rnams gang yin pa//lus dang ngag la rdzogs par bshad//dasngan rgyas 'di thams cad kyang //rtsa ba rang la rdzogs pa s+ho//'di dag bsgrub pa'i thabs mchog kyang //rnam par rtog pa'i rdul gsal nas//bsgru
125b2(rgyud): pa'i rgyal po yab yum gnyis//don la mkhas par byas nas nI//so'i thugs la thig le dag/zla gam dkar dmar gdab par bya//de yi rdzas mchog chen po yang //thabs kyi ga bur chen po dang //shes rab
125b3(rgyud): gsang ba'i rgyun gnyis//dkar dmar zla ga ma chen por bya//yab kyi thugs kar dkar po la//thig la kha ni mar lta ba'o//yum gyi thugs kar dmar po la//thig le kha ni yang lta ba'o//sab kyi thig le'i dbus
125b4(rgyud): ni dpal be'u dbus nyi ma bri//dbus oM gsal nang du hUM//yum gyi thig le'i dbusu ni//pad+ma dbus zla ba bri//dbus a gsal nang du hUM//de ltar gsal bar gyur pa na//kun tu bzang po yab yum du//g+ha/
125b5(rgyud): med par bskur bar bya//ting 'dzin gsal bar gyur pa dang //rang las byung ba'i bdud rtsi yis//gsang ba gnyis kyi mchod bgra/rang las byung ba'i dngos grub dag/rang nyid la ni bstim par bya//'di ltar
125b6(rgyud): sgrub pa gtsor byed na//bdud rtsi'i yo byad thams cad dang //bcud kyi mchog tu gyur pa rnams//lo yi 'tsho bar sbyar nas kyang //bstan bsgrub yan lag rnam bzhi las//bsnyen pa dag gi dupu ni//grang zag mi
125b7(rgyud): ye zas la brten//de yang lo yi skad cig gam//gnyis dang gsum gyi bar du sbyar//lo yi skad cig bar du ni//bdud rtsi yo byad rnams la brten//de nas lo yi skad cig ni//gcig gam gnyid kyi bar nga
126a1(rgyud): tu//rang las byung ba'i rjes rnams lngas//'phags pa mchod cing rwa kli bza'//des ni dris la gnas par 'gyur//drang po gyur pa phan chad ni//mo'i skad cig thang tshigs//ting
126a2(rgyud): 'dzin zas kyi ro rnyed nas//kham gyi zas dang bral bar 'gyur//drod chen rnam gsum rdzogs nas ni//rtags chen dag ni thob par 'gyur//rtags kyi cho 'phrul 'byung ba ni//rin chen phung po 'dod pa na//
126a3(rgyud): rdo la sogs byas na 'grub//chu dang mkha' la 'gro 'dod na//brtsams pas mi 'bying thogs med 'gro//mi yi phung po 'jil 'dod na//sdig pa'i 'dzub mo byar nas kyang //bden pa'i sgo ba byas pas 'grub
126a4(rgyud): de la sogs pa thams cad nus//rtags thob phan chad sangs rgyas yin zhes gsung so//gsang chen thugs kyi bsgrub pa bshad pa'o//rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i rgyud
126a5(rgyud): las bka' gsang chen 'khor lo'i bsgrub pa'i le'u ste nyir bu rtsa lnga pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rje de rdo rje me glong 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugaso//
126a6(rgyud): de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs thams cad kyis chos thams cad mo'i rang bzhin du snang bar mthong //de nas 'khor rnams kyis shin tu bstod pa//e ma'o sems dpa' che ba che//ting 'dzin chen po snang
126a7(rgyud): 'che//cho 'phrul chen po sna tshogs che//thabs mchog khyod la phyag 'tshalo//chos kun me glong bzhin du snang //me nyid ye shes gsal ba'i glong //'bar 'phro gsal bar gyur pas ni//mun
126b1(rgyud): gsal dngos po thams cad bsregs//bde chen dbyingasu kun rdzogs par//dpa' khyod kyis mdzad pa lags//thugs rje chen pa a la la//don grub chen po a la la//sgeg pa chen po a la la//'jigs byed che
126b2(rgyud): po a la la//dbyes pa chen po a la la//dregs pa chen po a la la//dpa'o khyod kyis byin rlabs kyis//bdag cag rnams la bshad pa shod//me yi rang bzhin chen po dag/bdag cag rnams lo bsha/
126b3(rgyud): par gsol//zhes gsol ba btab pa las//sems dpa'i rdo rjes dbyes te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa//rdo rje ma yi rang bzhin dag/bshad kyis khyed rnams gus pa
126b4(rgyud): nyon//rdo rje me yi las mchog 'das/rnal 'byor thab su bde sbyar bas//rgyal ba kun mnyes kun bsrog skongs//don grub las kyi mchog tu bshad//skye med rnam dag hom khung du//chos can skye ba'i
126b5(rgyud): yam shing la//spros med byang chub ye shes mos//mtshan mo'i bag chags bsregs spangs tham//rnam dag b+ha ga'i ha ma khung du//chags pa'i yam shing spungs pa la//bde chen byang chub me spar te/
126b6(rgyud): 'khor ba'i dngos po bsregs sbyangs thim//dpal chen zhal gyi hom khung du//nyon mongaso lnga yi yam shing la/ye shes lnga yi me sbar te//gzung 'dzin rdzas rnams bsregs sbyangs thim//snang srid na ma'i
126b7(rgyud): ham khung du//'byung ba ba ni yo yam shing pa//phyag rgya'i tshogs kyi mo sbar to//snang srid dngos po bsegs sbyangs thim//las bzhi so'i khyad par gyis//phyogs dang khe dog dbyings dang rdzani//ji ltar yin/
127a1(rgyud): /pa de ltar sbyar//shar lho nub byang dkar ser dmar//mthing ka nag po thal mdog sbyar//zlum po pad+ma le'u rtse zhi//'khor lo gru bzhi zur brgyad rgyas//zla gam gru chad gzhu dbyings dang /
127a2(rgyud): grub gsum b+ha ga kha mngon sbyor//sum brtsegs mdangs dang ri mor mdzes//las kyi yam shing rdzas kyis rgyas//ye shes rdo rje'i las rgyud ldan//bla ma gsum gyis thabs mchog sbyar//dag bI
127a3(rgyud): mtha' 'dzin nyis mchog 'dzin//rdo rje gsang ba'i zla bro glu ma rdzo ba gsang ba dus ni skyod//rdul gyi sngon pa skyo//gsang ba las kyi rgyud ldan pas//ba shar gda' zhi ba'i lha rgyud dang //rgyus dang dbang po shar rgyud//
127a4(rgyud): bshar bas//lha dang sngags dang phyag rgya dang //de bzhin rgyud dang 'byor par bya//rigs kyi lha rgyud lha rnams ni//so'i rigasu bshar gdab ste//glong yangs 'khyil pa'i hom khung du//dam rdzas
127a5(rgyud): bdud rtsi 'bar ba yis//skyeng dang thob phyir bsreb byar 'os//bsreg rdzas skye ba'i chos yin to//skye bar snang ba'i chos thams cad//'dir ni dngos po bzhin snang te//chos can rkyen dang 'byung nas dang /
127a6(rgyud): /rang bzhin nyid las cho 'phrul ni//skye ba nyid du 'dod pa yin//'di ni skye ba'i chos can te//rang byung sreg rdzas rang zhir thim//nyon mongs lnga yi dam rdzas dag/ye shes lnga yi glong du dbul//phung po
127a7(rgyud): lnga yi dam rdzas rnams//thabs mchog yab lnga'i sku la bstim//'byung lngas bsdus pa'i bsreg rdzas rnams shes rab yum lnga'i glong du bstab//rnam shes brgyad kyi bsreg rdzas rnams//ye shwe/
127b1(rgyud): gnas kyi ma brgyad//yul gyi dayeng ba rnam pa brgyad//dmigs med dbyis kyi bye brag brgyad//skye bani las kyi bsreg rdzas rnams//rnam thar sgo ba zhi'i blong du jim//thabs mchog la sogs rna ma tshogs
127b2(rgyud): thams cad dag/rdo rje g+hu yis brjod nas kyang //de dag mnyes pa'i mchod pa brtsam//mchod pa thams cad rdzogs pa dang //sgrib byang mi byang don chen rnams//b+ha ba dang ma byu ba don rnams ni//me la mkhas pas rtag
127b3(rgyud): bar byad me sgra gnyis dang kha dog gnyis//'bar tshul gnyis dang dbyings rnam drug/de dag yongasu shes par bya//gal te mtshan ma mi sdug ni//bkra mau shis pa'i rtags yin pas//bsreg sbyang chen po rgyu
127b4(rgyud): par bya/de nas 'dod pa'i rtags byung na//me la 'dod pa'i dngos grub rnams//rnam gsum gang ltar grub pa blang //ro yi rdzas rnams bsreg sbyangs nas//ro la sngags kyi btab nas kyang //shin tu drin
127b5(rgyud): sna tshogs kyis//ro la byug cing bkru bar bya//bdud rtsi zhun chen khu ba yis//ras la byugs pas ro bkris te//ro yi gnas rnams gang yin par//sngogs kyi sbyor ba kun bkod nas//phyag rgya'i mtshan mas gad/
127b6(rgyud): par bya//rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gang dag ni//gzhung yin pa'i phyag rgya rnams//du 'byung ba dang mnyam pa'i//sdong du'i brangs de ltar bya//sdong bu re la lha rnams kyis//ma nor rtse ba'i stong pa dag/ras chen dag
127b7(rgyud): la bris te gdags//ro yi sbyor ba rdzogs pa dang //ra yi phyi shul thams cad la//'khor ba'i bag chags kun bkod//ras sam shing shun shog shog la//'khor ba'i sa bon thams cad dgod//nyon mos
128a1(rgyud): wa dang dug gsum bcas//skye ba'i lAm lha rgyud drug rnams//ming ngam gzugs byas nas ni//gnas gnas dag tu dgod par bya//khams dang skye mched phung po lnga//gzugs/
128a2(rgyud): 'dzin ming du bcas pa rnams//brda'i tshul du bris nas ni//ro rnams khyad par dgod par bya//de nas ro yi phung po de//rten nam glegs sam stegs bu yi//steng du mkhris pas gzhag par bya//thab/
128a3(rgyud): kyi cho ga brtsam pa ni//maN+Dal 'khor khyud tsam zhig la//dkyil 'khor gang dang gang yin pa'i//phyag rgya bzhugs pa'i pho brang dag/thigs yul gcad sor bya//de yi steng du shing brtsigs pa//byi
128a4(rgyud): ni gru ba ni gtams pa la//zur bzhi ka ba bzhis brtan bya//sum rjegs yang thog par khang bcas//mtha' ma shing gis brdzang bar bya//bar khang dag gi glegs ma la//ro yi bzhin phyogs shar du
128a5(rgyud): bstan/ro yi steng gi khyang pa la//ras sam shog sh+log la bris pa'i//phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gsol bar dgod//ro khang glo skar bzhi phye la//thugs rje gzungs thag bzhis btags nas//phyogs bzhi pa/
128a6(rgyud): ma bzhi la dbug/shing gi cho ga rdzogs pa dang //shing gi phyi mtha' stegs bu la//phyag rgya'i lha rnams rim par dgod//stegs bu rdzogs par gyur pa dang //rdo rje las kyi bskos gdab pa//rdo rje rgyal po bA/
128a7(rgyud): la 'khor ba bsreg pa'i mnga' gsol te//ting 'dzin ye shes rtse gcig pas//me yi 'du 'phro rgyun tu bya//rdo rje las kyi kaurma la//las rnams rdzogs pa'i mnga'i gsol te//las kyi phreng ba rdzogs par bya/
128b1(rgyud): rdo rje chen po'i bla ma zhig/ro yi nyes pa'i mtha' bzung nas//las kyi bsags pa'i babrang zhing bshags//rdo rje skabs sbyor bla ma yis//bdud rtsi skabs kyi mchod pa sbreng //rdo rje bro gar glu tshigis//skabs
128b2(rgyud): kyi glu gar mchod pa dang //rol mos blangs te dbul bar bya//rdo rje gnas kyi smon lam ni//skabs dang las kyi 'jug du gdab/rdo rje las kyi ljang 'dzin pas//rtsa brgyad las kyis grangs bzung ste/
128b3(rgyud): dkar byed bla ma'i phyag du dbul//ro yi las ngan ltang 'dzin pas//grangs med grangasu bzung nas ni//mtshan ma nag po byang bu dag/ye shes me yi blong du bsreg/me yis sbyor ba'i cho ga bya//me yi
128b4(rgyud): lha ni gang yin pa//me yi sangs rgyas snang mtha' yas//me yi lha mo gos dkar ma//rgyal ba kun gyi 'od mchog ste//'byung ba me la dbang sgyur zhing //thams cad kun gyi drod bdag yin//srid gsuM
128b5(rgyud): bsreg par zhal gyis gzhes//'khor ba'i sreg pa'i 'phrin las la//thug de dbang gis yang mi 'da'//ma yi cho ga thams cad ni//yum chen dkar mo nyid la bsgo//de nas cho ga kun rdzogs nas//ro yi//
128b6(rgyud): bsgrib pa byang ma byang //me yi dngos grub thob mi thob//me las mkhas pas gang bzhin brtang//mtshan ma mi sdug byung ba na//bsreg sbyang cho ga rgya cher bya//gal te mgun dngos grub thob//ro yi thal ba chen
128b7(rgyud): po 'ad btags nas thal ba'i bdud brtsir bsgrig/des ni bsod nams chen po ni//dpag tu med pa thob par 'gyur zhes gsungaso//rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las rdo//
129a1(rgyud): rna ma'i chog bsgrub pa'i le'u b+ha nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o////de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje dam pa des dkyil 'khor thams cad byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje sngags kyi tshig 'ang
129a2(rgyud): gsung so////sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA sh+lo he ru badz+ra tsaN+Da/sarba duSh+TA na saM shrI he ru ka ta ka ha na pa tsa hUM hUM/sa sa sa sa sa ma ya sa nu ne sa no ra ba ra badz+ra gar+b+ha/rat+na gar+b+ha/pad+ma gar+b+ha/karma ga d+ha/mai triHn+ta/ru/

129b3(rgyud): kha kha/kha kha kha kha kha kha kha/muM muM muM muM muM muM muM/muM muM muM muM muM muM muM/muM muM muM muM muM muM muM/muM muM muM muM muM muM muM/ba ba ba ba ba ba ba/dz+re rje rdo rje dz+ra dz+ra dz+re dz+ra/gau ri/tsau ri/pra mo ha/be tA li/g+hasma ri/puH

129b5(rgyud): ts+tshe haM sa myed tso \u0f7f/au shib+h+yAM ka gai d+hAm+bi ya d+d+hiH/babab pa bab brab bag/drA dz+yo d+hi d+hi d+he d+hi d+he d+he d+hi/kr-i kro Takr-i ka? kr-i kr-ikl-i k+kokr-i/r+N+Na d+had+hA d+har+d+had+hAd+hA d+hAd+had+hA/d+h+r-id+b+had+hId+h+r-id+h+r-it+s+yat+sAd+hId+hA/

130a1(rgyud): 9/sa du/rmya.A ta/ dun namatshan rtan //21ga /shAt+tag sa d+hA
130a2(rgyud): swa ma ya ho/i da nA da na ra kaM/u tsi ra sa mra yaM phaT/badz+ra sa ma ya a be sha A a/zhes gsungs pas las kyi 'dra bo'i cho ga zhes thams cad shin tu 'bar zhing rgyas par gyur to//rgyud
130a3(rgyud): kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje dkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las rdo rje gsang sngags kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o////de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des sgyur ba phyag rgya'i le'u 'di rgya cher
130a4(rgyud): bsrung so//rnal 'byor mchog lag gnyis la//nyi zla 'bar ba le ng+ga ra ni//a dang pad+ma gnyis gsal te//thabs dang shes rab gnyis med sbyar//mnyam po'i tshul gyis gnas pa la//
130a5(rgyud): me'i steng du A nyid gzhag/bya ba thams cad bral ba'i rgya//a dang ma yi 'bru bcu rnams//'phro 'du bya zhing kun tu bsgyur//g.yasu 'khyil zhing g.yon du 'khyud//'di ni chu 'phrul 'byung
130a6(rgyud): rgyu uM dang ma yi 'bru rnam //sbyor bcangs te myu gur bya/shin tu bstod kun tu bsgyur/'di ni snying por gyur pa'i rgyu//ma yi sbyin pa ga tshul ye//mi yis thams cad sgru'i byed do//
130a7(rgyud): 'di ni chad med chen po'o//phul sboms pa'i phyag rgya mo no//ma nyid khrag 'dreg po yi snod //a nyid so phreng mche bar sbyor//'di ni thadri rol pa yi//'jigs tshul ston pa'i phyag rgya mo//e dang /
130b1(rgyud): gnyis rting sbyar te//ser 'phrong mche ba'i tshul gyis ni//shin tu kha glal pa yi tshul//'di ni 'jigs byed chen po'i rgyu//ma yis bzung ste 'thanas ni//a yis gdengs shing 'joms byed pa/
130b2(rgyud): byed chen po'i phyag rgya yin//ma dang A yis mgo 'jug nas//bzung ba'i tshul du byas nas ni//kha yis 'drad cing 'phen byed pa//za byed chen po'i phyag rgya yis//a dang ma yis shes rab las//
130b3(rgyud): g.yon tshul gyis bsgyur byas te//sau ji ltar yin thabs sbyar//gnas dang yul gyi gtan tshig su//bsgyur ba gar gyi phyag rgyar bshad//dpa'o gdan la gzhengs nas ni//phyogs mtshams
130b4(rgyud): kun tu bltas byas nas//shin tu 'gying zhing brjid par byed//a dang ma yis 'bru rnams ni//sor brdabs nas bskur brten bya//bgying ba'i tshul gyi spyad byas nas/stagi stabs kyis kun tu bskor//de nas rmun/
130b5(rgyud): bya stabs kyis ni//gong ma bzhin du bskor bar bya//de bzhin rus sbrul gzig dang stog/sbyang gi seng+ge dom stabs dang //phog chen nged kyi stabs kyis ni//tha~Md thams cad bskor bar bya//de bzhin 'dab chabs
130b6(rgyud): tha~Md kyis//'dza tshul stabs rnams rdzogs byas nas//dkyil 'khor thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur//zhes gsung so//rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje dkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las sgyur ba phyag rgya'i
130b7(rgyud): ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o////de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje des mchod pa dam pa gsang ba'i la'u 'di gsungs//hU~M'i bying ba chen po na mkha' ni//'byung ba chen po lnga yi mdzod//namakha'i las ni 'dod
131a1(rgyud): 'dod pa'i mchod pa 'byung gyur cig/zla rgyas la sogs snying po mchog/ma sa la sogs rnam lnga'i rdzas//me tog la sogs sngon phreng //sna tshogs mchod pa 'byung gyur cig/mi mo//
131a2(rgyud): rnams kyi reg bya mchog/'khril 'khyud sbyar ba'i gzungs chen ma//dbang po sbyor ba'i dgyes mcho de//bde ba'i mchod pas tshim gyur cig/rdo rje rol pas tshogs mchog 'di//mchod sprin kun
131a3(rgyud): du rgyas gyur cig/dug gsum brtsegs pa'i ri bo 'di//sku gsung thugs kyi glong du bstabs//dug lnga rol pa'i tshogs mchog 'di//ye shes lnga'i nang du thim//gzung 'dzin rtog pa'i mtshan ma
131a4(rgyud): 'di dbyings dang ye shes glong du thim//'khor ba mtshan ma'i chos can 'ang //chos nyid dbyings kyi ngang du thim//phung po tshogs kyi yan lag 'di//rnam grol phung po lnga ru thim//'byung
131a5(rgyud): chen rgyu yi mtshan ma 'di//mkha' glong 'bar ba lnga ru thim//rol pa chen po mchod sbyin la//rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs rnams rol//bla med bstan 'gan mchod pa 'di//sngon chad rgyal bas
131a6(rgyud): bgrod pa'i lam//dug gsum gting nas gsod pa'i thabs//sngon gyi thugs dam bzhin du bzhes//'chi med bdud rtsi g.yung drung chu//ro yi khams rnams slong bar byed//dugi phung po 'dzi/
131a7(rgyud): byed pa//waM mchog sman gyi mchod par bzhes//zhes mchod pa'i tshogs rnams ling long phyed par byang bas rgyal ba rgya mtsho tshogs long spyodas mnyes par gyur to//rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po
131b1(rgyud): rdo rje dkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las mchod pa dam pa gsang ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o////de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje des rdo rje klu'i le ru 'di gsung so//lI da ni rdo rje rnal 'byor rnams//
131b2(rgyud): bsnyen par snang ba'i dbang thob nas//bsgom dbyangs yi ge 'bru brgyad spro//yi ge klu yi rgyun yin te//glu yi yi ge bcu drug las//yi ge yan lag bsgyur bsdebs nas//glu yi bye brag bas mi khyab//dang por
131b3(rgyud): glu yi don byung ba//oM gyis glu rnams rab tu 'dren//oM yang a yi cho 'phrul to//a ni chos kyi yi ge yin//a las oM byung rgyal ba'i thugs//rgyal ba chos kyi dbyings las byung //a las aM byung gsu/
131b4(rgyud): gi mchog/gsung las klu yi yan lag 'byung //dbyangs kyi yan lag drug cur grags//glu yi yon tan bas mi khyab//sngon gyi rgyal ba glu yis grub//rigs 'dzin rdo rje glu yis 'dren//rnal 'byor/
131b5(rgyud): dbang phyug glu yis 'grub//bstan pa rgya mtsho glu yis spel//srid pa'i bu ma kr-i yis brten//bdud dang srin po klu yis 'dul//dngos grub rgya mtsho glu yis 'bebs//chos nyid dbyings kyi glong dkyil nas//dpa'
131b6(rgyud): /be'u nyi me dgu shar bas//rnam thar sgo bzhi rab gsapa yang //ma rig mun gnag 'thibs pa yis//bsgribs par rig pa'i sgo mo bye//'khor ba'i mur gnag glong rum na//byang chub sems kyi zla shwar bA//
131b7(rgyud): mun gsul rnam thar sgo bzhir snang //rin chen 'bar ba'i nyi ma rnams//dpal chen thugs las 'od shar bas//bag chags sprin mthongs bye ba ru//rnal dpyor thugs kar zer bab pas//mun 'asal rig ni/
132a1(rgyud): sgo phye ste//rnal 'byor don la 'jug par bya//rig pa thugs kyi dkyil 'khar nas//ru mu'i 'od zer sgo phye nas//spros pas cho 'phrul sna tshogs 'byung //srid pa gsum gyi bya
132a2(rgyud): drag byed//'khor ba'i rgya mtsho gting nas skems//nyon mongs rgyu drug gnas nas sgo ba//dug gsum rtsa ba brtsad nas gcod//bdud dang srin po gdug pa 'dul//byin brlabs dngos grub char ltar
132a3(rgyud): 'bebs//ji ltar dbang po'i sgo phye nas//'dzum mdangs gsal bar 'byung ba ltar//dpal be'u thugs kyi sgo phye bas//ru lu'i 'od zer yig 'bru shar//'thing nag ser nag dmar nag ljang //smug nag
132a4(rgyud): 'drar ba'i yig 'bru rnams//yi ge rigs kyi drang bar drang //rgyangs kyis bsgrub dang dkar gyi dbab//bsten kos nye bar gyur pa la//'jim gos mngon sum gsal bar bya//'bar klas
132a5(rgyud): gnyisu med pa la//'dren kos yi ge'i phreng ba drung //de nyid la ni glu drug ste//sha ta ba dang gar ta ba//tsang ka de'u dang pad ka deru//phreng ba dang dung de ba//glu yi yan lag sum brgyas ni//rgyal
132a6(rgyud): pa mnyes bya'i mchog tu 'gyur//glu yi rgyal po 'di drug gis//don grub yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur//sha ta pa yi glu blangs pas//gdug byed thams cad smra yang skong //gar ta ba'i glu blangs
132a7(rgyud): pas gnod byed thams cad rdul du rlog/cang ka dwe'u yi glu blangs pas//'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor me ltar mchod//paMng ka de'u yi glu blangs pas//drag po gtum po lha nar 'gyur//phreng ba'i
132b1(rgyud): b+hUblangs byas//sprul pa'atsha 'phrul thams cad 'gyed//drang ba yo zla blangs pas//srid pa'i bu mo dbang du sdud//m-i 'bru dgu'i rang shin la//phyag rgya po 'khor byam sa rlung rdzogs// zhin
132b2(rgyud): 'khyer lo ma khyung bcas//rgyams dang khyu gas pa pa'o//gled pa mtshadze yod snang thugs kyang //thams ca sa kyi rkye rdo rdzogs//mi sa rgyal btsun dang 'phral//'khor lo'os la ta ba //seM
132b3(rgyud): dmigs pa thams cad 'grub//chags ming lhun grub ngan pa na//rnam bzhi las kyi khyang par yang //bya ba med par don du 'gyur//yi ge gsang ba'i 'gro 'du yis//rgyal ba dang 'o thams ca
132b4(rgyud): dekun yi ges rnam sprul yang //rang bzhin des ma chos kyi si//mi 'phru tsha bral sa//dam pa cher sna tshogs 'byung //de bzhin spyi'i ba'i bung shing bsreg//gti mug
132b5(rgyud): mun sel ye shes 'bar//rig pa'i nyi ma gsal bar 'beb so//bdag nyid dpal chen 'bar ba'i thugs//tsit+ta dpal be'u zur brgyad 'bar//rin chen yig 'bru brgyad gsal//dpal chen rin
132b6(rgyud): chen 'dar ba'i thugs//dpal beru smug po zur brgyad las//gser gyi nyi ma dgu shar ba/'od zer ru lu yig 'bru brgyad//rdo rje 'bar po'i drung sgrom du//shin tu 'bar 'gro khrug byas te//spros pas
132b7(rgyud): rnal 'byor dang phyug/nas gas su grong bar bya//gau ra tsan 'i gzhas yasa?//san rnam tsam gyis rgya khyod la//gsor gyi nya mi ge 'u cu/shing po kyil na yig 'khrung dgu/zhes la ba'i da kyi danal
133a1(rgyud): khang /dngos po'i bag chags kun bsregs te//sems ni pra ser chu zhun ma bzhin//ltem la 'chor zhing 'od 'bar ba//rtsal las gyur pa'i zla dkyil 'khor//nyi ma stong na
133a2(rgyud): dpal be'u 'bar de la ru lu 'phro zhing 'du//dpal be'u tsit+ta'i dkyil 'khor 'di//yig 'bru 'bar ba'i ga'ur gsal//pad+mo 'bar ba yi ga'u 'di//yi ge 'phreng ba 'khyil ba'i gnas//dper na
133a3(rgyud): me tog 'bru ba las//bcud len bung bas bcud blangs te//rtsi yi bur bu sog pa ltar//dpal be'u thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas//rin chen 'od kyi me tog 'bar//ru lu'i yig 'bru bcud kyis
133a4(rgyud): rgyas//rnal 'byor sems las byas pa yi//bcud 'byin bung ba mang po 'phro//phar ldings yi ge'i bcud phyung nas//tshur ldings sems kyi ga'ur bstims//dang po shel gyi kha dog la//shin tu
133a5(rgyud): gsal zhing 'tshor 'bar ba//gnas dgu dag tu zla ba yi//thig le dkyil gyi dpal be'u la//'bru bkod gsal bar gyur pa dang //shel gyi bung ba mang po ngag/khyung chen ldings pa'i bong tshong tsam
133a6(rgyud): phar ldings bcud phyung tshur gsibs pas//yi 'bru ye shes me 'bar bas//bag chags bud shing phung po 'asregs//phar spyod thugs rjes sa la bskul//ji ltar nyi gzer tshe tsha ltar//rgyun mi 'a
133a7(rgyud): par rtsa gcig 'bar//bar du byi ru'i kha dog la//gong ma bzhin du bkod gang la la//byi ru bung ba mang po dang //gong ma bzhin du 'phur lding pas//bcud phyung bstim zhing slar la 'phro//ji ltar me
133b1(rgyud): mgul 'khor tshul du//dpal be'u sgrub po'i glong du bstim//kun gyi tha mar bsdu ba ni//bkod pa'i gong ma thams ca kun/mthing nag 'bar ba bsgyur nas ni//khyung chen gzan la 'dzums chod tsam//hAs
133b2(rgyud): byin cing phan tshun ldings//ru lu bcud 'byin dngos grub rlob//dran pa'i dkyil nas dza phyung ste//lcag kyu 'bar ba gre'ur bcas//dpal be'u'i dkyil na spungs pa yis//ru lu rin chen phung po dag bsdung
133b3(rgyud): shing drangs te gan su bstim//'bab pa'i shugs sam byin brlabs ni//mtsho la ser chen 'dril ltaro//'di ltar yi ger sbyar ba'i tshe//rnal 'byor nyag cig ma yin gyis//lha mchog dbyings nas zhu ba pa yA/
133b4(rgyud): chos nyid ngang du mi dmigs kyang //rnal 'byor mchog bskul ba'i tshe//thugs rje chags pa'i mdangs phyung nas//srog brtsol dran rig gsung gsung ltar//'gur chu yan lag 'gul 'gu ltar//rdo rje yi ge
133b5(rgyud): 'bru 'bar ltar//gug skyes glang kor tshig par phyin//ra ri khal khol sgrib med par//ye shes don la mkhyen rig rgyas//de lta mod kyang 'dul dbang gyis//rgyal ba bskul ba'i sa la bzhes//rnal 'byor gas//
133b6(rgyud): ba'i cho ga byed//lha dang gcig tu bya ba'i phyir//bzlas brjod grangs dang bsnyen pa dang //sbyor bas don la nye bar 'gyur//'di ltar stor ba'i dus dag na//byin rlabs phebs sam nye ba yi//rtags sam drod/
133b7(rgyud): dam mtshan ma ni//rnal 'byor nyid dang po sgrub rdzas dang //yod mthong sgra thos kun la 'byung //lus kyi drod dang rmi lam dang //sems kyi rtag su gsal ba dang //dbugs dag la yang nges par 'gyur//
134a1(rgyud): shing bal lta bur yang ba dang //ma bde'i gnod pa bral ba yin//rigs la ting 'dzin gsal ba dag/rmi lam du yang mos par 'gyur//dang zhing dga' la mgu ba skye//gdung ba'i bya
134a2(rgyud): chub sems skyes shing //ngo mtshar skyes pa de nyid//'gyur ba'i dbugs la dbang thob ste//dgag dang dbyung ba ji lta ba'o//rdzas ni 'bar dang 'phar ba dang //dri dang 'od 'thung ro mchog ste//ma zad mang
134a3(rgyud): 'phel ba dang //mngar 'jam dang zhing ro mchog rnyed//lha la mi gnod ma grin la min//zis na bzhin 'gyur lus brtas 'gyur//sil spyan yid 'ong sgra snyan gzugs//dri zhi ma 'byung ba de lta'o//
134a4(rgyud): rdorje bla rnams bzang ba na//rtags dang mtshan ma phebs pa ste//sbyar te dngos grub blang bar bya'o//de dang ga'u'i phyag rgya dang //rdo rje bum pa'i 'phro 'dra yis//dngos gru yum gyi mkha' la dpag
134a5(rgyud): yabaM yus sbyor ba'i lhag sems dag/ma phebs pa'i bar du ngo//shes rab gsal ba'i lha mo bzhis//lha ste me long ban+d+ha dang /zhing chen phreng ba la sogapa dang //kha dog lnga yo dar g.yab kyis//gas
134a6(rgyud): byed rigs 'dzin mang po bong //rol mo cha byad mang po dag/rdo rje gar dang sbyin pa'i glu//srid pa'i ba mo kun rton cing //byin rlabs chen po dbab par bya//phebs ma thag tu dngos grub bstim//'di na
134a7(rgyud): rdo rje glu 'kho'o//yang shes rgyan gyis las yino//zhes sems dpa'i rdo rje gsung so//rgyud kyi n+yalo tshwa ba rdo rje nad bkun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las rdo rje glu re le'u zhes bya ste sumacu pa laM/
134b1(rgyud): tsham aH/mams sa mthamasa.a ma pa/tha.a mthaH/Shas # ma yam ma
134b2(rgyud): de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des rdo rje rnal 'byor 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i le'u 'di gsung so//'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa//gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa 'dridrar//gang dag 'jug par byed pa'i//rnal
134b3(rgyud): 'byor rigs kyi bu rnams kun//sno du gyur pa kun bsdus nas//byang chub mchog sems bskyed//tshig 'di brjod de gnas par bya'o//e ma bde mchog dga' 'tshal 'dir//bdag cag kun tu 'jug par 'tshal//
134b4(rgyud): dga' ba byang chub sems bskyed nas//gsang ba'i don 'di spyad par bgyi//de skad gsol te zhus pa dang //gsang ba mchog bdag po yis//rgyud sbyangs rgyud drug las sgo gcad//rigs pa 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor kun/
134b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po gsal bton te//phyag rgya dbang dang bcas pa'i//'khor ba'i rgyud rnams sbyangs par bya//'jug pa de yi gnas lnga ru//rgyud drug sa bon bskyed nas kyang //hUM lnga dag gis mnan par bya//bcug/
134b6(rgyud): ba da yi spyi bor ni//pa yi ye shes la bskrun pa//pad+ma kha bzhi lte ba la//mi dang lha'i sa bon dgod//shar lho nub dang byang dag tu//lha min dud 'gro yi dgas dang //dmyal ba rnams kyi sa bon gdab//hUM gis
134b7(rgyud): laM sgo gcod par bya//lag gnyis the'u chung mthe bos gnan//sor mo gsum sbyar dpral bar bsnol//lha dang lha min gnas dag tu//mi gtang bzlog pa'i phyag rgya yin//lag gnyis bsnol nas mtshan khung
134b8(rgyud): bsdam dmi'i khams nas bzlog pa'i rgya//khu tshur bcangs te 'bru bsgreng nas//g.yon gyi steng du mnan pa 'di//byol song gnas nas bzlog pa'i rgya/thal mo mnyam sbyar gung che sprad//gung mo rgyang du srin la
135a1(rgyud): bsnol//mgul nas 'dzub mos 'khyud pa ni//yi dgas khams las bzlog pa'i rgya//g.yon thog g.yas kyi rgyab sbyar te//srin lag gung 'dzub gcig nas gcig/'khyud pa
135a2(rgyud): dmyal ba'i sgro gcong rgya//lag phyag rgya bcas nas ni//ngagi rdo rje rgya brjod pa//kyi ma ru dra ko d+ha kyi hUM/hri ma pa tsid+d+hi tris badz+ra hUM/'di ltar gsol bar gyur pa dang //sgrib pa dag par bya ba'i phyir//rnal
135a3(rgyud): 'byor sbyor ba'i phyag rgya ste//rdo rje rnal 'byor mcho gi lha//'gro drug 'dren pa'i dpal mdzad pa//rdo rje can la phyag 'tsha lo//byams mgon khyod la skyabasu mchi'o//de skad gsol ba btab pa dang
135a4(rgyud): rnal 'byor chen po'i zhabs nyid la//'jug pa de'i spyi bos gtug/sangs rgyas bde mchog thams cad kyi//rdo rje gsang mchog gsung las byung //srid pa gsum gyis phyag byas pa//dbang
135a5(rgyud): bskur snang ba chen po sbyin//A te ho sta hri da khaM//de nas gnod du gyur pa dang //gsang ba'i mig ni dbye bar bya//me tog phog pa'i lha yang sbyin//de nas dam tshig chen po bsgrags//rgyal ba kun
135a6(rgyud): dang mnyi ma sbyor ba'i//dam tshig 'di las gang 'das pa//rgyal po thams cad bsdus pa yin//khrag 'thung kha 'bar ma'i tshogs//khros nos snying khrag thogs pas 'thung //badz+ra sa ma ya i
135a7(rgyud): dan then ra gan//ba ra hri da ya na ma bsti nAn//sa ma ya rak+Sha sid+d+hi bid+ya badz+ra a mr-i daM nga khaM//rdo rje bdag chu byung nas//rdo rje gal chen mna' doro//rdo rje dam tshig sdom pa rnams//thams cad thaMng
135b1(rgyud): dpog par bya//skyob pa'i gnyer yang dbog par bya//kye reg 'dzin rdo rje bu mchog khyed//rnal 'byor rgyal ba'i sras kyis yin//gzhan yang gsang ba ma sku shig/gal te smras na dmyal bar 'tshig/
135b2(rgyud): khyod ni rdo rje che ge mo//rgyal ba'i sras po gdung rgyud 'dzin/gsang ba mchegi ming sbyin gyis//zhing khams kun tu bde bar spyod//des ni sangs rgyas zhing du skye zhes gsung so//rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje
135b3(rgyud): bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las rdo rje rnal 'byor 'jug pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o////de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rjes yongasu rdzogs pa dbang gi le'u 'di gsungs
135b4(rgyud): so/'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa//srid po gsum gyis phyag byas pas//bla ma'i sa la gnas pa ni//gsang mchog sum cu rtsa drug yin//phyi'i dbang dang nang gi dbang //bsgrub pa'i
135b5(rgyud): dbang dang gsang ba'i dbang /bcu dang bcig bcu gsum dang //rnam pa gnyis kyis rdzogs par 'gyur//de la dang po sbyin pa'i dbang 'di yin te//oM hUM sa hri ha/kun gyis 'da' bar
135b6(rgyud): dka' ba yi//tshig btsan yul la dbang sgyur ba//rgyal po bka' rtags phyag rgya'i dbang //sku lnga yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur//rigs rnams so so'i rgyud 'dzin cing //rtags kyi mtshan
135b7(rgyud): ma chen po ni//sbyor ba chen po'i phyag mtshan te//dam tshig phyag rgya rdzogs par 'gyur//shes rab gzungs kyi gsang mchog na//don dang ldan par gyur pa yin//mtha' gnyis dag tu mi
136a1(rgyud): rdzus 'i tshul mnan na/ //sa pa/chu mas dang dun du so//
136a2(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i dbang //bak+Sha shas chen po bum pa ni//bde gshegs bzhugs pa'i bo byung ste/dkyil 'khor rdzogs par gyur pa yaM//dbang chen de la sbyin por zla//gsung ba'i btsun
136a3(rgyud): brgyas nas ni//yun ring gnas par 'gyur ba yis//bkra shes rdzas kyis dbang mchog kyang //gnang ba chen po sbyin par bya//don rnams grub par 'gyur ba yi//'dod dbur
136a4(rgyud): rin pa9//rgyal srid rin chen sna bdun gyis//rgyal po mchog tu dbang sgyuro//rin+da chen padus na'i khri//bla mar gyur pa'i gdan mchog do//khyad par chen por gyur pa'i dbang/
136a5(rgyud): khri chen dag la gzhag par bya//gcod pan me tog phreng la sogs//dbang mchog brjid pa'i rgyan gyis klubs//dbu rgyan de shal se mo de//dpung rgyan rkang gdub lag gdub rnams//dbang po
136a6(rgyud): rgyal pos de la sbyin//dbang thob mdzes pas brjid pa'i rgyal po de//dbang phyug yin bris de la kun phyag 'tshal rje dang drub tu lho'o zhes par no//kun gyis sku chen 'di cing bsgrags pa
136a7(rgyud): byad gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs khyud ldan pa zhig/rgyal po de yi lag tu bskur nas ni//'jig rten kun la kha lo sgyur ba yi//dbang mchog rgyal po 'di yang sbyin par bya//phyi 'khor
136b1(rgyud): skyong ba'i rgyal por gyur phan chad//bla med mchog rtags dang ldan 'gyur bas//gsang sgo phye nas nang du gzhugs par bya//shin tu gsang ba'i rdzas dang ldan gyur nas//gsang sgro gang las
136b2(rgyud): 'dod pa'i don rnams zhu//gnang chen po'i rtag su byin gyis brlab//gsang ba'i don la nyan cing bslab pa'i dbang //dbong thob skal can de la sbyin par bya//bdud rtsi chu 'dis sna ba'i gsang sgo
136b3(rgyud): dbye//sarba ta thA ga ta sta ma ti ho//glegro bam zab mo la sogs thams cad rnams//rigs kyi bu mchog de la sbyin par bya//des na 'gro ba'i don byed nus pas na//las rnams rgya mtsho tha~Md
136b4(rgyud): sgrub pa'i rtags//rdo rje rgya gram la sogs rnam bzhi'i rdzas//bu mchog de la thabs kyi sbyin par bya//gzhan gyi re 'drod skong ba'i bu mchog de//rgyal po rgyal rigs rgyu du byung ba bzhin//rgyal
136b5(rgyud): che ba chos kyi rgyu du byung bas ni//tan tra la sogs dam pa'i mdzod gsum sbyin//des ni slob ma'i tshogs kun stong nus phyir//bstan pa sgrogs pa'i sa la gnas bya'i phyir//rdo rje rgyal po dpal gyi dbang mad+mo/
136b6(rgyud): 'di theg chen dgu yi rtags dang chas te sbyin//de ni bla med rgyal por 'gyur bas na//sa rnams non pa'i rtags mchog gdan khri'i dbang //lha mtshon la sogs zhing chen nyi zlar bcas//khyu mchog sreng+ge//
136b7(rgyud): ma he gzig dang stag/gtum de'i dom gyis spar te sbyin par bya//rgyal po yin pa'i rtags ni rnam pa bdun//skye la dbang sgyur rgyal po mnyes pa'i gzungs//pha rol dpung 'joms srid thub 'dzi
137a1(rgyud): pa dang //bdag gzhan dor sgrub rdzu 'phrul rkang par ldan//dgos 'dod yid bzhin skong ba'i rin po che//rgyal po de la thabs kyis sbyin par bya//de ni rgyal ba'i mchog spos yin du/
137a2(rgyud): na//phyag rgya chen po'i dbang mchog sbyin par bya//ras sam 'brur ram lug su blugs pa yi//phyag rgya'i gzugs brnyan de yi spyi bor gzhag yis chen po'i don dang de ldan pas//ye shes lnga
137a3(rgyud): rtag po chog phyag rgya yis//gnas lngar gdugs te thugs kyi dbang mchog sbyin//oM ma hA shU n+ya tAdz+nyA na badz+ra swa d+ha Sha Ad mo ko&haM/oM many+dzu kro d+ha sta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba at+ma& haM//oM ma hA sa maH
137a4(rgyud): dz+nyAn badz+re swa b+hA ba At+ma ko hA/oM mahA pra ti pra be sha swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/oM mo hA ai ta tri sha swa b+hA ba A~Mt+ma ka~M ha~M/sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi//rnal 'byor bde mchog de yin pas//sku gsung
137a5(rgyud): thugs kyi gas ma//rdo rje chen la sbyin par bya//oM s+yAtsa twA thA ga ta k+Sha ya 'adz+ris d+hU ba e+et+ma/te/dbang mtshan oM s+yAHta thA ga taHbadz+re swAb+hA wa An+d+roko swA/
137a6(rgyud): /oM sarba tathA ga tA tsi ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/oM sarba ta thA ga ta e nu rA ga dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu tsa badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/dbang mchog thob pa
137a7(rgyud): bu mchog de//den rnams grub par bkra shis phyir//bdud 'dul bkra shis rdzas mchog rnams//rtags kyi brkyen te sbyin par bya//don rnams thub pa'i bu mchog de//rdo rje dbang mchog thob pa na//zhi
137b1(rgyud): khams kun tu grags pa yi//rtsal gyi thig la rdo rje sbyin//nang du 'jug pa'i dbang brab nas//de dag kun la spyod sgrub pa'i//dbang mchog dam pa sbyin par bya//skyo med chos kyi dbyings nyid la//sems kyi
137b2(rgyud): dbang bskur thob pa yi//shes rab chen po rig pa'i dbang //sems lon don gyi gtan tshig sbyin//bya ba'i mtshan ma kun bral zhing //btsal med gnas pa'i byang chub sems//snying rje chen po'i bde
137b3(rgyud): mchogs//khams gsum kun la dbang sgyur sbyin//sbyin gsum 'gro ba'i don rnams kun//thams cad rdzogs par nus pa yi//rtags kyi dbang mchog dam pa ni//thong shol 'bar ba sbyin
137b4(rgyud): par byed//dug gsum gting nas sprug pa yi//rtogs tshon ga'u rnam pa gsum//dmar tshon dag gis bkang nas kyang //dbang chen thob de'i lag tu sbyin//srid gsum sgrol bar bya ba yi//dbang mchog
137b5(rgyud): chen po sbyin pa phyim//tir la sogs mtshon tshe rnams//dbang thob de yi lag tu sbyin//'khor ba'i chos la cir sbyar kyang //skyon gyis gos par mo'i myur ba'i//rtags kyi phyag rgya chen po ni//rnam
137b6(rgyud): dag rdzas kyi pad+ma sbyin//las rnams rdzogs par gyur pa yi//dbang mchog thob pa'i rtags che ni//sti ra'i byug pa chen po dag/dbang thob de'i lag tu sbyin//yum dang gnyis med 'khril
137b7(rgyud): yid/chos nyid don dang gnyis med rtags//sbrul nag 'khril ba'i rkun po 'di//dbang thob de'i lag tu sbyin//gsang ba sbyor ba'i shes rab ma//dri med rnam dag lha mo zhig/mtshan
138a1(rgyud): ldan shin tu brgyan byas la//dbang thob des sbyin par bya//dbang thob rgyal po chen po de//kun gyi bdag nga yin pas na//rol mo dri dang zhal zab dang //'dod yon lnga la sogs
138a2(rgyud): pa dang //nye ba'i long spyod rgyan rnams kun//thams cad thams cad sbyin par bya//sgrub pa'i las la dbang thab phyir//rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa//rgyal ba thams cad bsgrub pa dang //
138a3(rgyud): rdo rje tshe dang sman la sogs//bsgrub pa ma lus bsgrubs shig ces//bsgrubs rdzas thams cad sbyin par bya//rgyal ba sangs rgyas thams cad dang //dbang thob de gnyis gcig pa'i phyir//rig
138a4(rgyud): 'dzin rdo rje rtsal gyi dbang //rdo rje ming ni sbyin par bya//bsgrub pa'i dbang dang rdzas mchog dang //gsang ba'i bdag po yin pas na//gsang ba dbang mchog sbyin par bya//dga' bo byang chub
138a5(rgyud): sems chen po//kun tu tshim par byed pa yi//dkar dmar lhag pa'i byang chub sems//dbang thob de'i lce la gzhag/btsal mod byang chub sems chen po//shes rab chen po'i tshal gyis ni//
138a6(rgyud): /rjechos sku sgyu mar dbang sgyur nas//rdul chen rdzogs pa'i dbang yin pas//rdzas dang tshig dang gang zag dang //kun rdzob dbang de ma thob kyang //chos lnga sems kyi dbang thob na//rgyal ba'i
138a7(rgyud): rigasa'i dzin thams cad dang //srid gsum dbang can thams cad kun//de la dbang theb bskur bar 'gyur//dbang gi tshed ni 'di lta ste//dad ldan sri zhur ldan pa la//gsang ba nyan pa'i
138b1(rgyud): da na kur+ya//nAmya nga las kyi dan chad na//las rnams byed pa 'dang thun pa//ltung rjo dmigs dus chos mthod na//rgyal 'thob 'chang 'o nag/rkyen du chad ma smras
138b2(rgyud): ldanan//bram rdo rje slob dpon byung //dam pa mdzod gsum thams cad la//phyogs med par ni 'chad shes nas/ rgyal po'i dbyung bza ga//dad med gzhan rdzo pa che//chul
138b3(rgyud): mngon la ram gcid byed//de ni dbang gis 'tshig par bshad//gas med brjod ngas dang mi'i tshugs//da med gapal tshugs dbang mi dgos//snod med btsud dril kun ljongs pa/des ni dbang pos
138b4(rgyud): ma yin//snod ldan bcud rdzogs dbang thob ni//dbang mchog thob pa'i rgyud zhes bshad ces gsung so//rgyud kyi rdul po chen po rdo rje dkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las rdo rje dbang gi le'u zhes bya ste su
138b5(rgyud): rtsaganyis pa rI/de nas bcom ldan 'dus gsong ba mtshani bdag pa da/sums da rdo rje dam pa myed nichen po kun 'dus rig pa'i myi dang 'chos
138b6(rgyud): rjod khyi mo yong yin par riganas//das pa lal mtshal labyor rnams kyis shin tu ma ni nga mchur skyes nape ba spyod pa/shin tu dga' brten+de pa'i blo 'di byung //ma~M ma to//nyes
138b7(rgyud): legs ldan mtshan mi mtha' las 'das//dpag med byabs snrums don gyis bdag gzhan dpal//don dam gsang sa nam mkha'i dkyil du la khyil//rdo rje rtse mchog dbang phyug kun gyi bad/
139a1(rgyud): 'dzin pa mi rtog sha rus khral la rol//thugs kyi gdung thag 'khor ba'i thal rdza//yul med ma skyes mtshan ma'i g.yul las rgyal//bde mchog rgyal du
139a2(rgyud): khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod//shes rab chen po nam mkha'i nyi mar gsal//byang chub sems kyi 'od zer dbyings su 'cha ro//dpa' brtul myur ba'i shugs kyis 'gro drug sgrol//
139a3(rgyud): rtogs 'joms ye shes rdo rje cho 'phrul 'phro//dam pa'i don gsungs gnyis med ston pa'i sku//smra ba'i seng ge khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//rin chen gter ldan 'dod dgur kun skongs
139a4(rgyud): zhing //lung dang rig pa gtan tshigs kun gyi mdzod//brda can yang dag len pa'i me long gsol//rdo rje kun 'dus 'jigs byed rgyal ba'i rgyud//chos kyi me long 'di la bdag cag
139a5(rgyud): 'dud//rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las ngo mtshar bstod pa'i le'u ste/sum cu rtsa gsum pa'o////rgyud
139a6(rgyud): rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo rdzogs so////rgya gar skad du/shrI ra gu h+ya gar+b+ha ta tA bi ni shwA ya/bod skad du/
139a7(rgyud): dpal gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid rnam par nges pa/bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bshad pa'i dus na/de bzhin gshegs pa
139b1(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das longs spyod chen po phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /gsung dang /thugs rdo rje'i
139b2(rgyud): bdag nyid/ma lus mi lus lus pa med pa thams cad dang so so ma yin tha mi dad dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin te/'og min gyi gnas mtha' dang dbus med pa na gzhi tshad med pa'i ye
139b3(rgyud): shes kyi 'khor lo gsal ba la ye shes rin po che 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang /rgya phyogs bcur yongs su ma chad pa/yon tan dpag tu med par rgyas pa'i phyir gru bzhir gyur par
139b4(rgyud): lhag pa'i ye shes rin po che'i glo 'bur gyis mdzes pa/rtse mo phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa thams cad dang so so ma yin ngo bo nyid gcig pa'i
139b5(rgyud): ye shes kun tu 'khyil ba'i/ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes rin po che'i dbyibs dang kha dog la sogs pa rnam pa tha dad pa'i bye brag dang khyad par du gyur pa/sngags
139b6(rgyud): patshad dpag tu med pa/ye shes rin po che sna tshogs pa'i phreng ba dang /chun 'phyang dang /shar bu'i rgyan dang /gzugs sna tshogs dang /sgra sna tshogs dang /de sna tshogs dang /ra
139b7(rgyud): sna tshogs dang /reg bya sna tshogs kyi phyogs bcur 'khrigs par reng byung la mi sgrub par gsal ba'i rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab par klubs pa/rnam par thar pa bzhi'i sgo nas 'jug pa'i sgo
140a1(rgyud): khyud can/rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis rta babs dang ldan pa/phyi dang rlung med pa/kun tu yang nang du gyur pa na mi 'jigs pa seng+ge'i khri dang /stobs glang po che'i khyi
140a2(rgyud): dang /rdzu 'phrul rta'i khri dang /dbang rma bya'i khri dang /thogs pa med pa'i na mkha' ldeng gi khri dang /rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i zla'i dkyil 'khor dang /gos pa med pa pad+ma rin po
140a3(rgyud): che'i gdan la sku mdun dang rgyab med pa thams cad du zhal thale bar gsal zhing mtshwa dang dpe byad du ldan pa/bsam gyis mi khyab po/thams cad du sku gsung thugs sna tshogs par kun tu
140a4(rgyud): snang ba/thabs dang shes rab kyi zhabs gnyis mnyam pa'i brtul zhugs kyi skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa/ye shes drug phyag ye shes rin po che'i phyag rgya 'bar ba can sku gsung thugs bsam
140a5(rgyud): gyis mi khyab pa'i dbu gsum dang ldan pa/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par shes pa'i rgyal po dang /de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi rgyal po dang /de bzhin gshegs pa
140a6(rgyud): tshor ba'i rgyal po dang /de bzhin gshegs pa 'du shes kyi rgyal po dang /de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed kyi rgyal po dang /de dag kun kyang 'thing ka dang /dkar po dang /ser po dang /leb rgan da/
140a7(rgyud): ljang khu'i mdog tu 'tsher ba/btsun mo dam pa snang ba'i dbyings dang /sra ba'i dbyings dang /mnyen pa'i dbyings dang /dro ba'i dbyings dang /bskyod pa'i dbyings la sogs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang
140b1(rgyud): med par chos kyi kyi sa kun myupa yas par bya pa du t+tam+b+ha/dpo na tol gyigang du bzhin du dang nas khya par 'azhun so//don pa bya chu chen pa rdo rje mthung byed dang /bya chub can dri rdu/
140b2(rgyud): thos pa dang byang chub chen po rdo rje sdom pa dang /byang chub chen po rdo rje myong ba dang /btsun mthong bar bya ba dang /mnyan par bya ba dang /sdam par bya ba dang /myong bar bye 'i tshogs dang /rgya chu chen po rgyam rdzo
140b3(rgyud): dang /byang chu 'dzin po rdo rje mi byed dang byang chub chen po rdo rje snyam byed dang /rgyu chub chen po rdo rje khyod byed dang /btsun po 'das pa dang /de ltar dang /'byung po dang /mabyon pa'i na/dang /'joms pa chen sha
140b4(rgyud): 'joms pa chen po reg byed deng /'joms pa chen pa reg bya dang /'joms pa chen po reg shes dang /kho tsun mo rtag par ma yin pa dang /chad par ma yin pa dang /dag tu ma yin pa dang /mtshan mar ma yin
140b5(rgyud): sogs pa de lta bu'i tshogs brjod kyis mi lang ba dang /gnyi su med par bzhug so//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang /gnyi su med pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyis gsang ba 'i
140b6(rgyud): nyid sku dang gsung dang thugs dang /ljon dang phrin las rdo rje las byung //oM i e ma'o//de bzhin nyid dbyings nyid dbang sgyur//ye shes dkyir thugs rje'i dang //rang snang ba nyid ting 'dzin//gzugs brnyan sgyum
140b7(rgyud): oM ni rmugasung thugs sbyin rkyen las sel med ci'i snyun med 'dzin tham me da par ldan ma chog kun na nas shes tu
141a1(rgyud): na nyid nges pa las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das byed pa'o rdo rje yid kun tu bzang po thams cad ma lus pa'i rang bzhin gyi tshul rdo
141a2(rgyud): rje btsun mo bya ba mo chos kun du bzang mo la 'jug par gyur to//zhugs pas phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa thams cad gcig rang bzhin dbyer med pas
141a3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la tshad du brjod pa 'di brjod do//oM ma'o rdo rje phung po yan lag ni//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga ru grags//skye mched
141a4(rgyud): khams rnams mang po kun//byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid//sa bcu spyan dang mA ma kI//me rlung gos dkar sgrol ma ste//na mkha' dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma
141a5(rgyud): srid gsum ye nas sangs rgyas zhing //thams cad ma lus chos so cog/sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan ma yin//sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan pa'i chos//sangs rgyas
141a6(rgyud): nyid kyis mi mnyeso zhes brjod pas//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par gyur to//de nas btsun mo bya ba mos//chos kun tu bzang mos bcom ldan 'das yid/
141a7(rgyud): kun tu bzang po dang /gnyi su med par gyur nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do//kye ma phyogs bcu'i stong khams yi nas dben//srid pa gsum nyid dag pa'i zhing //snyigs
141b1(rgyud): ma yid 'di ldan gnas//phung po lnga nyid rdzogs sangs rgyas//thams cad mchog gi stong po bas//gzhan du rgyal ba'i chos mi btsal//nyid las gzhan zhes bya ba'i chos//btsal kyang
141b2(rgyud): rgyal bas mi gnyis//zhes brjod pas/thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas par de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to//de nas gnyi su med pa'i bdag nyid chen pos ye nas sangs rgyas
141b3(rgyud): pa'i sems ye shesu bskyed pa 'idi gsung so//e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang //skye ba med las thams cad skye//skyes pa nyid na skye ba med//
141b4(rgyud): e ma ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang //'gag pa med las thams cad 'gag/'gag pa nyid na 'gag pa med//e mo ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos//
141b5(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang //gnas pa mod las thams cad gnas//gnas pa nyid la gnas pa med//oM ma ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
141b6(rgyud): kun gyi gsang //dmyigs pa med las thams cad dmigs//dmigs pa nyid na dmigs pa med//e ma ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis gas
141b7(rgyud): 'gro 'ong med las bgro dang 'ong //'gro 'ong nyid na 'gro 'ong med//ces brjod pas//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang //btsun mo'i tshogs thams cad kyang /mnyam
142a1(rgyud): pas khyab par gyur to//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod//e ma'o ye nas gsang ba'i chas//
142a2(rgyud): sna tshogs snang la rang bzhin gsang //ngo bo nyid kyis rab tu gsang //gzhan du min la shin tu gsang zhes brjod pas//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang //chos thams
142a3(rgyud): cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i ngo bo nyid du gcig pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas dbyer med na/'gro ba'i rnam par rtog pa ma rig pa las 'gro ba lnga'i ris bsam gyis mi khyab par
142a4(rgyud): smin pa la thugs rje chen po sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chen po skyes nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod de//e mra bder gshegs snying po las//rang gi rnam rtog las kyis skul/
142a5(rgyud): sna tshogs lus dang long spyod dang //gnang dang sdug bsngal la sogs pa//bdag dang bdag gir so sor 'dzin//sus kyang ma bcings bcings med de//bcing bar bya
142a6(rgyud): yid ma yin//rnam rtog bdag tu 'dzin pa yis//nen gyis mkha' la mdud pa dor//bcings med rnam par grol med pa'i//ye nas lhun rdzogs sangs rgyas chos//
142a7(rgyud): bstan phyir spro ba sna tshogs mdzad ces de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du blang ngo //gseng ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges po las don dam pa dang //
142b1(rgyud): kun rdzob kyi byang chub kyi sems ye shesu bskyed pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o////dran pa de bzhin gshogs pa thams cad las thugs rje chen po'i byon brlabs shes bya ba'i rig
142b2(rgyud): pa'i skyes bu thub pa drug de bzhin du shegs pa'i sku dang /gsung dang /thugs rdo rje las 'thon to//'thon nas kyang las kyi dbang gis sbrel zhing nga yin man gyi 'jog rten drug
142b3(rgyud): ge phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po re re thub pa bcom ldan 'das re res 'dul ba rnam bzhis 'gro ba'i don mdzad de/bltam pa dang /rab tu byung
142b4(rgyud): ba dong /bka thub mdzad pa dang /sangs rgyas pa dang /bdud brtul ba dang /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /cho 'phrul chen pa ston pa dang /mya ngan las 'das pa la sam+ba
142b5(rgyud): bAr snyan pa'i thub pa dus bzhi kun tu mkhyen pa dang /thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud kun tu mkhyen pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi spyan gyis thams cad du gzigs pa dang /rdzu 'phrul
142b6(rgyud): gyi sbyin gyis kun tu gsan pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi tshogs kun tu don spyod pa dang /theg pa med pas kun tu bzang ba'i spyod pa rdzogs pa'i mngon par shes pa chen po drug dang /
142b7(rgyud): kun gyi sbu bas ma gyis mi khyab pa dang /kun tu thugs pas ma gyis mi khyab pa dang /kun tu zhal bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /kun tu gsung bsam gyis mi khyab pa
143a1(rgyud): ldan pa/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i grangs med pa phyogs bcur snang bar gyur to//thams cad kyang 'dri lta ste/'dul ba'i dbang gis lha dang ma'i theg pa dang /
143a2(rgyud): nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang /bla na med pa'i theg pas ma rig pa'i rnam par rtog pa nyon mongs pa stong phrag brgyad
143a3(rgyud): cu rtsa bzhi'i gnyen por chos stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi gsungs//gsung ngo //gsung bar 'gyuraro//de dag thams cad kyang gzung ba dang /'dzin pa'i phyi nang gi rten cing 'brel
143a4(rgyud): par 'byung ba dang /'dzin pa 'khrul pa las 'dogs pa dang /las dang las kyi 'bras bu chud mi za ba dang /las dang las kyi 'bras bus mi gos/gos par mi 'gyur//
143a5(rgyud): gosu med par ston pa'i mthar thug/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do//ji snyed 'jig rten 'khrul pa'i chos//ma rig rtog pa'i gzung
143a6(rgyud): 'artson gyis//phyi nang rten 'brel gnyisu 'khor//mi mthun bde sdug myong bar 'gyur//rang bzhin nyid las nyams pa med//yang dag sgyu ma'i tshul gnyisu//bdag
143a7(rgyud): dang bdag gi gzhan med de//rnam dag dbyings nyid tshul gcig/bdag dang bdag gi gzhan rnams ni//log par rtog pa tsam nyid las//phra zhing zab pa'ang yod ma yin//
143b1(rgyud): log rtog nyid la nyid spyod de//gzhan du g.yo ba ci yang med//log rtog rgyu 'bras rgyu nyid kyang //gzhi rtswa med dbyings skad gcig ma//rnam par dag pa'i dbyings nyid tshul//nyid la dbang
143b2(rgyud): sbyar nyid spyod phyir//bdag dang gzhan dang rtog pa'i rgyun//rnam dag bla med theg pa'i mchog/theg pa bzhi yis nges 'byung la/theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas//yang dag
143b3(rgyud): rtogs pas rab brtags na//rang bzhin med las cir yang 'grub//sangs rgyas mya ngan yongs mi 'da'//chos kyang nub par mi 'gyur te//ma rig smin mdzad 'dul ba'i phyir
143b4(rgyud): byung nas mya ngan 'da' bar ston//'dul ba mdo sde chos mngon dang //dam tshig sgrub dang grub pa dang //sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud//phyogs bcu rnamasu rab grags
143b5(rgyud): pa/gsang ba'i snying po las 'phros te//rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po 'di//sde snod kun dang rgyud kun gyi//'byung gnas gtan la nges par 'bebs//chos rnams
143b6(rgyud): ming du btags pa tsam//ston pas don dang 'thun phyogasu//ming dang tshig tu btags nas bstan//ston min tshig la dngos po med//ces ched du brjod//de nas de bzhin
143b7(rgyud): gshegs pa gnyi su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyidagasang ba 'di nyid sku dang /gsung dang /thugs dang /yon tan dang /phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo //a
144a1(rgyud): srid rna nyes dmigs bdag tu rtog las 'phros//rgyud drug skyo 'gag lus dang long spyod dang //gnas dang sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor la sogs pa//log rtog nyid
144a2(rgyud): las gzhan du g.yo ba ci yang med//stong nyid bdag med ye mkhyen rang rig thugs//dmigs bya dmigs byed med par dran dbang sgyur//ngo mtshar sku gsung thugs dang yon tan
144a3(rgyud): 'phrin las zhing khams las//gzhan na med de de nyid de ltar yin zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o zhes brjod pas/thub pa drug gi sprul pa grangs med pa dang /de bzhin gshegs
144a4(rgyud): ba thams cad kyis gsungs pa yang de dag tu 'dus par de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to//gsang ba'i snying por kho na nyid nges pa las chos thams cad gtan la
144a5(rgyud): phab pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o////de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgongs pa gcig tu gyur nas mnyam pa chen po'i tshul rdo rje'i dbyingasu chos thams
144a6(rgyud): cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i ting 'dzin las mi g.yo bar chos thams cad ming tsam du gnas pa'i yi ge phreng ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba 'di sku dang gsung dang /thugs rdo rje
144a7(rgyud): las phyung ngo //a rab tu brtan gyur a dkar las//shin tu phra ba'i a rnams spro//phyogs bcu gang bar gsal gyur nas//bsdus kyang 'phel 'grib med par
144b1(rgyud): bstan//de las ming tshigs gsal 'bar gan//spro zhing bsdu ba'ang de bzhin//'di na rdo rje dngos grub kyo//DUn+danA byung yo shes rgyu yin//a A/ku kha ga b+hA /tsatshad d+hA nya/Ta Tha NaD+ha
144b2(rgyud): Na NA thAd d+ha na/ba ba bar+d+ha ma/ya we ra la/sha Sha sa te/k+ShaH/oM I/yu m+me/e A~M/oM mo//'di dag phyung bas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas paM rnam pa drug
144b3(rgyud): tu g.yos/rab tu g.yos/kun tu rab tu g.yos nas/chos thams cad ming gi mtshan nyid tsam du gyur to//hoHde nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ched du brjod pa 'di
144b4(rgyud): brjod do//a ni steng dang mi sbyong gi/dbu ma'ang dmig su yod ma yin//thams cad ming tsam sangs rgyas kun//yi ge phreng ba nyid la gnas//a nyid sna tshogs par snang
144b5(rgyud): ba'i//klu la sogs pa bzhi bcu gnyis//sgra yi ming gis thams cad bsdus//mngon rdzogs rgyal por de nyid nges//e ma ngo mtshar ya mtshan gyi//'phrul chen bzhi bcwa
144b6(rgyud): lnga'i ming //ming rnams ma lus 'dzin pa'i gnas//sna tshogs don nu ni smra zhing sten//dngos med mi ge'i rang bzhin sems//bdag med mtha' bral mi dmigs kyang //
144b7(rgyud): dbyibs dang kha dog ming tshegs kyis//rol pa cir yang sprul cing ston//phyogs bcu dus bzhir gshegs pa yi//ye shes sems dpa' sku gsung thugs//dkyil 'ar
