145a1(rgyud): zhi bcuHk+Sha nyid//yi ge mgro nas klu la rdzogaso//sems kyi rang bzhin yi ge ste//yi ge'i dngos po yod ma yin//dmigs med de nyid sna tshogs pa'o//
145a2(rgyud): sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo tshe//sku gsung thugs ni ngo mchir gyi//ngo mtshar 'phrul chen rab 'gugs pa//dbyings la dbyings kyis bris pa ste//yi ge zhes ni de phyir brjod
145a3(rgyud): mgo ni ma nor lam yin te//tsheg na shes rab ming du smra//shad ni thabs chen tshig su gcod//a ni skye med de bzhin nyid//A ni thog mtha' stong pa nyid//tha ni sgyu 'phrul rdo rje
145a4(rgyud): nyid//Ta ni snang ba'i sgyu 'phrul nyid//Da ni sgyu 'phrul yid bzhin nyid//D+ha ni sgyu 'phrul snang bdag nyid//Na ni sgyu 'phrul kun du nyid//tha ni dra bas mngon rdzogs nyid//ta ni dri
145a5(rgyud): bas bsten pa nyid//da ni dra bas lhan ni nyid//d+ha nI dra bas 'khril ba nyid//na ni dra bas kun tu 'gyur//kau ni spyan gyis thugs kyi mchog/kha ni spyan gyi thugs kyi mchog/
145a6(rgyud): ga ni shangs kyi thugs kyi mchog/b+hA ni ljags kyi thugs kyi mchog/nga ni thugs kyi 'jigs byed pa'o//ce ni spyan gyi sku yi mchog/tshwa ni snyan gyi sku yi mchog/
145a7(rgyud): ni shangs kyi sku yi mchog/dz+ha ni ljags kyi sku yi mchog/nya ni sku'ang 'jigs byed pa'o//po ni spyan gyi gsung gi mchog/pa ni snyan gyi gsung gi mchog/ba ni shangs
145b1(rgyud): kyi gsung gi mchog/b+ha ni ljags kyi gsung gyi mchog/ma ni gsung yang 'jig par byed//ya ni skye ba rnam par dag/wa ni gnas pa dag pa yin//ra ni 'jigs pa dag pa ste//la ni
145b2(rgyud): stong pa dag pa'o//sha nI rtag pa med pa ste//ShA ni chad pa'ang yod ma yin//sa ni mtha' bral bdag med pa//ha ni mtshan ma med pa nyid//kla ni ye shes thugs kyi thugs//i ni
145b3(rgyud): rdul snyed lha rnams//I ni rdul snyed lha ma yin//u ni rdul skyed mi rnams//u ni rdul skyed byol song rnams//e ni rdul snyed yi dag su//e ni rdul snyed dmyal ba rnams//oM na//
145b4(rgyud): thams cad 'jig par byed//oM ni thams cad zhig pa yin//yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen 'di//sku gsung thugs kyi phreng bas bsdus//zhes brjod//a ho/de nas de bzhin
145b5(rgyud): gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang /gnyisu med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyis gsang ba 'di nyid sku dang //gsung dang thugs dang /yon tan 'phrin las rdo rje las phyung //
145b6(rgyud): a he/thabs dang shes rab dgyes sprin byang chub sems tshogs rgyu 'khor lo//'bras bu rgyal ba smin grub ngo mtshar ming tshogs bzhi bcu gnyis//'dus ma byas nyid 'dus/
145b7(rgyud): byas rdo rje dkyil 'khor 'byin pa'i dam//'da' bar mi mdzad dbang med rgyu rkyen tshogs pa'i mthu chen yin//ho/rdo rje gsang ba'i tshogs tu'o zhes brjod pas de bzhin//
146a1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad yi ge 'khar lor gyur to//gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las yi ge phreng ba'i 'khor lo bskor ba'i lany+tsa ste bzhi pa'o//
146a2(rgyud): de nas yi ge 'khor lo sprin bkod pa las sgyu 'phrul rnam par 'phro ba 'di che du brjod do//rtsa ba med pa'i sems nyid ni//chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba yin//sems nyid yi ge'i
146a3(rgyud): rang bzhin te//yi ge yid bzhin rin chen spri ni//sgyu 'phrul dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis//dra ba'i dkyil 'khor mngon rdzogs pas//phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa
146a4(rgyud): yi//dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur//bdud rtsi 'gyur zhing 'byung ba dang //bzhi rgya rtsa bzhi'i nad sel cing //long spyod 'byung ba ngan song sbyong //tsar yang
146a5(rgyud): gzhan du 'gyur ba 'grub//nam mkha' rdo rje sra 'byung zhing //'bar nas me yang 'tshig pa dang /chur 'gyur 'bab pa'ang de bzhin to//'jig rten khams 'di 'dor ba dang //
146a6(rgyud): thams cad stongs shing ltung bar 'gyur//dgug dang btang dang bcing dang grol//gso dang bsad dang pham dang rgyal//ting 'dzin 'di yis byed par 'gyur//de nyid ye shes
146a7(rgyud): rang snang ba'i//ming tshig gzugs yid bzhin gyis//mun la snang 'byung ji bzhin du//'gyur bas gser 'gyur slan gyi tshul//ston pa mchod brtson rtogs pa
146b1(rgyud): gsal//dam tshig sngags dang phyag rgya rnams//ma nyams shes shing yo byad ldan//'grub 'gyur mi ldan med cing brlag/dus gsum rgyal bas thugs chud pa'i//dngos grub
146b2(rgyud): mchog gi snying po ni//zad pa'i dus med yid bzhin mdzod//'phel 'grib med par 'byung ba ste//dngos po med las dngos po spyan//sna tshogs rnam par 'byung zhing 'gyur//dngos rnams
146b3(rgyud): nyid na dngos med par//rtog pa'i dbang sgra ting 'dzin yin//gang gis dmigs med mi shes pa//de yis chos kyi dbyings mi shes//de phyir dngos dang dngos med pa//'jigs pas
146b4(rgyud): dmigs med shes par gyis//ngani rtsa mid pa'i sems nyid ni//pho mo ma yin ma ning min//mtshan med ma yin rigs rgyud min//kha dog ma yin dbyings ma yin//gnasu ma yin gang
146b5(rgyud): yang min//de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes te//thabs kyi phyag rgya kun gyi rgyu//thabs las thabs 'byung thabs bsam yas//tha dad med la tha dad pa'i//nang dang nang gi phyir rol gyi
146b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bsam yas ye shes rol/'jig med kun bzang phyag rgya'i mchog/gang gis glang chen myos 'dra'i sems//mnyam par bzhag pas gtul nas//sngags dang
146b7(rgyud): phyag rgyas rab bstan na//dngos grub ya mtshan chen por 'gyur//zhes brjod pas//de bzhin gshegs pa nyid gzigs mos mnyes par gyur to//gsang ba'i snying po de
147a1(rgyud): kho na nyid nges pa las sgyu 'phrul bsgrub pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o///de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin gcig dang du ma med pa
147a2(rgyud): bdag nyid chen po thams cad kyis 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad la nyid kyi che ba'i dkyil 'khor 'byung bar bzhed nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do//ye shes phyogs
147a3(rgyud): bzhi dbus brtags te//dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub//rdzogs chen rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas//kun 'byung dkyil 'khor chen por spyod/'khor lo rtsibs
147a4(rgyud): bzhi mu khyud bcas//gru chad bzhis brgyan par khyams ldan//kun du gru bzhi sgo khrud ldan//rol mo sna tshogs sprin spung bzhin//dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis kyis
147a5(rgyud): brgyan//seng ge glang chen rta dang khrung //na mkha' lding gi khri chen la//nyi zla pad+ma rin po che//gdan la rdzogs dang sems da'i tshul//'khor lo rgyal po rgyal mo dang
147a6(rgyud): g.yas na mthong thos snom pa dang //myong dang btsun mo'i chogasu bcas//gru tshod la ni mthong byed dang //thos byed snom byed myong byed rnams//btsun mo'i tshogs
147a7(rgyud): dang bcas par gnas//bar khyams la ni thub drug dang //mdun dang rgyab na byed pa dang //bya bo dag ni gnas por bsten//sgo khyod bzhi la 'joms pa ni//btsun mo
147b1(rgyud): tshogs dang ldan par gnas//rdo rje 'khar lo rin po cha//pad+ma ral bri d+hil bu'abar//ut+pal klu shing la sogs mtshan//mdzes tshul mnyes pa'i yo byad 'dzin//'thing ka dkar po sar
147b2(rgyud): leb rgan//ljang khu la sogs sna tshogs pa'i//mnyan lcug 'khyil ldem gzhin tshul can//gsal 'tsher lhun stug gzi byin 'bar//'od zer 'phro ba'i tshogs chen po//2
147b3(rgyud): ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs pa ste//mtha' dbus med par khyab pa yi//dkyil 'khor bas ma yis lhun gyis grug/sku yi phyag rgya che mchog ni//de bzhin dbyings las ma g.yos
147b4(rgyud): kyang //yang dag thar pa'i gzugs sku dang //'gro ba ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir//'thun byas sku ni sna tshogs ston//sbyong nyid sgyu ma mig yor tshul//tshu lo nyid dbyings las g.yos
147b5(rgyud): pa med//ma g.yos bzhin du sna tshogs pa'i//de tshe mi 'thun sna tshogs la//so so 'dre bar snang ba ni//de bzhin nyid kyis ma bcos kyang //las 'phro'i dbang gis so sor
147b6(rgyud): snang/dper na me long chu zla bzhin//de tshe 'gro drug thams cad las//sdig spong gzugasu rnam par bstan//dge tshul rnams la dgra bcom gzugs//rang rgyal
147b7(rgyud): rnams la bse ru'i gzugs//gzhan yang theg ma chog rim pa bzhin//reg nin bla med gnas mchog du//sku ni rnam par snang mdzad tshul//byang chub sems dpa
148a1(rgyud): 'khor rnams la//de bzhin gsung mchog mi smra ste//sku yis chos rnams mjal bar ston//mo long ston pa'i tshul bzhin du//dngos kyi mdog ngan thams cad
148a2(rgyud): sel//'khor gyis de bzhin sku bltas na//byang chub sgrib pa gtang dpag med//me long bzhin du sku la snang //de nas sa bcu rim gyis 'byung //bla med byang chub yang dag 'thob/
148a3(rgyud): chos sku dpag med brjod du med//khang spyod zad med rin chen gter//sprul pa bye ba bsam mi khyab//mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad rdzogs//spyod yul kun tu maN Da la//tshogs
148a4(rgyud): tshan gnyis kyang rdzogs par rol//thabs dang shes rab sa yi mchog/de la sogs te bsam yas mchog/skye shi med pa g.yung drung sku//nyon mongs kun gyi zhing du gnas//zad mi
148a5(rgyud): shes pa'i gter du 'gyur//rdo rje 'dzin pa rig pa'i sku//thams cad dbyer med mnyam pa'i sku//thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sku//de tshe sku lnga kun kyang rdzogs//zhes brjod pa//
148a6(rgyud): 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa thams cad du dkyil 'khor brjod kyis mi lang ba zhing gi rdul snyed gcig gsal bar gyur to//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
148a7(rgyud): btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyi su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba 'di nyid sku dang /gsung dang /thugs yon tan phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo //a te//dmigs kyi
148b1(rgyud): dmigs byed mi dmigs dpag med bsam mi khyab//ye shes rang rig dkyil 'khor sna tshogs brjod mi lang //mnyam dang mi mnyam kun khyab khyab med khyab pa'i dbyings//ya nas kun
148b2(rgyud): gsal dkyil 'khor rnam 'phro spros pa med//ho/rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o////gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dkyil 'khor spros pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//
148b3(rgyud): da nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo ///bruM bi sA bi shud d+he/hUM badz+re d+h+r-i ka/oM dzaM
148b4(rgyud): na dzaM ka/sAM rad na d+h+r-i ka/AM A rau lig/haM pra dz+nyA d+hI ka/mau d+hA tAM shwa rI/lAM d+h+we Sha ra ti/mr-i mo ha ra ti/pUM rA ha ra ti/pAM rA ga ra ti/tAM badz+ra ra ti/k+ShaM he rA dza ya/tr-i
148b5(rgyud): a garba ya/hri ha hUM pad+ma ba da ma/dz+nyAM ku ru pa na hI/hU~M lA s+ye sa ma ya stAM/traM ma l+yaM sa ma ya hoH/hI gI ti rA gau haM/aM narti rA ge yA me mI/d+hA ra swAhA/thi li sa ra pa
148b6(rgyud): ya swat+tha/hUM sA rA dzI ya swAt+tha/mu shrI I raM ga ya swAhA/dzAHd+hU pa pra bi saM/hUM puSh+pa a bi sa/baM dI paM su khI ni/ho gan d+ha tsita taM/hUM ya mUni ta kr-it+tha phaT/hUM pad mAn
148b7(rgyud): ta krita phaT/hU~M pra d+hAn ta kr-iti phaT/hUM bi g+hAn+dan ta kr-ita/oM mi hA badz+ra d+ha ra ma hI/kra d+ha shwa rI dzA lA hUM phaT/aM ma hA rad na d+ha ra ma b+h+r-i krad+d+hi shwa r-I dzA lI ni hUM phaT/
149a1(rgyud): /oM ma hA d+ma d+ha ra myA hA kro d+he shwa rI dz+wa la nI hUM phaT/oM ma hA kAr+m+ma d+hA rA ma hA kro d+hash+tsarI dz+wa la ni hUM phaT+Ta/d+hur+thA ts+tsha badz+ra tsit+ta a a a badz+ra b+hA dra sa man ta /
149a2(rgyud): oM mu ne d+d+hi swAhA/oM mA ne hUM swAdz+dza/oM mu ne srung swAny+dza/oM mu~M ne gr-i swAhA/oM mu~M nai k+ShaM swAhA/oM mu ne ya swA hA/oM oM dz+yo ha~M b+ha ga bAn ma hA kA ru Ne ka dri s+ya ho sa ma ya
149a3(rgyud): s+t+waM/IM m-ir+b+h+yAM s+t+r-itAM/dbadab pa/dbab pa ga/dzadza dza dzadza/pra ba ba be baM/sa sa sa sa sA/ba ba pA ba b+hA/ma ma ma ma me/pab pa pa pa/ya ya yA
149a4(rgyud): yaM/pa ba ba pa pa/oM a~M hU~M swA hA/ye shes rgyal po sku gsung thugs/yon tan phrin las rmad po che/de nyid du ni mnyam sbyor ba'i/phyag rgya chen por bdag sbyor cig/oM
149a5(rgyud): badz+ra sa ma ya hUM/oM badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+waM/oM badz+ra sa ma ya hoHdzaHhUM baM hoHzhes brjod pas gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'di dag gis 'jig rten drug gis phyogs bcu thams/
149a6(rgyud): cad du khyab par grag so//rab tu grag so//kun tu grag so//de nas bcom ldan 'das byed pa po rdo rje dang /bya ba mo rdo rje gnyi su med pa'i dkyil 'khor la thim par
149a7(rgyud): mdzad//de nas phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid chen pos bdag nyid chen po'i ye shes dang byin bsdu bzhi bya ba'i sku dang gsung dang /
149b1(rgyud): thugs rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dra ba las phyung ngo //sau ma hA shu n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA byA Ad ma ko&haM/oM ma hA yA dar sha dz+nyA badz+rA swA b+hA brA Ad ma kau&ha~M/oM ma hA pra t+ya be k+Sha d+hA dz+nyA na dad+d+ha swA thA
149b2(rgyud): ba Ad ma kau&haM/oM ma hA sa ma tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA baM Ad ma ko haM/oM ma hA kri t+ya a nuSh+TA na dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad mya ko haM/oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad ma kau ha/
149b3(rgyud): oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA bA ga badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko ha~M/oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ke haM/oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA a nu tra ga badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko ha~M/oM
149b4(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pU dz+nyA badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma k+Sho haM/zhes brjod pas thim par 'gyur/gsal bar 'gyur//'bar bar gyur to//e ma ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos//rdzogs
149b5(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung //sgra dang ming tshig kun las 'das//sna tshogs sgra rnams gsal bar 'byung //gsung cig dkyil 'khor yan lag ni//bsam gyis mi khyab
149b6(rgyud): kun tu khyab//sgra dang ming tshig so sor grags//thams cad gsung gi phyag rgya'i mchog/rgyud mchog sgyu 'phrul dra ba las//bde ldan gsung gyi don 'byung ba//thams cad
149b7(rgyud): d+ma'i ngang gyur na//grol thar lam dang 'khor ba'i sgra//ji skad brjod kyang gsungs mchog yin//theg pa mtho dman thams cad dang //log 'gro ma lus thams cad skad//
150a1(rgyud): byang chub rdo rje'i gsung du bsdus//bsdus nyid phyogs bcur rnam par grags//grags nyid ma chags ngang du gsungs//gsung ba nyid na brjod du med//brjod
150a2(rgyud): med de nyid sna tshogs sgra//kun la grags shing so sor 'jal//dper na de bzhin sprin sangs bzhin//gsung gcig sgra yis thams cad go/'di ni gsung mchog rgyal po yin//
150a3(rgyud): theg pa mthun man thams cad kyang //de bzhin nyid las ma gsungs te//gdul bya'i thab su so sor thos//ji ltar gsung rab kun brjod kyang //de bzhin nyid las gsung
150a4(rgyud): ba med//yi ge med dang rig pa'i gsung //ljags kyi rtse mor ma phyung yang //thugs rje gsung gi byin brlabs kyis//'gro don sna tshogs so sor gsal//gsal nyid
150a5(rgyud): gsung gi rdo rje mchog/de bzhin gsung gis 'gro don rnams//de bzhin dang las ma g.yos kyang //dper na brag cha'i sgra bzhi no//gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa
150a6(rgyud): las dkyil 'khor bsdus pa dang /gsang sngags kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o////de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yan lag thams cad kyi
150a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du lhun gyis grub par byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba 'di ched du brjod do//sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pa'i//thams cad byang chub mchog gi rgyu//gsang/
150b1(rgyud): nyid nges pa mo//snang po phyug rgya 'da' dka'//mi bskyod nyi ma'i dkyil mo//rin chen na bya dkyil yi ka/lnga gnyis zung du snad pa las//sbyar bas phyag rgya 'byung ba'i rgyu
150b2(rgyud): oM dang mu gnyis rtse sbyar to//'bru brgyad bsnol nas rtsi spyad pa//rgyal ba kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i//bde ba chen po sbyin pa'i rgyu//'bru bzhi spros nas thugs khur bkan/
150b3(rgyud): bsgreng rtsi mer rdo rje 'bar//zla brtul 'bru spris dril gisal zhing //'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan//'bru ba zhi sbas nus thugs khur bkun//muM bsgreng rtse med du
150b4(rgyud): gsol 'bar//nyi ma 'bru lnga la su 'khril//btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyi blta//'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs khar bkan//oM bsgreng rtsi mor 'khor lo 'bar//zla brtul 'bru
150b5(rgyud): sbas dril gsil zhing //'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos le brtan//'bru bzhi sbas nis thugs khar bkan//lam bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'ab//nyi ma 'bru lnga sa su khrol//
150b6(rgyud): btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyi blta//'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs khar bkan//swa basbrang rtse mor rin chen 'bar//zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing //'khril ba'i tshal gyis
150b7(rgyud): chos la brtan//'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs khar bkan//ma bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar//nyi ma 'bru lnga la su 'khril//btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta//'bru
151a1(rgyud): na sa su nga / ts+tsha / rgyu ts+tsha/na na rgyas nus pa smra//wA
151a2(rgyud): / sa na //gzugs mangs men chen phreng ba nga /yang kA m+b+ha margyag nyid / da sa
151a3(rgyud): mi thug pa la stsogs du'o//las l+la 'khrim zhing chos la brtan//dAn rnam sa 'byur zhing 'dud pa'i tshul//gang po phyis na du zhen//gnyis pa po
151a4(rgyud): du 'breg//sgo ba ni khro ba'i phyag rgya ni//rtse mgo gdangs dang rdo rje gnan//zang tshul chen bas zhinan pa dang //rdo rje rgya gro mo las kyis gnon//lcags kyi zhags
151b1(rgyud): t+taH//sgo bzhir gnas pa de dag kyang //bdud tshul 'khril ba gong ma bzhin//thub drug phyag rgya sna tshogs to//mdor bsdus phyag rgya drug yon//sregs par dang ni pi ljang dang //ga n+da
151b2(rgyud): ba ti rin chen sgrom//me dang chu ni rab tu bstan//yum ni gnyis med chos kyi dbyings//kun bzangs mnyam gzhug ye shes 'gro//yum 'gyur mnyam rdzogs pad+ma'i dkyil//gzhan
151b3(rgyud): yang phyag rgya sna tshogs te//yang na de bzhin gshegs nyid dam//yang na rdo rje thal mo nyid//phyag rgya chen po'i chags mchog ni//thabs dang shes rab ldan 'byor na//ma bskyod ma
151b4(rgyud): bskul thams cad kun//phyag rgya chen po'i ngang du gnas//yan lag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ldan//de nyid yan lag spyos bdag ste//bani bcu rtsa gnyis gsum 'gror 'gyur//de ltar
151b5(rgyud): ldan pa'i gtso mchog gi/rgyal ba rgyal mchog de bzhin du//bcu gnyis drug gi 'od 'phro bar//de la sogs te bsam mi khyab//phyogs bcu dus bzhi bas ma ya su//'dul
151b6(rgyud): ba'i don rnams so sor ston//theg pa mtho dman thams cad dang //phyin ci log rnams thams cad dang //zhi khro tshogs chen thams cad laM//so sor 'thun par kun tu
151b7(rgyud): ston//dper na gar mkhan nyid dra ba//lus las ma bkod sna tshogs ston//mdor na phyag rgya thams cad ni//'di zhes gcig ces brjod du med//gnyis dang gsum du/
152a1(rgyud): rnam par 'gro//bskyod dang spro ba'ang de bzhin nyid//mdor na bskul bskyod thams cad kun//phyag rgya chen po'i dang du gnas//gnas gnyis mi granas gnas
152a2(rgyud): ma yin//de skad dag mchog nyid kyis bshad//gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las yan lag dkyil 'khor du//byin gyis rlabs nas phyag rgya spros pa'i le'u ste brgyang
152a3(rgyud): pa'o///de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig bkod pa la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'dri brjed do//shin tu phra
152a4(rgyud): ba'i dam tshig mchog/phyag rgya chen po'i phyag mthil du//thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa'i ste//sor ni bzhi yi tshad du bya//'bru lnga spros lnga rin chen lnga//snying po lnga dang
152a5(rgyud): sman lnga dang //bdud rtsi lnga ni rab bsnyams la//rig pas thig ni gdab par bya//lte ba rtsibs dang ldan pa yi//rtsibs bzhi 'khor lo mu khyud bcas//gru chad bzhi
152a6(rgyud): dang gru la ni yi//bair khyams sgo khyud ldan par bya//sen+da zlum tsam gyi nyi zla la//tsa na'i 'bru tsam pad+ma'i gdan//yungs 'bru tsam gyi yi gre la//phyag rgya til 'bru
152a7(rgyud): tsam du bri//bcos bu ras ni sna tshogs dang //brgyan phreng bro ba'i btung bas bskor//glu tshog bro gar rol mo yi//sprin dpung tshogs kyis rab tu mchod//yum
152b1(rgyud): sa songs ma sa/ na snun//sgyus da padag mnan ldan pa /nang du byu 'am stsal//g+hu / zla ba'i tshogs rnams kyus/
152b2(rgyud): bzhi'i mchod pa rab tu sbyin//hUM ba'i dkyil 'a' nate/gon tu phra ba sbyangs pa mis//bsam yis dag la'ang de bzhin /rIg+sa pas dbyug pa tsam du la//nargod pa'i
152b3(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po na//sems kyi med bzhin sbyin chags kyi'o//phyogs bcu thams cad sangs rgyas zhing //mnyan 'jam reg ni bde nga ste//sna tshogs rin po che yi gzhi//mang
152b4(rgyud): sa shing ba //kun na / legapa rjeng du rnamachag 'chen yang ba ste tshogs //rgyun dang dpag pasam smin
152b5(rgyud): pa'i tshog//glu dbyungs tshug sgo//b+hai ri rnal mtshanan po gA gas//de shol dpung rgyun pa ma de//bza' dang 'drid ba'i mtshan rnams dang //rang la mdzes
152b6(rgyud): brgyan pa yi//skye dang lha mo rdul snyed kyis//bro gar la sogs bsam yas kyi sa//phyogs bcu ni mkha'i khams bkang nas//dkyil 'khor kun la rgyas par dbul//bskal
152b7(rgyud): ldan gsapa pa'i khyad par gyis//rim gyis yang na gcig car du//chas kyi dbyings dang mnyam sbyor ba'i//mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen por bsgom//gsal ldan ma 'am
153a1(rgyud): byin brlabs la//stong gsum yungs 'brur 'jug tshul du//dbyings nas dkyil 'khor spyan drang mchod//mnyes nas grub pa'i dam tshig mchog/bdag
153a2(rgyud): nyid chen po mchod pa yis//sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus mnyes//srid gsum 'gro ba thams cad la//dga' ba chen pos khyab par 'gyur//sgyu 'phrul dra ba brtan pa yiyas//
153a3(rgyud): phyogs bcu dus bzhir gshegs pa yi//sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus dang //khams gsum 'gro rnams mngon du 'gyur//lus ngag sems dang chos thams cad//
153a4(rgyud): gang na'ang mi gnas mi dmigs pa//mig yor tshul du sbyor ba yis//nam mkha' la ni nam mkha' bskum//kun byas dbang phyug rig pas 'jug/de nas slob ma gzhug
153a5(rgyud): par bya//de nas rigs kyi bu mchog des//rgyal srid dang ni rang gi lus//bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig/rab tu gces dang yid 'thad dbul//dbang phyug long spyod lngas
153a6(rgyud): mchod na//dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod pa yin//nye ba'i dkyil 'khor smos ci dgos//nyes pa thams cad dag par 'gyur//dad brtson brtul zhugs rab rtogs
153a7(rgyud): nas//phan pa'i dbang sbyin nus pa'i dbang //rim pa bzhin du sbyin par bya//snying rjes chung ma zes par gzung //yang na thal mor rab bsnol nas//phyag rgya chen po'i
153b1(rgyud): 'phang du ni//dkyil 'khor 'dzub gang tsha du bya//mkhas pas cho ga bzhin du bya//yang na sa gzhi rab bsnyams la//dkyil 'khor khru gang tsha du bya//yang na lus gang cha du ste//yang
153b2(rgyud): na lus ni gsum gyi tshad//phur bu srad bu mtshon phye dang //gos rgyan mdzes pa'i yid 'ong grogs//thig gdab cho ga phun sum tshogs//mkhas ldan chen pos bsgribs te bya//yang
153b3(rgyud): na khru ni bcu drug dang //nyi shu 'am nyi shu rtsa lnga bya//rigs kyi dkyil 'khor lnga rnams bsgom//sku gsung thugs ldan gzugs kyang bgod/yang na rgyang grags dpag tshad tsam/
153b4(rgyud): namakha'i dbyings ni bsam yas par//sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sna tshogs bsgom//ma mthong rmongs pa brtan phyir mtshon//kha dog nyi shu rtsa lnga yang //lnga yi tshen gyis bri bar bya//
153b5(rgyud): 'dul ba'i cho gra bzhin du dgye//ting 'dzin rol mo mtha' yas mchog/yi ge 'am brda' 'am snying po 'am//phyag rgya 'am sku gsung thugs ldan par//byin brlabs ya mtshan
153b6(rgyud): rmad po che//'grub 'gyur sangs rgyas kun gyi dam//sa la sogs la phyag rgyar byas//rnam grol rim pa thob par 'gyur//dag pa'i ye shes kyis sbyangs nas//smos ci dgos
153b7(rgyud): te de nyid yin//phyogs dus dkyil 'khor bdag nyid che//mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas//dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drangs nas//rong snang dbyer med dkyil 'khor
154a1(rgyud): la/'jug pa'i mtshan nyid matam sbyor bas//phyogs dus kun nas gshegs pa yi//bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rdzogs//nye bar gyur pa'i dam tshig
154a2(rgyud): mchog/dpag bsam shing dang yid bzhin gyi//rin po che dang 'byung ba kun//de dag rdzas yod ma yin te//rang sems bsod nams brtan pa yin//ngo mtshar tshe 'phrul rmad
154a3(rgyud): po ched/gzhan nas yod 'ongs ma yin te//thabs la brtan pa'i shes rab nyid//de lta bu yi ngang du byung //shes rab dbyings kyi de bzhin nyid//thabs kyi phyag rgyar gyur pa'i
154a4(rgyud): phyir//ye shes la ni ye shes rol//ye shes rol pa nyid kyang gsog/rgyal ba mngon 'byung skyob pa dang //byin brlabs ston pa'ang de bzhin te//bya byed nus pa'i gzi
154a5(rgyud): byin gyis//sgyu ma rdo rje brtsan po mchog/cho ga lnga ni rdzogs byas shing //yo byad lnga ni rdzogs par ldan//sngags kyi yan lag lnga rdzogs pas//ma nyams 'jug la rab
154a6(rgyud): brtson pas//zhag ni sum cu phrag drug gam//bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug gis//dbang bsgyur rigs kyi dam pa 'grub//de tshe bcu drug tshun chad kyis//sru lnga
154a7(rgyud): lhun gyis rdzogs pa ni//ye shes thig le nyid snang ba//bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog/phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i//zhing khams rnam dag
154b1(rgyud): s+ho/rgyu sgyu smo// rgyan ma / dus sa sa sa na tu sa pa dang /rdzu
154b2(rgyud): don 'byung /spri 'i shes ba byung sa//jug dang mu k+shi d+hA ya~M//mahA nga thas med de zhin da//sangs sa kyis kya mi gags te/rang
154b3(rgyud): gnas me byung //bzhi par rtog ga gis rnam mi shes dkyi mas me gzhan byed //thugs chen bas myal bas na//bgro drug dus gnas ma sus snang /
154b4(rgyud): bachen po'i dum stangs pa sa ma yang na/sa nyid du ldan zhugs na//'dide ni yid 'du mnyam par 'gyu/sa pa mnyam pa'i
155a1(rgyud): 'khor gar+b+ha//nyan byed 'khor la gzhal yas//gsal ba thig la ny-i//hU~M gi phyag rgya'i chags mchog las//rlan chen dkyil 'khar
155a2(rgyud): gsal spro thim//gsang ba gsung tshon gsang mchog lngas//gsung ba kun la mnyan par bya//gsang ba'i don nyid rtag pa las//gzhan du smra byer bya ba yin//gsal ba'i 'khor
155a3(rgyud): lo gzhal ya su//gsal ba'i thig le ngo bo nyid//yi ge phreng ba'i tshogs mchog las//rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal spro bstim//oM dus gsum rgyal ba'i sras chen po//
155a4(rgyud): sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje zung //rgyal ba thams cad mnyes mchod la//rgyal ba kun dang mnyam par 'gyur//lag pa'i 'khor lo gzhal ya su//gsal ba'i thig le ngo bo nyid//
155a5(rgyud): /haMgi phyag rgya'i tshog sa mchog las//las kyi dkyil 'khor gsal spro thim//oM khyod ni rdo rje las yin gyis//las rnams ma lus kun gyis shig/po ny+dza mang po'i 'du 'phro kun//khyod
155a6(rgyud): kye dgos pa byed pa yin//spu byud 'khor lo'i gzhal yas//gsal ba'i thig le'i ngo bo nyid//tri yi phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog las//tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gas pa smra ma//
155a7(rgyud): mo chos kyi bdud rtsi bla med kyis//dad ldan skyes bu dmas par byas//rab 'bring tha ma'i blo can la//'thun pa'i gsang bsgrags gzhan du min//bskyod chen 'am
155b1(rgyud): 'i gnas ya su//gsal ba'i thig le'i ngo bo nyid//hUM oM s+thA A ha rnams las//dkyil 'khor lnga dang khro phreng bsgom//oM phyogs bcu dus bzhi thams cad kyi//sku gsung thugs kyu
155b2(rgyud): rdorje che//dkyil 'khor kun gyi byed pa po//dkyil 'khor kun gyi sbyin pa spyod//slob dpon mnyes par ma byas shing //dbang rnams thob par ma byis par//nyam pa la sogs rtsen pa rnams//
155b3(rgyud): 'bras bu med cing brlag par 'gyur//dbu brgyan cod pan phreng ba dang //go cha rgyal mtshan phyag rgya dang //gdugs dang bum pa bza' gtung dang //snying po lnga yis dbang bskur na//dus 'di
155b4(rgyud): phyin chad rgyal ba'i sras//ngan song thams cad med pa dang //tshe ring bde bskyed phun sum tshogs//mtho ris thar pa'i bdag por 'gyur//zhes brjod do//gsang ba'i snying po de kho na
155b5(rgyud): nyid nges pa las dbang sbyin pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o////de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen pos sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyal po sgyur ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms
155b6(rgyud): par zhugs nas/ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do//rgyu gcig pa dang yig 'bru'i tshul//byin gyis brlabs dang mngon sum par//rab tu rtogs pa rnam bzhi yis//thams cad mngon
155b7(rgyud): rdzogs rgyal po che//yan lag dbang po rnam shes kun//rnam smin oM du shes par bya//dz+re Da ba'i dkyil 'khor nyi du bsgo/yang na bros bI dkyil 'khro ba//gzu sgra dr-i ro reg la sogs//rnam smin
156a1(rgyud): muM du shes par bya//yum gyi dkyil 'khor nyid du bsgom//yang na khro mo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom//gos brgyan bza' btung glu dang tshig/bro gar tshogs
156a2(rgyud): kyi sprin phung gis//tsu du shes pas rab spyad na//ngo mtshar 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor mnyes//lha mo klu mo rigs ngan mo//dbye 'am yang na mi dbye bar//bsnyen pa dang ni nye
156a3(rgyud): bsnyen po//bsgrub pa dang ni bsgrub chen po//rum gyi pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du//bde ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor spro//sangs rgyas sprin tshegs ma lus la//dgyes mnyam tshigs kyi sbyin
156a4(rgyud): pas bsting //bsgrub pa nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor de//dkyil 'khor rdo rje lce yis blangs//mkha' gro gsal 'bar tsho la sogs//yid bzhin sprin gyi bdag por 'gyur//
156a5(rgyud): zhing 'gyur mchog dang mchog phran rnams//nyi zla'i steng du mkhas pas bzhag/nga rgyal lag gi 'du byed bsgom//hUM du gyur pas rnam par dag/dbying su thim nas phyag
156a6(rgyud): rgyar 'bar//skur 'gyur 'od zer 'phros pas brjid//gtsug tu rnam par rgyal ba sgom//ngo mtshar ngan 'gro thar pa'i thabs//ye shes skye med de bzhin nyid//sgyu mar
156a7(rgyud): snang ba mi g.yor tshul//sbyor sgrol bya ba kun byas kyang //rdul bya tsam yang gos pa med//snod bcud rgyu rnams dag rtogs shing //mnyam gnyis lhag pa'i
156b1(rgyud): \u0f7fsa gnyis kyus//darnal gakhor kun tu brla na khyod spyod chag pa can gnyis rdzuldanas//yon lag ma nyam pa yo byad ldan//chag rdzogs par shes pa yis//rnal 'byor chag sku
156b2(rgyud): de'i dkyil 'khor sa//ngas par leg sa pa'i dgas po'i ga/d+hA daN+Da lI b+h+yo ba yis//tsam+b+ha ru rnga mi wA bkod la//khro bo bcu dang d+hI ma dzug//'khor ma'i tshul rnam par 'dzus/
156b3(rgyud): de bzhin rigs dang rdo rje'i rigs//pang+ka'i rigs te sku gsung thugs//khro bo'i tshogs dang ldan pa yi//tshem bu gsum gyi lha rnams bsgom//rigs kyi rigs te rigs kyi gtso//thugs
156b4(rgyud): kyi thugs te thugs kyi mchog/khro bo'i tshogs dang ldan pa yi//tshom bu gcig pa'i lha rnams bsgoms//khro bo khro mo'i tshigs chen dang //po nya phyag brnyan bka' nyan tshogs/
156b5(rgyud): tsi bkyi la sogs tshogs rnams kyis//dngos grub las rnams rdzogs par byed//rna ma'i byor sngags 'chang dngas grub ni//mnyam rdzogs lhun grub dang gnas shing /snod
156b6(rgyud): la'ang thogs med pa//thams cad ye nas dbyer med pa'o//rdo rje rig su thams cad dkyil//'od 'bro 'bar bar rab tu bsgom//tshogs ming tshul du bstim pad+ma d+ha//gnyi
156b7(rgyud): med gyur nas phyag rgya che//yang na sku gsung thogapa nyid de//thams cad ma lus sku gsung thugs//ting 'dzin gsal bar 'od zer 'gro//gnyis med dbyings kyi nga du zis//
157a1(rgyud): rigs 'dzin dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur//dkyil 'khor ma lus 'bar bar 'grub//nyon mongs sdug bsngal sel bar byed//rdo rje rigasu skye ba'i gnas//
157a2(rgyud): sngags 'chang dngos grub yang dag ni//thabs dang shes rab thams cad kyis//dkyil 'khor lnga dang khro phreng bsgom//chags pa med pa'i tshul gyi sa//'od zer rnam pa mang po
157a3(rgyud): 'phre gnyi su med par bstim par bya//dngos grub mchog gi snying po 'grub//rnal 'byor thabs dang shes rab kyis//de bzhin gshegs dang yum du bsgom//sems
157a4(rgyud): dpa' sems ma nyid du bsgom//so so'i sngags dang phyag rgya dang //ting 'dzin yang dag so sor gsal//gnas dang long spyod ci bde dang //ma nyams blo ni rab ldan pas///
157a5(rgyud): dang po dam mnos bzhin du bya//le lo sgyid snyoms med pa yis//the tshom med par bsgrub byas na//dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur//rdo rje gsang mchog
157a6(rgyud): dam pa thob//bsgrub pa'i zhig dang ches grangs ni//rgyud las smos pa bzhin du bshad//rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o//zhes de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs
157a7(rgyud): pa nyid la ched du gleng ngo //gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o////de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
157b1(rgyud): dgyes pa chen pos rol mo'i sprin rnam par spros te//brgyan bkod pa'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas chad du brjod pa 'di brjod do//sgyu 'phrul dra ba mngon rdzogs pa'i//dkyil 'khor
157b2(rgyud): brtan pa'i ting 'dzin//bro gar phyag rgya'i 'du 'phro yis//'dzum lam na mkhar 'gro bar 'gyur//glu tshig sgra yi phyag rgya yis//chos kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur//rgyan
157b3(rgyud): dang bgo bo'i phyag rgya yis//'bar ba'i rgyal po thub med 'grub//bza' dang btung ba'i phyag rgya yis//yid bzhin sku dang bdud rtsi 'grub/A li kA li'i phyag rgya yis//
157b4(rgyud): thams cad thams cad 'grub par 'gyur//shes 'jug mtshan nyid 'byor pa'i gzugs//'bras bu smin byed rgyu dang rkyen//nus mthu can du gang gyur pa//rigs 'dzin
157b5(rgyud): rgyal ba'i zhing du grags//mi dang lha dang tshangs pa yi//skye ba rnam dag 'dzin mod kyang //khyad par sa la gnas 'gyur yin//pha rol phyin pa kun tu rdzogs//thabs dang shes
157b6(rgyud): rab thangs kyi mchog/shes rab mchog gi mchog gyur pa//sa yi khyad par bcu dang gsum//rgyu 'bras khyad par lhun gyis rdzogs//mkha' dkyil dag pa'i dbyings nyi
157b7(rgyud): zla//ye shes rgyal po stangs dbyal bsgom//rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas kun//mi lus par ni bsgom par 'gyur/dus bzhi'i phyogs bcu gang nas kyang /
158a1(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnyed mi 'gyur//sems nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te//sangs rgyas gzhan nas mtshol cig/dkyil 'khor kun tu rab sbyor bas//
158a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur//tshi ga lhag gam ma tshad yang //skyon nyid dag sto nyes pa med//ces ched du brjod pas rol mo'i sprin gyis mnyes por gyur to//
158a3(rgyud): gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las tshogs bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o////de nas de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i
158a4(rgyud): sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas dgyes pa chen pos chos thams cad ye nas rdzogs pa chen por lhun gyis grub pa'i dam tshig shin tu
158a5(rgyud): gsang ba'i snying po sprin bkod pa'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas cheng du brjod pa 'di brjod do/tsa/ma rtogs pa dang log par rtogs//phyogasu rtogs yang dag
158a6(rgyud): nyid ma rtogs/tsha/'dul ba dgongs pa gsang ba dang /wa/rang bzhin gsang ba'i don rnams ni//yi ge sgra rtags ming tshogs las//brten pa'i tshig gis rab
158a7(rgyud): mtshon to//bang nas gib sgras don 'byin pa//ston pa rdo rje'i thugs la gnas//dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor bsgom//dkyil 'khor
158b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor las byung ba//thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog/gsang ba'i thig le dkyil 'khor dbyings//'byung ba shes rab rigs kyi yum//chen po rigs kyi de bzhin
158b2(rgyud): te/byang chub sems ni rdo rje'i tshogs//dbang po yul dus rig pa rnams//kun tu bzang po'i dkyil 'khor la//bdag nyid chen po lhag pa yis//thugs kyi ye shes lngas
158b3(rgyud): bltas shing //snying po thig le mnyam sbyor ba//bde ba'i ye shes rol mo yis//ye shes dgyes la mchod par 'bul//zag pa med pa'i bsod nams kyis//ye shes sgyu mar rang snang ba'i//
158b4(rgyud): rol mo dkyil 'khor mtha' yas mchog/gsang ba'i thig le nyid kyi dbyings//de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos//phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i//sku gsung yon tan phyin
158b5(rgyud): las thugs//ma lus bdag nyid zhal mthong ba'i//dbang sgyur mchog nyid dam pa yin//dkyil 'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor nyid//rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis
158b6(rgyud): grub//rgyan du dkyil 'khor ma lus thogs//rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyor las//thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor yongs kyis 'byung //phyogs dus dkyil 'khor
158b7(rgyud): 'dul ba'i mchog/sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor sgrol ba yis//bya byed med par dkyil 'khor spyod//ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la//thos bsam sgom pa mnyam sbyor
159a1(rgyud): gyis//rang byung kun nam lhun gyis grub//'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis//'da' bor mi mdzad dam tshig mchog/gang zhig 'di la mos 'gyur ba/
159a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis//phyogs dus kun nas thams cad du//dkyil 'khor ma lus bsnyen pa yi//nye ba'i srasu dgongs par 'gyur//skal ba zhing gi
159a3(rgyud): rdul snyed du//shin tu sbyangs la rab gnas pa'i//dkyil 'khor ma lus bsnyen pa yi//'bras bu gsang chen 'di yin te//'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na//'das dang du
159a4(rgyud): ltar byung ba yi//rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pas//brnyes nas sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs//'byung dang ma 'ongs thams cad kun//'di yis lhun gyis grub par 'gyur//'di ni
159a5(rgyud): gsang chen nges pa yi//'bras bu lam du gyur pa yin//rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus la//'di las gsang ba'i nges don med//btsal kyang rgyal bas mi brnyes///
159a6(rgyud): kun gyi phyag rgya chen po'i mchog/thos bsam bsgom la rab sbyangs pa'i//shes rab mig ldan rnams kyis gzung //snod ldan dang tshul bzang la brtan//lus dang
159a7(rgyud): long spyod gtong la sbyin//gzhan du nam yang sbyin mi bya//rmongs la phyar bas gal te sbyin//dus min par ni srog zad nas//bsregs dang sbrebs par yun rings
159b1(rgyud): gnas//zhes de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du brjod do//gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las shin tu gsang ba man ngag gi le'u ste bcu gsum/
159b2(rgyud): pa'o////de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid kyi dkyil 'khor la dgyes pa chen po'i glu 'di blangaso//oM phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa yi//ye shes dkyil 'khor
159b3(rgyud): thig le che//bsod nams dkyil 'khor sku yi tshogs//snang stong thig le kun tu rdzogs ho//hUM rdo rje bsod nams thig le che//rdo rje ye shes dkyil 'khor ldan//rdo rje sgra chen
159b4(rgyud): mtha' yas pa//rdo rje rgyal po thig le che ho//oM sku gsung thugs kyi rdzogs pa che//yon tan phrin las kun tu rdzogs//yaM nas lhun rdzogs kun tu bzang //'dus pa'i tshigs
159b5(rgyud): chen thig lce che ho//oM mi dmigs sgyu 'phrul mnyam pa'i dbyings//mtha' yas kun nas sna tshogs 'phro//mtha' yas kun nas lhun gyis thim//sna tshogs sku gsung thugs chen po
159b6(rgyud): to//oM phyogs bcu 'jig rten rdul rnyed du//rgyal ba'i don rnams rdul phran snyed//sprul pa rdul phran bsam yas kyis//skad cig yud la lhun gyis grub ho//oM thams
159b7(rgyud): cad ma lus sku gsung thugs//sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid che//sku gsung thugs kyis kun tu khyab//sku gsung thugs kyi thig le ho//zhes che du bsgragaso//gsang ba pa'i
160a1(rgyud): snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i las mnyes pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o///de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngang
160a2(rgyud): nyid kyi khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du mngon par 'du mdzad de/de ci'i phyir zhe na/bdag tu rmongs pa'i rtog pa dang /rtag pa la mngon par zhen pas yang dag pa'i lam dang /bral ba dag gab
160a3(rgyud): pa'i gsang ba ma gtogs par sbas pa'i gsang ba pa la mngon par 'tshal nas/rgyu dang 'bras bu la rmongs pas srid pa'i sa bon rtsub mos 'phangs nas mtshams med pa'i rab tu tsha
160a4(rgyud): ba'i dmyal bar skyeso//de rab tu tsha ba'i sdug bsngal drag pos gdungs pa dang /'di bas shin tu grangs yang ci ma rung snyam pa'i mod la rab tu sbrebs pa dang /pad+ma ltar gas pa'i sdug
160a5(rgyud): bsngal drag po dag gis rab tu nyen pa de lta bu'i sdug bsngal rab tu tsha ba la sogs pa brgyad dang /shin tu grang ba la sogs pa brgyad du 'jig rten gyi khams brgyud cing bskal pa
160a6(rgyud): chen po stong phrag bcu gnyi mu nyamasu myong ngo //de nas rnam par smin pa de zad pa dang /yi dgas ltogs pa dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa dang /'dod pa'i dngos po rnams
160a7(rgyud): yid du mi 'ong ba dang /gdog cing rngub pa'i dngos po sna tshog su gyur pa dang /yong med par yang gyur cing shin tu rid cing skams pa dang /lus dang yan lag dang /dbang po
160b1(rgyud): 'tsham par gyur/bskal pa chen po dru du smras//de nas las kyi sgrib pa drubu mo'i rnam par smin pa de khad kyis bsrabs pa dang sngon gyi srid pas mtshams sbyar nas/yi dgas srin
160b2(rgyud): po rab tu gdug pa gtum po lus gcig lo mgo brgya pa dang /mgo sna tshogs pa dang /lus brgya la mgo gcig pa dang /lus sna tshogs pa dang /yan lag mang po dang /yun
160b3(rgyud): lag sna tshogs pa dang /gdug pa'i lag cha sna tshogs thogs pa dang /'khor rab tu mang po dang /'jigs pa'i gzugs sna tshogs dang /'jigs pa'i nga ro sgra skad sna tshogs pa sgos
160b4(rgyud): pa dang /gzugs dang /sgra dang /dI dang //brnangs kyis thams cad spyi thung zhes byed pa dang /rab tu 'jigs pa'i rlung nag dang /grang ba dang /tshwa ba'i dbugs kyis phyogs bcu kun tu
160b5(rgyud): khams 'khrug par byed na/nad yani brgya rtsa bzhis 'debs par byed pa/myos shing nyams par byed pa'i mthus klu'i rigs dang /lha ma yin gyi ris dang /lha'i ris dang /tshangs
160b6(rgyud): pa'i ris dang /'od gsal dang /dge rgyan dang /'bras bu che ba man chad dbang du bsduso//de sngon brten pa'i stobs kyis thams cad mkhyen pas gzigs nas/thugs rjes 'dul bar
160b7(rgyud): gyur to//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje bkod pa sgyu 'phrul dra bas 'jig rten drug gis phyogs bcu'i srid pa gsum gyi bdag po 'dul ba'i nga rgyal chen po ga
161a1(rgyud): brjid chen po bstan pa'i phyir/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /gsung dang /thugs rdo rje'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po khro ba
161a2(rgyud): rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin 'byung ba chen po rnam par spros pa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyal po ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings las khro mo dbang
161a3(rgyud): phyug ma chen mo mngon phyung ste//hi hi dgyes pa'i gzi mdangs kyis//pad+ma rgyas par mdzad nas ni//gnyisu med par dgyes pa'i 'khril bas thim nas//byang chub sems
161a4(rgyud): kyi sprin las//hUM hUM hU~M bi shwa badz+ra kro d+ha dz+wa la marda Da la phaT phaT phaT ha lA ha la hUM/zhes brjod pas/'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas khyab par gyur to//khro
161a5(rgyud): bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs stong gsum gyi 'jig rten tsam/phyogs bcu'i rdul phra mo snyed 'thon par gyur pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad g.yos/rab tu g.yos//
161a6(rgyud): 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur bur/kun tu rab tu 'ur 'u ro//chem tshim/rab tu che ma tsham/kun tu rab tu chem che mo//shig shig/rab tu shig shig/kun tu rab tu
161a7(rgyud): shig shig/gtor gtor/dator rab tu gtor/kun tu rab tu gtor gtor ro//'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu'i stong khams na gnas pa'i dbang che ba dang /gzi brjid
161b1(rgyud): che ba dang /mthu che ba'i dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa rgyal rab tu brgyal bar gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po nyid 'jigs byed chen po shin tu rngam pa sku
161b2(rgyud): bung zhes byed pa 'bar ba chen po'i khrag 'thung /sku smug gnag cir yang 'gyur ba/dbu dang phyag dang zhabs stong khams kyi rdul snyad mtshan cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa da dbu gsu
161b3(rgyud): phyag drug zhabs bzhir gyur te/dur klod chen por dgyes nas khrag gi rgya mtsho'i dkyil na king rus chen po'i ri rab kyi steng /'bar ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i dkyil na dbang phyug
161b4(rgyud): chen po dang dur khrod kyi bdag po dregs pa khyo shug gi gdan la brkyang bskum du bzhug so//khro bo'i dkyil 'khor sprin phung gi tshogs thams cad de dag kyang la la ni dpal khrag 'thung
161b5(rgyud): chen por gyur te/shar phyogasu bzhug so//lA la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po rin po tshar gyur te lho phyogasu bzhugs//la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po pad+mar gyur te/
161b6(rgyud): nub phyogasu bzhugaso//la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po kun tu la su gyur te/byang phyogasu bzhugaso//de dag kun kyang 'jigs byed chen po'i cha lugs dang /rngam pa'i
161b7(rgyud): nga ro dang /'bar ba'i klong nang bu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhis dri za dang /gnod sbyin dang /srin po dang /gshin rje la sogs pa khyo shug gis gdan byas pa la bzhugaso//
162a1(rgyud): /btsun mo khrag 'thung chen mo rnams kyang so sor sku la 'khril ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs//de nas dregs pa chen po la sogs pa gtum po'i sems kyis
162a2(rgyud): gdug pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po sna tshogs pa bstan nas/mgrin gcig tu gdug pa'i nga ros gleng ba'i gtum tshig tu smras pa/thong thong snying rje'i bdag po ci de ltar byed dam zhes
162a3(rgyud): 'dzer cing shin tu gdug pa'i sems kyis khros nas rnga mo//de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po dbu dgu phyag bco brgyad zhabs brgyad du gnas nas/thugs rjes 'dul
162a4(rgyud): ba'i thabs kyis shin tu khros nas rngam pa'i skad kyis/hUM hUM hUM ha ha ha/khA hi khA hi khA hi zhes brjod pas/dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gdug pa chen po'i tshogs chen po de
162a5(rgyud): dag gi snying dang dbang po kun phyung /nang khrol kun drangs/yan lag kun bcad gtubs nas khrag kun 'thungs nas rus pa kun 'tshe so//de nas hUM hUM hUM b+h+yo e A ra li dza dza
162a6(rgyud): zhes brjod pas/phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams na mkha' dang bcas par yungs 'bru gcig tsam gyi nang du chud par bsduso//de nas 'byung ba ma lus pa'i rgyal po'i
162a7(rgyud): yang rgyal po dregs pa chen po la sogs pa'i chung ma 'byung mo thams cad kyi rje mo'i yang rje mo srin mo chen mo mo'i srin mo dang /tshangs ma dang /'khrag mo dang /dbang ma
162b1(rgyud): dang 'jug sred me dang /gzho nu ma dang /dmar mo dang /bdud rtsi mo dang /zhi ba mo dang /bo chen mo dang /srin mo dang /za ba mo dang /dga' mo dang /ra ra khrag 'thung myos pa dang /gcig
162b2(rgyud): bu spyod ma dang /yid 'phrog mo dang /grub mo dang /rlung po dang /gsod byed mo dang /me mo dang /bag maM dang /rgan byed mo dang /sna tshad me dang /chu lha me dang /nag mo
162b3(rgyud): chen mo dang /ra mgo dmar chen ma dang /bum sna sde nag mo dang /gsus sor nag chen mo la sogs pa bran dang /g.yog dang /yang g.yog dang /'khor zhing gi rdul
162b4(rgyud): snyed bsduso//de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po dpal khrag 'thung chen pos 'dul ba'i thabs kyis yang rigs lnga'i 'jigs byed chen por snang ngur byas nas/de dgas
162b5(rgyud): par rol pa'i dkyil 'khor sprin 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sku dang /gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di dag phyung //oM hU~M aHbadz+ra pra bi sha
162b6(rgyud): A la la ho zhes brjod pas 'byung mo'i rgyal mo rnams shin tu chags pa'i yid g.yos nus prAd+hA'i dkyil 'khor sdud cing rgyas par gyur nas/dper na khab len la lhag 'du

163a3(rgyud): po che'i sku la bdud rtsi mo dang /zhi ba mo dang /be chen mo dang /za ba mo dang /srin mo rnams 'khrilo//bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung chen po pad+ma chen po'i sku la

169a7(rgyud): ba'i//sdom byas de la 'da' ma byed//sdom byas de las 'das gyur na//mgo lus snying yang tshal pa bdun//yak+Sha khro bos gtubs par 'gyur//de bas
169b1(rgyud): rnal 'byor sngags 'chang gi/ji ltar bcol ba bzhin du byos//las de sngon du ma byas na//rang gis khas blangs mnas por bzhin//rul myags tshig nas dmyal bar 'gro/rnal
169b2(rgyud): 'byor dam la gnas gyur pa'i//las rnams yongasu bya ba dang //'khor rnams bu gcig bzhin du skyongs//phra men ma yang dngos grub thob//bcol ba'i las rnams mngon du byas//
169b3(rgyud): zhes bsgo'o//khro bobi sgrub pa'i las kyi gtso bo 'di yino//khrag 'thung chen po la sogs pa'i//bro gar glu tshig chen po yis//thams cad thams cad ci 'dod par//thams
169b4(rgyud): cad thams cad byed pa yin//mdzod lha chen po la sogs pa'i//bro gar glu tshig chen pos ni//thams cad kun+da la za bar byed//rdul cha tsam yang med par byed//'du dar
169b5(rgyud): 'dod na 'du bar byed//'phel bar 'dod na 'phel bar byed//sbos mo chen mo la sogs pa'i//bro gar glu tshig chen pos na//lhan ner 'dod na lhan ner byed//rmugs
169b6(rgyud): par 'dod na rmugs par byed//seng gdong chen mo lA sogs pa'o//bro gar gru tshig chen mos nI//thams cad kun la za bar byed//rdul cha tsam yang med par byed//
169b7(rgyud): gzhadang gdong chen po la sogs pa'i//bro gar gru tshig chen mos ni//thams cad kun la 'byin par byed//kun la rab tu nyam par byed//slas dang bye mo bran mo yi//
170a1(rgyud): bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni//sprad cing gtang bar bya ba ste//thams cad thams cad byed pa yin//ljon pa dang ni lcug phran tshal//gdang cig ma dang me reg dang /
170a2(rgyud): dang ba'i dga' bas chags pa dang //khros pas ka li rab tu bya//zhes brjod pas/de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sbyong bar gyur to//gsang
170a3(rgyud): ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/lhun gyis grub pa'i 'phrin las byin gyis brlabs pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po
170a4(rgyud): tshegs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis shin tu rngam po'i gdangs kyis glu 'di blangasau//hUM gtum chen dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar//'od zer nyi ma 'bum gyis gzi//khro gnyer glog
170a5(rgyud): stong 'gyu ba bzhin//mche ba zangs yag za byed che hoH/hUM rngam pa'i nga ro'i drug steng lderaM//gtum che ma ri rab 'bum bsnyil skad//a a ha la'i ga rgyangs mche/
170a6(rgyud): dbyugs pa'i 'ther rlung g.yeng ba che hoH/hUM khro bo shes rab 'od po che//ye shes dkyil 'khor kun tu gsal//'bar ba'i ye shes kun tu 'joms//sna tshogs ye
170a7(rgyud): shes thig le che hoH/hUM khro bo'i rgyal po srin chen po//khros pa'i dkyil 'khor char chen 'bebs//dkyil 'khor yid bzhin 'byung ba'i gter//sna tshogs khros pa'i
170b1(rgyud): A yot+ta/b+h+ya na na sno du chen go/ kyi bdudu du bdadu rnams 'jams//'jigs pa'i tshogs kyang 'jigs spyod pa//'jigs khyong tshun pa thog yo mnaH/rdo rdzu thags su
170b2(rgyud): rdo rje chu bai rdung ba ba//rdo rje me ste kun 'angadzin//rdo rje rlung skye 'thor rlung hU~M//zhes tshad du thang so//gsang ba'i snying ba de kho na nyid nges pa las khro ba la bstod pa'i
170b3(rgyud): nyi shu rtse gcig gi la//de nas bcom ldan 'dus gyes bya chen pos nga bzhin gshegs pa nyid la sngags kyi rgyal ba brtan par gzung ba 'di ched du brjod do/
170b4(rgyud): phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i rang bzhin 'di//de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid//brdung 'dzin spros la 'tshal ba yi//rnam rtog zhags pas so sor zin//sa rnams
170b5(rgyud): khyad por bkod pa yid//gsang ba'i snying por 'gro de lam/ye shes ngo mtshar rab 'byams ku ni//don du mi 'gyur longs mi gsungs//de bzhin gshegs pa thams
170b6(rgyud): /phyag rgyagasang chen des pa /rtogs nas sgyu ba gang byed bya/de nyid yin dang me rdzogs//de bzhin du shegs pa rnams ca //gdung ba 'dil
170b7(rgyud): gzhan ma mo gro/sgro dang bskur bzhi rdo //gsang ze byung po /na//nyid de nges pa'i dbyings nas /de rjes par lung basbyin te//sras ni thugs
171a1(rgyud): skyes pa yin//sa rab rig pa 'dzin la gnas//zhes brjod pas/de bzhin ga shogs pa thams cad dbyer med par dpyob nas dus pan mnyam pa nyid tu
171a2(rgyud): dbyings sku gsungs thugs kyi lhun stug po bkod pa'i rkyen nyid du bzhug so//'phags pa rtog pa'i rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dri bo'i le'u ste/stong phrag brgya las mtshan nyid dang rgyud
171a3(rgyud): thams cad kyi lung gi spyi/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i le'u las thams cad ma lus par spros te 'khor lo bskor
171a4(rgyud): ba de dag gi 'bras bu'i mchog/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las mnyes pa dang yongasu gzung ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa rdzog so////rgya gar skad du/
171a5(rgyud): badz+ra satwA mA yA dza la gu h+ya sarba A drar shA nA ma tan tra/bod skad du/rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba thams cad kyi me long zhes bya ba'i rgyud/oM rnam par
171a6(rgyud): snang mdzad la phyag 'tshalo//hUM mi skyod pa la phyag 'tshalo//oM snang ba mtha' yas la phyog 'tshalo//de nus dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //rgyal ba kun gyi gsung ba'i bdag
171a7(rgyud): kun gyis dbang bskur gter 'dzin pas//dgyes shing spyan gdangs gus bcas pas//rgyal ba kun la bstod bskor nas//spyan sngar gus 'dug 'di skad gsol//oM
171b1(rgyud): maho//sangs rgyas kun gyi gdang //rtog pa kun gyi rgyal po ste//cho ga rgyas par bstan pa'i rgyud//dri med zab mo brtag dka' ba//'dul ba mdo sde chos mngon dang //dam tshig bsgrub drang
171b2(rgyud): grub pa dang //sku gsung thugs kyi cho ga'i rgyud//mu lus gtan la 'bebs pa 'di//rdo rje sems pa ji ltar lags//sgyu 'phrul gang gis bstan pa de//dra ba'i rgyud de gang phyir
171b3(rgyud): bstan/lung ni gang phyir brjod pa nyid//gang phyir spyi zhes bya bar bshad//gsang ba zhes ni ji lta bu//snying po'i don ni ci'i phyir//de khro nyid ces ji ltar brjod//nges pa zhe
171b4(rgyud): pa ci yi phyir//mtshan 'di gang zag gang la gsungs//mtshan gyi dri ba dris pa'o//thun mong khyad par tshul nyid kyi//ston pa zhes ni ci'i phyir//gnas dang 'khor ni ji lta bu///
171b5(rgyud): dus dang sdud pa ji lta bu//mi bskyod pa ni ji ltar bya//rnam par snang mdzad ji ltar brjod//rin chen 'byung ldan grang gi phyir//snang ba mtha' yas gang gi phyir//don
171b6(rgyud): yod grub pa ji lta bu//spyan dang na mkha'i dbyings ma dang //gos dkar mo dang mA ma ki/sgrol ma zhes pa gang gi phyir//sa'i snying po ci'i phyir//nam snying sbyin ras
171b7(rgyud): gzigs dbang dang //phyag ni rdo rje gang phyir brjod//sgeg mo phreng dang glu gar ci//byams dang sgrib sel kun bzang dang //'jam dpal zhes pa ci yi phyir//dus bzhi bdug
172a1(rgyud): spos me tog dang //mar me dri chab gang phyir brjod//rnam rgyal gshin rje bshed po dang //rta mgrin bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ci//lcags kyu zhags pa lcag pa sgrob
172a2(rgyud): dang //dril bu zhes pa dang phyir brjod//yid dang chos bzangs gnyis kyi phyir//gtso bos bdag la nges par gsungs//gang phyir thun mong ma yin pa'i//nang dang gsang
172a3(rgyud): ba'i gling bzhi las//ston pa bstan pa gnas dang 'khor//dus dang sdus pa ji ltar brjod//grags pa thun mong gleng gzhi lngas//ston pa 'khor gnas dus ji ltar//
172a4(rgyud): bstan pa sdud pa ji lta bu//skyes bu chen pos bshad du gsol//'di ni gleng bzhi'i dri ba tshig su bcad pa'o//thun mong thun mo mA yin pa'i//gleng bslang gnyi su ci phyir 'gyur//
172a5(rgyud): gang gis gang la blang bsrung zhing //thabs dang 'bras bu ci yin ston//thun myong thun mong ma yin pa'i//sems lnga ye shes lnga yi rim//gang dang 'brel pa bshad du
172a6(rgyud): gsol//'di ni blang ba'i tshig su bcad pa'o//skyes bu chen po ston pa'i gtso//sgyu 'phrul dra bar mnga' brnyes shing //phun sum tshogs pa chos kyi rje//gzi brjed
172a7(rgyud): phung po phun sum tshogs//blta bya gang la ci yi phyir//gang gis rtogs par ji ltar 'gyur//rtogs dang ma rtogs khyad par ci//rtogs pa'i sgo ni de ru
172b1(rgyud): gsungam//gtan tshigs tshul dang 'bras bu ni//'di ni lta ba'i dra ba'o//thun mong spyod pa ci yi phyir//thun mong thun mong gang ci'i phyir//shes rab tshogs dang thugs rje dang //
172b2(rgyud): rtogs dang phyogs gcig spyod pa dang //'brel dang rig 'dzin spyod pa ci//gang gis gang la ji ltar spyad//de yi 'bras bu gong phyir 'gyur//gang du de dang mi ldan pa'i//
172b3(rgyud): sbyar ba'i skyon nyid bdag lo gsungs//'di ni spyod pa'i khyad par gyi dri ba'o//thun mong spyi dang khyad por gyi//rang bzhin nyid dang lhun grub gyi//dkyil 'khor zhes pa gang
172b4(rgyud): ci'i phyir//de nyid phyi nang gsang ba dang //'dul thabs gnyisu ji ltar 'gyur//ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor rims gsum gang //lhag pa ting 'dzin zhes bya ba//gnyis
172b5(rgyud): la sku gsung thugs sbyor dang //phyi nang gsang ba'i rim pa ci//gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor ji lta bu//gang phyir gzugs brnyan zhes brjod cing //gang gi gzugs
172b6(rgyud): brnyan gang la snang //phyi nang gsang ba ji ltar 'gyur//lhag pa zhes pa gang phyir te//gzugs brnyan zhes pa ji lta bu//gnyis dang gsum dang drug bstan cing //
172b7(rgyud): don dam kun rdzo'i byang chub sems//phyi nang gsang ba ji ltar sbyar//tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gnyis ci zhig/gang gis gang du gang tshogs nas//ji ltar spyad pas ci zhig
173a1(rgyud): 'grug/'di dag bstan pa'i dgongs pa ci//gnas skabs gang dang 'brel par 'gyur//yan lag rtsa ba gang dang 'brel//dkyil dang 'khor du ji ltar
173a2(rgyud): brtag/gsungs shig skyes bu mchog chen po//gang dang nges pa ma rnyed par//kun gyi spyod par ma gyur pa//legs par gsungs shig rgyal mchog che//'di ni dkyil
173a3(rgyud): 'khor gyi dri ba dris pa'o//gang gis gang la gang dag tu ji ltar dbang bskur phun sum tshogs//bdag gis ji ltar shes par bgyi//gang dang gang du ji ltar 'brel//skyon
173a4(rgyud): dang yon tan ji lta bu//'bras bu rim pa bshad du gsol//'di ni 'jug pa'i cho ga du//las kyi rim pa ji lta bu//rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen po//sgyu 'phrul dro ba
173a5(rgyud): mngon rdzogs pa'i//thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas//bdag gi the tsom gsal du gsol//'di ni dbang gi don mtha' dag la dri ba dris pa'o//gang la gang gis
173a6(rgyud): brten pa yi//dam tshig zhes pa ci yi phyir//rtsa ba dam tshig du zhig bstan//gang phyir rtsa bar brjod par bya//yan lag du zhig bstan pa gsungs//'di dag lam
173a7(rgyud): dang bsnyen bsgrub dang //gang zag gang don ji ltar 'brel//bsrungs dang 'das pa'i skyon yon ci//phyi nang gsang ba'o ji ltar gsungs//lta dang spyod dang bsgrub pa
173b1(rgyud): dad //shes bya tI 'dzin dam chog tu//grub dang mi spyod bsrung ci zhig/rgyal mchog skyes busu bshad du gsol//thun mong thun mong mA yin pa'i//mchog dang mchog gyur ma yin
173b2(rgyud): pa'i//bsgrub pa'i khyad par ji lta bu//gang gis gang du ji ltar bsgrub//dgug dang bcing dang gso dang gsod//dbye dang bskyed dang pham rgyal ci//gter dang mig rnon rkang mgyogs dang /
173b3(rgyud): rig 'dzin go 'phang ji ltar bsgrub//rgyal ba mchog gis bshad du gsol//'dri bsgrub pa'i dri ba dris pa'o//phrin las rim pa gang ci zhig/gang gis gang du brtsam par bya//
173b4(rgyud): thab dang rdzas dang phur bu ci//ting 'dzin 'dug stangs hom khung ci//gdul bya rim po gang ci zhig/khyad par rim pa ji ltar bshad//'bras bu yon tan ji ltar 'gyur//
173b5(rgyud): gsungs shig gsungs shig rgyal mchog gtso//the tsom legs par mchod par mdzod//'di ni phrin las kyi dri ba dris pa'o//rmad byung skyes bu gang zhig gis//drang po
173b6(rgyud): lam tshul ji lta bu//phyi nang gsang ba'i lam ci phyir//stong pI'i rnal 'byor snying rje che//phyag rgya tsog dang spros bcas ci//rnam smin dbang sgyur phyag rgya dang //lhun gyis grub
173b7(rgyud): pa'i mtshan nyid ci//mthar phyin rnam pa du zhig gsungs//phyi nang gsang ba mthar phyin pa'i//'bras bu bdag gzhan don nyid ci//nyi shu rtsa lnga'i don ji ltar//gang dag
174a1(rgyud): rtog pa'i rgyal po de//sgyu 'phrul dra ba blan med//kun las 'bras bu thugs chud pa//cho ga rgyas par bshad pa'i rgyud//skal ngan rnams kyis ma rtogs pa'i//
174a2(rgyud): gsang ba gsang chen mdo sde dang //'dul po chos kyi phung po dag/na mkha' mtha' thug bshad pa kun//gsang ba'i snying po las 'phros pas//ji snyed bskyed dang rdzogs
174a3(rgyud): pa'i lam//ma lus kun gyi snying po 'di//theg pa dman dang ma sbyangs dang //rigs chad dbang dang man ngag bral//ji ltar bltas kyang mi snang ba//skyes bu mchog gi spyod
174a4(rgyud): yul las//rdul snyed sbyangs pa'i gang zag la//gsang phyir gsong ba'i thabs dag gis//dngos grub mtha' yas grub phyir bstan//phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa'i/
174a5(rgyud): rten dang rten par bcas pa'i chos//ji ltar grags dang grags gyur pa'i//thams cad ma lus rgyu gcig kyang //rkyen stobs nus pa so sor snang //khyad par rim
174a6(rgyud): par grang gnas pa//rang bzhin gdul bya ba der gshegs dang //'khrul pa'i dbang gis so sor snang //ma bcos dang la tha dad med//rang snang las kyis tha
174a7(rgyud): dad pa'i//bye brag rnam par bstan pa kun//de bzhin nyid la dgod bya'i phyir//rgyal mchog bde chen yongs gang bas//dri ba'i don 'di lung bsten cing //thabs
174b1(rgyud): dang shes rab 'brel gyur pa'i//gsang ba'i don la dgod du gsol//sgyu 'phrul dra ba rdo rje sems dpa' gsang ba me long gri rgyud las dri ba rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba bshad pa rtog pa'i
174b2(rgyud): rgyal po rdzogaso////de nas gsang bdag phyag na rdo rje 'tshong //skyes bu mtshan dpe rab ldan cing //dpag med rgyal bas rab bskor zhing //rang 'byung dag pa'i gzhal
174b3(rgyud): yas na//thabs dang shes rab 'khril sbyor zhing //kun kyang de dang 'thun pa ste//'dzum zhing steg pas sos 'debs shing //dgyes pa'i tshul gyis bka' stsal pa//dpag
174b4(rgyud): med rgyal bas gsungs pa dang //gsung dang gsung 'gyur thugs kyi rgyud//thog ma bar dang mthar dge ba//thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i//cho ga rgyas par dris pa'i
174b5(rgyud): mchog/nyon gcig da ni sems dpa' bshad//chos rnams ma lus gnyis med pa'i//rang rig byang chub sems nyid de//tha dad med pa'i rang bzhin nyid//rdo rje zhes ni
174b6(rgyud): bshad pa yin//rang bzhin mtha' thug med pa'i chos//thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa yis//thugasu chud cing mngon rtogs pa//phyi nang gsang ba'i sems dpar
174b7(rgyud): bshad//rang bzhin thabs dang 'bras bu'i don//nus pa'i rim pa stsa la snang ba//thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa'i don//sgyu 'phrul zhos ni bzhir bshad//tha dad mi
175a1(rgyud): las tha dad pa'i//ngo bo thabs dang bdag nyid dang //byin brlabs shugs kyis 'brel pa ni//drang ba'i don zhes bshad pa yin//ma brjod grags pa'i bstan/
175a2(rgyud): pa nyid spro kur med dang zhal nas gsungs//dri ma med pa'i lung nyid de//las dang ye shes spyi nyid dang //rdzogs pas rdzogs phyir lung nyid de//bstan pa spyi yi bdag nyid
175a3(rgyud): ni//thams cad kun gyi bdag nyid pas//gcig dang du ma mi gnas kyang //so so'i bstan pa rgya mtsho'i rgyud//'di ston 'dis ston 'di phyir ston//don kun 'di la
175a4(rgyud): yongs rdzogs pas//lung gi spyi zhes bshad pa yin//gang phyir gsang ba zhes bya ba//sku dang gsung dang thugs nyid de//rang bzhin ye nas ngo bo dang //thabs dang
175a5(rgyud): 'bras bur gyur pa nyid//gsang ba'i don du 'di brjod do//ngang gis dman dang ma sbyangs dang //dbang dang dam tshig bral ba dang //rang brtags bsgribs pas sa'i khyad
175a6(rgyud): par/de dang dro yis dbang gis na//ro myong bral phyir gsang bar bshad//rang bzhin thabs dang 'bras bu yi//chos rnams thig le chen po'i don//'jig rten
175a7(rgyud): 'das dang 'jig rten pa//ma lus ro gcig dbyer med pa//ji snyed thag pa'i khyad par dang //bstan pa'i bye brag gnas pa rnams//'dir 'dus thabs 'dis
175b1(rgyud): mtshon pa dang //rtsa bar gyur pa kho na yin//thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i//byang chub sems nyid bde ba che//rang 'byung ye shes thog mtha' med//rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag
175b2(rgyud): nyid de/rgyal ba'i byin brlabs rab snang ba//bsam gyis mi khyab che ba rnams//'di las ston pas snying po ste//snying po dang ni 'od bzhino//rgyu dang 'bras bu bcud 'dus pas///
175b3(rgyud): snying po zhes ni bshad pa yin//gang phyir thams cad byang chub sems//mtha' dbus yongasu ma chad pa//dngos po gsum gyis khyab gyur pa//yongasu rdzogs pa'i rgyu yin//
175b4(rgyud): thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i//de bzhin nyid du rdo rjes rig/bdag dang gzhan don nus pa rdzogs//'bras bu'i de kho na nyid//gang phyir dngos gnyis tha dad por//
175b5(rgyud): log par brtags pa'i snang ba rnams//mun la snang dang gser 'gyur ltar//ro gcig thabs kyis de kho na//de phyir de kho na zhes brjod//dngos po sna tshogs dbyar med pa'i//
175b6(rgyud): tha dad don min dron gcig min//de nyid gsang ba'i nges pa ni//gzhi dang lam dang ngo bo dang //nges pas nges pa gsum du bstan//gang du theg pa bzhi gsungs pa//'gro
175b7(rgyud): ba 'dren phyir ma nges pa//ro gcig theg par nges gnas pa//nges pa'i theg pa bla na med//rang bzhin ma bcos rang byung las//bya byed dang gis bral ba yi//sna tshogs
176a1(rgyud): rgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor 'phrul//rang snang sgyu 'phrul dra ba'o//rang bzhin mtha' dbus med pa las//rgyu rkyen las kyis so sor 'khrul//de nyid byang chung
176a2(rgyud): sems nyid de//mtha' dbus med par mnyam par gnas//de lhor so sngor snang ba'i rgyud//na mkha' dang ris phye ba ltar//rgyud chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba yi//lam gnyis
176a3(rgyud): 'brel par mngon bsgoms pas//thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i//bde chen thig le mngon snang ba//'jug dang grol ba'i lam nyid//sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i lam du
176a4(rgyud): brjod//rang bzhin yongs kyis khyab pa yis//dngos dbang thabs kyis 'brel pa yis//rig pa ji bzhin stobs gyur pas//khyad par thabs kyi sgyu 'phrul yin//
176a5(rgyud): thog ma med pa'i rdo rje sems//chos kun rang gi ngo bo nyid//zab mo bstan pa ci yi lung //thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'o//rtog pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud
176a6(rgyud): bskal pa grangs med sngon rol nas//shes rab sbyang dang snying rje ldan//dad dang brtson 'grus dam tshig dang //tsho gas dag par sbyangs pa yis//dbang po rab
176a7(rgyud): kyi spyod yul yin//rdo rje gsang ba'i theg pa 'di//ngo bo nyid dang byin brlabs dang //mtshon dang rdo rjer grub pa ste//rdo rje theg pa bde ba che//rang bzhin ngan dang
176b1(rgyud): dman pa dang //phyin ci ldog dang mi mos dang //dbang dang dam tshig med pa la//bsang phyir gsang ba'i theg par gsungs//thabs dang bral ba'i slob dpon gyis//snod dang bral ba'i
176b2(rgyud): slob ma la//gsong ba'i snying po bstan gyur na//bdag dang gzhan kun sdug bsngal zhing //sreg dang bsgribs par yun rings gnas//sgyu 'phrul dra ba rdo rje me long gi rgyud chen po las
176b3(rgyud): mtshan gyi don gyi bshad pa dang po'o///de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//thun mong ma gyur gsang ba'i don//thun mong ma yin 'khor dag la//phyogs bcu rgyal ba rdo rje 'chang
176b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor mngon du phyung ba yi//rdo rje pad+ma 'gel ba yis//byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur nas//thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i//nyon mongs lta dang shes bya rnams//skad cig
176b5(rgyud): yud la gsal byas te//thun mong khyad par gsal ba yi//lam gnyis nges par ston pas na//ston pa zhes ni brjod pa yin//de yi gnas mchog bshad bya ba//'thung dang
176b6(rgyud): bzhugs dang rten pa dang //mtshon pa byin gyis brlabs phyiro//thabs dang lam gyi khyad par gyis//kun bdag rdo rje 'chang chen nyid//gtsang ma rigs dag spangs pa yi//
176b7(rgyud): 'og min gnas mchog chen po der//yang dag sangs rgyas der sangs rgyas//skal med skye bo gdul ba'i phyir//sprul pa po ni 'dir sangs rgyas//sangs rgyas kun gyi
177a1(rgyud): bzhugs pa'i gnas//gtsang ma rigs dag rnam spangs pa//'jig rten las kyis mthar gyur pa//'og min 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang //phyogs//
177a2(rgyud): bcur rgya yongs ma chad pa'o//yon tan khyad par spags pa na//gsang ba yum gyi b+ha ga la//bcu gsum sa yi dbang phyug ldan//rdo rje 'chang chen dpag med dang //til
177a3(rgyud): 'bru'i tshul du rab tu bzhugs//chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid//thog ma tha ma dbus med pa'i//rang bzhin don gyi 'og min na//rgyal ba kun gyi pho brang phyir//'das dang
177a4(rgyud): da ltar ma byon pa'i//rgyal ba kun gyi rten pa'i gnas//de dag nye bar mtshon pa yi//yid dang mtshan ma las gyur pa'i//sgoms dang bris dang byas la sogs//de dang 'dra ba'i
177a5(rgyud): gzhal yas khang //rgyal ba sngags dang byin rlabs kyis//der gnas don phyir mtshon pa'i gnas//thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i//bsod nams ye shes khyad par can//
177a6(rgyud): bsags pa sna tshogs las byung ba'i//rdzogs long spyod pa chen po ni//gtsang ma rigs dag spangs pa yi//'og min chen po'i gnas mchog na//rigs bdag phyag rgya
177a7(rgyud): lhun grub sku//gcig dang du ma rnams spangs pa//sangs rgyas kun gyi spyi gzugs te//gdod nas theg mchog mdzod nyid phyir//sgrib pa mtha' spangs gdul bya la//
177b1(rgyud): skad cig cig gis spangs par mdzad//chos rnams sna tshogs ji snyed pa//dngos po tha dad med phyir zlum//khyad par lpags dang tshad med dang //ye shes bzhi phyir 'khor lo bstan//
177b2(rgyud): chos dbyings 'du 'bral med pa'i phyir//mu khyud zlum por kun nas bskor//sku gsung thugs dang byin brlobs dang //thugs rjes ma khyab med pa'i phyir//yon tan rgyas pa'i
177b3(rgyud): dbyingasu bstan//rang 'byung ye shes mtha' bral bas//phyogs bcur 'gro 'od mi gnas pa'i//tshad dang bral ba'i sems kyi phyir//gzhi rtsa tshad med 'khor lor bstan//gdod nas byin
177b4(rgyud): brlabs ngo bo'i phyir//ma bsags lhun rdzogs mdzod nyid//'gro ba re 'dod skong ba'i phyir//rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang //sna tshogs dngos dang dngos med pa'o//chos
177b5(rgyud): kun ngo bor rang gnas te//bdag gzhan gzung 'dzin bral ba'i phyir//phyi dang nang bral sgrib pa med//thun mong la brten thabs kyi 'bras//ye shes thabs kyis 'phags pa nyid///
177b6(rgyud): gdul bya'i blo la mngon snang bas//blo 'bur bzhi ni lhag par mdzes//thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i//gdul bya'i rim pa mthon dman kun//stong smon mtshan med 'od
177b7(rgyud): gsal 'jug/de phyir ye shes sgo bzhir shar//thabs mang bsam gyis mi khyab pas//lam brgyad rim par bgrod pa yis//'bras bu yon tan khyad par kun rdzogs
178b1(rgyud): rgyal ba rgya mtsho kun gyi mtshan//dang phyir rdo rje thugs chud pas//las dang spyod pa dka' thub dang //srid pa'i ri bos mi bskyod pas//de ni mi bskyod mchog tu gsungs//thabs dang shes rab 'brel
178b2(rgyud): ba yis//ji snyed sku gsung thugs snang ba//mos dang thabs kyi khyad par gyis//snang bar snang phyir snang mdzad mchog/rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan ni//tshogs rnams 'dus pa'i ngo bo
178b3(rgyud): ste/yon rin chen ltar 'byung bas//rin chen 'byung bar gsungs pa yin//dpag tu med pa'i gsung gi sgo//dbang po thabs kyi bye brag gis//don brtags gsung dang yi ge'i
178b4(rgyud): sgo//mtha' yas snang phyir mtha' yas mchog/dpag med thugs rjes mdzad pa yi//'gro 'ong med pa'i thugs rje yis//'gro ba skyob pa'i don mdzad pas//don grub ces
178b5(rgyud): ni rnam par bstan//rig pa'i rgyal po 'di dag kyang //tha mal lnga nyid gnas dag cing //de las thabs des mngon byas pas//der dbang bsgyur de nyid snang ba//rgyal po nyid du
178b6(rgyud): brjod pa yin//stang 'og gnyis las mngon gyur pa'i//sbyor dang 'ju 'dul rlung gi rim//gang de thabs las mngon gyur pa'i//bde ba'i gzugs dang tshor ba dang //'du
178b7(rgyud): shes dang ni 'du byed dang //rnam shes zag med bde ba'i ro so//dbang sgyur ye shes rgyal por bshad//gang phyir snang dang bsgoms dang bris//phyag rgya rtsa bcud thig le'i mdog/
179a1(rgyud): dkar dang dmar dang ser ba dang //sngo dang ljang dang rims ldan pa'o//rgyal ba kun gyi bde skyed cing //spyod dang de las 'byung ba'i yum//thams cad de las
179a2(rgyud): skyed pa lnga//tha mal zhen pa dag pa dang //dbang dasgyur rgyal mo lnga rang bzhin//skye dang gshor dang d+mod dang bskyod//nam kha'i khrims kyis glung bye ba//snying 'og thabs las
179a3(rgyud): mngon gyur pa//yul dang shes rab dbyer med cing //thugs rjes shes rab 'brel pa yis//'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das//gnyis med gzigs pa spyan gyi mchog/zag med
179a4(rgyud): stong pa'i glong chen gyis//skyed dang sdud dang gnas pa'i phyir//mtha' dbus bral ba'i de bzhin nyid//nam kha'i dbyings zhes gang brjod pa'o//thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i//
179a5(rgyud): pas dang lte ba nyon mongs dang //shes bya'i dri ma mtha' yas pa//rtogs pas sbyong zhing sreg pas na//gos dkar ma ru brjod pa yin//gang phyir las dang ting 'dzin dang /
179a6(rgyud): ye shes thugs rje bar med chus//gang dag 'khrud dang tshim byed pas//rgyu nI m+b+ha ma kr-I ru ba shad//gung phyir rtogs dang thabs dag dang //ting 'dzin thabs kyi rlung
179a7(rgyud): dag gis//bgrod pa med pa'i zhing khams//sgrol bas sgrol ma nyid du zo shad//snying po rang byung ye shos nyid//kun brten gnas dang khyab pa'i phyir//byang
179b1(rgyud): mas kyi rang bzhin lnga//sa y-i skyong bar brjod pa son//rang 'byung skyong po byang chub semyos//namakha' sgyu bur bsam brjod mod//mtha' dbus sgur gang 'das pa//do na nam
179b2(rgyud): sto ba nyid//gang phyir thugs rje dpag mi bas//'gro bachu bo rgal g+ha~M //skye ba med par gzigs bstan//sbyin ras gzigs de ng+ge'i kAT+wA~M//rtog su dang dpyir med rje
179b3(rgyud): y-is//mtha' yi bdag rtags mtshan ma dag/'joms pas phyug na rdo rje ste//thun mong nyid dang khyad par b+histe//gsang ba'i rnam par shes pa bani//thun mong yul dang khyed
179b4(rgyud): bar ni//thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa las//mtshon dang rtogs dang bsgom+b+ha pa yis//rtse mo bzhir ni mngon snang ba//byang chub sems dang bde ba dang //thabs kyi 'de bas
179b5(rgyud): rab bsgegs pas//lha mo 'di ni sgeg mor bshad//grol dang ma grol 'khor ba yi//phyi nang sgra yi bye brag kun//brag cha lta bur brjod mdzad pas//bar chad med pas
179b6(rgyud): phreng ba ma//tshim pa'i ngo bo gang bstan pa//dri dang ldan pa'i khyad par nyid//dbyangs nyid tshim zhing yid bde bas//de nyid rdo rje gIr ti ma//ro yis khyab cing gar sbyar ltar/
179b7(rgyud): bde 'a chen po bzhi yi gar//khyab dang mdzes dang tshim pa dang //mi gnas bgrol bas gar mkhan ma//rgyan dang chags pa'i sgra dag dang //yid kyi phreng ba zod pa'i gas/
180a1(rgyud): lha ma bzhi yi rang bzhino//ma rtogs 'gro ba mtha' yas la//rang bzhin thugs rje mdzad pa yis//yongs la phan 'dogs skyob pa ni//'di ni byams pa
180a2(rgyud): zhes bya'o//rtogs goms mthar phyin khyad par gyis//las dang nyon mongs lta ba'i rim//sel ba 'di ni sgrib se lo//thabs dang shes rab gnos rtogs na//gang phyir spong
180a3(rgyud): len mi gnas pas//phyi nang bsnod bcud ma lus pa//dbye ba med pas kun tu bzang //bdag dang gzhan du 'dzin pa kun//zag pa med pa'i shes rab kyis//lta ba'i dra ba
180a4(rgyud): gcod pastan//zag mid shes rab 'jam dpal skya//dbang po me ge thig ler bcas//gnas dang rtags dang bsgoms pa yis//mngon du snang phyir brjod pa yin/
180a5(rgyud): dus bzhi rim pa gnyis brgyud//de nyid dgrol dang brod skyed dang //spyod yul dag phyir brjod pa ni//dri dang bde bas ngag tshim zhing //yid ldog med pas rdo rje dri//phyi nang khyab
180a6(rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor la//me tog thig ler bder bkod pas//rdo rje me tog bla na med//phyi nang sems la gnas bcas pa'i//mun pa bsal phyir shes rab dang //ye shes//
180a7(rgyud): snang ba bla na med//rdo rje gsal ba'i mar me ma//phyi nang dkyil 'khor ma lus la//rang 'byung ting 'dzin bde ba yis//thams cad khyab par gnas pa'i phyir/
180b1(rgyud): dran pa sa//de bzhin nyid ngas pa smras/lan+da du rgyas rnams ma lus pa//byang chub stong banar brjod pas//rnam par rgyal bzhes su brjod//gzung 'dzin/
180b2(rgyud): thebo ba'i ye shes 'di //gnyis 'dzin rtag pa'i gnyen pa ste//rtog pa sems de las 'jam sa pasan//ya mnA tAk+kide ga shin rje gshed//gang phyi 'khor ba'i rgyu maN+Da las
180b3(rgyud): thabs dang bzlas de'i rdzu 'phrul la sku/'joms dang snrel d+hir mdzad pas na//mgrin rgyam po de dade //'khor ba'i bdudu rtsi dag /so shes lha rlugs ma grams
180b4(rgyud): sa//gnyis med ci ru gang 'khyim pa/sgrib zang 'dud rtsi la bar shad//gang du lus dang bcas pa yaM//dadang po du ma dang rnam shes reg/rang rgyud bcad pa
180b5(rgyud): skyob rnam pa ba rA gsungs//rung ni cad thog pa dang zu hU~M de ste dang ba bdang //thig la rig par bcas pa nyid// phyi gnas rgyas dkyu
180b6(rgyud): ba dang /gang du'ang 'gro bar mi nus pa dang //de las 'da' bar dka' ba dang //bstims nas bde bas dril bu ma//gzung dang 'khyud dang bsdams po dang //gnyis med zla
180b7(rgyud): mtshon po/rangasas snang zad brten gsi la//rtogs dang thams pa'i tshul gyis sbyad//de dag ma sus dra bye pa/rig pa'i rgyam gyi kune dbya mad//kun gni rdo
181a1(rgyud): /drA ga/kun dang //masnas 'das byas ma byas chos//malus da ma gyu g+hAs//sa nga dang bang byung gA//na
181a2(rgyud): tubabang mod de bshad//mi shigs thig le byede chen po//ye shes lnga ljin dang sna mo'i bcud//rang 'byung lus can kun gnas pa//ston pa po/gsung
181a3(rgyud): d+harmas kyi chos kyi gnas//da bzhi ma tshogs tshul dun//sus smras pa yi tshul dag gis//lus can kun la khyab par gnas/rang 'byung thugs kyi bde
181a4(rgyud): rgyu ba bral ba'i snying po ste/bar ma ar+tha byang chub sems//na mkha'i ye shes thugs kyi klong //ma ni ma ta dran rtogs yod//rnam shes rgyu ba'i dran rtog rnams//yes
181a5(rgyud): nomakhar gsal 'dod pa//dran rtogs rig pa 'khor du gnas//zag med rnam shes pasam mi khyab//ma lus na mkha'i ye shes//bdi chen reg pa'i mi rtog par//
181a6(rgyud): bsdus te nyams la gnas par mdzad//bde ba chen po ma skyes pa//na mkha' lta bur mi byed po//nam kha'i ye shes dbyer med sku//dus gsum kun gyi ji bor
181a7(rgyud): 'di zhes nye bar bstan pa ni//me sogs bzhi yi tshul gan so te//phyi nang bar 'khyams gdong par bcas//gsang ba'i 'og man rgyan rdzogs pa'o//thib
181b1(rgyud): dbyibs spros pa med//brjod med bstan pa gsung mdzad cing //byin brlabs bde chen mi rtog pa//'khor la snang bar mdzad pa'o//ma ni mA nu ma ta ste//sdom byed dran rtog yid kyi dngas//
181b2(rgyud): las can rnam shes de dag gis//gsal bar go bar 'khor du brjod//chos rnams kun gyi ngo bo nyid//thig le bcu drug sems lnga'i dngos//mi rtog lhan cig skyes pa'i don//byid
181b3(rgyud): brlabs mngon sum tshul gyis gsal//thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i//thig le zag med skyes pa'i dus//bsam med lhan cig skyes pa'i tshe//bde ba chen po'i dusu 'dod
181b4(rgyud): shes pa rten dang brten par bcas//thabs kyi rim pa la brten nas//rlung gis sdus pa'i don gyis ni//rang rig thabs kyi rgyal por gsal//gang dang gang la gang du ni//gang gi
181b5(rgyud): gang tshe gang gsungs pa//brjod 'byung rtsa bar de gyur pas//gleng bzhi zhes ni bstan pa yin//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi//dbyer med ye shes gcig gi dang /
181b6(rgyud): rdo rje 'chang chen kun bzang las//sna tshogs sku ni rnam par 'phrul//de tshe rgyal ba thams cad kyang //lha la rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid//lha min ston phrag dog rje//ma~M la thub pa'i dbang /
181b7(rgyud): po ste//byol seng sgra yis 'dul mdzad pa//yid dgas drag pos gdung ba sel//dmyal ba sdug bsngal chos kyi rgyal//gdulta ba'i sbrul sku ngo bong shar//la la lha las 'pho
182a1(rgyud): ba dang //la lar lhums zhugs bltams pa dang //dka' thub bdud btul sangs rgyas nas//'khor lo bskor te mya ngan 'das//gnas la nges pa yod min te//
182a2(rgyud): dmyal ba yi dgas byal song dang //mi dang lha dang lha min te//so so'i gnas te gang yin pa//'gro ba 'dul phyir ston pa'i gnas//lha rnams dang ni mi rnams dang //lha
182a3(rgyud): min yi dwags dud 'gro dang //dmyal ba so so'i 'gro ris dag/rang rang mos dang las dbang gis//'dul tshul tha dad dbang gis 'khad//rang rang mos pa'i phrad pa'i cha/
182a4(rgyud): rang rang brda'i skad tha dad pas//rtogs dang gro bar gang gyur pa//rang rang ji bzhin ston pa'i dus//bstan pa'i theg pa sna tshogs te//rang rang zhen pa mtha' yas phyir//
182a5(rgyud): tshul dang mas pA'i dbang gis na//theg pa sna tshogs tshul du snang //theg cig mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul//gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi dang lnga//dgu dang brgyad bri la sogs pa//'gro ba
182a6(rgyud): 'dul ba'i tshul gyis snang //sku dang gsung thugs las ngag gis//'dul dbang thabs ni sna tshogs kyis//chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor//de tshe 'gro ba so so yang //rang gi bzhi
182a7(rgyud): don rig nas//rim pa lnga 'am thabs gcig gis//rig 'dzin sangs rgyas sa la gnas//rang rang cha 'dzin sprul pa'i lus//sar gnas 'khor gyi dang po yis//de dag zhus pa'i//
182b1(rgyud): ram gsungs pa//blo dang tshi ba dang yi ger bsdus//rgyud ces bya ba rgyun du grags//sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud//lta spyod dkyil 'khor dbang dam dang //sgrub pa phrin las lam rim ni//
182b2(rgyud): phyi dang nang dang sbas pa ste//rang bzhin gnas dang mngon byed pa//thabs kyi rgyud ni gsum du gsungs//phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i//mdo sde 'dul ba mngon pa dang //sku dang
182b3(rgyud): gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud//bskyed rdzogs thabs rim gang bstan pa//sgyu 'phrul dra bar 'dus pa ste//de ltar grags pa'i chos rnams kun//rtog pa'i cho ga kun bshad pa'i//rgyud chen
182b4(rgyud): rgyu 'phrul dra ba ste//sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung gi mchog/thog ma bor dang mthar dge ba//dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyis gsungs//rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me
182b5(rgyud): long gi rgyud chen po las gleng gzhi rnam par bshad pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o////de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//gang zag thabs ni thun mong du//blo yi yul du gang gyur pa///
182b6(rgyud): de ni thun mong yul nyid de//gang zag thabs dang ston pa nyid//de ye sbed yul ma gyur cing //thabs chen gsang ba dang ldan pa//de ni thun mong ma yin pa'o//de nyid skye bo 'khor gnyis
182b7(rgyud): don//rnam gnyis tshul du snang bar mdzad//phung po khams dang skye mched nyid//rgyal ba yab yum sems dpa' dang //sems ma nyid du lhun gyis grug/gsang yul dbang
183a1(rgyud): 'o rnam shes rog/ma lus 'dzums par khrob ste//rtags sogs mtshan mu las smyos sbyor//skam ste las kyis mi gnas bshad//mad rgyas
183a2(rgyud): bzang po bzang mo nyid//chags sems nyon mong d+han pa nyid//thub pa sprus pa drug du bshad/ ni daphyogs na dus bzhi yo//phreng ba 'byung nganam shes yul//dbang po dus dang
183a3(rgyud): lus ches bzhi//mtshan ma nyan mongs sum nyid//de nyid sems phyir mi skyes pas//lhag pa'i bdun gnyis 'phrul ba las//byang chub sems lnga rnam par 'byung //des
183a4(rgyud): bo snang brags chos thams cad//skye ba med dang 'gags med dang //gnos pa med dang dmigs med dang //'gro 'ang med pa nyid du snang //bdege phyir ye shes gnam
183a5(rgyud): snang yang //gzhan phyer de dag ma rtogs pas//rang bzhin ngo bo ye nas gsang //shin tu gab skus gsang ba'i don//de nyid legs par bshad pa'i don//yan+da
183a6(rgyud): minyam nyid gsang bu'o//mA rig lag rtog rkyen dbang gis//'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rdo bar snang //de nyid bde gshegs snying ba de//dngos med dngas pa'i sgyi brgyan//
183a7(rgyud): 'gro ba rnams ni sprin bya'i phyir//sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin las//sgrib pa rnams ni rnam par 'phru//sku dang gzung thugs sna tshogs kyi//chos kyi la
183b1(rgyud): rnam par bskor//rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag kyang //ston pa 'khor gyis gcig la gcig/yab dang yum dang gnyis med dang //gang la glang gis gleng bslang ba//brda' dang dgengs/
183b2(rgyud): de'i tshig gis te//bstan pa'i tshogs ni snang bar 'gyur//phan pa rlung gi sbyor du ris//thabs ngas yum sa gang bskul bas//gnyis med 'brel ba'i chags pa'i 'od//sa
183b3(rgyud): ya bcu gsum sku gsung thugs//bde cheni skyu rugs pa byas shing //na mkha'i ye shes mngon phyung nas//bde ba'i ye shes gsal ba'i ro//sgyu dang dga' dang gnas pa dang /
183b4(rgyud): 'gro 'ong nyid las shes par 'gyur//gang gis gang la gong bslangs pas//gang rkyen dbang gis de dag las//ye shes gsal bar gang snang bas//snang srid lus dang dngos
183b5(rgyud): bar bcas//namakha'i ye shes cir yang sdud//nang gi gleng bskung thabs chen sbyin//gang phyir thabs kyis shes rab la//chags pa'i glu dang sbyor bas bsgra/
183b6(rgyud): rab thabs la lan bskul ba'ang //shad baM yi glu gar dang //sngags sbyor ba yi rim pa yis//phyag ts+tsha ba ni yis mngon sgyur bas//thabs dang shes rab gnyis med du'i//
183b7(rgyud): rgya ba rlung gi spyang ba mos//dgug dang 'gug pa'i thabs nyid//dbapa dong gzung dang bskyil ba dang //zlog dang gzung du sbyong ba las//bskyed dang sngags dang rdzogs kyi
184a1(rgyud): go/thun med thun meng ma yin pa'o//mthar thug rim pa las byung ba'o//kun kyang sems lngar snang ba ste//thabs las byung ba'i thig la dang //shes rab
184a2(rgyud): gsang ba'i thig le dang //gnyis med bde ba las byung ba'i//sems lnga rim par snang bar 'gyur//thabs dang shes rab mnyam sbyor zhing //sku dang gsung thugs las byung ba//
184a3(rgyud): bye brag brgyang ku nun 'dus pa//dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis te//sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lngas//thabs dang rang bzhin 'brel ba yis//'gro ba kun la
