184a4(rgyud): rgya skra btab pa'o//snod bcud dade ba'i rang bzhin gyis//ma lus lhan cig skyes par gnas//gnas gang smon 'jug gnas mthar phyin//skye ba'i gzhi dang thabs dag dang //
184a5(rgyud): skyes nas maNar phyin ye shes lnga//sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin nyid//ji lta ba bzhin rnam par gnas//'gro ba mos pa'i khyad par gyis//gzugs dang kha dog sngags
184a6(rgyud): dang 'od//dkyil/'khor la sngog so sor gnas//gang zag blo dang 'tsham par bstan//rten dang brten can las byung ba'i//rang 'byung bde chen mi rtog pa//lus mad lus la
184a7(rgyud): gnas pa yi//khyab pa gnyis med gang lu'i tshul//gang phyir zag med bde ba yi//ting 'dzin bde ba khyad par can//rang bzhin brtags dang snang ba dang //byin rlob nus
184b1(rgyud): pa'i lha yis ni//phyi nang snod bcud sku gasteng thugs//mo lus sbyor ba gsum las byung //rtsa rang rlung dang thig le dag/rim par bstan dang sbyor ba dang //'phen dang sdud pa rlung gos te//
184b2(rgyud): dngas mar ye shes rlung gis 'jug/steng dang 'og las byung po yi//bde ba'i thig la rim pa dag/dngas snyigs rlung gi khyad par gyis//ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'bras bu nyid//rkyen
184b3(rgyud): gyis nus pa phrad pa ltar//rgyu gcig nus pa so sor snang //'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i//lam ni rtsa dang thig le dang //rlung ni phyi nang dngas snyigs dang //lam dang
184b4(rgyud): ba'i tshul las byung //gar phyir med dang nus pa med//stengs dang log pa'i nus mthu yis//rang lus 'jig dang sdug bsngal zhing //dbang po ma tshang dman par gyur//
184b5(rgyud): dang phyir thun mong thun mong min//sems lnga ye shes lnga bstan pa//rang bzhin ting 'dzin gzegs brnyan du//gzungs ma rigs la rten bcas pa'i//sems lnga yun
184b6(rgyud): ring thung bcas pas//bdag gzhan chos rnams ma lus pa//lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes te//dngos po ma yin dngos med min//bdag gzhan gnyis ka gnyis med
184b7(rgyud): min//rang 'byung bde chen sgyu ma nyid//rdo rje brtsan po rang snang ba//ye shes sgyu ma lhun gyis grub//rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud chen po las
185a1(rgyud): gleng bslang ba bshad pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o///de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//kun gyi shes bya yul bshad pa//chos rnams ma lus thams cad
185a2(rgyud): kun//gcig dang tha dad kun bral ba'i//mtha' dang dbus med de bzhin nyid//sgro skur kun bral mnyam pa las//rtogs dang ma rtogs khyad par las//sna tshogs chos ni
185a3(rgyud): rnam par 'phrul//gzhi dang rtsa ba las 'das pa'i//rang bzhin dbyer med de bzhin nyid//dngos med dngos po yul 'das la//'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa yi//ngo bo sna
185a4(rgyud): tshegs rang snang ba//gnyis med thabs chen rdo rje nyid//e ma'o gnyis med bde chen las//sna tshogs gnas dang long spyod dang //rigs dang kha dog tshe tshad dang //bde
185a5(rgyud): sdug dbang po bye brag dang //rang bzhin sna tshogs rnam par 'phrul//sgyu ma chu zla 'ja' tshon ltar//byang chub sems kyi ngo bor gnas//las dang rkyen gyis gang snang
185a6(rgyud): ba//rang rang zhen pa'i tha dad kyis//dbang po khyad par sna tshogs pa'o//rtog pa'i nus pa sna tshogs mthong //rang bzhin gzhi rtsa med pa'i dbyings//lhan cig skyes
185a7(rgyud): dang kun brtags pa'i//ma mthong log zhen rtas pa yis//'khrul 'khor log pa'i stongabasu snang //'khor ba ma bsal dag pa yi//zhing dang spyod yul/
185b1(rgyud): long skyed dang //ting 'dzin dbang stobs rdzu 'phrul dang //mngon shes ye shes dpag med pa'i//sna tshogs sku dang gsung thugs dang //yon phrin las rang snang ba//bdag gzhan
185b2(rgyud): lhun gyis grub pa'i don//sna tshogs yid bzhin nor bu ltar//ma bsags lhun gyis grub pa'i sku//sna tshogs kun dang dbyer med pa'i//kun la yid bzhin 'thun par
185b3(rgyud): snang //kun kyang rang 'byung byang chub sems//bden pa dbyer med don du snang //gang phyir na mkha'i rang bzhin ltar//gang la de ltar snang ba las//yang dag gcig tu gzung
185b4(rgyud): du med//ma bcos rang 'byung zhi ba nyid//rnam par dag pa'i snying po ste//'khor ba nyid na mya ngan 'das//rnam par dag pa'i dbyingasu mkhyen//sgro dang skur ba kun bral ba'i///
185b5(rgyud): thams cad rang snang snying po las//sna tshogs ma lus rnam par 'phrul//dngos dang dngos po med min zhing //gang la dri nyid yul 'das pa//na mkha' lta bur dpag med
185b6(rgyud): ba/phyogs ris mtha' dbus rgya dpag med//gang gis gang la khyab pa ltar//mkha' sogs rdul bral 'byung ba'i bcud//zag pa med pa'i snying po nyid//lus
185b7(rgyud): can kun gyi dbang po dang //dngas mar 'brel bar gang snang yang //mthong ba log pa'i stobs kyis sbyor//bdag gzhan med pa'i rang snang yin//ma lus thams cad dbyer/
186a1(rgyud): mad pa'i//thabs dang shes rab bcud lnga'i rgyun//long spyod thabasu bcas pa nyid//'gro ba kun la khyab par gnas//gang yang thabs dang shes rab kyi/
186a2(rgyud): sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rang bzhin nyid//rang bzhin dbyer med byang chub sems//bad pa chen po'i ngo bo nyid//'das dang da ltar ma byon gyi//rgyal ba rig 'dzin mtha' yas dang //
186a3(rgyud): ma lus kun gyis rtog bya ba//phyogs med khyab pa'i ngo bor gnas//gang snang ma lus de bzhin nyid//ma bcos ma byas zhi ba ste//gcig dang du ma las 'das pa/
186a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin nyid//mtha' bral na mkha'i rang bzhin ltar//ma lus gnas pa de dag kyang //rtogs pa'i khyad par dbang po yi//mthong tshul dag dang ma
186a5(rgyud): dag gis//rang bzhin yul du ma gyur pas//phyi nang gsang ba la sogs pa'i//dbang dang man ngag 'bral ba yis//de nyid mthong rtogs don phyir bshad//gang phyir
186a6(rgyud): rdo rje slob dpon nyid//yon tan yongs rdzogs nus pa can//dad dang brtson 'grus brtul shugs can//shes rab khyad par gang ldan la//dbang dang dam tshig man ngag
186a7(rgyud): dang /rgyu rkyen 'brel ba'i nus pa yi//bde ba gsal ba mi rtog pa//thabs kyi phun sum tshogs par 'gyur//gsang ba'i gsang chen snying po nyid//sku gsung thugs/
186b1(rgyud): kyi dngas grub ste//phyi nang bdag gzhan ma lus pa//thams cad dbyor med de bzhin nyid//thabs bral kun la rgyas btab pas//mun pa'i tshogasu gyur pa yin//mun snang drug dang
186b2(rgyud): gser 'gyur ci//thabs mkhas rang bzhin des 'gyur ltar//gong de'i lce spyod ting 'dzin gyis//de moM thag tu de bzhin 'gyur//dbyer med na mkha'i rang bzhin du//khi dag dbyangs
186b3(rgyud): dang rdzas la sogs//ma lus tha dad med pa ltar//thabs mkhas ma lus de bzhin 'gyur//tha mal pa dang leg pa dang //dka' thub can dang rkyen rtogs dang //phyi ning can dang tha dod can
186b4(rgyud): gtsang sme can dang phyogs rtogs nyid//mnyam nyid lha las gang 'das pa//ngo bo nyid dang thabs dgra dang //dbang po la sogs log pa yis//de nyid gnod pa'i stobasu 'gyur//
186b5(rgyud): gang la gang gis zin pa'i nad//thabs dang brtson 'grus legs pa yis//de ltar brtson pa'i khyad par gyis//de nyid ma spangs rnam par dag/gang phyir de nyid nges po las/
186b6(rgyud): rtogs dang ma rtogs khyad par gyis//tha dad chosu gang snang ba/dngos la da ltar gnas pa min//rdo rje ste med shes rab ste//me long thabs nyid sna tshogs snang //gnyis
186b7(rgyud): 'brel ba'i mnyam pa nyid//ma lus dbyer med dam par bshad//de nas rtogs sgo bshad bya ba//gang la gang gi don med la//lha dang spyod dang lama'i bras dag/'di nyid don
187a1(rgyud): gnyer gzhan med pa'o//gang gis de dag de don du//tshig dang sngags rdzas dka' thub kyis//gang bstan da yi byin brlabs kyis//bdag gzhan phan
187a2(rgyud): par gang 'dod pa'o//gang las gyur pa de zhig pas//lus sems 'byung ba'i bag la gnas//phyin chad phan gnod chos med pas//dka' thub 'bad rtsol ma
187a3(rgyud): dgoso//gang phyir byed pa'i rgyu bzhi dag/mnyes dang dag pas bde bya'i phyir//las dang dka' thub drag shul gyis//grol zhing thar par 'dod par snang //bde
187a4(rgyud): bzhi bcu drug tha dad lam//khams gsum mthong sgom song tshul gyis//rang don zag pa kun bral nas//rang dron thar pa mya ngan 'das//rkyen rtog bag chags
187a5(rgyud): sad pa yis//'byung med bcu gnyis rang brtags nas//ma rig 'khrul 'khor rgyu 'bras zad//yid bzhin bde ba mchog gis//tha dad med pa'i rig pa'i
187a6(rgyud): sems/bden brdzun khyad par cir bltas pas//gsal la mi rtog snying po nyid//bdag gzhan nus pa'i stobasu snang //chos rnams rgyu ma mig yor dang //
187a7(rgyud): brag cha chu zla 'dra ba yi//de nyid mtha' dbus bral ba ni//bden gnyis 'brel pa dbu ma'i tshul//rdo rje dam pa gsum bkod de//dngos po sgyu ma las grol nas
187b1(rgyud): dag pa'i brten 'brel la brten nas//ye shes sgyu ma mngon sum shar//gang phyir las dang bya ba dang //khrus dang gtsang sgra la brten nas//sngags dang phyag rgya'i mthu stobs kyis//
187b2(rgyud): sgo gsum rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa//de dag las 'thun khyad par nyid//de kho na nyid bzhi rtogs nas//las dang ting 'dzin 'brel goms pas//rdo rje 'chang ba'i sa la gnas//
187b3(rgyud): ting 'dzin rig pa gtsor byas nas//sngags dang phyag rgya bsam pa yis//cha lugs ji bzhin mngon sbyar te/goms pas bdag gzhan don grub pa'o//thabs dang grol
187b4(rgyud): ba'i khyad par gyis//dbang po yul dang rnam shes dang //snang srid phyi nang snod bcud kyi//spyod yul ji ltar 'gyur pa kun//thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i//gsang
187b5(rgyud): ba'i thabs kyis rgyas btab pas//ma lus rdo rje nyid du 'gyur//snang srid dpa' bo thabs chen de//rang bzhin dbyer med dag pa yi//sna tshogs 'phrul pa rang snang bas//
187b6(rgyud): ma lus gnyis med ye shes yin//thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i//thabs dang rig pa gang zin pa//gzhan gyis dor ba'i 'khor ba'i chos//ye shes bdud
187b7(rgyud): rtsi'i ngo bor 'gyur//ma lus gcig dang tha bral ba'i//ji ltar 'thun pa'i snying po la//so so'i don ltar mi gnas pas//bskyed pa lha dang gzhal yas dang /
188a1(rgyud): rdzogs pa ni mkha'i ye shes dang //dngos po lhan cig skyes pa ru//snang ba rkyen gyis sbyar ba ltar//ma lus de yis ngo bor 'gyur//de dag bltas
188a2(rgyud): pa'i khyad par gyis//rang re'i mos dang bsam pa dang //nus pa'i rim pa cir snang yang //na mkha' dang ba'i rang bzhin las//nyi zla gza' dkar sprin khu rlangs//
188a3(rgyud): rang 'byung rang dngas 'gyur med ltar//ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun//dngos dbang don las ma g.yos pas//de dag de ltar nyid gnang bas//de nyid nam
188a4(rgyud): mkha'i khongasu 'du//de nas bstan tshigs bshad par bya//ma lus 'gro ba thams cad la//byang chub snying pos kun khyab pas//kun gyis mthong goms bya dgos///
188a5(rgyud): bas//so so thun mong gtan tshigs dang //thun mongs ma yin la sogs pa//rgya mtsho glong dang chu bo ltar//ma lus 'dul shing 'byung ba yin//thun mong bzhi
188a6(rgyud): sogs gang yin pa//log lta phyogs 'dzin dgag pa dang //dngos dbang thabs dang 'brel mtshon phyir//thun mong gtan tshigs brjod pa yin//gang phyir gtan
188a7(rgyud): tshigs thams cad kyis//rang las 'phrul phyir me long nyid//ma lus gcig dang tha dang min//gang gi mtha' las yongs grol te//dbusu gsung med
188b1(rgyud): gtan la phobs//gcig dang du ma bral ba'o//rgyu dang rgyan dang 'bras bu ste//thabs de gdod nas dag pa gsum//ma lus rang snang rtogs pa nyid//mtshan nyid de yi mtshan nyid
188b2(rgyud): do//rgyu gcig pa dang yig 'bru'i tshul//byin gyis brlabs dang mngon sum pa//ma lus rtags pa bzhir shar te//de nyid rtogs pa bzhir snang //ma skyes dang las ga
188b3(rgyud): snang ngo //chu dang rlabs bzhin gcig pas na//de dang drer gcig dbyer med pas//dngos po lo rgyus nyid kyis shes//'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa yis//rtsa ba chags sdang
188b4(rgyud): lnga nyid//gzhi pa ma bcos skad cig ma//de nyid rang spyir gang snang ba//rtogs pas spyi dang rang mtshan shes//snod bcud rgyud rnams mtha' yas dang //mnyam gnyis
188b5(rgyud): lhag pa'i mnyam gnyis kyis//dngos po snang grags chos rnams kun//ma bcos de bzhin nyid du gnas//mi lus snying po thig le dang //lnga bdag brgyad curtsa gnyis
188b6(rgyud): rgyu//sa ya bcu gsum rtsa yan lag/ro dang gnas skabs kun las grol//dang po gnas dang gnyis pa gnyis//gsum pa ma lus khyab byed pa//nyam su myong byed gtan
188b7(rgyud): tshig so//thig le gnas dang yig 'bru dang //de yi byi ni rlabs 'dres pa yis//bde ba chen po mngon du snang //chu las chu bo tha dad de//rgya mtsho las ni chu thigs dang /
189a1(rgyud): shing su 'bras su m+b+ha/thabs kyi byu par sna du da// sgyum lnga las dang dz+ha hA/ ska lus sems rgyu rdzog la//khams rdzun
189a2(rgyud): ro dang bcud snang ba/ye shes chen por gtogs pa yin//gsum dngas brgyad sogs kha dog grangs//gnas pa gang yin de snod de//so so'i bdud kyi khyad par las//
189a3(rgyud): byang chub sems nyid gsal bar snang //don dam kun rdzob dbyer med pa'i//bden pazhi dbyer med dngas ma nyid//ma lus khyab pa'i tshul gyis snang //thabs dang shes
189a4(rgyud): rang gnyis med pa'i//thig le gcig dang du ma nyid//bral ba'i ye shes chen po nyid//gcig dang du ma las grol ba'o//bcud 'dus thig le gnyis ro rgyu//rlung dang
189a5(rgyud): gdams ngag rkyen ldan pas//'bras bu lhan cig skyes par snang //rang la gnas pa thabs kyis gsal//thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba'i ro//rtswa yig bcas pa bcu
189a6(rgyud): 'dus pas//thabs dang rlung gi gdams pa yis//ma lus spyan skyes mngon gsum gsal//bde dang stod nyid mi phyed pa'i//rang rig bde chen mA skyes gar+b+hag+sa//
189a7(rgyud): ma lus bod dang rnam pa ltar//dbyer meng tshul du rang gnang ba'o//bde ba skyed po'i rtog pa lnga//rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa nyid//ma lus yis chen po nyid//
189b1(rgyud): ye shes lnga yi rgyas btab pa'o//dbang po snod bcung bcas pa yis//yab yum 'brel par bcas pa'i bcud//sems lnga'i rgyud du rang snang ba//mnyam pa bzhi yi tshul du gsal/
189b2(rgyud): de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa'i//phyi nang gsang ba mthar thug pa'i//gtan tshigs mtha' yas bshad pa ste//rdo rje me long bshad pa'i rgyud//gang gis rtogs pa de nyid ni//
189b3(rgyud): ma lus rang snang sku gsung thugs//yon tan phrin las rang snang ba//zag med rang byung dang las 'char//chos rnams 'bras bur lhun rdzogs pa'i//bdag dang gzhan don lhun
189b4(rgyud): rdzogs pa//me btsos ji bzhin dang bzhag las//lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'byung //gang dag gang la gang rten pas//lhun gyis grub pa'i 'bras bu nyid//ma bcos sgyu
189b5(rgyud): me lhun grub nyid//dus bzhi phyogs bcu ma lus par//lhun grub 'bras bur rang snang ba'o//rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba bsang ba me long gi rgyud chen po las lta ba ma lus
189b6(rgyud): pa bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o////de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//sgyu 'phrul dra ba mngon rdzogs pa'i//spyod pa'i khyad par ma lus pa//'di dang bshad par bya ba
189b7(rgyud): ste//rang bzhin thabs dang mngon gyur pas//spyod pa ma lus bstan pa yin//e ma'o rang rig snying po las//bde sdug gnas dang long spyod dang //tshe dang kha dog la sogs
190a1(rgyud): pa//la par mngon par chags pa ste//la lor drag shul zho spyang spyod//la yur ri'os non pa nyid//la gyur ldongs pa'i mun pa nyid//l+ya sa phrag dag sdang
190a2(rgyud): ba yin//la lar ser sna 'thab bcod te//la lar 'chal dang bya ba btang //rtsol dang mi rtsol la sogs pa//de la sogs pa mtha' yas rnyed//chos dbyings mtha' ya
190a3(rgyud): mu med pa'i//nam mkha' dbyings ni mtha' yas par//spyod pa'i khyad par de nyid//rang 'byung thangs kyi spyod pa nyid//ji ltar bsam zhing brtags pa ltar//rang bzhin dbye ba
190a4(rgyud): med pa'i phyir//sgo gsum byed spyod bsam mi khyab//thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyis//ma lus sangs rgyas gnas gyur kyang //ma rtogs thabs dang bral ba'i phyir//
190a5(rgyud): pabade sdug sna tshogs bsam mau khyab//thabs chen dag dang ldan pa la//'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang //nga rgyal phrag dog chen po dag/byang chub lam du bde bar bshad//
190a6(rgyud): thabs dang bye ba sna tshogs kyis//mdzad spyod dka' bu sna tshogs pa//mi dang lha las thar pa med//dper na dug dang ldan pa la//thabs kyi khyad par ji bzhin du//rtogs
190a7(rgyud): pa'i khyad par ji bzhin du//de dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs rgyun//rang bzhin gnyis med dag pa las//brtags pa'i bye brag khyad par gyis//mi mthu ni bde sdug sna
190b1(rgyud): tshogs myong //ma bcos da sa las g.yos pa mad//gang dag thun mong ngo dag las//las dang bya bsgo nas ni//spyad dang spyod dang spyod 'gyur phyir//'di skad spyod pas spyod par gsung //rang
190b2(rgyud): bzhin rgyal ba'i spyod pa yis//chu dang rlabs ltar khyab gyur kyang //spong len bya ba sna tshogs las//spyod pa thabs kyis zin pa medo//gang phyir thabs dang shes rab dang //sgra dang
190b3(rgyud): rtogs pa sna tshogs kyis//thun mong yul du ma gyur pa//thun mong ma yin thabs spyod de//la lar thun mong nyid du ste//thar pa dang ni mthar pa//kun tu rgyu dang mu stegs dang //bung
190b4(rgyud): med dang ni me rabs dang //rgyal po dpa' bo dka' thub can//byis pa la sogs tha dad de//la lar dgod dang drag po dang //gshe dang 'jigs dang zhi ba dang //la lar de bzhin
190b5(rgyud): chags chen po//g.yo rgyu spyod dang g.yem par ston//zhi dang sku dang phre dog spyod//'dod dang long spyod gzir ba dang //glu bro gar dang 'jo sgeg dang //de bzhin 'jigs dang sdigs
190b6(rgyud): pa dang //ma rungs pa dang rnam par 'tshe//zhing khams rdzu 'phrul spyod pa dang //ngo mtshar cho 'phrul du ma dag/gang dang gang gis mdzad pa dag/skye bo ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir//
190b7(rgyud): mdzad pa mtha' yas rnam par ston//zhi la tshangs dang khro la khro//thar pa na chung mdzes dang rol//gdung dang rmongs dang sdug bsngal ba//rang rang ded dpon mtha' yas pa'o//
191a1(rgyud): sku yi rol pa mtha' yas ston//byin gyis brlabs dang rang snang dang //brda' dang rig pa ting 'dzin dang //tshig tu chags sdang rmongs pa dang //shin tu rgyal
191a2(rgyud): dang phra dog dang //'jam dang dal dang snyan mi snyan//brtsub dang drag dang sbom phra dang //ring thung rol mo lha klu dang //mi dang mi min 'byung po'i skye//khyim bdag dbang chen
191a3(rgyud): legs dpon dang //chags can gtum po la sogs pa'i//sna tshogs rol pa mtha' yas pa//dag dang ma dag tshul gyis ni//gsung gi ril pa mtha' yas snang //
191a4(rgyud): la lar byams dang sdang ba dang //g.yeng dang mi g.yeng rmongs dang ri//sdud dang mi sdud yal ba dang //grol dang ma grol rno rtul dang //ma rig ye shes la sogs pa//
191a5(rgyud): thugs kyi rel pa mtha' yas pa//thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul gyis snang //mtha' yas dbyer med dam pa nyid//lung dang rigs pa man ngag gis//tshad ma dag gis//
191a6(rgyud): tra ga cal ba//shes bya khong du chud par 'gyur//de nas chos rnams ma lus pa//bdag gzhan phyi nang dbyer med pa'i//thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul gyis snang //mthu
191a7(rgyud): yas dbyer med dam pa nyid//dran dang shes bzhin brtan po yis//dus gsum rgya mtsho gting lta bur//mi g.yo gsal ba'i ngang gyur nas//sgo gsum mnyam par
191b1(rgyud): sbyor ba yis//dang po rtogs pa'i spyod pa ste//de bzhin nyid la gsal brtan te//stong pa shes rab spyod par bshad//de na pa phyogs bcu ma lus pa//rang 'byung byang chub sems
191b2(rgyud): nyid phyir//gang snang rang rgyud dngos med do//sgyu ma mig yor brag cha dang //rmig rgyu chu bur la sogs pa//gong ma'i stobs dang 'di nyid stobs//mnyam par sbyor bas bsgom
191b3(rgyud): par bya/gang la ma ltas mngon byas dang //ting 'dzin rim pa gnyis med pas//kun la snying rje'i spyod pa dag/dam pa 'di ni spyad par bya//rang bzhin ched du dmigs pa dang //
191b4(rgyud): khyab dang shugs las gang byung ba'i//snying rje'i spyod par rnam par spyad//de nas sgyu ma lta bu nyid//rang nyid phyogs med snang ba yis//cir yang bsgyur du rung ba'i phyir//rig pa
191b5(rgyud): dbu mar gang gsal ba//nyi zla brtsegs pa'i gdan du 'bar//sa bon gang las thabs tsho gas//'phro 'du zhu nas mngon gyur pa//rdo rje gsum gyi ngo bor snang //de nyid
191b6(rgyud): gcig dang lnga gsum gyis//brtan 'bar mdzes par gsal gyur te//mdun dang gzhan du skabs dag sbyor//gcig dang nges med rim pa dang //'khor lo zhes bya bzhi
191b7(rgyud): ru gyur//gang gis gang de ma brtan par//'phro 'du bsgoms pa don med de//skyon bral gsal brtan 'dris pa yis//gang bsgoms gsal bar mngon du 'gyur//tha
192a1(rgyud): mal zhen rtog zlog pa dang //lam gyi 'brel par bya ba dang //dngos grub 'bras la myur 'jug pas//rtags kyi lha ni bsgom par bya//de ltar brtan 'gyur/
192a2(rgyud): gsal ba la//bdag gzhan phyi nang ma lus pa'i//sgo gsum sku gsung thugs gsal bas//thun mong spyod pa rnam bcad la//sgo gsum mnyam bzhag rjes thub
192a3(rgyud): med//gang gis de ltar gsal bya'i phyir//phyogs gcig spyod pa brtsam par bya//de nas rtsa ba goms pa dang //bslab bya khyad par mthar phyin ltar//gang de rim
192a4(rgyud): par brtan 'phel phyir//yan lag spros pa rnam par bsgom//lhag pa bcu gcig dgur ldan pa'i//gcig las rgyas bsdus phye ba yis//'khor le'i rtsa ba lha dag
192a5(rgyud): kyang //yab yum gnas dgod gsal bar bsgom//de dag lhag pa'i lha dgu dag/yan lag tshul du spros te sgom//'dul ba gnyis kyi rang bzhin gyis//mdzes
192a6(rgyud): pa'i tshul dang gdug pa 'dul//lha dang zhal phyag dbu grangs kyang //rtsa ba yan lag spros tshul gyis//dkyil 'khor grangs dang gang sbyar ba'i//rim par
192a7(rgyud): spros shing bsgom par bya//grangs dang grangs med tshul dag gis//dpag tshad rgyang grags mkha' dbyingasu//zhi dang khro la sogs pa yi//sangs rgyas sprin
192b1(rgyud): tshogs sna tshogs bsgom//dang po'i bar dang tha ma'i bar//rig pa'i ting 'dzin gsal brtan nas//sku gsum thugs dang ldan pa yi//tshom bu ram par bsgom par bya//dgon pa'i rim pa 'am
192b2(rgyud): nags tshal dang //chu 'gram ri rtse dur khro dang //skyon bral yon tan rdzogs pa ste//dgra dang phyogs mtshams skyon med pa'i//brtag pa'i rim pa ldan pa yis//shes dang 'thad
192b3(rgyud): pa'i sa phyogasu//gzhal yas rim rtsegs mdzes ldan pa//rgyan dang bcas pa ldan byas la//ting 'dzin mnyam po'i shes rab thabs//mi ldan gong ma'i 'od kyis sbyang //bdag
192b4(rgyud): rang gzhon gyi nus pa yis//mnyam nas tshogs la 'jug par bya//yo byad lnga ldan thogs med par//cho ga'i rim pa ji bzhin btsam//blo glu gar dang ting 'dzin bcas//bar chad
192b5(rgyud): med par bsgrub par bya//gal te 'dod pa ma rdzogs par//sgyu mo'i lus de ma brtan na//yid kyis rdo rje gsum gsal las//rnam par smin pa'i rig 'dzin de//phyin chad
192b6(rgyud): 'jigs bral khyud bzhino//de bas 'brel ba'i spyod ldan no//dbang sgyur zag mang sa thob ste//brgya dang stong sogs 'jig bral zhing //gling dang 'jig rten brgya skyong du//
192b7(rgyud): 'dul ba'i cha 'phrul mtha' yas snang //'jig pa med cing mi ldogs//dpa' bo rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas//gzhan don spyod pa'i khyad par dag/'dul ba'i dbang ni sna
193a1(rgyud): chags kyis//rnam par rtse pa sgra tshogs s+ho//'di ni la ba thams cad kyi//shes rab kyi yi stod pa ste//chog rgyas par bstan pa yin//de nas gan/
193a2(rgyud): yang bshad bya ba//nang du 'jug pa'i rim pa yi//spyod pa'i khyad par cho ga dag/de nas rim pa 'di dag bshad//lus can 'gro ba thams cad la//tsakra bzhi dang
193a3(rgyud): gsung thug so//sdor dang 'bar ma 'khyil ba dang //'brel dang ma 'brel khug pa dang //'dzin dang 'dzag dang gnas pa dang //de bzhin khyab dang 'khrul ba'i rtsa//gang
193a4(rgyud): du rgyu dang gnas 'dzin pas//rtswa zhes de la mngon bshad//de dag rgyu dang lam 'bras dang //thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas//badre ba chen po skyed par byed//gong da
193a5(rgyud): ga gi rang bzhin las//spyi dang khyed par kha sbyor 'byung //sa bon khyab byed 'khor lo yis//thams cad khyab cing 'dzag pa'i rtsa//dngas snyigs rlung dang 'brel
193a6(rgyud): ba yis//gang de pho mo'i bcud rkyen gyis//zag dang zag med bde ba spyod//lus kun khyab par gnas pa nyid//dngas ma thur gyi rlung dang 'grogs//gang na sku
193a7(rgyud): sbyor 'khor lo can//des kyang kun khyab rgyu ba can//'khrul zhing 'khor bas 'khor lo ste//gsung gi 'khor lo ngag gi brten//rdzogs dang ma rdzogs gang ma
193b1(rgyud): glus la//sgyu sbyong dag dang mu dag gyur//d-i dang rgyun dang mo bstan dang //byadang dr-in+da dung ba dang //rmugs pa'i spyan sna chags s+ho//mdog dmar lus khyab kyu la sngags//
193b2(rgyud): 'i rlung dang 'grogs te glenas/srog gi rten//mthu sa bzhi rgya kun b+h+yo \u0f7f/skyeb ni yan lag brgyad dang ldan//dngas ma lnga 'dus kun ga//phyi rim rin
193b3(rgyud): chen sul mangs 'dra//mi shigs thig le bde chen gri//rin chen phung po za mi rtog/sna tshogs ye shes lnga'i bdage/thung ngu a'i rang bzhin can//srog gi rlung dang 'grog
193b4(rgyud): te gnas//phyi rim pad+ma 'dab brgyad de//chos nyid ye shes yon+d+ra dang //rang rgyud bzhi la yan lag brgyad//thun mong phyi yi rim pa yin//'di la rtsa gsum rim pa ste//
193b5(rgyud): zag pa'i rtsa dang mngon shes rtsa//chos nyid rim pa gsum du gnas//rlung yang gcig gam gnyis yin te//de las bye brag dpag med pa'o//gnas pa dang ni rgyu ba'i
193b6(rgyud): rlung gnas pa srog dang ye shes te//rgyu ba bzhi ni mngon par brjod//phyi nang can dang gyen thur can//de re'ang dngos snyigs khyad par gyis//rim pa brgyad du mngon
193b7(rgyud): snang yin//gnyid dang 'gro ba'i sa bon gyis//chags sdang dran tog kun gyi gzhi//gang du gnas dang gnas ma yin//rgyu zhing 'pho ba rlung gis te//bde dang sdug
194a1(rgyud): bsngal ji snyed pa//myong zhing skyed par byed pa yin//'di ni gnas dang mi gnas kyis//srog dbang dran pa dbang sgyur bas//gnas dang 'pho ba pha rol dag/
194a2(rgyud): gnas pa srog gI rlung cano//gang du 'khrul pa mdzad pa ni//mA lus 'gyed cing spro ba yi//gyen thur 'dzeg cing 'gengs 'byung ba'i//sgo gnyis lus kun khyab pa'i rtsa/
194a3(rgyud): drug cu rtsa bzhi snying po can//phyi ram bzhi yi rgyun du 'khyil//dbus nas 'khyil ba thig le'i rtsa//'phen pa bde ba'i rlung dang 'bregs//gang du'ang 'khrul cing sprul
194a4(rgyud): pa'i phyir/sprul pa'i 'khor lo shes rab nyid//de 'og gru gsum 'bar ba'i rtsa//gyen du 'bar dang thur du 'phro//'od kyis 'bar ba ri sa bon can//rtse mo'i 'og nas ren
194a5(rgyud): pa'i khams//gtum mo lte 'og 'bar ba'i rtsa//skyes bu chags pa slong ba ltar//'di dag bde ba bskyed pa ste//gnas sa tshad dang bcas par gnas//de 'og g.yo
194a6(rgyud): ba rlung gi brten//'gyed dang 'dzum pa'i las can nyid//de dang de gnyis gang ldan pas//lus kyi dngas snyogs 'dris 'byed pa//bye brag brgyad cu rtsa gnyis rtsa//'dus pa
194a7(rgyud): sku gsung thugs yin te//lte ba thur du 'dzag pa'i rtsa//rtsa gsum 'dom pa'i bde ba'i gnad//rgyu bi rlung ni thig le'i rten//'gyod cing 'dud pa g.yas g.yon te//
194b1(rgyud): cu drug 'dus pa'o snyan rje gang //rta gsum mngon par 'dus pa na//sgra spyod 'khor lo dag blo gnad//da nas dang su ma'i thog la la//ma lus 'das pa'i tshul du gnas//rag pa
194b2(rgyud): na lho bcud 'dus pa'i//thogs med gsal ba'i mngon shes 'byung //phyi rol zag pa'i rtsa nyid la//bde ba chen po'i bdud 'dus pa//bde tshan nyams kyi spyi bar 'gyur//chos nyid
194b3(rgyud): thig lo mi g.yo ga/dwangs ma 'dus pa'i bcud thim pas//ye shes lnga dang ldan pa yi//zabu med ye shes bde ba che//nam kha'i dbyings ni rgya che ba//thog mtha' med par gyu
194b4(rgyud): par 'gyur//'di nyid rtogs dang mi rtogs las//'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa yi//spyod pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur//thabs kyi khyad par phyag rgya lta//bskrad pa rlung dang 'bar ba
194b5(rgyud): me//thaMg le chu dang 'dzin pas//bde chen namakha'i phyag rgyar gsal//bde bas bde ba'o dri ni mthong bas//rtsa dang thog le rlung dag dang //bod ba rang rig ma skyes pa//de nyid 'a
194b6(rgyud): chen mi rtog pa//rang rgyud bral bas zag pa med//rang rgyud med pa'i bde ba nyid//dngas ma'i thig les kun khyab pas//phyi nang dbang por bcas pa yis//bde ba rgyu ma'i rang bzhin
194b7(rgyud): 'char//sa lus 'di bachen panyid//de la de yis rgyas btab pas//bdes mi rtog lhan cig skyes//phyag rgya gcig tu gsil bar gnas//gang du 'khar mo gyi bdud ldan//
195a1(rgyud): sa bon yi ga 'de ba dang //khams lnga ye shes ro ldan zhing //steng dang bde ba'i thig le 'dres//rtag tu dran par gnas pa nyid//re re'ang de ltar gnas pa
195a2(rgyud): phyir//'khor lo rtsa bcud thig ler bcas//lha dang ye shes sku gsung thugs dang lus snang ba snod bcud kun//spros bcas phyag rgya'i grangasu gsal//bcud lnga yis
195a3(rgyud): kho na'i phyir//dngas snyings dbyer med thig le'i don//so sor kha dog dbyings tshul dang //sbos po'i sku gsung thugs dag la//dbyer med gsal ba'i rig pa yis//
195a4(rgyud): ma lus bde chen mngon du gsal//de nas bde ba chen po nyid//gar thabs rlung gis dbang bsgyur nas//ma lus bde ba'i rig pa 'char//gtsang dang 'dzem pa bral
195a5(rgyud): gyur nas//bshung ba lnga dang 'dod pa lnga//thig le bcud dang dngas mar bcas//thig le tshon por 'dres pas na//mi 'gyur 'chi med tshe la gnas//rang rig bde
195a6(rgyud): ngo chen po nyid//thog ma tha ma med par gnas//thig le rgyu de rlung dang bcas//zag med dngas ma'i snying por thim//mngon shes lnga ldan zag pa med//dngas ma'i
195a7(rgyud): snying por lam mthar phyin/de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba//'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa dag/thabs dang shes rab kha sbyor ba'i//bden gnyis nye zla'i khyad par las/
195b1(rgyud): ldan nas nga nag na ma ma thag na rgyu gas pa smra/ da la //dun dang dag na sa 'o//
195b2(rgyud): du s+yAd d+hi dang re//reg nga na tshigs kyis//kun dang tshang de'i rang bzhin gyis//rang bzhin ban ni gsal bar 'gyur/sarnamal 'khor ba'i lta//rdzag
195b3(rgyud): da sa skyes gas pa// na /lus da ma lus pa//rdza sa dang shes shA m+bu ga sbyang grags//sbyin du 'khrugs pa'i la ba lta/
195b4(rgyud): ba kA dadu rgyu gnas/sa de mi hU~Ms/ ni rje zlum ze dang //dmas rims kyi'i gar mkhan sa//rdol man chang ma nyid das
195b5(rgyud): swA dab+haka mo srid mo dang //mthar sgeg dus ma sa sonas//sa nga du shed//bcu gnyis bcu ba ni tsu sh+le dang /brgyud srung ldan
195b6(rgyud): 'du /'a zla lus pa da mas las//na cig skyes pa gsus tsugal /
196a1(rgyud): shAng /mas pang btsun po R+tha \u0f88\u0f90//gnas bzhin na la las dang shes rab gnyis med pa'o//rgyu rgyu ba'i ldan sa /
196a2(rgyud): dngas skyigs rlung gis nges bzung nas//dngos pa lhan cig skyes pa dag/bdag po gdung can sgyur ba'i//'gro 'du byed drung bcung ba dang //bzlog pas nyi n+d+he dbyer mdan+ta /
196a3(rgyud): 'jug hU~M la sags nas/rje'atsha chen gsang bdag byur/ma sems sde mthar byin pa//sngabs kyi khyad par gsapa 'gyur//rjes dang zhes
196a4(rgyud): nyis me pa'i//reg minan mkha'i shar sgronas/nyi zla dus gcig sha rA ba //das cha gsa' gos klad ba//nyon mtshan med pa'i ye //'phen parlung
196a5(rgyud): rgyung ngas 'byung //nal 'byer rig pas snang ba yi//khyab bo namakha'i 'jig rten na//bad chen mdzes pa'i martag la//bcud kyis khyad par gang gnas pa//thabs dang
196a6(rgyud): sa rab 'brel ba yi//shes dang b+hU ri'i bung bsdus nas//rnal 'byor bcud kyis rgyas 'gyur nas//bcu gsums la lhun gyis grub//'khyud pa'i gar thabs lnga
196a7(rgyud): byung ba //bde ba'i chen na mi rtag go//skad cig cha las byung ba po//zag mod ye shes sbyong ba ste//ma lus dngas ma'i rma snang gi/zhan dril steng rtag mi gan+d+ha
196b1(rgyud): sman da sbyin sa da dzi ba nyid rji bu'i rten pa med//ma gzugs sman+da /
197a1(rgyud): dgon pa dur khrod ldan pa yi//gsang ba'i 'og min 'bar ba nyid//rim pa phyi nang bar ldan par//nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan sbyangs nas//dus gsum thig ler ro gcig/
197a2(rgyud): pa'o//bde chen gnyisu med par bzhugs//thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i//chom bu'i tshogs kyang de bzhin te//thun mong dram tshig ting 'dzin dang //byang chub shre
197a3(rgyud): rab snying rje lnga//gzhan du thabs dang shes rab dang //spyad dang glu gar rgyan dang bcas//ma spangs rol par long spyad pas//ye shes nyi zla rgyun 'char ba//rlung sems yis
197a4(rgyud): bcas pa nyid//rgyu ba med pa'i zag pa bral//na mkha'i mthar thug par nyid du//zag med bde ba rgyun mi 'chad//de nyid tshad med dkyil 'khor te//bde chen mngon du gang
197a5(rgyud): bar snang //de dag lam la zhugs pa yi//phyi nang gsang ba ma lus pa'i//spyod pa'i khyad par thams cad kun//'dir ni rgyas par bstan pa yin//thabs dang shes rab
197a6(rgyud): ldan gyir pas//phyi nang gsang ba la sogs pa//skabs la bab pa'i rnal 'byor pa//gang yang rung bas spyod par bya//dang po rtogs nas mthar thug pa'i//phyi nung
197a7(rgyud): gsang ba'i lam spyod la//spyad bya yul zhes gang 'dod de//thams cad blang dor med par spyad//thabs kyi lto spyod ting 'dzin gyis//pad+ma la ni 'dam bzhin nam//
197b1(rgyud): mun snang gsor 'gyur thabs bzhin du//thabs la mkhas pas spyad par bya//skyes mchog thabs dang ldan pa yis//zhing dang spyod yul dag pa la//chags bral bde bar gang spyod pa//
197b2(rgyud): namakha' dbyings kyi long spyod la//bde ba chen por long spyod cing //lhun gyis grub pa'i bdag por 'gyur//gang dag thabs dang mi ldan zhing //don med lam la ma 'brel par//sgra dang
197b3(rgyud): tshig la brten pa yis//gsang ba'i spyod pa gang brtsams pa//gang bsgrubs snang bar mi 'gyur gyi//nus med g.yul du zhugs pa ltar//bdag gzhan gnyis ka brlag pa dang //mthong
197b4(rgyud): ba'i chos la sdug bsngal zhing //ngan 'gro log pa'i gnasu 'gyur//rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud chen po las spyod pa rgyas par bshad pa'i le'u ste lnga
197b5(rgyud): pa'o////de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//rang bzhin ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan dang //lhag gnyis ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan dang //byang chub sems dang chogs nyid kyi//
197b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor don ni bshad par bya//gang phyir dbang yul rnam shes kun//gzhan snang tha dad ma yin pa'i//ma lus rang rig byang chub sems//ma bcos rang bzhin 'od gsal
197b7(rgyud): gan ma lus kun gyi snying po ste//phyogs bcu 'das dang ma byon pa'i//rgyal ba rnams kyi rang bzhin yin//'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa yi//chos rnams ma lus thad kun//
198a1(rgyud): sna tshogs rang bzhin dbyer med pa//de nyid rang bzhin chos sku yin//de nyid 'jig rten brtan g.yo ste//ji ltar snang grags thams cad kun//nges pa'i rang bzhin bzhi bcu
198a2(rgyud): gnyis//rang bzhin long spyod rdzogs skur bshad//de nyid phyag rgya sna tshogs te//kun tu sku dang gsung dang thugs//yon tan phrin las bsam yas mchog/rang bzhin sbrul sku
198a3(rgyud): bsam mi khyab//ji snyed 'gro ba ma lus kyi//lus can snying la gang gnas pa'i//rang 'byung zag med ye shes gzugs//mi shigs thig le bde chen po//nam mkha' lta bur kun
198a4(rgyud): khyab pa//mi gnas chos sku'i rang bzhin yin//de nyid rtsa ba'i rang bzhin las//ma lus snod bcud rang bzhin can//rtog pa ma lus dkyil 'khor te//long spyod rdzogs pa'i rang
198a5(rgyud): bzhin nyid//de nyid thig le phra rags par//snang ba'i mdzad pa bsam mi khyab//de yis de 'dul snang ba'i rgyu//sprul pa rang bzhin zhes bshad//gang 'dir phung po 'byung ba dang //
198a6(rgyud): rnam shes dbang po yul dus dang //nyon mongs rtag chad yid chos bcas//gang la mngon pa ro mi snang yang //rang bzhin ma bcos dkyil 'khor te//kun la khyab par snang ba
198a7(rgyud): yin//rang snying dngas ma lngar ldan pas//dngas ma'i phung po 'byung ba dang //dbang po yul du bcas pa yi//rtsa bcud thig ler bcas pa nyid//sku gsung thug su ring snang
198b1(rgyud): /ma lus kun la rgyas btab pa//bcud 'dus thig le chen po nyid//nyi zla 'das pa'i rang bzhin nyid//bde ba'i thig le rang snang ba//ma lus 'dus pa'i tshul dag gis//thabs kyis
198b2(rgyud): mngon du gyur na yang //gnyis med thig le bde ba'i ro//'gro ba kun la rang bzhin snang //de dag yab yum sku gsung thugs//rtsa bcud thig ler bcas pa nyid//'du 'bral med
198b3(rgyud): par ye gnas pa'o//gang phyir rgyal ba thams cad kyi//zag med ye shes rang snang gi//dpag med yon tan rgya mtsho nyid//ye shes 'og min pho brang ste//zag med yon tan rgyan
198b4(rgyud): ldan pa'i//'khar lo 'bar ba'i pho brang dbus//mi 'jigs phung po'i gdan stengs na//bdag po kun bzang 'khor lo bskor//bka' sdod skyes bu mdun na gnas//gzhan yang rgyal
198b5(rgyud): ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs//sku gsung thug dang yon tan las//rang rang rigs lnga gang gyur pa'i//rnam thar dbu dang ye shes phyag/so so'i bzhugs tshul ldan pa yis//mdun rgyab phyogs
198b6(rgyud): bcur 'khod pa nyid//yab yum 'brel ba'i tshul gyis gnas//rang 'byung mi bsgribs ye shes phyir//zag med tshogs gnyis las byung ba'i//na mkha'i khams dang rgya mnyam
198b7(rgyud): nga'o//'jig rten drangs med rdul dang bcas//bkod pa phun sum tshogs par gnas//gong de zag med ye shes kyi//phyag dang zhal dang thabs ldan pas//zhal
199a1(rgyud): mthong rigs la dbang sgyur bas//rdo rje 'dzin pa chen por gyur//rgyal ba de dag ma lus pa'i//gsung mchog brjod med pa nyid//na mkha'i dbyings kyis mthar
199a2(rgyud): thug pa/brda' dang don dang byin rlabs dang //gAsang bA la sogs ci rigs par//dam pa'i tshe sgra rgya mcha sgrogs//zag med ye shes rgya mtsho yi//byin brlabs cho 'phral mngon
199a3(rgyud): shar ga/a A/i yI/au U/e ai/i au/r-i r-I/l-i l-I/a aHkA kha ga g+ha da/tsaM tshaM dza dz+nya nya/ta tha da d+ha na/Ta rba Da D+ha/Na pa pha ba b+ha ma/ya ra la wa/sha Sha sa ta
199a4(rgyud): kla/'di dag rab tu phyung ba yis//phyogs bcu 'jig rten khams bcas pa'i//na mkha'i dbyings dang rgya mtsho dang //'khor ra yug dang lhun po dang //'bab chu steng ka mtshe'u
199a5(rgyud): bcas//de na gnas pa'i 'gro ba rnams//rang rang long spyod bde sdug bcas//phyi nang snod bcud bcas pa rnams//ma lus g.yo zhing ldeg par byed//sgra bo che yang sgrogs
199a6(rgyud): par byed//de dag sbyangs nas mi gnas par//gsung gi ngo bor byin brlabs te//de dag stong nyid la thim pas//ma lus stong pa nyid du 'gyur//a nI stong dang mi stong gi/
199a7(rgyud): dbu ma dmig su'ang yod ma yin//ji snyed snang grags chos rnams kun//yi ge phreng ba nyid la gnas//gang phyir de yi rang bzhin yang //rang bzhin che 'phral teng
199b1(rgyud): 'dzin dang //gsang ba bris par gang snang ba//rig pa'i khyad par snang ba yin//rna ba dang ni rgyan zhes dang //lha yi yi ge mngon snang ba//rang bzhin sku gsung thugs nyid//khyab pa'i tshul gyis ma
199b2(rgyud): lus snang //gang du thugs rje byin rlabs dang //ting 'dzin rig pa'i cho 'phrul te//rang rang khyad par mngon snang yin//'di dag rang bzhin sna tshogs pa//gang du ji ltar gnas pa kun//
199b3(rgyud): yi ger ma gyur med par gnas//rgyal ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//ye shes rgya mtsho'i gsang ba'i thugs//mthar thug med pa'i na mkha' bzhin//zag med rgyas pas kun
199b4(rgyud): khyab can//shes bya'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas pa//gcig dang du ma med tshul gyis//ye shes ma sgribs gsal ba yis//nam mkha' dbyings ltar gsal mkhyen pa//dus
199b5(rgyud): gsum chos dang 'gro ba dang //zhing khams rgyal ba dpag med dang //ri dang rgya mtsho rdul bcas pa//snga phyi ma bsgribs da lta nyid//me long lta bu'i mngon du snang //dpal ldan nam
199b6(rgyud): mkha'i dkyil 'khor du//ye shes lnga yis kun khyab can//kun mkhyen stobs bcu mtha' thug med//na mkha'i dbang phyug bde chen po//mngon shes rgya mtsho pha rol byon
199b7(rgyud): shes bya'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kun//sad dang sangs pa'i bdag nyid can//thog ma tha ma med pa'i bdag/bde ba chen po sgyu ma nyid//rang byung thugs las gzhan pa
200a1(rgyud): min//'di ni rgyal ba thams cad kyi//sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin te//gdul bya gang gi ngo drag tu//sna tshogs mngon par 'phrul pa yin//gang du 'khro
200a2(rgyud): gtum gdug ldan pa'i//srid gsum dregs pa'i bdag po dag/thugs rjes 'khros pas gdul ba'i phyir//khro bo'i de bzhin gshegs par mdzad//sku ni ri rab lta bu nyid//
200a3(rgyud): zhabs dang phyag ni rdul rnyed//gang de gdul ba'i khyad par gyis//zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi dang //dbu dgu bco brgyad phyag la sogs//nyi shu rtsa gcig dbu la
200a4(rgyud): sogs//de bzhin g.yo rdul mi g.yo ba'i//phyag zhabs zhal yang de bskyed de//mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa des//ji snyed phyogs bcu 'jig rten du//cho 'phrul
200a5(rgyud): bzhi la sogs pa yi//mdzad pa'i gar thabs sna tshogs kyis//dregs pa che dang dbang phyug dang //tshangs pa khyab 'jug rgya byin dang //dri za gshin rje gnod sbyin
200a6(rgyud): bcas//gdug pa'i nga rgyal rgyu 'bras can//rgyu 'bras rtsad nas bcad pa'i phyir//ma lus pa dgra ma btang bar//de rgyal khro gtum zhum pa yis//ji skad
200a7(rgyud): smras kyang rang rang gi/nyon mongs rgya mtshom skams par//thugs rje zhe la mnan tshul gyis//de dag mngon du brtul bar mdzad//la lar dpal chen khrag
200b1(rgyud): 'thung nyid//la lor rdo rje khrag 'thung nyid//la lar rin tshon khrag 'thung ste//la lar pad+ma de bzhin gshegs//la lar sna tshogs la su bcas//rang rang btsun mo tshogs dang 'khrul/
200b2(rgyud): rigs kyi mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin//mdog dang cha lugs de bzhin te//de bzhin sras dang bka' nyan dang //pho nya yang sbrel la sogs pa//rdo rje baspu bu ga nas//pho nya bye ba drug bcu pa//
200b3(rgyud): phyogs bcu kun tu rgyas bkye ste//na mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa yi//gdug pa'i tshogs ni de dag kun//ma lus dus gcig btul nas ni//phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod//de dag
200b4(rgyud): gsung yang sna tshogs te//sbrul 'gyed pas gsung gcig tu//khams gsum sgra yis gang bar mdzad//hU~M hUM hU~M bi shwa kro d+ha dz+wa la ma Na Da phaT phaT phaT/ha la hA la hA la hUM phaT/
200b5(rgyud): b+haT phaT phaT/tratAt+sa ta/kro Ti k+Sha Ta kro Ta/hUM la hA la ha la/d+ha lu hu lur+b+ha l+r-i/tiSh+Thi tiSh+Thi tiSh+Thi/ban d+ha ban d+hi bin d+ha/da ha da ha da ha/gre d+ha g+hA d+ha gr-i d+ha/ba tsa~M pa tsa pa tsi/ts+tshiH
200b6(rgyud): ts+tshin+da nIn+te/gardze gadz+re gardza/hU~M hU~M hU~M/b+h+yo b+h+rU~M b+h+yo/phaT dz+wa la raM zhes pa'i sgra yis thams cad gang //ji srid na mkha'i mthar thug par//ridang gling dang rgya mtshor bcas//'khor
200b7(rgyud): yug stong gsum 'jig rten bcas//moM lus g.yo zhing sgras bkang ste//gdug pa'i tshogs de 'khor bcas pa//gang gi dbang du ma btang bar//gdug pa dus gcig brtul
201a1(rgyud): bar mdzad//de tshe de yi 'khor g.yog kyang //zhum pas smras shing gsol btab nas//rang snying phul nas dam mnos te//smod btsugs rang gi pham la bzhag/
201a2(rgyud): 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag kyang //la lar gti mug rmugs par mdzad//la lar chags la chags chen po//la lar g.ye ma la g.yem par ston//sdang la drug shul spyod
201a3(rgyud): pa ste//nga rgyal can la ri bos gnon//zhi las slong dang zhi ba nyid//gsal dang zhe la gnon pa dang //chags khro dang ni sdang khro dang //rmongs khro gnon khro la sogs pas
201a4(rgyud): bskal pa zhing gi rdul rnyed du//rang gi mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis//gdul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogasu//sgyu 'phrul dra ba mngon rdzogs pa'i//thugs kyi sprul pa snang
201a5(rgyud): bar mdzad//gang phyir spros med goms pa nyid//de nyid ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor te//phyi nang snod bcud mo lus pa//ji snyed phyogs bcur gnas pa kuni//rang rig
201a6(rgyud): rgyal bar gnas pa nyid//'di nyid pho mo ma ning dang //mtshan med lha sogs gang yang min//dngos dang dngos med las 'das pa'i//de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes te
201a7(rgyud): rig pa skye ba med pa'i ngang //'di nyid gsal bar sgom par bya//oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko haM//skyes dang ma skyes la sogs pa'i//tha snyad ming la mi
201b1(rgyud): gnas shing //zla ma sbyor ba las 'das pas//'don de bzhin nyid ces bshad//'di la rim pa med pa ste//rgyal bu mchog gi yul du gsungs//mA lus rang rig rdo rje nyid//khyab par
201b2(rgyud): tshul gyis na mkha' ste//rnam dag rang bzhin 'od gsal ba//dam pa'i ting 'dzin chen po nyid//gong gis ma lus mngon gsal nas//phyi nang chos rnams thams cad kun//
201b3(rgyud): goms nas spros med de bzhin nyid//de dag ting 'dzin thun mong nyid//mi shigs thig le dngas ma'i bdag/bzhi 'dus lnga bdag gnyisu med//rtsa bcud thig ler bcas pa nyid//
201b4(rgyud): thabs dang bcas pa'i ting 'dzin gyis//ye shes lnga yi ri dang bcas//bde chen skye ba med pa'i don//zag med khyab pa mngon du smin//ye shes na mkha'i gzugs can nyid//phyi
201b5(rgyud): nAnang med pa'i rang byung ste//gsal dang bde ba'i rang bzhin can//thabs dang thig les dbang bsgyur nas//lus can kun la gsal bar skye//gnas bzhi 'byung ba'i dngas ma
201b6(rgyud): nyid//rten can brten par bcas pa nyid//rang 'byung thig le bde ba nyid//phyogs cha med par gsal khyab pas//bde ba chen po'i lusu 'gyur//rang 'byung snying po
201b7(rgyud): dngas ma'o lus//'byung ba zag med snying por thim//thig le spros pa med pa ste//thams cad ma lus khyab par snang //rang lus rtsa bcud phyi nang kun//snyigs ma
202a1(rgyud): dang sa mar smin byas te//drangs ma ye shes snying por gsal//de nyid rgyu ba med pa yi//rang 'byung thig le spros pa med//dngas ma zag med stobs las snang //
202a2(rgyud): gang phyir skyes dang sprul pa dang //brtags pa'i gzugs ma las byung ba//dbang po gnyis ni bsrubs pa las//skad cig bcu drug mtha' yi tshe//nyi zla 'dres pa'i gar
202a3(rgyud): thabs las//dngos po lhan cig skyes pa gsal//sems lnga rdzogs pa'i snying po nyid//brjod med rang snang bstan pa nyid//ma lus sku gsung thugs gnas pa//'khyud
202a4(rgyud): pa'i gar gsum bsdam pa yis//gnas dang 'byung ba ma lus pa//rang rig ye shes gzugasu snang //thabs dang shes rab dbyar med pa'i//byang chub sems kyi thig
202a5(rgyud): le ste//rten dang brten par bcas pa nyid//rang nyid gsal bar byin brlabs nas//ji ltar snang srid chos thams cad//lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bor gsal//ma
202a6(rgyud): lus bde ba chen po'i rigs//dam pa'i sbyor ba snang bar 'gyur//'di ni phyi nang gsang ba yi//ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor nyid du bshad//gang phyir mtshan
202a7(rgyud): ma'i rnal 'byor pas//dngos dang dngos medo rnam spangs pa'i//rang rig skye med de bzhin nyid//ma bcos rang rig 'od gsal ba//de bzhin nyid dang por
202b1(rgyud): bskum//de nas skyeng rje na mkha' ltar//gsal la stong pa'i rnal 'byor bsgom//yang na rtswa mu brag chu dang //rdzuTa'i tshul du bsgom par bya//de nas rang nyid yi ge nyid//gsal la brtan
202b2(rgyud): zhing goms pa yis//ma dag pa ni sbyang byas te//dge pa'i mkha'o lnga bsam par bya//e ye ba~M su laM//saM chu mi rlung na mkha' dag/rig pa rang snang tshul du bsgom//de dbus rin
202b3(rgyud): chen khang pa dag/mdzes pa'i tshul dang ldan pa ste//brtsibs bzhi 'khor lo lte bar bcas//mu khyud zlum po thog mtha' med//gru chang blo 'bur bar khyams dang //sgo bzhi rta babs them
202b4(rgyud): klas dang //sku rtsegs pa gu du phyed dang //'dod yin ka bzang chags//mi sgrib gsal bya'i rgyan dang ldan//mi 'jigs la sogs kyi dbus gdun//nyi zla bad+ma la sogs pa//b+hU dang gsum
202b5(rgyud): dang bzhi gcig/rim pa 'tsham pa'i gdan steng su//sa bon cho ga las byung ba//gtso gzungs mthing kA rdo rje 'dzin//'khril sbyor 'dzum pa'i byin rlabs te//dbang bskur cho ga lnga ldan
202b6(rgyud): bas//sbyor bskul sras bskyed so sor dgod//chos dbyings dkar po 'khor lo 'dzin//mnyam nyid rin chen ser po lho//sor rtogs pad+ma dmar ba nug/bya grub ral gri ljang khu byed//
202b7(rgyud): btsun ma rigs 'thun dril 'dzin 'khyil//'khor mo'i rtsibs mtshan shar stonas//sa snying dkar ba myu gu 'dzin//sgeg mo dug mdig me long 'khril//nam snying sngon po
203a1(rgyud): /'dzin//phreng 'dzin mA len mkha' mdog/spyan ngas lob rgan pad+ma dkar//'aki ti pi wang dmar mo mdog/rdor 'dzin ljang khu las kyi rigs//phyag gnyis brkyang
203a2(rgyud): nas gar mdzad ldang //gru chad bzhi la rim pa bzhin//byams pa dkar ser klu shing 'dzin//sgrib sel dmar ser gle bra baM bsnams//kun bzang dmar ljang rin chen ste//'jam
203a3(rgyud): dpal dkar ldang ut+pal bsnams//brdzun mo rigs dang 'thun pa ste//spos dang mar me me tog dri//'khril zhing 'dud pa tshul bzhin bzhugs//sgo bzhir rim po ji bzhin du//
203a4(rgyud): stobs chen gshin rje gshed po dang //rta mgrin bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ba'i//lcags kyu zhags pa lhag sgrog dril//mthing nag ser nag dmar nag dang //ljang nag rdo rje thod dbyig
203a5(rgyud): nga //thod sbyar rdo rje rgya bram dang //yum yang so so'i phyephyag mtshan bcas//bsgo bzhir rngam tshul 'khril sbyor ba zhugs//khyams kyi mdun dang rgyu ba du ni//kun bzang yab yum
203a6(rgyud): namakha'i mngag/phyag rgya ma nges sna tshogs te//mnyam bzhig ye shes 'phro ba'i steng //rdo rje dril bu mtshan pa'o//thub drug dkar ser mthing ka dang //dmar nag ser na ga dung
203a7(rgyud): ka ste//phyogs bzhi steng 'og shar nub tshul//pi wang go cha seg par sgrom//po ti me chur shes par bya//mi bskyod byed pa la sogs pa//rdo rje 'chang ngas rnam par rgyan//
203b1(rgyud): gzhan dag rang rang gis yin to//ya mAn ta krod rtag pa'o//thang drug kun bzang brtan pa 'od//sku gsung thug 'ar byon rlangs ldan//rdo rje 'gro 'du stod par ldan//tshigA'i rim pa shes par
203b2(rgyud): //dngas ma bcud ldan ye shes nyid//ma bcos de bzhin nyid yin te//ye shes na mkha'i dang dang 'brel//kun la khyab pa'i snying rje yis//thung byed 'dre ba'i stong po nyid//tha mA la rtog
203b3(rgyud): gang drug nas//bdeb chen pod d+hInA~M mis rlog/'byung lnga dngas ma'i snying de nyid//thams cad 'byung ba'i tshe yin to//d+harmA tsi kra chos kyi dbyings//me shegs theg le kun gyi gnas/
203b4(rgyud): nus pa'i khyad par phra rags pakri//thig le'i gzugs dang tshor ba dang //'du shes 'dra byed rnam shes nyid//ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin nyid//rgyal po lnga ru bshad pa yin//'byung lnga dngas ma
203b5(rgyud): bcad pa ni//dgyes pa bskyed phyir btsun mo ste//mig sogs bde ba'i rnam shes dang //de yi ngo bo yul bcas ni//gnas pa rtsa bcud thib ler banas//nang gi sems dpa' yab yum
203b6(rgyud): nyid//so so'i rtsa bcud gnas pa'i rten//dbang po dus bzhir bcas pa nyid//phyi yi sems dpar bshad pa ni//gnas dang dus kyi phye phyiraro//gang de dngas mas bskyed pa yis//lus
203b7(rgyud): kyi chos bzhi rtag chad bcas//zla tsan yang yum shes par bya//'ad chen yod chos rang rig nyid//kun bzhing ngo yi bde ba nyid//nyon mongs drug gi yul rnamasu//sprul pa'i thog sar/
204a1(rgyud): rang shar ba'o//'dul ba bzhi yis don mdzad de//sprul pa'i mdzad pa bsam mi khyab//kun kyang dngas ma'i rang bzhin las//ye shes lnga yi re ldan pa//gnas
204a2(rgyud): dang ngo bo lngas brgyan pa//ye shes lnga yis rgyas btab pa'o//sa bon sku ste yi ge gsung //bde thugs sku gsung dkyil 'khor ldan//'phro 'du rtsa ba'i thig ler bcas//ma lus kun la 'di gan+da
204a3(rgyud): pas//yan lag nyid 'di shes bya//stong nyid rdo rje la sogs pa//sngon byas rang rgyud med pa yi//rigs rtags gzungs ma blang bar bya//rang rgyud sgo gsum dag byas pa//lha yi
204a4(rgyud): 'gyur sa ky-i/rdo rje lji pa //srab sa nga rgyu// mi babyung ba rgyu //de ba ni dngas mi nam / kyai sa b+ha ga pa na/
204a5(rgyud): tshegs 'dus pa'i gzhal yas khang //nyi zla pad+ma nus pa'i gdan//che ba'i yon tan rdzogs pA ldan//thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba'i ro//lnga phung 'byung lnga dag pa yi//rang
204a6(rgyud): bzhin de dang mnyam sbyar bas//ye shes phra rags gnyi su med//thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa yi//dbang po yul dus rnam shes bcas//rang rang bde bar skyes pa'i lha//
204a7(rgyud): lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes nyid//thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i//rgyu ba'i rlung la dbang thob nas//thabs lam bde ba'i gnyer dag gis//brtags pa rang gi rtog/
204b1(rgyud): pA zlog/dngos po rnams kyi ngo bo la//zlog bya ngas kyang ma dmigs//bdo ba'i thig lo sa don la//thabs ba ni rlung gi gang thabs kyis//dga' ba'i tshang ldan nus pa bcas//dngos 'di ltan
204b2(rgyud): cig skyes par brtan//bde ba'i phyag rgya chen po ni//phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa//bde ba chen por ro gcig phyir//me lus lhan cig skyes par gnas//bcud 'dus bde ba'i thig le ni//yon
204b3(rgyud): kun gyi ngo bo bas//che ba'i yon+ta kun rdzogs pas//sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bor gnas//de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'chang //rgyal ba kun gyi rgyal po yis//maM lus lhag pa'i lhar ba
204b4(rgyud): phyir//gsung gi snying po brjod par mdzad//bruM bi shwa bi shud d+he/hUM badz+ra d+hig+ha/oM dzi na dzig/swaM rad na d+h+rig/oM a ro lig/ha pradz+nyA d+h+r-ig/muM d+hA tu sha ri/laM dwe shwa rA ti/maM mo
204b5(rgyud): ha ra ti/byaM rA ga ra ti/taM badz+ra ra ti/k+Sha ti rA dza ya/traM a ga ra d+ha ya/hI ha pad ma ba dA ya/d+hi ku ru pa na hri/hUM la s+yai sa ma yo ste//traM mA l-i sa maM ya ho/hrI bi N+ye ra go
204b6(rgyud): haM/a nr-i d+hai ra ga ya mi/me d+ha ra na swAh+ma/b+hI ni sa raM pa ya swA hA/hUM swa ra dza yaM swAtwA/muM shrI a raM ka ya swAh+ma/dza d+hU pe pra b+he sha/hUM puSh+pa a be sha/baM dwI pa su kr-i ni/ho g+hanra
204b7(rgyud): d+ya/hUM la rgyun tu srid rje d+hIHd+hu n+dan tu krid hU~M bai/hU~M bad mAn te kr-id pa phaT/hUM pradz+nyA na kr-id tsa phaT/oM ma hA badz+ri d+hi ra ma hA k+shab+hU shI ra dz+wa la ni phaT/mam
205a1(rgyud): hA ra nad+d+ha ra ma hA kr-i d+hi shwa re dz+wA lan+da phaT/oM ma hA pad+yA ma d+hA ra ma hA kro d+hish+tsa ri dz+wa la ni phaT/oM ma hA karmad+ha ra mahA kro d+hi shwa ri dz+wa la ni phaT/d+hur+b+hu hUM badz+ra tsid ta trUM/a a a/
205a2(rgyud): badz+ra ba trA sa man ta e oM mu ne kr-i swAhA/oM munaM trUM draM/oM mu ne srung swAhA/oM mu ni praM swA tAM/oM mu ne shaM swAhA/oM mu ne ye swAhA/oM e ha ti b+ha ga tAn/ma hA kA ru d+h+r-i ka tri sha to//sa ma
205a3(rgyud): ya s+t+waM/dzaHhUM baM hoHoM AHhUM swA hA/ba ba ba ba ba/dr-i dre dzA dz+wa dz+ra/saM sa sa sa sa/ma ma ma ma ma/ya ya ya ya ya/oM AHhUM swA hA/oM sgyu 'phrul dra ba gnyis med pa'o//gsang ba zab mo
205a4(rgyud): sku gsung thugs//gded nas bdag dang dbyer med pa'i//da ltar nyi du dbyer med shog/oM badz+ra sa ma ya hUM/oM badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+waM/oM badz+ra sa ma ya ho/dzaHhUM baM ho/zhes brjod pas/sna
205a5(rgyud): tshogs dkyil 'khor mdzes pa dag/gnyis med ro gcig 'dres nas kyang //stong gsum dkyil 'khor gsal bar 'gyur//oM AHhUM swA hA/muM maM laM bai taM/hUM hUM hUM hUM/traM trAM traM traM/
205a6(rgyud): hrId+hIr+d+ha/ya A yA ya/d+hAd+hAd+hA rmAd+hUhU~MtrAMt+ma/d+hUhUM trAdz+dzadz+dzadz+dza d+hU dz+nyA/\u0f7fhU~M /rab ldan pas/gtso bo dang gtsa ma~M //'brel pa sum d+haHgaits+tsha dang//de
205a7(rgyud): bai khre me dang //sgo bzhi rab 'jam la sogs pa//dkyil 'khor rgyas bar snang bar mdzad//'khor lo nyis rtsegs rtsibasu bcas//'khyams dang sgor bcas lha yi rim//rang rang
205b1(rgyud): phyag mtshon gdan dang bcas//bzhugs thabs tshul bzhin gnas pa'o//de nas rgyal ba de dag gis//dkyil 'khor chen po de dag la//dbang bskur byin brlabs bya ba'i phyir//gsang ba'i sngags
205b2(rgyud): ni gsung bar mdzad//oM ma hA shU n+ya dz+nyA na badz+ra swA b+hA ba Ad ma ko \u0f85haM/oM ma hA a ta ri sha dz+nyA na badz+ra sA b+hA bu Ad ma ko&haM/oM ma hA pra ta be sha dz+nyA na sta b+hA ba Ang ma kro&haM/aM
205b3(rgyud): mahA sa man ta dz+nyA na badz+ra sA b+hA ba Ad ma ko&haM/oM ma hA kri ta a nu sta na badz+ra sA b+hA ba Ad ma ko&haM/oM sArba ta thA ga ta ma hA kA ya badz+ra sA b+hA ba AMd ma ko&haM/oM sarba ta
205b4(rgyud): thA ga ta ma hA b+hi ka badz+ra staM b+hA ba Ad ma ko&haM/oM sarba ta thA ba ta ma hA tsid ta badz+ra swA b+hA ba Ad ma ko&haM/oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA a nu ra kaM badz+ra sA b+hA ba Ad ma ko&haM/oM
205b5(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga tA me hA b+hu dze badz+ra sA b+hA ba Ad ma ko&haM/zhes brjod ye shes sku gsung thugs//rtse gcig bim par gsal bar 'gyur//tsid ta 'og min 'bar ba'i gnas//rin
205b6(rgyud): chen 'bar ba'i rdzogs pa'i mdzod//mi shigs thig le zla ma tog/rgyal ba kun gyi bzhugs pa'i gnas//tsid ta'i khams lnga'i snying po la//bde ba'i thig le 'phra rags
205b7(rgyud): nyid//ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid du//gsang ba 'dzin pa'i rgyal por brjod//gang de dngas ma ye shes lnga//gang du mi phyed rdo rje gsal//dug lnga ye shes bskyed pa dang //btsun
206a1(rgyud): mo dga' bde'i ngo bar brjod//khams lnga 'dus pa'i ye shes nyid//rang 'byung ye shes bde ba'i thugs//rnam shes bzhir bcas thig le nyid//thugs
206a2(rgyud): kyi sems dpa' nyid du bshad//de yis gang la dbang sgyur ba'i//yul bzhi thig le bde ba'i bcud//sgyu ma'i bde bar gang 'char ba//yul bzhi rim par bshad pa ste//dbang sgyur
206a3(rgyud): gnyis med gang yin pas//yab yum 'brel ba'i ngo bor bshad//rtsa bcud thig ler bcas pa'i rton//so so'i nus par bcas pa nyid//gang la de dbang de yi phyir//'di ni
206a4(rgyud): yi rim par bshad//gang la khams lnga'i bde ba yis//mnyes dang thig le bkod pa dang //na mkha'i ye shes gsal ba dang //de nyid khyab pa'i rang bzhin te//zag med bde ba'i
206a5(rgyud): rang bzhin gyis//phyogs bcu'i zhing khams mnyes par mdzad//dgug dang bcing dang mnyes dang gsal//thabs lam bcud du 'brel bar gsungs//gang de thabs chen gsal byas
206a6(rgyud): pas//lus kyi chos bzhi rtag chad spangs//bde ba'i thig le rang snang ba//ma lus 'joms la khro bo'o//bcud las 'das pa'i hUM gsum nyid//byed pa bral ba'i ngo bo nyid
206a7(rgyud): yul gsum bral bas chos kyi dbyings//ma lus rnam dgra kun tu bzang //dngas snyigs snying por 'brel pa yis//nyon mongs sa bon drug bcas pas//thig le
206b1(rgyud): btul nas bstan pa 'chad//sprul pa'i sku ru bshad pa yin//kun kyang ye shes lnga'i ro//khyab par gnas pas rgyas btab cang //snang srid bde chen sku gsung thugs//dran pa rtag tu gsal
206b2(rgyud): bzung ba'o//de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya//gsang rtse sna tshogs 'dus pa'i dbus//phyi nang rim pa'i dbu rtse can//ngo bo byin brlabs 'phags pa ste//yon byin rlabs kun gyi gnas//
206b3(rgyud): gsang ba'i pad+ma'i rang bzhin du//rdo rje gnyis med thig ler blta//nyi zla zil ba'i thig le nyid//phan tshun 'dres pa rlung gis phye//gsang ba'i khams lngas ye shes rol//snyigs ma'i phung
206b4(rgyud): pe lnga dag nas//dngas ma lnga yi rang bzhin gsal//rgyal po de bzhin gshegs par gsal//gsang ba'i 'byung ba lngar bstan pa//dbang yul phrad pa'i skabs las shes//rigs
206b5(rgyud): mchog yum gyi phyag rgya lnga//snyigs ma bral ba'i dus na blta//thig le thugs kyi bde ba rnams//rang rang thig le bde bar gsal//ye shes rnam shes dngas ma rnams//bde ba chen po
206b6(rgyud): gsal bar shes//dam tshig bde ba'i chas kyis skegs//sgo gsum 'brel cing thig ler chags//gang du bde ba'i sgra sgrags te//bskyod cing 'phro ba'i gar gyis mnyes//thugs gang thig le
206b7(rgyud): brten pa'i gnas//gang yul bde bar dbang byed pa'i//rten dang bcas pa'i bde ba yis//rang rang thig le skyed par byed//thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i//thugs dang thig ler bcas pa
207a1(rgyud): nyid//dgug 'dzin 'khyud cing gan pa dang /thig le rlung dang bstod smad bsdams//bskyod dang 'bebs pa'i thabs yin te//tshom dang thig le dar ba dang //ye shes gsal
207a2(rgyud): bas bde sems rgyas//rim pa ji bzhin gsal bar brtags//gsang yul dbang po reg pa dang //rnam shes gang yin te krid de//bde ba'i rang bzhin ma skyes pas//rtag chad mtshan ma
207a3(rgyud): bdag med pa//sgo ma'i rang bzhin gsang ba'i sngags//shes skyob don phyir gsang ba'i sngags//shes pa gsum 'das sgrib zad pa//rang rig byed pa yid ces bya//rgyun gsum zad pA
207a4(rgyud): chos dbyings nyid//rtogs bya kun tu bzang mor bshad//'khor ba'i sa bon nyon mongs bcas//zil pa'i thig sngon lam bzhin du//thabs sbyor thig le'i 'phro 'du yis//gsang
207a5(rgyud): ba'i mdzod pa bcu gnyis ston//sa bon thig le ma skyes gzugs//bstan pa rim pa gsum du bstan//'dod pa'i yan lag sum rgya dang //drug cu rtsa bzhi la sogs pas//tha
207a6(rgyud): mal zhen pa rang grol nas//rdo rje ze'u 'bru 'brel bskyod pas//rang 'bar thig le gzugasu chags//yab yum lnga phyi thabs kyis gzung //nyi ma zla ba shar ba'i 'od//rtsen+da
207a7(rgyud): rtse ru phyin pa yis//'khor ba'i mun pa kun bsal nas//ma lus lhan cig skyes par gsal//de nyid gsang bar shes par bya//rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pa/
207b1(rgyud): shrI bcu rtsa lngar gnas pa yi//thugs kyi rang bzhin snying po nyid//rang rang mtshon pa'i rtags yin te//rgyas dang bsdus pa'ang de bzhin du//rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri 'bar//dril bu pad+ma rin po che//
207b2(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rim bshad pa'o//gzhan gang gnasu rdo rje shes//dang po thugs dang g.yon 'khyud pa'o//rin chen myu gu ral bri 'bar//pad+ma dkar po rdo rje che//ut+pal k+Sha shing zla
207b3(rgyud): tis+t+waM//gzugs mdzes rin chen phreng ba dang //pi ling glar sbyar bag me dang //byug pa so so rim shes bya//ni mig rdo rje tha~Md rgyu gram//lcags kyu zhags pa s+pho ta ho//'di 'bru
207b4(rgyud): mnyam bzhag rdo rje thal//ye shes rtse lnga chos khams dril//thugs la brtan pa nyid du gsungs//thub chen nges par phyag gnyis shes//seg par go mtshon po wang brdab//skyob
207b5(rgyud): stob spro ti chos 'chad tshul//me dpung bum par shes par bya//gzhan yang 'thun pa skabs kyis brtag/mi 'thun khyad par rgyas par bstan//rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang //
207b6(rgyud): gram dril bu brkyang shes bya//rdo rje lcags kyu mda' se gol//rin chen nyi ma rgyal mtshan so//pad+ma 'khor lo ral gri lce//rgya gram khu chur go cha mche//gzhan yang skabs
207b7(rgyud): dang 'thun pa ste//rang rang don nyid rtse gcig pa'i//thugs kyi rtag su shes par bya//dngas ma'i ye shes lnga 'bar bas//gcod dang mi phyed dga' ba dang //ma gos bde ba
208a1(rgyud): bskyed pa nyid//rnam par mi rtog ri p+da shes//yon tan bskyed dang tha mal gcod//de bzhin ma gros ye shes nyid//so so yon tan cha las byung //rang ra
208a2(rgyud): rtsa bcud thig le'i dbyibs//so so nyid ltar rang gnas te//bde ba'i thig le nyid du shes//rang 'byung dngas ma'i thig le nyid//'bral ba'i tshul gyis kun snang ba//khu ba
208a3(rgyud): rtsa'i dbyibs gzugs nyid//rang rang las dang rtog pa dang //snying po phyag mtshan dbyibs bzhin pas//bde chen thugasu gsal brtan pa//thugs kyi dusu shes par bya//thabs dang
208a4(rgyud): shes rab gnyis med pa'i//thig le gsal ba'i rang bzhin las//thugs mtshon che ba'i ye shes nyid//dpag tu med par rang snang ba//bde ba chen po'i thig le'i 'od//ma
208a5(rgyud): lus de der snang ba nyid//ma lus gnyis med thig le yi//bde ba chen po'i ye shes lnga//de las phye bas mtshon pa'i sgo//thugs kyi rang rtags bsam mi khyab//bde ba
208a6(rgyud): thugs las gzhan ma yin//gang phyir dkyil 'khor 'di dag kyang //thun mong gnasu bsgoms pa dang //mi shigs thig le'i snying po las//sku gsung thugs nyid gsal bar
208a7(rgyud): bya//don dam thig le pad rtse la//rim pa ji bzhin gsal bar bya//de nas gdug pa gdul ba'i phyir//'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar gshad//cho ga'i rim pa ji bzhin gyi//
208b1(rgyud): rang d+hi rgyu yi sa bon trAM//dag pas rim pas gsal ba la//rang rgyud 'byung lnga nyon mongs lnga//rang byung lnga ru snang ba'i phyir//'byung ba lnga nyid bsgom par bya//a yang ra/su/kau/ra/
208b2(rgyud): so so las rnams byis nas ni//na mkha' gru gsum zla gam rlung //khrag gi dba' klong 'khrug pa dang //gti mug ro dang nga rgyal ri//zhe sdang me nyid bsgom par bya//mdog kyang
208b3(rgyud): rim par shes bya ste//las dang rang bzhin shes bzhin brtag/bri las dur khrod gzhal yas khang //'khor lo rtsibs bzhi thod phreng dang //bar khyams gnyis ni sgo dang bcas//
208b4(rgyud): thod phreng sbrul gyi zar tshags//zhing gi gdul dang ka ba ste//sprin nag dur khrod brgyan dang bcas//khro mo bdud rtsi lha mo dang //thod pa lnga gsum rtsig pa can//nyi zla'i rgyan
208b5(rgyud): can bas mi byas la//dregs pa gnod sbyin srin po dang //dri za gshin rje gzhon par bcas//de bzhin gsal bar bsgom par bya//sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi//cho ga
208b6(rgyud): las byung rim pa yis//gnyis med gsal bas de brtan phyir//dbang bskur byin brlabs rim bzhin bya//sbyor ba'i thig le 'phros pa yis//gdug pa ma lus btul
208b7(rgyud): nas ni//rang rang rim pa gsal gyur nas//hUM gis phyogs phyogs gdan la bzhugs//ha brgyad sa bon las byung ba//dkar mo'i tshigs dang rkun mo'i tshogs//rmongs mo
209a1(rgyud): dang ni thal byed ma//spos mo dang ni gtum mo dang //sle sha can dang mtshogs ma'i//so so'i cha lugs rngam 'thon nas//sprul pa bzhi po la thim zhing //rang rang lnga
209a2(rgyud): mjed snying po sgrogs//'dus te phyogs phyogs gnas par bya//he brgyad sa bon las byung ba//stag dang seng ge wa dang khyi dang //bya rgod kang ka 'ug pa dang //pho rog la sogs
209a3(rgyud): 'phra mi na rnams//'phro 'du las dang phyogs mdog mtshan//rim pa ji bzhin de bzhin bsam//phaT bzhis rta dang phag gdong dang //sbrul dang spre'u gdong rim par bzhin//
209a4(rgyud): las dang sku mdog phyag mtshan yang //rim pa bzhin du gnas pa yin//de dag 'khor lo dbus dang lde//yab yum phyag rgya 'brel par gnas//rtsibs 'chan gru chad
209a5(rgyud): bzhi dag la//gnas kyi ma mo dgod par bya//bar 'khyams dang por 'phro men brgyad//phyogs mtshams rim par dgod par bya//sgo bzhir sgo ba rnga ma tshul gnas//bar
209a6(rgyud): khyams tha ma dag la ni//slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs//sku mdog phyag mtshan bzhugs tshul nyid//rim pa bzhin du bkod par bya//rin chen thod pa'i dbu rgyan dag/
209a7(rgyud): gnas skabs dag tu 'tsham par bya//sku gsung thugs kyang de bzhin te//yan lag dkyil 'khor nyid du bshad//gang phyir na mkha'i ye shes nyid//spros med dam pa nyid
209b1(rgyud): do//bde ba'i thig las kun khyab la//chos nyid skyed rje kun tu snang //thig le rang snying sa bon rgyu//zag pa med pa'i snying po yin//ma lus 'das pa'i snang po can//thag la gang
209b2(rgyud): ga kun dang 'brel//gnas pa khong spyod tshul dag gis//moM lus kun la khyab pa yin//sgro g.yo ba'i sa sgo can//bskyod dang las kyis khyab blud pa//lus khyab gnas dang las ngag
209b3(rgyud): ni//khyad par so sor snang ba yin//de steng te le kA'i rang bzhin//'bar ma brgyad dang ldan pa nyid//zhu dang 'bar ba'i las byed pa//drag mo zhes kyang 'dod pa yin//thig le sgo
209b4(rgyud): nas 'jig pa'i bcud//gsher dang 'dzag pa'i baM snying can//sdad dang bebs pa'i rang bzhin can//lus can gnas pa gsal bar bya//gang la glung brten de yi brten//thig
209b5(rgyud): le rtsar bcas bde ba'i rten//de nyid bskyed dang gnas gyur pa//brten pas sa yi dkyil 'khor nyid//'khor lo gzhal las rang bzhin te//rim pa gong 'gro 'brel ba can//
209b6(rgyud): lus la gnas pas dur khrod de//kha dog rtsa dang bcud bsdus pa'i//rgyan dang gdan du ldan pa yin//gang la rten pa'i thig le nyid//gnyis med bde ba chen po'i lha//sa bon
209b7(rgyud): yi ge bde ba yis//sku gsung thugs dang ldan pa nyid//gcig kyang khams lnga'i bde bo'i ngos//maM lus khyab pa'i tshul gyis gnas//lus la thig le chen po gnas/
210a1(rgyud): gnas dang bcud dang bde ba nyid//thabs chen thabs las byung ba yi//namakha'i yo shes dpag tu med//'jug pa bzhi dang rim pa brgyad//thig la gcig/
210a2(rgyud): gis khyad par 'phags//nyon mongs zad pas zad byed de//dngas ma'i ye shes lnga 'bar nyid//yul dang bcas pa'i rang bzhin las//'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gsalnga byu
210a3(rgyud): sna /gnas kyi thig le badri ba can//dur khrod ma brgyad gsang ba ste//gnyis med 'phra men nyid bshad//thig le thabs dang bcas pa nyid//dkyil 'khor 'jug pa'i sgo
210a4(rgyud): dang 'brel//snying po thig pa nyid sbyor//gang dang lhan cig skyes pa las//bde ba chen po skye ba med//ma lus bde ba chen po nyid//khyab pa rgya yongs ma chad pa'o//ma lus
210a5(rgyud): 'dus pa'i bde ba'i ro//sa yang bcu gsum 'dus pa'i mkha'//rang byung khyab pa chen po'i gzugs//kun 'dus thig le chen por gsalnga//rnam thar klusum ldan oM yi
210a6(rgyud): gzugs//bde ba bskyod dang thig la bskul//'phro dang bsdud dang bsdams pa'i rlung //rdo rje pad+ma 'dus pa'i sa//rten dang bral ba bde ba'i sa//shu kr-i'i thig le glang ga
210a7(rgyud): ga/gsang ba chu yi rang bzhin yin//de dag phyag rgyas ging sbyar bas//bde ba'i drod ni rang 'bar skye//bruM las gsang ba'i gzhal yas khang //sangs rgyas rin chen /
210b1(rgyud): ma tog/sna chags 'dus pa'i snying po can//khyad par 'phags pa'i 'og min te//yan tan rdzogs pa'i dngos bzhi can//dga' bzhi 'jug pa'i sgo dang ldan//'bab 'jog theg le'i d+ha/
210b2(rgyud): dang ldan/bde ba nyi zla rgyal la bzhugs//thig le 'dres pa bde ba'i ro//nyi zla 'brel pa bde ba'i lha//'thung dang rngub pa'i thabs chen gyis//'khor ba'i sa bon zad ces pas//za byed khro
210b3(rgyud): bor de bshad pa'o//dpag med thig le'i rang bzhin gang //sa ya bcu gsum pho brang na//bde ba chen po ye shes gzugs//sku gsung thugs dang lhan cig bzhugs//'du shes gsum
210b4(rgyud): ldan byin brlabs te//gsang ba'i ye shes lnga ldan pas//dbang thob rnams la rgyas btab po//gsang ba thig le chen po ni//rang 'byung bde ba chen po nyid//rnam rtog rgyu ba chad pa yi//
210b5(rgyud): rdo rje pad+ma'i bar na gnas//'og sgo snying po pad+ma ni//rgyal ba kun gyi dkyil 'khor te//gsang ba sku gsung thugs nyid du//thabs dang shes rab gnyis med gnas//mi lus 'dus
210b6(rgyud): pa'i thig le nyid//gnyis med btsud du gyur pa na//de yi bde ba chen po nyid//khyab pa'i tshul gyis gang bar bzhugs//yis rgya mtsho lhan cig skyes//gsang ba'i thig le bred pa'i
210b7(rgyud): ro//nyi zla 'dres pa'i tshul gyis snang //gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad//de nas rgyal ba thams cad kun//gdul bya bsam pa'i khyad par gyis//na mkha' dbyings kyi
211a1(rgyud): mthas gtugs par//rdo rje khro bor snang gyur te//bskyed cing gdug pa 'dul ba yi//drag po lha'i sngags dpya drang //de yi gzhal yas snang bar mdzad//bru ba shA ti/
211a2(rgyud): shud+d+ha/dz+nyA na kA pa la rad na pan tsad+d+he/ma hA bsti r+yA ba~M/sUr+ya tsan+da tra moN la d+h+r-i//de steng so so'i sku nyid dag/gsel ba'i rim pa dgod par bya//oM b+hU ta ma hA shrI ha ru ka ma hA
211a3(rgyud): tsan+d+ra sarba duSh+TAn ta ka ha na da ha ba tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/oM badz+ra me hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN Da sarba duSh+Tan ta ka ha na da hA pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/oM rad na ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaNe Da sarba duSh+TAn
211a4(rgyud): tAtaka ha na da haM pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/oM pad+me mA hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaNe Da sarba duSh+TAn ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/oM karma ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN De sarba duSh+TAn ta ka ha n+yA da ha pa
211a5(rgyud): tsihUM hUM hUM phaT/oM sarba tI thAM gr-i ta ma hA kro d+hish+tsa re sarba duSh+TAn hUM phaT/oM mu hUM badz+ra da ra kro d+hi shwa ri dz+wa la ni hU~M phaT/oM ma hA s+yAn+ye rid na ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri bi da mi hU~M phaT/oM shrI
211a6(rgyud): sa monr-i pad ma ma hA kro d+hi shwe ri kha hUM phaT/oM sarba a ma~M kaM ma hA d+hi sha re bi sha hUM phaT/badz+ra ki rI ha/badz+ra nai ri ha/badz+ra pr-i mo ha/badz+ra be ta lI ha/badz+ra pu ka si ha/badz+ra
211a7(rgyud): b+hasma ri ha/badz+ra sme sha ni ha/badz+ra tsaN Da li ha/badz+ra si ha mu kaM ta~M/badz+ra bya kr-i mu ka he/badz+re sri la mu ka haM/badz+ra sho na mu ka te/badz+re kri ta mu ka haM/badz+ra kaM ka mu ka
211b1(rgyud): d+hA ka/ sa Sh+TA/rmu sad+d+ha/ ka/klu ba sgribs pa n+d+ha/b+h+ya b+hU b+h+yaHb+hU/b+hUb+h+yab+h+yaHb+hUr+dz+dzag+hUb+h+yaHb+hUb+hUb+hUb+h+ya/
211b2(rgyud): b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/badz+ra ma nu rak+Sha si/badz+ra pra na ni/badz+ra rau dwe/badz+ra be s+thA be/badz+ra kau ma ri/badz+ra in tra ni/badz+ra su r+ya ya~M/badz+ra bad ga l-i ma/badz+ra sa mau/dr-idz+dza oM mr-i taM/badz+ra d+ha na dAm/
211b3(rgyud): badz+ra rAk+Sha siM/badz+ra bad sha sai/badz+ra ra ti haM/badz+ra ru ti re ma haM/badz+ra e ka dza raM/badz+ra na mo ha raM/badz+ra si ti kaM/badz+ra ba ya be/badz+ra ma hA mA ra na/badz+ra ag ne/badz+ra ba ra hi/badz+ra
211b4(rgyud): /tsa mu ti/badz+ra pU dza na/badz+ra ba ru ni/badz+ra ma hA ka la/badz+ra tsakra la/badz+ra sum ba ka lan/badz+ra lam bo d+ha ra/ru lu ru lu hUM/e h+ye hi/e na ya/dza hUM baM ho/raM/oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa
211b5(rgyud): ma ya hUM/oM khro la khros pas zhi mdzad pa//thugs rje khro dpal rngam pa'i tshogs//'bar ba'i byin rlabs rmad po che//de nyid du ni bdag la stsol//oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya s+t+waM/oM badz+ra kro/
211b6(rgyud): d+ha sa ma yA phaT/oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya ho//a li u li ta la ta pa ti/daMSh+TA g+ho na rau tri/kha ra~M yo gi ni khA hi ho//hU~M ha he phaT b+h+yo ra/gsang sngags drag po mthu yis ni//phyogs
211b7(rgyud): bcu tshig cing rab tu tshig/kun tu rab tu tshig par 'gyur//'bar dang rab 'byam kun tu 'bar//'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor khro tshogs kyis//gang zhig rab gang kun tu gang //'khrug
212a1(rgyud): dang rab 'khrugs kun tu 'khrugs//'thor zhing rab 'thor kun tu 'thor//'gul zhing ldeg pa de bzhin te//phyogs bcu dus bzhi gong la yi//sgra
212a2(rgyud): yang sgrogs par byed//phyogs bcu'i gdug pa ma lus pa//thul zhing rgyal nus myos gyur te//de dag bde bas bslang byas te//bde ba chen po dgyes pa'i gar//phyog+sas bcu
212a3(rgyud): na mkha'i mthar thug par//rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzugs kyis byed//rdo rje gsang ba'i rang bzhin las//thig pon po'i dkyil 'khor bsgyur//gdod nas thig le'i rang
212a4(rgyud): bzhin nyid//mi bcos thig ler gnas pa nyid//ma lus thig ler rgyas btab pa//na mkhru'i gzugs can de bzhin nyid//mya lus bad+mo ba'i thig le nyid//khyab pa chen
212a5(rgyud): bo'i rang bzhin te//mtha' dbus bral ba bde ba che//snying rje chen por brjod pa yin//kun gyi rgyu ni thig le ste//ma lus sa bon rtsa ba nyid//mi shigs snying kha'i pho brang
212a6(rgyud): nyid//ye shes rdzogs pa'i gzhal yas khang //nam mkha' lta bu'i mtshan nyid//rgyal ba kun gyi bzhugs gnas//nyon mongs gdug pa'i gdan khri nyid//gdul bya
212a7(rgyud): thub pa nyid du bstan//phung po nyon mongs lnga dag pa//rgyal po lnga yi rang bzhin te//rang snying dngas mar bcas pa nyid//dbang phyug lnga ru brjod pa nyid//rnam shes yul du
212b1(rgyud): bcas blo nyid//rten dang brten par bcas pa yi//bde ba 'phra man bcu drug nyid//phyi lta nang lha dkyil 'khor nyid//dgub dang 'dzin dang thig las bsdams//thig pa'i rang bzhin gnyis med//
212b2(rgyud): dbu ma'i thig lo bcas pa'i lam//dbang phyug nam kha'i dbang mi tshogs//dra 'i nye ba'i tshul bzung nas//thig le dngage pa'i thabs bzhi yis//phab pas rang rgyu dngos po sa
212b3(rgyud): dran 'byung rig pa'i 'phro 'du tshogs//bde ba chen po'i don la 'jug/gnyis med thim pas dkyil 'khor 'bar//sku gsung thugs kun gsal bas//gnyis medo rnam pas mnyes
212b4(rgyud): par mdzad//rang bzhin bde ba'i dkyil 'khor kun//rig pa nyams myong dbyings la thim//dran rtogs 'byung ba nyon mongs kun//tshig pa gsum du shes par bya//ye shes bde ba chen po
212b5(rgyud): nyid//'bar ba gsum du shes par bya//byang chub sems kyi bde ba yis//ma lus gang zhing khyab par gyur//thig le gong 'og steng 'og nyid//thig le gong ma nyid 'og tu//'og
212b6(rgyud): ma nyid ni steng du 'bar//gcig gonyis lus kun khyab par 'byor//lus dang rnar bcas 'gul ba dang //ldeg cing 'bar ba'i bde bas gang //bde bsang dbang bsgyur tshim pa'i
212b7(rgyud): sgra//ma lus khyab par sgrogs par byed//sku gsung thugs kyi b+ha ga nyid//bde ba chen po'i rnam pa'i dbyings//'byung bzhi rdo rje pad+ma nyid//reg pa 'dus pa'i bde ba yin//ro dogs
213a1(rgyud): rgyu bcad pa nyid//de bzhin nyid du bsdu bar bya//thog po 'dus pa'i ba 'gyus//su yang bcu gsum khyab pa'o yid//ma lus mkha' ltar du mdo pa'o//rang
213a2(rgyud): byung phyogs med kun tu snang //thabs dang shes rab bde ba yis//'byung bzhi rim pa'i dngas ma ste//sa bon bde ba'i rgyu zhes grags//b+ha ga pad+ma'i snying po nyid//sku gsung thugs
213a3(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor gyi//bzhugs gnas bde ba chen po'i rten//sangs rgyas rin po che yi snod//phung po lnga dang nyon mongs lnga//ye shes lnga yis zil gyis mnan//nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan la
213a4(rgyud): bzhugs//sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po ni//bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin nyid//thig le phrad pa'i dus nyid ni//ye shes lnga yi ro dang ldan//gdul bya 'joms pa'i khro bo lnga//'byung lnga
213a5(rgyud): dang phyug rnam par bad+d+hAm+ba myeng dang yul bcas rnam shes yul/'phra min nyid du shes par bya//phyag rgyar bcas pa'i sbyor ba bzhi//sbyor bcus nyid du shes par bya//sku
213a6(rgyud): tshigs 'jig pa'i thi ga ze nyid//dbang phyug bde bar shes par bya//gnyis kyi phyogs pa'i rang bzhin nyid//bde ba chen po spyan drungs pas//rtog pa ba ba'i dkyil la
213a7(rgyud): 'jug rim pa gnyis med brda' mjal mchog/sku gsung thugs kyi thig le nyid//gnyi su med par thim par mdzad//rna la 'byor dbang phyug pho mo kun//bde ba chen po
213b1(rgyud): mnyes par gyur//sangs rgyas gang tshe snying po la//ma lus bde ba'i rang bzhin ldan//thig le gnyis med bde ba'i ro//ye shes lnga ldan zag pa mang //phyi nang gang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid//
213b2(rgyud): ma lus 'das de'i rang bzhin te//nyi zla 'dres pa'i gar thabs las//lhan cig skyes pa gsal bar 'gyur//sa ya bcu gsum gnyis 'dus pa'o//thig le rdo rje'i rang bzhin
213b3(rgyud): nyid//gnyis med 'khril ba zhes bya ste//rang rig bde ba chen por thim//sangs rgyas rin chen de yi dbyig/kha sbyor snying po za ma tog/sku gsung thugs kyi pho brang las//ma lus
213b4(rgyud): thig le gnas par mdzad//sku gsung thugs kyi pho rang ni//bde ba chen po'i gnas nyid//rdo rje snying po rtse dang 'brel//gnyis med bde ba'i thig ler gnas//gsang ba'i thig le
213b5(rgyud): chen po ni//ma lus 'dus pa'i bcud yid de//gsang ba yon rdzogs pa'i mdzod//snying po'i lam la gnas par bya//rdo rje nyi ma'i snying po la//rdo rje zla ba'i 'od kyis brgyan/
213b6(rgyud): gnyis med thig las gang ba yi//bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin 'char//brten nas 'byung ba'i rten can nyid//gang lo gang gis mnyam sbyor bas//thabs chen thabs las byung
213b7(rgyud): ba yi//bde ba chen po'i rla bar 'gyur//de nas rdo rje khrag 'thung nyid//rang rang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid//gdul bya'i ngo la dgongs mdzad//thugs kyi dkyil 'khor snang bar
214a1(rgyud): mdzad//rdo rje rdo rje dril bu dang //'jig rten 'khor yug bcas pa 'degs//de bzhin 'khor yug bcas pa 'degs//de bzhin 'khor lo dgra sta dang //kha T+wAM rab tu 'khrol ba'o/
214a2(rgyud): nor bu rin chen rgyu zhags dang //rdo rje dgra sta rab tu rdebs//tshogs mchog pad+ma chen po dang //dril bu rnga yi sgra sgrogs pa'o//las ni ral gri gshol chen dang //'jig rten rgyang mar 'phen pa ste//bar ma
214a3(rgyud): rdo rje dung mar 'khrug/sti ra chen po rab rdebs pa'o//brdzun mo khrag 'thung chen mo yang //'khril bas pad+ma reg ta stob//gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya ni//byis dbyug mda' gzhu rgyal mtshan dang /
214a4(rgyud): byis snying rdo rje za rdeg tshul//byis snying dung dmar byis rgyu dang //mgo lus 'brel ba'i tshul du gnas//steng 'og phyi nang bsnol ba dang //byis lhag khog pa dral zhing lha//rgyu mgo zhing khur rgyu
214a5(rgyud): gri dang //rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o//lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrogs dang //dril bu 'khrol bas slong bar byed//slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs//bcu gnyis dang ni brgyad kyis mdzes//
214a6(rgyud): rang gi stan dang lag cha dang //ci bgyi zhes ni chas te gnas//kun kyang mdzes pa'i rgyan dang bcas//zhal 'dzum steg mig 'khril tshul can//dbu skra ral pa lcang lo bcings//sha da
214a7(rgyud): ba yi kA len cing //dmar la rdul ldem chags pa'i tshul//snam zheng che la rked pa phra//nu 'bur stod smad bye zhing bgying //dmar la klan zhing 'dud tshul can//gus dang steg pa'i ngang
214b1(rgyud): tshul 'chang //sa su gangan la 'khyod pa no//skyon+d+ra mo sgyug nug rjod glon 'chang //rgyangs su dmyur ba bad+mo bsnams//wA rgyun kar wAng tro shU la//gtogs 'dod stan ma 'gyur lo 'chang /
214b2(rgyud): gzhon nu dmar ma mdung thung 'phel//brgyu byin dkar mi yin 'dri gdangs//rdo rje ser mo can da thung //bdud rtsi dmar me badra bsnams//zla ba dkar ma~M pran+ta ta ri//be can
214b3(rgyud): gnag dbyug tho 'byar//srin mo dmar mo dung khrag 'thung //ze ba ljang nag pa su 'dren//dga' ba dmar ma ke tar 'chang //stobs chen dkar mo gshol 'dzin ma//rdo rje sir
214b4(rgyud): mo spu gri gcod//'dod pa dmer mo mnga' gzhu 'gengs//nor srungs dkar mo bum pa 'dzin//rlung lha sngon mo ba dan 'phyar//gsod byed dkar mo ral g+hi so//me me dmar mo
214b5(rgyud): gsal zhing 'chung //pag mo nag mche zhags tsan/rgan byad dmar mo zhing chung za//sna tshogs dkari mo thaMd khrag 'thung //chu lha dmar ser sbrul zhags 'dzin//rdo rje nag mo
214b6(rgyud): lcags kyu 'dzin//rdo rje sar mo ra mag zhags//rdo rje dmar mo lcags sgrog snyam//rdo rje ljang gnag skyil 'khrol 'byung //sa~M so brjid pa'i stabs ldan pa'o//de nas gzhan
214b7(rgyud): shi bya ste//rnam par spro ba'i rgyag pa'i phyir//sku dang gsung dang thug sa nyid dang //yin tan 'phrin las khwa ma'i byer//lnga bcu brgyad ldan gyi brag la//sngags pa
215a1(rgyud): phyag rgya ting 'dzin dang /sku mdog bzhugs tshul rim pa dag/rigs rnams ji ltar 'gyur ba rtag/de ltar bsams dang bris pa dang //brjod dang mos pa'i
215a2(rgyud): sbyor ba yis//ji ltar 'tsham par bsgom par bya//de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos//rngam pa'i zhal gAdamyas spyan zlog cing //mche gartsigs phyogs bcur
215a3(rgyud): gom pa yis//'jigs pa'i stang stabs gar mdzad pa//'jigs byed bcu ni rnam par 'phrul//oM au oM au au au au au au au/ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba/dzA dz+ra dz+ra
215a4(rgyud): dz+r-i dz+ra dzI dzA dz+ra dzA dzA/kro kro kro kro kro kr-i kro kro kro kro/d+ha d+ha d+hA d+ha d+ha d+hA d+hA d+ha d+ha d+ha/hU~M kA ra bi dza ya/ni la da Na Da/ya mAn ta ka Ar+ya a tsa la/ha ya gr-I ba/a pa rA d+hI tA/
215a5(rgyud): a mr-i ta kun+da Da le/tai lokya bi dza ya/ma hA ba la/hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hU~M hUM hUM/phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/'di dag sngon du phyung ba yis//ri bo sa gran
215a6(rgyud): 'gul byed cing //rgya mtsho ma lus 'khrug pa dang //sngags kyi sgra chen grags par 'gyur//hUM mdzad rnam rgyal dbyug sngon can//gshed po gzhan 'joms rta mgrin dang //
215a7(rgyud): mi g.yo bdud rtsi khams gsum rgyal//stobs chen khro bo 'di dag gis//rang rang bgegs kun rnam par gzir//ma lus 'jigs shing 'joms par mdzad//brdza gardza/
215b1(rgyud): nar+thA\u0f88\u0f90/dAhA dat+ta/paHpa /ba r+b+ha t+ta/t+yA s+yAr+tha sa?/tiy+YAm+b+hartenad+ha dz+nyAn+daH/be r+b+ha naH/ d+hA d+hAd+h+yAn+man+tu/sa la ya ya ga la sa ya dran/
215b2(rgyud): rgyal po 'di dag kyang //blo dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis//bskal pa'i me ri nang rol du//bri'am bsams mam dmigs bya ba//mthing ka dkar po mthing nag dang //ljang sngon dmar
215b3(rgyud): nag dud ka ljang //dkar ljang dud dmar mdog tu snang //khro mo lus dang grib mar gnas//'khor lo ni mgo rdo rje stir//drang srong 'bar bar bcas pa dang //gshin rje'i rkang bzung
215b4(rgyud): zhing dbyug 'phyar//ral gri bdan bral stir dbyug gshog/ba dan brgyad thegs pa ram nyid//rin chen ni mgo gsum gyi dbyug/rdo rje rtse gsum ni mgo dang //thong gshol gtun shing
215b5(rgyud): g.yas g.yon thogs//yang na zhal gsum phyag drug ste//blo ldan rnam par bsams nas ni//bgegs dang gdug pa rnam par 'jig/pho brang 'khor dang rnam par bsgom//de
215b6(rgyud): nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//rang lus rten dang rten pa yi//dkyil 'khor nyid du gsal bar rtag/lte ba snying ste sku gsung thugs//thig gis cha chen cha chung bcas//gnas bzhi
215b7(rgyud): dngas ma 'byung ba ste//khog pa dur khrod gzhal yas khang //ka ba gdung dang rta babs dang //bla bre rdo rje ra ba dang //'khor lo dra ba dra phyed dang //nyi zla skar khung rdzing bu dang //skyed
