216a1(rgyud): shing g.yas g.yon 'khor lo brtsegs//cod pan nyi zla pad mar bcas//rgyal ba bzhugs pa'i gzhal yas khang //rang 'byung N+DI rta'i 'khor lon//thig la yis/
216a2(rgyud): lnga bdag nyid//ma lus thig le 'dus pa'i ros//cho 'phrul bstan pa'i gdug pa 'dul//so sor 'khor lo dgod pa yi//ting 'dzin rdzogs pa'i tshul tu bsgom//'byung ba ni
216a3(rgyud): dngas ma yum nyid//bde ba'i dngas ma na mkha'i khams//thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i//rang bzhin khams lnga'i rang bzhin bcud//zla ba nyi ma gnas pa yi//shrI
216a4(rgyud): ra tsi ta'i thig le la//nang gi gdug pa 'joms pa dang //spyod yul bde bar sbyar ba dang //thig le so sor dgod par nus//phye bas rim pa'i 'khor lo ste//bsdus pas thig le chen
216a5(rgyud): bo nyid//thig le ye shes lngar ldan pa//thabs nyid dngas ma yum du bshad//rnam shes thig le nyams myong nyid//tha mal 'joms pas khro mor snang //gnas kyi thig le tsar
216a6(rgyud): bcas pa//'phra men nyid du shes par bya//gnas bzhi 'jug pa'i sgo nyid//sgal tshigs la rten bde ba'i bcud//'phro zhing sdud pa dbang phyug ma//gnas brten bcu yi thig le
216a7(rgyud): la//'joms pa'i rang bzhin gsal bar byed//nyams myong skye dang rnam pa med//spyod yul dag pas mang du bshad//zla ba nyi ma la rten te//sku gsung thugs kyi lam
216b1(rgyud): rgyud//thob pa ga ya dang 'brar ba dang //ri dgas med par rnam par dran//dado 'o yan lag bzhi ru 'gyur//'khyud pa gang gyi phyag rgyang zhes//rdo rje stong po'i da d+hAr 'grol//bstod pa
216b2(rgyud): rlung dang mnyam sbyor bas//nyi ma zla ba dus gcig 'char//de nyid kun tu khyab pa las//mya lus lhan cig skyes par 'gyur//bde ba chen po gnyis med pa//kha sbyar bsru
216b3(rgyud): thabs las skyes//thangs las byung ba'i gsang thig le//ma lus 'dus pa'i bcud kyi ro//rten las rten can nyams myong ba//lhags pa'i ye shes thabs las skyes//chos dbyings
216b4(rgyud): la sogs yo shes lnga//thugs nyid mtshon phyir mtshan ma ste//gang mi rten dang 'bar dang 'jig/bde ba'i rlung dang na mkha'i khams//de bzhin btsun mo dgyes spyad pa//mi phyed
216b5(rgyud): gnyis med lhan cig pa//gang de thabs las byung ba yi//dngos gnyis yum dang dbang po'i tshogs//lhan cig skyes pa'i thig le nyid//ma lus bde bar rang snang ba//gnyis med
216b6(rgyud): 'dus pa'i stobs las byung //gnas yul phyag rgya'i thig ler bstan//dgug dang 'khyud dang bsdams dang 'bebs//ye shes 'jug pa'i sgo yin te//skal tshigs brgyad
216b7(rgyud): ra thig le'i rkyen//dbang phyug mar ni shes par bya//baspu thig li 'bral ba nyid//'phro mo bsem mi khyab snang ba//grangs las 'das pa'i phyag rgya ste//bsam byas nim
217a1(rgyud): mdza'o zhing du sbyar//zla bzhi las byung gsang thig la//khams gsum bcud 'dus pad chen po//yungs dkar spyan med brten pa las//mA lus khyab par tshul
217a2(rgyud): phyis snad //thig le bde chen thabs sbyor ba/thob dang goms pa'i rang bzhin las//zhen pa'i 'du shes bral 'gyur bas//rang dbang med pa'i rtags 'byung ste//sbar zhing man ma
217a3(rgyud): nga'i tshig bya//snang dang rig pa sna tshogs chos//bde ba chen po'i thig ler brtan//nyi ma'i snying po lta ba ltar//bltas pas mthong ba med pa'i don//ma lus bde chen rgyun tu
217a4(rgyud): snang de nas gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor bshad//'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa yi//ji snyed ma lus chos bstan pa//rang 'byung ye shes chen po ste//de nyid dngos po sna
217a5(rgyud): tshigs mchog/ji skyed brtan g.yo snang ba'i chos//chen po rags pa gnas pa'i chos//maM lus kun la 'thun snang ba//rang 'byung thabs kyi ngo bo nyid//de dag gdod nas ma
217a6(rgyud): skyes pa'i//rdo rje shes rab ston nyid//gang yang dngos min ngo bo nyid//shes rab yum gyi rang bzhin//ji snyed na mkha'i mthar thug pa//rang 'byung byang chub sems kyi gzugs/
217a7(rgyud): mo lus kun gyi rang bzhin nyid//dpag med 'thun par snang ba ste//me long dang ba'i rang bzhin nyid//sna tshogs gzugs dang 'brel ba bzhin//ma lus rigs pa'i thig le
217b1(rgyud): las//ma lus sku yi dkyil 'khor snang //ji snyed rab 'byams ma lus pa'o//'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa dang //zin dang ma zin gnyis ka'i sgra//nges pa dang nam nges pa'o//'phrul dang mA 'khrul skra
217b2(rgyud): tshogs pa//brjod dang bsam dang 'phrul pa dang //byin rlabs mtha' yas rang snang ba//byang chub sems kyi gsung mchog ste//namakha'i sgra dang brag cha ltar//rang rgyud med pa'i rig pa nyid/
217b3(rgyud): bsam pa mtha' yas ji snyed pa//ma lus gsung gi dkyil 'khor nyid//rang rgyud brtan po min par gnas//gang du na mkha' mtha' klas par//bskal pa mtha' thug med pa'i bar//nam hA/
217b4(rgyud): char dang chu bur dang //sprin dang chu rlabs phung po ltar//ye shes bde dang sdug bsngal dang //nges dang ma nges dam pa dang //dman dang chags dang chags bral dang //zin dang zhen dang ma zhen
217b5(rgyud): dang //rnam pa rnam med rtags pa'i chos//dran rtogs rig pa gang yang rung //ma lus rig pa rang snang ba//snga ma dran pa'i rnam pa 'am//rmi lam sgyu ma'i nyams myong ltar//sna tshogs
217b6(rgyud): sdang yang rang rgyud min//gang yang rang rgyud kun bral ba'i//ma lus dkyil 'khor bshad pa rnams//rang rgyud med pas gzugs brnyan te//thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i//
217b7(rgyud): gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub//rang 'thung ye shes skye 'gag med//ma lus mi phyed rdo'i gzugs//rnam pa mthar thug med pa nyid//yon lhun grub rang snang bas
218a1(rgyud): de yi brnyan/rang bzhin 'char//mtha' bral rang 'byung dkyil 'khor ni//cir yang snang la mi dmigs phyir//yang dag brtan par ma gnas pas//ma lus gzug
218a2(rgyud): brnyan dkyil 'khor shar//bde chen rang 'byung lhun grub nyid//yon rdzogs pa'i nor bu ltar//dpag med chosu snang ba'i phyir//bde ba chen po'i gzugs brnyan te//skye bo dag dang ma dag
218a3(rgyud): ba'i//gdul bya mthon dman rig pa la//rig sbyang spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir//drang po nas bzung mthar thug par//rang rang bsam pa de bzhin du//de dag po la de ltar snang //gzugs brnyan
218a4(rgyud): phyi yi rim pa ste//thun mong yul du gyur phyir//ma lus tha dad med pa yi//phyi nang snod bcud rdzogs pa'i lus//bcud ldan bde ba mdzad pa'i nas//mi shigs thig le kun gyi dngos//
218a5(rgyud): rang nyid bde ba chen po'i gzugs//dngas snyigs 'brel ba'i nus mthu las//zag pa yod dang med pa yi//dngos po gnyis kyi cho su snang //rgyu yi thig le'i rang bzhin la//nus pa'i khyad par
218a6(rgyud): so so yis//'byung ba dang ni yum nyid dang //bde ba chen po la sogs pa//thig le nus pa'i stobs las snang //ma lus 'khor lo'i snying po nyid//thig le 'bar ba bde ba'i
218a7(rgyud): gzugs//rtsa yig bye brag bcas pa ni//bcud 'dus thig le ros gang ga/ma lus rten can dkyil 'khor nyid//ma lus snod bcud kun tu snang //thabs chen gsang
218b1(rgyud): mtsham#mas sam #sa ma latha thas mthamamapa#la yam san#
218b2(rgyud): ba'i rim pa nyid//khams bzhi las brten thig la nyid//g.yo dang 'dzag cing gnas dang thim//bye brag gsum las rgyud pa yis//glu dang sgyu ma'i 'khrul chu la//zhugs dang 'thungs pa'i skung
218b3(rgyud): yul lam//me long lam dang ba'i ri bo yi//rtser phyin ma lus bltas pa ltar//bde chen gzugs brnyan nyid snang //rim pa ba na yi thig le nyid//bde ba'i 'du byed gang bskul ba//gnas/
218b4(rgyud): bzhi'i thig lnga'i bye brag gsal//mu tig phreng ba brgyus pa ltar//'jig dang 'bar ba'i thig le nyid//ti l+le'i bla 'bras bu smin pa ltar//ma lus til gyi phung po ltar//thig le'i lus
218b5(rgyud): gnas pa yin//nyams myong gsal bar 'bar ba'i tshe//'dar dang rdul dang ba spu ljang //'phar dang sgra 'byin dpa' bo'i gar//rnam par rol pa'i tshogasu snang //snang srid bde ba chen po

218b7(rgyud): snang srid snod bcud ma lus kun//bde chen rig pa'i gzugs brnyan du//rgya mtsho 'dzings nas bltas pa ltar//ma lus de ltar snang ba yin//reg pas nyam su myong ba dang /
218b8(rgyud): spyod yul dag pas nang du bshad/rang byung bde ba chen po nyid//gsang ba'i gang zag gdul ba dang //gsang bI nyams myong mngon bstan phyir//thabs dang shes rab 'dus pa yi//
219a1(rgyud): can//nyi ma m+me shes 'd-i 'byung ba/rlu nga nang gi phyug rgyus babyed//nair rgyu 'jug rang dbang med//ma lus rig pa'i thog lang 'akrus//rtswa ba'i rlung ni tshod ldan//

219a4(rgyud): de nas dus gsu 'du 'bru med/nanam / rgyus med pa yi/ na na nas
219a5(rgyud): me rtogs khya pa'i gzugs brnyan te//rtog pa nyams myong gzugs brnyan ny+Ning+ga//mahA byin zhes gzugs brnyan 'di//dman drung yin lag/mi tshang
219a6(rgyud): dang man ngag med pa dang //dka' thub can dang ma smin dang //skal med yal ba'i yul min pas//gsang ba'i gsang chen dam pa nyid//de nas gzhan yang bshad
219b1(rgyud): bya ga/lhag pa gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor nyid//tha mal brod pa skyed pa'i phyir//cho ga rgyas par bshad par bya//dkyil 'khor chen po rtogs 'od kyang //ji bzhin mngon du ma gyur la//
219b2(rgyud): lhag par 'di yis rtogs gyur pas//lhag pa zhes ni bstan pa yin//gang gis gang la gang mtshon pas//lhag par mtshon par nye ba dang //gang la rten te gang bsgrubs pa//lhag
219b3(rgyud): par myur du 'grub pa'i phyir//'dis ni lhag pa nyid du brjod//gang las gang de thabs 'di yis//mngon par lhag pas lhag pa'o//rgyal ba kun gyi sku gsung thugs//thabs de gang
219b4(rgyud): gis mngon ston cing //dngos bzhi ma yin pa'i phyir//gzugs brnyan nyid du bstan pa yin//gang la brten pa'i thabs nyid kyis//de nyid 'dra bar snang ba ltar//ma mthong mos pa'i gdul byas
219b5(rgyud): de dang 'dra ba'i thabs nyid//dngos min 'dra phyir gzugs brnyan//tshul ba kun gyi rang bzhin//dpag mod ye shes lhun rdzogs pa'i//ye shes rang 'byung lnga'i gzugs//zag ma
219b6(rgyud): gdul bya'i ngo la snang //de yi yon gzugs brnyan gyis//zag bcas mos pa'i gang zag la//sku gsung thugs kyi rnam pa nyid//'dra bar mtshon phyir gzugs brnyano//gang phyir chos
219b7(rgyud): dbyings ngo bo la//tha dad dbye ba mi gnas kyang //mos dang drag po'i dbang gyur te//gang gis gang de mi 'dul bas//thugs rjes kun la khyab pa'i phyir//long spyod sprul
220a1(rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khar bstan//zhen pa can dang nga rgyal can//thabs dang drag pos char bcad phyir//de ltar so so'i 'tsham pa ste//lhag pa gzugs brtan gnyi su bshad//
220a2(rgyud): gang du bkra shis yid 'ong ba'i//steng 'og phyogs bzhi par mtshams dag/legs pas yid 'ong bar chad med//phyi nang ri bo dgon pa'i mchog/rang gi sa bzhi legs brtags la//
220a3(rgyud): pra dang nyams kyi ltas brtags la//ma dag mtshan dan spang byas la//dag cing nyams dga' blang bar bya//sa gzhi byin brlabs bkra shis pa//gal te rtsod pa zhi bya'i phyir//
220a4(rgyud): snang dang mi snang bdag po la//mgu bas bar chad med par ba slang //gang de dbang du bya ba'i phyir//cho go'i yan lag kun brtsams te//mchod dang mnyes pas tshim byas la//sa
220a5(rgyud): gzhi bdag gi dbang du bya//thun mong skyon gsal dag byas nas//mi dmigs chos la blo sbyongs shing //dngos grub myur zhing nyams dga' ba'i//phyi nang dag pa chen por sbyang //
220a6(rgyud): rang bzhin byin brlabs kun gyi dngos//gdod nas ma bcos gnas pa la//lhag pa'i bdon pa dbyer med pas//lha dang gzhal yas ngo bor brlag/gang de'i bar chad srung
220a7(rgyud): pa'i phyir//sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor gsal btab la//rdo rje khro bo'i 'khor lo spro//hUM bzhi sngogs dang bcas pas bsrung //de dag legs par gzung ba'i phyir//ma dag
220b1(rgyud): pa ni mtshams bcad de//las kyi bya ba kun rdzogs nas//rgyal ba kun la gsol btab lo//'dod pa'i don rnams grub pa'i bar//dngos grub gter du ming gis gzung //gang phyir bshad
220b2(rgyud): pa'i cho ga yis//ma dag pa dang ngan pa dag/rtogs dang ting 'dzin cho ga yis//mnyam pas re dogs med par gnas//dkyil 'khor phyi nang bshad pa bzhin//tshad ni rje su 'thun
220b3(rgyud): ba ste//thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste//yang na sor bzhi tshad tu ste//yang na 'dzub gang tshad tu bya//yang na lus gang tshad du ste//yang na lus ni gsum bzhi nyid//yang na
220b4(rgyud): bco brgyad nyid du 'am//nyi shu lnga yi tshad du bya//yang na rgyang grags dpag tshad de//rang gi rig pa rjes 'thun par//na mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa'i ched//tshad dang ldan pa'i dkyil
220b5(rgyud): 'khor te//yid 'ong byug bdug nyi shu lngas//mdzes shing legs par byas nas ni//gang dang 'brel ba'i cho ga brtsams//gzhan du long spyod ma byas pa'i//ras bal dur khrod rgyu las
220b6(rgyud): byas//gsar zhing grims lnga 'jur mdud med//byin brlabs lnga dang sku gsung thugs//thim pas ye shes thig skud de//rig pas thig ni gdab par bya//thabs dang shes rab
220b7(rgyud): gnyis med dra'i//gsad pa'i 'phro 'du de bzhi no//dkyil 'khor yid 'ong pho brangs//ma nor gsal bas thig tu bshad//gang gis gang mtshon de bzhin te//kha dog lnga dang
221a1(rgyud): phung po dang //khams dang skye mched rnams shes sogs//ye shes dkyil 'khor mtshon phyir//rtogs pas 'khor bu'i rgya dral phyir//mtshon zhes kyang ni
221a2(rgyud): brjod pa nyid//ma mthong rmongs la ston phyir mtshon//kha dog nyi shu rtsa lnga 'am//lnga'i tshon gyis dri bar bya//gsar dang dngul dang bai DUr+ya//pad+ma in Da ni la nyid//rin
221a3(rgyud): chen lnga dang ldan pa yis//mkhas pas 'byor ldan ci bder bri//yang na 'bras dang sa lu la//kha dog bsgyur bas de bzhino//dman deng 'byor pa chung ba yis//'byung
221a4(rgyud): khungs lnga yis bri bar bya//thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i//rgyal ba bcu nyid thim pa yis//ye shes rin chen phyi nang med//dag pa'i ngo bor blta bar bya//oM
221a5(rgyud): a hUM swA hA/sane pany+tsi rad na sa ma ye hUM/'bru bcu srung zhing 'bun pa yi//sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs//zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus la//ye shes
221a6(rgyud): rin tshon rtsig pa ste//dra ba dra phyed rta babs dang //rdo rje zla phyed 'dod yon dang //rin chen sa gzhi skyed shing dang //rdzing bu dril bu g.yer khas spras//rtag tu bri zhing
221a7(rgyud): bsgom par bya//gdug pa 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor la//thod pa sna lnga sna gsum dang //thong skam rtsig pa'i rim pa bzhin//tshangs dang lha dbang la brten pa//
221b1(rgyud): mchog chen brgyad ni yin par 'dod//lhag ma rnams kyis thog phub ste//gza' brgyad nyi zla'i blo skar ldan//sbrul dang thod pa'i phreng ba snod//dra ba dra byed rnam par smras//phyi nang rgyu 'bras
221b2(rgyud): bdug pa dag/gdul bya'i rta babs bzhir bshad//sor 'phreng zad pa'i phreng ba dang //dbang po nyi zla'i phreng bas spras//khro mo sha lnga bdud rtsi dang //dur khrod 'dod yon ldan pa'o//du khrod sa
221b3(rgyud): gzhi khrag dang bcas//skyes bu gsal shing phyogs mtshams brgyad//rak+ta'i mtsho brgyad rba rlab 'khyil//thod tshal brgyus pa dur khrod rlung //'jigs pa'i sgra dang
221b4(rgyud): me 'ang ldan//zhing 'phen phyogs mtshams brgyad dang bcas//lha chen thod pa sbubs bstengs na//tsi ta'i tog las 'od zer 'phro//he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor nyid//ma lus bri
221b5(rgyud): zhing bsgom par bya//ma lus 'gro ba'i re skong bas//rin chen 'phreng dang rgyan du ldan//mi 'jigs stobs sogs kun ldan pas//stobs ldan theg par gnas pa yin//spyod
221b6(rgyud): la sbyin gyis ma gos pas//pad+ma 'bar bar mdzes par snang //thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas//nyi zla mdzes pa'i gdon la bzhugs//bde chen don las mi 'da' byas//
221b7(rgyud): 'khril sbyor dgyes pa'i tshul du bzhugs//sku gsung yon tan 'phrin las thugs//yongs rdzogs sku'i rgyan du gnas//lam dang byang chub yan lag rnams//rdzogs phyir
222a1(rgyud): b+h+ya/zung bral sno r+m+ma//thugs rje 'khor ba mog 5//chu sbyin klu byug d+hA rlu sa bskos//thugs rdo ba na du mo mangs khrus//'brel ba bar chad mod par gnas//
222a2(rgyud): brtson 'grus 'khor bu spong ba'i phyir//ri dgas dag ni mnyan par gnas//zag mo sprin gyis kun gzigs pas//dge sdig spyan gyis gzigs par bstan//ma lu
222a3(rgyud): zil gnon stobs rdzogs phyir//bya khyung dag ni gnas par bstan//chos kyi 'khor lo bskor byas shing //nyon mongs ched pa'i gdul sel bas//thugs rje gdugs kyis
222a4(rgyud): 'khor lo bstan//ma lus gcig tu 'dus pas na//tog stong 'od zer 'bar ba ste//gdul bya'i bsam pa'i don phyir bstan//lha rnams so so'i rnam pa ni//sku mdog sna
222a5(rgyud): tshogs bzhugs tshul dang //gdan dang phyag mtshan rgyun du bcas//pho mo'i tshul dang bcas pa rnams//de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa dang //gdul bya gzigs pa'i tshul
222a6(rgyud): nyid kyis//gats+tsha 'khor phyi nang lnga tshul gyis//bzhugs thabs rim pa so sor bstan//rang rang snying po gang yin pa//kha dog so sor phye nas ni//gsung gi dkyi
222a7(rgyud): 'khor bstan pa'i//rim pa bzhin du gsal bar bya//rang rang thugs mtshan gang yin pa//kha dog dbyibs dang bcas pa nyid//thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bstan
222b1(rgyud): ba'i ra//rim pa ji bzhin dgod pa bya//gdug pa 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor yang //dung tshon ras chen la sogs pa//sku gsung thugs kyis 'khor lo nyid//rim pa bzhin du gsal bar dgod/
222b2(rgyud): de bzhin nyid la dmigs med de//stong zhing mi dmigs rig pa nyid//gang la rtog spyod mi gnas pa//chos dbyings de bzhin nyid du bsgom//bden gnyis dbyer med mnyam pa nyid//mi nus
222b3(rgyud): khyab kyang ma rtogs pas//phyogs med snying rje na mkha' ltar//rnal 'byor pas ni bsgom par bya//rang 'byung ye shes rnam pas ni//yig 'bru rnam pa gsal ba las//zhen 'dzin
222b4(rgyud): sbyangs nas yig 'bru yi//'phro 'dus 'byung lnga rim gyis spyod//bruM gis gnyis med 'od sbyangs nas//gzhal yas khang ltar yin par bsgom//rnam pa'i gang yin du dag dang //rang rigs
222b5(rgyud): don gnyis med las//'dres pas gang yin gtsobo nyid//bskyed cing dbang bskur byin brlabs nas//'khor yang mi phyod 'dres par bsgom//yongs rdzogs sbyin cing smrasmra pa la//9hUM
222b6(rgyud): hos gnyis med de//'ad 'i mthar thug bar du bsam//las kyi bye ba spyan zin nos//thun mong mchod pa sna tshogs dang //kun bzang mchod pa la sogs pa//lha mo brgyad dang bcu
222b7(rgyud): drug gisadang/ mchod pa'i rim pa brtsam par bya//rin chen rnam snga N+Da gling dang //'bru dang bang mdzod kha'i khyim dang //bu dang chung ma bran khol dang //gnas dpa zhing dang na bza
223a1(rgyud): dang /rgyan drang bza' btung long spyod dang //rdzing dang chu mig 'bab chu dang //mtshe'u dang khron po lu ma dang //ri dang dre'u dang skyed mos chal//kho ra yug dang lhun
223a2(rgyud): po dang //skye bo mang pa bro glu dang //na mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa yi//mchod pa sna tshogs rgyas par chod//dpa'o sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga//bcud dang rol mo snang ba dang //sna
223a3(rgyud): tshogs dri dang byug pa mchog/dag cing legs par 'bul bar bya//thar pa la sogs zhing gi mchog/dngos dang lta spyod ting 'dzin gyis//sgrub bya ma lus kun bsgral te//
223a4(rgyud): rdo rje zhing du bskyed par bya/lha mo mi mo reg pa mo//cho ga'i sbyor ba rang rtog bzhin//dngos dang ting 'dzin sbyor ba yis//bde ba chen po rol mi yos//phyi nang na mkha'i
223a5(rgyud): khams bkang ste//rin chen lha mo yo byad dang //reg pa nyam myong bde ba yis//rgyal sras zhing gi rdul snyed la//gnyis med dag pa'i tshul gyis mchod//rol mo klu
223a6(rgyud): dbyangs bcas pa yis//dkyil 'khor rim pa bstod par bya//rdo rje gsum gyi bzlas pa yis//mtshan ma legs par snang ba na//spyang dang byin brlabs dbang bskur dang //
223a7(rgyud): mchod dang bstan pa'i cho ga dag/rtog pa'i cho ga rgyas par bya//dkyil 'khor de yi phyogs bzhi ru//rnam bzhi las kyi me thab la//dus bzhir rang rang rdzas dag gis//mya
223b1(rgyud): nga'i tshul gyis mchod par bya//de nas gnad thob dbang phyug nyid//dkyil 'khor zhugs shing nus ldan nas//thugs rjes 'khor ba bsgral ba'i phyir//skul ldan slob ma gzhug par bya//
223b2(rgyud): dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yis//sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo che//mngon du mthong zhugs bsod nams gang //'dir zhugs pa nyid de bzhin//gang du sku gsung thugs
223b3(rgyud): ldan pa//glang du mos pas spro bskyed phyir//rgyal ba kun kyang 'phrul mdzad//sgo gsum byin gyis rlob par mdzad//rnal 'byor cho ga rdzogs pas kyang //gdul bya zhing dang khro ba
223b4(rgyud): la//so so'i mtshan ma nyid bstan phyir//sku gsung thugs kyi rnam pa dag/bris dang brdung dang blugs pa dag/so so'i gnasu legs par 'gram//ma lus sku gsung thugs
223b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor//'di las ma gtogs lha gzhan med//gang du dbang dang 'brel ba ni//bco lnga'i rim pa'i byin brlabs phyir//bzhi dang brgyad kyi dkyil 'khur la//yab yum bco
223b6(rgyud): brgyad gnas par bya//bcu gnyis bcu drug dkyil 'khor la//bzhi bcu gnyis dang ldan par bya//nyi shu 'am nyi shu rtsa lnga la//rgyas pa'i cho ga rim par dgod//'di dag lugs
223b7(rgyud): dang 'bur dang bza//bri dang bsgom po dag kyang rung //'di ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor//zab mo'i dbang gi dkyil 'khor ni//thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i//sor bzhi 'jub gdung ba rten
224a1(rgyud): rol rna ba'i rjes 'brang min/mthong dang brtan dang goms pa ni/rim pa bzhin du gsal bas 'byung //brgyad pa lam gyi rim pa yis//mthar byin nyam su myong bar 'gyur//dbang
224a2(rgyud): bskur thabs kyi rim pa yis//byin brlabs man ngag yid ches bya//'di ni dbang gi dkyil 'khor te//de bzhin gnas skabs gzhan du yang //thun mong tshogs la sbyar ba'i phyir//
224a3(rgyud): 'byung lnga rgyu dang bdag nyid dang //mkha' dag byin brlabs so sor gdon//rang gi tshe ga'i sbyor ba yis//ji ltar brtsams pa 'grub par 'gyur//bsod nams tshogs zhes bya
224a4(rgyud): bar bshad//gzhan yang stobs ldan rnal 'byor pas//gang 'dod mngon du bsgrub pa'i phyir//'chi med tshe'i dkyil 'khor dang /mtshan ma pra'i dkyil 'khor dang //dug 'joms
224a5(rgyud): bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor dang //cho 'phrul ro langs la sogs pa//gang bsgrub don phyir gang bshad pa//de nyid bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor//las bzhi lha'i rnal 'byor gyis//
224a6(rgyud): rigs dang 'thun pa'i sa gzhi la//thab khung so so'i mtshan ma can//phyin las dkyil 'khor nyid du bshad//slob dpon nus pa stobs ldan pas//rdo rje lusu brtan
224a7(rgyud): bya'i phyir//rgyang grags dpag tshad la sogs pa//sku gsung thugasu mngon gsal ba//rnal 'byor skal ldan spyod yul te//tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid du bshad/
224b1(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//mtshan ma rtogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis//mthong bya don la sgrib pas na//de dag sbyang pa'i cho ga bshad//tha mal zhen pas brtags pa'i don//lhag pa'i bden
224b2(rgyud): gnyis rtogs bsgoms pas//phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa/sku gsung thugs kyi ngang du bsreg/dkyil 'khor lha'i mtshan ma dag/rnam pa ji snyed gnas pa dag/rang rig rnam par
224b3(rgyud): 'phrul pa nyid//mtshan ma thig le'i nga du sbyangs//thig le rim pa'i snang tshul te//phyi nang med pa'i byang chub sems//dngos dang dngos med kun sbyangs te//rang rig byang chub sems kyi me//
224b4(rgyud): phyogs bcur 'bar zhing dbyings la sdud//rnal 'byor las rung goms pa yis//gzhan don rtsom po'i don byed na//dang por nyes byas gsum sbyang phyir//rnam gsum khrus kyi rim
224b5(rgyud): pa btsam//gdug pa 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis//bar chad bgegs dang dpral byas la//bkug bcings bstim la rnal du gzhag/bsrung dang byug bdug rgyan gyis brgyan//'khor
224b6(rgyud): ba'i sa bon kun bkod de//dkyil 'khor 'phro 'dra rim pa yis//'khor ba'i sa bon sbyang bar bya//de tshe sdong bu gnas bkod//sdong bu re la lha rnams kyi//snying po tshang bar gdags pa
224b7(rgyud): dang //gsol btab gnang byin srasu bskyed//'jug dang dbang bskur las rdzogs nas/khro bo'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin to//las bzhi mo'i las byas nas//rtog tshogs lha gsuM
225a1(rgyud): dbyer med pa'o//rang rang gan su dag pa la//sbyin phyog glu br-i gar gyis mchod//las kyi bye ba kun zin nas//thig le chen po dang la rdzu//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya bA/
225a2(rgyud): byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor te//ma lus byang chub sems nyid//de rtogs bya phyir bshad par bya//chos rnams ma lus tha~Md dang //dkyil 'khor ma lus thams cad kun//tha dad dbye
225a3(rgyud): ba mi gnas te//byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor nyid//rang 'byung mthon dman med pa yi//sku gsung thugs dang lus ngag yid//ma lus gzhi rtsa snying po ste//rang 'byung
225a4(rgyud): byang chub sems la 'dus//de nyid rang rig 'od gsal ba//dngos po ma yin dngos med min//gnyis ka ma yin gnyis med min//mtha' dbus chu shas kun bral ba'i//
225a5(rgyud): zab cing yangs la rgya che ba//de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul te//rtog ge rnams kyi yul min pas//gsang ba'i gsang ba byang chub sems//e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi
225a6(rgyud): chos//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang //skye ba med las thams cad skyes//skyes pa nyid las skye ba med//e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
225a7(rgyud): kun gyi gsang //'gag pa med las thams cad 'gag/'gag pa nyid ni 'gag pa med//e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang //
225b1(rgyud): gnas pa med las thams cad gnas//gnas pa nyis la gnas pa med//a ma'o ngo tshar rmad kyi chos//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang //dmigs pa med las thad dmigs//
225b2(rgyud): dmigs pa nyid na dmigs pa med//e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang //'gro 'ong med las 'gro dang 'ong //'gro 'ong nyid la 'gro 'od med//
225b3(rgyud): ma skyes rig pa'i byang chub sems//dngos med dngos po'i rang bzhin du//rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid//g.yo dang mi g.yor bcas pa yis//phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa//rang
225b4(rgyud): 'byung sems kyi dkyil 'khor nyid//rang bzhin gnas dang rtogs pa dang //bsams dang dmigs dang gongs pa yi//sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan ma dang //lha dang lha min
225b5(rgyud): gsang ba dang //sha za 'byung po mi 'am ci//grul bum yi dgas klu rnams dang //rgyu ba'i srog chags ma lus dang //rtsi shing gel pa 'bras bu dang //phun sum tshogs pa ma
225b6(rgyud): lus pa/ma bcos don gyi lha nyid//byang chub semasu khyad par med//lha zhes gzhan du bstan pa yang //tshig gi tha snyad tsam du zad//byang chub sems la gnyis med par//rtogs
225b7(rgyud): pa'i don la gcig tu bstan//snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gang //gnas pa'i don dang ma phrad pas//ma lus snying rje'i gnas gyur pa//snying rje byang chub sems yin te//mi 'gal
226a1(rgyud): don du rab sbyor ba//kun rdzob byang chub semasu rjod//ji snyed rnam par bcas pa'i chos//ma lus mtha' yas bstan pa kun//byang chub sems kyi rnam 'phrul te//na ma khI/
226a2(rgyud): cho 'phrul ji bzhin du//sna tshogs snang bzhin dngos po med//de dag ji ltar gnas kyang rung //byang chub sems las gzhan min yang //thun mong yul phyir phyi ru bshad//rang lus
226a3(rgyud): phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor la//rang 'byung 'khor lo drug gnas pa//g.yo ba yang gis bskyod byed pa//'gro ba kun gyi lus la gnas//'phen dang sdud pa'i rang bzhin can//snying
226a4(rgyud): ma'i du su 'ang bde ba 'char//smin pa gru gsum smad na gnas//rnam thar sku gsum rtsa 'dud can//'bar zhing thig le 'bebs dang gnas//rang lus bde chen smin byed pa/
226a5(rgyud): de la gling rten bde ba'i gnas//sangs rgyas rin chen gab co la//thung ngu a snying lte bar gnas//'khrul zhing 'dzag dang gnas pa'i rtsa//rdo rje dbu ma'i lam dang 'brel/
226a6(rgyud): khyab cing rgyas ba'i snying po can//sum bcu gnyis gnyis rtswa yigri ldan//d+harmA tsakra snying po'i gnas//rtsa bzhi yan lag brgyad kyi dngos//dngas snyigs shes pa brgyad kyi
226a7(rgyud): rten//rgyu ba bzhi yis shes par bya//dngas ma 'dus pa'i thig le nyid//oM laM brten pa'i hUM gis bdud//ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can//bde ba mngon shes chos nyid/
226b1(rgyud): //rim pas mthar phyin 'byung bar 'gyur//bcu drug sgra sbyor thig la can//'dab ma a lo ldan pa yis//ma lus sgra skad bdag nyid can//khyab pa gsung gi bdag nyid can//sde chen//
226b2(rgyud): bcu dang ldan pa nyid//'byung 'jug gnas pa'i lam yin te//thobs dang shes rab bskul ba yis//bde ba 'byung 'gyur the tsom med//sum cu rtsa gnyis dkyil 'khor na//thig le de yi snyam
226b3(rgyud): pa'i dbyings//ma lus 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur cing //lus can kun la khyab par gnas//kun gyi dngos yin kun gyi gtso//ma lus kun 'dus gnyisu med//spyi gtsug 'dus pa'i
226b4(rgyud): snying po nas//rkang thil gsang ba'i gnas yan chad//sku gsung thugs kyi bka' bas bzung //snod bcud rgyud rnams rang bzhin bcud//dngas snyigs 'dres pa thabs kyis 'byed//
226b5(rgyud): g.yo ldang smon 'jug gnas mthar phyin//skad cig rim pa skye 'gyur ba//khams lnga 'dus pa'i ro yi stobs//sems lnga rim pas shes par 'gyur//'di nyid gsum du bshad/
226b6(rgyud): pa ste//skabs kyi rim pas sbyar ba nyid//rtsa dang thig le bde ba yis//phyi nang gsang ba'i tshul du bshad///de nas rgyal rigs rje rigs dang //bram ze gdol pa
226b7(rgyud): gar mkhan ma//yod 'ang na tshod dar la bab//nus dang chags pa che ba dang //bka' blo bde zhing yid mi 'khrug/lus ran sha mdangs dkar dmar phyed//skad snyan dran pas
227a1(rgyud): yid 'brog ma//bco brgyad bcu drug bcu bzhi dang //bcu gnyis ldan pa'i bu mo la//sbyor ba tshang zhing rtags byung nus//tha mal spangs pa'i sbyor ba yis//
227a2(rgyud): sa ya bcu gsum gnyis ldan pa'i//gsang dbang 'dus pa'i khams lnga las//gser 'gyur sman dang mun sel ltar//thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i//nyi ma zla ba rtsa
227a3(rgyud): phrad pa'i//ma lus 'dus pa'i rtse 'khor lo//'byung 'jug gnas pa rlung dang 'grogs//ldang bas tha mal shes pa 'gag/g.yo bas nyams nyid rtse gcig pa//smon pas yid
227a4(rgyud): gcig 'dres pa ste//'jug pa dzaHhUM baM hoHste//shes pa bde bar 'jug pa nyid//gnas pas yun ring gnas pa ste//mthar phyin 'dres pa'i gar thabs kyis//brjod bral
227a5(rgyud): thig le'i bstan pa 'char//tha mal zhen pa nub gyur nas//zhen pa ldog cing rig pa thim//rnam shes brgyal ba la sogs 'byung //yid 'ong gzi ldan phyag rgya ma//mthong
227a6(rgyud): bas lus sems bde ba dang //phrad pas sdug bsngal nyams par 'gyur//'dris pas bde ba brtan po 'byung //thabs dang ldan pas spyad gyur na//skal bar sbyangs pas
227a7(rgyud): mi 'byongs pa'i//rnam rtog zhen pa log gyur nas//da lta bde ba chen por smin//thob pa brtan 'dod rnal 'byor pas//mthong dang thos dang lhan cig gnas//'khyod dang 'phrad
227b1(rgyud): dang spyad pa yis//lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes ste//dbang dang mi ldan skal ngan dang //dman pas mi rtogs yul min pas//gsang ba zhes ni bshad pa yin//de nas gzhan yang bshad tu ba//
227b2(rgyud): rim pa'i ting 'dzin mthar phyin nas//sku dang gsung dang thugs ldan pa'i//chom bu gsum par ldan pa yi//sum bcu'i dkyil 'khor sgom par bya//gang du rgyas pa'i dbang gyur la//rigs
227b3(rgyud): lnga ye shes lngar ldan cing //sku gsung thugs dang yon tan las//bdun bcu'i rim pa sgom par bya//chos chub gsang bar spyod 'dod pas//tsham bu gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor te//
227b4(rgyud): bcu 'am yang na bco brgyad pa'i//tshom bu tha ma bsgom par bya//'dir ni dkyil 'khor kun 'dus pa'i//tshogs kyis 'khor lo bsgom par bya//gang du gdug pa 'dul ba yis//dkyil 'khor
227b5(rgyud): rim pa de bzhin te//rim pa bsgyur ba'i khro bo ni//rim pa ma 'dres tsam du bsgom//rnal 'byor yo byad tshogs pa yis//dkyil 'khor ting 'dzin spyod tshogs pa//ma lus tshogs
227b6(rgyud): bas tshogs zhes bya//dang por dod dang brtson bkrus dang //dam tshig lta sogs sngon song zhing //rim bzhin ting 'dzin mthar phyin pas//nus pa yod pa'i rnal 'byor pa//
227b7(rgyud): skal ldan drod tshad mnyams pa 'am//mi ldan 'phro 'dus sbyangs pas 'grub//rab tu dben zhing yid 'ong ba//ri rtsegasang 'dob chu gling ngam//dur khrod ri bor nags 'dabs
228a1(rgyud): te//skye bo 'dus dang rnam bral zhing //bar chad bral ba'i sra phyogs der//rnal 'byor rgyal po lta bu'i phyir//rin chen yid 'ong mdzes rgyan pa'o//'khor khang
228a2(rgyud): phyi nang par ldan pa//'chags sar bcas par btsam par bya//rnal 'byor pho mo grangs mnyam pa//lto spyod ting 'dzin dam tshig tshang //bro gar 'dus 'phro yo byad dang //gru
228a3(rgyud): tshig sgra yi yo byad dang //bza' dang btung ba'i yo byad dang //rgyan dang bgo ba'i yo byad dang //A lo ka li mnyam sbyar zhing /nyi zla brtsegs pa'i ngo bor bzhugs//lha
228a4(rgyud): dang mi dang yo byad dang //gnas dang spyod pa kun tshogs pas//de dag chog su bshad pa yin//thabs dang shes rab 'brel gyur nas//yab yum gsal ba'i ting 'dzin la//
228a5(rgyud): mtha' thug med pa'i rgyal ba rnams//na mkha'i char bzhin kun bkug la//yab yum gnyis med 'dres pa la//dbang bskur byin brlabs brgyan btags te//bdud rtsi
228a6(rgyud): lnga dang sha lnga dang //bza' btud lha la lha rol zhing //'od kyis mAM lus tshim pa dang //'gro mang bde ba thob par bya//bro lnga gor lnga stabs tshig lnga//bro grar rtse 'dzi
228a7(rgyud): brjod pa yis//rigs kyi 'od zer 'phro 'dur gsal//'gro ba'i phyi nang mun bsal te//rigs 'dzin sa nas sa ru sbyang /glu lnga tshig lnga rigs lnga yis//phyogs
228b1(rgyud): phyogs bltas twa brjod pa ni//'gro ba kun gyis bde thob cing //chos kyi dung chen sgyu yang sgrogs//phyi nang rgyan gyis yo byad ni//rin chen ze'u phrog rna chas dang //lag gdub rkang gdub mgul to dag/
228b2(rgyud): na bza' rgyan gyis gang brgyan pas//yid 'ong ting 'dzin gsal ba dang //'gro bas lte ba'i 'o su 'gyur//rlung dang nus pa'i stobs ldan zhing //sgo gsum bag chags zad 'gyur te//byin
228b3(rgyud): brlabs rlung la dbang thob pas//A li kA li mnyam sbyar ba//bcu drug rdzogs pa'i dus sbyar bas//bdag po gdung can phrad pa'i tshe//nyi zla dus gcig shar ba'i tshe//thun mong thun mong ma
228b4(rgyud): yin pa'i//spyod yul nus pa kun bzlog nas//mthong lam rang gi mtshan nyid skye//zla bo 'am zla phyed dus mtshams sogs//bde chen nyams myong rgyan mi 'chad//mthong ba'i don
228b5(rgyud): la mnyam gzhag pas//brtan zhing nges pas gding du gyur//sku ni phyag rgya chen po ste//de chen zag med ting 'dzin//bskal pa brgya phrag stong du yang //bde ba chen po rgyun mi 'chad//sprul
228b6(rgyud): nga'i long spyod mdzad pa yis//'jig rten khams mang 'gro ba dge/de tshe 'gro ba'i dbyingasu sbyor//rdo rje lus thob de phyin chad//skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung yin//bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu
228b7(rgyud): drug gis//dbang sgyur rigs kyi dam pa 'grub//de tshe bcu drug tshun chad kyis//ye shes thog le de nyid la//ye shes thig le nyod snang ba//bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog/gang
229a1(rgyud): zag rim par 'jug pa rnams//dang por dngos don mthong ba yis//tshe 'dis sa la 'phrod bya zhing //bsam byas lhun drub nyid thob phyir//lta spyad ting 'dzin rim 'bral
229a2(rgyud): bas/khar chad med pa'i lam la 'ad//gnas skabs rim pa ji snyed kyang //tha mal pa dang log spyod dang //mos pa la sogs yul min te//nus dang grub po thob pa yis//gsang ba
229a3(rgyud): lam dang 'brel par bya//rnal 'byor chen po lnga la gnas//rim nas rim par brtan gyur te//gsal ldan mi g.yo thob pa la//nyam nga med pa'i stobs ldan pas//pad+ma la ni 'dam
229a4(rgyud): bzhin te//spyod pa so so gnas pa yis//rtsa ba spros bcas rnal 'byor te//sgrub pa dus kyi tshogs la gnas//yan lag tshogs kyi spyod par gsungs//gang phyir dkyil 'khor des
229a5(rgyud): bstan pa//rang rig mtha' dbus med pa dkyil//ye shes bzhi 'phros 'khor lo'i tshul//'jig rten 'das pa dkyil nyid//'jig rten sna tshogs 'khor du bshad//rig pa'i don
229a6(rgyud): nyid dkyil nyid//cho 'phrul rab 'byung 'khor du gsungs//rdo rje sems dpa' dkyil nyid//rigs bzhi lha dang lha mo'i dang //khro bo khro mo 'khor du bshad//lha yi ting 'dzin dkyil nyi//
229a7(rgyud): spyod pa yo byad 'khor du bshad//gang la gang gis rgyas btab pa//goms dang rtas pa'i dbang gis na//ji ltar snang grags chos thaMd//de dang de yi ngo bor 'gyur//rdo rje sems pa'i/
229b1(rgyud): rgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud las dkyil 'khor ma lus par bshad pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o////de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//dbang skur cho ga phun sum tshogs//thabs kyi
229b2(rgyud): la sbyor byed pa'i//rtog pa'i cho ga bshad par bya//rgyal ba kun gyi gsang chen po//ma lus pa yi rgya mtsho nyid//rgyal ba kun gyi spyi gzugs te//'khor tshogs ye shes rgya mtsho la//rang
229b3(rgyud): bzhin dkyil 'khor lhan cig tu//ye shes lha mo la brtan nas//ye shes chen po'i dbang bskur bas//gsang bdag rdo rje 'tshong chen 'gyur//ye shes rgya mtsho dbang phyug gis//dang rdo/
229b4(rgyud): nas bzung bcu pa'i bar//ting 'dzin 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du//rig pa'i lha mo la brten nas//ting 'dzin chu bos dbang bskur bas//sa dang ye shes zhing khams dang //rdzu 'phrul
229b5(rgyud): mdzad pa'i rim par 'phel//mthong lam rdo rje sku thob pas//nges 'byed nyams ldan rnal 'byor lo//rig pa nyams kyi dkyil 'khor du//rig pa rtsal gyis gzungs brten nas//
229b6(rgyud): zag med rdo rje sku la spyod//rig pa brtan thob rnal 'byor pas//las dang skal ldan rnal 'byor la//lhag pa gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor du//rig ma'i phyag rgya mdzes ma la//dbang /
229b7(rgyud): bskur byin brlabs brten byas nas//cho ga thabs kyi dbang bskur zhing //brgyud pa dbang gi man ngag gis//sbyor ba nyams len rnal 'byor thob//ye shes rgya mtsho blo ldan zhing //thugs
230a1(rgyud): rje rgya mtshos 'gro ba skyob//dam tshig dbang dang rig pa'i drod//rim par brgyud pa'i dbang thob cing //dgongs zab don la mkhas pa dang //rkyen thub sa bon gzi brjid che///
230a2(rgyud): las dang bya ba ma rmongs shing //ma yangs brtson 'grus bar chad med//ri dgas rgyal po seng ge ltar//gzi chen gzhan gyi nyam nga med//byin brlabs 'dus pa'i nus pa can//tshig
230a3(rgyud): dang bden pa'i byin brlabs 'grub//de yis dbang bskur cho ga brtsam//dad dang dam tshig ldan pa dang //snying rje che la slob la brtson//brtson 'grus shes rab phun sum tshogs//
230a4(rgyud): bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed du//thos bsam bsgoms la rab gnas pa'i//'gyur med brtan pa'i bsam pa yis//tha lam bsam pa spang byas te//bla ma la ni de bzhin gash+ye
230a5(rgyud): 'dul dbang thabs mkhas bsam par bya//bla ma sangs rgyas des kyang ni//snying rjes nad pa bzhin bsam zhing //skyon dang mnar dang slu sems spang //rang rang nus pa ldan pa dang //
230a6(rgyud): bdag gzhan don nus brtson 'grus ldan//brtul zhugs gsum dang rab ldan zhing //dngos grub don du gnyer ba yi//gsang chen rigasu nges pa dang //gzhan gyi dbang du mi 'gyur na/
230a7(rgyud): dbang dang man ngag sbyin par bya//ri bo'i phyogs sogs 'byor pa mod//ljon shing me tog rgyas pa'i tshul//tsAn dri gsung ldan pa'i ri//bdag dbang bar chad med pa'i
230b1(rgyud): /phyi dang na dang gas sa so//rab dgon pa yon tan gnas//ma lus 'dus pa'i dkon pa do //rnyed dang dor ni gnas par bya//sa bcumathar byon gang zag la//zhing khams mtha
230b2(rgyud): thugs med stan sa//rgyal brdo rje 'chang chen pas//ye shes sgyum la na te//rka cig shes dbang bsgyur bas//tshe brgyad yon tan sbyin grub pa//rkad cig nyid kyi spyan rdzogs te/
230b3(rgyud): d+yAm+b+ha sman hUM la gan swA//yig 'khor la sa la smin//bdag gzhan 'byed pa med pa li//bde chen phyogs nis med par dgang ste//'di la'i sgrib med pa'i rang bzhin gyis//g+hazhan
230b4(rgyud): don yid bzhin nor bu bzhin//sa thob sems bstan skyes bu la//ting 'dzin rig pa'i pho brang du//rgyal chab skyes bu mtha' dag gis//rig pa'i lha mo na so med//rig bral ti
230b5(rgyud): 'dzin stobs las grub//de la slob mas nges bsten nas//ji ltar chul ji bzhin du//ting 'dzin byin brlabs dbang bskur bas//rnam pa dang bral dbang rnams ni//nyam myong dbang
230b6(rgyud): durang shar te//thob dang brtan dang gos pa yis//'jig rten brgya dang stong phrag bcu//'bum sogs bdag gzhan don rdzogs te//skad cig nyid la rag sus b+h+yas//rba m+bu
230b7(rgyud): chos kyi rgyal por bshad//lam zhugs rigs byed rtags thob la//slob dben mthar nye lam gnas pas//chung grags dpag tshad la sogs par//rdo rje thig chad sbyor brjod
231a1(rgyud): pas//phyag rgya dkyil 'khor gsal ldan pa//sna tshogs dkyil 'khor mchog du gsungs//sna tshogs rig pas dbang bsgyur ba'i//sangs rgyas stong gi dkyil 'khor
231a2(rgyud): du//stobs ldan bu mo la brten te//thabs dang ting 'dzin dbang bskur bas//rdo rje tshe la dbang thob cing //cho 'phrul mngon shes ldan par 'gyur//dang po yon tan kun ldan pa'i//rigasu nges
231a3(rgyud): de'i bu mchog ste//dad brtson brtul zhugs ldan pa yi//mi 'gyur brtan pa'i rigs can la//drod ldan gnang zhing dbang thob pa//rgyal po lta bu bla ma yis//lhag pa gzugs brnyan
231a4(rgyud): byin ldan du//dad mos brtson 'grus 'jug pa 'i//mi ldog dang brtan tshul gyis bzhugs//dbu rgyan cod pan phreng ba dang //gdugs dang bum pa bza' btung dang //go cha phyag rgya
231a5(rgyud): rgyal mtshan dang //snying po lnga yis dbang bskur ba//rang bzhin ngo bos gnas tshul la//rdzas thabs ting 'dzin dbang bskur bas//nus pa'i byin rlabs mngon shar nas//thog chen
231a6(rgyud): rdo rje rig su 'gyur//de nas skal ldan slob ma des//tha mal 'du shes kun bzlog ste//rang rang ltar bcas gsal ba la//nus pa'i tshad dang nyams sbyar nas//nyan pa'i dbang
231a7(rgyud): dang bsgom pa dang //'chang dang phrin las byed pa dang //rdo rje rgyal po slob dpon dbang //rang bzhin ngo bos gnas pa la//ji ltar chu la chu bzhag dang //thabs dang ting 'dzin
231b1(rgyud): dang bskur bas//mi nus nus pa thob pa'i tshad//mi nus pa la bskur ba min//tshad ldan rnams la rim par bskur//rig ma lngas kyi phyag rgya mo//bcu drug btso brgyad ldan pa yi//dri zhim
231b2(rgyud): yon ldan pa la//thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i//rgyal ba kun gyi bcud 'dus pa'i//rdo rje pad+ma'i rtsa 'khor lo//yis lnga yi ro ldan pa//thabs dang shes rab snod kyi mchog/
231b3(rgyud): thabs gsum tshul gyis rtser bstims pas//dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kun//nyungs dkar tshad tsam rdo rje sems//rtse nas rtse ru thim pa las//gnas ngan len pa gsum sbyangs
231b4(rgyud): te//rtsa bcud thig le'i ngo bo nyid//mar me 'od ltar gsal gyur pas//bde chen nyams dang rtags thob pa//de ltar nyid 'byung the tsom med//rdo rje'i nyi ma rab ldan pa'i//bcu bzhi
231b5(rgyud): bcu drug rab lon pa//phyi nang gsang ba'i yon+da nyid//byin rlabs rig ma lha mor byas//chags pa bskyed pa'i thabs rnams nyid//blo dang ldan pas mngon sume bya//de nas tshi ga
231b6(rgyud): kun rdzogs nas//bla mas gnyis med gtad bya'i phyir//byin brlabs sbyor ba byas nas yang //gnyis ka'i srin lag bzung nas ni//slob ma 'di la legs btad la//gsang
231b7(rgyud): ba'i gnang ba sbyin par bya//skyes bu 'di bzung bzang ba yin//di ring phan chad bu mchog khyod//sgo gsum lha ru mnyam sbyor bas//tha mal sman pa'i lta ba spangs//bde ba chen
232a1(rgyud): / nyams chung 'am//Sh+Na thu jug pa'i stu ba ngas//thabapa dang shes gnyis mdu pra//bad pa rnams myong brtan par bya//brtan pa par chad med pa //
232a2(rgyud): rdo rje 'chang gis la 'gro//de bas skal ldan rigs bzangs kyi//gtan du 'bar bar ma byed cig/sbyor ba'i thabs dang ting 'dzin dang //rgyu ba'i chung la dbang thob pas//dag
232a3(rgyud): las la thogs pa med//rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rdul phran snyed//ma lus 'dus pa'i thig mo nyid//sna yang bcu gsum gnyis ldan pa//nyams myong brten cing gnyis med sbyar//
232a4(rgyud): rlung gis brten pa'i thig la nyid//ro gcig dus maunyam tshul byung ba//drag pa ma yin dal ba min//dgongs pa nyams dang zhen chags min//A~M li kA li zhu ba'i sems/
232a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas phreng ba gnyi su med//rdo rje pad+ma ribi bskyod cing // khyud bkar gyi phyag rgya las//nyidrad 'byor ba na//byed pa rlung gi thig sa 'azung //rgyu ba gcad cing la mnan//
232a6(rgyud): shes po namakha'i dang la gtad//dbang 'i shes rab che chung gis//lan ga sum brtan par gyur pa'am//mi thob bar du sbyin pa'i bya//rdo rje zla 'od mdzes ldan ma//dman dang
232a7(rgyud): ngan rnam par spangs//rdo rje dbang pos ma phog cing //gzhan dbang long spyod ma byas pa//bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bco lngabang rung //thabs dang zas dang spyod lam gyis//bsnyen pa ni
232b1(rgyud): byagazhung bzhin b+ha//rdo rje gyi dang srin lag dang //srin lag bcas ma la sogs pa//thabs dang byug pa'i yan lag gis//gabang ba'i pho brang rgyas par bya//'khor ba zil gnon thabs chen ga/
232b2(rgyud): myong bas chu rgyun ting 'dzin thob//gal te rtsa dang bral ba na//phaT dang ldan na 'phro bar 'gyur//dngas rlung mnyam pas zin par 'gyur//bzlog pa 'dren pa'i hUM gis shes//sdud pa'i hUM hri
232b3(rgyud): bsnams gnas pa//thig les lus la khyab par byed//dang por sa bon 'jog pa ste//gnyis pas nus pa bskyed pa yin//gsum pas nyams myong skyed pa yin//bzhi pas de nyid brten
232b4(rgyud): par byed//lnga pas brtan pas nyams blangs pas//mchog gi dngos grub tshe 'dis 'grub//rdo rje slob dpon gau nang thob pa//nus ldan rab gnas cho go brtsams//de nas slob ma tshul
232b5(rgyud): bzhin gzhug/sgo gsum nyes pa kun bral ba'i//sdom pa'i dam tshig phog byas la//dbang bskur rim pa sbyin par bya//dbang gi nyams myong brtan bya'i phyir//gdams ngag rjes
232b6(rgyud): 'thun sbyin par bya//gdams ngag nyams brtan lam rim ste//lam mthar phyin pa 'bras bu nyid//drod mthor phyin dang sa brgyad dang //grags chen sangs rgyas sa dag la//rang rig
232b7(rgyud): rtag dang thug rje yis//'den stobs mkha' gro gsum du snang //mkha' dang sgro dang gzugs can gyi//pad+ma can zhes grags pa yi//sbyor dang glu dbyangs snang ba dang //gzugs
233a1(rgyud): tsam brtan papa grol bar 'gyur//dbang bskur rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor ni//ma bcos rdo rje dbyis dkyil 'khor//khro bo'i dkyil 'khor yan lag ste//bsgrung dang gdug pa gdul phyir/
233a2(rgyud): yin//dpal rtsa ba'i dbang thob nas//phyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbang thob bya//gdul bya mos pa'i dbang brtsan la//thun mong tsam du nges pa med//dang po gnyis pa gsum pa dag/rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang
233a3(rgyud): bskur yin//bzhi pa dang ni lnga pa nyid//he ru ka yi dkyil 'khor ro//dus gsum rgyal bas byin brlabs pa'i//ma nor lam ston slob dpon la//mnyes dang bkur bar mi byed cing //rang rang nus
233a4(rgyud): shing 'jug pa la//dbang bskur gnang pa ma byin par//gsang ba bshad dang nyan pa dang //bsgom dang bsgrub pa la sogs pas//bskal pa bye ba dpag med du//'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur gyi//
233a5(rgyud): dmyal ba'i gan su skye bar 'gyur//de ni dam pa kun brnyas pas//nad dang sdug bsngal mang po dang //mkha' 'gro ma dang gdon gyis 'che//de nas nges par 'chi bar 'gyur//byin rlabs ldan
233a6(rgyud): pa'i dri ma yis//dad brtson brtul zhugs rab ldan pa'i//rigs nges skyes bu mchog nyid la//thabs kyis dbang bskur byin brlabs na//rgyal ba dang ni mkha' gro dang //rigs 'dzin grub pa
233a7(rgyud): pa mo yis//tshe 'dir bsam pa kun skongs shing //byin rlabs dbang dang dngos grub kyi//phun sum tshogs pa'i bdag por 'gyur//gang gis gang la dbang bskur bas//tha mal zhan pa
233b1(rgyud): dge ba dang //rang chen lam la mngon zhugs pas//dngos grub gang la thog med//las rnams gang brtsams 'grub pa dang //'dod pa'i don la rol pa yis//sa bcu rim pa mthar phyin nas//pad+ma spyan gyi
233b2(rgyud): sa thob ste//yi ge 'khor lo sa la gnas//sku gsung thugs dang yon las//nyi shu rtsa lnga lhun grub pa//dbang gi 'bras bu rang las shar//thabs chen 'di dang gang bral na//bskal pa gang+gA'i
233b3(rgyud): bye snyed du//brtson pas 'bras bu tshal byed pa//'dod pa'i 'bras bu stongs par 'gyur//gang phyir slob dpon slob ma dang //dkyil 'khor rim pa ji bzhin du//las dang ting 'dzin byin
233b4(rgyud): rlabs kyis//'jug pa'i cho ga gsum du bshad//dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//sku gsung thugs kyi gsang chen po//sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i lam chen po//ma lus cho ga
233b5(rgyud): rgya chen po//dpal ldan rdo rje me long gi/'jug pa'i rim pa ji bzhin du//gsang ba kun la shes par bya//rdo rje bla ma de nyid kyis//cha byad gus ldan mdzes pa yis//me tog
233b6(rgyud): ldan pas 'khor lo nyid//mngon byas sku gsung bskul ba yis//dam tshig dran te dgongs par 'gyur//rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du//gsal dang rig pa'i stobs kyis ni//
233b7(rgyud): rdo rje slob ma byin brlab phyir//slob dpon dag kyang 'jug par bya//de nas slob ma 'jug bya ste//khrus byas dri zhim gos bzang gon//dad dang pus ldan rin chen bcas//gus bcas/
234a1(rgyud): stan pa'i tshig gas no//sras dbul dag dA'i sems kyis gnas//bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sbyor ba yis//bar chad sbyor bsal bsrung b+ha//cho ga gang yin
234a2(rgyud): lhar bskyed la//mtshan ma rdzogs par nan tan bya//rgyal ba kun gyi dam tshig lnga//'bru gsum sku gsung thugs ldan sbyin//snying khar rdo rje brtan byas la//dam tshig legs par dpos
234a3(rgyud): par bya//tsan dan dkar dmar byin brlabs chu//lan gsum blud la snod dor ro//de nas rang gis dam bsgrags te//gsang ba'i don la nges par bya//rang rang 'brel pa'i lha nyid la/
234a4(rgyud): rin chen dor de brtag par bya//sngags dang phyag rgyas de bkug la//bstim la dbyer med gnas pa la//rtag tu byin brlabs gnas pa'i phyir//legs par brtan pa'i cho ga bya//
234a5(rgyud): mi shes rab rib bsal byas la//'khor lo mngon pa'i nga rgyal bya//de nas lha dang dkyil 'khor gyi//drug pa rims kyis bstan par bya//de nas bla ma sangs rgyas la//ma lus ci yod
234a6(rgyud): dbul bar bya//b+hin rlabs cho ga dag pa yi//dkyil 'khor mchad dang bsgoms pa dang //zhugs pa'i yon bsam mi khyab//rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid du 'gyur//des na rigasu nges pa yis//
234a7(rgyud): dang por 'jug pa'i rim pa bstan//rtsa ba yan lag kun thob nas//rim pa bzhin du dbang bsku'o//de nas bla ma'i bka' mnas la//'dod pa'i dngos grub bsgrub par bya//ni sems
234b1(rgyud): dpa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba grasang ba'i mo long gi rgyud las dbang bskur ba ma lus pa bshad pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o////de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//rdo rje dmachog bla na mod//sdom pa brtan po
234b2(rgyud): dam bcas pa//'di dag legs par bshad par bya//dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis//'das dang ma byon dus gsum du//rgyal khrims the tshigs bkrus bcad ltar//rim pas
234b3(rgyud): dmod bor bkas bcad pa'i//byin brlabs rang bzhin 'da' bka' ba//kun gyis bsrung bya yin par bshad//gang phyir dam pas byin brlabs pa'i//dam tshig chen po 'di nyid la//
234b4(rgyud): 'das dang da ltar ma byon pa'i//rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa dang //rigs 'dzin rnams dang mkha' gro dang //lha rnams dang ni mi rnams dang //klu dang mi min 'byung po'i tshogs//rdzu 'phrul
234b5(rgyud): ldan pa'i lha chen kyang //dam pa 'das pas 'tshig par 'gyur//dam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin 'dri//rgyal ba kun gyi dgongs pa la//sgra bzhin spyod pa'i gang zag rnams//log par spyad
234b6(rgyud): pas tshig par 'gyur//dam pa rnams kyis bkas bcad cing //byin brlabs dmod par rang bzhin 'grub//dam pa 'di las gang 'da' ba//rdo rje can yang tshig par 'gyur//dam pa rnams
234b7(rgyud): kyi dgongs pa la//dbang dang byin brlabs thob pa yis//dam pa'i tshul bzhin nges spyad na//mi mthun phyogs rnams 'tshig par 'gyur//de phyir dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis//dam/
235a1(rgyud): chag ces ni rnam par bsgrags//bla na med pa'i dam tshig ni//ma lus rang rag byang chub sems//mtha' dbus 'gro 'ong las grol gA/bzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid//
235a2(rgyud): gang gis don rtogs gnas gyur pa//don dam byang chub semasu brjod//ma skyes byang chub sems nyid ni//skye ba'i rang bzhin nyid snang ba//rang lus rgyal ba'i phyag rgya ste//ma lus der snang
235a3(rgyud): de bo gcig/rang lhar sgo gsum gsal rtogs pa//kun rdzob byang chub semasu bshad//gsang ba bshad dang dbang bskur dang //man ngag lung dad nyams chog skong //mchog dang thun mong la
235a4(rgyud): sogs pa//dngos grub ster zhing grol byed pa//'di ni sangs rgyas mnyam pa'i phyir//skad cig gdung pa nyams mi bya//rang gi lha dAr gnyis med nas//phyag rgya bzhir gsal rnal 'byor pa//
235a5(rgyud): rang gi sgo gsum ma nyams par//chu bo lta bur bar chad med//sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba ni//thag tshan gsang ba nyid yin pas//snod med dman sogs log pa la//gsang bcu
235a6(rgyud): la sogs brjod mi bya//dang por gsang bar srog gcig pas//byang chub snying por mi 'bral bas//rang srog rang gis gcod kyang bla//brtsi gdung dam tshig bral mi bya//lam dang bsgrub
235a7(rgyud): pa'i rtsa ba dang //dngos grub kun gyi rtsa ba dang //'di dag nyams ni kun nyams pas//rtsa ba zhesu bstan pa yin//yan lag thun mong dam tshig dang //thun mong min par bshad par
235b1(rgyud): dang por gsang ba'i lung thob nas//nus pa mngon du snang bar du//bdag dang gzhan mir thun mong gi/'gal dang sgro kur kun 'das shing //kun dang bsam pa dga' byed pa//thun mong dam las mi//
235b2(rgyud): 'gal ba//thun mong dam tshig yin par bshad//thun mong ma yin gang zag gis//thabs chen thun mong ma yin pa//nyon mongs lnga dang spyad pa lnga//bdud rtsi lnga dang shes pa lnga//grub pa lnga
235b3(rgyud): yi chos rnams nyid//skyes bu rigs phyed spyod yul te//thun mong rnal 'byor yun min pas//thun mong ma yin zhesu bshad//dang po nas bzung rtags thob par//rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa yi//
235b4(rgyud): lus sems ma yongs rtse gcig pas//rnam pa dang bcas dang du blang //sa thob goms dang mthar phyin par//ting 'dzin don la gnas pa'i tshe//'gal ba'i sgo gsum mi 'byung bas//
235b5(rgyud): ting 'dzin rgyun gyi dam tshig la//rnam pa'i dam tshig ma lus 'dus//don las langs tshe snying rje dang //rtsa ba yan lag shugs ldan yin//sangs rgyas sa la gnas pa na//'da' ba
235b6(rgyud): med pa'i dam tshig ste//rgya mtsho rlan bzhin thob spangs med//bsrung byed ye shes dam tshig ste//dam tshig 'di ni rmad po che//bsnyen pa rtags dang ldan par du//spyi yi dam tshig
235b7(rgyud): bsrung bya zhing //bsgrub pa gang yin 'grub pa na//khyad par rang rang rtog pa yi//dam tshig med par 'grub mi 'gyur//gang zag gang la dga' ba la//dam tshig dka' thub sgo
236a1(rgyud): nas ni/gsad ba don la dgo bya'i phyir//dam tshig rnam pa mtha' yas bstan//dang po las can rnal 'byor la//rna ba thun meng dmachog bstan//bstan nas
236a2(rgyud): nyams ldan gang zag la//thun mong min pa'i dam tshig bstan//rtogs pa'i 'jigs med gang zag la//mda' nyams med pa'i dam tshig bsten//sa thob goms mthar phyin pa
236a3(rgyud): la//ting 'dzin rgyun gyi dam tshig bstan//dngos grub rtogs pa kun dang 'brel//dam tshig 'di ni rdo rje che//sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pa'i//rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa
236a4(rgyud): 'di/thob nas dam par gang bsrungs pa/yon chung yang 'grub par bshad//mchog dang thun mong la sogs pa//dngos grub rtog pa ma lus pa//cho ga gang dang ting 'dzin gang /
236a5(rgyud): bsgrub pa gang dang gang yang rung //ma nyams tshul du rab brtson pas//myur du 'grub pa nyid 'gyur//gal te byin gyis ma brlabs na//rdo rje 'chang nyid brlag par 'gyur//rgyal ba
236a6(rgyud): kun gyi yon nyid//dam tshig rdo rje las byung bas//dam pa 'di la gang brten pas//yid bzhin nor bu lta bur gyur//dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyi//sku gsung thugs dang
236a7(rgyud): yon lag go//bsrung bya dka' thub dam pa 'di//kun gyis 'da' ba ma yin zhing //gnas pa dam pa nyid yin te//las dang skal pa dman pa dang //rigs dman le lo che ba
236b1(rgyud): dang //rang bzhin ngan pa'i gang zag gis//blun po gang zhig 'da' byed cing //dngos grub gnyis la rgyab phyogs nas//dam pa rnams la smod byed pa//sangs rgyas kun la nyes byas pas//rdo rje
236b2(rgyud): 'dzin rgyal khros nas ni//bdun rgyud tshun chad brlag par mdzad//mkha' gro ma dang rigs 'dzin dang //kha 'bar gtum 'khrug rngam pa'i tshogs//de ma thug tu srog bcad nas//dmyal ba'i
236b3(rgyud): gan su skye bar 'gyur//gal te 'jig par gyur na ni//'jig rten gzhan du skye 'gyur zhing //ji srid na mkha' 'jig pa 'am//phyi yi rgya mtsho zad pa'i tshe//thar te gzhan du nam yang min//
236b4(rgyud): dam pa'i bla ma spong ba dang //rdo rje mched la 'khu ba dang //byang chub sems nyid mi dran zhing //sngags dang phyag rgya yal ba dang //snod min gsang ba bshad pa dang //gsang ba'i don la bskur/
236b5(rgyud): ba ni//'dir yang sdug bsngal myong 'gyur zhing //skad cig 'gags pas de ma thag/bar ma'i lus dang bral gyur pa'i//rdo rje dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur//gang du rtsa ba yan lag bcas
236b6(rgyud): bsrung dang dpog par bya ba'i chos//thun mong dbang dang 'brel bcas pa'i//thun mong spyi yi yul gyur pa//de ni thun mong bsrung bya ste//'di ni phyi yi dam tshi go/thabs dang shes rab sbyar
236b7(rgyud): ba'i sems//thig le'i sems lnga'i lam gyi rim//rig pa ma lus gsal ba'i tshe//thig le gnyis med nyam su byung //bde ba'i thig le'i bcud bsgyur bas//tshogs drug rong
237a1(rgyud): snang thig le'i grogs//ma lus thig les byin brlabasna pas//thams cad bde chen phyag rgyar gsal//thig la rig pa khar dbyung min//'khor lo kha sbyor/
237a2(rgyud): bde ba yis//tha mal bde bar dbang por bsgyur//rgyal ba'i dgongs spyod thabs kyis myong //tha mal zhen pa rnam par bzlog/thabs ldan don la gsang ba'i dono//rang snying byed kyi dkyil
237a3(rgyud): 'khor lnga//'char dang nub pa'i rim pa yis//thabs chen gsang ba'i thig le ltar//shes nas spang du med par gnas//rang byung gnas pa'i bcud lnga ni//rang lus rten pa'i don snang
237a4(rgyud): ga/khyab par rgyu ba'i tshul dag gis//dngas snyigs gnyis kyi tshul du gnas//rang lus rtog pa dngas snyigs dang //kha dog yan lag nying lag gis//bde ba'i ye shes lngar shes
237a5(rgyud): dang //bde ba chen po nyid gsungs//khams lnga bcud las skyes pa yi//ma lus thig lo'i rang bzhin te//ye shes lnga yi ro ldan pas//rgyal ba lnga ru yang dag gsungs//thebs
237a6(rgyud): dang shes rab rdo rje dril//nyi zla rim pa'i 'od gsal ba//sems lngas mkha' la gsal ba'i tshe//rten can rten dang gnyis med pa//lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes snang //ma zin rje
237a7(rgyud): lce yis blang //gnyis kyi rtog pa ma lus pa//bde chen ro gcig byin gyis brlabs//skad cig bral med bde ba'i sems//dus gsum mo 'bral brtan par gnas//rlung dang /
237b1(rgyud): thig le'i bzlas pa yis//thams cad bde chen phyag rgyar gsal//bde chen thabs dang nyams kyis ste//brjod dang tshig gis phebs pa min//gnyis sbyor phrad pa'i bde ba yis//tha mal zad dang bad
237b2(rgyud): chen sbyor//gang gis sbyin par mi nus pa//da ltar nus pa rang gis myong //gzhan gyi brdzun pa'i don 'di ni//thabs kyis bde bar mngon du bstan//tha mal zhen pa spang ba'i phyir//kha na ma
237b3(rgyud): tho bag tsha bral//skyes dang nus dang gnas pa'i tshe//rang bzhin lnga ni shugs kyis grub//rang gi rtsa bcud so so las//bdud rtsi bral ba med par gnas//'byung lnga dbang po gzugs
237b4(rgyud): sogs bcas//thabs ldan sbyor ba'i byin rlabs kyis//bde chen lhan cig skyes par shes//nyi zla rlung gis zin pa yi//mtshan ma bral ba ngo bo las//zhen pa med pa'i thabs chen
237b5(rgyud): bos//lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin las//ye shes lnga yi ros gang bas//ma lus rgyal ba lnga ru grub//'di ni phyi nang gsang ba yi//rang bzhin dam tshig chen po yin//dam
237b6(rgyud): tshig rnam pa mtha' yas pa//shin tu bsdus pa rnam pa gnyis//'bring du rtsa ba lnga nyid dang //yan lag bcu ru shes par bya//shin tu rgyas pa'i dam tshig ni//spyir ni sum brgya
237b7(rgyud): drug bcu ste//rang bzhin 'od gsal ba nyid dang //nyid kyi dkyil 'khor snang ba dang //dus bzhi rgyal mchog nyid dang ni//bsgrub med mnyam par rdzogs pa nyid//ldan grub pa
238a1(rgyud): gnas dam chog dang //rnam dag byang chub bzung 'dzin bral//rtogs nas don 'dzin dam chog dang //sems la gnas bca ba dam tshig dang //ye nas ma bcos
238a2(rgyud): dam tshig dang //'dus byas rnam dag dam tshig dang //chos rnams dbyer med dam tshig dang //thams cad 'jigs med dam tshig dang //g.yung drung che 'phel dam tshig dang //thaMd//
238a3(rgyud): bsrung du med pa ste//'di dag lta ba'i dam tshig yin//thams cad sbyor ba'i dam tshig dang //ma lus bsgral ba'i dam tshig dang //ma byin len pa'i dam tshig dang //brdzun du
238a4(rgyud): smra ba'i dam tshig dang //thams cad spyod pa'i dam tshig dang //dam rdzos spyod pa'i dam tshig ste//'di dag spyod pa'i dam tshig yin//bsgrub pa'i dam tshig rnam gsum ni//
238a5(rgyud): rdo rje'i skye gnas dam tshig dang //'dren byed gnas stobs dam tshig dang //lam la ston byed dam tshig dang //rab tu rtogs byed dam tshig dang //sgyur byed byang chub dam
238a6(rgyud): tshig dang //thams cad dbang bsgyur de mi tshig dang //rig 'dzin gnas stobs dmachog ste//bsgrub bya rtog pa'i dam tshig yon//yum gyur dbyings phyag dam tshig dang /
238a7(rgyud): thabs nyid shes rab sbyor dmachog/shes rab thab su sbyor de bzhin//glang po brjid gnani dam tshig dang //thams cad mi chung dmachog dang //thams cad bsrung ba
238b1(rgyud): dam tshig dang //ting 'dzin phyag rgya'i dam tshig ste//bsgrub pa thabs kyi dam tshig dang //tshogs kyi mchod pa'i dam tshig dang //tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor dam chog dang //tshogs kyi 'phrin
238b2(rgyud): las dam tshig dang //'phro n+dan tshim byed dam tshig ste//bsgrub pa'i phrin las dam tshig yin//yang dag don ston dam tshig dang //gsung mchog mtha' yas dam tshig dang //tha~Md
238b3(rgyud): skad 'jal dam tshig dang //yi ge med 'jal dam tshig dang //stong gsum kun grags dam tshig dang //ye shes gsung mchog dam tshig dang //bsam yas rdo rje gsung dam tshig/mi
238b4(rgyud): 'gyur rdo rje'i dam tshig ste//bdag gis shes bya'i dam tshig yin//shes bya ting 'dzin dam tshig bzhi//nam mkha' snang byed dam tshig dang //rten byed sa yo dam tshig dang //bsreg
238b5(rgyud): byed me yi dam tshig dang //'khru byang chu yi dam tshig dang //g.yengs byed chen po'i dam tshig ste//shes rab lnga yi dam tshig dang //phung po lnga yi dam tshig ni//thabs mchog lnga yi dam
238b6(rgyud): tshig ni//chos rnams gzugs brnyan dam tshig dang //sgra ltar shes pa'i dam tshig dang //dri ltar shes pa'i dam tshig dang //ro ltar shes pa'i dam tshig dang //reg ltar shes pa'i
238b7(rgyud): dmam tshig ni//gnyisu med pa'i dam tshig yin//kha dog lnga yi dam tshig dang //phyogs lnga yi ni dam tshig dang //dbang lnga yi ni dam tshig ste//gsum po spyir khyab dam tshig yin//
239a1(rgyud): bde ba'i ngang nyid dam tshig dang //lhun grub yo shes dam chog dang //mi 'jigs rgyal mchog dam tshig dang //mnyam rdzogs lhun grub dam tshig dang //phyogs dus dbyer med
239a2(rgyud): dam tshig dang //nyid kyi dkyil 'khor dam tshig dang //chos la skyon med dam tshig dang //brjod med spros med dam tshig dang //phyogs dus gnyis med dam tshig dang //gnyis mdo byang chub
239a3(rgyud): sems dam tshig/'dus ma byas pa'i dam tshig dang //thams cad rgyas 'debs dam chig dang //thams cad mi 'gog dam tshig ste//ngo bo nyid 'dzin dam tshig yin//grub par bya
239a4(rgyud): ba lnga bstan pa//chos kyi 'khor lo'i dam tshig dang //rin chen 'byung ba'i dam tshig dang //pad+ma chags med dam tshig dang //don rnams grub pa'i dam tshig dang //'jigs byed
239a5(rgyud): rdo rje dam tshig dang //de bzhin sku nyid dam tshig dang //thams cad 'byor ldan dam tshig ste//sku yi dam tshig bdun du bshad//yang dag don ston la sogs pa//gsung gi dam
239a6(rgyud): tshig brgyad po nyid//rang la rdzogs par shes bya ste//'bras bu'i bsrung bas bsgrub bya yin//rang rig dbang bsgyur dam tshig dang //cha mchog rnam dag dam tshig dang //rang
239a7(rgyud): bzhin 'od gsal dam tshig dang //byang chub sdom byed dam tshig dang //thams cad dbang sgyur dam tshig drug/thugs kyi dam tshig nyid du bshad//byang chub zhing bkod dam tshig
239b1(rgyud): dang/ye shes bzhugs gnas dam chog dang //gzhal yas yang bstan dam tshig dang //sna tshogs kun skyer dam chog dang //zad med gter ldan dam tshig dang //bsgrub pa zad med dam tshig dang //
239b2(rgyud): zad med gter chen dam tshig ni//yon dam tshig bdun du bshad//thams cad byin rlob dam tshig dang //bdud sde tshar gcod dam tshig dang //sems can don byed dam tshig ni//phrin las dam tshig
239b3(rgyud): gsum du bshad//spong ba rdo rje dam tshig dang //chags pa'i ye shes dam tshig dang //gti mug chen po'i dam tshig dang //phrag dog chen po'i dam tshig dang //nga rgyal bde mchog dam tshig dang
239b4(rgyud): nyon mongs lnga yi dam tshig ste//mi spang ba yi dam tshig yin//gtan du ma yengs bsrung ba ni//mnyam pa lnga yi dam tshig dang //bden pa dbyer med dam tshig dang //sku gsung thugs sbyor dam
239b5(rgyud): tshig dang //lam lnga rdzogs pa'i dam tshig dang //thams cad bde sbyor dam tshig dang /rdo rje log 'joms dam tshig dang //'khor ba zil gnon dam tshig dang //ma bcos lhun grub dam tshig
239b6(rgyud): dang //thig le bde sbyor dam tshig ni//lte ba rgyun bsrung dpa tshig yin//ting 'dzin rgyan bsgom dam tshig dang //bcing ba phyag rgya'i dam tshig dang //bzlas pa sgra snyan dam tshig dang //
239b7(rgyud): sgo gsum mnyam pa'i dam tshig dang //shes rab bde sbyor dam tshig ni//ting 'dzin rgyan gyi dam tshig yin//tha snyad zil gnon dam tshig dang //spyod lam bde 'byor dam tshig dang //rig
240a1(rgyud): ka da //ma rgyas gnas dun dang chog dang //rang byu gnas bral dam chog s+ho//gcig car gnas pa'i smyad //rnams cad spyod byung /
240a2(rgyud): dam tshig dang //rgyud drug sbyong byed dam tshig dang //rtogs pas tshim byed dam tshig dang //khyab pa rnamakha'i dam tshig dang //gzhan don shugs grub dmachog ni//dam tshig che ba bag+h+nAn+ti
240a3(rgyud): pa yin//dmyal chen dmyal ba bal pa dang //yid dgras byol song son po dang //gnod sbyin mngal srin kha 'bar gyi//lha dang lha min ru dA dang //rtsangs pa la sogs 'khar
240a4(rgyud): bskyed chad de'i skye gnas bstan pa yin//bsrung ba'i dam tshig chen po yin//gal te spyong ba'i don rtogs na//bskrad dang nyams pa'i tshul med de//chad pa'i yul las
240a5(rgyud): pa yin//gang zag 'ga' zhig spyod yul yin//gal te rtsa ba'i ma nyams na//bla ma grogs po brgya dag la//bshags pa stong phrag brgya ru bya//bzlas pa bye ba phrag bdun bya//gto
240a6(rgyud): ma 'bum phrag bdun duH//sbyin srog 'dum phyug bcu gcig ste//de nas slar yang byung ba 'am//rnams gnang nas gnas par bya//gal hU~M tshul dri mi gnas sa mA~M/'og hU~M
240a7(rgyud): na cid bdas pa'i grogs pa'i tshul mi mang //ma 'du pa'i sems sbyas nas//slang ba'i tshad las 'dus bskye//ba'i chen po brgyad pa /
240b1(rgyud): bshags kyang dag par mi 'gyur te//rdo rje dmyal ba zhes bya bar//mi bzad sdug bsngal myong nas ni//ji srid na mkha' gnas pa'i bar//mtshan cha'i 'khor lo bzhin du 'khor//yan lag dam/
240b2(rgyud): tshig nyams gyur na//zla ba bdun du smra bcad bya//sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad du bya//bzlas pa'i bye ba tshad 'bum gcig/gtor ma khri phrag gcig tu gtong //de nas slar yang blang ba dang /
240b3(rgyud): dag dang tshangs par bsgrags par bya//dag pa'i snod dang mi ldan par//gsang ba stong cing 'chad pa dang //dbang ma thob par bka' 'gom dang //bder gshegs bka' las 'das pa dang /
240b4(rgyud): tshad dang ldan pa'i snod min la//gsang ba tshad du sgrogs pa dang //gsang ba nyam su mi len par//'phyar bas kun la spel ba ni//tshad las 'das pa'i gang zag ste//sangs rgyas kun la
240b5(rgyud): brnyas byed pas//dus gsum sangs rgyas khros pa yis//bdun rgyud tshun chad brlag par mdzad//bla ma dang ni glegs rnams dang //pha ma gnyen bshes rgyal blon dang //rgyal 'bangs nyes med
240b6(rgyud): sdang ba ni//dam tshig nyams pa'i brtagasu bshad//zab mo dag la gegs 'byung dang //bsgrubs pas 'dod pa mi 'byung zhing //bsrung ba'i lha rnams g.yel ba dang //ma nyes yal ga
240b7(rgyud): 'byung ba dag/dam tshig nyams pa'i rtag su bshad//dang por bla ma'i lung thob nas//rang gis nyams pa mtshor zhing //bde legs bsam pa 'grub 'gyur zhing //bdag gzhan
241a1(rgyud): bsam pa'i khyad par dag/sngon du yid bzhin nor bu bzhin//'grub cing bsngags pas thob pa ni//ma nyams don dang ldan pa'i rtags//rnal 'byor dbang phyugs
241a2(rgyud): rgyal po yin//gal te ma nyams rtags byung na//bskang go sI cho ga myur du brtsam//gal te nyams la rtags med cing //legs par snang na mi rung ste//bdag gis sa bon tshig pa ste//
241a3(rgyud): bde ba zad byas gtan du sdug/ma nyams rtags byung myur bskangs ni//sngon gyi bag chags zad par 'gyur//rdo rje sems dpa' rgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud las dam tshig
241a4(rgyud): ma lus pa bshad pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o////de nas yang dag bshad bya ba//mchog dang thun mongs la sogs pa//bsgrub pa'i khyad par ji snyed pa'i/rtog pa'i cho ga
241a5(rgyud): mdor bsdus bshad//rgyud kyi rgyal po ma lus las//thun mong dag la mos zhugs pas//thun mong yo byad ting 'dzin dang //sngags dang phyag rgya bral goms pas//rtags dang nus pa
241a6(rgyud): mthar phyin pas//gang ltar dmigs pa 'grub 'gyur te//zag bcas thun mong dngos grub yin//de las gzhan pa bshad par bya//gang du mchog gi rnal 'byor pa//dbang dang dam tshig
241a7(rgyud): ting 'dzin dag/phyi nang gsang ba'i rim thob nas//me ldog brtan pa'i rnal 'byor thod//mthong nas bsgom lam ma nges rigs//ting 'dzin gang bsgom bar chad med//tshe 'dis
241b1(rgyud): dbang bsgyur 'jigs bral te//de nas pU mda'i bdag nyid thob//mchog ldan mchog gi mchog thob pas//mchog gi dngos grub thun mong min//dad dang dam tshig shes rab dang //brtson 'grus
241b2(rgyud): rtul zhugs bzod pa thob//brtan cing snying rtsi dbang rdzogs shing //bsgrab deng lam gyi sbyor ba shes//yid thub mi ldog brtan ba cane//nyams thob dang du len pa ni//gcig dang lnga gsum gang zag
241b3(rgyud): gis//ri bo ri su la gsang bar dang //chu gling ngam grogs brag rdzong dang //dur khrod raM phug chu mdo dang //yid 'ong bkra shis nyams dga' bar//tshig byin brlabs rdzogs pa nyid//las kyi
241b4(rgyud): cho ga gang yin pa//bdag gam gzhan gyis byas pa ni//bdag dbang bkra shis phun sum tshogs//dam tshig dbang dang lta ba dag/sngon du bya ba rdzogs pa yis//sngon du rnal 'byor gsum thab
241b5(rgyud): bas//dang po yid brtan grang yin kyang //gang la yid kyis dmigs pa de//cho ga ting 'dzin 'brel pa nyid//rang rang rtog pa ji bzhin du//tha mal pa dang le lo dang //the tshom dad pa'i stobs
241b6(rgyud): kyis te//gal te de dag mi ldan na//sa thob kyis kyang ma yin na//gang zag skye bos smos ci dgos//gal te dgug pa'i las bya na//bdag nyid dbang drag khro bo'i ste//dmar thag dud ka'i
241b7(rgyud): mdog 'dra ba'i//gang ltar gnas pa'i 'phro 'du ni//zhags pa lcags kyu sha dag ste//dmigs pa brtan cing brtags thob nas//mngon du gyur gyi bar du ni//rang sngags brjod pa de yi
242a1(rgyud): mngar//cho ge ma zhig dzaHhUM zhes//dgra dang bgegs dang lha dang gzungs//mthu dang rdzu 'phrul ldan yang rung //tha mal dbang med bzhin du dgug/gal te de yi dgos
242a2(rgyud): pa dag/myur du grub par ma gyur na//de dag legs par grub kyi bar//gang yin mkhas pas bcing bar bya//dgra dang thabs dang ting 'dzin gyis//'grub par 'gyur bar gdon mi za//
242a3(rgyud): bdag nyid dbang drag gsal ba yi//lce la dbang gi 'khor lo bsam//yi ge gsum ldan dgu bkod nas//'od kyis na mkha'i khams bkang zhing //pad+ma rA ga zhu 'dra bas//gang thim
242a4(rgyud): bdag gi dbang gyur zhing //bden pa bdar zhing ngag gis bcing //yang na gang la gang chags pa'i//rdzas la ring du 'dod pa ltar//'dod pa grub na dam bcas zhing //yid 'ong 'dul bI/
242a5(rgyud): ting 'dzin gyis//dga' ba'i thabs kyis brten byas na//gal te 'gro zhing 'phro 'dod na//dbang drag phyag rgyas bsdigs bcing gzir//dga' ba'i thabs kyis yid 'phrogs nas//
242a6(rgyud): rol mo sgyu mkhan dgra de yis//'dus pa'i gang zag chags pa can//bya ba thabs kyis bral ba ltar//bral ba med par gnas par 'gyur//ting 'dzin brtan pa'i nus pa yis//
242a7(rgyud): gang yang rung ba'i sems can de//sna tshogs khro bo khro mo yis//'od dang phyag rgya 'bar ba yis//bcings nas mdun du gnas par blta//dga' dang bsdigs pa rdzas kyi mtha'//
242b1(rgyud): ting 'dzin brtan pas nges par 'grub//mod las dngos por ngos grub cing //mi 'thun brgyad sogs nges 'grub na//yod dang snang ba'i 'gro ba dag/dbang pos bsgyur ba smos ci dgos//gal te gas
242b2(rgyud): ba'i las byas na//las ni gnyis te brtsams pas 'grub//bdag nyid rtag par skyes nas ni//dbang bskur byi ni brlabs kun bstibs nas//mdun du shel gyi bumo pa ru//thugs las chu yi lha mo
242b3(rgyud): bskyed//phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba der gyur nas//bum par lha mo 'od du zhu//nad dang sdug bsngal byang bar bsam//dmar ser ba yi 'o ma dang //sman dang rin chen spos dang 'bru//bdud rtsi snying po cha rkyen
242b4(rgyud): la//mA ma kI yi sngags kyis gdab//oM mA ma kI sarba pA pa du ru du ru swA hA//nad dang sdug bsngal ldan pa'i lus//bkrus pas 'tshe bar the tshom med//bdag nyid brtul zhugs bde ldan pas//
242b5(rgyud): sngon du bya ba sngon song bas//dgon pa bas mtha' rab dben par//ma smas ma rul tshad ldan pa'i//dur khrod zhing chen mtshan ldan la//khrus dang byug bdug kun byas nas//be mo la sogs
242b6(rgyud): yin pa yi//lces de nges par 'grub par 'gyur//de dag maN Dal gtsang ma yi//dbusu legs par bzhag nus ni//bdag nyid khro bo gang yang rung //gsal bar tshangs pa brgya byin rung //rang
242b7(rgyud): sngags srog snying ji yis dgug/phyag rgya bzhi yis dbab par bya//gal te 'dar dang rgod pa dang //du dang 'jigs pa'i sgra byung na//dam tshig phyag rgya bstan par bya//dam chu byid la mnas
243a1(rgyud): dmags te//gang 'dod las la mngag par bya//gal te 'jug rten tshum zas//de yos rnaMs dang shArgyal ba dang //'phrul du bdag nyida' 'gyur//gang zhig tu rngan/
243a2(rgyud): brtan pa yis//bar chad med par bsgrubs pa'i tshe//mdangs ldan yid 'ong dang po ste//dri zhim 'od chags gnyis pa yin//dga' ba'i sgra sgrogs gsum pa yin//bkrag dang gzi mdungs
243a3(rgyud): nyams sod yin//zhing tshan kha nas dri byung na//ting 'dzin rdo rje so yis bcad//ro langs brdabs na gser du 'gyur//lce yi ral gris de bcad na//cis kyang mi tshugs go mtshon te//
243a4(rgyud): lha min g.yul yang pham byed na//dpa' bo stobs ldan smos ci dgos//de yi dbang po lnga dag la//mngon shes lnga yi dngos grub yod//rang gi rtog pa ji bzhin du//mkhas pas bsgrubs
243a5(rgyud): na 'grub bar 'gyur//gal te bcu bdun bco brgyad me'i//zhing mdzes kyu zhing byugs byas te//rgyan dang gos kyis legs par gdags//dri zhing dbang po dag pa la//bdag nyid dbang
243a6(rgyud): drag rnal 'byor gyis//ye shes 'jig rten gang rung ba'i//lha mo yid 'o 'od 'bar ma//sngags dang phyag rgya sa bkug bcings nas//rtags byung bar du bstim par bya//dri dang sgra dang 'od dag dang //
243a7(rgyud): 'dar dang 'gul dang rgod pa dag/dang po'i rtags ni yin par bshad//lha dang gtame dang gnyis pa ste//dngo su langs pa tshad yin pas//dam 'dar mnos bsgrags dbang du spu/
243b1(rgyud): gal te sbyar du sad pa na//cho 'phrul che zhing log ston na//dbang drag nga rgyal chen po yis//dbang du bsdu dang zil gyis mnan//de dag chags pas rol spyad na//skad cig cho 'phrul bzhi thob ste//skye
243b2(rgyud): shi med par gnas pa dang //ma lus 'de chen 'bar ba dang //zhing khams kun tu bgrod pa dag/thogs pa med par 'grub par 'gyur//gtsang ma byis pa rma med pa//yid 'ong legs pa bca'o/
243b3(rgyud): blangs nas//dag cing bdud rtsis dri byugs la//mda' hU ma tas legs byugs la//kha dog lnga yi gzungs kyis gdags//tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang //lha mo gang rung snying pos dgug/rtag tu
243b4(rgyud): phyag rgya bzhis bstim zhing //bdag nyid ha ya grI ba 'am//ya mAn ta ka la sogs pa//gang rung khro bo ra gsal bsgoms la//drag tu dgug tsong bstim par bya//rtags byung mthar thug mngon
243b5(rgyud): gyur nas//legs nyes de yis smra bar 'gyur//gal te 'dar zhing mi brjod na//oM gyi 'od dang a mri tas//lho la thabs kyis dbang bskur zhing //ha ya g+he bas gang mos bsdigs//
243b6(rgyud): legs par smra bar the tshom med//gal te gsad pa'i las byed na//gsal la brtan thob rnal 'byor pas//dur khrod shing gcig bzhi mdo 'am//lha 'dres mngon du gnas pa'i sar//bdag
243b7(rgyud): nyid zhe sdang rdo rje ste//dud kha nag po 'od 'bar ba//spyan bzlog mtshon cha me ltar 'bar//sprul pa'i char ltar 'khrug par bsam//mdun du he ma khung khru gang tshad//gru gsum dur sol
244a1(rgyud): khrag chan byuH/nang du ling kha bdud rtsi lnga//chags pa'i rgyu dang tsha ba dang //shes pa chags pa'i rten la byas//pho nyas ming rus sdus bkug la//bstims la phyag rgyas
244a2(rgyud): bcing bar bya//lcags sam nag po'i shing las byas//drag po'i phur pas gnas gsum gdab//hrIHSh+T+rIHdrag pos g.yas g.yon nas//khros pi sems kyis bsreg byas nas//de nang
244a3(rgyud): drag po cher ma can//nam phyed gcer bus bsregs byas nas//lha yang rung ste brlag par 'gyur//ge li te dbye ba'i las byed na//bdag nyid ya mAn tA ka ste//rngam zhing gdug gtu
244a4(rgyud): nga rgyal can//shin tu 'jigs shing sdigs par bsgom//nyi mas 'jigs de'i dang rung dang //mun pas 'jigs pa'i gung ru la//gang yin de nyid bris la blan//lha dang lha min
244a5(rgyud): gnyis la gtad//rlung gi phyogasu de yis bskyod//sprul pa pho nyas g.yul 'gyed cing //'thab cing rtsod par rnam par bsam//bar du khra dang bya rog 'thab//me chu rlung gis 'bud
244a6(rgyud): bsams na//do ni grang yin su yang rung //'bral zhing 'thab pa nyid du 'gyur//rgyal po bram ze blon po dag/gdug pa gnod pa can gyi rigs//mi gnas bsgred par bya ba'i phyir//
244a7(rgyud): bdag nyid aM par tsi ta ste//drag po khros de'i tshul du sgom//dgra bgegs gang yang rung ba yi//'og tu rlung snying bcas pa bri//steng du ming rus bcas bskyon la//mdun na
244b1(rgyud): gnas pa'i gdul bya de//rlung lha rnga mo'i steng du zhon//pho nya sprul pa mtha' yas kyis//'khrig cing tshogs par rang bsams la//gshin rje'i drung du khrid par bsam//'dis ni dbugs med brgyal
244b2(rgyud): ba'ang //gzhan du drag pos phyin 'gyur na//srog dang ldan pas smos ci dgos//gal te dgra dpung pham 'dod na//bdag nyid mi g.yo mgon po ste//ji ltar gnas pa'i rab tu bsgom//de yi gzugs
244b3(rgyud): brnyan bris nas kyang //cho gas de ru byin brlabs la//sngags ni bdun 'bum la sogs pa//lcags sna bdun las bcu gnyis tshad//ral gri snying por bcas pa la//gsal bar de dag rtags byung
244b4(rgyud): bzlas//'od dang sgra dang sa g.yos dang //ral gri skad ni 'don pa na//phyung bas g.yul las ldog pa dang //bskor bas dmag dpung 'bros par 'gyur//bdag nyid rgyal zhing che 'dod na//bdag nyid
244b5(rgyud): gsal zhing brtan gyur nas//zhe sdang rdo rjer gsal byas la//dur khrod ras la ming rus bri//sngags dang phyag rgyas bkug bstims la//nges par bstan pa'i ltas byung nas//he ru ka yi zhabs
244b6(rgyud): kyis mnan//rta mgrin gad mo drag pas bsdigs//khyung gshog phyag rgya zil gyis mnan//bdag dang khyi'i sgroms nas gdon//bdag nyid them pa'i 'og tu mnan//yang na bdag gi
244b7(rgyud): 'og tu mnan//rdo rje rgya gram phyag rgya yis//steng nas mnan cing bden pa bdar//bdag nyid de yi rgyal por 'gyur//dbul po gter dang phrad 'dod na//bdag nyid las la goms pa
245a1(rgyud): yis//rigs lnga lhag pa'i lcags la nas//so so'i phyag mtshan yungs 'bru tsam//dbang por mthong gi bar du ni//bsam zhing sngags bzlas bdon pa bdang //mchad
245a2(rgyud): ma brtan po gsal ba na//gang na yod pa'i phyogs der dong //bden pa ting 'dzin sngags bcas mthus//'dug gam smra'am mthong ba 'am//phra mo dar ni ltung bar 'gyur//de nas
245a3(rgyud): gtor dang phrad gyur nas//dbul ba kun las thar par 'gyur//de nas rdo rje rnal 'byor pas//mngon shes mig dang ldan 'dod na//bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor pa//rab tu dben pa'i sku
245a4(rgyud): phyogasu//mig sna lnga dang bdun pa'i zhugs//de yi zhun mar dud par bcas//'phrul gyi 'o ma dag gis sbyar//rdo rje pra yis zhag bdun bsgrubs//nyams dang drod rtags thob
245a5(rgyud): pa na//mig la legs par sngags kyis byugs//skad cig stong gsum bcas pa yi//phyogs bcu mngon par shes pas mthong //gang zag rgyun ni brtag pa dang //sdu
245a6(rgyud): bsngal drag pos zhen bzlog cing //so so dag pa'i zhing khams kyis//yid bde grub par bya ba'i phyir//mngon shes mtshan mas legs par bsgrub//rkang mgyogs thob par
245a7(rgyud): 'dod pa yis//bdag nyid lhag pa'i lhar bsgoms nas//brtan shing bar chad med thob nas//bla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dug ste//yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor ste//skad gcig
245b1(rgyud): dpag tshad brgyad 'gro ba//de la gnas bsam ma yengs byas//rlung gis khyab pa ji lta bar//dpag tshad brgya phrag du ma yang //skad cig tsam gyis bgrod par 'gyur//glal te rdzu 'phrul bzhi dag gis//
245b2(rgyud): rigs 'dzin go 'phang 'gro 'dod na//sngon du dag pa'i don thob nas//phyog rgya gsal bar gyur pa'i tshe//na mkha'i ling ga zla ba la//hU~M las rdo rje cho ga gsum//rim par bstan pa'i dbang thob
245b3(rgyud): nas//dngas ma'i phyag rgya la brten pas//rdo rje zlar bcas rlung brten pas//gang 'thad zhing du bskyod pa'i sa//rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa yis//zhing khams dag pa'i bya ba 'grub//mdun gyi nam
245b4(rgyud): mkhar zla ba la//oM la cho ga'i tshul gyis bsgyur//brtan pa'i 'khor lo zla rlung gis//dngas ma'i stobs kyis lus gnas pas//de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig 'dzin pa//zhing khams so sor
245b5(rgyud): bskyod byas nas//rang gi bsam pa bsgrub par bya//na mkha' dbyings kyi zla ba la//trai las skyes pa'i cho ga yis//rin chen rlung zlar bcas pa yis//ting 'dzin drag po bskyod pa'i shugs//
245b6(rgyud): dngas ma lus yid bcas pa yis//dag pa'i zhing khams kun bskyod de//lhag pa'i bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur//na mkha'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//pad+ma ro bcas pa'i zla ba
245b7(rgyud): bsgom//hriHlas sna tshogs chos mchog sems//gsal brtan rlung gis stobs bstan pas//dngas ma'i lus yid gang yin pa//zhing bskyod bsam pa grub par 'gyur//na mkha'
246a1(rgyud): ldanab+h+yas kyangs gnas //gsus byud ma tshogs bangs pa rnam//ma 'am ta las dang ts+tsha s+ho//las kyi phyag na snyoms paraH//rgyun nas dang+yas mA r+b+bats+tshaH
246a2(rgyud): kyis//zhing khams gang du mngon bsam pa'i//'dod pa'i bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur//'dis ni 'byung zhing dbang med cing //'chi med rlung la dbang thob nas//cho 'phrul bzhi
246a3(rgyud): yis zil mnan nas//mngon shes bdug pa 'dul ba yis//las rnams mi 'grub gcig kyang med//de nas gzhan yang chags ldan rim//bskal ldan dman dang sbyor bas
246a4(rgyud): zad//bde ba'i don 'dod dka' thub can//'di dag don la thabs kyis dgod//thabs ldan lus kyi gong bu la//rang rang cho ga'i thabs ldan na//bde chen gar thabs sna
246a5(rgyud): tshogs pa//rnam par 'phrul pa'i ro yis phyed//bde tshan long spyod chos kyi gnas//sprul pa'i thig le bde ba'i ro//ma lus mkha' lnga'i rang bzhin gyis//rang lus mi
246a6(rgyud): bcos gnas nyid bde//brtul zhugs thig le gsum thob nas//sgrol ma dang ni thipA laM dang //gnas dang thabs dang ting 'dzin gyis//bye brag brgyad bcu kun 'dus pa'i//thabs
246a7(rgyud): kyis mtshon pa las byung bas//dngos grub cho ga sna tshogs 'grub//rang rten thig ler bcas pa yis//dngas ma'i rang bzhin khyab gnas pa//bskul ba thabs kyi sbyor ba
246b1(rgyud): yis//mo lus bskyod cing 'gugs par byed//dngas snyigs rgyu dang mi rgyu ba'i//rlung gi thig les dbang bsgyur nas//'phro zhing 'dzag pa'i thig le nyid//rlung gis 'ching ba nyid yin te//
246b2(rgyud): thig le snyigs maro nyams gyur pa//thabs dang rlung bcud stobs ldan pas//pad+ma la ni chu bzhi no//ranga'o byung thig le'i rang bzhin las//rten drang zag pa snyigs ma dang //'khor ba'i
246b3(rgyud): rtsa dang sa bon dang //lo tog thig le zhe na bcas pa//rang byung na mkha'i thig les 'jigs//rang lus bde chen snying po la//na mkha' sprin ltar mi phyed cing //dngas snyigs bde ba'i rang
246b4(rgyud): bzhin nyid//thig le chu dang 'o ma dang //gnas pa rlung dang rton stobs kyis//dngas snyigs phye la drangs ma bstim//rang snying lus la 'od snang ba'i//phyi nang dngos rtogs ma lus pa//
