246b5(rgyud): rlung sogs 'khor lo'i 'phen stobs kyis//der mi gnas par goms par bya//gang du so bon snyigs btsas pa//na mkha'i ye shes lnga 'bar bas//gang du rgyu bar bcas pa'i
246b6(rgyud): yod//de ma thag par rnam par brlag/rlung dang rtsa dang thig ler bcas//thabs kyis bskul ba'i ro ldan pas//ma lus thig le'i rang bzhin pas//mi mthun zhen pas rnam grol
246b7(rgyud): bas//rang sems rten bcas thig le ni//dngas ma'i ye shes blo ldan pa//kun khyab bde 'byung snying po can//gsang ba'i rig pa'i gter kha 'byed//phyi nang rgyu ba thig ler bcas
247a1(rgyud): snying nang bde bar 'bar gyur nas//rang lus rtag su bde chen 'bar//mngon shes rin chen rtsa la phog/rig pa'i mngon shes lnga ru 'char//de nas mi 'gyur stong pa'i/
247a2(rgyud): 'gyur med kun snang rlung la thim//dman pas mi 'grub khyad par thabs//gsang ba'i thig le 'bab zhon gyis//rtsa bcud ting 'dzin 'brel pa'i stobs//bskal pa du ma'i snyoms dgags
247a3(rgyud): te//dngas ma'i ye shes rlung du 'grub//phyin pa med par mthar song ba//bde chen groms pa'i stobs las gyur//bcud lnga 'dus pa'i thig le ni//ro lnga 'dres pa'i badro chen de//bsgom
247a4(rgyud): dang mthar byin khyad par gyis//bde ba chen po rigs mchog gnas//de nas gang yin brjod bya ba//zab mo kun rdzogs brtul zhugs can//dbang po dang zhing smin pa yi//chags
247a5(rgyud): can nyi zla 'dzin nus pas//spyi gtsug thig le'i 'khor lo dang //gsang ba'i 'og min nus ldan pa//'byor pa'i rten can 'di nyid gnas//thabs dang rol pa'i khyad par dang //ting
247a6(rgyud): 'dzin rlung gi dbang thob ste//'byung bzhi snyigs phye dngas dusu//nyi zla 'dres pa'i gar thabs kyis//lha mo rnams dang lhan cig tu//rol pa'i thabs kyis gang rtsan pa//bye brag
247a7(rgyud): brgyad bcu gnyis 'dus pa'i//pad+ma'i snying po kun bkug ste//thig la dpa' bo lnga yi stobs//mi sdod 'phro ba'i rang bzhin nyid//thabs dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis//bcings
247b1(rgyud): la bzung zhing gnas par bya//de dang rtse phrad gnyis bzlog pas//bde ba'i myu gu gso byas pas//tha mal zhen pa kun bral nas//rtog dang lhan cig gang smras pa//dngas snyigs bye ma'i nyams
247b2(rgyud): dag gis//snyigs ma bag chags zhen bcas pa//de yi stobs kyis gnas mi 'gyur//gsang ba'i thig le stobs ldan pas//rigs ngan tha mal zhen tshigs dang //drin rtog ma lus pham/
247b3(rgyud): byas ste//phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa//lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin du//ma lus dpung btsugs rgyal bar mdzad//rdo rje pad+ma'i snying po la//dga' ba'i rol pa'i bdag nyid kyis//thabs
247b4(rgyud): dang shes rab gsal ba'i ro//phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba 'dus pa'i ro//zag med yon gter chen po//gsang ba thabs kyis stobs las grub//bde chen snying po thig le'i ro//dbab dang gzung
247b5(rgyud): bzlog 'byongs pa yis//rtsa gsum gang zhig thim pa'i tshe//bar chad med pa'i bde ba dang //thams cad mkhyen pa'i mngon shes dang //skye shi med pa'i tshe 'thab cing //mi 'gyur chos
247b6(rgyud): sku thig le la//rgyu ba spangs pa'i tshul gyis gnas//bde chen cho 'phrul dpag med pas//gsang ba'i zhing khams dag byed cing //gsang ba chos kyi 'khor lo bskor//bde tshan nyams
247b7(rgyud): dang dga' ba'i gar//chags pa'i sgra ni sna tshogs pas//ji srid na mkha'i mthar thug par//glu ni sna tshogs len byed cing //mdzes dang ngo tsha spangs pa'i tshul//mdog dmar rlan dang /
248a1(rgyud): ldan pa yis//rol pa'i tshul ni sna tshogs kyis//rdo rje bcud chen zla bcas pas//nyi ma chags pa dang bcas pa'i//pad+ma'i skying po'i spangs mdzad cing //dga' ba
248a2(rgyud): 'od dang 'khyud pa'i grwar//rlung gi snying po brjod byed cing //srid pa'i myu gu 'gog par mdzad//rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba'i me long gi rgyud chen po las bsgrub pa ma
248a3(rgyud): lus par bshad pa'i le'u sti dgu pa'o////de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//rtog pa'i rgyal po ma lus pa//bya ba las kyi rim pa dag/bzhir ni gsal bar gsungs pa yin//
248a4(rgyud): dang por zhi ba'i rang bzhin te//de 'og rgyas pas rgyas phyir//rgyas pas dbang du bya ba dang //dbang mi 'du ba bsgral phyir ste//thun mong khyad par yon rdzogs//bya ba'i las la ma rmongs
248a5(rgyud): shing //nus pa brtan pa'i rang bzhin gyis//rim pa ji bzhin brtsam par bya//gangs dkar 'dabs dang yid 'dong ba//zhi ba'i ljon shing me tog tshal//'bras ldan rgyas pa'i rang
248a6(rgyud): bzhi no//sum mdo dam grog gting zab pas//dbang du bsdu ba'i gnasu bshad//dur khrod mtshan gcig rgya gram gnas//'byung po 'du sar drag po shis//zhi las gzhi dkar
248a7(rgyud): ldan pa//zlum po sum rim oM dang bcas//'khor lo 'od dkar dang bcas pa//zhi ba'i thabs kyis rang bzhin//rgyas la ser po tsan dan bcas//gru bzhi rim gsum traM dang bca
248b1(rgyud): chen 'od zer gro gnas pa//thab ni rgyas par gsungs pa yin//dbangul pa dmar chags 'du nan//zla gam gzhu 'dra pad+mas mtshan//rim gsum rje dang bcas pa ni//dbang du bya ba'i thab yin//
248b2(rgyud): drug po sa nag dur sol can//gru gsum rdo rje rtse gsum gdang //thaMd phreng 'od napa rim gsum d+hi//drag pa thab kyi me bI yin//'o ma can dang gser can dang //chags pa can dang cher ma tsa/
248b3(rgyud): phrin las bzhi ni so so yi//yam shing bsreg shing nyi du bshad//ling gra kha dog so so ste//gnas kyang thag khung bzhin dang mtshungs//mar dkar 'bras dkar til dkar dang //nas
248b4(rgyud): dkar chen dang 'o ma zho//dngul phye gtor me dkar por bcas//zhi ba'i bsreg gtor rdzasu bshad//mar snying bu ram sbrang rtsi dang //'bras dang chan rnams ldong ros dang //me tog gser/
248b5(rgyud): dang tsan dan bcas//'di dag rgyas pa'i rdzas nyid//dpal dang gzi byin rgyas par 'gyur//tsha ba'i mar dang chang skyur dang //ram bu pad+ma rag ta dang //'bras dmar tsan dan zangs phye dang //
248b6(rgyud): gtor ma dmar po dbang rdzas yin//tshil chen mar dang tsha ba gsum//klung chen sha khAg sran chan dang //dug gsum thal chen tsha ba mar//ska tshe phye gsum mi khyag dang //ming rus spel
248b7(rgyud): mar bcus gtor mas//bsgral ba drag po'i rdza su bshad//dngul lam dkar po'i shing rnams la//mgo bo rgya mdud rtse zlum po//logs la zhi ba'i lha bkod la//de bzhin gshegs
249a1(rgyud): par gsal bas gdag/gser ram se ba'i shing rnams la//mgro rtswa rgyu mdud grub zhi bcas//logs la rgyas pa'i lha bsgoms te//rin chen nga rgyal
249a2(rgyud): sa pas gdang //zangs sam gyu ru dmar shing rnams//mgo bo rgya mdudu r+b+he zla gam+b+ha//logaso la dbang gi wA ba/ la//rtags bai rdo rje du gsal bas gdag/lcags samanas
249a3(rgyud): bo'i shing rnams la//mgo bo rgyu mdung rtsi zur gsum//logs la drag po'i sgra bkod//zhe sdang rdo rjer gsal bas gdub//oM dang tra~M dr-id+hIny+dzi las//'byung lnga'i rim pa gsal
249a4(rgyud): steng su//e baM ma ya druM lus bskyod//gzhal yas zlum po gru bzhi dang //zla gam gru gsum ji bzhin dbyings//kha dog rang gi tshul bzhin bskyed//rang rang sa bon gdan stengs
249a5(rgyud): la/'od bzhi 'phro 'du'i cho ga yis//las bzhi gtso bo'i las bzhin bskyed//'khor yang gtso bo'i chu 'dra ba/phyag mtshan rang rang thugs rtags la//las bzhi rtags kyi
249a6(rgyud): mtshan ma ste//kha dog las kyis dbye bar bshad//dbang bskur lus bzhi rigs kyis brgyan//lus bzhi 'od kyi 'phro 'du can//cho ga sde gsal bar bskyed byas la//spyan drangs
249a7(rgyud): bstim sogs las rdzogs bya//los dang ting 'dzin bzhi nyid kyis//las bzhi rtse gcig ting 'dzin bya//gang du dmigs ba rtse gcig pas//las bzhi bye ba'i tshig dag/
249b1(rgyud): pa ga 'byu ngan rdzu sa pas sa pa sa// khru gas s+ho//da 'dun pa gas // klung phyuganasas+ho//snyams gas
249b2(rgyud): bar byed//g+ho phyogs ni khwa bltas te//dga' ba'i 'du shes kyi gcigo bas//na ni skye'i klung laganas pas//dpal dang gA ni byin 'jol zer bya/chub kyi phyog skye kha ba N+Dis te/
249b3(rgyud): chags rang zhin paHgcig pa//pad+ma'i skyil krung la gnas te//ma lus dbang du rngasdu bor gyi//byang phyogs nyid du kha bltas te//khros pa'i sems kyis so btso zhing+ga//ru sbrul dang /
249b4(rgyud): b+hU s+yAng s+yAk+Shis//gdug pa lAl du gzhug/sa so ni sngags kyi rime ba dag dz+r-i zhi Sh+NI las b+h+yam+b+ha //gung la rgyas pa nyid du bya//dkrongs k+Sha dbang gi dus ts+tshed de/
249b5(rgyud): namA gyi gung lam+b+ha nA~M dus bzhir de m+b+ha sa //ngas par la ba ni 'gyu byu 'byed// na g+ha rA swAH//ste dus g+h+nA na s+t+raihU~M/
249b6(rgyud): ge mo ba shi ku ru swAH//hU~M che ga mi mA~M ra ya pa Ta/ling gi'i gnas kyang las bzhi'i dbyibs//dgug dang phur bu bani btab la//r-i yu~M 'am lcug ma gtubs pa ni//sa siM lham
249b7(rgyud): shal du bstag/rtse mo zhi byed yal ga rgyas//sdong po dbang la rtsa ba drag/kha dang mngar sgyur tsha ba'i shing //ra yi mchod pa de bzhin te//rgyud bzangs rgyal po smad 'tshong ma//shan
250a1(rgyud): pa'i khyim nas me blangs te//las dang 'thun pa'i ra skyes mnan//sa bon bzhi las rim pa bzhin//pa pa ka dang dbang chen dang //gzi byin can dang 'joms byed
250a2(rgyud): bzhi//sku mdog las bzhis phye ba ste//'gu 'di sgrom dang zhags pa dang //rtse gsum g.yon pa bgrang phreng nyid//rigs bzhis las bzhi byin brlabs dbu//spyan drang
250a3(rgyud): mchod bstod las rdzobs nas//lto bar brum las gzhal yasu//las dang 'thun pa'i lha bskyed la//rang rang rtog pa'i cho ga bzhin//bsreg dang br-i gar las byas pas//gang yang
250a4(rgyud): 'grub par the tsom med//zhe sdang can dang nga rgyal can//sdug bsngal gdug sems nad gzir ba//de 'dra zhi bar bya ba'i phyir//zhi ba'i las ni rtsom pa yin//tshe thung nad mang
250a5(rgyud): dpal long spyod//phongs dang nyam de 'jigs pa dag/dngas snyigs zad nas snying por thim//thig le mi shigs bcud 'dus pa//stong nyid thig le'i ngang du 'gag/rgyu ba'i rlung la
250a6(rgyud): dbang thob cing //mngon shes skye 'jigs thob bral bas//bde chen na mkha'i ye shes nyid//rdo rje thig le 'gyur 'jig med//steng dang 'og las gang sbyar bas//sku gsung thugs
250a7(rgyud): kyi pho brang dag/bde chen til 'phru bcud bzhin du//nyi zla gnas pa'i bar du 'bar//'bab pa thig le zla ba'i gzugs//kha bcad rlung gis gzung bya zhing //'og gis phul zhing steng
250b1(rgyud): sa drang //mas dacan kyang bar gnas//ma rtag gas la bar ma dza ston pa//song gyu na brdugs pa sta ba//brnas dang tong 'dzin myu ba yong//nan rdzas nas tshan pa la//mas/
250b2(rgyud): rdzogs par gnas//chags can 'argyal zhugs bral ba yi/lus dang dran zlos pag chags cis//rigs dang rigs min brang yang du//sgo gsum mA lus bcas pa dag/steng zla ga
250b3(rgyud): byas 'dul yin//dang por gsang po'i rim thob pas//rlung dang thib le'i las goms nas//bde chen byang chub sems kyi ro//sems lnga'i tshul gyis gang snang ba//g.yo thob brtan po
250b4(rgyud): nyams nyid kyis/lus dang phyi nang dran rtogs bcas//nam po'i gzugs can nyid skyed//lus dang snang bar bcas pa yi//namakha'i mtha' ltar mi phyed pa//'di chen thig le A dang gnas/
250b5(rgyud): thi le stong pa'i ri mo can//gas sde par shes pa rgyu bas mngon//'og nas bskol zhing steng nas mnan//dngas snyigs bsre ba'i thabs la 'jug/bde ba'i rlung can yam ge s+ho//bskyod
250b6(rgyud): sbyor bas gyen du phul//rgyu ba rlung gi snying po can/ 'og nas zur du 'then//rig pa'i ye shes gnas pa'i rlung //stong nyid na mkha'i dbying su thim//phyi nang rgyu 'chad pa dang //rig po zhig
250b7(rgyud): lo'i dpal gnas//'di ba'i rtags ni 'byung 'gyur te//'dir deng rdul dang baspu ldang //sgra dang lus bde rgyug pa dang //rgod dang brgyal sogs gang byung gi/brtan dang sbyang ba'i cho ga bya
251a1(rgyud): mi mthun log pa'i chos brtags na//thabs kyi rim pa'i cho ga yis//gdon dang spos dang gnan pa dag/ji ltar rigs par brtag par bya//rang lus thig le la nyams myong
251a2(rgyud): la/bar chad med par gsal 'jug pa'i//tha mal zhen pa bsgyur ba dang //bde ba'i dbang phyug smin pa dang //dran rtog rgyud sogs zhi ba dang //bde chen rgyas pas khyab pa dang //rlung dang
251a3(rgyud): bde ba'i rnal 'byor gyis//thams cad dbang du sdud pa dang //dri ni rtog a ye dang du gnas//'di ni nad gri rim pa yin//de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba//thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba lnga//
251a4(rgyud): gsang ba'i phrin las bzhir 'byung ba//dka' thub can dang tha mal dang //thun mong lam las zlog phyiraro//'dod chags zhen cing dbang po smin//tshad ldan yum dang bcas pa yi//bde
251a5(rgyud): chen dgon pa thig le'i gnas//yon khyad par kun tu rdzogs//gnyis med 'khril ba'i ngo bo ni//bde ba chen po 'byung ba'i gnas//gsang ba'i b+ha ga rgyas pa ni//zhi rgyas dbang drag
251a6(rgyud): tshul bzhin dang //nus pa byin brlabs gang ldan pa//gsang ba'i thig le'i tshul la gnas//pad+ma gsang ba'i thab khung du//gsang ba'i sbyin sreg gang phul ba//lo dang zla ba ma yin
251a7(rgyud): par//myur du bde chen lus gyur//thabs dang shes rab las byung ba'i//dngas snyogs bcud dang bag chags dang //nyi zla khu bar bcas pa ni//bde chen gsang ba mchod pa'i rdzas//
251b1(rgyud): gdung dang bde ba bral ba dang //zhan rtog de nyid chags pa yi//rang gi ling gA de nyid la//gsang ba'i phur pa bani rdzogs pa//gsang ba'i yul la btab pa yis//lhan cig skyes pa'i ting 'dzin la/
251b2(rgyud): las bzhi ya bcol rdzogs par ldan//rol pa'i tshul dang thig le gnyis//pad+ma rdo rje snying po'i rtsa//nyams dang sbyor tshul gang yin pa//gsang ba'i sbyor ba'i dusu blta//gnas pa rtsa yi
251b3(rgyud): tshul dag ni//kha dog dbyibs sogs tha dad pas//mchod rdzas nyi zlar bcas kun la//gzar bu gnyis bcos thabs phul bas//thig le chen por 'bab par 'gyur//gsang ba'i don
251b4(rgyud): la dga' ba dang //rig pa'i rtul zhugs spyod pa dang //dbang po dar cing smin pa dang //thig le'i don la mos pa dang //rlung dang bcud la goms pa yi//rnal 'byor pho mor bcas pa kun
251b5(rgyud): dran rtog phyi ma bcas pa'i yid//gdul ba'i don du de bshad//gang dag thabs la mkhas pa dang //dbang dang dam tshig ldan pa yis//thabs dang sbyor ba la brtson zhing //nyi zla rtse sbyor
251b6(rgyud): dbang thob nas//bzung zlog 'byongs pa'i gar thabs kyis//dngos po lhan cig skyes pa'i don//sems lnga'i tshul gyis gsal bar skye//nyi zla zhon pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang //rgyu ba'i rlung la dbang
251b7(rgyud): thob pa sa//khams bzhi 'dus pa'i snying po las//bde chen thig le mi rtog pa//thabs kyis da ltar mngon du snang //thabs dang bral ba'i slob dpon gyis//skal med las kyis dman pa
252a1(rgyud): la//dbang dang rgyud pa bral ba yis//tshig dang rigs pas ci bstan kyang //rigs ngan rgyal sar bzhag pa ltar//bdag phung gzhan rlag 'dzag par
252a2(rgyud): 'gyur//gang du gsang ba'i thig le nyid//gsang ba'i lam lngar nyams skyes pas//zag med bde ba'i dkyil 'khor du//mkha' gro gsum la gang brten pas//ye shes thig le rgya
252a3(rgyud): dpag sde/rim par mthar thug gnasu 'gyur//gang zhig 'di la 'dris goms pas//rgyu ba thig ler thim pa dang //dran rtogan mkha' gsal ba dang //bde chen sngon du smin pa yis//
252a4(rgyud): 'chi med sangs rgyas sa la sbyor//'jigs pa kun las grol ba dang //lha mo tshogs kyis byin brlabs nas//rol rtsed sna tshogs bsgyur byed cing //thabs dang shes rab gnyis med
252a5(rgyud): cing //long spyod rdzogs pa'i zhol mthong zhing //rdo rje dbang gis mtshams sbyar nas//yi ge 'khor lo tshogs mchog mnyes//na mkha'i mthar thug bar du ni//bde chen ye shes zag
252a6(rgyud): pa med//ye shes rgya mtsho byin brlabs can//na mkha' lta bur dpag med pa//rgyal ba kun gyi ngo bor 'gyur//rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud las
252a7(rgyud): phrin las mtha' yas pa bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o////de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba//dasang ba'i lam la gang dga' bas//thun mong ma gyur gsang ba'i laM//
252b1(rgyud): rim pa nyid bshad par bya//dad dang brtul zhugs che ba dang //thog pa chen por rig nges shing //snyad rtsi dbang dang dmachog ldan//sgrub la brtson pa'i gang zag gis//lus dang long spyod 'tsho ba/
252b2(rgyud): dang //bu dang chung ma rgyal srid kyis//dang por bla ma mnyes byas la//thabs la mkhas pas 'dod pa blang //phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa//rang byung ye shes rang snang ba//gcig dang
252b3(rgyud): du ma med tshul gyis//bden pa gnyis med 'brel pa nyid//byin brlabs sgra dang gtan tshigs kyi//rang 'byung ye shes mngon du snang //rang gnas 'khor lo bsam mi khyab//rtog ge'i
252b4(rgyud): spyod yul ma gyur pa//thabs chen thabs las byung ba yi//'phel dang dga' bde long spyod phyir//rgyas pa'i las la 'bad par bya//dbang chen gzi byin che ba dang //rgyal rigs blon po bram ze/
252b5(rgyud): dang //gdug pa dbang du sdu ba'i phyir//rjes dgug dbang gi las brtsa mo//dgra dang bgegs sogs ma rungs pa//gang gis 'dul bar mi nus pa//gzir zhing 'du shes bsgyur ba'i
252b6(rgyud): phyir//drag po bsgral ba'i phrin las brtsam//gang yang rung ba'i dngos po la//dang po mi mthun zhi bar bya//de nas yon rgyas par bya//de nyid dbang spu las la sbyar//gal te dbang du mA
252b7(rgyud): gyur na//drag pos gzir te bsgral bar bya//gal te log par lhung srid pas//'og min gnas paT gyis 'phang //nges par 'grub 'gyur gdon mi za//dang por sngon bya'i las rgya/
253a1(rgyud): ni//nus dang mi nus khyad par brtag/de nas nus pa thob pa ste//de nas bde ba'i rtsal thob nas//thogs pa med pa'i phrin las 'grub//zag med lam la goms sbyangs pa
253a2(rgyud): cho 'phrul bzhi dang phrin las bzhi//gdul bya zhing dang nus mthu dang /byin brlabs rtsal gyi khyad par 'phags//mthar phyin sku lnga'i zhing thob pas//ma rtsal chu dang rlabs bzhin du/
253a3(rgyud): dpag med yon ngo bo'i phyir//lhun gyis grub pa'i phrin las yin//las dang nyon mongs gdug pa dang //sdug bsngal rtog pa ji snyed pa//cho ga thabs dang ting 'dzin gyis//lhan na
253a4(rgyud): lgang der zhi bar 'gyur//nga rgyal rin chen gzi brjid kyis//dpal dang leng spyod 'phel ba dang //tshe dang lang tshe stobs ldan zhing //yon na mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam//'dod chags
253a5(rgyud): rdo rje ting 'dzin gyis//bdud dang gdug pa rgyal po dang //lha dbang srin po mkho 'gro ma//phyag na rdo rje'ang dbang du 'gyur//zhe sdang rdo rje ting 'dzin gyis//cho ga rdzas dang stobs ldan
253a6(rgyud): pas//chos sku rdo rje'ang 'jig 'gyur na//gzhan lta smos kyang ci zhig dgos//rang lus bde chen kun gyi dbyings//rang lus thig le'i thabs mkhas pas//sbyor ba rlung gi goms
253a7(rgyud): stogs can//dkyil 'khor nang la gnas gyur pas//nyams kyis las bzhi gsal gyur te//rim pa chi bzhin 'gyur ba dang //rang gi mngon par gsal gyur pa//nus
253b1(rgyud): ba bstan pas mngon du 'gyur//gzhan min 'khor lo pho brang nyid//gnas dang 'jug dang gzung ba dang //bstim zhing gnas pa gang yin pa//de dag nyid du bshad pa yin//d+harma tsakra gzhal yas/
253b2(rgyud): khang /rtsa bzhi yan lag brgyad dkyil na//e baM ma ya las bzhi dbyibs//kha dog las kyis gtsor gyur pa//bag chags sa bon snyegs ma dang //rtog dang tha mal zhen pa'i rdzas//
253b3(rgyud): nyams myong 'gyur med bzhir gnas te//thig les de nyid zhi ba dang //rang lus phyi nad thig les rgyas//rlung dang thig le rtog par bcas//nus pas dbang du 'dus pa dang //thig les ma
253b4(rgyud): bcos na mkha'i dang //srog dang thig ler bcas bsdus pa//a yi dang du thim 'gyur te//rgyu ba dngas shing 'phar ba gnan//mi 'gyur dbyings la gnas par bya//rang lus thabs kyi ngo
253b5(rgyud): bo las//'khor lo bzhi dang me rlung dang //bskyed pa rlung gis las rung bas//na mkha'i ye shes cir yang gsal//thig les rgyus dang lus rgyas pas//bde chen dbang thob zhen chags
253b6(rgyud): bral//ting 'dzin sbyor bas gang bskul na//rim pa'i rtags deng nus pa byung //kha dog grangs dang snying po dang //dbyibs dang tshad dang thig le yi//khyab pa la sogs mtha' yas pa/
253b7(rgyud): bzhugs tshul de nyid de bzhino//'khor lo bzhi yi thab khung du//gtum mo byin pa'i las bskul bas//dngas sgyogs rtog pa'i bag chags dag/mi shags thig ler mchod pa phul//
254a1(rgyud): khyi nang rgyu ba ma lus pa//rang 'byung 'khrur la thog lo mchog/spyod yul thun mong ma lus da//phywa yi rnam pa lam byed pas//thun rmang phyi yi lam du bshad//de nyid na
254a2(rgyud): du rtsa 'khor lo//thig les nang du nyams bskyed pa//rim pa 'di ni nang du bshad//dbang thob sbyangs pa ma rtogs pa//sbrul rani rigs chud yul min po//gsang des gseng ba zhes
254a3(rgyud): bshad//dang par blo ldan gang zag ni//ma lus bden pa dbyer med la//rang bzhin rig pa'i gautan tshigs kyis//phung po khams dang skye mched la//thabs dang shes gnyis med pa'i
254a4(rgyud): don//ye nas sangs rgyas rdzogs pa nyid//de nyid dus gsum ma skyes pa//gang la brten nas rtogs pa la//lam gyi yan lag kun rdzogs te//sa bcu rim par ma bkod rdzogs//
254a5(rgyud): ma lus yon rang shar bas//thams cad ma lus ma 'da' la//tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i 'bras bu nyid//dbang po gcig tshar spyod yul yin//gang su blo dang mos pa dang //
254a6(rgyud): chung mtshan mi dga' ba la//thun mong sgo 'thun khyad par can//rim pa'i rnal 'byor brlab par bya//dang por phyi nang snod bcud kun//rang sa nyed na mi dmigs pa//ma bcos
254a7(rgyud): ma bsal mi gnas pa//dngos po tsa'ang mi rtag cing //de nyid la yang mi rtog pa//'dzin rtog zhan pa mo gnas par//bsam dang bsam bya med tshul gyis//bdag
254b1(rgyud): gzhan gyi nang ma lus pa//byang zhi por ma grub pa//nI la'ang mi gnas sbyor ba yis//rang par mi rtog jo ba nyid//btsas pa med pa'i tshul du bsgom//gal te mtshan ma'i rgyu ba dag/chu las rnyon
254b2(rgyud): ba'i tshul byung na//ma bcos rang bzhin bzhag par yis//ma lus rtog med de bzhin nyid//rang bzhin bzhag pas dag par 'gyur//na mkha' dag par 'byur ba'i tshe//sbyin kyang rang 'byung
254b3(rgyud): dag pa ltar//byung tshor dran rtog ma lus pa//chos nyid stong pa'i rang bzhi no//gang du snang srid ma lus pa//phyi nang med pa'i sems nyid//de nyid stong pa'i rang bzhin du//goms shing nus pa
254b4(rgyud): brtan pa'i tshe//de nyid rnal 'byor de nyid ni//stong pa chen po rnal 'byor yin//sgo gsum byed spyod ma bcos pa//ma brtags mi rtogs cir mi gnas//'di ni rnal 'byor rtse gcig pas//bya ba
254b5(rgyud): spangs pa'i spyod pa yin//de nas de las langs pa'i tshe//sgyu ma chu zla smig rgyu dang //'ja' chen lbu ba chu bur ltar//snang yang dngos por gnas ma yin//rig pa phyi nang ma lus par//stong pa'i
254b6(rgyud): chu 'phrul snang du zad//ma lus rig pa'i ngo bo ste//de yang sgyu ma'i rang bzhin ltar//zhen chags med pa'i tshul du bsgom//ye shes sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul ni//dpag med ngo bor rang snang yang
254b7(rgyud): byin rlabs tshi 'phrul rang snang ba//de ltar ma rtogs dman pa li//rang 'byung snying rjer 'char ba'i phyir//snying rje chen po rnal 'byor yin//'gro ba gang dang gang dag las//snying rje chen po gang
255a1(rgyud): gzigs pas//sna chags mdzad pa'i tshul nyid kyis//de snyed spyod la mtha' yas te//don dang 'thun pa 'ba' zhig ston//tha mal ba dang thabs nyid dang //lus ngag
255a2(rgyud): yid kyis ci 'tsham par//don 'gyur spyod pa bsam mi khyab//gang du byams dang skying rje yis//mi khyab ming gi rnal 'byor te//theg pa chen po'i rigs chad cing //dman pa'i rigasu gyur
255a3(rgyud): pa yin//rtsa ba med pa'i sems nyid ni//chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba ste//na mkha'i ris dang dbyer mod ltar//ma lus rang rgyud bral ba yi//ngo bo de min brdzun pa min//chos rnams
255a4(rgyud): ming tsam dngos po med//sgo gsum 'di ltar brtan pa ni//thugs rje chen po spyod pa yin//de nas sgyu ma'i rang bzhin nyid//rang bzhin gnyis med rig pa yi//yi ge hUM du gsal bar bsgom/
255a5(rgyud): phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa//'phro 'dus hUM du gsal bar bya//rdul phran de snyed 'dus pa lngas//thig le mi dmigs stong par blta//ma dang a las nyi zla'i gdan//gang bsgril hUM
255a6(rgyud): bcas gsal bar bya//rang rang gsung yang 'gal ba med//sgril ma'i snying po phyag mtshan ste//'phro 'du 'phra mo'i rang bzhin sku//gsal la skyon dang bral bar sgom//de nas rang rang
255a7(rgyud): tshad gyur pa'i//rags pa'i phyag rgya chen po nyid//zhi dang khro bo skabs dag du//ji ltar 'thad par bsgom par bya//yang na zhal gcig phyag gnyis te//yang na zhal gsum phyag
255b1(rgyud): drug bsgom//gnas gcig gnas gsum gnas lngar yang //yan lag lha ni chang bar sgom//goms nas bstims te spyod yul kun//de ltar gsal bar brtag par bya//rtsa ba gcig pa'i lha bsgom
255b2(rgyud): pa//phyag rgya gcig pa'i rnal 'byor yin//sgo gsum bsgom la rab 'byor pas//rnam par g.yeng ba'i chos spyod 'das//ma lus rtsa ba'i spyod pa ste//phyogs gcig pa yi skyed par gsung
255b3(rgyud): de nas rtog pa'i yan lag dag/gnyis ka thabs dang shes rab tu//brtags te de ltar bsgom par bya//'od zer 'phro ba 'bru gsum nyid//yang na yis lnga nyid//gnas gcig snying por///
255b4(rgyud): gnas par bya//de bzhin bsngo ba gtso mo dang //sems dpa' dang ni sems ma dang //khro bo khro mo sprul pa dang //yid chos dag la'ang shes par bya//zhal dang phyag dang lnga grangs dang //chom
255b5(rgyud): bu spros pas spos bcas yin//sku gsung thugs dang yon+ta las//tshem bu lnga la khros bcas bsgom//yang na sku gsum thugs ldan pa'o//tshom bu gsum dang bcas pa yi//khro bo
255b6(rgyud): khro mo 'khor du bsgom//rigs kyi gtso ste thugs kyi mchog/khro bo tshogs dang bcas pa yi//mos pa'i tshul dang sbyor ba yis//tshom bu gcig po'i lha rnams bsgom//slob dpon
255b7(rgyud): mthar nya'i lam gnas pa'i//rgyang grags dpag tshad la sogs pa//rdo rje thig tshad bor tsam gyis//phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gsal ldan pa//sna tshogs dkyil 'khor mchog
256a1(rgyud): gsungs//dang po rgyud glags dkyil 'khor te//de nas dpag tshad dkyil 'khor nyid//na mkha'i dbyings ni bsam yas par//sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sna tshogs pa
256a2(rgyud): de nas yo byad lnga ldan pas//ting 'dzin mos pa spyod mthun pa'i//skye bo tsam du grangs mthun pas//tshom pus 'dod pa'i don bsgrub bya//thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa yi//pho mo
256a3(rgyud): 'dus pa'i gangs mnyam par//yo byas 'dus pa'i tshogs ldan pas//dgon par 'khor khang par brtsigs te//rang rang thabs dang shes rab tu//brtags te yo byad long spyad cing
256a4(rgyud): rdorje glu bro gar thabs kyis//zhag ni sum cu phrag drug gam//bcu gnyis ducu bzhi bcu drug gis//tshe la dbang bsgyur zag med thob//de nas rgya phrag bcu drug gis//sku lnga lhun
256a5(rgyud): gyis grub par 'gyur//skye bo mdza' ba kun tshogs pa//rnal 'byor 'dus pa'i tshogs zhes bya//'byor pa'i long spyod tshor ba ni//bde ba'i long spyod tshogasu bshad//lha dang dam can
256a6(rgyud): kun 'das pas//'dus po chen po'i tshogasu gsungs//thams cad spyod pa mi 'dzin pas//tshogs gnyis rgyun tu rdzogs byed pas//cho gso chen po ru nges par bshad//bar
256a7(rgyud): tshad med pa'i lam rdzogs pas//rig pa'i skyes bu thub pa med//lho mi cha byad 'dzin mod kyi//'byung lnga cho 'phrul dbang sgyur thob//zhing dang long spyod dag pa yis//gong nas
256b1(rgyud): gong du mnyam par sbyar//rdo rje rig pa 'dzin gyi sku//zhing khams kun la gnas par byed//gal to mtshan mar zhon dbang gis/rtogs pa'i stobs ni chung gyur na//byang chub phyag rgya rdo rje sku//mtshan
256b2(rgyud): drang dpe byad la sogs pa//cha lugs mngon du byung ba yang //zhi ba de nyid mthong ba min//gang du sbyar ba'i yum rnams kyang //thun mong lam dang skabs gnyi su//nus pa'i khyad par che chung
256b3(rgyud): gis//'phrin las bzhi ru bshad pa ni//dkar mo bong chung skad che la//bzhin lus gtsug pudo g.yasu 'khyil//yan lag phra 'jam skad gsal zhing //rlung khar tsi bos zhi ba byaM//
256b4(rgyud): zla dang yan lag mang ba dang //phra zhing bshad la bzangasu ring //bzhin lus ser zhing gru bzhir gnas//rnam 'phyangs sha dang nu ma rgyas//'phel ba'i dusu 'di dag bzung //bzhin
256b5(rgyud): mdog pad+ma 'dra sogs ka la//smin sgyus ring la bstod smad phyed//lus dang chu rlung dri zhim zhing //bde ba ldan zhing yan lag med//'di ni bsdud pa'i mchog tu 'gyur//nag mo gru
256b6(rgyud): gsum rtsid mgo ma//khro gnyer byis pa'i lus ldan zhing //gtum zhing brling tshig 'dzem pa med//rtsang smra'i rtog bral gsod par bshad//gang du nus pa brtan thob pa//de dag
256b7(rgyud): sa nas sar sbyong ba//rig pa'i skyes bu dam pa nyid//rnal 'byor rim pa'i lung ldan pa//ma skyes mnyam la dbang sgyur zhing //ma lus gsal bar mthor phyin pa'o//rang rig yis rgyu
257a1(rgyud): don phyir//rang snang rig pa mngon byas pa//rigs 'dzin mchog ste lhun grub pa'o//ting 'dzin nus pa'i mthu med kyang //sa sbyong sems dpa'i bskyed du med//bde gshe
257a2(rgyud): nyid dang spyod yul gcig/rig pa'i skyes bu'i lung thob pa'i//gal te 'byung ba'i lus 'jig na//bdag nyid sgo gsum lhar lta zhing //'byung ba bsags pa'i lus las grol//ting
257a3(rgyud): 'dzin phyag rgya chen por smin//khyung phrug sbubs dang bral ba ltar//ma lus phyag rgya sgyu ma'i mchog/rnam par smin ces de la brjod//zag pa zad pa rdo rje lus//phyin chad 'gyur
257a4(rgyud): 'jig chos dang bral//bde ba chen po'i lung thob pas//zag bcas bslab pa'i chos dang bral//zhing la dbang sgyur sprul pa'i lus//ting 'dzin leng spyod dpag tu med//bsgrubs pa'i nus pa gang
257a5(rgyud): brtan pa//rdo rje lus gyur 'jig pa med//'jigs pa lnga bral zag pa zad//dbang bsgyur gsum la dbang thob pas//bde ba long spyod dpag tu med//grangs med bskal par don byed cing //
257a6(rgyud): mthong bas de bzhin gnyis med rigs//rgyal tshab skyes bu sa sbyong ba//phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa//na mkha' lta bur dpog med cing //mtha' dbus bsam pa'i rgyun las
257a7(rgyud): 'das//'jigs bral dbugs phyin mya ngan 'das//rang snang dpag med zhal mthong bas//gzhan du blta ba'i yul dang bral//ting 'dzin rig pa goms pa'i mthu//mtsha
257b1(rgyud): masdug po yul las 'das//'jig rten snang phyug dpung skur zhing //gnyi sa med phyug rgya chen pa'i rigs//nam mthu thug med pa sgyur//'ams dang nus pa'i rdul stangs kyis/
257b2(rgyud): bag chags mtshan ma'i tshad ching la//tIng 'dzin reg pa'i mi 'byung bas//zhing khams rgya bral dpag med du//ting 'dzin rigs pas gang sbyangs pa//bsgoms dang ting 'dzin rig pa yis/
257b3(rgyud): 'dzin pa'i lung thob pa//phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin yin//de nas reg pa'i rtsal rdzogs shing //ye shes lha mo rol dbang gis//mthar phyin rig pa'i skyes bu ste//zhing khams bye ba'i dbang
257b4(rgyud): thob cing //rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid kyi sras//dbang dang cho 'phrul kun thob pa//na mkha'i mtha' ltar dgongs pas khyab//mnyam bzhag rjes thob khyad par gyis//rgyal ba'i lung mnod bka'
257b5(rgyud): la gnas//zhing khams dag par kun spyod kyang //rmad 'byung bsang ba'i rang bzhin la//spyod kyang lta ba'i rang bzhin gyis//phyogs bral na mkha' mi mthong bas//dbang dang dgongs pa
257b6(rgyud): mthar phyin 'gyur//dbang dang dam tshig brtul zhugs te//dang po bslab pa mthar phyin cing //thig lo rdzogs par 'dod pa yis//gsang ba nang gi dron la sbyor//thun mong bya ba mthar
257b7(rgyud): phyin naso//lus dang spyod yul bcas pa dang //lce yi rnal 'byor ma lus pa//bde chen thig le nyid du blta//lha dang bde bar mnyam sbyor bas//thig lo bde bar snang ba nug/sku bzhi
258a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor khams thog lo//dngas ma lnga ru mnyam sbyor ba//nga ba dang ni rkyen dag gis//thabs kyi rim pa bskul las shes//bde ba'i thig le nyams myong ba//mi rtog bde ba
258a2(rgyud): cha shas med//mi shigs thig le kuni gyi bdag/stong nyid 'brel ba'i rim can//tha mal bya ba kun bral ba//spyod pa nyid bstan pa yin//thig le bzhu ba'i rang bzhin gyis//'jog 'bar thim
258a3(rgyud): gang bde ba ni//sa yang bcu gsum bde bas brgyan//lus kun khyab pa'i thig le shum//til 'bru bcud kyis khyab pa ltar//ma lus khyab pa'i ros gang ba//ma lus 'od dang snying po
258a4(rgyud): ltar//snang srid thig le chen po nyid//bde ba chen pos khyab par gsal//ma lus 'dus pa'i thig le ni//khams lnga 'dres pa'i snying po ste//mi shigs thig le bde ba'i bcung //
258a5(rgyud): ma lus bde ba'i rgyas btab pas//nam mkha'i ye shes cir yang gsal//dus gsum rgyal ba'i dgongs pa ste//thig le gcig gis kun khyab pas//bde chen snying rjes gcig tu
258a6(rgyud): 'khyil//de nyid bde chen phyag rgya ste//nang gi phyag rgya gcig par bshad//de nyid nges par las rung bas//thig le bde chen dang bcas pa'i//bye brag brgyad cu ma lus par//sau'i
258a7(rgyud): thothig lar sku 'phros shing //khams lnga ye shes ro dang bcas//sa bon thig laM bde bas brgyan//mi rtog thig le thugs mchog sgra//rang lus smin nas snang bar spro//gang nA
258b1(rgyud): nga la smras byung //de srod co/pa'i phyag rgya ste//'ad pa'i thog pa grangs las 'das//so shos lnga dang sku gsang thugs//ma ts+tshedang pos gang khyab pas//grangs 'dus pade rgyun rna/
258b2(rgyud): rdzobs nas//ma sas bde ba'i phyag rgyar snang //gang de de yis rgyas btab zas//de nyid dad chen thig ler smin//rnam pa skye nang snyigs mar brtas//bde chen thog mini ji bar smin//
258b3(rgyud): snyigs pa 'byung ba'i lusalas 'a //slong ba par tshad med pa'i lus//thig les tha mo'i snod glang bas//ma su sa dad chen ba sprid//de nas thabs dang ting 'dzin dang //rlung gi 'dres pa'i sgrus
258b4(rgyud): ldan pa//rin chen lung gi thig ler zhugs//skad cig mngon shes lngar smin cing //'gro ba ris dang thar par 'gyur//mi shigs a la thig le thim//'byung 'jug med pa'i rlung 'thob cing //
258b5(rgyud): 'byor 'jig med pa'i lum la gnas/la 'grib med pa'i bde ba nyid//snang bag sa nyid ste//thrig la thung du u ru thim//gnyis med 'ad tsho shes bral//'di ni zag med
258b6(rgyud): byu gA/rkyen dang bral bahU~M da chen cing //dpe na me dad che ba 'am//rgya mr-i cha dang ni dz+nyAn bzhon//rlung dang thig le rig pa dang //tshe dang long spyod 'byung ba dang //'dud lnga kun la drubang sgyur thog/
258b7(rgyud): 'dri ba'i phyag rgya chen po ni//ma sus zag med thig le hU~M/skye bral rig pa'i dzA g+sa'i nyid//stsogs pa'i zag pa rlung zad pas//ti dzin rkye ni theg med gesol//rig pa 'i chen
259a1(rgyud): rang gsal bas//ci mthong brad chen phyag rgya nyid//'du bas sbyar ba'i spyod yul lam//mun gyur dug rtsi ji bzhin du//rgya dang bral ba'i zhing khams dag/bde chen phyag rgya
259a2(rgyud): chen por 'gyur//gang dag sgoms pa'i skyes bu ni//tha mil pa dang brkam chags pa//rnam pa'i spros pa ma lus pa//bsgoms dang ched du ma byas par//bde chen thig ler lhun gyis grug/
259a3(rgyud): dper na chu dang rlabs bzhin nam//rgya mtshor phyin pa'i 'du shes ltar//goms pas bde chen gsal mthar phyin//rkyen dang gnod pa ma lus pa//reg dang mthong thos dran pas kyang //
259a4(rgyud): bde chen thig la nyam su 'bar//bskal pa du mar gnas gyur cing //'byung ba lnga dang spyod yul kun//rang lus bde bar bsre ba 'grub//gsang ba'i lam la goms byed na//
259a5(rgyud): mtshon byed rig pa'i bde ba yis//lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba rtogs//mthar phyin lam gyi rim pa 'grub//dbang po dar zhing chags pa dang //bde chen mos pa'i rnal 'byor pas//e dang
259a6(rgyud): baM la gnas pa yi//byang chub rdo rje dril las 'byung //dngos po lhan cig skyes pa yis//ma lus bde bar rtogs byas la//phyi nang sbyor ba'i cho ga yis//gang zhig rtags dang ldan pa'i
259a7(rgyud): tshe//gsang ba'i phyag rgya bzhi ldan pas//bde chen mchog la rol par bya//ye shes nyi zla ro dang mnyam ldan pas//re dogs chad pa'i thig le 'byung //lhung med gnas dang
259b1(rgyud): thim pa dang //bdag po gdung can phrad pa las//nyin mtshan bral ba'i snang ba ltar//dus gcig nyi zla shar ba'i tshe//ma lus bde bas khyab gyur na//g.yo ba med pa'i thig le 'char//gal te nyams
259b2(rgyud): ba'i ltas byung na//thabs dang nyams dang rol pa yis//rim pa bzhin du bslab par bya//thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i//nyi zla 'dres pa'i thig le nyid//dngos bral lhan cig skyes pa
259b3(rgyud): nyi//rgyal ba kun gyi phyag rgya yin//lhan cig skyes la gnas pa'i tshe//ma lus bde chen ro gcig pu//bde chen phyag rgya gcig tu gnas//rdo rje pad+ma'i thig le nyid//sa ya bcu gsum//
259b4(rgyud): phrag gnyis rtsa//nyi zla 'dres pa'i gar thabs kyis//so so bde ba'i pho brang du//thig les gang bar spros pa'i tshe//sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lnga//nyams myong ro yis rgyas bta'o//
259b5(rgyud): lus kyi bde ba mthar phyin nas//rgyu rkyen rten 'brel las 'das pa'i//rig pa'i bde ba la gnas bya//gal te nyams na bsam pa'am//blta dang mnyan pa la sogs pas//bar chad med
259b6(rgyud): par bsgom par bya//rig pa bde bar gang smin pas//sgo gsum bde ba chen por smin//spyod yul rlung dang thig ler bcas//goms pa'i thabs la dbang bsgyur bas//rten dang brten par bcas
259b7(rgyud): pa yi//thig lo rlung la dbang bsgyur zhing //lha mo mi mo gnod sbyin mo//mkha'agro rnams la dbang byed nus//thig le dbab dang 'dzin pa dang //zlog dang sbyor la dbang bsgyur te//gal
260a1(rgyud): te mkha' la 'phrog pa'i tshe//dngos grub lam dang bral ba yin//phyin chad mchod dang nus pa sbyin//rang gi skabs ni ma gtogs pa//gzhan du thig le mi ltung zhing //dbang
260a2(rgyud): sbyar lam la goms par bya//nyi zla 'dras pa'i bde ba nyid//zag med snying por thim pa'i tshe//sems kyi bde bar rang snang zhing //sems kyi bde ba bar chad med//gsal byed stobs dang
260a3(rgyud): bral ba'i tshe//ma lus bde chen phyag rgya ste//lus sems mnyam du gnas pa nyid//tshad dang rgya dbyings ro las 'das//dpag med bde ba'i rol mo ni//sangs rgyas kun gyi dgyes chen
260a4(rgyud): te/ thig les don zab pa bral//bde chen nyams myong rgyun mi chad//rang nyid thig ler nyams myong bas//snying po'i thig la bral ba med//phra zhing rdul bral dri ma med//rdo rje thig le dril
260a5(rgyud): bu nyid/'bad rtsol med par rang snang ba//bral thob med pa'i ngo bor gnas//gang du yon tshogs kyis rab rgyas pa//bde chen chu rgyun lta bu'i rgyun las byung //tshogs gnyis yongs rdzogs/
260a6(rgyud): bdag gzhan lhun gyis grub//gzhan na med de rang nyid snang bar zad//rang bzhin gnas phyir gzhan nas 'ong ba med//zhen pa bzlog pas bdag zhal bdag gis mthong //rdo rje sems dpa'
260a7(rgyud): sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud chen po las lam gyi khyad par ma lus pa bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ga/ma lus kun gyi
260b1(rgyud): bsgrub bya nyid//phyag la bcu ma lus rdul snyed kyi//che ba'i yon bshad par bya//mthar phyin lnga yi rang bzhin//rtogs dang 'bras bur gnas mod kyi//mthong dang goms dang grub pa nyid//thun mong 'bras/
260b2(rgyud): bur yang dag bshad//yang dag mthar phyan 'bras bur ni//thabs chen thabs las byung ba yi//yid bzhin nor bu rin po che//dpag med yon lhun rdzogs pa//tshad dang dmigs pa las 'das
260b3(rgyud): pa/bsam yas ldan gyis grub pa ste//na mkha'i mtha' ltar dpag med pa//thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes na//ma lus mchog gi gter gyur pa//zad 'phel med pa'i nor bu ste//
260b4(rgyud): ma lus kun la mnyam du gnas//sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin ni//rgyu dbyings tshad las 'das pa yi//dag dang ma dag ci snang yang //blang der phyogs ris yongs kyis med//rang 'byung
260b5(rgyud): 'od gsal maN Da la la//ma lus gcig gi rang bzhin te//thugs rje'i byin brlabs tshad med pas//ma lus bsam pa skang bar mdzad//rang byung ye shes lhun grub ni//chos rnams kun gyi
260b6(rgyud): ngo bo bas//ma lus phyogs med rang snang yang //zhen dang chung ngu byas pa med//sa dpa lam la sogs pa yi//theg pa kun gyi 'bras bu ni//rang rang ltos pa'i mthar thug kyang //tshe mchog
260b7(rgyud): lhun thung mnyam dang bral//skad cig nyid la lhun rdzogs pa'o//sangs rgyas dpag med yon rnams//rigs bdag rdo rje 'chang tshan gyis//ye shes lha mo rol dbang gis//nyi zla'i bde ba
261a1(rgyud): sngon thob ste//rdo rje 'chang gi sa la bkod//dpag med rgyal ba thams cad kyi//'gro ba'i gdul bya mtha' yas pas//sku gsung thugs kyang de bzhin te//bzhugs tshul dang /
261a2(rgyud): med rnam par dang //che ba'i yon+ta lhun rdzogs pa'i//sangs rgyas drug pa'i rang bzhin te//na mkha'i mthas gtugs mtshan pa yi//bde chen ye shes rgyas par gnas//bcu drug zhag gis rdzogs
261a3(rgyud): ba ltar//ma lus rdzogs pa'o ye shes nyid//sa mtha'i nyes pa kun bral ba//kun gyi yon bdag nyid gnas//sangs rgyas zhing khams mtha' yas pa'i//na mkha'i mtha' thug bar du ni//
261a4(rgyud): gdul bya'i rdul snyed gnas kyi bar//skad cig 'du 'bral med par gnas//bcud 'dus thig le chen po ni//bde ba'i zag med thig le ste//a dang bde bar 'brel pa yis//ma lus
261a5(rgyud): khyab pa'i tshul du bzhugs//thig le'i bye brag brgyad bcu'i rtsa//bcud 'dus gsang ba'i thig le'i ro//ma skyes mnyam la gnas 'gyur zhing //ma lus gang ba'i tshul gyis ni//zhing
261a6(rgyud): khams phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa//zag med thig ler ro gcig pas//na mkha'i gzugs can de bzhin nyid//sku bzhi 'dus pa'i khams thig le//dngas ma lnga 'dus snying po/
261a7(rgyud): can//gsum 'dus mi 'gyur snying po ste//bdes gang bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis po//thig le ro yis gang phye ba//dpag med sku gsung yon thugs//bsam gyis mi khyab yang snang
261b1(rgyud): ba|thig lce phyag rgya bsam mi khyab/phyi nang dngas skyigs mu lus pa//rang 'byung dngas ma'i thig le nyid//gzhan med phyogs med rang snang ba//phyogs med bde ba chen po nyid//gsang ba'i
261b2(rgyud): thig le chen po ni//yon rdzogs pa'i ngo bo ste//bde 'a chen po'i snying po las//dpag med yon rnam par 'phrul//bde ba chen po'i thig le ne//'du 'phro bral bas zag pa med//phyogs ris 'das pas/
261b3(rgyud): ma khyab med//thog mtha' med par mnyam pa yin//rgyal ba kun gyi rang bzhin te//thig le ro la mnyam bzhugs pas//nam mkha'i mthas gtugs chos thams cad//bde ba chen por
261b4(rgyud): gsal bar myong //mtshan dang dpe byad tshad 'das pa//rang la rdzogs pa'i thig le nyid//ji snyed bde ba'i rol pa kun//rang la rdzogs pa nyid gnas//sangs rgyas kun gyi bde ba ni//
261b5(rgyud): rang 'byung thig le chen po ste//A li kA li zhu ba las//na mkha' khyab pa'i bde ba 'byung //gsang ba'i thig le kun gyi rgyu//na mkha'i thig le gsang ba'i ngang //khyab pa chen po
261b6(rgyud): phyogs cha med//lus gnas rang bzhin mi skyes pa//bde ba'i dbang phyug sku gsung thugs//nam mkha' lta bur dpag tu med//thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i//gsang ba'i thig
261b7(rgyud): li bzhugs pa'i gnas//dpag med ting 'obru rdul snyed kyi//rgyal ba kun dang ldan cig tu//ma lus bde ba chen po'i ro//lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin gyis//ma gsung rid pra taM/
262a1(rgyud): btud das//mi 'dzin lo spyod chen po'i gnas//rang 'byung nyizla rten gyir//ma spangs 'dus pas 'du 'bral med//gsang ba'i thig lo bcud 'dus pa//nam ju' ga
262a2(rgyud): ba bde du'i ro//gnyis med 'khril pa'i stobs las byung //mkhar dbyings byang chub 'byor pa'i sems//ma bting ma spros thig le che//na mkha' rgyas pa'i mtha' bzhin du//
262a3(rgyud): bde ba'i tshad kyang dpag tu med//yab yum+b+ha gnas pa'i grangs tshad kyang //na mkha'i khams kyi rdul snyed de//ro re'ang bde ba'i dkyil 'khor ni//rdul snyed na mkha'i mtha' dang
262a4(rgyud): mnyam//yab yum gnyis med 'brel pa yi//thabs dang shes rab bcud 'dus pa//gang yang mi sgrib thig le'i ro//snad gsum mtshan ma las 'das pa//sangs rgyas rin chen
262a5(rgyud): kun gyi bcud//bye ba rdul snyed grangs 'das pa'i//ma lus kun dang lhan cig tu//mos dang chags pa'i khyad par gyis//cha lugs mtha' yas snang ba ni//la lar chags
262a6(rgyud): par lta ba'i tshul//de bzhin 'jam par smra ba dang //la lar 'khyud cing lta ba ste//la lar sen thabs zhal sbyor zhing //la lar mnye dang rdebs dang 'dud//'gyed dang 'dud
262a7(rgyud): dang 'gying po mi//dkar 'dzin sbyin dang skye ba sbyin//'o dang 'tshor dang rgod pa dag//sna tshogs rim pa 'di dag gis//ma chags bdag chags byed cing //chags
262b1(rgyud): sbya du nyams par byed//tha skar myur du 'angs byed cing //'di chen lo zag skyed par byed//bye ba rtul skyed bcas pa yi//lha dang lha mo 'khor bcas pas//steb cir 'dzum pas ldan rtog tu//
262b2(rgyud): ril cing glu ni len par byed//oM ma ho sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin bde bo che//lhan cig skyes pa mkha' ltar rdul dang bral ba ste//rdo rje pad+mar bcug bskyod pas ni brtags pa'i skad/
262b3(rgyud): nug/ma lus khyab pas mkha' ltar dga' bar byas kyang dbang po rlung gis rlabs//bde ba'i sa bon zag pa rnams ni slar yang ldang bar byed//rgyu ba rnam par chad pa'i kha sbyor bde chen ni//
262b4(rgyud): na mkha'i rgyu mnyam yun yang de srid bar du gnas pa ste//'dod pa'i yon lnga ni lha mo khyod la tshang ba ste//bdag ni khyod la bsten cing dga' bas mig brtag ma lus rgyal ba'i zhing du blta/
262b5(rgyud): gang tshe 'gro ba'i tha mal bder spyod yul la chags par zhugs pa na//dga' dang bde dang rtse gcig yid 'ong 'dod par rab zhugs pas//dbang po gnyis rol nyi zla phrad cing bde chen mchog
262b6(rgyud): skyes che//skye rga nu 'chi re dogras ngo tsha mi tshwa grags pa'i chos brgyad chod kyang byis pas mi sheso//gang zhig thabs dang shes rab bral bas gsang ba'i don 'jug pa//rgya mtsho la ni
262b7(rgyud): so bon bta bo bzhin 'dod pa'i 'bras bu mi 'byung ste//nyan thos rang rgyal byang chub sems dpa' tha skabs te//rgyal ba nyid kyang thabs dang shes rab bral bas byang chub myu gu gtan nas
263a1(rgyud): skams to//'dzin rtswa ru blangs pa yis//rdul skyed bcas pa'i 'bar tshogs rnams//rang rang brgyan dang gas dor ste//dpa' bo ska ma'i tshul 'dzin cing //da
263a2(rgyud): 'khor phyogs bcu'i rdul snyed du//glu dang gar ni sna tshogs kyis//tha mal yid rtog bcad nas ni//bde chen yid ni 'phrog par mdzad//de bzhin dkyil 'khor bsam yas dang //zhing
263a3(rgyud): thabs bde ba rlud 'byung ba//'dul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs pa//dpag med mtha' yas cir snang yang //rang byung ye shes byang chub sems//thig le gcig gi ngo bo las//mdzod
263a4(rgyud): gar thabs sna tshogs kyis//'dul ba'i dbang du ci yang spro//thabs la thabs kyis dbang sgyur bas//thubs chen thabs las byung ba yi//ngo mtshar ya mtshan rmad po che//sangs rgyas kun gyi
263a5(rgyud): rang bzhin to//thabs chen sgyu ma rmad du byung //sgyu ma skye 'gag med pa'i dbyings//sgo gsung yon+d+ra 'phrin las thugs//ma lus kun 'dus rnam par dag/thams cad rang rig byed
263a6(rgyud): chub sems//kun nas 'khyil pa'i dkyil 'khor ste//kun gyi rang bzhin 'byung gnas nyid//bya ba byed la byas pa med//zad dang 'phel ba med pa yi//dngos grub gter chen bsam
263a7(rgyud): mi khyab//ye shes thig le rang snang ba//bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog/mtha' dbus med pa'i ye shes ni//gcig ces 'di zhes brjod du med//na mkha' rang byung
263b1(rgyud): rtag pa ltar//'pho 'gyur med pas de bzhin//na mkha' mtha' dbus med pa bzhin//rang 'byung ye shes thog mtha' med//ma byung ma skyes byang chub sems//ye shes nyi ma'o 'dra ltar gsal//
263b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas sems can grol thar kun//ma lus rang rig 'od gsal bas//rang 'thung ye shes rang snang phyir//mkhyen dang bsgribs po chung zad med//mkhyen pa'i ye shes nya gcig la//
263b3(rgyud): rang gi tshe shas chos bral bas//nam mkha'i mtha' thug chos rnams kun//skad cig ma 'dres tshul du mkhyen//rang rig byang chub sems nyid las//mthon dman blang dor ma dmigs pas//
263b4(rgyud): 'khor ba'i ngo bor rang snang yang //ma chags skyon med pad+ma 'dra//dpag med yon ngo bo rnams//rang 'byung reg pa rang snang bas//ma lus ngo mtshar rgya mtsho rnams//rang snang gzhan las
263b5(rgyud): thob bya med//byin brlabs cho 'phrul rmad kyi chos//rang 'byung nyid las rnam par spro//tshul ni rnam pa sna tshogs te//dag dang ma dag khyad par gyis//ngo bo gcig lis ma g.yos
263b6(rgyud): kyang //mos pas mthong tshul de bzhin//gsung ni na mkhas khyab par ni//phyogs bcu khyab par sgra sgrogs pa//mos pa bzhin du sna tshogs pa'i//bskum yas 'dul thabs sna
263b7(rgyud): tshogs snang //thugs ni me lus mkhyen pa'i thugs//phan pa dang bcas brtser ldan po'i//mngon shes mkhyen pa'i ye shes spro//ye shes thugs li khyad par med//yon+ta tshad khyad
264a1(rgyud): bral ba ste//na mkha'i nor bu katIr 'chang gA/dpag med bsam pa bskang ba'i phyir//byin brlal yid bzhin nor bu'i tshul//phrin las byin brlabs rang snang ba//'chu
264a2(rgyud): 'od med pa'i don tshul gyis//dpag bsam bum dang rin chen gyi//bye byed med par don rnams rdzogs//mi lus spros pa rnam dag cing //rang 'byung rig pa mtha' dbus med//ma lus
264a3(rgyud): kun gyi 'byung gnas te//bde ba chen po chos kyi sku//'dod pa'i long spyod thams cad ni//gnyis med dang la kun rdzogs pas//de nyid tshad bral mnga' brnyes pas//long spyod yongasu rdzogs//
264a4(rgyud): ba'i skud/ da sku gcig thig le'i ngo bo las//'jig rten khams ni thams cad du//ji ltar 'dul ba'i tshul bzhin du//rnam par 'phrul pa sprul pa'i sku//ma byung ma skyes don rtogs pas/
264a5(rgyud): ma lus dbyer med rdo rje nyid//mi 'jigs gnyis po kun bral ba//rdo rje sku zhes rnam par bstan//gang du mngon par byang chub pa'i//'od gsal na mkha' mtha' dbus med//sku bzhi
264a6(rgyud): mtha' yos mya reg pa//dang po mngon par byang chub pa'o//ma lus dbye ba mtha' spangs shing //de ltar kun dang mnyam par gnas//don gyis ma lus khyab 'gyur ba//brjod med don/
264a7(rgyud): gyi gsung nyid//sku dang phyag rgya gzigaso tshul gyis//ting 'dzin dgongs pas 'dul ba la//brjod med tshul gyis gang ston pa//brda' yi gsung du rnam par bstan//gang yang
264b1(rgyud): rlung ba mthong thos tshe//dpa' bos bltas pas g.yul selA ltar//dngos pos byang chub na mkhar rtogs//byin brlabs rtogs pa'i gsung zhus bya//brang gi don nu gang snang ba//gnyen po bar chad
264b2(rgyud): mi gnas shing /gzhan dag phras byed mi thub pa//zil gyis gnon pa'i gsung du brjod//tshig gcig brjod pas chog mtha' yas//mos pa de snyed rnam grol cing //yon rgya mtsho phun sum
264b3(rgyud): tshogs//'di ni brjod pa tshig gi gsung //ji snyed mang por rnam spros kyang //chos kyi dbyings la khyad par med//rtog la rnam rtog mtshan ma yang //mi rtog ye shes grol ba'i thugs//gnyis
264b4(rgyud): med bde ba chen po yis//'dod pa'i yod spyod lnga la rol//ma lus bde bar snang ba'i tshe//'di ni bde ba chen po'i thugs//bdag gzhan phyi nang mi mnga' yang //rang 'byung gnyis kyi phyog
264b5(rgyud): bral bas/gdul bya'i bsam pa kun mkhyen pas//'gro ba ma lus bsgral ba'i thugs//ji snyed rig pa'i don snang zhing //ma lus kun gyi ngo bo la//skye 'jigs gnyen po gdod nas
264b6(rgyud): sto//mi 'gyur rdo rje thugs rjes bya//dpog med na mkha'i gling khams dang //che ba'i khyad par bstan pa'i gdan//zag pa med pa'i rkyen rnams dang //yo shes 'bar ba'i gzhal yas
264b7(rgyud): khang //mtha' dbus med par khyab pa yi//'od zer tshogs ni rnam par snang //gzhan yang yon chen po ni//mtha' dbus med pa'i na mkha' ltar//dpag cing gzhal bar mi nus te/
265a1(rgyud): zag med che ba'i lcen snang //gzhan yang mdzad pa'i phrin las na//gdul bya'i yul ni ji snyed pa/mdzad pa'i sgo ni bsam yas te//mthar thug med par rnam
265a2(rgyud): par snang //'di dag bsdus pas bshad byi na/zhi rgyas dbang drag la sogs pas//mtha' yas bzhis ni rnam par bsdus//lhun gyis grub par kun kyang 'grub/
265a3(rgyud): nador ni 'bras bu'i rnam grangs ni//bsdus las nyi shuHljang gnas//rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud chen po las lhun gyis grub pa ma lus pa bshad pa'i le'u
265a4(rgyud): ste bcu gnyis pa'o////de nas gsang bdag rdo rje 'dzin//dpag med rgyal bas dbang bskur ba//gsang ba'i bdag po sngags kyi mdzod//gter 'dzin rgyal po stobs
265a5(rgyud): po che//rang gi lag gi rdo rje nyid//dga' zhing mgu bas gsor byas te//bye ba rdul snyed bcas pa yis//rab tu bskor ba byas pa yis//'jig rten drug tu bcas bdag
265a6(rgyud): 'khrugs shing rnam par g.yo mdzad do//kun tu rab g.yo rnam par ga yo//stong gsum 'jig rten 'khor yug bcas//'od dang sgra yis gang mdzad//rmad 'byung sku gsung
265a7(rgyud): thugs rnams kyi//ngo mtshar cho 'phrul rnam par snang //ngo mtshar cho 'phrul rmad 'byung gi/phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa dang //'dod yon lnga yis khyab mdzad//rgyal ba'i
265b1(rgyud): tshogs// mnyes par bya/kun kyadu dga' zhing rnam pa mas/ khams rdul dang mnyam pa mo//'khor tshogs rnams ni bstod pa'ang / rdzogs sa ni zla ru thungs//oM U la
265b2(rgyud): laho//sgyu 'phrul dri ba'i thugs ni mi skye ye shes bde ba'i thugs/me d+h+r-ig gsal ba'i zugs ni kun la khyab par gnas//gang yang dbyer med 'dus byas ma yin 'dus ma byas ma ni
265b3(rgyud): 'jig med//dam pa'i thugs la byung tshor ga yo 'gog ci yang med pas bde ho//sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i sku ni sna tshogs 'od 'bar bde ba'i sku/sna tshogs mtha' yas ji ltar snang ba ngo bos dben
265b4(rgyud): de nyid 'du ba'i thabs kyis de ltar yid 'phrog tshim pa'i sku//mtha' yas sna tshogs bye brag ji ltar gsal yang na mkha'i ngang du bye brag med to/sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i yon+d+ra yid bzhin nor bu
265b5(rgyud): rin po che mi zad par ldan rgyan gyi 'khor lo dpag med rgyas par snang //'gro ba rnams kyi yid 'phrog bltas pas chog shes med par mdzes//rgyal ba ma lus yon rdzogs par snang
265b6(rgyud): la de dag mtha' thug med ho//sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i gsung ni zab cing rgya cher na mkha' 'dra//ma lus go zhing tshim mdzad rdo rje'i sgra 'byin snyan sgrogs pa//rdo rje sgra chen mtha' yas mes dang /
265b7(rgyud): 'thad pa de bzhin rnam par snang ho//sgyu 'phral dra ba'i phrin las sna tshogs bya ba lhun gyis grub//bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed 'gro ba ma lus kun 'dul ba//thabs dang shes rab 'du/
266a1(rgyud): 'bral med pa'i rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs 'di ni rnam par rol to//de nas rgyal mchog skyes bu yis//rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa//bya ba rdul snyed bcas pa la//gsang /
266a2(rgyud): ba 'di ni gtad par mdzod//nga yi gsang ba'i snying po 'di//dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//bston pa kun gyi rang bzhin te//ma lus kun gyi thabasu snang //gsang sngags rdo rje
266a3(rgyud): theg pa ste//dpal ldan sgyu 'phrul thugs kyi rgyud//chos rnams ma lus kun snang ba//gsang ba'i me long thabs kyi rgyud//rgyal ba rdul snyed kun 'dus nas//dam pa 'di la sngags par
266a4(rgyud): mdzad//sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud chen po//zab mo'i lung gi nges don 'di//rigs chad dman pa'i gang zag gis//thams cad la ni me long ltar//bltas kyang gzugs brnyan mi snang bya///
266a5(rgyud): ston pa gnyis la rgyab phyogs shing //brtags pa phyi rol chos la zhen//slob dpon la ni brnyas byed dang //rdo rje spun la sdang sems che//zab mo'i don la skur byed cing //gsang rgyud don
266a6(rgyud): la 'phya ba dang //ser sna rang phyogs chags pa che//dad dang dam tshig mi ldan zhing //rgyal srid rin chen mi gtong ba'i//phyi nang gnyis lha'i gang zag la//bskal pa zhing gi rdul
266a7(rgyud): snyed du//lus sems bral ba'i byed gyur kyang //gsang ba'i glegs bam mi bstan na//dbang dang dngos grub rnams kyang min//rmongs pas gal te byin na ni//de nyid mnar
266b1(rgyud): med dmyal bar ltung //dad dang dam tshig ldan pa yis//phun sum tshogs pa kun gtong zhing //dam pa'i yo byad ldan gyur pas//lus dang srog la'ang mi lta na//dman par 'ang spyad nams kyang
266b2(rgyud): min//theg pa tshi la mos pa dang //brtul zhugs snying rtser gus par ldan//rdo rje slob dpon bsnyen bkur zhing //skyon dang smyo ba yongasu brjod//bskal par 'grogs kyang yod mi 'khrug/nyes
266b3(rgyud): dang legs pa ci la yang //ngo mtshar skyo ba'i 'du shes med//rang bzhin bzang dang tshul shis dang //'grogs pas dug nad mi ldang ba'i//dam pa 'di la gsang ba gtang //slob dpon man
266b4(rgyud): ngag mi ldan cing //gsang ba'i don la ma goms pas//rang rtags log pa'i tshad ma yis//gsang ba'i sbas don gtan ma 'bebs//blun po mun pas chod pa rnams//log par
266b5(rgyud): zhen pa'i rjes 'brengs nas//mthong ba'i chos la dmyal bar smin//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi//phyag rgya gsang chen snying po 'di/ma lus kun gyi gsang yin pas//rtogs
266b6(rgyud): nas gsal bar gang byed pa//dbang dang dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa ste//bdag dang gzhan don lhun gyis grub//rdul skyed zhing la bsnyen bkur zhing //tshogs kyi bla ma bsten byas pa'i//'bras
266b7(rgyud): bu gsang cher 'di yin te//de bas rgyal bas gcig gi yul//rnyed dang bkur bstis 'tshe ba yi//brags pa'i stobs ldan rnam par spangs//a ho rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o//rdo rje
267a1(rgyud): sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud las mthar phyin pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o////rdo rje sems pa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba rdo rje sems dpa' gas
267a2(rgyud): ba me long gi rgyud chen po rdzogaso////rgya gar gyi mkhan po bai ma li mi tra dang /ban de dz+nyA na ku mA ras bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//srad nes bi ma la mi tra nyid la bram ze mo
267a3(rgyud): dge slong mas yang dang yang du nan du zhus pa 'di gzhan la spel nang ma tshig nyam s+ho///bod skad du/gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa/bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang
267a4(rgyud): po la phyag 'tshalo//'di skad bshad pa'i dus gcig na//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das long spyod chen po phyogs bcu dus
267a5(rgyud): bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid ma lus mi lus lus pa med pa thams cad dang so so ma yin tha mi dad dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin te//
267a6(rgyud): 'og min gyi gnas mtha' dang dbus med pa na gzhi chad med pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo khyab par sprul ba la ye shes rin po che sna tshogs 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang /rgya phyo/
267a7(rgyud): bcur yongasu ma chad pa/yon+ta dpag tu med par rgyas pa'i phyir gru bzhir gyur pa//lhag pa'i ye shes rin po che'i blo 'bur gyis mdzes pa/rtse mo phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs
267b1(rgyud): rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa thams cad so so ma yin ngo bo nyid gcig pa'i ye shes kun tu 'khyil pa//ye shes ngasam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che dbyibs dang kha dog la sogs te/rnam pa dra
267b2(rgyud): dad pa'i bye brag dang khyad du gyur pa'i tshad dpag tu med pa/ye shes rin po che sna tshogs kyi phreng ba dang /chun 'phyang dang /shar bu'i rgyan dang /gzugs sna tshogaso dang /sgra sna tshogs dang /dri sna tshogs dang
267b3(rgyud): ro sna tshogs dang /reg bya sna tshogs kyis phyogs bcur 'khrigs par rang byung la//mi bsgrib par gsal ba'i rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pas klubs pa/rnam par thar pa bzhi'i sgo nas 'jug
267b4(rgyud): pa'i sgo khyud can//rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi rta babs dang ldan pa'i phyi dang nang med par kun tu yang nang du gyur pa na mi 'jigs pa seng ge'i khri dang //stobs kyi glang po'i khri dang //rdzu 'phrul gyi
267b5(rgyud): rta'i khri dang /dbang gi rma bya'i khri dang /thogs pa med pa na mkha'o' lding ti/khri dang /rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor dang /gos pa med pa pad+ma rin po che'i gdan la
267b6(rgyud): sku mdun dang rgyab med pa thams cad du yang zhal thal le bar gsal zhing mtshan dang dpe byad ldan pa//bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad du sku gsung thugs sna tshogs par kun tu
267b7(rgyud): snang ba rda lhun gyis grub pa'i sku gsung thugs chen po las thabs dang shes rab kyi zhabs gnyis mnyam pa'i brtul zhugs kyi daskyil mo krung du bzhugs pa/ye shes drug gi phyag/
268a1(rgyud): ye shes rin po che'i phyag 'bar ba can//sku gsung thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbu gsum dang ldan pa 'di lta ste/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par sh+lo/
268a2(rgyud): pa'i rgyal po dang /de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi rgyal po dang /de bzhin gshegs pa tshor ba'i rgyal po dang /de bzhin gshegs pa 'du shes kyi rgyal po dang /de bzhin gshegs pa 'du/
268a3(rgyud): byed kyi rgyal po dang /de dag kun kyang mthing ka dang /dkar po dang /ser po dang /leb rgan dang /ljang khu'i mdog tu 'tsher ba/btsun mo dam pa'i snang ba'i dbyings dang /sra ba'i dbyings dang /
268a4(rgyud): mnyen pa'i dbyings dang /dro ba'i dbyings dang /bskyod pa'i dbyings la sogs pa btsun me'i tshogs dang gnyisu med pa'i chos kyis dbyings kun tu mtha' yas par khyab pa ni 'di lta ste/
268a5(rgyud): dper na til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang nas khyab par bzhug so//de nas byang chub chen po rdo rje mthong ba dang /byang chub chen po rdo rje thos pa dang /byang chub chen po rdo rje sgom pa dang /byang
268a6(rgyud): chub chen pa rdo rje myong ba dang /btsun mo mthong bar bya ba dang /mnyan par bya ba dang /bsnam par bya ba dang /myong bar bya ba'i tsho gas dang /byang chub chen po rdo rje mthong byed dang /byang chub
268a7(rgyud): tshon po rdo rje thos byed dang /byang chub chen po rdo rje sdom byed dang /byang chub chen po rdo rje myong byed dang /btsun mo 'das pa dang /da ltar 'byung ba dang /me byin pa'i tshogs dang /'dzem
268b1(rgyud): po chen mo reg pa dang /'jams pa chen po reg byed dang /'joms pa chen po reg shes dang /btsun mo rtag par ma yin pa dang /chad par ma yin pa dang /bdag tu ma yin pa dang /mtshon mar ma yin pa
268b2(rgyud): la sogs pa de lta bu'i tshogs brjod kyis mi lang ba dang gnyisu med par bzhug so//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i chags dang /gnyis med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba 'di nyid//
268b3(rgyud): skra dang /gsung dang thugs dang yon phrin las rdo rje las phyung //e/e/e ma ho//de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid dang /dbang sgyur ye shes dkyil 'khor thugs rang rang snang ba nyid ting 'dzin gzugs
268b4(rgyud): brnyan sgyu ma rnam dag gsal ba ni sku dang gsung dang thugs yon phrin las sel med pa'i yid bzhin nor bu rin po che mi zad par ldan pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo rdo rje mchog gi gnas nyid//zhes rdo rje
268b5(rgyud): gsang ba'i tshig tu'o///gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das byed pa po rdo rje yid kun tu bzang po thams cad ma
268b6(rgyud): lus pa'i rang bzhin gyi tshul rdo rjes btsun mo chos bya ba mo kun tu bzang mo la 'jug par gyur te tsha du brjod pa 'di brjod do//oM chos kyi chos nyid shes bya'i dbyings//kun tu bzang mo
268b7(rgyud): bde ba'i yum//ma g.yos rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ni//bdag yan bdag gi spyod yul ba//phyag rgya sna tshags so sor gsal//nub phyogs 'og min gnas mchog tu/ma chags
269a1(rgyud): pad+ma'i gdan bting ba//dus gsum rgyal ba bzhugs pa'i gnas//rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhi la//phyag rgya bzhi dang yang dag ldan//dbang dang skal min gsal ba'i phyir//
269a2(rgyud): nang dang phyi rol lcags dang ldan//rgyal ba yongs kyi sbas pa yi//sus kyang gting dpag dka' ba de//kun tu bzang po nyid kyis gzigs shes brjod pas btsun mo bya ba mo chos
269a3(rgyud): kun tu bzang mo la 'jug par gyur to//zhugs nas btsun mo bya ba mo chos kun tu bzang mos bcom ldan 'das yid kun tu bzang po dang gnyi su med pa'i long spyod bde ba la
269a4(rgyud): mnyam par gnas te//che du brjod pa brjod//sems kyi sems nyid byed pa'i gtso/kun tu bzang po rdo rje yid//ye shes drug gi rang bzhin te//shar phyogs mngon dga' bsaM
269a5(rgyud): las na//ni la lta bu'i gter 'byin pa//gsang 'dus 'phrul gyi lde mig gis//rnam par thar pa'i sgo phye nas//byang chub mchog gis nang gdan dgrol//mnyam sbyor pad+ma'i
269a6(rgyud): gdan lnga bzhugs//'gro don byang chub sems bskyed nas//'gro lnga skye bzhi dbang du bsdus//sku gsung thugs gnas dbang bskur to//zhes brjod pas thams cad mnyam pa
269a7(rgyud): chen po'i tshul rdo rje nyid du gsal bar gyur to//zhugs pas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa thams cad gcig gi rang bzhin dbyer med pas de bzhin ga
269b1(rgyud): pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la che du brjod pa 'di brjod//oM ma ho rdo rje phung po'i yan lag ni//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasna lnga ru grags//skye mched khams rnams mang po kun//byang chub sems dpa'/
269b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor nyid//sa chu spyan dang mA ma kI//me rlung gos dkar sgrol ma ste//na mkha' dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma//srid gsum ye nas sangs rgyas shing //thams cad ma lus ches cog/sangs/
269b3(rgyud): rgyas nyid las gzhan ma yin//sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan pa'i chos//sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi rnyed//zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par gyur to//de nas btsun mo
269b4(rgyud): bya ba mo chos kun tu bzang mos bcom ldan 'das yid kun tu bzang po dang gnyisu med par gyur nas tshe du brjod pa 'di badz+rod//e ma ho phyogs bcu'i stong khams ye shes dben//srid pa
269b5(rgyud): gsum nyid dag pa'i zhing //snyigs ma lnga nyid bde ldan nas//phung po lnga nyid mngon sangs rgyas//thams cad mchog gi snying po bas//gzhan du rgyal bas chos mi 'tshal//nyid las gzhan
269b6(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i chos//btsal kyang rgyal bas mi rnye do zhes brjod pas thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas par de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to//gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las
269b7(rgyud): gleng ba sgreng ba'i 'bru ste gnyis pa'o///de nas gnyi med pa'i bdag nyid chen pos ye shes sangs rgyas pa'o sems ye shesu bskyed pa 'di gsungaso//e ma ho ngo mtshar
270a1(rgyud): rmad kyi chos//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang //skye ba med las thams cad skyes//skyes pa nyid ni skye ba med//e ma ho ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun
270a2(rgyud): gyi gsang //'gags pa med las thams cad 'gag/'gag pa nyid ni 'gag pa med//e ma hi ngo mtshor rmad kyi chos//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang //gnas pa med las tha~Md
270a3(rgyud): gnas//gnas pa nyid na gnas pa med//e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang //dmigs pa med las thams cad dmigs//dmigs pa nyid na dmigs
270a4(rgyud): pa med//e ma ho ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang //'gro 'ong med las 'gro dang 'ang //'gro 'ong nyid na 'gro 'ong med ces brjod pas de bzhin gshegs
270a5(rgyud): pa thams cad dang btsun mo'i tshogs thams cad mnyes pas khyab par gyur to//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pas che du brjod pa 'di brjod//oM
270a6(rgyud): ma ho ye nas gsang ba'i chos//sna tshogs snang ba rang bzhin gsang //ngo bo nyid kyis rab tu gsang //gzhan du min la shin tu gsang //zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
270a7(rgyud): ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i ngo bo nyid du gcig pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas dbyer med na//'gro ba'i rnam par rtog pa ma rig pa la 'gro ba lnga'i rigs bsam gyis mi khyab par smin pa la
270b1(rgyud): du ldan pa sa su rgya kyi shes chen ba smonan su ma bad pa 'do da/na tu drug shegs stong brolas//nga gonam galas sa smras// nags sa su da la sto dang //rnas
270b2(rgyud): dang sdug bsngal la sogs pa//bdag dang bdag gis so sor 'dzin//smras kyang mi 'ching bcings med//bcing bar bya ba med ma yin//nam rtag bdag tu 'dzin pa yin//nan gyi sa ma
270b3(rgyud): mdu ba zad de//bcings med rnam par grol med pa'i//ye nas rgyun rdzogs sangs rgyas chos//bstan phyi sprob sna tshogs mdzod ces de bzhin paM shugs pa nyid la che du //gsang de'i snying sa
270b4(rgyud): de kho na nyid nges pa las don dam pa dang kun rdzob kyi byang chub kyi sems ye shesu bskyed pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'i////de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las thugs rje chen po
270b5(rgyud): byin gyis rlabs zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i skyes bu thub pa drug de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las bton to//bton nas kyang las kyi dbang gis snrel gzhi dang //yan man gyi
270b6(rgyud): 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i re rer thub pa chen po bcom ldan 'das re res 'dul ba rnam gzhis 'gro ba lnga'i don mdzad bltams pa dang /
270b7(rgyud): rab tu byung ba dang /dka' thub mdzad pa dang /sangs rgyas pa dang /bdud brtul ba dang /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /tshe 'phrul chen bston pa dang /mya ngan las 'das pa la sogs pa/
271a1(rgyud): ston pa'i thub pa dus pani kun du mkhyen pa dang /thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud tu kun tu mkhyen pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi spyan gyis kun tu gzigs pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi bas+thAn+ta/
271a2(rgyud): kyis kun tu gsan pa dang //rdzu 'phrul gyi tshogs kun tu don spyod pa dang //zag pa med pas kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa rdzogs pa'i myongangon par shes pa drug dang /kun tu sku bsam gyis mi
271a3(rgyud): khyab pa dang /kun tu thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /kun tu zhal bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /kun tu gsung bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa/bsam gyis mi khyab pa grangs med/
271a4(rgyud): bar phyogs bcur snang bar gyur to//de ltar snang bar gyur nas ji snyed pa'i thub pa chen po snying rje'i go 'phang chen po thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/'dul ba'i dbang gis lha dang mi'i theg
271a5(rgyud): pa dang /nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang /bla na med pa'i theg pas ma rig pa'i rnam par rtog pa nyon mongs pa stong
271a6(rgyud): phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i gnyen por chos kyi phung po stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi gsungaso//gsung //gsung bar 'gyur//de dag thams cad kyang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i phyi nang
271a7(rgyud): gi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'dzin pa 'khrul pa la dgongs pa dang /las dang las kyi 'bras bu chud mi za ba dang /las dang las kyi 'bras bus mi gos par mi 'gyur
271b1(rgyud): bdang /gos pa ring ba'i sbyin pa'i mthar drug/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams kyis 'khor ba'i spyan dang /mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon+ta bstan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la tshwa
271b2(rgyud): brjod pa 'di brjed//e ma ho/dkyil 'khor bsam yas par//snying po bla med ji snyed pa'i//gzhan gyis mi 'phrogs rang bzhin rgya laM//mtha' dang bral bas bdag med pa'o//de nas de
271b3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi cha du brjod pa 'di brjod//e ma ho ji srid 'jig rten 'khrul pa'i chos//ma rig rtog pa'i gzung 'dzin gyis//stong gi 'jig rten bsam yas par//phyi nang
271b4(rgyud): rten 'brel gnyisu 'khor//rtog pa'i bgra chags stug po yin//mi mthun bde sdug myong bar 'gyur//de nyid ji bzhin dbyings nyid dang //rang bzhin bdag med tshul gcig ste//rang bzhin
271b5(rgyud): nyid la nyams pa med//yang dag sgyu ma'i tshul gi nye su/bdag dang bdag gi gzhan med//de nyid ngo bo nyid dbyings pas//rnam dag dbyings nyid tshul gcig/bdag dang bdag gi
271b6(rgyud): gzhan rnams ni//log par rtog po tsam nyid las//phra zhing zab pa yod ma yin//log rtog nyid la nyid spyod//gzhan du g.yo ba ci yang med//log rtog rgyu 'bras rgyun nyid kyang //
271b7(rgyud): gzhi rtsa med de skad cig ma//rnam par dag pa'i dbyings nyid tshul//nyid la dbang sgyur nyid spyod phyir//bdag dang gzhan dang rtog pa'i rgyun//rnam dag bla med theg pa'i mchog/theg pa bzhi yis
272a1(rgyud): nges 'byung la//theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas//yang dag rtogs pas rab brtags na//rang bzhin med la cing yang 'grub//sangs rgyas mya ngan yod mi 'das/
272a2(rgyud): chos kyang nub par mi 'gyur te//ma rig smin mdzad gdul ba'i phyir//'byung gnas mya ngan 'da' bar ston//'dul ba mdo sde chos mngon dang /dam tshig sgrub dang grub pa dang //sku dang /
272a3(rgyud): gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud//ji snyed 'jig rten mtha' klas par//phyogs bcur kun tu rab grags pa//gsang ba'i snying po las 'phros te//rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po 'di sde snod//
272a4(rgyud): kun dang rgyud kun gyi//ston pa'i thub pa bsam yas pa//'byung gnas gtan la nges par 'bebs//chos rnams ming du btags pa tsam//ston pas don dang 'thun phyogasu//
272a5(rgyud): meming nyid chog tu rtags nas bstan//ston cing tshig la dngos po med ces brjod pas/chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis lhun gyis grub pa chen por gsal bar gyur to//de nas de
272a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa lhun gyis grub pa gnyisu med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba 'di nyid sku gsung thugs dang yon phrin las rdo rje las phyung //a ho srid rdzi' nyes
272a7(rgyud): dmigs bdag tu rtog las 'phros//rgyud drug skye 'gag lus dang long spyong dang //gnas dang sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor la sogs pa//log rtog nyid las gzhan du ci yang
272b1(rgyud): med//sted nyid bdag med ye mkhyen rang rig thugs//dmigs bya dmigs med med par dran dbang sgyur//ngo mtshar sku gsung yo zhing khams la//gzhan na med de nyid de ltar yin tes
272b2(rgyud): rdo rje gsang pa'i tshib cu'o//thub pa drug gis sprul pa dang //de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa yang dri dag N+DI 'dus par de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mi khyen te//ga
272b3(rgyud): snying po de kho na nyid nges paM lus tshe sa thams cad bstan pa las chos thams cad gtan la phab pa le'u ste bzhi pa'o///de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das pa
272b4(rgyud): can pos 'gro ba rnams cad kyi nga bzhin b+hi dak+Shil 'khor yod par bstan pa dang /rigs nAd rtag tu yang sh-i/da la chos kyi rigs ni thams cad kun la yang yod de//nam
272b5(rgyud): kyang kun la khyab par gnaso//de ltar chos kyi dbyings dang /na mkhas kun la khyab kyang rnam par thar pa'i don ma rtogs na me long g.yas g.yogs pa dang 'dra ste gzugs brnyan snang /
272b6(rgyud): pa'i bye ba byed mi nuso zhes gsungs nas yang 'di skad rdo rje 'chang gis gsung so//mnyam nyid deni rtogs rang rig rgyal ba dang //rgya mtsho chen por chu klung 'beb bya ltar//
272b7(rgyud): don rtog po thabs chen 'di dag tu//rnam pa'i thog pa bas pa yas ma lus 'dug//oM ha~M/bdag med gnyis rtogs pa ba phyin rdzogs pa//saM baicu rim gyis bsgoms
273a1(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa//sangs rgyas sar 'gro go 'phang thob pa'i lam//bden pa gnyis kyis rab tu thob par 'gyur//phyi nang rten 'brel sgyu ma mig yor chub shes pa'i//
273a2(rgyud): dngos po gzugs la thogs med rab tu 'jug/dag bshes mi slob rang gi rig pas rtogs//byang chub sar 'gro yid bzhin bde ba'i mchog/bden bzhi don rtogs rab tu spong ba yis//
273a3(rgyud): ye shes bcu drug cha sbyangs rab zhi ba'i//rgyun zhugs la sogs rim par sbyangs nas ni//nyon mongs dgra rnams rab tu zhi ba'i sa ru 'gro//theg pa gang du bstan pa ma nges pa'i//yang na
273a4(rgyud): kun la 'thun nas 'jom par 'jug/yang na nges med 'di zhes brtag tu med//'di ni ma nges rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs//dge bcu spyod cing mi dge slong byed pa//'dod khams lha dang mi
273a5(rgyud): ru skye ba'i rgyu//tshad med bzhi sbyong mi g.yo sgom byed pa//tshangs gnas la sogs skye ba'i rgyu yino//chos kyi dbyings kyis kun tu khyab gyur kyang //rang rig rtogs pa'i skal dang mi
273a6(rgyud): ldan ni//ji ltar dmus long mdun du mdog bsten bzhin//'di ni skal med rigs chad sa yino//chos kyi dbyings kyis kun la khyab pa yis//bla med theg pa bsam yas gsungs pa yang ///
273a7(rgyud): so so rang rig bla la snang bar zad//ngan song 'gro drug sna tshogs rgyu ba yang //'khrul pa'i blo log rtog pa nyid snang ste//de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings la 'gyur ba med//mi dmigs rang //
273b1(rgyud): rig gams byas bla na med pa'i mchog/log rtog bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin gyur na//dngos mad mi sdug sna tshogs snang bar 'gyur//yang dag shes pas rig blo med na//bde gshegs zhing
273b2(rgyud): yang ngan song gan su mthong //theg mchog mnyam pa'i don nyid rtogs pa ni//ngan song gnas nyid 'og min dga' ldan gnas//na mkha'i dbyings ni de nyid bsam yas par//nyi zla gza' skar
273b3(rgyud): mtshan ma glog 'gyu dang //'ja' tshe na sprin mangs sna tshogs 'khrugs gyur kyang //nam mkha'i dbyings la gyur cing nyams pa med//mi dmigs chos kyi dbyings ni bsam yas par//sku gsung//
273b4(rgyud): yon phrin las rmad 'byung dang //'jig rtog gtso mchog ma lus thams cad dang //'khrul 'khor sdug bsngal sna tshogs rnams mang yang //de bzhin nyid la 'phel zhing bri ba med ces rdo gsang
273b5(rgyud): de'i tshig tu'o//rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las thams cad la chos nyid kyi rgyu yod pa dang rigs rgyud chad pa dang rigs brgyud so sor dbye ba'i mdor bshad pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o///
273b6(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgongs pa gcig tu gyur nas mnyam pa chen po'i tshul rdo rje'i dbyingasu chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i ting 'dzin las mi g.yo bar chos
273b7(rgyud): thams cad ming tsam du gnas pa'i yi ge phreng ba 'khor lo zhes bya ba 'di sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //a rab tu brtan gyur a dkar las//shin tu phra ba'i a rnams spro/
274a1(rgyud): b+ha blas kun gang sngags 'byungs/sdus kyang 'phel 'brib med par bstan//de las ming chags gsal bar kun//spro zhing rdzu bA 'dra de bzhin//'di ni rdo rjed sgyu thur gyi/
274a2(rgyud): brtan 'byung ye shes rgyu yin//a/ka kha ga b+ha nga /tsa tshi dza dz+nyanya/Ta tha Da D+hAH/ta tha da d+ha na/pa pha ba b+ha ma/ya wa ra la/sha Sha sa ta k+ShA/i I/u U/e aM/o o/'di dag
274a3(rgyud): byung bas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa rnam pa drug tu g.yos/rab tu g.yos kun tu g.yos nas chos thams cad ming gi mtshan nyid du gyur to//de nas de bzhin gshegs
274a4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis ched du brjod//A ni stong dang mi stong gi/dbu ma dmigasu yod ma yin//thams cad ming tsam sangs rgyas kun//yi ge phreng ba nyid la gnas//a nyid sna tshogs par
274a5(rgyud): snang ba'i//kaM las sogs pa bzhi bcu gnyis//sgra yi ming gis thams cad bsdus//mngon rdzogs rgyal por de nyid ngas//e ma ho ngo mtshar ya mtshan byis//'phrul chen bzhi
274a6(rgyud): bcu rtsa lnga'i ming //tshig rnams ma lus 'dzin pa'i gnas//sna tshogs don kun smra zhing ston//dngos med yi ge rang bzhin sems//bdag med mtha' bral mi dmigs kyang //dbyings
274a7(rgyud): dang kha dog ming tshogs kyis//rol pa cir yang sprul cing ston//phyogs bcu dus bzhi gshegs pa yi//ye shes sems dpa'i sku gsung thugs//dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa sgonya
274b1(rgyud): yi ge ma ga nas klu las rdzogs//sems ni rang bzhin yi ge ste//yi ge dngos po yod ma yin//dmigs med de nyid sna tshogs pa'i//sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo che//sku gsung thugs na
274b2(rgyud): ngo mtshar byi//yi mtshan 'phrul chen rab 'gugs pa//dbyings la dbyings kyis bris pa ste//yi ge zhes ni de phyir brjod//mgo ni me nor lam yin te//tsheg ni shes rab ming du smras//sha
274b3(rgyud): ni thabs chen tshig su gcod//a ni skye med de bzhin nyid//tha ni sgyu 'phrul rdo rje nyid//TaM ni snang ba'i sgyu 'phrul nyid//Da ni sgyu 'phrul yid bzhin nyid//D+ha ni sgyu 'phrul rnam dag nyid//Na ni kun
274b4(rgyud): tu sgyu 'phrul nyid//tha ni dra bas mngon rdzogs nyid//ta ni dra bas brtan pa nyid//de ni dri bas lham mo nyid//d+ha ni dra bas 'khyil ba nyid//na ni dri bas kun tu 'gyur//kA ni sman gyi thugs kyi
274b5(rgyud): mchog/kha ni snyan gyi thugs kyi mchog/ga ni shangs kyi thugs kyi mchog/g+ha ni ljags kyi thugs kyi mchog/da ni thugs kyang 'jig byed pa'o//tsa ni spyan gyi sku yi mchog/tsha ni snyan
274b6(rgyud): gyi sku yi mchog/dza ni shangs kyi sku yi mchog/dz+nyA ni ljags kyi sku yi mchog/nya ni sku yang 'jig byed pa'o//pa ni spyan gyi gsung gi mchog/pa ni snyan gyi gsung mchog ste//
274b7(rgyud): ni shangs kyi gsung mchog yin//b+ha ni ljags kyi gsung gi mchog/ma ni gsung yang 'jig par byed//ya ni skye bo rnam par dag/wa ni gnas pa dag pa yin//ra ni 'jig pa
275a1(rgyud): dag pa ste/la ni stong pa dag pa'o//sha ni rtag med drag pa ste//'a ni chad pa'ang yod ma yin//sa ni mtha' bral bdag med pa//ha ni mtshan ma med pa nyid//kA tI yi
275a2(rgyud): thugs kyi thugs//oM ni rdul snyed lha rnams//I ni rdul snyed lha ma yin//u ni rdul snyed mo rnams//U ni rdul skyed byol song rnams//e nai rdul skyed yi dgasu//yaM ni rdul snyed
275a3(rgyud): dmyal ba rnams//oM ni thams cad 'jig par bying/oM na thams cad 'jig pa yin//yi ge 'khor lo tshigs chen 'dis//sku gsung thugs kyi phreng ba bsdus//a ho/de nas de
275a4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyisu med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba 'di nyid sku gsung thugs dang yin 'phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo //a ho/thabs dang
275a5(rgyud): shes rab dgyes sprin byang chub sems tshogs rgyu 'khor lo//'bras bu rgyal ba'i smin grub ngo mtshar ming tshogs bzhi bcu gnyis//'dus ma byas nyid 'dus byas rdo rje dkyil 'khor
275a6(rgyud): 'byin pa'i dam//'da' bar mi mdzad dbang med rgyu rkyen tshogs pa'i mthu chen yin//i ho/rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o//zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yi ge 'khor
275a7(rgyud): lor gyur to//gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las yi ge phreng ba 'khor lo bkod pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o////de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las
275b1(rgyud): shAnakasang ba'i phyir gsang sngags kyi hud da ra phye ba dang nang ba thabs kyi rgyud gzhan la khams bco brgyad du bstan/gtsug ldag thams cad la yang khams bco brgyad du bstan pa yin/lung ga
275b2(rgyud): 'di ni shin tu zab pa'i phyir//bems nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bstan te/lung gi skye yang rgyud dang gsung rab thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas yin/gsang ba'i dbang po dang gsang ba'i yul gnyi ka yang
275b3(rgyud): mched dang khams thams cad 'byung ba'i gzhi yin pa'i phyir shin tu gsang bar gsungaso//dkyil 'khor de dag shin tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir nyid la nyid che du brjod pa 'di brjod do//
275b4(rgyud): e ma'o ya nas gsang ba'i ches//thams cad kun la rang bzhin gnas//ngang gis dag mnyamo ma gtogs pas//kun la yod cing rang bzhin gsong //gzhan du min la shin tu gsang //don
275b5(rgyud): nyid kyis ni gsang ba'i rgyu//mnyam pa'i rdo rje can gyis gsung //'do ni byang chub snying po mchog/a haM/rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o//dbang po yul du snang ba'i rnams//byang chub sems dpar
275b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor nyid//phung po lnga dang 'byung ba lnga//rigs rdza yab yum tsu ru 'byor//skye mched khams rnams bco brgyad do//sems dpa' sems ma'i dkyil 'khor nyid//thams cad byang
275b7(rgyud): chub sems ma yi//rdo rje gsang ba'i dbang por 'dus//rdo rje dbang po gsang ba'i thabs//dbang po yul nyid shes rab dbyings//dbang po'i thugs na rdo rje sems//thams cad 'byung ba'i
276a1(rgyud): gter nyid dang //thams cad 'gro ba'i gnas nyid//de yis mya bskyed gang yang med//'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa'i rgyu//de las thams cad skyo zhing 'byung //kun gyi phyag
276a2(rgyud): rgyu'i rgyu yin te//bde ba byang chub sgrub pa'i rdzas//de las bskyed cing de las so//dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa'i gnas//dbang po rdo rje pad+mor ldan//gnyis mod byang chub sems 'dron
276a3(rgyud): mi dmigs pade dang long spyod 'phro//sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lnga//gdas pa'i lha mo bzhi rnams dang //mched po'i lha mo rdzogs ldan bzhi//'jug dang ldang dang gnas dang
276a4(rgyud): smin pa'i byang chub sems//g.yo dang bskyod dang ldan dang gnas//'gug dang 'dzin dang de bzhin te//bsdus dang 'khril ba'i don sgrub phyir//bsdams dang mi gtod dbang sgyur te//
276a5(rgyud): bde ba sgra snyan phyogs bcur sgrebs//shin tu skegs pa'i gzi brjid 'bar//yid bzhin rin chen phreng bar 'bar//dbyangs snyan yid 'phrog gzi ldan 'bar//gzugs mdzes bskyed
276a6(rgyud): pas phyogs bcur ga yo//kun tu tshim byed brigasung thim/lha mdzes rin chen phung po 'phro//'od gsal 'phro bas kun tu 'bar//bdud rtsi bsil dro 'jam pa'i dbyings//a
276a7(rgyud): la ho/gsang ba'i dbang por ldan gyur nas//chags pa med pa'i tshul gyi su//pha rol phyin bcu rgyu 'bras rdzogs//saM cu rims kyis bkod med rdzogs//kun tu 'od gsal
276b1(rgyud): pad+ma spyan yang rdzogs//yi ge phreng ba 'khor lo bsam gyis mi khyab pa//yang dgra rdzogs chen thabs dang ldan//thabs dang shes rab bla med sa yang rdzogs//bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen rje
276b2(rgyud): par rol//a la la ho//de bzhin nyid kyi gsang mchog las//khams ni nyi shu rtsa gcig ste//bco brgyad po ni rgyud gzhan bzhin//gsum ni de bzhin kun gyi bdag/bco brgyad 'byung ba'i
