276b3(rgyud): gnam yin te//byang chub 'grub pa'i zhing yang yin//bde ba 'byin pa'i rgyu yang yin//gsang ba'i mtshan nyid brjod pa ni//dbang po rdo rje gsang ba'i rgyal//yul ni pad+ma bde mchog dbyings
276b4(rgyud): sems ni byang chub 'byung ba'i gter//dbang po yul sems ldan gyur nas//gsang ba mchog gi 'phrul chen spro//dkyil 'khor rdul rnyed grangs med dang //phun sum tshogs pa'i lhun grub//
276b5(rgyud): rnams gsang ba mchog gis 'byin par byed//'di ni rje gcig yin par gsungs//gsang ba'i don mchog 'di dag ni//lta ba dman la bshad byas na//dus min par ni srog zad nas//
276b6(rgyud): mgo 'gas snying yang tshig par 'gyur//khab lan gyis ni lcags sdud ltar//mi 'dod bzhin du dbang med par//ngan song mi khoms bskal par brgyud par 'gyur//de bas 'di ni shin tu/
276b7(rgyud): gsang bar bya//shes rab rgya chen blo zab yangs pa yis//blo brtan snying rje che dang dad ldan dang tshul bzang la brtan//gzhan du nams kyang sbyin mi bya zhes nyid la yang nyid brjed//
277a1(rgyud): gsang ba'i spyang ba khon nyid nges pa las khams nyi shu rtsa gcig tu brdzus nas thams cad ma smras par dbying su bkod pa'i le ru ste bdun pa'o//donapa
277a2(rgyud): yi ge'i dkyil 'khor gyi smon bkod pa las sgyu 'phrul rnam par slob pa 'di ched du brjod do//rtse ba med pa'i sems nyid ni//chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba yin//sems nyid yi ge'i ra
277a3(rgyud): bzhin te//yi ge yid bzhin rin chen sprin//sgyu 'phrul dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis//dra ba'i dkyil 'khor mden rdzogs pas//phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa yi//dkyil
277a4(rgyud): 'khor thams cad grub par 'gyur//bdud rtsir 'gyur zhing 'byung ba dang //bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi nad sel cing //long spyod 'byung zhing ngan song skyong //ci yang gzhan du 'gyur bar 'grub//
277a5(rgyud): nam mkha' rdo rje sra 'byung zhing //'bar nas me yang 'tshig pa dang //chung 'gyur 'bab pa'ang de bzhin te//'jig rten khams ni gtor ba dang //thams cad stongs shing ltung ba
277a6(rgyud): 'gyur//'gug dang gta' dang bcing dang dgrol//gra so dang gsad dang pha ma dang rgyal//ting 'dzin 'di yis byed par 'gyur//de nyid ye shes rang snang ba'i//mi tshig gzugs tshogs
277a7(rgyud): yid bzhin gyi/mun la snang byung ji bzhin du//'byung bas gser 'gyur spyan gyi tshul//ston pa mchod rtson rtogs pa gsal//dam tshig sngags dang phyag rgya rnams//ma
277b1(rgyud): nyams shes shing yo byad ldan//'grub 'gyur mi ldan don med brlag/dus gsum rgyal bas thugs chud pa'i//dngos grub mchog gi snying po ni//zad pa'i dus med yid bzhin mdzod//'phel 'grib med
277b2(rgyud): med par 'byung ba ste/dngos po med las dngos po'i sprin//sna tshogs rnam par 'byung zhing 'gyur//dngos rnams nyid na dngos med par//rtogs pa'i dbang sgyur ting 'dzin yin//gang gis dmigs
277b3(rgyud): med mi shes pa//de yis chos kyi dbyings ma yin//de phyir dngos dang dngos med pa//'jigs pas dmigs med shes par gyis//bzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid ni//pho mo ma yin ma ning min//
277b4(rgyud): mtshan med ma yin rigs rgyud min//kha dog ma yin dbyibs ma yin//gan su ma yin gang yang min//de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes te//thabs kyi phyag rgya kun gyi rgyu//thabs las thabs//
277b5(rgyud): byung thabs bsam yas//tha dad min la tha dad pa'i//nang dang nang gi phyi rol pa//dkyil 'khor bsam yas ye shes rol//'jigs med kun bzang phyag rgya mchog/gang gis glang chen
277b6(rgyud): myos 'dra'i sems//mnyam par gzhag pas btuyan su/sngags dang phyag rgyas rab brtan na//dngos grub ya mtshan chen por 'gyur zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid gzigs
277b7(rgyud): mos mnyes par gyur to//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rdzo gsang ba'i tshigi 'di phyung //a ma'o snying por lam bcas pas//'jigs med dbyings nyid/
278a1(rgyud): kun bzang phyag rgya mchog/rang bzhin sku gsung thugs chen po//byang chub lhun grub 'dal ba'i ngang //snying po nyid ni snying por kun bcas kun tu gnas//de nyid rdzogs pa'i
278a2(rgyud): dang las dngos grub kun shar kun tu gnas/a ho/rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o//gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las sgyu 'phrul sgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o////de nas
278a3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khro lnga lhag 'i dkyil 'kho gyi sngar 'chang rnaMs lha sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di don yod par bya ba'i phyir ched du brjod pa 'di
278a4(rgyud): brjod do//e ma'o ye nas rnam dag pa'i//thabs dang shes rab ldan par gnas//byang chub mchog tu nyi zla shar//de nyid bzhugs gnas yin par gsungs//chos rnams thams cad
278a5(rgyud): bdag med pa'i//dbyingasu thim pa'i 'od zer gsal//gcig dang spros pa thams cad med//dkyil 'khor spros med zlum po'i tshul//ye nas mya ngan 'das pa'i chos//ye shes
278a6(rgyud): rgyu dang 'bras bu ldan//thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sku//chos kyi 'khor lo yongs kyis bskor//thugs rjes byin brlabs 'phros pa yis//ye shes bzhi'i dkyil 'kho
278a7(rgyud): spro/ye shes lnga dang sku gsung thugs//byin brlabs yi mtshan bsam mi khyab//rang snang ba yi thabs las 'byung bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs pa'i//thugs rje
278b1(rgyud): rgyas pa'i gzhal yas khang //dbus mtha' med par rgyas par gnas//stong smon mtshan med 'odra gsal 'jug/de phyir ye shes sgo bzhir bshad//der 'gro lam stogs brgyad dang ldan//
278b2(rgyud): rang bzhin ye nas 'od gsal phyir//nyi zla brtsegs pa'i gdan khri 'bar//ye nis rnam par dag pa'i phyir//ma chags pad+mo 'bar ba'i gdan//zag med ye shes gter gyur pas//yid bzhin
278b3(rgyud): rin chen 'bar ba'i gdan//ye nas mnyam nyid mi 'da'i phyir//ta la'i ljon shing rang bzhin gnas//re ba yid bzhin slong ba'i phyir//dpag bsams shing gi rin chen 'bar//yid bzhin
278b4(rgyud): rin chen brgyan gyis bskor//thams cad la ni dbang sgyur phyir//'jig rten lha chen rnams kyis bskor//gsang ba'i de nyid nges pa las//'phrul chen bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis//thams
278b5(rgyud): cad lha nyid rtag tu sbyor//thams cad ma lus dkyil 'khor mchog/'di ni rang bzhin dkyil 'khor dang //gzugs brnyan lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor gsum//
278b6(rgyud): ting 'dzin lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor dag/byang chub sems dang tshogs mchog brten zhes nyid la nyid bshad//gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las shin tu gsang ba'i dkyil
278b7(rgyud): 'khor bsdus nas lhag pa'i gzugs brnyan bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o///de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin gcig dang du ma med pa bdag nyid thams
279a1(rgyud): cad kyis 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad la nyid kyi che ba'i dkyil 'khor 'byung bar bzhed nas/che du brjod pa 'di brjod//ye shes phyogs bzhi dbus brtags
279a2(rgyud): te//dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun grub ni//rdzogs chen rtags pa'i rnal 'byor pas//kun 'byung dkyil 'khor chen por spyod//'khor lo brtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas//gru chad bzhis
279a3(rgyud): brgyan par 'khyams dang //kun tu gru bzhi sgo khyud ldan//rol mo sna tshogs sprin phung bzhin//dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis kyis brgyan//seng ge glang chen rta dang khyud //nam mkha' lding
279a4(rgyud): gi khri chen la//nyi zla pad+ma rin po che//gdan la rdzogs dang sems dpa'i tshul//'khor lo rgyal po rgyal mo dang //g.yas nas mthong thos snom pa dang //myong dang btsun mo'i tshogasu
279a5(rgyud): btsas//gru chad la ni mthong byed dang //thos byed snom byed myong byed rnams//btsun mo dag dang bcas par gnas//bar 'khyams la ni thub drug dang //mdun dang rgyab du byed pa dang //
279a6(rgyud): bya ba dag ni gnas par bstan//sgo khyud bzhi la 'joms pa ni//btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan par gnas//rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che//pad+ma ral gri dril bu 'bar//ut+pal klu shing la sogs
279a7(rgyud): tshan//mdzes tshul mnyes pa'i yo byad 'dzin//mthing ka dkar po ser leb rgan//ljang khu la sogs sna tshogs pa'i//mnyen lcags 'khrel ldem gzhon tshul can/gsal 'tsher spyan
279b1(rgyud): sugrags gyun pan//nga phra ba tshogs chen po//'bar ba'i phreng bas la khyil bste//dbus mtha' mod par khyab pa yi//kyi 'khor bsam yas spyan gyis zug//s+thA ya~M b+hag rgya na mchog no//de banan
279b2(rgyud): dbyings las ma g.yos kyang //yang dag thar pa'i gzug sku dang //'gro ba ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir//mthun byas sku ni sna tshogs ston//ston nyid skye ma mig yor tshulo//tshul nyid dbyings las
279b3(rgyud): g.yos pa med//ma g.yos bzhin du sna tshogs bzhin//de'i tshe mi mthun sna tshogs la//so so 'dra bar snang ba ni//de bzhin nyid kyis ma bcos kyang //las 'phro dbang gis so sor snang //dper na
279b4(rgyud): me long chu bzla bzhin//de tshe 'gro drug thams cad la//sdig srong gzugasu rnam par bstan//dge tshul rnams la dgra bcom gzugs//rang rgyal rnams la se ru'i tshul//gzhan yang theg
279b5(rgyud): mchog rim pa bzhin//'og min bla med gnas mchog tu//sku ni rnam par snang mdzad tshul//byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams la//de bzhin gsung mchog mi smra te//sku yis chos rnams
279b6(rgyud): mjal bar ston//me long bstan pa'i tshul bzhin du//dngos kyi mdog ngan thams cad sel//'khor gyis de bzhin sku bltam na//byang chub sgrib pa gting dpag med//me lung bzhin du sku la
279b7(rgyud): snang /de nas sa bcu rim gyis 'byang //bla med byang chub yang dag 'thob//chos sku dpag med brjod du med//long spyod zad meng rin chen gter//sprul pa bye ba bsam mi khyad//mtshon
280a1(rgyud): du sman // / du smra du rdzu// rgyun /
280a2(rgyud): skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung sa//nyen mongs kun gyi zhing du gnas//zang mi shes kyi gter du gyur//rdo rje rig pa 'dzin gyi sku//thams cad dbyer med mnyam pa'i sku//thams dang mkhyen pa
280a3(rgyud): yo shes sku//de tshe sku lnga kun kyang rdzogs ces brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa//thams cad dkyil 'khor brjod kyis mi lang ba zhing gi rdul ste du gsal bar
280a4(rgyud): gyur to//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyi su med pa'i yon chen po'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba 'di nyid sku gsung thugs dang yon phrin las rdo rje las
280a5(rgyud): byung ngo //A ho/dmigs bya dmigs med mi dmigs dpag med bsam mi khyab//yis rang rig dkyil 'khor sna tshogs brjod mi lang mnyam dang mi mnyam kun khyab khyab med khyab TI
280a6(rgyud): skye/yinas kun kyi rnams b+h+rUM smras pa ma//ye nas kun kyi dkyil 'khod pas ma yis rlung gi ng+ge ste//sen s+yArnam spros skying dkun ldan sag ng+gA slong rjeg
280a7(rgyud): chog tu'o//a ho zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu'o//gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dkyil 'khor spros pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o////de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams ca
280b1(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs nas 'khor bas ma gyis mi khyab+hA pa thams cad kyang nyid la nyid mnyes par mchod cing /kun tu bzang po byas te phyogs brgyangs son ma lus pa thams cad kyi bzhugs gas
280b2(rgyud): thams cad grazhal yas khang rin po che sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa/tshe dpag tu med pa rgyas pa/mtha' dbus med par khyab cing 'od zer slob pa med pa rang byung ba la bzhugs nas chedu
280b3(rgyud): brjod pa 'di brjod//nyid kyi dbyings nyid 'phro ba dpag tshad med//kun nas dkyil 'khor yongasu ma chad pa'i//srid gsum yang dag mnyam sbyor spyad yul te//mtshan 'dzin 'das pa mchog gi
280b4(rgyud): rgyu las byung //dbang sgyur shin tu rnam par dag pa yi//de bzhin gshegs pa 'og min gnas bzhugs nas//gzung 'dzi ni bral ba'i bla med rjes 'dod dang //'jig rten 'khor gyi gtses bku
280b5(rgyud): dbang phyug dang //gzhon dang 'jig rten phyogs bcu khams gnas pa//bdud rtsi ro yis dga' ba bde chen 'grub//dug gsum dri bral bdud sde tshar gcad pa'i//'das dang ma byon de
280b6(rgyud): bzhin nyid sbyor//shes rab thabs ston nges pa'i dran phyung ba//rig pa'i thabs chen dbang sgyur nyid du bsgom//stong sgron+da mtshan med rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i//zag med bsod nams
280b7(rgyud): chags kyis brgyan par 'gyur//b+h+rUM/rang thung nyi zla pang+ga rin chen rgyas la bzhugs//rdo mnyam nyid thugs chud pa yi//mnyam rdzogs chen po lhun sa ros pa mdzad//bde gshegs
281a1(rgyud): dbyings nyid de bzhin nyid gnas pa//dus bzhi rgyal ba kun dang mnyam par thub//thams cad 'od gsal dkyil 'khor thugs chud pa'i//sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'chang
281a2(rgyud): las 'byung //spyod yul 'phrog med brjod kyis mi lang ba'i//dus bzhi mnyam nyid nges pa'i don nyid nyon//thugs rje dbang gis 'gro drug dus gnas bzhugs//nga dang bdag med
281a3(rgyud): mnyam pa'i dbyings mkhyen pa//mnyam pa'i don grub rdo rje can gyis bya//rnam par rtog med byang chub rdo rje can gyi sku//shes rab mchog gis ma lus yongs bsdus pa//bde gshegs mi
281a4(rgyud): gnas mnyam nyid dang du byon//thabs chen ma 'dres rnam pa sbas pa yi//dmigs med bde gshegs nyid dbyings thugs chud pa//thabs dang shes rab dbyings nyid dam pa'i mchog
281a5(rgyud): phyogs bcu dus bzhi dbyings gnas mthas gtugs pa//shes rab mchog ldan gsal ba'i dang 'chang ba//thugs rje byin rlabs sna tshogs 'phro ba'i//bde gshegs ma lus thaMd
281a6(rgyud): 'byung ba'i gnas//yid bzhin rin chen mi zad par ldan 'phro//rang rig rgyal po che yis rtogs par 'gyur zhes nyid la nyid du brjod rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o//gsang ba'i snying po/
281a7(rgyud): de kho na nyid nges pa las gzhal yas khang dbub pa thabs dra ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o////de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshigs dang bcas pa tha~Md kyi sku
281b1(rgyud): da gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di dag byung ngo //b+hU bi shA bi shud+d+ha/d+hU badz+ra d+h+r-ika/oM dzi na dzig/swA rang nu d+heka/oM A ro li//d+hU prad+d+hA d+h+r-ika/mr-i d+hA tA shwa ri/la dr-i shA ra ti/ma mo ha rA \u0f7f/
281b2(rgyud): bai rA ga ra te/t+ye badz+ra ra ti/k+Shi hi rA dzA yai/traM A kaM gar+b+ha yA/hr-i da hU~M b+hU d+ha me/d+h+wi ku ru pA na ra/hUM lA s+yai sa mA ya s+t+wa~M/traM mA pa~M sa maM ye hoHhUM gr-I d+he rA ga haM a na? traM rA ga ya mai mo
281b3(rgyud): ranA sAt+ma/b+hI ne swa ra maM pi swAt+ma/hUM s+pha rA d+hA yA swa/muM shr-I i rA gA s+yA/d+h+r-i d+hU pi pra be sha/hU~M pUSh+pa a be sha baM d+h+waM ba su ki ni/ho gan d+h+ye tsi ta ta/d+hI ya mAn ta kreta phaT/pra dz+nyA na tA
281b4(rgyud): hUM bi g+han+ma ta krita phuT/hUM pad mAn te krita phaT/oM mA hA badz+ra d+hA ra ma hA kro d+he shwa ri dz+wa la ni phaT/oM ma hA rad na d+ha ra ma hA kro d+he shwa ri dz+wa la ni phaT/oM mu hA pad ma d+ha ra ma hA kro dz+nye shwa ri/
281b5(rgyud): dz+r-IM lA nai phaT/oM ma hA ka ra me d+hA ra ma hA kro d+ha shwa ri dz+wa li ni phaT/hU~M hUM hUM badz+ra tsi ta ta hUM/a a a badz+ra b+ha dra sa man ta ma//oM mu ne kr-I swA hA/oM mu ne druM swAhA/oM mu naM sra sAt+ma/
281b6(rgyud): oM mu ne b+hi sAhA/oM mu ne k+ShaM sAhA/oM mu ne ye swAhA/e h+yaM hi/b+haM ga bAn/mA hA kA ru NI ka/tri sha ho/sa ma ya stau/dzaHhUM ba hoHoM AHhU smAhAM/ba pra ba ba baMdz+dza
281b7(rgyud): dzANI dz+dza/sa si sa sa sa/mi ma ma ma ma/ya ya ya ya ya/oM AHhUM swA hA/oM ye shes rgyal po sku gsung thugs//yon+ta phrin las rmad po che//de nyid du ni mnyam sbyor
282a1(rgyud): pa'i//phyag rgya chen po bdag gyur cig/oM badz+ras ma pan+d+ha/u badz+ra sa ma ya b+h+ya/oM badz+ra sa ma ya ho zhes brjod pas//gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'di dag gis 'jig
282a2(rgyud): rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad khyab par grag so//gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las gsang sngags kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o////de nas bcom ldan
282a3(rgyud): 'dis byed pa po rdo rje dang /bya ba me rdo rje gnyis med pa'i dkyil 'khor la thim par mdzad//de nas phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid chen pos bad
282a4(rgyud): nyichen po ye shes dang byin bsdu ba zhes bya ba 'di sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i sgyu 'phrul drangs byung //oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swA b+hA ba Ad ma kau \u0f85\u0f7f/oM ma hA mA d+hA re shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na
282a5(rgyud): badz+ra swA b+hA ba Ata ma kai&haM/oM ma hA pra te na bi k+ShI na shUn+ye tAM dz+nyA na badz+ri sta~M b+hA ba Ad ma ka&haM/oM mai hA saM min te shrI n+yai tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swA b+hA ba Ad ma ko&haM/oM mi hA kr-i
282a6(rgyud): a nu lpA ne shU n+ta rA dz+nyA na badz+ra swA b+hA ba Ad maM kau&hi/oM sarba ti d+h+r-i ga ta mai tI kA ya badz+re swA b+hA bo Ad ma ka&taM/oM sarbatrA~M thA ki tA ma hA b+hUk+Sh+ma badz+ra prA b+hA ba Ad ma ko&/oM sar+b+ba
282a7(rgyud): ta d+h+r-i ga ta ma hrItsa te te badz+re swA b+h+rU~M bi Ad me ko&/oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA e nu rA ga ni badz+ra s+t+rai d+hU ba nga ma ko&/ma~M sarba ta thA ga ti ma hA buM dzi badz+ra swa b+hA ba yAta ma kaH
282b1(rgyud): haM zhes brjod pas thim par gyur to//gsal bar gyur to//'bang bar gyur to//e ma ho mtshar rmad kyi chos//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang //sgra dang ming chag kun las 'das//sna tshogs sgyu
282b2(rgyud): rnams gsal bar 'byung //gsung gcig dkyil 'khor yan lag ni//bsam gyis mi khyab kun tu khyab//sgra dang ming tshig so sor grags//thams cad gsung gi phyag rgya mchog/rgyud mchod
282b3(rgyud): rgyud chen dra ba las//bad ldan gsung gi don 'byung ba'ang //thams cad pad+ma'i ngang gyur na//grol thar lam dang 'khor ba'i sgra//ji ltar brjod kyang gsung mchog ste//theg pa mthon dman tha~Md
282b4(rgyud): dang //log 'gro ma lus thams cad skad//byang chub rdo rje gsung du bsdus//bsdus nyid phyogs bcur rnam par grags//sgra nyid ma chags dang du gsungs//gsungs pa nyid na brjod du med//
282b5(rgyud): brjod med de nyid sna tshogs sgra//kun la grags shing so sor mjal//dper na de bzhin sbrid bsangs bzhin//gsung gcig sgra yas thams cad go/'di ni gsung mchog rgyal po yin//theg
282b6(rgyud): pa mthon dman bsim yis kyang //de bzhin nyid las ma gsungs te//gdul ba'i thab su so sor thos//ji ltar gsung rab kun brjod kyang //de bzhin nyid kyis gsungs pa med//yi ge med dang
282b7(rgyud): rig pa'i gsung //ljags kyi rtse mor ma phyung yang //thugs rje gsung gi byin brlabs kyis//'gro don sna tshogs so sor gsal//gsal nyid gsang gi rdo rje mchog/de bzhin gsung gis
283a1(rgyud): da na rnams//nga na las ma g.yas cung //de na nan smra banan//das ston can nyi ngos pa las pa 'gyur sdu ba dang //gsang /
283a2(rgyud): kyi le ste bcu gsum pa'o/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas nyid kyi phyag rgyu sbyin pa'i snying ba zhes bya cid che brjod pa 'di brjod//oM dz+nyA badz+nyA satwArmA/
283a3(rgyud): b+hAn d+hA mr-i badz+rag ni d+har+m+mA/sa~M tsakrAm/la yi laM badz+ri gan d+he b+hA Sha ma/swar ta na pra b+hA ni s+t+wa~M/oM badz+ra gan d+harmAShe /oM pad+mA pra b+hA na ma~M/Ni badz+ra gnad+ha pradz+nyA nA ba~M ha~M/kha da ga tIk+Sh+Na ba
283a4(rgyud): te 'adz+ra gan d+ha d+hA Sha pradz+nyA na te/shrI radA na pra thAn shrId+h+waM/badz+ra gan d+ha pra dz+nyA na dz+ha Shin+ti/rje btag pra dz+nyA na d+hi/NAM badz+ra gan d+ha b+hU 'br-ib+hU daH/g+neHpad+ma pra b+hA na hrIHbadz+ra gan d+hAb+hU Shi br-in+ti/
283a5(rgyud): nod+d+haHha badz+ra gnad+hib+he 'bya dz+nyAn na/a badz+rag ni te Sh+Tha Shabr-i d+hA na ya/ma~M ka laM pr-i b+ha~M na ma~M/hU~M badz+ra gan d+hA bi dz+nyA na b+h+rUM Shad+d+he pr-i dz+nyA na me la k+She/s+thi badz+raM gan d+ha b+ha Sha te pra dz+nyAs+t+wa~M/
283a6(rgyud): ni sr-i sA d+ha b+he dra br-i b+hAnA mA dz+dzaHbadz+ra gan d+ha b+he Sha pra dz+nyAn rjeHmr-i yud pa la nA la pre b+hA na ma?/oM badz+ra gan d+ha b+he Sha pra b+hA na sa// badz+ra a ma r+tha mr-i g+ha ra pra b+hAn phaT phaT//oM badz+rag
283a7(rgyud): d+ha D+ha 'a br-i b+hA ne oM ya~M/phaT ma hA badz+ra pra b+han phaT phaT/hUM ma hA ra ta na badz+ra gan d+he D+ha 'a pra b+hA na d+hI NA~M/oM tra~MHpad+ma med g+ha ra br-i b+hA na sin+diHoM ma~M hA badz+ri pad+ma badz+ra gan d+haH
283b1(rgyud): nan+ta dz+dza/a kar mA ud g+har badz+ra pra dz+nyA na phaT pad/a karma badz+ra gan d+hA d+hi Sha ba thA nA d+hA/a a ya zhes brjod pa phyag rgya gsung gi dkyil 'khor kun tu gsal bar gyur to//'brar bar
283b2(rgyud): gyur te//gsal ba'i snying po dri kho na nyid nges pa las den dam pa dang kun rdzob kyi byang chub kyi sems las phyag rgya gsung gi dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i pa'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o///de nas
283b3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pas rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrulagra ba bstan pa las chos thams cad na mkha' dang yum gyi dbyingasu 'dus par bstan nas che du brjod pa 'di brjod//yang dag don gyi gsang
283b4(rgyud): mchog ni//bde ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor paM/nges pa'i don tshan bzhi bcu gnyis//yid bzhin rin chen gsal bar thim//thams cad ma lus thig le'i dbyings//sku lnga'i 'od zer mang
283b5(rgyud): po kun//thams cad yum 'gyur dbyingasu thim//gsal 'bar sbyin gyi bdag por 'gyur//byang chub sems kyi thig le ni//kun la khyab cing mi gnas pa//kha dog gnas dang dbyings
283b6(rgyud): ma yin//yor mchog gi snying po ni//rtog ge spyod yul yong ma yin//zab cing rgya chen rab sbyangs pa'i//gsal ldan brtan pa'i spyod yul te//gzhan nas btsal zhing brtog tu
283b7(rgyud): med//thams cad na mkha'i mtshan nyid//sna tshogs 'jig rten brtan g.yo dang //rgyal ba mngon byung thams cad kun//na mkha'i dbyingasu ma gyu pa//dus bzhi phyogs bcu gdan med//
284a1(rgyud): dus gsum bde gshegs nyid kyi mnga'//sngon gyi bde gshegs thugs chud pa'i//nam mkha'i dbyingasu thams cad thim//thams cad shes rab dbyings nyid//dbyangs
284a2(rgyud): la dbyings ni rnam par sbyor//shes rab dbyings nyid 'byar pa yis//byang chub rdo rje thig le yin//dkyil 'khor gzhal yas lhun grub dang //rgya dang bral po'i bsam yas kyis
284a3(rgyud): kun la khyab cang ma gnas pa//yon mchog gi gnas yin te//ma bcos rgyun gyi skad cig ma//de yis ma zin gang yang med//rang gi rnam rtog ma yin pa//yang dag gshegs
284a4(rgyud): dang leg rtag dang //gzhan yang sprul pa mang po'i tshogs//phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad kun//de la gsad cing gzung du med//kha dog dbyibs dang gnas ma yin//skyes bu/
284a5(rgyud): dam pa mchog 'dod pas//de la rtag 'grus gsal byar gyis//de yi 'bras bu mthar phyin ni//rgyu 'bras med pa'i dus gcig ste/thams cad ming gi mtshan nyid du//yi ge 'bru
284a6(rgyud): gsum rdzogs par gyur//mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor los bsdus//tshogs chen gnyis kyang rtogs par rol//skye 'jig med pa'i dbyings la zhugs//'jig rten 'das dang ni//
284a7(rgyud): rten pa//mtha' yas 'jig rten bsam yas kun//rgyal ba yum gyi dbyingasu thim//thams cad ma lus chos skur 'du//ho/chos thams cad ming gi mtshan nyid do//
284b1(rgyud): gsung ba'i snyistong po nga kha na nyid nges pa las thams nad yum gyi dbyings 'dus pa shan tA gsang ba'i le'u ste bcwa lnga pa'o////de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yan lag thang /
284b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du lhun gyis grub par byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i tshe brjod pa 'di brjod//sgyu 'phrul drangs mngon rdzogs pas//thams cad byang chub mchog gi rgyu//gsang ba de nyid nges pa yi
284b3(rgyud): snying po phyag rgya 'da' bar dka'//mi bskyod nyi ma'i dkyil yi ge/rin tshan zla ba'i dkyil yi ge/lnga gnyis zung du spros pa las//sbyar ba phyag rgya 'byung ba'i rgyu//oM dang muM gnyis rtsa sbyar
284b4(rgyud): to//'bru brgyad bsnol nas rtser sprad pa/rgyal ba kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i//bde ba chen pa'i sbyin pa'i rgya//'bru bzhi sbas nas thags dkar bkan//hUM bskang rtse mor rdo rjer 'bar//zla bskul
284b5(rgyud): 'bru sbal dril bsil zhing //'khrul ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan//'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs dkar bkan/mung gi rtse mor dril bsil 'bar//nyi ma 'bru lnga la su 'khril//bdud 'dzum
284b6(rgyud): pi'i mdangs kyi blta/'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs dkar bkran//oM bskrang rtse mor 'khor lo 'bar//zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing //'khril ba'i tshul gyis ches la brtan//'bru
284b7(rgyud): bzhi sbas nas thugs dkar bkan//lam gyi rtse mor dral gsil 'bar//tam 'bru lba la su 'khril//bdud ta 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 27//'bru bzhi sbas nas shugs dkar bkan//
285a1(rgyud): stong rtsor 'bar ba rin po che//zla brtul 'bru sbal dril bsil zhing //'khrol ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan//'bru bzhi smras nas thugs kar bkan//mung gyi rtse yor dril
285a2(rgyud): bsil 'bar//nyi ma 'bru lngas las 'khrel//btud te 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta//'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan//a ma gyi rtse mor pad+ma 'bar//zla brtul 'bru sbas dril bsil/
285a3(rgyud): zheng /'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan//'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan//b+h+yo bsgreng rtse mor dril bsil 'bar//nyi ma 'bru lnga la su 'khril//btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs
285a4(rgyud): kyi blta 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan//hi gyi rtse mor ral gri 'bar//zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing //'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtul//'bru bzhi sbas nas
285a5(rgyud): thugs ka ra bkan//taM bsgreng rtse mor dril bsil 'bar//nyi ma 'bru lngas la su 'khril//btu de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta//ut+pal la sogs klu shing mtshan//rin chen myu gu ral gri
285a6(rgyud): 'bar//pad+ma dkar po rdo rje 'bar//chos kyi 'khor lo rin chen te//gzugs mdzes rin chen phreng ba dang //pi bang gar mkhan mchog nyid//me tog phreng ba spos mchod ma//mar me byug
285a7(rgyud): la sogs pa yis//las la 'khril cing chos la brten//dbu rnams byon nas 'dud pa'i tshul/gong gi phyag rgya chen po bzhin//gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du thim//sgo bzhi phyag rgya
285b1(rgyud): chen pa ni//ni mgo gdangs dang rdo rjes gnon//thod phreng chen pos gnon pa dang //rdo rje rgyu gam las kyis gnan//lcags kyu zhags bA s+phu Ta ho//sgo bzhir gnas pa de dag kyang //'dun tshul
285b2(rgyud): 'drim pa gong ma bzhin//thub drug phyag rgya sna tshogs te//mdor bsdus phyag rgya drug yin//sreg par dang ni pi bang dang //de che sgo ti rin chen sgrom//me dang chu ru rab tu bstan//yum ni gnyis med/
285b3(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings//kun bzang mnyam bzhag ye shes 'phro//yum 'gyur mnyam rdzogs pad mo'i dkyil//gzhan yang phyag rgya sna tshogs te//yang na de bzhin gshegs nyid//yang na rdo rje thal mo
285b4(rgyud): nyid//phyag rgya chen po tshogs mchog ni//thabs dang shes rab ldan 'byor na//mi bskyod ma bsgral thams cad kun//phyag rgya chenI ba'i ngang du gnas//yan lag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ldan//de nyid
285b5(rgyud): yan lag spros bdag ste//bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis sum 'byor 'bar//de ltar ldan pa'i gtso mtshig gis//rgyal ba rgya mchog de bzhin du//bcu gnyis drug gi 'ang 'phro 'bar//de la sogs te bas
285b6(rgyud): mi khyas/phyogs bcu dum bzhi bas ma ya suM//'dul ba'i don rnams so sor ston//theg pa mthon dman thams cad dang //phyin ci log rnams bsam yas dang //zhe khru tshogs chen thams cad
285b7(rgyud): 5//so so 'thun byas kun tu snang //dper na gang mtshan nyid 'dra ba//lu sa~M las ma dgod sna tshogs ston//mdor na phyag rgya thams cad ni//'di zhes gcig ces brjod med //gnyi
286a1(rgyud): dang gsum du rnam par 'gro//bskyed dang smra ba de bzhin nyid//mdang na bskyod 'gul thams cad kun//phyag rgya chen po'i ngang du gnas//gnas nyid mo gnas pa'ang min//de skad
286a2(rgyud): dag mchog nyid kyis bshad//mthe bo 'dzub mo rdo rje 'dzin//mthe bo gung mo rgyal ba 'dzin//srin lag mthe bo chags pa che//mthe'u chung mthe bo legs pa mchog/hUM ho//'dzub mo gnyis
286a3(rgyud): sbyar rin chen mchog/gung mo gnyis spyang gzi brjid don//srin lag gnyis sbyar rgyal ba'i tog/gzhad pa'i sgras ni mdza'u chung spyad//tro ta ru ha//'jug mo steng 'ag chos kyi mchog/
286a4(rgyud): smr-i mo snang 'og 'jam dpal mchog/srin lag steng 'og 'khor lo mchog/mthe'u chung sbrang 'og sgra gsung yin//hrIHSh+T+r-i R+R-i ha~M/'dzub mo rgya glum las kyi mchog/gung ma
286a5(rgyud): gram bsrung bar byos//srin lag rgyu gram gnod sbyin mchog/mthe'u chung rgya gram gnas par bshad//hatrU~M a b+h+rUM/phyag rgya brda' tshig chen po 'dis//sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor
286a6(rgyud): mdzes par snang //rang bzhin dkyil 'khor phun sum tshogs//glu gnyis phyag rgya ldan pa yis//sa ler gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor 'bebs//phyag rgya spros pa chen pos ni//gzung
286a7(rgyud): dang 'dzin pa rnam gnyis pa//dag par gsal bas phyag rgya yin//yi ge sau so gsal ba yis//gar du bsgyur bas mya ngan 'das//dza dang ho la sogs pa yis//gar du bsgyur bas
286b1(rgyud): rdo rjer 'tshod//gsang ba'i sbyong ba de kho na nyid nges pa las phyag rgya smras pa'i laT skye bcu drug pa'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos mtshan cha dam tshig ces bya bar glu 'a/
286b2(rgyud): blangaso//hUM lus ngag yid gsum rdo rje ni//sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes te//sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes ni//rdo rje sems dpa' rang gnas pas//ye shes rdo rje rang gsor zhing spro//e ma'o/
286b3(rgyud): rdo rje che mchog ni//nyid kyi mtshan du gsol ba ni//ces kyang mi shigs mi phyed la//cis kyang ma g.yos ma 'dres pas//bde chen mchog tu gyur pas na//kun kyang phyag rgya bzhi rgyas gdag/
286b4(rgyud): rgyal ba rnams kyi thubs nyid la//rdo rje 'chang rgyal thams cad kyi//rang gi rtag su bstan pa'i phyir//mi phyed rdo rje 'chang zhes bya//hUM ji ltar rgyal po rang gi rgyas//rgyal po gtsigs la btab pa
286b5(rgyud): ltar//bde chen snying la gnas pa dang //dbang chen dus la brtson pa yis//thams cad kun la de ltar 'debs//'da' dka' ji bzhin mi shigs pas//rgyal po phyag rgya mchog gnas//bdag
286b6(rgyud): nyid chen por mtshan ma'i gzugs//hUM phyag rgya zhes ni bsgrags pa yin//nyid kyi lus ni brtan phyiro//rdo rje rdo rje drag chen dang //rang nyid che ba'i bdag nyid dang //'dul ba thabs kyi rgyal po yis
286b7(rgyud): phye zhing bshig dang bcom la sogs//dkrugs shing thal ba rdul phran bzhin//brtsan zhing 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du 'dis//thams cad rdo rje nyid pas na//na mkha'i khams kun bkang ba yin///
287a1(rgyud): las rdo rje gsang 'byung ba la//oM badz+ra dz+wa lA na lArka hUM phaT//oM lus ngag yid gsum 'khar la ni//sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes te//snang mdzad 'khar la dpa' ba yin//snang
287a2(rgyud): mdzad 'khor lo rang gnas pas//ye shes 'khor lo gsor zhing spro//e ma'o 'khor lo che mchog gi/nyid kyi mtshan du gsol pa ni//cis kyang ma shigs mi byed pas//cis kyang ma ge r+m+ma
287a3(rgyud): ma 'dres pas//bde chen mchog tu gyur pas na//kun kyang phyag rgya bzhi rgyas gdab//rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs nyid las//'khor lo 'chang rgyal thams cad kyi//rang gi rtag su brtan pa'i
287a4(rgyud): phyir//mi phyed 'khor lo 'chang zhes bya//hUM ji ltar rgyal po rang gi rgyas//rgyal po'i gtsigs ni btab pa ltar//bde chen snying la gnas pa dang //dbang chen dus la brtson pa yis//thaMd
287a5(rgyud): kun la de ltar 'debs//'da' dka' ji bzhin mi shigs pas//rgyal po phyag rgya mchog gi gnas//bdag nyid chen po mtshan ma'i gzugs//phyag rgya zhes ni bsgrags pa yin//
287a6(rgyud): nyid kyi lus ni brtan phyiro//oM 'khor lo 'khor lo drag chen dang //rang nyid che ba'i bdag nyis dang //'dul ba'i thabs kyi rgyal po yis//phye zhing gzhig dang btsam la sogs//
287a7(rgyud): dkrugs shing thal ba rdul phran bzhin//hUM rtsan zhing 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du 'dis//thams cad 'khor lo nyid pas na//na mkha'i khams kun bkang ba yin//de las 'khor la
287b1(rgyud): gsong 'byung ba//oM tsakr-i dz+wa ldan lA ha hU~M phaT/oM lus ngag yod gsum pad ma ni//sku gsung thugs kyi ye shAs to//sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes no//pad+ma sems dpa' dpa' bo yin//pad+ma sems dpa/
287b2(rgyud): rang gnas pas//pad+ma dgra sta gsor zhing spro//e ma ho pad+ma che mcho gi/nyid kyi mtshan du gsol ba ni//cis kyang mi shegs me phyed la//cis kyang mi g.yos ma 'dres pas//bde chen mchog/
287b3(rgyud): tu gyur pas na//kun kyang phyag rgya bzhi rgyas btab//rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs nyid las//pad+ma 'chang rgyal thams cad kyis//rang gi rtagasu bstan pa'i phyir//mi phyed pad+ma 'chang zhes bya//
287b4(rgyud): oM ji ltar rgyal po rang gi rgyas//rgyal po gtsigs ni btab pa ltar//bde chen snying la gnas pa dang //dbang chen dus la brtson pa yis//thams cad kun la de ltar 'bebs//'da' dka'
287b5(rgyud): ji bzhin mi shogs pa//rgyal po phyag rgya mchog gi gnas//hUM/bdag nyid chen po mtshan ma gzugs//phyag rgya zhes ni bsgrags pa yin//nyid kyi lus ni brtan phyir//pad+ma dgra sta
287b6(rgyud): drag chen dang //rang nyid che ba'i bdag nyid dang //'dul ba thabs kyi rgyal po yis//phye zhing bsheg dang bcom la sogs//dkrugs shing thal ba rdul phran bzhin//brtsan zhing 'ibar ba'i
287b7(rgyud): 'phro 'du 'dis//thams cad pad+ma nyid pas ni//na mkha' khams kun bkang ba yin//de las pad+ma'i gsung phyung ba//oM pad+ma dz+wa la lA rka hUM phaT/hraM/lus dag yid gsum rin chen
288a1(rgyud): ni//sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes te//sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes ni//yon chen po dpa' bo yin//rin chen sems dpa dang gnas pas//ye shes dbyug/pa gsong
288a2(rgyud): zhing spro//e ma ho rdo rje rin chen che mchog gi/nyid kyi mtshan du gsol ba ni//cis kyang mi shigs mi byed la//cis kyang ma g.yes ma 'dres pas//bde chen mchog tu gyur pas na//
288a3(rgyud): kun kyang phyag rgya bzhi rgyas gdab//swaM/rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs nyid la//rin chen 'chang rgyal thams cad kyi//rang gi rtag su bstan pa'i phyir//mi phyed rin chen 'chang zhes bya//s+t+waM ji ltar
288a4(rgyud): rgyal ba rang gi rgyas//rgyal po'i gtsigs ni btab pa ltar//bde chen snying la gnas pa dang //dbang chen dus la brtson pa yis//thams cad kun la de ltar 'debs//'da' ka ji bzhin
288a5(rgyud): mi shigs pas//rgyal po phyag rgya mchog gi gnas//bdag nyid chen po mtshan ma'i gzugs//phyag rgya zhes ni bsgrags pa yin//nyid kyi lus ni brtan phyiraro//rin chen dbyig pa
288a6(rgyud): drag chen dang //rang nyid che ba'i bdag nyid dang //'dul ba thabs kyi rgyal po yis//phyi zhing bshig dang bcom la sogs//dkrugs shing thal ba rdul phran bzhin//brtsan zhir 'bur
288a7(rgyud): ba'i 'phro 'du yis//thams cad rin chen nyed pas na//na mkha' khams kun bkang ba yin//de las rin chen gsung 'byung ba//sr-i rang na dz+wa la lA rka s+t+waM phaT/haM lus ngag
288b1(rgyud): yid gsum phrin las ni//sku gsung thugs kyi yis te//sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes ni//las kyi sems dpa' dpa' bo yin//las kyi sems dpar nga gnas pas//ye shes ral gri 'debs shing
288b2(rgyud): /oM ma ho//las kyi tshe mtshig gi/nyid kyi mtshan du gsol ba ni//cis kyang mi shigs mi byed la//cis kyang ma g.yos ma 'dres pas//'dri chen mchog tu gyur pas na//kun kyang phyag rgya
288b3(rgyud): bzhi rgyas btab//haM rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs nyid las//ral gri 'chang rgyal thams cad kyi//rang gi rtag su bstan pa'i phyir//me phyed ral gri 'chang zhes bya//haM/ji ltar rgyal po rang gi
288b4(rgyud): rgyal//rgyal po'i gtsigs ni btab pa bzhin//bde chen snying la gnas pa dang //dbang chen dus la brtson pa yis//thams cad kun la de ltar 'debs//'da' dka' ji bzhin mi shigs pas///
288b5(rgyud): rgyal po phyag rgya mchog gnas//bdag nyid chen po'i mtshan ma'i gzugs//phyag rgya zhes ni bsgrags pa yin//nyid kyi lus ni brtan phyi ro// ra shringal gri drag chen dang //rang nyid che ba'i
288b6(rgyud): bdag nyid dang //'dul ba thabs kyi rgyal po yis//phyi zhing bshig dang bcom la sogs//dkrugs shing thal ba rdul phran bzhin//brtson zhing 'bar ba'i 'du 'phro 'dis//thams cad
288b7(rgyud): ral gri nyid pas na//na mkha'i khams kun bkang po yin//de las phrin las gsung byung ba'o//haM karma dz+wa la na lAM ka hUM phaT/mu lus ngag yid gsum dril bu las//sku gsung thug/
289a1(rgyud): nyid gtum par 'gyur//bskor thabs che ba'i mchog tshul du//rdo rje lan gsum gsor ba yis//lha mo klu mo rigs ngan+t+ra mo//da ma can rnal 'byor dbang du 'gyur//
289a2(rgyud): rnal 'byor pho mo gang snang ba'i//thams cad gcig tu 'dres par ni//yul la mngon du snang bar 'gyur//mi bskyod rdo rje thabs ldan pas//oM dang haM ni ma thal bar//lan gsum gsor
289a3(rgyud): chen gur dkar bsgom//lha ne'i dkyil 'khor mchog tu 'gyur//oM dang haM ni thal tsam du//kun tu gru bzhir bdag gnas te//len gsum gsor la gang brtsan pa//tshe dang bskul pa
289a4(rgyud): 'phel bar 'gyur//long spyod ci 'dod grub par 'gyur//de nas zla gam mdog dmar sham//'brel ba mnyam par lan gsum gyis//khros pas gsor la gang brtson pas//yid la
289a5(rgyud): dmigs dang las thams cad//dbang chen dkyil 'khor nyid du 'gyur//de las gtum pa'i mdog gnas te//drag tu phaT ces brjod pas ni//kha dog nag por bdag gnas shing //
289a6(rgyud): bskal pa 'bar ba'i dbus gnas pa//khros te dgug pa nyid dag tu//rgyang ni ring du 'phags pa dang //ci 'dod las rnams 'grub par nges//oM badz+ra da ha dz+wa la ha na badz+ra pa tsa dz+wa la
289a7(rgyud): badz+ra hUM phaT//chos la brtan pa phyag bsnams pa//sbubs ni dril bu chos khams te//shes rab yum gyi chog su brtag/skad ni gsung snyan bde ba mo//lce ni gar mkhan mya ngan 'das
289b1(rgyud): chos sku thugs kyi thugs nyid las//rab tu gsor lu gang brtson pas//muM la sogs pa'i yi ge bsgom//rdo rje 'khor lo pad+ma 'bar//muM gi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor ni//kun tu dbang spar
289b2(rgyud): yid 'ong ba'i//'dod pa bzhin du 'thun pas 'grub//oM badz+ra g+han Da pA sha d+harma d+ha ra/hUM hUM hUM zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la dgyes par gyur to//gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid
289b3(rgyud): nges pa las sgyu 'phrul chen po thabs dang shes rab tu 'byung ba phyag mtshan gyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o////de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam
289b4(rgyud): tshig bkod pa la snyoms par zhugs nas che du brjod pa 'di brjod do//shin tu phra ba'i dam tshig mchog/phyag rgya chen po'i phyag mthil du//thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa de//sor ni
289b5(rgyud): bzhi yi tshad du bya//'bru lnga spos lnga rin chen lnga//snying po lnga dang sman lnga dang //bdud rtsi lnga yis rab snyams la//rig pas thig ni gdab par bya//lte ba rtsibs dang ldan pa yi//rtse bzhi
289b6(rgyud): 'khor lo mu khyud bcas//gru chad bzhi dang gru bzhi yi//ba ra khyams sgo khyud ldan par bya//sen zlum tsam gyi nyi zla la//tsa na 'bru tsam pad+mo gdan//yungs 'bru tsam gyis yi ge las//
289b7(rgyud): phyag rgya til 'bru tsam du bri//bcos bu'i ras ni sna tshogs dang //rgyan phreng dud dang bro bas bskor//glu tshig bro gar rol mo yis//sprin phung tshogs kyis rab tu mchod//yum dang 'jom
290a1(rgyud): sems ma dang //ji ltar 'dod pa'i las bzhin mchod//dbyibs dang kha dog mtshan ldan pa'i//zhal tu gyur pa'i me 'os la//bza' btung bro ba'i tshogs rnams kyis/
290a2(rgyud): las bzhi mchod pa rab tu sbyin//khro bo'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin te//shin tu phra ba sbyangs pa yis//bsam yas dag la de bzhin bya//rigs pas dpag pa tsam du'o//mchod pa'i
290a3(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po ni//sems kyi yid bzhin sprin tshegs kyis//phyogs bcu thams cad sangs rgyas zhing //mnyan 'jam reg na bde ba yis//sna tshogs rin po che yi gzhi//
290a4(rgyud): mdzes par bris shing spras pa dang //kun 'byung rin chen phung po 'bar//dbyebs legs rdzing bu bro mchog bsil//rin chen khang pa sna tshogs dang //rgyan dang dpag bsams
290a5(rgyud): sngon pa'i tshal//gru dngas tshig su bcad pa'i sgra//bla re rgyal mtshan na bza' gdug to shal dpung rgyan se mo //bza' dang btung ba'i mchog rnams dang //rang la mdzes pas brgyan pa yi
290a6(rgyud): lha dang lha mo brdul bsnyed kyi//bro gar la sogs bsam yas kyis//phyogs bcu na mkha' khams bkang nas//dkyil 'khor kun la rgyas par dbul//skal ldan gsal
290a7(rgyud): nga'i khyad par gyis//rims kyis yang na gcig char du//chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam sbyor zhing //mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen por bsgom//gsal ldan ma 'am byin rlabs la//stong
290b1(rgyud): gsum yungs 'brur 'jug tshul du//dbyings nas dkyil 'khor spyan drangs mchod//mnyes nas 'grub pa'i dam tshig mchog/bdag nyid chen po mchod pa yis//sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor
290b2(rgyud): ma lus mnyes//srid gsum 'gro ba mo lus pa//dga' ba chen pos khyab par gyur//sgyu 'phrul dra ba brtan pa yis//phyogs bcu dus bzhir gshegs pa yi//sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma
290b3(rgyud): lus dang //khams gsum 'gro rnams mngon du gyur//lus ngag sems dang chos thaMd //gang na mi gnas mi dmigs pa//rang bzhin mnyam pa'i chos nyid la//mig yor tshul du sbyor ba
290b4(rgyud): yis//na mkha' la ni nam mkha' sgom//goms pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po la//kun byas dbang phyug rig pas 'jug/de nas slob ma gzhug par bya//de nas rigs kyi bu mchog des/rgyal srid
290b5(rgyud): dang ni rang gi lus//bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig/rab tu gces dang yid 'thad dbul//dbang phyug la sogs lngas mchod na//dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod pa yin//nye ba'i dkyil 'khor
290b6(rgyud): smos ci dgos//nyes pa thams cad dag par 'gyur//dad brtson brtul zhugs rab rtogs naso//phan pa'i dbang sbyin nus pa'i dbang rim pa bzhin du sbyin par bya//snying rjes chung ma zlos
290b7(rgyud): ping gzung //yang na thal mo rab snol nas//phyag rgya chen po yi phang du mi/dkyil 'khor 'dzub gang tshad du bya//mkhas pas cho ga bzhin du bya//yid na sa gzhi mnyam pa la//dkyis
291a1(rgyud): 'khor khru gang chad du bya//yang na lus ngag tshad ste//yang na lus ni gsum gyi nang //phur bu srad bu tshon phye dang //gos rgyun mdzes ma yid 'ong grogs//thig gdab cho ga phun
291a2(rgyud): sum tshogs//mkhas ldan chen pos bsgrims te bya//yang ni khro ni bcu drug dang //nyi shu 'am nyi shu rtsa lngar bya//rig kyi dkyil 'khor snga rnams bsgom//sku gsung thugs ldan gzugs
291a3(rgyud): kyang dgod//yang na rgyang grags dpag tshad dam//na mkha'i dbyings ni bsam yas par//sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sna tshogs bsgom//ma mthong rmongs pa ston phyir tshe na//kha dog nyi shu rtsa //
291a4(rgyud): 'am/lnga yi tshon gyis bri bar bya//'dul ba'i cho ga bzhin du dgyes//ting 'dzin rol mo mtha' yas mchog/yi ge 'am gdan nam snying po 'am//phyag rgya 'am sku gsung thugs ldan par//byin/
291a5(rgyud): brlabs ya mtshan rmang po che//'grub 'gyur sangs rgyas kun gyi dam//sa la sogs pa phyag rgyar byas//rnam grol rim par thob par 'gyur//dag pa'i ye shes kyis byas pa//smos ci
291a6(rgyud): dgos te de nyid yin//phyogs dus dkyil 'khar bdag nyid che//mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las//dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan //rang snang dbyer med dkyil 'khor la//'jug
291a7(rgyud): pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam sbyor ba//phyogs dus kun nas gshegs pa yi//sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes ni//kun tu bzang mo mi bsnyengs yin//kun tu bzang mor de gnas pas//yis dril
291b1(rgyud): bu bsil zhing spro//e ma ho sangs rgyas yum chen gyi//nyid kyi mtshan du gsol ba ni//ces kyang mi shogras ma phyed la//cis kyang mA g.yo ba ma 'dres pa//bde chen yum du gyur pas na//kun kyang phyag rgya
291b2(rgyud): yum lngas btab//muM kun tu bzang mo'i thugs nyid las//rdo rje yum chen thams cad kyi//rang gi rtag su bstan pa'i phyir//mi phyed dril bu 'chang zhes bya//muM ji ltar rgyal po'i gnas bshams te/
291b3(rgyud): rgyal pos gtsigs chen 'gyed pa ltar//bde chen yum du gnas pa dang //dbang chen dus la brtson pa yis//thams cad kun la da ltar 'debs//'da' dka' je bzhin mi shigs pas//rgyal po/
291b4(rgyud): phyag rgya mchog gi gnas//bdag nyid yum chen mtshan me'i gzugs//phyag rgya zhes ni bsgrags pa yin//nyid kyi lus ni brtan phyir//muM dril bu dril bu grags snyan dang //yum nyid che ba'i
291b5(rgyud): bdag nyid dang //'dul ba thabs kyi rgyal mo yis//phye zhing bshig dang bcom la sogs//dkrugs zhing thal ba rdul phran bzhin//brtsan zhing 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du 'dis//thams cad dril du nyid
291b6(rgyud): pas na//na mkha' khams kun bkang ba yin//de las chos sku gsung 'byung ba//muM g+ha dz+wa la la rka muM zhes brjod pas//phyag rgya'i tshogasu snang bar gyur to//gsang ba'i snying po kho na nyid dra ba
291b7(rgyud): las mtshon chad dam tshig phyag rgya klu'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos thabs dang shes rab 'byung zhes bya ba 'di ched brjod pa
292a1(rgyud): 'di brjod do//de nas yid dang chos 'thun par//thugs kyi phyag rgya rdo rje 'chang //shes rab dril bu chos la brgyan//hUM dang muM ge snying po 'bar//de las rdo rje rtse bcur 'bar/
292a2(rgyud): oM dang mu gi mchog tu brtag/shes rab nyi zer zla rgyas thabs//'bar ba'i phung pos chos la brtan//de las gzung thabs gnyis kyis ni//'bru lnga phyag rgya nyid du ste//de las rdo rje phyug//
292a3(rgyud): bsnams gsor//de las 'khor lo phyag bsnams gsor//de las nor bu phyag bsnams pa//dro las pad+ma phyag bsnams 'dzin//de las ral gri phyag bsnams gcod//de nyid rdo rje
292a4(rgyud): phyag bsnams pa//thabs chen drug tu yang dag gsor//de las rdo rje gzung thabs gnyis//oM dang muM gyi mtshon bzhin du//rdo rje rtse bcu thabs chen po//thugs kang bstan pa'i
292a5(rgyud): tshul du 'bar//sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' yi//phyag na mi 'jigs thugs kar 'dzin//muM las phyag rgya chen po ni//dril bsil 'bar bas sangs rgyas yum//mchod gnas chos
292a6(rgyud): la brtan par 'dzin//thams cad kun tu phyag rgya yi//thabs dang shes rab rdo rje 'chang //sku gsung thugs ni thams cad pa//yen phrin las kun tu rdzogs//sgyu 'phral dra bas byang
292a7(rgyud): chub pa'i//sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang du dmigs//de las rdo rje mchog bsnams pa//de las mi bskyod nyi ma'i lam//sku gsung thugs kyi yon pas//oM hU~M sraM gyi rtser 'dzin
292b1(rgyud): /nyid yas yang dgra spyod tshul du//shes rab yum du shin tu brtags//rdo rje 'bar bas rab brtan ya/thabs chen yid ni sangs rgyas yab/gcig dang du ma yongs kyis med//de las 'grod na
292b2(rgyud): byin las rgya char//yid dong chesu rab brtags pa'i//rdo rje 'chang rgyal tshul chen las//rdo rje drag por lan gsum gsod//gtum pa'i sngags brjod de bskyed pas//bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'tsha
292b3(rgyud): rab tu rdzogs//nye bar gyur pa'i dam tshig mchog/dpag bsams shing dang yid bzhin gyi//rin chen dbyig dang 'byung ba kun//de dag rdzas yang ma yin te//rang sems bsod nams brtan
292b4(rgyud): pa yin//ngo mtshar cho 'phrul rmad kyi chos//gzhan nas yong 'ong ma yin te//thabs la brten pa'i shes rab nyid//de lta bu'i ngang du 'byung //shes rab dbyings kyi de bzhin nyid//thabs kyi phyag
292b5(rgyud): rgyar gyur pa'i phyir//ye shes la ni ye shes rol//ye shes rol pa nyid kyang gsog/rgyal ba mngon byung skyob pa dang //byin brlabs ston pa'ang de bzhin te//bya byed nus mthu'i gzi byin gyi//
292b6(rgyud): sgyu ma rdo rje rtsen po mchog/cho ga lnga ni rdzogs byas shing //yo byad lnga ni rdzogs par ldan//sngags kyi yon lag lnga rdzogs pas//ma nyams 'jug pa rabo brtson pa//zhag ni sum cu
292b7(rgyud): phrag drug gam//bcu gnyis lacu bzhi bcu drug gis//dbang sgyur rigs kyi dam pa 'grub//de cha bcu drug tshun chad kyis//sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs pa ni//ye shes thig le de nye
293a1(rgyud): ye shes thig le nyid snang ba//bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog/phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i//zhing khams rnam dag bsam yas dang //rgya dang
293a2(rgyud): bral ba'i bzhal yas khang //'khor lo rgyan dang rol mo'i tshogs//dkyil 'khor ma lus bsam yas kun//mthong nas nye bar mnyes pa dang //rgya chen gsung las don byung ba//'thun
293a3(rgyud): pa'i ye shes rang snang //gcig dang du mar bral ba yi//mtha' dang dbus med de bzhin nyid//sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi gshegs te//rang byung ye shes gnas med snang //log par
293a4(rgyud): rtog brtags rnam dag cing //ye shes dbyings las mi gzhan phyir//thugs rje chen pos 'brel pas na//'gro drug dus gnas ma lus snang //bde ba chen mo'i dkyil 'khor ni//
293a5(rgyud): stangs dbyal gnyis sam yang na lnga//byas te dad ldan rab zhugs na//'dod pa yid 'ong mnyam par 'gyur//skal ba mnyam pa'i ye shes de//gnyer na nye bar mnyam pa yi//ya
293a6(rgyud): mtshan chen po 'byung bar nges//dad med nyams na phung bar 'gyur zhes che du brjod//rdo rje bkod pa gsang ba dam tshig gi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o////de nas de bzhin gshegs
293a7(rgyud): pa rgyud kyi rgyal po rgyu 'phrul dra ba las lhag pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor gyis dngos grub blang ba'i thabs 'di gsungs//ye nas mnyam nyid dkyil 'khor la//thabs dang shA
293b1(rgyud): rab ldan byas te//rang rig ye shes rgyal po yis//thams cad ma lus maN Da la//de bzhin nyid kyi gzhal yas la//rig pa rang 'byung gyur pa yis//mnyam par mnyam la mi gnas pa'i//cho sa//
293b2(rgyud): phyag rgya chen por bsgom//'jig rten brtan g.yo thams cad la//rang bzhin dkyil 'khor gnas mod kyi//gzung 'dzin rnam rtog zhags pa yis//rang rig bsgribs shing bdag tu bcings//
293b3(rgyud): kun gyis yang dag rtogs bya'i phyir//de bzhin chos sku'i gzugs brnyan bstan//rtog dang mi rtag rang rig dang //yang dag thongs chen rdzogs pa'i don//rin chen sna tshogs la sogs dang //
293b4(rgyud): 'byung ba bzhi las gyur rnams kun//thams cad byang chub mchog gi rgyu//gzugs sogs ri mor bris pa dag/ye shes chen po rab 'byam gyis//don du mi 'gyur yong mo gsungs//de
293b5(rgyud): bzhin ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor gyis//thams cad dbyingasu bsdus nas ni//nyid kyi thugs la bstim byas te//thams cad chos sku'i phyag rgya che//dkyil 'khor rnam gsum dag byas pa/
293b6(rgyud): na mkha'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du//rang rig ye shes 'du 'phro yis//thams cad chos sku phyag rgya che//yang dag rtogs pa'i khyad par gyis//ting 'dzin don rnams gsal bsgoms /
293b7(rgyud): mA ma kI'i rgyun chags la//yang dag chos sku phyag rgya che//de bzhin ting 'dzin gsal bsgoms nas//don mchog ma lus rdzogs pa'i phyir//mkha' la 'phro ba'i dkyil 'khor du//
294a1(rgyud): dri med ches sku phyag rgya gsal//dbyings dang de bzhin nyid med par//ting 'dzin gyi dbang bsgyur nas//kha dog dbyibs dang gzugasu bsgyur//sna tshogs phrin las rnam par rol//
294a2(rgyud): don gyi snying po mchog rnams kyang //byang chub phyogs rnams rab tu rdzogs//'jig rten gtso mchog rnams kyis bskor//Ab+h+yo/chos sku phyag rgya de dag las//las lnga'i dkyil
294a3(rgyud): 'khor rab tu bsgrub//ting 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur na//ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'brub//drag po gtum po gtul ba'i phyir//bdag nyid drag po bsgoms nas ni//chos sku
294a4(rgyud): nag po 'od 'bar gyis//bgegs kyi ling ba gnon par bya//gtum po rngam po'ang brlag par 'gyur//mi mthun phyogs kyang rdul du rlag/'di dang 'gro ba thams cad//shin du/
294a5(rgyud): stobs drag che ldan 'gyur//thams cad gnyis med dbyings bsdu'i phyir//bdag nyid ha ya b+hI bar bsgom//dmar po'i chos sku gsal bsgoms te//mi mthun phyogs rnams da//
294a6(rgyud): du gding //ting 'dzin gsal bas byin brlabs na//thaMd mau lus dbang du bsdu//mthu chen dag kyang phyi bzhin 'drang //ci 'dod las rnams byed par 'gyur//thams cad yon+d+ra 'phel bya'i phyi/
294a7(rgyud): bdag nyid rgyal ba'i khyu mchog s+ho//gser gyi mdog 'dra phyag rgyar bsgom//gang 'phel chos sku gdan du bdag/de ltar dag pas byin brlabs na//yon+ta na mkha'i mtha' dang mnyan/
294b1(rgyud): tshe dang yang spyod 'phel ba dang //ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub//thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis//gtum khra ma lus zhi bya'i phyir//dkar zhing 'char ba'i chos su bsgom//gang zhig gtum//
294b2(rgyud): khro zhi ba'i gdan//de bzhin teng 'dzin byin brlabs na//gtum po rngam po'ang zhi bar 'gyur//gzhan yang ji ltar dmigs pa bzhi no//zhi zhing dul ba nyid du 'gyur//thams cad mkhyen pa'i yis
294b3(rgyud): kyis//rnam bzhi dkyil 'khor dbyingasu bsdus//bya byed med par dkyil 'khor spyod//lhun 'grub dkyil 'khor ye nas rdzogs//a haM/tshe sku phyag rgya chen po ni//dngos grub gang 'dod sbyin par
294b4(rgyud): des//nye ba'i lha ni gang bsgrub pa//phyag rgya'i snying po bris bcug na//gang bsgoms the tshom med par 'grub//de ni rgyal ba kun dang mnyam//the tshom med nges 'grub 'gyur//'jig rten pa yi b+h+ya
294b5(rgyud): sgrubs na//lha yi snying po gang yang rung //bris te dkyil 'khor nang bcug na//lha de nye bar 'grub par 'gyur//chos nyid rten cing 'brel bris na//chos kyi don rnams rtogs 'gyur te//rang dang spyi
294b6(rgyud): yi don rtogs nas//skye rgan 'chi med par rtogs//phyag rgya chen po dengag sa//nyon mongs las rnams sbyong byed pa'o//snying po ma nor don bris na//ngan song sdug bsngal med par 'gyur//gzhan
294b7(rgyud): yang dkyil 'khor ngas ma yas dang //dpag tshad med pa'i phyag rgya che//sku gsung thugs ni rgyun mi chad//zhing khams bye baM rdul dang mnyam//a ho/rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o//sgyu 'phrul
294'a1(rgyud): dA ba las lhag pa'i gzugs brnyan gyis dngos grub len pa'i thabs te mchod rten gdab pa'i le'u s+t+re sh+'u da//de nas com ldan 'das dgyes pa tshan ba rgyu
294'a2(rgyud): dang sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i Sh+Ti badz+ran la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod//shes rab thags kyi phyag dz+hal mo//badri ba'i 'bru tshogs gsal ba'i rgyun//rdo rje lam las /
294'a3(rgyud): bskyil//rtse nus bstim zhing dkyil 'khor skya//nyan byed 'khor lo'i gzhal yas//gsal ba'i thig le ngo bo nyid//rlung gi phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog las//rin chen dkyil la
294'a4(rgyud): gsol spro bstim//tra~M/gsang ba'i gsang chen+do gsang mchog dang //gsang ba kun la mnyan par bya//gsang ba'i don nyid rtogs pa las//gzhan du smra bar bya ba min//gsal ba'i 'khor
294'a5(rgyud): lo gzha ya sa//gsal ba'i thig le ngo bo nyid//yi ge phreng ba'i tshogs mchog las//rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal spro thim//oM dus gsum rgyal po'i sras chen po//sku gsung
294'a6(rgyud): thugs kyi rdo rje drung //rgyal ba thams nAd mnyis mchod la//rgyal bu kun dang mnyam par sbyor//lag pa'i 'khor lo gzhal yas//gsal ba'i thig le'i ngo bo nyid//hUM gau phyug
294'a7(rgyud): rgya'i tshogs mchog las//las kyi dkyil 'khor gsal spro thim//oM khyod ni rdo rje las yon pas//las rnams ma lus kun byos shig/pho nya 'du 'phro mang po kun//khyod
294'b1(rgyud): dgos pa byed pa yin//sgra byed 'khor lo'i gzhal yas//gsang ba'i thig le ngo bo nyid//hrIHyi phyag rgya tshogs mchog las//chos kyi 'khor lo gsal spro thim//oM chos kyi bdud rtsi bla
294'b2(rgyud): med kyis//dad ldan skyes bu ngoms par byos//rab 'bring tha ma'i blo can la//'thun par gsang bsgrags gzhal du min//bskyod chen 'khor lo'i gzhal ya suM//gsal ba'i thig le'i ngo bo
294'b3(rgyud): nyid//hUM/oM s+t+waM oM haM rnams las//dkyil 'khor lnga dang khro phreng bsgom//phyogs bcu dus bzhi thaMd kyi//sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje che//dkyil 'khor kun gyi byed pa po//dkyil 'khor/
294'b4(rgyud): kun gyi sbyin pa spyod//slob dpon mnyes par ma byas shing //dbang rnams thob par ma byas par//nyan pa la sogs rtsom pa rnams//'bras bu med cing brlag par 'gyur//dbu rgyan cod pan
294'b5(rgyud): phreng nga ba dang //go cha rgyal mtshan phyag rgya dang //gdugs dang bum pa bzang btung dang //snying po lnga yis dbang bskur na//dus 'di phan chad rgyal ba'i sras//ngan song thams cad med
294'b6(rgyud): pa dang //gnyen por gyur pa'i rtsal 'chang bas//tshe ring bde ba phun sum tshogs//kun tu bzang po la sogs mtshan//mtho ris thar pa'i dbang por 'gyur//lus dang phung por bcas
294'b7(rgyud): ma'i sa//rig 'dzin lha gnas pa yin//rig 'dzin sa la gnas pa'i sa//bla med kun tu bzang por 'gyur//yum dang sgeg mo la sogs la//de nyid byin gyis rlob par 'gyur//
295a1(rgyud): pho nya 'du 'phro mang po rnams//sangs rgyas bka' las mi 'dra' zhing //de yi dgos pa byed pa dang //sgro dang bskur ba la sogs pa//de ni myur du brnag par 'gyur/
295a2(rgyud): ring bde ba phun sum tshogs//mtho ris thar pa'i bdag por 'gyur zhes ched du brjod//gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dbang sbyin pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gcig pa'o///
295a3(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs nas lhag pa'i ting 'dzin gyis dngos grub myur bar len pa'i thabs 'di gsung so//de bzhin nyid dang
295a4(rgyud): mnyam sbyor phyir//dam pa'i don gyis bsgom par bya//byang chub phyogs la gzung bar gnas//mchog tu bde ba'i zhing gnas pas//mnyam rdzogs chen po lhun bsgom zhing //
295a5(rgyud): byang chub sem su brtan par gzung //bya ba med las bya byed bya//mig nA gnas la gnas par bsgom//b+ha ga'i dkyil du ling ga a//shin tu 'chor zhing gsal bsgoms nas//'od 'phro
295a6(rgyud): 'bar bas thams cad khyab//dus gsum ngan song gnas bsregs nas//b+ha ga'i dkyil du 'od 'phro thim//thim 'gyur dbyings nas 'od 'phro 'bar//a ma las ni zla nyi 'gra/
295a7(rgyud): phyogs bcur 'ayoms pa'i mun sel zhing //nyon mongs sdug bsngal bsil ba'i sman//thugs rje'i byin brlabs bsam mi khyab//rol pa'i phyag rgya bsam mi khyab//mkha'
295b1(rgyud): na ma su smra/ na smra smra /rgyu sa / sma du
295b2(rgyud): //klu bla na na/ d+hA nis /shi sh+tsa pa myu bag tu
295b3(rgyud): ga du// gang 'dris pa dang / nga gas tshe che gang de ber nas/ i shes padzin pa rgyun //
296a1(rgyud): 'phro 'bar zhing don byed bsgoms//yang na phyag rgya chen po ste//bdag nyid zhal gcig phyug gnyis bsam//zhal gsum phyag drug rtag tu bsgom//gzhal las khang nga
296a2(rgyud): gdan khri rnams//phra ba'i tshul de snga ma bzhin//mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad ldan//rdo rje 'khor lo ral bre 'bar//rin chen pad+ma dril bu 'bar//phyag rgya chen po de dag las//phyogs bcu ma/
296a3(rgyud): lus gzhal yas khang //nyi zla gza' skar dkyil 'khor gdan dang rgyan//bde gshegs dkyil 'khor ma lus bsgom//thugs rje byin rlabs 'gro don mdzad//zhi ba phyogs gcig shes
296a4(rgyud): bya smra//sa bcu mnyam par sbyong byed cing //bde gshegs 'khor yang dag par byed//de ltar sgrub pa'i rigs mchog de//'bras bu mngon du ma smin kyang //sdug bsngal thams cad yod mi
296a5(rgyud): 'byung //lha mi mtshan rdzogs yongasu 'grub//theg pa dman par yong mi skye//bde gshegs 'byung dang skol mi 'gyur//byang chub gzungs la zhugs pa yin zhes nyid la nyid gsung so///
296a6(rgyud): rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o//gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las rdo rje sems dpa' sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o////de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po
296a7(rgyud): sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyal po sgyur ba zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjed//rgyu gcig dang ni yig 'bru tshul//byin gyi rlabs dang mngon sum par//rab tu
296b1(rgyud): na// san sa rgyal s+ho// shA dzin sa sas/ sgyu ma du smras pa /sa d+ha rgyun du 'anam//man rdza
296b2(rgyud): 'khor bskyes//gzugs sku dri ri rig la sogs//rnam sbyin hU~M shes pa \u0f7f//tshus kyi nyid du sa//mngon khri ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgon//gis rkyen par brjid gyu dang tshi/
296b3(rgyud): blo gar tshogs kyi sprin phung la//hUM du shes blang ba spyad na//de mtshor smad byung ba yi//dkyil 'khor ma lus mnyes par 'gyur//lha mo k+Sha mo rigs ngan mo//dbye'am yang na mi dbye bar//bsnyen
296b4(rgyud): pa dang ni nye bsnyen du'o//sgrub pa dang ni sgrub chen po//sran gyi ng+gA'i dkyil ladzir du//de pa'i thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ste//sangs rgyas smin tshogs ma lus pa//dkyus mnyam mchog gi sbyin
296b5(rgyud): //b+hu \u0f7fnyiH snying po de//'bri ga sa gnas de dag nyid//mnad pa rgyan por mnyes sbyar zhing //dkyil 'khor rdo rje hUM yos nga //mkha gro gsal bar tshal sogs//yid ni ni
296b6(rgyud): sbyin gyi bdage por 'gyur//zhing 'gyur mchog dang mchog phrin rnams//nyi zla'i dkyil du mkhas pas gnag/nga rgyal lag gis 'du byed stom//hU~Mdu gyur pas rnam par dag/dbying du thimam
296b7(rgyud): byig rgyar 'bar//sur 'gyur 'ad zer 'bro ngas brjid//gtsug tor rnam par rgyal pa rlom//ngo mtshar ngan 'gro bar pa'i thangs//yinas skye med de bzhin nyid//rgya ma snang po mig ma
297a1(rgyud): tshul//sbyor sgrol bya ba kun byas kyang //rdul cha tsam yang byas pa med//snod bcud rgyud rnams dag rtogs shing //mnyam nyid lhag pa'i mnyam nyid kyis//dkyil 'khor kun tu
297a2(rgyud): bzang po'i zhing //byed spyod tshogs chen gnyis gyur nas//yan lag ma nyams yo byad ldan//cho ga rdzogs par shes pa yi//rnal 'byor tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis//nges par la
297a3(rgyud): pa'i dgos pa 'grub//lnga zhing lnga dang sbyor ba yi//chom bu lnga yi lha bkod la//khro bo bcu dang khro mo bcu//'khor lo'i tshul du rnam par sgom//de bzhin gshegs dang rdo rje'i rigs
297a4(rgyud): pad+mo'i rigs dang sku gsung thugs//khro bo'i tshogs dang ldan pa yi//tshom bu gsum gyi lha rnams bsgom//rigs kyi rigs te rigs kyi gtso//thugs kyi thugs te thugs kyi mchog
297a5(rgyud): phra bo'i tshogs dang ldan pa yi//chom bu gcig gi lha rnams bsgom//khro bo khro mo tshogs chen dang //po nya phyag brnyan bka' nyan tshogs//ci bgyi la sogs pa rnams kyis//dngos
297a6(rgyud): grub las rnams rdzogs par byed//rnal 'byor sngags 'chad dngos grub ni//mnyam rdzogs lhun grub dang gnas shing //spyod pa ci la'ang thogs med pa'i//thams cad ye nas dbyed
297a7(rgyud): med pa'i//rdo rje'i rigasu thams cad dkyil//'od 'phro 'bar ba rab tu bsgom//chags med tshul gyis bstim par bya//gnyis med gyur nas phyag rgya che//yang na sku gsung thugs
297b1(rgyud): nyidade//thams cad ma lus sku gsung thugs//ting 'dzin gsal bar 'od zer 'phro//gnyis med dbyings kyi dang du thi ma//rnyog 'dzin dngos grub mchog tho' 'gyur//kyil 'khor ma lus 'ang/
297b2(rgyud): ba 'grub//nyon mongs sdug bsngal sel bar byed//rdo rje rig su bskyed pa'i gnas//sngags 'chang dngos grub yang dag ni//thangs dang shes rab thams cad kyis//dkyil 'khor lnga dang khro
297b3(rgyud): phreng bsgom//chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis ni//'od zer rnam pa mang po spro//gnyisu med par bstim par bya//dngos grub mchog gi snying po 'grub//rnal 'byor thabs dang shes rab kyis//
297b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs dang yum du bsgom//sems dpa' sems ma nyid du bsgom//so so sngags dang phyag rgya dang //ting 'dzin yang dag so sor gsal//gnas dang long spyod ci bde dang //ma
297b5(rgyud): nyams blo ni rab ldan pas//drang po dam mnos bzhin du bya//le lo spyod sgom med pa yi//the tshom med par bsgrub byas nas//dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur//rdo rje gsang
297b6(rgyud): mchog dam pa thog/sgrub pa'i zhag dang tshes grangs ni//rgyud las smos pa bzhin du bya//rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o//zhes de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa nyid
297b7(rgyud): ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do//gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o////de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes
298a1(rgyud): pa chen po ro mo'i sprin rnam par spros te//rgyan bkod pa'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas tshangadu brjod pa 'di brjod//sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs
298a2(rgyud): pa'o//dkyil 'khor brtan pa'i ting 'dzin//bro gar phyag rgya'i 'du 'phro yis//'dzul lam na mkhar 'gro bar 'gyur//tshig sgra yi phyag rgya m+bi/hUM kyis dod grung thob lnga 'gyur//rgyan dang ba
298a3(rgyud): rgya yis//'bar ba'i rgyal po thogs med 'brub//bza' dang btung ba'i phyag rgyas ni//yid bzhin sku dang bdud rtsir 'grub/A li kA li'-i phyag rgya yis//sku bsung mchog gi thugs ldan//
298a4(rgyud): pas/dA thams cad thams cad 'grub par 'gyur//shes 'jug mtshan nyid 'byor pa'i gzungs//'bras bu smin byed rgyu dang rkyen//nus mthu can du gang gyur pa//rig 'dzin rgyal
298a5(rgyud): po'i zhing du grags//mi dang lha dang tshangs pa yi//skye ba rnam dag 'dzin mod kyi//khyad par sa la gnas gyur yin//pha rol phyin pa kun tu rdzogs//thabs dang shes rab mchog//
298a6(rgyud): gi mchog gyur pa'i//sa yi khyad par bcu dang gsum//rgyu 'bras khyad par lhun gyis rdzogs//mkha' dbyings dang ba'i dbyings nyi zla//ye shes rgyal po stangs 'byal skem/
298a7(rgyud): rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kun//ma lus par ni bsgrims par 'gyur//dus bzhi phyogs bcu gang nas kyang //rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnyed mi 'gyur//sems nyid
298b1(rgyud): rnas ga sangs rgyas te/sa su nus pazhan du malato//sbrum sbyong bas//dbya 'khrang rnams da zung ba 'jug/tug tsug gan pa ra//rgyun tu na/
298b2(rgyud): du la dos pa sbyin kyis sa pa / mas par b+hur ts+tsha swA gsung thugs dang na ldan A~M dz+haiM bis 'di
298b3(rgyud): mdzong nangs lnga chags pa sA+es+yA/hUMsgyu rnams med du banags paN+Dam//hU~M hrId+b+ha//dus gnas ming tshig stong //zab ni spyod yul lhag par rdzogs brtags
298b4(rgyud): pa du//U le kA li la sogs bdod pa'i stong pa nyid//phyug rtswasku gsung thugs//thugs kyi rmugs chen ma rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus ni//rnyed de ma pa
298b5(rgyud): thab sa rab tu gsal//mnyam nyid khyab pa'i sbyangs dkyil yon mchog ste stegs kyi drin las rdzogs//rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o//gsang ba'i skying pa de kho nat+ta nges pa
298b6(rgyud): las chags rgyab pa'i leSh+ma ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o///de nas de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs brgya dus bzhi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thams cad gcig tu
298b7(rgyud): 'dus nas dkyim pa chen pos ches thams cad y-i ras rdzogs pa che bar rgyun gyis thub 'i gi shin tu gsang ba'i snying ba'i sprin pod ti 'dzin pa rnams
299a1(rgyud): zhugs nas che brjod pa 'di brjod//ma rtags pa dang lkug par rtogs//phyogs rtags yang dag nyid ma rtags//'dul ba dgongs pa gsang ba dang //rang bzhin
299a2(rgyud): gsang ba'i don rnams ni//yi ge sgra btegs ming tshogs lo//brten pa'i tshig gis rab mtshon ste//khong nas gang sbas don 'byin pa//smyon pa rdo rje thugs la gnas//dkyil 'a
299a3(rgyud): ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis//dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor bsgom//dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor las byung ba/thun kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog/gsang ba'i thig le dkyil
299a4(rgyud): 'khor dbyings//sku gsung thugs rig kun mnga' ba'i//bder gshegs kun gyi snying po rdzogs//'byung ba shes rab rigs kyi yum//chen po shes rab de bzhin te//byang chub
299a5(rgyud): sems ni rdo rje tshogs dbang po yul dus rig pa'i rnams//kun tu bzang po'i dkyil 'khor lo//bdag nyid chen po lhag pa yi//thugs kyi ye shes lngas lta zhing //snying pa
299a6(rgyud): thibra le mnyam sbyor bas//bde ba'i ye shes rol mo yis//ye shes dgyes la mnyes par 'bul//zag pa med pa'i bsod nams kyis//ye shes sgyu ma rang snang ba//rol mo'i
299a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor mtho yas mchog/gsang ba'i thig le nyid kyi dbyings//de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos//phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i//sku gsung yon+ta 'phrin
299b1(rgyud): las thugs//ma lus bdag nyid zhal mthong ba//dbang sgyur mchog nyid dam pa yin//dkyil 'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor nyid//rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub//rgyan du dkyul
299b2(rgyud): 'khor ma lus thob//rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor man+ta mo sbyor las//thugs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs kyis 'byung //phyogs dus dkyil 'khor 'dul ba'i mgon//sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor/
299b3(rgyud): sgrol ba yis//bya byed med par dkyil 'khor spyod//ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la//thos bsams bsgoms pa'i mnyam sbyor gyis//rang byung kun nam lhun gyis grub/'di ni
299b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis//'da' bar me mdzad dam tshig mchog/gang zhig 'di la mos gyur pa//sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis//phyogs dus kun nas thams cad du//
299b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor ma lus bsnyen pa yis//nye ba'i srasu dgongs par 'gyur//bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed du//shin tu sbyangs la rab gnas shing //dkyil 'khor ma lus bsnyen pa yi//
299b6(rgyud): 'bras bu gsang chen 'di yin te//'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na//'das dang da ltar byung ba yi//rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pas//brnyes pas sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs//
299b7(rgyud): 'byung dang ma 'ongs thams cad kun//'di yis lhun gyis grub par 'gyur//'di ni gsang chen nges pa yi//'bras bu lam du gyur pa yin//rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus la//'di
300a1(rgyud): yis gsang ba'i nges don med//btsal kyang rgyal bas mi rnyed//kun gyi phyag rgya chen po mchog/thos bsams bsgoms la rab sbyangs pa'i//shes rab mig ldan
300a2(rgyud): rnams kyis gzung //snod ldan dang tshul bzang la brtan//lus dang long spyod gtong la sbyin//gzhan du nam yang sbyin mi bya//rmongs la 'phyar bas gal te sbyin//dus min par ni srog
300a3(rgyud): zang nus//bsregs dang spangs par yun ring gnas//shes de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la tshad du brjod do//dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis//dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil
300a4(rgyud): 'khor bsgom//dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor las byung ba//thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog/gsang ba'i spying po de kho na nyid nges pa las shin tu gsang ba man
300a5(rgyud): dgra gi snying po'i le'u ste nyi shu lnga pa'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos dgyes pa chen po'i ngang las gsang ba 'byung ba bya ba 'ang che du brjod pa
300a6(rgyud): 'di brjod//e ma'o//thams cad ma lus dus gsum bder gshegs mchog/bdod nas ma skyes rnam dag byang chub sems//rang bzhin dbyer med gdong mtha' mi
300a7(rgyud): 'byed cing //ye nas mnyam pas rgyal ba rgya mtsho yin//'gro 'ong med par dus gsum gcig char rdzogs//dbye bsal med cing bzang ngan blang dor med//rnam rtog/
300b1(rgyud): nyi na yis rang bzhin te//rnam rtog mi skyed ye shes brjod med//bdag tu med pa'i spros mchog sngon sbyangs pa//khyi la 'ga' tsom gal te 'byung 'gyur zhing //sna rabs phyis 'byung /
300b2(rgyud): dag dang dbyer med pa'i//mngon sum sangs rgyas skyes mchog de dag la//bskal pa 'ga' naso shes rab blo sbyangs pa//dad ldan 'ga' yis 'tsham par ci theg go/bdag nyid
300b3(rgyud): ma mthong shes rgyud ma 'byongs pa//gzhan du tshol zhing rmongs pa'i sems can gyis//stan kyang ma thos mtshon kyang ma mthong ba//bdag cag gzhan du tshal bas sangs mi rgyas//
300b4(rgyud): de dang ma bral ston pa mi mthong zhing //bgrod par 'dod pas phyin par mi nus te//shas rgyud ci yin gang gis ngo shes shing //bya byed las 'phags gyin 'da' 'dug byed pa//gang zhig
300b5(rgyud): blo la dpyod pa byang chub thob//ma spangs mtshan ma kun bral yod med pas//dran byed mi spong 'khor rgyun mi 'byed de//ma snyigs mi 'byed mngon sum sangs rgyas la//blo yi rig pas
300b6(rgyud): dpyad cing nan tan dang //mchod cing brten pas byang chub thob mngon te//nam mkha' gzung bas sprin gyis khebs par 'gyur//nam mkha' med par gang gis shes pa na//sprin zhig 'byung
300b7(rgyud): zhing khabs par mi srid//rnam par rtog pa'i g.yung drung sangs rgyas la//thams cad ye nas mnyam gnas rnam dag cing //mi rtag sa ler gnas la rtog pa mdzad//snyad du med pas sna
301a1(rgyud): tshogs 'byung ba yin//bdag med bdag chen thams cad 'byung ba'i gter//ma bkag pa las rgyu zhing 'byung med pa'i//thams cad sems kyi ngang ste sems zhes gdas
301a2(rgyud): su med//ma bcos lhun gnas ye nas byang chub cing //thob rgyu med pas yaM nas bder gshegs yin zhes brjod pas chos dang ye shes kyi khams thams cad rang bzhin sangs rgyas
301a3(rgyud): bar de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to//mkhyen nas ji bzhin pa'i bdag nyid chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dra ba las rje
301a4(rgyud): gsang ba'i tshig 'di phyung //e ma'o ma bsgrubs grub chen po//grub pa chen po yis che//blang dor med pa'i sa chen po//mi g.yo 'du 'bral med pa'i gzungs//rtog pa'i ye shes yid bzhin
301a5(rgyud): gter//thams cad la yang me long bzhin//bltas kyang gzugs brnyan mi snang //gang na gsang chen 'di yod par//me ma mur gyi dong 'bogs la//spu gri so ni btams pa la//

301b1(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa tshon pas mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs nas nyid kyi sku la thams cad ma lus par ston te ched du brjod pa 'di brjod//'das dang de ltar/

301b3(rgyud): ji snyed bstan gso la sogs pa//sgyu ma mig yod tshul yin te//skyes bu blo rtsal rab ldan pas//de la rtag tu mnyam sbyor zhing //sems can kun gyi zhing gyur pa//de dag gnyis
301b4(rgyud): med dbyingasu sbyor//thams cad thabs kyi mtshan nyid//thabs la thabs ni rnam par sbyor//thabs dang thabs las byung ba yi//da ni byang chub rdo rje mchog/ji snyed brjod pa'i kha rgyud
301b5(rgyud): kyang //yang dag don gyi snying po ni//gang nas btsal kyang mi rnyed//rang rig sgrib med dag pa yin//de la rtag 'grus goms pa ni//bstan pa'i dam pa de yin te//de ni ma nor lam smin
301b6(rgyud): byar//a yis bo d+hi rab tu bsdus//de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid ni//gcig gam 'di zhes brjod med//gsum du sna tshogs 'byung zhing 'phro//byin brlabs bsam yA mtha' yu mcho/

302a1(rgyud): ga chad mar bshad//chad bzhis phab pa'i don yin te//dag pa rnam gsum tshul bsgom zhig/'bru lngar bsdus pa zab che te/'gro ba kun la rang rig gnas//byA ba
302a2(rgyud): med la byas pa med//zad pa'i dus med yid bzhin gter//bum pa bzang dang yid bzhin mdzod//za me tog dang yid bzhin rgyal//gzhan nas yod bong ma yin te//gsang ba'i snying

302b1(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams rgyud ring bskal pa chen po stong phrag bcu gnyi su myong ngo //de nas rnam par smin pa de zad po dang yi dgas rtogs pa dang sgom pa'i sdug bsngal gyis nyan pa dang /'dod pa dang /
302b2(rgyud): po rnams yid du mi 'ong ba dang /gdug cing rtsub pa'i dngos po sna tshogasu 'gyur ba dang /yod med par yang 'gyur zhing shin tu rid cing skams pa dang /lus dang yan lag dang dbang po

303a1(rgyud): dbang du bsdu so//de sngon gyi rten pa'i stobs dang thams cad mkhyen pas gzigs nas thugs rjes 'dus par gyur te thams cad kyis mtshan nyid bstan pa'i klu 'di

303a3(rgyud): gnyen mgon po yin//rmongs dang 'khrul pa rab sel zhe sdang 'joms//kun 'byung bde ba rdo sku mchog ste//rdzogs ldan mdzad pa'i phrin las bsam yas pas//thugs rje chen

303b2(rgyud): du phyung ste hi hi zhes dgyes pa'i gzi mdangs kyis pad+ma rgyas par mdzad nas gnyisu med par 'khyil pa'i dgyes pas thim nas byang chub sems kyi sprin las//hUM hUM hUM bi shwA badz+ra kro d+ha dz+wA la

304a2(rgyud): gi rgya mtsho'i dkyil na keng rus chen po ri rab kyi steng gi 'bar ba chen po'i gling gi 'khor lo'i dkyil na dbang phyug chen po dang dur khrod kyi bdag po dregs pa chen po khyo shugs/

306b1(rgyud): sa kr-id+hA byung bas 'dam kun 'jungs te/dran pa slar rnyed nas khro ba'i dkyil 'char rgya tshogs de dag thams cad kyang dbu dgu brgya/phyag stong brgyad brgya gangs brgyad 'argya/sku 'bar ba chen dang /

306b3(rgyud): bas dus gcig tu btul to//de nas de dag shin tu 'bar zhing bred pas rab tu zhum pa'i de ros/'bang su mchi 'bangasu mchi/'ab su nan tan ma bgyis na//mgo dang lus ni brgyur 'gas

307a1(rgyud): smras pa bzhin du ma bsgrubs na//bdag cag rnams kyi mgo lus snying //gas brtubs dum bur rul bar mchi zhes smras//de nas de'i chung ma'i chags dang sring mo dang bu mo'i
307a2(rgyud): thams cad yud tsam gyis 'ongs nas thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu smras pa/bdag cag 'khor tshogs thams cad kun//dpa' bo chen po'i 'bengasu mchi//dpa' bo chen pos bdag
307a3(rgyud): cag rnams//las kyi dngos grub stsal du stsol zhes smras//de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos lag tu rdo rje byin nas ming gi dbang bskur te dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol tu bkod//
