307a5(rgyud): pos dkyil 'khor tshogs chen po 'di dag dam tshig gis grub pa bya ba'i phyir/de bzhin gshegs pa'i khro bo khrag 'thung chen mo btsun mo dang bcas pa'i tshogs de dag gi sku dang gsung dang
307a6(rgyud): thugs rdo rje rngam pa las gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'di dag phyung //oM tA thA ga ta ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da d+ha/sarba duSh+TAM ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa/hUM hUM hUM phaT/oM badz+ra ma hA shrI he ru ka ma
307a7(rgyud): hA tsaN+Da d+ha sarba duSh+TA~M ta ka ha nad ha pa tsa d+hu hUM nAM phaT/oM di na ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaNi Da d+hA sarba duSh+Te ta ka ha na da ti pa tsa hUM hUM hU~M phaT/oM pada~M ma~M ma hA shri he ru ki ma hA baN+Da d+ha sa
307b1(rgyud): duSh+TAM ta ka ha nud ha pa tsa hUM hU~M hUM phaT/oM karma ma hA shrI he ru kra ma hA tsaN+Da d+ha sarba duSh+TAM t+ya ka ha na da ha ba tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/oM ta thA ga ta ma hA kro d+he shwa ri dz+wa la ni sarba duSh+TAM hUM phaT/oM ma hA badz+ra d+hA ra ma hA kro/
307b2(rgyud): shrI r-i dz+wA la ni hU~M phaT/oM mi hU~M sman+d+ha radA na ma hA kr-i d+h+ya~M shwa ri bi d+ha ma hUM phaT/oM hrIHd+ha bad+ha ba mu kha me hI kr-i d+hI shwa ri khA hi hUM phaT/oM sarba a mo g+ha ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri bi shwa hU phaT /bidz+ra gau riH/
307b3(rgyud): badz+ra tsi ri ha/badz+ra pra mo ha/badz+ra pi ta li ha/badz+ra tseN Da li ha/badz+ra puk+ka si ha/badz+ra gasma'i ho/badz+ra sma sha ni ha/badz+ra si he mu khe ka haM/badz+ra bya gr-i mu kha ka he/badz+ra sr-i ge mu kha ka ha~M/badz+ra
307b4(rgyud): kri ta mu khaM ka he/badz+ra ka kha mu kha ka he/badz+ra kha kha mu kha he/badz+ra hu lu ka mu kha ka ha/badz+ra dza dza/badz+ra a mu kA hUM/badz+ra lo ka baM/badz+ra ba sh+mi ba la ya ba ti ho/b+h+yo b+h+yo/b+h+yo b+h+yo/b+h+ye b+h+yo b+h+ye b+h+ya/
307b5(rgyud): b+h+yo b+h+yo/b+h+yo b+h+yo/b+h+yo b+h+ye/b+h+ye b+h+yo/b+h+yo b+h+yAM/b+h+yo b+h+yAM/b+h+yo b+h+yAM/b+h+yo b+h+yo/b+h+yAM b+h+yo/b+h+yo b+h+yo/ru lu ru lu hUM/e h+ye ti a na ya dza hUM/baM to ri/oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya hUM/oM badz+ri kro d+ha sa ma ya phaT/oM khro lo khros pas zhe
307b6(rgyud): mdzad pa//thugs rjes khros dpal rngam pa'i tsho gas//'bar ba'i byin brlabs rmad po che//de nyid du ni bdag la stsol//oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya s+t+waM/oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya ho//a li u li//
307b7(rgyud): ta la ta pa ti/d+ha s+t+waM go na r-i/tri kha ri yo gi ni khA ha ha//hUM ha he phaT ces brjod pas/'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad chog/rab tu tshig/kun tu tshi go/'bar/rab tu 'bar
308a1(rgyud): kun tu 'angararo//thams cad 'dar de'i dkyil 'khar rgya tshogs kyis gang rab tu gang /kun tu rab tu gang bar gyur to//gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las khya bar/
308a2(rgyud): tshegs chen po gsung gi dkyil 'khor spros bri'i le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o////de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo chen po'i byin rlangs phyag rgya 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin
308a3(rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs nas che du brjod pa 'di brjod//dbang po'i yul dus rig pa rnams//thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur cing //mnyam pa'i ngang nyid rtogs gsal na//thams cad
308a4(rgyud): bde ba chen po'i rgya//bskyod chen 'khor lo'i gzhal ya su//khro bo khro mo thams cad kun//gsal zhing 'od zer 'phro bsgoms na//bskul bskyod tha~Md phyag rgya yin//bla med chen pos
308a5(rgyud): de skad gsungs//yan lag snying po rtse lnga rtse dgu bcu gcig tu//las rnams so sor rab tu bsgom//thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i zhabs//rtag tu rdo rje 'bar bar 'gyur//thab
308a6(rgyud): chen re re bskyod na ni//pad+ma chags med re re 'byung //rdo rje pad+ma de 'byor na//sems can thams cad bla na med//byang chub zhing du skye bar 'gyur//rang bzhin dkyil 'khor lha rnams
308a7(rgyud): kyang /khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom byas te//dbu yi dkyil 'khor bskul bskyod na//sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor thams cad g.yo//lag gi 'du byed bskyod byas na//rig 'dzin zhing
308b1(rgyud): khams thams cad g.yo//rkang pa'i stabs chen gnan mtshangs na//sdug bsngal mi zad thams cad dang //bdud dang lag 'dran thams cad gnan//yan lag thams cad 'asgrol bamigs na// /
308b2(rgyud): spu bu ga re re nas//khro bo grangs med rdul snyed 'phre/de dag sprul pa grangs med kyis//phyogs bcu khams mang rdul snyed du//khro bo'i don rnams rdul phran snyed//thugs rjes 'dul zhing dpying/
308b3(rgyud): su bstim//thams cad khro bo'i dkyil 'khor dang //khro mo'i dkyil 'khor rab tu 'dus//thams cad rdo rje'i brag skyengs dang //me ri dkyil 'khor rab tu 'bar//'di ni spyi rgya chen po yin//
308b4(rgyud): steng gi bgegs rnams 'dul ba'i phyir//rdo rje 'khor lo ni mgo gdengs//'og gi 'jig rten bgegs 'dul ba'i//rdo rje thong gshol ni spar dang //rdo rje gtul chen dril bu'o//shar gyi/
308b5(rgyud): bgegs rnams 'dul ba ni//rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba dang //ste ra chen po'i dbyug pa'o//lho yi bgegs rnams 'dul ba ni//rin chen mi mgo'i dbyug pa dang //gshin rje chen po'i rkang
308b6(rgyud): bzung ba'o//nub kyi bag Da rnam 'dul ba ni//sprul dang sti ra'i dbyug pa dang //khyung chen gshog gis rab tu rdebs//rgya mtsho che rnams rked par gtub//byang gi bgegs rnams 'dul
308b7(rgyud): ba ni//rin po che yi dbyug to dang //ni mgo gsum pa'i dbyug to can//gnod sbyin gdon rnams tshar gcod pa'o//mtshams bzhi'i bgegs rnams 'dul ba ni//phyogs bzhi
309a1(rgyud): dag gis gdul bar 'gyur//gal te de yis ma dul na//byung shar mtshams kyi bgegs 'dul ba//rdo rje rtse gsum ni mgo gdengs//i sha nyid kyang phyag na bsnams//'byung
309a2(rgyud): po de kun rab tu btul//shar lho mtshams kyi bgogs 'dul ba//rdo rje ye shes me lce 'bar//me de nyid kyang 'tshig par byed//drang srong nyid kyang phyag rgyar bsnams//me lha gdon 'khor
309a3(rgyud): dbang du bsdus//lho nub mtshams kyi bgegs 'dul ba//rdo rje dang ni srin po'i mgo/rab tu rno ba'i ral gri 'bar//bden bral nyid kyang phyag na bsnams//srin po'i tshogs rnams dbang du bsdus//
309a4(rgyud): nub byang mtshams kyi bgegs 'dul ba//rlung gi ba dan ni mgo gdangs//shin tu drag blo glang po brjid//tshig srung nyid kyang phyag na bsnams//g.yeng ba thams cad dbang du bsdus//'og tu/
309a5(rgyud): 'jig rten bgegs 'dul phyir//phyag rgya ri rab chen po ste//bag chen po ni phyag na bsnams//'og gi bgegs rnams 'dul ba'o//gzhan yang nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor gyis//tsha dang drang
309a6(rgyud): ba'i sdug bsngal sel//me yi dkyil 'khor chen po yis//thams cad ma lus bsreg par byed//chu yi dkyil 'khor chen po yis//thams cad ma lus 'khru bar byed//rlung gi
309a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po yis//thams cad ma lus gtor bar byed//gzhan yang ral gri 'khor lor bcas//mda' gzhu tho chen gri chen dang //rdo rje mdung chen dgra star bcas//mtsho
309b1(rgyud): gtsigs su bri sa dang no//mda' dang mdud dang ste ra dang //gzhan yang phyag rgya sna tshog so//dbus kyi ho ru'i phyug rgyu ni//ste ra dbyug to chen po dang //'khor lo chen po rab tu 'bar//dung chen
309b2(rgyud): dmar gyis gang ba las//rdo rjes dkrug cing rab tu gsol//shar gyis khro bo'i phyag rgya ni//sti ra chen po'i dbyug pa dang //rdo rje che pob tu 'bar//nI mgro dmar chen bkang ba gsol//
309b3(rgyud): lho yi phyag rgya chen po ni//star chen po'i dbyug pa dang //yid bzhin nor bu'i gzhol yasu//dmar gyi arga rab tu gsol//nub kyi khro bo'i phyag rgya ni//sti ra chen po'i dbyug pa dang //pad+ma
309b4(rgyud): chags med rab tu 'bar//dung chen dmar gyis bkang ba gsol//byang gi khro bo'i phyag rgya ni//sti ra chen pa'i dbyug pa dang //rdo rgya gram rab tu 'bar//dung chen dmar gyis bkang/
309b5(rgyud): ba gsol//khro mo rnams kyang khro dang 'thun//gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya ni//rgyud gzhan ngag dang 'thun par bshad//ma mo rnams kyi phyag rgya ni//'jig rten 'das mdado tshwa las
309b6(rgyud): bshad/nagasang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa sgyu 'phrul dra ba las phyag rgya spros pa'i le'u ste sum nu pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos de dag gi dkyil
309b7(rgyud): 'khor bstan pa'i phyir tshe du brjod pa 'di brjod//'bor ba'i dkyil 'khor rtsibs bzhi pa//gru tshad bzhi yis rnam par brgyan//bru bani sgo khyed de bzhi dang ldan//'bar ba'i bar khyams
310a1(rgyud): gnyis kyis mdzes//thod sbrul sna tshogs nyi mas brjid//'bar nga'i 'phro ba mang po 'khrug/khyu mchog ma he gzig dang stag/gtum pa'i dom gyis sbyar bas ni//dbang /
310a2(rgyud): phyug lha chen la sogs bzung //smug gnag sde gnag ser gnag padA mar gnag ljang gnag 'jigs pa'i sku//dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrang //ko rlon gos ni sna tshogs
310a3(rgyud): gyon//rngam pa'i sgra chen 'jigs par bsgrogs//sbrul dang thod 'phreng nyi zlar bcas//steng gi 'jig rten khor lug bcus//rdo rje dung chen gang ba dang //ral gri dgra sta gshol la so/
310a4(rgyud): rang gi lag cha sna tshogs bsdams//btsun mo 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang 'khril//gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dang //sgo bzhi phyag rgyar rab mdzes shing //slas dang byi mo tshogs kyi gca
310a5(rgyud): bcu gnyis dang ni brgyad kyis mdzes//rang gi stan dang lag cha dang //ci bgyi zhes te chas te gnas shes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad 'bar ba'i dkyil
310a6(rgyud): 'khor kun tu gsal byar gyur to//de nas dgyes pa chen po bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dra ba las rdo rje gsang de'i tshig 'di phyungango //a ho//bskal
310a7(rgyud): par bcas shing dug tshogs 'bar ba yi//nyon mongs kun g.yo dkyil 'khor 'khor lo brjod dka' ba'i//ji snyed 'jig rten rgyan gyis rdul snyed bsam yas pa//ro tshogs
310b1(rgyud): klag la brkam pa dpung gnyen kun bkye nas//zhen pa'i gdug mi shin tu gsal dka/'a dra'o//mi mngon dbyings nas gzugs kyi cho 'phrul bsam yas kyis//snyigs mar bcas shing mtshams
310b2(rgyud): kun dam zil gyis gnon//rab tu gnon pa'i 'jigs byed bsam mi khyag/de bzhin de nyid gnyen por kun 'byung kun tu gras la//to//chos rnams ji snyed 'gro drug sprin byed brjid mi
310b3(rgyud): lung/dus mthar rmongs la gnas pa brjod mi lang //'dod pas zhen pa'i las kyang ji snyed ji sbed pa//drag pa brdo rje'i rlung chen bsam mi khyag/de bar bcas pa gzhan du
310b4(rgyud): med par brjod mi lang //bskal par bsags pa'i dug chen rab rtag kun tu rtog/de rnams zla ba gnon khrig 'thung sku gsung 'jigs byed par//rkyen du bcas nas sbru du
310b5(rgyud): 'bras bu smin tha rab smin ltar//dgyes pa chen po bcom ldan 'das ni ming ba'i tshogs//dadagra med bsam yus lhun grub pas//rab tu 'dul bar shin tu gsal//ho//khro bo'i rang
310b6(rgyud): bzhin gdug par 'jigs pa ma yin zhing //zhi ba mdzes pa kun gyi yid dang 'thad par gnas rgyud yong ma yin//ji nyid gnyi su min pa'i cho 'phrul bsam yas thams cad kun du khyu
310b7(rgyud): rigs lnga khrag 'thung 'jigs pa'i rab pa rdul snyed rab ston pa'o//rnam dag byang chub mchog gi dbyings te gsang 'i snying por rab bstan nges pa nyid de shin tu gnas par gsal//
311a1(rgyud): rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o//gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid dri ba lnga khro dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste sum cu gcig pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa/
311a2(rgyud): chen pos nyid kyi byin rlabs dang yon ston pa zhes bya ba 'di che du brjod pa 'di brjed//oM sangs rgyas rnal 'byor chen po ni//dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//ye shes snying po'i
311a3(rgyud): mchog nyid de//sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po nyid//'di yin gzhan na med pa ste//rol pa kun la mnga' brnyes shing //srid pa 'jig rten thams cad kun//sangs rgyas nyid de dus
311a4(rgyud): gsum du//ma g.yos lhun gnas snying po ste//rang bzhin che ba'i yon+da las//ma rtogs rmongs pa'i 'gro ba la//sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pa/snying rje chags pa'i dam tshig gis//
311a5(rgyud): nga rgyal nyid kyi sku chen bstan//gdug cing gtum pa'i khams gsum nu//'dul ba'i zhing du rab sbyong zhing //phrin las rnam bzhi rdzogs par mdzad//ye shes ngo mtshar tsham
311a6(rgyud): ngam gyis//chas bzhi rnam dag che ba'i lha//ye shes sku ste khyad par che//chags pa'i tshogs kyis mtshan ma ni//'dod chags chen po nyid kyi sku//gtum ngam gdug pas
311a7(rgyud): mtshan pas na//zhe sdang chen po nyid kyi sku//'dul bya zhing du rab sbyong zhing //chos nyid mnyam las bzhengs pas na//gti mug chen po nyid kyi sku//snod bcud dag
311b1(rgyud): pa'i spyod yul ba//thugs sku gsung las 'phros pa dang //rgyal ba nga yis mtshan pas na//nga rgyal chen po nyid kyi sku//gsang ba'i snying po bzhi bcu gnyis//thig le thugasu bsdus pa nyid//
311b2(rgyud): gzhan du mi gtong mtshan bste na//de nyid phrag dog nyid su rdzogs//stong gsum sto gi sbyong chen po//'jig rten khams mang sna tshogs pa//rdul dang bye bra la sogs pa'i//'gra
311b3(rgyud): las ni rab 'das mtshan//de nyid snang zhing srid pa nyid//'jigs byed sku gsung thugs kyi dbyings//chos sku ye shes rang bzhin la//sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i thig le mchog/snying po thig le
311b4(rgyud): bsam yas nyid//'jigs byed dbu dgu bco brgyad phyag/sgyu mas mtshon po'i dra ba yin//de nyid tshogs dang dkyil 'khor sngags//ga ga la gsum du mchog tu sngags//yul dang
311b5(rgyud): 'byung ba nyid//bdag rig gzhan don snying po nyid//thabs dang shes rab phyag mtshan pa//gnyis med rig pa'i ye shes che//ming dang gzugs dang dbur gyur pa//phyag dang zhab su
311b6(rgyud): rnam par brtags//brtags pa las ni 'phros pa'i sku//ci yang med las cir yang snang //bskal bzangs mchog gi sgyu 'phrul pa//dra ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rdzogs//rtags
311b7(rgyud): pa zil gnon mos nyid spyan//spyan ni chos nyid mnyam pa nyid//ji bzhin dbyings kyi yul la sbyor//rol pa'i rtsed mor sdang mig pa//gzhan du mi gzigs yul la gzigs//
312a1(rgyud): pad ma 'khyil ba nyid sku gsung //mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i dngos po 'jig/ye shes chen po'i spyan bgrang las//khro gnyer glog stong 'gyu ba yi//mi yi tshogs kyi
312a2(rgyud): gzhan phug glog/bdud rtsi zhing du sbyor bas na//bdud rtsi mchog khro bo yin//sku nyid mnyam pa rdzogs pa las//sna tshogs 'char bar rab son pa//ye shes sgyu 'phrul stobs chen po//mi
312a3(rgyud): g.yo mchog 'du 'phro las//gshog pa rdo rje gtams pa ni//shes rab tshogs la 'phrul pa dang //thugs rje dri ba'i byin brlabs kyis//'khor yug ji snyed mtha' klas pa//dbyings nyid
312a4(rgyud): bde la spyod pa ste//'phros nas dbang du byed pa'i don//rta yi gar thabs rdzu 'phrul gyis//gcig kyang yal ba ma yin pa'o//chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa'i//sgyu 'phrul dkyil
312a5(rgyud): 'khor mo thas klas par//rtsed mo mchog phyag rgya ni//brkyang dang bskum pa zhibs tshul te//thabs dang shes rab rol pa'i don//rab dbang thabs chen rgyal po yis//sangs rgyas kun gyi
312a6(rgyud): sku gsung ba//thib le mchog gi gnas la rdzogs//dbang phyug lha chen la sogs la//zil gnon khros pa'i phyag mtshan pa//sna tshogs mtshon rnon ma gro bsnams//nga rgyal gdug gyi/
312a7(rgyud): sdang gcod//gti mug chos sku sgyu 'phrul pa//de ba'i thugs rje mtha' dag ni//khros pa'i dam tshig snyang de yis//mnyam pa'i thig ler dgod pa ni//gshin rje gshed por gdug pa'i
312b1(rgyud): khrag gnas ma ga nag /la kun du byu sa //ga dang na da /sa ga na du shAm+b+ha//nga /gsu pa shos ldan
312b2(rgyud): sa dang shAg+sa nga // g+sa sa pa na/ 'i dpe ni nga da //mig pam nas ma rnyog tu bzlug
312b3(rgyud): lag sa byed pa//de nal 'brog pa'i dan chub//dun tu nga kyi'o// rnyed pa//rgyu hU~M d+h+r-i g-is byung 'jug/ rje blas sa/
312b4(rgyud): snar bablugs/ pas /hUM b+h+rU~M rgyu ba/ sbyin da pa ldan pa/ la pa
312b5(rgyud): gnan pa//rdo rje ma yi 'bar ba 'byung //na mongs rgyu maste skams par byed//dz+nyAn sa myed sems rdo ma tshig gas//bas ma lus jig rten la 'ad sdug ban+d+has//rang ge zlus
312b6(rgyud): ma na pas ni// rje 'phru ga// sa pa / da//byin thog ldan 'grums//nyid thig sa
313a1(rgyud): chen yin//ha ni thig le drag po nyid//hA na thig le rol pa nyid//ha nI thig le 'phrin las nyid//ha ni thig les chags dbang 'dul//hA ni thig le las kun rdzogs//hwe nI thag
313a2(rgyud): le ye shes thugs//hA ni thig les gsung snyan pa//hi ni thig les cham rngam lce//he ni thig le rol pa nyid//he ni thig le dbang rtags yin//he ni thig les drag shul bA/he ni thig les
313a3(rgyud): thugs chen rdzogs//he ni thig les dkyil 'khor ba//'jigs byed mchog gi sgyu 'phrul te//dra bas zil gnon lam 'gog/hUM ni ye shes thugs kyi thugs//hUM ni ye shes thugs
313a4(rgyud): sku nyid//hUM ni ye shes thugs sku gsung //hUM ni ye shes yid bzhin las//hU~M ni thi ga le ye sheso//phaT ni sku yi thugs kyi thugs//phaT ni gsung gi gsung gi thugs//phaT ni thugs
313a5(rgyud): kye thugs kyi thugs//phaT ni chos sku'i thugs kyi thugs//phaT ni chos sku'i gsung gi thugs//phaT ni chos thugs thugs kyi thugs//sgyu 'phrul dra bas dgyes pa ho//dbang
313a6(rgyud): phyu/chags pas dgyes pa ho//gar thabs rol pas dgyes pa ho//sku gsung thugs ldan dgyes pa ho//yon las kyi dgyes pa ho//pho nya 'du' phros dgyes pa to//kun la snang bas dgyes
313a7(rgyud): ba te//byin gyis rlabs kyis dgyes pa to//chos kyi sku la dgyes pa ho//ye shes rol pa dgyes pa ho//ce yang min pas dgyes pa ho//gnod pa sdud las dgyes pa ho//chos kyi dbyi
313b1(rgyud): da dbyas pa to//des dgyes pa chen po nyid la nyid shin tu dmyos par gyur to//chos thams cad gcig rang bzhin tu gyur to//gsang gA'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa stong phrag brgya las dgyes pa can/
313b2(rgyud): po'i byin rlabs dang /yor mchog ston pa'i le'u m+b+hi sum cu gnyis pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos 'jigs byed kyi bsod nams sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la
313b3(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs te ched du brjod pa 'dri brjod//'khor lo bar khyams sgo rnams//'jigs byed 'khor lo rigs kyi gtso//btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan par bsgom//zho dang drag po dbang
313b4(rgyud): dang rgyas//'jigs pa'i tshogs chen de dbus//bdag nyid drag po bcos tshul du//sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom//'khor lo bar khyams sgo rnamasu//'jigs byed rdo rje rigs kyi
313b5(rgyud): gtso//btsun mo 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang bcas//khro mo'i tshogs dang ldan par bsgom//ni dang drag po dbang dang rgyus//'jigs pa'i tshogs chen de dbus//lus dang ngagra yid byin
313b6(rgyud): rlabs nas//bdag nyid drug po bcos tshul du//sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom//'khor lo bar khyams sgo rnamasu//'jigs byed rin chen rigs kyi gtso//btsun mo 'dzin pa'i
313b7(rgyud): tshogs dang bcas//khro mo'i tshogs dang ldan par bsgom//zhi dang drag po dbang dang rgyas//'jigs pa'i tshogs chen de dbus//lus dang ngag gis byin brlabs nas//bdag nyid drag
314a1(rgyud): pa bcom tshul du//sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom//yang na rigs dbang dkyil 'khor//'khor lo bar khyam pa sgo rnams//'jigs pa'i phrin las rigs kyi gas/
314a2(rgyud): btsun mo 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang bcas//khro mo'i tshogs dang ldan par bsgom//zhi dang drag po dbang dang rgyas//las bzhi dkyil 'khor rdzogs par dgod//'jigs pa'i tshogs chen de
314a3(rgyud): dbus//lus dang ngag yid byin rlabs nas//bdag nyid drag por rab gnas nas//sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom//'jigs byed lnga rdzogs dkyil 'khor ni//nya shu rtsa lnga
314a4(rgyud): sku gsung thugs//yon phrin las rdzogs par bsgom//rgyan dang cha lugs la sogs pa//'jigs pa'i tshogs ni ji bzhin par//tsham ngam chen po'i cha lugs bsgom//glu dang gar dang /
314a5(rgyud): phyag rgya dang //shes rab thabasu shes pa dang //byang chub sems kyi mchod pa dang //brda la sogs pa'i yon dang //bza' dang bca' dang btung dang bgo/long spyod lnga ldan thams cad
314a6(rgyud): kyi/mdor na tshogs rnams mngon du bsgrub//gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las 'jigs byed chen po'i bsod nams sbyin pa dam tshig le'u ste sum cu gsum pa'o///
314a7(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos cho ga dang dkyil 'khor yongasu shes par bya ba'i phyir tshe du brjod pa 'di brjod//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs//chos
314b1(rgyud): dbyings rnam dag dkyil 'khor//gsang sngags spyi yi dkyil 'khor las//shes 'jug yum gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom//rgyang phrags dpag tshad la sogs dang //lus gang lus do gsum
314b2(rgyud): tshad//rang gi rigs pas ci nus par//sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom//gnod bskrad sa gnon byin gyis brlab//ljon pa lcug phran sdod gcig dang //ma rig tshon gyis ji bzhin du//gams
314b3(rgyud): par bya ba'i ting 'dzin dpag//'jigs byed sku gsung dkyil 'khor bzlas//gnas dang zla dang rdzas rnams ni//tshogs kyi mchog tu dmigs pas gzhag/dang por mchod sbyin dam pas mchod/
314b4(rgyud): gzugs dang lugs chen dung mchog ni//ci 'dod snang bar bdag gis dgod//'jigs byed dbang du bdag zhugs nas//khro mo ji snyed 'khor du bya//bar chad ting 'dzin mchog gis
314b5(rgyud): zlog/gsang ba'i snying por nyid bshams te//'das pa bdag tu mnyam sbyar zhing //thugs kyi sngags kyis spyan drangs nas//bdag gi lus la zhugs tshul du//de yi gzugs gzung
314b6(rgyud): mchog tu bstim//dza zhes lan gsum brjod pas na//de nyid bsod nams lus thob cing //ye shes lnga yi dngos grub sbyin//pho nya 'du 'phro mang po rnams//de yi dgos pa byed par
314b7(rgyud): 'gyur//yang na sa gzhi rab mnyam la//phyag rgya gzugs dang snying po rnams//lnga yi tshon gyis bri bar bya//dkar rtsi dmar rtsi dri sha chen//rdo rje dung tshan dpar rtsis dgang //dung dang

317a1(rgyud): pa'i bdud chen po de dag nyid kyi yid kyis gdungs te rab tu rgyal nas ma mthong par rmongs pa'i gnas nas rang dbang med cing dran pa med par keng rus kyi ri rab chen

320a3(rgyud): rnam par thar pa lta rdzogs byed//sa bcu rdzogs shing sangs rgyas sa yang rdzogs//de phyir sman 'di bsgrub par bya//kun la phan pa'i sman yin pas//de phyir nga dang bdag ma 'dzin//

320a6(rgyud): gyi byin brlabs bsam mi khyag/ra ni song sbyong zhing mtho ris 'grub//gser 'gyur sman dang mun sel bzhin//gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs 'grub//rkyen las byung ba'i dug
320a7(rgyud): rnams dang //rtsa ba'i dug dang sbyar ba'i dug/klu dug spod gtong dug la sogs//thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis//dug rnams thaMd gdul ba'i phyir//dkyil 'khor ma
320b1(rgyud): lus chang du b+h+yo//gnas lnga dag tu 'grulnga bsnam//oM hU~M hraHA/yang na ye rgomra gyis bya//yang na ya gre hri las btang //drug rnams pad m+b+hir bsgyur bar bya//mnyam pa'i dbyings tha
320b2(rgyud): yi \u0f7f/a d+d+ho rje bas du ba'i tshi k+sha dz+ra'o//hU~M bdag nyid zhe sdang rdo rje ste//thugs rjes rtog bdag 'dus bar byed//da dang 'drug med dbyings sbyor zhing //byams pa'i thugs dang ldan pa'o//
320b3(rgyud): bdag nyid gti mug chen po ste//yis 'od zer gsal ba'i dang //thod 'byung ba'i 'khor lo yo hUM bdag nyid de rgyal yon+da te//snying rjes 'gro don 'phel bar byed//zhi ba'i blo chen dbyings
320b4(rgyud): sbyor/yin rgya mtsho dpag med pa'o//dri bdag nyid 'dod chags gsum mchog ste//nyon mongs las rnams dag par byed//nyin mongs sdug bsngal rnam par dag/chags mad seM
320b5(rgyud): noni byang chub pa'o//a bdag nyid las kyi sems pa ste//don rnams ma lus grub par byed//log rtog ma lus 'dul ba'i mchog/phyogs bcu dus bzhi 'phro ba'o//muM bdag nyid shes
320b6(rgyud): pa 'od gsal te//le lo g.yeng ba sel bar byed//thugs rje myur ba las byung ba//rgyal ba kun tu thogs med pa'o//nyon mongs las rnams dag byed cing //dbugs chen dag kyang
320b7(rgyud): 'byin par byed//dug rnams sbyong ba sku gsung ste//lam lnga skyod pa ye shes lnga//'khor ba'i rtsed gnod shes rab mtshon//hUM du bsdus shing ho yis g.yeng //raM gyis bsred pa/
321a1(rgyud): /shing phaT kyis 'bang //thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa yi//thig le'i dpying du thim par bya//de nas gnyis med dbyings gyur nas//ye shes sems dpa'i sku rung nam//'bru
321a2(rgyud): gcig 'bru gsum 'bru lnga bsgom//bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ma lus dang //sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor tshang bar bsgom//du med bdag med phyag rgyar gsal//de nas long spyod lnga kun dang //yis lnga
321a3(rgyud): dang rigs lnga dang //lha mo lnga dang sman lngar bsgom//oM hU trAM hrIHaHoM badz+ra a m+bi ta kun+da li ha na ha na hUM phaT/oM b+hI shud+d+ha a mI te hU~M phaT/oM d+hArma a mri te hUM phaT/oM AHhUM ces brjid/
321a4(rgyud): pas tham cad dge par gyur/bdud ni gyur/sa chu me rlung na me khe'i rnams//rang bzhin med par gzhig pa'i phyir//gcig lA l-I lngar du bya zhing //mu~M gyi dbying su po stim par bya//'byung ba
321a5(rgyud): rnams de dag la//lhag pa'i ting 'dzin bskyed par bya//rags pa thabs kyi phyag rgya ste//de bzhin gshegs pa lngar bsgom zhing //'byung ba so so'i mtshan nyid//yum lnga dag tu bsgom pa
321a6(rgyud): bye//de rigs ye shes lnga nyid//rgyur byos gzugs sogs bzhi bcu gnyis//phyi nang snod bcud thad kun//de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid na//de ltar gyur cing skyes pa kun//smos
321a7(rgyud): ci dgos te de nyid yin//oM he i ma'o//lhag pa'i byin brlabs kyis//bdag la lha rnams bsdu bar bsgom//de nas lha dang gnyis med nas//bdag nyid yi ge oM dang muM//gnyis
321b1(rgyud): dadang bdag dang dbyi su thim//bdag nyid bdud rtsi 'khyil par bsgom//sku mdog gangs ri nyi shar 'dra//zla ba pad+ma gdan khri la//nyi ma stong gi gdan khri ldan//lha dang lha mo tshogs kyis bskor//khro bau
321b2(rgyud): /khro mo'i dkyil 'khor bcas//gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgyas mdzes//slas dang byi me tshogs kyis bskor//a ho/'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcis//dbusu bdud rtsi 'khyil ba ste//shar gyi rtse
321b3(rgyud): la rdo rje'o//lho yi rtse la rin po che//nub kyi rtse la snang mtha' yas//byang gi rtso la don yod grub//thabs dang shes rab ldan par bsgom//phyag rgya rnams kyang gsal bar bsgom//snying po 'bru
321b4(rgyud): tshig gsal bar bzlas//de la bdud rtsi'i phyag rgya ni//bum pa gang ba yid bzhin 'bar//re ba yid bzhin bskor bar byed//nyon mongs sdug bsngal sel bar byed//'dod lnga yon ldan par byed//dngos
321b5(rgyud): grub chen po bla med pa'o//bdud rtsi char bzhin 'bebs par byed//bsgo bzhi phyag rgya ldan par byed//a mri tA yi rgyu nyid ni//byang chub sems dang sha chen dang //dri chu dri chen mang sar bcas//
321b6(rgyud): pad+ma rak+ta la sogs dang //gzhan yang don yod sna tshogs rnams//dbye ba 'am yang na mi dbye bar//bdud rtsi nyid byin gyis brlag/rtog pa'i bag chags spyad pa'i phyir//gtsang sme med par dag par
321b7(rgyud): gyani dbyingasu yang ni bstim par bya//phyag rgya 'od zer 'bar bar bsgom//bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad sel zhing //dug gsum sdug bsngal med pa dang //bskal par yun rings gnas pa dang //dngos
322a1(rgyud): grub chen po 'thob 'gyur te//tshogs gnyis rdzogs par yang dag gsungs//bdag nyid yi ge hUM gyur nas//long spyod lnga ldan thams cad la//oM AHhU~M du gyur par bsgom//'od
322a2(rgyud): 'phro 'bar zhing phyogs bcur sprob slar 'dus 'od 'phros bdud rtsir 'bar//shin tu gsal zhing rtse gcig bsgo mi//gzhan yang yi ge'i tshegs pas gangab//'thung na ngan song sgrib pa byang //
322a3(rgyud): tra ta/brtag brten dngos grub mchog kyang 'grub//bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi nad sel cing //lha la rtag tu mchod byas na//bdag dang gnyi su med par 'gyur//mi mthun phyogs la gtor byas na//
322a4(rgyud): dradrug po gtum po'ang lha ner 'gyur//gzhan yang dngos grub thaMd kyi//ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub//sangs rgyas go 'phang thab 'gyur na//lha srin la sog smos ci dgos//the tsho med par bsgrub pa
322a5(rgyud): gyis//rtag tu spyod cing dbyingasu thim//gsang ba'i snying pa de kho na nyid nges pa las rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba la sman sgrub pa'i le'u ste sum cu dgu pa'o////de nas dgyes pa chen pos de dge
322a6(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'di che du brjed pa 'di che du brjed//de la mchod sbyin dam pa ni//'phrul chen bzhi bcu rtsi lnga nyid//khams dang 'byung ba nyid la gnas//de gnyis sgyu 'phrul thabs
322a7(rgyud): mkhas pa/dra bas mngon rdzog sku gsung thugs//thams cad ma lus phyag rgya nyid//chos sku mchog gi brtan gyur pa//phyogs bcu gang bar gsal bar bsgom//de nyid ngag lam
322b1(rgyud): kun khengs par//hU~M gis tshogs su rnam par bsgom//lus nyid ha yi tshogs la bstim//gang la bya ba'i gzugs gzung bas//kha dog nag po'i tshon phya yis/
322b2(rgyud): de yi snying nang bdag zhugs la//dza zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas nas//mgyogs su 'gro bar lcags kyis spang //dri rno snga bas mgyogs pa dang //gang du bya ba byin par
322b3(rgyud): byed//de yi lus las 'byung 'dod na//zhi bas bdag gi gzugs bzang la//dal bus hUM zhes bsdus pa yis//bdag gi lus la chud par 'gyur//thams cad ma lus
322b4(rgyud): phyag rgya nyid//chos sku mchog gi brtan gyur pa//phyogs bcu gang bar gsal bar bsgom//de nyid dag lam lus khengs par//oM gyi tshogs su shin tu bsgom//lus
322b5(rgyud): nyid a yi tshogs la bstim//gang la bya ba'i gzugs bzung nas//kha dog dkar po'i mtshon phye yis//de yi snying nang bdag zhugs la//hUM zhes bya ba'i sngags
322b6(rgyud): bzlas nas//mang pos bskur ba rgyal chen po//blo rno yid 'dzangs bzhin bzangs dang //snga bas longs spyod 'du ba dang //gnas par dga' ba bzhin du 'gyur//de
322b7(rgyud): yi lus las 'byung 'dod na//zhi bas bdag gis gzugs gzung la//dal dbus oM zhes bsdus pa yis//bdag gi lus la gzud par 'gyur//thams
323a1(rgyud): cad ma lus phyag rgya nyid//chos sku mchog gi brtan gyur pa//phyogs kun gang bar gsal bar bskor//de nyid ngag lam kun khebs par//saM gyi chog su ra
323a2(rgyud): bsgom//lus nyid sri gyi tshogs la stim//gang la bya ba'i gzugs gzung nas//kha dog ser po mtshon phye yis//de yi snying nang bdag zhugs la//sr-i zhes bya ba'i sngaT bzlas nas//nor mang blon po yid 'dzangs la
323a3(rgyud): blo rna snga bas yong spyod 'du//de yi 'khor la long spyod cing //gnas ni dga' ba bzhin du 'gyur//de yi lus las 'byung 'dod na//rgyas pas bdag gzugs bzung la//dal bus sraM zhes brjod pa yis//bdag gi lus la
323a4(rgyud): chud par 'gyur//thaMd ma lus phyag rgya nyid//tshe sku mcho gi brtan gyur pa//phyogs bcu gang bas gsal bar bsgom//de nyid ngag la lus khengs par//oM gyi tshegasu shin tu bsgom//lus nyid aM gyi tshogs la
323a5(rgyud): bstam//gang la bya ba'i gzugs bzung nas//khe dog dmar po'i mtshon phye yis//de yi snying nang bdag zhugs la//aM zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas nas//rgyal mo zhang blon dbang chen dang //ci 'dod yid bzhin/
323a6(rgyud): dbang du 'gyur//de yi 'khor la long spyod cing //gnas par dga' ba bzhin du 'gyur//de yi gzugs las 'byung 'dod na//dbang gis bdag gi gzugs bzung la//dal bus aM zhes brjod pa yin/bdag gi lus la
323a7(rgyud): rgud par 'gyur//thaMd ma lus phyag rgya nyid//tshe sku mchog brtan gyur pa//phyogs kun gang bar gsal bar bsgom//de nyid dag lam lus khengs par//haM gyi tshogasu shin tu bsgom//lu nyid ha ya cho
323b1(rgyud): pa spyom//gang 'bya b.ro gzugs bzung nas//kha dog ljang khu'i mtshon phye yis//de yi sted nang bdag zhugs la/ta zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas nas//rdzas kyi rigs tshon gang 'drad gzugs//dmag mang
323b2(rgyud): mnung phung gi mtshon bzang //zhe sdang can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur//'dod chags can rnams 'dub baM dang //nga rgyal chen po 'dud par 'gyur//de yis bstun pa 'dzin par byed//de yi 'khor la longs
323b3(rgyud): spyod cing //gnas par dga' ba bzhin du 'gyur//de yi lus las 'byung 'dod na//snyoms pas khro yi gzugs bzung la//dal bus haM zhes brjod pa yis//mi snang ba yi gzugasu 'char//bdag gi lus la//
323b4(rgyud): chud par 'gyur//gling ngam dur khrod gnas rnams//nga yi 'dod pa chos dbang gis/sgyu 'phrul dkyil 'khor mchog 'dzin la//dra ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs kyis 'byung //gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid
323b5(rgyud): nges pa las de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi byin gyi rlabs 'byung ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos nyid kyis che ba'i yon ston pa'i phyir
323b6(rgyud): 'gro ba'i sems can gyi don che du de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings 'di sku gsung thugs rdo rje las byu //dpal nyid kyi mchog rigs kyi yum//dbab par bya ba'i gzugs brnyan la//spyi gtsug kha dang
323b7(rgyud): snying ka mtshan//'bru lngas byin rlabs mu du brtags//de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa//muM gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom//de nyid mthar bral mi dmigs pas//de zla'i dang tshul da brdzun/
324a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas rdo rje tsa na ka/shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom//lam du zhugs la de lus dkang //de goms blo bde gsal spro thim//de bzhin rigs rnams oM du bsgom//snang
324a2(rgyud): gnas bde ldan khengs gyur par//yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas//phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs//rigs dang 'thun par rnam par bsam//brtan pa yi 'phro 'du ltar//rnam shes byin
324a3(rgyud): /rlabs ngang du brtags//gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las//yid bzhin yi ge'i sprin tshogs bsgom//phyag rgya shin tu gsal ba na//nye ba'i bsnyen pa yin par bsgrags//'phro 'du rigs dang 'thun pa'i
324a4(rgyud): grangs//bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum na/lcags kyu mchog phyag rgya bcing //drin 'dod pa bzhin du 'gyur//rang bzhin sku gsung 'dus ma byas//gzhan dbang ma yin rdo rigs//dang ldan rdo sgyu 'phrul
324a5(rgyud): shin tu chos kyi bsgrags pa la//gsal bar 'dod pa smra bya ba//spyi gtsug kha dang snying ka mtshan//'bru lngar byin brlabs lam du brtags//de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa//lam gyi tsho Da kyi lha rnams bsgom//
324a6(rgyud): sangs rgyu spyan gyi sbyor ba las//rgyal ba thaMd byin gyis rlog/de nyid mtha' bral mi dmigs las//rang bzhin mchog gzugs bcas nas//sangs rgyas rje can ka/shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom//de las
324a7(rgyud): rdo byin gyis bzlog pang+gAgasang gnas 'dzum thabs yin//spro sa nas zhugs la de lus dgang //de goms blo bad gas pa spro thil//rdo rje rigs rnams hU~M ba zlom//sAd gnas bde ldan 'angs rgyu
324b1(rgyud): yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas//phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs//rigs dang 'thun par shin tu bsam//brtan pa ha yi 'phro 'du ltar//rnam shes byin rlabs ngang du brtags//gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las
324b2(rgyud): yod bzhin yi ge sprin tshogs bsgom//phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa/'phro 'du rigs dang 'thun par grangs//sgoms dang bzlas dang mngon sum na//lcags kyu'i stangs kyis bskul par gsungs//rjes chags pa'i/
324b3(rgyud): phyag rgya yis//rigs dang 'thun pa'i 'phro 'du bsgom//yon sku gsung yid bzhin gter//dang ldan sgyu 'phrul mchog chen mo//chas shing bsgregs pa'i gzugs brnyan ni//ljon pa lcug phran la sogs la//dbab pa
324b4(rgyud): mchog las bya ba//spyi gtsug kha dang snying kaM mtshan//'bru lngas byin rlabs oM du brtags//de nyid goms las gsang mtshan la//oM gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgo me//sangs rgyas me yi sbyor ba la//rgyal
324b5(rgyud): bzad byin gyis rlob po//de nyid mtha' bral mi dgyes las//oMn gter gyi gzugs gces na//sangs rgyas rin chen tsa na ka/shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom//de las rdo rjer byin brlabs te//pad+mags
324b6(rgyud): nas 'dzum thub pa yin//sbub su zhugs la de lus dgang //de goms blo bde gsal spu thim//rin chen rigs rnams s+m+R+YuM du bskam//snad gnas bde ldan khengs gyur pa//yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal drar
324b7(rgyud): phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs//rigs dang 'thun par shin tu bsan//rtan pa dri rtsi 'phro 'dra sbyar//rnami shes byi ni brlabs nga du brtag pa//glezhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las//yid bzhin man

325a2(rgyud): rigs dang 'du 'phro 'thun par bsgom//gso dang gsad dang pha ma dang rgyal//gzhan du 'gro dang 'dug pa dang //ci 'dod 'od dang smra yang rung //mtshon dang 'jigs pa mang ba dang //bcings pa'i las dang mtshon//
325a3(rgyud): las thar//dang ldan pad+ma mchog gi yum//bde chen gar dbang gzugs 'dzin pa//dbab par bya ba'i gzugs brnyan na//ljon pa'i lcug phran la sogs la//dang por gnas lnga byin gyis brlabs//de nas gnas

325a5(rgyud): rnams byin gyis rlog/de ny-id mtha' bral mi dmigs las//rdo rje gsung gi gzugs bcas nas//sangs rgyas gsung chen can ka/shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgon//de nas rdo rje dbyon parlabs te/
325a6(rgyud): gsang nas 'dzum thabs yin//sbung su zhugs la de lus dgang //de goms blo bde gsul spro hrI ma/ming dang snying po bcas pa dgug/rdo rje gsung rnams oM du bsgom//snong gnas bde ldan kho pa

325b1(rgyud): bAd+hi d+hu med pa'i sems nyid las//chos dbang yi ge g+hin+da tshogs pasgom//phyag rgya gsal bar hUM bstan pa//'phro 'du rigs dang 'dun par ni//bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum na//chags pa'i draSh+Ta
325b2(rgyud): mchog gis cing //chags pa chen po'i phyag rgya bzhis//rigs dang 'thun pa nyid du bsgom//zhi ba dbang dang drag po rgyas//ci 'dod par ni rab tu bsngags//dpal ldan 'grubabasgyu 'phrul pa//dbab par bya/

325b4(rgyud): mi mchags kyi lha rnams bsgoms//de nyid steng gi lha rnams te//bod gi med batha' bral mi dmigs las//don yod dang tshu lI de bzung nas//don med mchog gi can ka/shes rab yum dang ldan pa
325b5(rgyud): bsgom//de las rgya gram byin rlabs te//pad+ma gsad nas 'dzum thabs yin//srub su zhugs la de lus dgang //rgya gra mtshon gyis khengs pa dang //so so'i snying pos med yang dgug//de goms blo bdegs
325b6(rgyud): spro thim//rdo rje la la rnams te bsgom//snod gnas bde ldan khengs gyur par//yum gyi tshotshigs kyang gsal bar gnas//phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs//riklas dang 'thun pa nyid bsgom//brtan pa
325b7(rgyud): gyi 'phro 'du ltar//rnam shes byin rlabs dang rtags//gzhi rtsa mad pa'i sems nyid lnga//grub pa sgyu 'phrul sprin tshogs bsgom//phyag rgya gsal ba nyid snyen pa/'phro 'du dib dang 'thun sde ni//bsgoms nas bzlas dang
326a1(rgyud): mngon su ni//dgyes pa gar gyi gsung snyan cing //rje su chags pa'i phyag rgya bzhis//rigs dang 'thun pa nyid du bsgom//phyogs bcu 'gro dang dbrog pa dang //tshe btung ba dang las rnams dang //
326a2(rgyud): mngon sum ci 'dod sla ba'i mchog/rigs kyi yum dang rtsen par 'gyur//srid pa las 'phags mya ngan 'das//ting 'dzin 'di yis byed par 'gyur zhes brjod pas rnad smin pa'i tshogs de bzhin ga
326a3(rgyud): pa'i che ba'i yon tan nyid mkhyen to//mkhyen nas de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di phyung //a ho bsam bya bsam par zin pa yi//bsam pas
326a4(rgyud): zin bsam mi khog/bsam yas lhun gau nas mi g.ya dpag med pos mi khyab//rgyu dang 'brel pa'i rkyen du shes pa'i dbyings nyid zad mi shos//ngo mtshar srid la mtha' bral dmigs med pa//de nyid ston
326a5(rgyud): mchog gi 'khor lo lam mchog yin//a ho//rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o//bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nas che ba'i yon tan smon pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu
326a6(rgyud): gcig pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos che ba'i yon tan ston pa'i sgyu 'phrul chen po gsung gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba chos dang bcas pa 'di sku dang gsung dang
326a7(rgyud): thugs rdo rje lAm byu //dbab pa mchog dkyil 'khor rnams//kha dog grangs bcas ma brlams pas//shes pa d+mo che khong yangs la//thob par spyod la mi skyo bar//zas srung gos rjes dam zas
326b1(rgyud): du rgyu yis bsring//rten du rung bar ting 'dzin dang //dbang dang sgrub pa mchog kyang bstan//mi m+bu gsang ba'i dam tshig dngog oM da rdzu gyi blo bstan nas//gas dra bas mtshan ma ldanas spyad//sgyu stsal dkyi
326b2(rgyud): lakho shi lu gnyis//drung po khams da skye mched skyed/nga sa spyod lnga ldan ma da // na lam glasung chen bas//oM sau d+d+haSh+Tha tA nA a~M/oM dz+nyA ku la d+h+we dz+re ga la~M /sa sa
326b3(rgyud): g+hakalpa rad na sr-i/oM pad+ma tathA hr-i da ya a ro log/ha pradz+dza haM/tar+theshA ra muM/dwai she ra ti laM/oM ha ra ti au/rA ga ra ti gi badz+ra ra ti ti/muM muM muM/laM l-i laM/aM ai aM/baM baM pau/taM ta taM/oM baM ma yau/ba ba ba ba gadz+r-i

327a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor yin//de nyid goms la gsang mtshan pa//ya yi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom//de nyid hUM gi lha rnams dang //bdag med mtha' brel ma dmigs las//rong gi ngang tshul de bzung
327a3(rgyud): nas nA sangs rgyas rdo rje tsa na kA/shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom//de las rdo rjer byin brlabs twe//pad+ma gsang gnas 'dzum thabs yin//slab su zhugs la de lus dgang //rdo rje
327a4(rgyud): tshen gyis khengs pa dang //so so'i snying po ming yang bod//de goms blo bde gsal spo tha mo//ming yang snying po bcas pa dgug//rdo rje lha rnams hUM du sgom//snod gnas sgeg mo khengs gyur par//
327a5(rgyud): yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas//phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs//rigs dang 'thun pa nyid du bsam//brtan pa hA yi 'phro 'du ltar//rnam shes byin brlabs dang du brtags//gzhi rtsa ma

327a7(rgyud): bcing nga rje su chags pa'i phyag rgya bzhes//rigs dang 'thun pa nyid du bsgom//rin ched phreng ba'i byin bsdu ba//gzugs ston dbab par bya ba ni//rigs dang 'thun pa'i gzugs brnyan la//spyi gnub
327b1(rgyud): dang snying //mtshan//'bru lngas byin rlabs e nyid sbyin//de nyid pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor yin//de nyid goms nas gsung mtshan pa//a yaM tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgoms//de nyid swag+ni lha rnams te//bdag med mtha' bral
327b2(rgyud): dmigs yas//rang gi ngang tshul de bzung nas//sangs rgyas rin chen can ka/shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom//de las rdo rje byin rlabs te//pad+ma gsang gnas 'dzum thabs yin//sbub su zhugs la de lus dgang //
327b3(rgyud): rin chen tshon gyis khengs pa dang //so so'i snying pos mI yang dgus de goms blo bde gsal sgo thim//rin chen lha rnams sr-i du bsgom//snod gnas phreng ba khangs gyur par//yum gyi tshogs kyang gras bya bar gnas
327b4(rgyud): phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs//rig sa dang 'thun pa nyi du bsam//bstan pa sa gyi 'phro 'dra ltar//rna ma shes byin rlangs drang du brtags//gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las//sangs rgyas rin chen sprin tshogs bsgo//

327b7(rgyud): de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa//baM gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom//de nyid yaM gyi lha rnams te//bdad med mtha' bral mi dmigs las//ra shi ngang tshul de zung nas//sangs rgyas pad+ma tsa na ka/shes rab
328a1(rgyud): slos dang ldan pa sa//das na na dun pa to//d+hAgs dunanas dus rnapas so//sru su grugs la dosas drug //ng+gA tshogs kyis khongs pa dang //sosna
328a2(rgyud): bas mi srud /d+hI mam dag // rgyu mas su du nam//snod shin stsam pa/sa skye pa/rmyis kyi tshogs ci dgas la ba dag /
328a3(rgyud): byigazugs la sogs//rigs dang 'thun pa nyid sgom/ gyi 'dro 'du ltung //rnami shes byin rnabs dang du brtags//gzhi gyi meng pa'i sems nyid las//sangs rgyas pad+mo sprin

328a5(rgyud): bzhis//rigs dngo 'thun pa nyid du bsgom//gang mkhan las kyi byin bsdu bo//gzugs ston dbab par bye ba ni//ris dang 'thun pa'i gzugs brtan la//spyi gtsug kha dang snying ka mtshan

328b1(rgyud): 'dzul thabs yin//sgrub su zhugs la de lus dgang //las kyi tshogs kyis khem pa dang //so so'i rnying pos ming nas dgug/de goms blo ba ngo gsal sgo thim//sAs kyis/rnams ha du brjor/
328b2(rgyud): snod gnas gar mkhan khengs 'gyur bar//yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas//phyag rgyu snying po gzugs la sogs//rigs dang 'thun pa nyi du bsgom//brtan pa ho gyi 'phri dadu ltar//rnam

331a6(rgyud): sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor las//tshom bu gnyis kyi lha rnams bsgom//nga nyid sdug pa'i gnas bshams te//lo dang zla ba gsum dang ldar//rdo dung chen gang ba dang //

331b1(rgyud): khrobo chen po rnam par rgyal//rang gi rang bzhin du sbyar nas//spyan dgrad mche btsigs sdang mig 'bar//brkyang bskum rngam pas zhing stengs bsgom//shig shig drag du gyur pa na//de yi

332b2(rgyud): ji bzhin grub par nges//de las 'dod pa bzhin du 'gyur//de bsnyen nyam su lon pa yin//de yi grub po'i rtag pa rnams ni//ming dang gzugs dang mngon sum na//dbugs gas sdang mig

333a2(rgyud): ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i spyan sngar dregs pa chen po dang /dbang phyug chen po dang /rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /phyogs skyong bar gyur pa sde dpon dang chung mar bcas/bran dang g.yog dang
333a3(rgyud): yang g.yog gi rab tu 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i sems kyis gus par dam bcas shing /rang rang gi dkyil 'khor dang /snying po zhes bya ba 'di mgrin gcig tu yang smras so//dregs

333a6(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di rnams la//ming tsam 'dzin par byed pa yis//zhabs kyi mthil du 'di bsgoms te//rang gi snying po 'di brjod na//de bran bzhin du bdag cag bgyid//de
333a7(rgyud): yi dgos pa ci yang rung //ma lus rdzogs par bdag cag bsgrub//'dug nas snying po 'di bzhin dbul//oM khaM d+hu ha swA hA//dbang phyug lha chen dkyil 'khor dang //lus dang
333b1(rgyud): ngag nyid dbul ba ni//'khor g.yog bye ba brgyad cu stong //me tog sil ma bkram pa dang //ras stan 'phar ma mang po dang //rin chen btsal dang brdung ba dang //rol mo glu gar rab tu
333b2(rgyud): snyan//rin chen khang pa'i gnasu ni//lha mo mang por bdag spyod cing //rin chen snod du bdag cag 'thung //gdugs kyis rgyas par steng nas g.yogs//gzugs mdzes pas ni gda'
333b3(rgyud): bar bgyid//rin chen me tog la sogs dang //lha yi me tog phyogasu 'thor//lha yi tshogs mang kun gyis bskor//dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di rnams la//ming tsam 'dzin
333b4(rgyud): par byed pa yis//zhabs kyi mthil du 'di bris te//rang gi snying po 'di brjod na//de la bran bzhin bdag cag bgyid//gtsug tu bzhag nas bkur ba dang //de yi dgos pa
333b5(rgyud): yang rung //ma lus rdzogs par bdag cag bsgreng //de gzugs ston cing gda' bar bgyid//oM sarba daM bA hA u pa haM//rgyal po rnam thos yul 'khor bsrung //'khor tshogs
333b6(rgyud): stong phrag mang po yi//lus dang ngag yid 'bul ba ni//'khor g.yog stong phrag bye ba brgya//me tog sil mar bkram pa dang //rgyan mang byug pa bcal bkram pa//sde dpon nyi shu
333b7(rgyud): bye ba rnams//ci legs par ni rab tu smra//rim pa che zhing srid zhu gus//mchod par byed cing lugs mchis pa'i//bdag gi 'khor dang bcas pa lags//rin chen btsal dang
334a1(rgyud): 'thun pa dang //rol mo glu gar bstan pas brgyan//rin chen khang par bdag mchis shing //bzhon pa dmag mangs 'khor bar mchis//rin chen snod
334a2(rgyud): du chang 'thung ba//gdugs kyis brgyan par steng nas g.yogs//gzugs mdzes pas ni gda' bar bgyid//rin chen me tog phyogasu 'thor//rgyal po'i tshogs mang kun gyis
334a3(rgyud): bskor//dri za med pa'i bdag po dang //dbang ldan rlung gi bdag po rnams//'di bzhin gus par bdag cag bgyid//dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di rnams la//ming tsam
334a4(rgyud): 'dzin par byed pa yis//rang gi snying po 'di brjod na//de la bran bzhin bdag cag bgyid//gtsug tu bzhag nas bkur ba dang //de yi dgos pa ci yang rung //ma lus
334a5(rgyud): rdzogs paro bdag cag sgrub//de la gzugs ston gda' bar bgyid//oM sid d+ha d+hi d+hi d+hu ho swA hA//rgyal po mig mi bzang dang 'phags skyes po//'khor tshogs khri phrag mang
334a6(rgyud): po yis/lus dang ngag yid 'bul ba ni//'khor tshogs khri phrag bye ba brgya//mo ti gri sel ma bkram pa dang //rgyan mang byug pa bcol bkram pa//sde dpon nyi shu bye ba
334a7(rgyud): rnams//ci legs par ri rab tu smra//rim pa chen po srid zhu guso//mchod par byed cing lugs mchis par//bdag gi 'khor dang bcas pa lags//rin chen btsal
334b1(rgyud): dang btung ba dang //rol mo glu gar snyan pas brgyan//rin chen khang par bdag mchis shing //bzhon pa dmagu mang 'khor bar mchis//rin chen sted du chang 'thung ba//gdugs
334b2(rgyud): kyis rgyas par steng nas g.yogs//gzugs mdzes pa ni gda' bar bgyid //rin chen me tog phyogasasu 'thor//rgyal po'i tshogs mang kun gyis bskor//gnod sbyin srin po'i
334b3(rgyud): tshogs rnams dang //chu bdag gshin rje'i 'khor mang rnams//de bzhin gus pas bdag cag bgyid//dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di//ming tsam 'dzin par byed
334b4(rgyud): pa yis//zhabs kyi mthil du bris nas kyang //rang gi snying po 'di brjod na//de la bran bzhin bdag cag bgyid//gtsug tu bzhag nas bkur ba dang //de yi dwagos
334b5(rgyud): pa tsi yang rung //ma lus rdzogs par+ya bdag cag bgyid//de la gzugs ston gda' bar bgyid//oM d+ha ka b+hi du b+ha bi shu pa she oM hUM//zhes mgrin gcig tu smras pas srid pa
334b6(rgyud): rnams thugs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dis 'dul bar gyur nas//bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos sku dang /sud dang thugs yon tan phrin las rdo rje las rdo rje gsong ba'i
334b7(rgyud): tshig 'di phyung ngo //a ho/de bzhin gshegs pa bas mo yas snying po bsam yas par//'bru gtor ba sdu ba las ni 'das bzhin bsnyags dka' ba'i//ma nor las chen
335a1(rgyud): gcig gis rab tu 'dul 'gyur zhing //de yi bsngags pa'i bka' las 'da' bar ngas mi nus//thugs kyi thugs rjes ji srid ma nor lam nyan la//gsang ba
335a2(rgyud): snying po nges pa sgyu 'phrul mchog nyid pa//nga nyid 'dod 'gyur gzhan lta smos ci dgos//de nyid thugs las sprul pa'i thugs nyid do//he rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o//gsang ba'i snying po de
335a3(rgyud): kho na nyid nges pa las shin tu 'dul bar gyur pa gnas dang snying po dbul ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i bdag nyid
335a4(rgyud): dpal khrag 'thung chen po'i spyan sngar dregs pa chen po dang /dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten po'i tshogs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis sems 'dun pa chen po
335a5(rgyud): gyur te/ched du stod pa'i glu 'di me blon gcig tu smraso//e ma to/ya mtshan 'phrul chen gyi//sangs rgyas rdo rje'i rang bzhin dpal//dug dang bdud rtsi khyad med par//dag pa'i rang
335a6(rgyud): bzhin rnal 'byor thugs//kun tu bzang po rdo rje'i sku//ye shes lha'i khro rgyal gtso//khrag 'thung 'jigs byed he ru ka/sangs rgyas mtha' yas 'gro ba rgya mtsho 'dul//thugs rje bas/
335a7(rgyud): yas khwa rgyal kun gyi gtso//khrag 'thung kun lnga chos 'phags yid bzhin mdzod//ser gnag 'thing gnag ljang gnag dmar nag dang //sngo gnag ri rab lte bur brjid pa'i sku//bskal ba
335b1(rgyud): bcas pa'i me ri'i dbus gnas pa'i//ro tsho Da mang po'i dkyil nas zhal rngam pa'i//bsod nams lus bsdus rdo rje mi zad pa'i//skar tshogs mang la nyi zla'i 'od bzhin du//tshe ba can drags
335b2(rgyud): pas 'jigs pa'i tshogs kun 'joms//mtshungs med cho 'phrul khyad par rab ston cing //'dod pa'i dbang phyug gar gyi tshul du bzhugs//za byed skam pas thugs sku gsung gi zhal//
335b3(rgyud): khrag 'tsho mtha' med skems shing rgal tshigs 'joms//khro gnyer snying 'dren 'jigs byed glog ltar 'gyu//dur khrod 'bum gyi dbu smug 'jigs par brjid//'khor ba'i rtog pa 'jig
335b4(rgyud): mdzad thod rnon phreng bas bsgegs//rol phyir rtse mor snang bas a A ha las bzhed//rang nyid che bas dbang rdzogs rgyal bas dbul brgyan//smin ris khro gnyer klog bzhin rab 'gyu bas//phyog
335b5(rgyud): dang 'thun pa'i khrag 'thung 'gyed cing sdud//sprul pa de lta bus ni zil gnon pa//'jigs pas mun pa'i tshogs chen rab bshams kyang //sdang mig sbyin na nyi zla rgyas 'bar bas//'jigs
335b6(rgyud): pa'i tshogs phung sdug bsngal gtan nas sbyong //khros pas zhal gdang so chen gtsigs 'bar bas//srid pa'i rtse nas dmyal khams snyigs pa ltar//'jig rten dus gcig mid mdzad lam
335b7(rgyud): drug gtan nas gcad//ye shes phyag bsnams phyag mtshan 'bar ba yis//srid gsum ma lus rdul phran stongs par mdzad//rkan sgras rol pas 'gro la pheg brdabs bzhin//kham+ba ga suM
336a1(rgyud): kun la chos ston rgyas par mdzad//zasu khrag 'thung rdo rje rgyo mchog gsol//'jigs tshogs smad pa'o kargyun g.yang gzhi bsnams//klu 'dul smon sbrul gnas/
336a2(rgyud): skyong gis klu ste//'jigs bcas klu yi tshogs kyang zhabs 'ag mnan//'dod chags 'dul ba 'dod chags kun gyi gtso//'did chags chen po 'dod chags nyid kyi ste//ma
336a3(rgyud): 'khor bas 'jigs pa'i 'khor du byas//zhe sdang 'dul ba zhe sdang kun gyi gtso//zhe sdang gdugs pa zhe sdang kun gyi sku//'jigs pa'i tshogs rnams zer gyis kun bzhi pa'i//ra
336a4(rgyud): cubarjid pa 'jigs pas 'jigs pa'i gzugs//gau ti mug 'dul po gti mug kun gyi ga ts+tsha// ti mug b+h+r-i sa la~M baN+Di m-ig rten po'i sku//mched lhas khrag 'thung sran chen ma
336a5(rgyud): ban//nga rgyal 'dul ba rgyal kun gyi gtso//'jigs tshogs sad nasa'i tshe ges mang gi gnas//zhabs dgra ma tshi gtsigs mchog pa'i dus mtha' med//'jigs byas phebs
336a6(rgyud): da da 'gong shin snang //bla dge 'dul ba dog kun gyi gaH//phra dgi tshe mchog phra dag chen pa'i hUM//drung me dkun bsdus dkyil 'khor dades gnas shing //lam nor gdug
336a7(rgyud): par bcas pa thaM gyis gas //na gi shes pa'is gdug pa 'dul bar bsnams//sku 'dra gyigs tshigs gi gas kyis sbrul brgyan//zhabs dang phyag du gyur pa sa
336b1(rgyud): thag chad//zhabs tshon g.yon mang brkyang pas lha gnon bdud la khyab//zhangs g.yas thabs chen mang pos dbang sdud 'dor zhing sku ma//rdo rje sa bral byar brdabs gnyid tshor rlabasal
336b2(rgyud): mdzad//'od chen dbus nas glog chen rab 'gyu ba'i//'jigs par gong na med pa'i dpa' bo khyod//zas ngan bdud rtsi sbyor ba'i sman chen bdag/'jigs byed khyod lta bu na rab tu dkon//
336b3(rgyud): bskal pa bkrus kyang slar skye dri ma la//ye shes nyi zer 'od kyi byin rlabs dang //thugs rje dag pa'i char gyi cho 'phrul gyis//brda'o tsam yud la rmongs 'khrugs las slong zhing //shi ba'i lam 'brog
336b4(rgyud): shes rab dkyil 'khor du//skye ba gtan nas sbyong ba'i thugs rje 'char//byams sdang mi mnga' bka' drin chen po'i gter//khrag 'thung sku gsung thugs la phyag 'tshalo//gsang ba'i snying
336b5(rgyud): po de kho na nyid nges pa las bka' drin dran pa'i klu zhes bya ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes po chen pos gsang sngags kyi rgyal
336b6(rgyud): pe 'di brtan zhing mi 'gyur ba dang //'jig rten gyi khamasu gnas par bya ba'i ched du 'byung po rnams kyi jo mo'i yang jo mo//mi srin mo chen mo//mi srin mo dang /tshangs ma dang /'khrug
336b7(rgyud): mo dang /dbang mo dang /'jug sred mo dang /gzhon nu ma dang /dmar mo dang /bdud rtsi mo dang /zhi ba mo dang /becon mo dang /srin mo dang /zab mo dang /dga' ba me dang /ra ra khrag
337a1(rgyud): 'thung myos dang /gcig pu spyod dang /yid 'phrog ma dang //grub mo dang /klu mo dang /gsod byed mo dang /me mo dang /phag mo dang /rgan byed mo dang /sna chad
337a2(rgyud): mo dang /chu lha mo dang /nag mo chen mo dang /ra mgo do mar ser chen mo dang /bum sna sngo gnag chen mo dang /gsus 'dzin ser gnag chen mo dang //rgyal mo dang /blon mo dang /sde dpon/
337a3(rgyud): mo dang /g.yog dang yang g.yog dang /bran dang yang bran la sogags pa//slas dang byi mo dang /bran mo rnams la che du brjod pa 'di brjod//gsang ba'i snying po nges pa 'di//gsang sngags
337a4(rgyud): kun gyi rgyal po yin//thabs chen mtshan pa'i shes rab ni//sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i snying po dang //gsang ba rgyud ni mang po rnams//nga yi thugs las sprul pa yin//tshangs pa dang ni
337a5(rgyud): brgya byin dang /dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa//sde dpon 'o phrog ma'i yul rnams dang //lus 'phags ban lang spyod pa dang //sgra mi snyan dang 'dzem gling du//nga yi thugs
337a6(rgyud): kyi snying po 'di//phyogs bcu kun tu spel ba dang //de yi gzugs la btad pa ni//yid bzhin mdzod 'byor bka' yi gnas//phyi nang theg pa bstan bcos
337a7(rgyud): dang //stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rnams//spyod dang bsgom dang 'das pa dang //sdom pa kun la mkhas pa yis//bsgom pa sran dang chos phyogs dang //
337b1(rgyud): bstan pa 'dzin par nus pa yis//gsang ba'i snying po mchog tu gtad//gzhan la bsnyad par ma yin no//mi 'khrug blo zab rkyen thub cing //yid bzhin sbyor bar
337b2(rgyud): mos pa la//rtsa ba yan lag dam tshig bstan//zla dang bcas pas dam tshig che//sbyor ba gnyis ga mkhas pa dang //lung dang tshad du ldan thub dang //gzhan lo bsnyad
337b3(rgyud): par mi byed cing //bstan pa mchod par byed pa'o//nye ba bsnyen pa dam tshig la//bskyob pa bsten pa nye bsnyen pa//ci nus par ni shin tu brtson//sems can ngang tshul
337b4(rgyud): kun par nas//gang gi yid kyang mi 'khrugs shing //mchod pa tshogs la stobs la rug/bud med 'gugs pas gtso la dbul//zung thub gsang la mkhas pa yis/
337b5(rgyud): nges pa can la shin tu btang//gzhan du bstan par mi bya'o//thogs med phyal bar 'dod pa spyod//bud med yon tan kun yod cing //'dod chags kun dang 'thun spyod
337b6(rgyud): la//rtsa ba dang du blang ba dang //'tsham par lha yi sku bstan te//nye bsnyen gsang ba'i man ngag rnams//nams kyang sbyin par mi bya'o//de la sbyor stangs de bstan nas//
337b7(rgyud): gzhan bstan par ma gsungs so//dad ldan srun ci bla rno ba//dad pa che zhing chos la gus//chags par ran pa bka' nyan cing //gnas la dga' zhing lus nyan pa/
338a1(rgyud): rtsa ba yan lag dam tshig sgrub//mchod pa'i gnas shom sgom pa srung //bsnyen pa la ni byin phab nas//gsang sngags tshogs kyi mched
338a2(rgyud): gnas su//nga yi gsang ba byin phab te//thogs pa med par mngon sum la//sbyor ba'i thabs ldan mnyam sbyor ba//dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi//bdag
338a3(rgyud): nyid mnyes pa'i mnyam sbyor zhing //mnyam pa'i grub pas tshogs la mchod//dam tshig mi ldan spyod rtsing dang //gting nas bstan pa mi 'dzin la//'dod chags
338a4(rgyud): sbrel bang mi byed cing //gsang ba'i snying po de kho na//nges pa'i don ni mi stan la//nga'i dbang dang bslab pa rnams//rim pa bzhin du rab tu sbyin//rigs ngan pho ma
338a5(rgyud): 'dod spyod ni//spro thung 'dod chags rab tu che//blo zhan phrag dog sgro skur can//gnyid che chang dang brtson 'grus chung //slob la mi gus nan tan med//slob dpon mi dran spun
338a6(rgyud): sems chung //gas te dam la gnas na yang //de yi gsang pa 'dzin pa la//mngon du dga' bar mi nus to//lta zhan bka' las 'das pa dang //grol ba dka' zhing nus
338a7(rgyud): mthu zhan//mun dang lkog dang skye bo la//gar dben phred par 'dod spyod cing //'dod chags 'ga' lam de dag la//tshig rnams gsang ba spu byed pa//dngos po don dang 'thun
338b1(rgyud): pa las//gsang bu'i snying po sbyin mi bya//bskal pa ni 'jig rten bar du yang //thugs kyi bde ba mi spro zhing //nams kyang bstan par mi bya'o//'jig rten 'dod pa dga'
338b2(rgyud): rnams phyir//gal te rmongs pas byin pa ni//mas bla nad kyis srog bcad de//rtsa ba yan lag skyes pa yin//bsregs dang sbyangs par yun paches gnas//zhes brjod pas
338b3(rgyud): sred pa mtha' dag gi bud med kyi tshogs rnams dam tshig 'dis 'dul bar gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po sku gsung thugs dang yon tan phrin las rdo rje las rdo rje
338b4(rgyud): gsang ba'i chog 'ang phyung ngo //e e ma e ma'o chos rnams sgyu ma yi//nga nyid bud med gsang ba sngags pa yi//lce drug dus btab snang ba' srid 'byung ba'i gter//yang dge
338b5(rgyud): lan rnyed mngon par kun gnas kun tu gnas//chos mang chos nyid mnyam pa'i phyag rgya ji snyed las//las ngan dge ba'i cho 'phrul la mtshan 'di//kun gyi khyad par nyid ni dung
338b6(rgyud): med bde ba gcig pu yin//chos kun de nyid yin phyir dman pas mi smad 'tsham par bstan//sgyu ma 'byor pa nyid ni bde bar gshegs nyid yin rab tu gsal//rdo rje gsang ba'i
338b7(rgyud): tshig tu'o//gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dam tshig chen pos bud med 'dul ba'i lo'u sto bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa'o///de nas bcom ldan
339a1(rgyud): dgyes pa chen pos mnyes pa'i mchod pa 'di brjod do//de la mchod sbyin chen po ni//thog mar bdag nyid rtogs goms bsgral//de nas gnyis
339a2(rgyud): med blo yis ni//blo ngan 'jig rten snying re rje//gnyis su med par bsgral bar bya//'khril pa'i mchod chen mnyam sbyor bas//bdag nyid mnyes pas mnyes par bya//
339a3(rgyud): mnyam pa'i grub rdzas chen po dag/bdag dang mnyam pa'i tshogs la 'bul//bza' dang bca' dang btung dang bzo//longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad ni//dkyil 'khor

339a5(rgyud): ci dgos//rnal 'byor las su rung rnams kyis//phyag rgya chen po rdzogs gyur cing //gsal ba'i yid gnyis med pa ni//dkyil 'khor chen po 'bar bar 'gyur

339b1(rgyud): g+hu ngas/nangs las nas m+b+ha kun spyod kyang //rgyus la mo sgrogs gas byung ste//rdul khrims sdom pa zung sun zlas//bla mo mchog dmachog du//
339b2(rgyud): blo'i dbang du tshul khrims dang //ji snyed sdom pa byasgyu ma yis pa//ma lus kun 'dus rnam pa pa //yod ming dbu ma 'ang mi dmigs shing //sgyu ma tshig yor lta bu'i tshul//

339b5(rgyud): tsam yod pa yid//mchags po lce rgyags pa dang //chags pa nyid na tshigs pa med//de ni chang sa mchog rgyal ba ste//shin+d+ra tu chags pa chen po yin/ meng snang rna m+bu

339b7(rgyud): tshig mtshig smin tshogs dang ni sdeng dang //pam na na pa \u0f7f/dag kyi ma shichen//dkau pa'i snod ma /ni 'azhi
340a1(rgyud): yi dmatshig mchog/yo nas dag mnyam rtogs pas spyad//bsrung zhing bsgrub pa'i dam chogalnga/rtsa ba yin te rigs med 'gyur//mi spang ma
340a2(rgyud): dor lnga gnyis ni//yan lag dam tshig 'da' dka' ba'o//mnyam la mnyam par sbyar ba ni//mnyam pa'i dam tshig la gnas na//mnyam rdzogs chen po thob par 'gyur//
340a3(rgyud): 'das na sangs rgyas ma yin no//rtsa ba nyams pa'i phyal ba dag/gsol nye bar mi btsun dang //skad cig yud tsam smra ma byed//nyams 'gyur nyes pa brjod mI lang /
340a4(rgyud): rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams myur ni//bsgrub pa thams cad log par 'gyur//yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs pa'i//'bras bu mi 'dod bzhin du 'du//yam lag dam tshig nyams
340a5(rgyud): gyur na//'bras bu med cing ngan 'gror ltung //dam tshig rnams ni rdo rje che//sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin//rtsa ba'i dam tshig lnga la ni//gcig la'ang gnyis
340a6(rgyud): dang bcu drug gsum//yan lag dam tshig lta gnyis la//gcig la bcu phrag gnyis su hU~M//dam tshig 'di ni mang po che//'jig rten drug gi phyogs btsun//srid
340a7(rgyud): gsum 'gro ba ji snyed pa'o//rtog 'dul dam tshig de snyed spro//gzhan yang rgya mi mchog kun brjong na//thams cad ma lus phyag rgya yi//bsgrib mdo dam pa me lus 'brig/
340b1(rgyud): de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/rgyal ba'i rigs mchog 'dzin pa ste/'jig rten gtso dang 'khor gyis bkur//dam pa'i mchog dang dam pa yas//sras dang spun dgongs
340b2(rgyud): byin gyis rlob//bder gshegs nyid kyi yul la zhugs//'jigs med kun tu bzang por sbyor//ji bzhin nyid dang 'dul ba'i thabs//ji snyed sdom pa bsam yas pa//ma
340b3(rgyud): lus rnam dag lhun gyis 'grub//nyams na bskangs pas rdzogs pa dang //de la sogs pa bsam yas mchog ces brjod pas/de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs
340b4(rgyud): ba nyid la 'dul bar gyur te//gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dam tshig gi le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa'o////de nas de bzhin gshegs
340b5(rgyud): brgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las sngags 'chang rnams don yod par bya ba'i phyir /dam tshig sum brgya pa'i rtsa ba mdor bsdus nas/sngags 'chang rnams kyis
340b6(rgyud): don tshod du brjod pa'i de brjod do//phyogs bcu 'jig rten rdul snyed du//log rtogs mi bzad rdul phran steng //rtog 'dul gnyen po bsam mi khyab//'dul ba sdom pa bsam

348a1(rgyud): bor khas blangs bzhin//rul myags tshig nas dmyal bar 'gro/rnal 'byor dam la gnas gyur pa'i//las rnams yongasu bya ba dang //'khor rnams
348a2(rgyud): bu gcig bzhin du skyongs//'phra men ma yang dngos grub 'thob//bcol ba'i las rnams mngon du byos zhes bsgo'o//khro bo bsgrub pa'i las kyi gtso bo ni//'di yin no//khrag 'thung
348a3(rgyud): chen po la sogs dri'i//bro gar glu tshig chen pos ni//thams cad thams cad byed pa yin//mdzod ldan chen mo la sogs pa'o//bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni//'du bar 'dod na
348a4(rgyud): 'du bar byed//'brel bar 'dod ni 'phel bar byed//spros mo chen mo la sogs pa'i//bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni//lhan ner 'dod ni thim par byed//rmugs par 'dod na
348a5(rgyud): myos par byed//seng gdong chen mo la sogs pa'i//bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni//thams cad kun tu za bar byed//rdul cha tsam yang med par byed//gzhad gdong chen mo
348a6(rgyud): lo sogs pa'i//bro gar glu tshigs chen mos ni//thams cad kun la za bar byed//kun la rab tu nyams par byed//slas dang byi mo bran mo yi//br-i gar glu tshigs chen mas ni//
348a7(rgyud): sprod cing gtong bar byed pa ste//thams cad thams cad byed pa yin//ldan pa dang ni lcug phran tshal//sdong gcig dang ni me rog tu//dang ba dga' ba chags pa dang //khros pa
348b1(rgyud): ka li rab tu bya//zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa nyid sbyong bar gyur to//gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid dnges pa las lhun gyis grub pa'i phrin las byin rgya
348b2(rgyud): rlob pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug cu pa'o///de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las chos thams cad yod dang che su 'dus par bstan pa
348b3(rgyud): ba dang /shes rab thams cad ni yum bzhir 'dus//yum bzhi yang gcig tu 'dus//thabs thams cad ni rigs bzhir 'dus//rigs bzhi yang gcig tu 'dus te//dza dbyings pa/
348b4(rgyud): dbyings kyi ye shesu 'dus par bstan nas tshig mgo mjug gi don bsdus nas/yang 'di skad brjod de/don gyi rtsa ba'i mchog yin no//thams cad ma lus mi lus mi dmigs ma
348b5(rgyud): chags chos nyid de/de bzhin dbyings nyid mang po sna tshogs thab su snang //thabs nyid sgyu ma mig yor chu zla gzugs brnyan yin//de nyid rang rig ye shes chags med sna tshogs
348b6(rgyud): snang //thabs dang shes rab ldan pas mchog gi gnas gyur pas//ji ltar spyad kyang zad med gnyis med sgrib mi 'gyur//shes rab thabs chen mchog la ye nas rol pa yin//
348b7(rgyud): de nyid phyag rgya sna tshogs sprul pa rang rig ste//rgyu 'bras ye nas dbyer med snga phyi ma yin pas//'bras bu lam du gyur nas dus gcig mnyam par sbyor//'di ni yin bzhin rin chen thaMd
349a1(rgyud): 'byung ba'i gnas//thams cad 'du ba'i gtor dang yod bzhin mdzod//gnyis bral mnyam dang mi mnyam thams cad nyid kyi dbyings//nga dang bdag med
349a2(rgyud): mtshan ma sna tshogs dbyer med pa//stong dang mi stong mi gnas de bzhin nyid du 'dus//rang byung rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zad med dkyil 'khor spro//'das dang ma 'das dkyil
349a3(rgyud): 'khor bsam yas lhun grub dang //mi zad par ldan rgyan gyi 'khor lo drug rdzogs pa//skye med dbyings kyi rang byung 'od gsal phreng ldan mchog/ye nAs ma bcos ma byas rang
349a4(rgyud): rig dang gis gas la//thams cad 'byung 'jug rang rig gter chen dang du bsdus//phyogs bcu ma lus mi lus thams cad kun 'dus dang //zhing khams gzhal yas
349a5(rgyud): bsam yas rin chen mchog chen kun//skye med dbyings dang rang gi gnyisu yang dag 'ab//mos spyod stong nyid rgyu 'bras yang nas yang sbyangs mi dmigs pa//ye nas 'od
349a6(rgyud): gsal chags med ma chags dkon mchog gonas//ming tsam mchog rol thabs dang shes rab mchog gis rdzogs//lam stegs nyid du pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs par rgyu
349a7(rgyud): 'bras spyod//mnyam nyid pa la rdo thabs chen yang dag ldan//'gro med 'ong med mi gnas kun khyab khyab med nyid kyis bshad//a ho rgyud kyi rgyal ba sgyu 'phrul dra ba las
349b1(rgyud): pha rol tu phyin pa dang sa bcu gnyis dang //thabs kyis mchog dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus par yid dang chosu 'dus par bstan pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa gcig pa'o///
349b2(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes lnga'i dkyil 'khor la mnyam par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do//lnga phung yan lag thams cad kyang //'bru lnga gnas pa'i byang chub
349b3(rgyud): oM dang muM du 'brel ba yi//byang chub rdo rje nyid las byung //spyir na brjod pa thams cad kyang //kun kyang ming tsam yi ge u//skye 'jig nyid kyang yi ge lnga//de ni byang chub sems//
349b4(rgyud): nyid yin//dmigs med byang chub mchog 'byung ba//gsum sha re lnga 'bar bcu 'byor pa//zad med rin chen gter yin to//mngon shos drug ldan mtshan bzang lpags//
349b5(rgyud): e las 'phro zhing ar 'dus pa//gsang ba'i thig le nyid kyi dbyings//na mkha'i dbyings nas sprin byung ba//kun la khyab cing sna tshogs sprin//bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i khong nas bas
349b6(rgyud): mi khyab//rkyen brlabs ya mtshan rmad po che//yon tani mi zad gta du gyur//ho dpe nas mnyam nyid gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dbyings//dbyings las mi zhan ye nas thig
349b7(rgyud): le'o ngang //ye shes dbyings nyid gzugs brnyan sgyu ma'i tshul//snang byed nyid na bya byed med par gnas//ye shes 'phrul chen bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i don//dkyil 'khor bas yas
350a1(rgyud): lhun grub dam pa ni//thabs dang shes rab gnyis med mnyam par gnas//dag mnyam rnam gsum don rtogs bsgom byas shing //mnyam pa rnam panis
350a2(rgyud): don rtogs mchog gi gnas//rgyu 'bras lhun grub phun sum tshogs bzhir 'dus//ye shes lnga rdzogs sku gsung thugs kyis bsdus//chags medo zhi ba'i lam nus thig ler 'jug/
350a3(rgyud): ye shes lnga rdzogs spyod yul mi 'da' la//ma chags 'od gsal dkyil 'khor rdzogs par ldan//thams cad ma lus rang rig rgyal po yis//dkyil 'khor dag mnyam
350a4(rgyud): khro bo khro mor sbyor//chos rnams rang bzhin nyid kyis stong //nad dang nang gi phyi rol gyi//rnam rtog sna tshogs 'dzin pa yang //dngos po med dbyings skad cig ma//de nyid rnam
350a5(rgyud): par dag pa'i lam//phyin ci log nyid yang dag ste//ma rig pa ni ye shes gsal//nyon mongs sdug bsngal byang chub mchog/thams cad yon tan mchog gi gnas//a
350a6(rgyud): phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kun//nges pa'i don dgrol bzhi bcu rtsa lngar 'dus//bsdus po'i don nyid yi ge 'bru lngar bsdus//lnga po'i don nyid 'bru gsum
350a7(rgyud): nang du 'dus//gsum po de nyid yi ge ar 'dus te//a nyid ma skyes mnyam rdzogs dbyings thim//oM ho/mi dmigs stong pa nyid kyang brjod ma lang //mi dmigs de bzhin/
350b1(rgyud): shegs kyang bsnam me d+ha/sa smos rdzog gis dbyings kyang bsam mo khyuH//ma 'gags byang chub sems ni 'jog med//'gra mda'ang ma ma gan pa//drugs
350b2(rgyud): rnam par 'phro zhes nyid la nyid gsung //dbyings las dbyings byung thabs kyi phyag rgyar gsal//thabs las dbyings byung yum gyi phyag rgyar gsal//dbyingasu dbyings kyis ye shes 'byor de /
350b3(rgyud): ni//byang chub sems tshogs dkyim 'khor brjod mi long //de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor nges pa'i don mA lus par mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgyar brim dA'i le'u ste drug cu
350b4(rgyud): gnyis pa'o///de nas de bzhin gshegs pas rgyal po mtha' ya su sprul nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do//sgyu 'phrul dra ba bstan bsdus te//bruM dang bi shI'i dkyil la
350b5(rgyud): du//ma dang A yi dkyil 'khor la//rdo rje 'khor lo rab bsgoms nas//bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i don bsgoms te//de yis phyogs bcu ri gang bar bsgrim//blo dang dzAHhUM ba~M hos dgug/sku
350b6(rgyud): gsung thugs kyi snying po mchog/lus ngag sems la thim par bya//ni nyid dngos sam yid bzhin mdzod//bum pa mchog ni bzang po yi//tshi gzhag gnas ni 'di yin te/
350b7(rgyud): nas yang du dgug bya ste//mngon sum smin par gyur pa dang //dbyingasu yang ni sra bar bya//rdo rjego cha bsrung ba yis//brtan zhing 'khor los dkab par bya//snying po 'bru lnga'i nang du bstim
351a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad ma lus kun//rgyal ba che dpag med pa bsgom//sku mchog glang ri tshor ba la//rgyan phreng sna tshe/nas kyis brgyan/yid zhin rin phrengab/
351a2(rgyud): dang //yid bzhin rin chen za ma tog/rin chen rgyan dang bum pa bzang //gzhan yang 'gro ba'i don bya ba//bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog/bgegs kyis ni rnams ma ster na/
351a3(rgyud): tshe dpag med dang khro bo ste//phyogs btsu na mkha'o khams bkang nas//sgra skad drag po bton nas ni//thams cad ma lus thul bar bya//dbang du tshe dpag med pa bskur//
351a4(rgyud): tshe bsnyen dang ni nye bsnyen dang //tshe bsgrub dang ni bsgrub chen dang //thabs dang shes rab 'byor pa yis//ci 'dod las rnams grub par byed//tshe dbang mo ni rgyud 'di lam

351b2(rgyud): la yang tshe dpag med//sku gsung thugs kyi gzugs kyis ni//phyogs bcu na mkha'i khams bi kang nas//phyag rgya mtshon cha sna tshogs kyis//'jig rten phyogs bcu'i bdud

351b7(rgyud): bas brgyan//rin chen lnga dang sman lnga dang //'bru lnga spos lnga yungs dkar lnga//sngags mkhan rab bstan blo ldan pas//yan lag ma nyams sngags bzlas bsgom//brgyan chas
352a1(rgyud): lnga dang ldan byas nas//dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur//de nas rigs kyi bu de yis//yo byad ma lus ldan byas nas//mchod yon rnam pa
352a2(rgyud): sna tshogs kyis//mnyes mched dngos grub thob par 'gyur//sgyu 'phrul dra ba las tshe'i cho ga dbang dam pa shin tu gsang ba'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa gsum pa'o//

352a4(rgyud): kun tu bzang po thugs rje'i dang //sku gsung thugs ldan yon tan rdzogs//mnyam pa'i zhing du sbyar bar bya//rdo rje rab tu gsang ba yis//rdo rje rab tu kun sbyar te//oM dang

352b1(rgyud): par bya//ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du//rje las lcags kyu mang ba yis//gang dgug de yi snying ka nas//drangs te de'i khar gzhug bya//ma lus nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du//dza las

353b2(rgyud): po khyod nyon cig/yang nas yang du mngon gsal du//byang chub mchog gis rtags bsgoms shig/de ltar byas pa'i dngos grub ni//'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten po'i//brda pang skad/

353b4(rgyud): kro d+hi shwa ri dang gnyisu med par 'du ba mdzad nas byang chub sems kyi rdo rje las khro bo'i dkyil 'khor mang pos spros nas 'jig rten pa'i dbang mo chen po dang /dbang po dang /rgyal po dang /

355a1(rgyud): sbyin 'od zer brgya dang ldan//lag g.yas rdo rje tri shul la//lag g.yon bdud rtsi bum pa gsol//in tA s+thA ya swAt+ma/dzaHhUM baM hoSh+Thatra mi tA d+hu hAru
355a2(rgyud): tA bAg ta dza dz+nyA dz+nyA dzA hUM hUM/zhes lan 'bum bzlas nas//bdag nyid rdo rje he ru ka 'dren pa'i phyag rgya de dag gis//lha'i snying po'i dbang po'i snying mang rjes//rgyab nas rdo rje can gyis phul/
355a3(rgyud): de nyid lha'i dbang gyur nas//las gang 'dod pa byed du gzhug/thams cad thams cad grub par byed//kun la 'byin cing kun la za//lha yi 'khor rnams thams cad kun//
355a4(rgyud): ma lus par ni yang dag 'du//bran bzhin du ni thams cad 'brang //rgyal po 'phags skyes bsgrub pa ni//bdag nyid rin chen he ru ka/sku mdog rgyud nas 'byung ba bzhin//phyag
355a5(rgyud): rgya rnams kyang de bzhin te//'od kyi 'phro 'du byin brlabs kyis//'phags skyes po ni dbang du bsdus//d+hI ta d+hI ta swA hA/dzaHhUM baM hai/g+h+r-i h+Na gr-i h+Na du ri bid swA hA/hang hang hang
355a6(rgyud): rang na dzaHhUM baM ho/zhes snying po lan 'bum du bzlas te//srog dang ldan pa ro tang 'dzin bya//bdag nyid rod ne he ru ka/'phags skyes pa yo snying ka nas//dze yis rab tu
355a7(rgyud): bzung nas ni//bdag gi mdun du dgug par bya//rgyab nas rdo rje can gyis//de nas mngon sum gyur pa dang //gang 'dod las de byed du gzhug/mdog ni gser gyi
355b1(rgyud): mdag tu 'bar//'bar rnams thams cad bdag la bsdu//yid bzhin rin chen gzhal yas 'grub//rgyal po mag dan pad+ma 'ad ni//bdag nyid pat+ta ta R+YA//sgyu ma dag gang na/
355b2(rgyud): sku ma bzhin//phyag rgya rdu la yang de bzhin te//snying ba 'bum phrag gis la bzlas nas//ting dzin phyu rgyu bsgyur ru shing //lha nyid du tshu gas la gyur nas//rtul po sa
355b3(rgyud): bdan skyon tu dmami nang 'tsher ba s+ho//shA /rgyun sun k+Sha rnams ro'i snang //ska m-ig+ha yis ga mi ka can//de ni rab tu
355b4(rgyud): //d+hId+hit+sI k+She bAng+ku/d+hIHd+hUHhU~M/na ga shrIn dI ya~M pag sha pag dzaHhU~M'adzum d+hi/dum bzlas nas na//de ni dug gi de dU du badz+ra//bdag nyid lta drugs
355b5(rgyud): bsgo myo nas/tsho ma sbyong kanas//dza yis rab tu gzung nas drung //d+hU ba nas rdo rje can gyis drug//de nas bdan /dang gnyis med 'i/dribyur med par ni b+hair ba dang /
355b6(rgyud): dang las byed dru gzhug/mad ngan 'khor rnams mdzes phyir//rlung gi las rnams 'byub bar byeng //rmyil po rnam thos bsgrub boni//bdog nyid tshu ba dudu kyi 'khyi
355b7(rgyud): pU de byag mchi ma na//gas pani pa'i rnams shing//rang sagis byung ba'i dus blog na nga dang //rnam sa dushin du
356a1(rgyud): gzugs noran chen bai DUn//yang na mdog na sngo zhing 'cher//phyag g.yas rin chen dbyig to thags//gnon na 'dod yon bum pa gsol//dang /
356a2(rgyud): laran chen sna tshogs mdzes//bi shrA ma Na ye swAhA/dzaHd+hU ba toHku be ri/kang kang /yong yang /dzaHhUM ba haH'bum du bzlas shing sreg yod par//yang dang yang
356a3(rgyud): du bzlas par bya//bdag nyid bdud rtsi he ru ka/ji yis rnam thos snying nas drangs//dbang du yang dag bsdu bar bya//rgyab nas rdo rje can gyis phul//yid bzhin rin chen
356a4(rgyud): dbang du 'gyur//gnod sbyin pa rna pa bran bzhin bsdu//rin chen spros shing las rnams bsgrub//ci 'dod las rnams byed par 'gyur//sgyu 'phrul dra ba las lha chen po bsgrub
356a5(rgyud): pa dang //rgyal po chen po bzhi po dkyil 'khor bkod cing bsgrub pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa lnga pa'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos tshogs kyi dkyi
356a6(rgyud): 'khor la shin tu rngam pa'i gdangs kyis glu 'di blangaso//hUM ga tu mtshan dus mtha' mo ltar 'bar//'od zer nyi ma 'bum gyis gzi//khro gnyer glog stong 'gyu ba bzhin//mche
356a7(rgyud): bzangs ya ba za byed che to//hU~M rngam pa'i nga ra 'brug stong lngar//thug che ma ri rab 'bum brnyil skad//a mnya'a'i gang rgyangs che//dbyug pa'i 'thir rlung gsug pa che //hUM khrus
356b1(rgyud): pa'i shes rang 'od po che//ye shes dkyil 'khor kun tu gsal//'bar ba'i ye shes kun tu 'joms//sna tshogs ye shes thog la tshwa ta//hUM khros pa'i rgyal po sngon tshan po/
356b2(rgyud): khros pa'i dkyil 'khor char chen 'bebs//dkyil 'khor yid bzhin 'byung ba'i gter//sna tshogs khros pa'i thig le che ho//hUM bdud kun gyi ni bdud chen po//bdud kyi bdud de dang
356b3(rgyud): rnams 'joms//'jigs pa'i tshogs kyang 'jigs byed pa//'jigs byed chen po thig le che ho//hUM rdo rje brag chen sra ba po//rdo rje chu ba sdud pa po//rdo rje me ste kun 'bar che//rdo rje
356b4(rgyud): rlung te 'thor rlung che ho//zhes tshad du blangs//gsang po'i snying po de kho na nyid ngeb pa las mnyes pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa drug pa'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa
356b5(rgyud): chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la gsang sngags kyi rgyal po/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las bdag dang rdo rje sems dpar dbyer med par yang
356b6(rgyud): dag pa'i dbyingasu 'dus shing bdag gis rdo rje sems dpa'o zhal mngon sum du mthong ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir ched du brjod pa 'di gsung so//kun rdzob skye mar zhal mthong ba'i//thad mig
356b7(rgyud): yor sgyu me'i chu'i//snang srid ma lus thams cad kun//chu zla'i tshul du 'drar shes shing //yul dang rtog pa gnyis med par//gang gis de ltar rig pa de//gzhi rtsa med du
357a1(rgyud): skad cig ma//snga phyi med dbyings de bzhin nyid//cis kyang mi rmugs rdo rje yin//rdo rje sems dpa' di la gnas//lta spyod 'thun pas nal mthong yin//rang
357a2(rgyud): bzhin dkyil 'khor yang dag ni//chos dbyings bdag dang dbyer med pa'i//mnyam par sbyor zhing dge ba'o//thams cad byang chub lhun grub pa'i//de ltar gang gis rtogs 'gyur ba//
357a3(rgyud): de ni ye shes gnyis can te//de yis yang dag snying po mthong //de nyid dris kyang mi tshugos pa//shin tu sra zhing brtan pa yin//rang bzhin dbyings nas 'od gsal ba//sems
357a4(rgyud): dpa' mchog tu yang dag gsungs//de ltar rtogs na zhal mthong yin//de bzhin mnyam rdzogs lhun grub yin//de bzhin gshegs dang ye shes lnga//rang byung chen po'i dkyil
357a5(rgyud): 'khor bsgom//rtog nyid bral ba'i thabs mkhas kyis//lha gsal dngos po med bsgoms na//mthong thos la sogs med pa'i tshul//rang gi ye shes gsal bsgoms na//
357a6(rgyud): rang bzhin med la cir yang 'grub//'grub 'gyur nyid na dngos po med//ji ltar bcom ldan de bzhin gyis//bdud dpung dkyil du ta la btsugs//thams cad byang chub
357a7(rgyud): shing bsdus te//gdug pa dang gis mi dga' nas//tal bcad bskams yongs mi gcod//rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid yin//bdag dang ting 'dzin mthong gyur po//de nyid
357b1(rgyud): rdo rje rnal mchong yin//rdo rje sems dpa' nyid bsgoms te//ting 'dzin shin tu 'dres gsaldan//thams cad rdo rje nyid du 'gyur//kun la dbang sgyur cis mi tshugs//bdag dang sed da bye
357b2(rgyud): med de//las 'thun ji ltar snang ba bzhin//bdag dang sems dpa' lta spyod cig/de nyid rdo rje zhal mthong yin//gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor yang dag yin//chen po rags pa
357b3(rgyud): thabs kyis rtogs//so so'i mtshan 'dzin shes rab rtog/gnyis med 'brel pa thabs chen yin//kun kyang shes rab dang du gnas//snang dang gnas pa thams cad kun//de bzhin
357b4(rgyud): nyid las ma goyos phyir//gra mo dang med pa gnyi ga med//gnas dang mi gnas dbye ru med//mnyam pa'i dbying su thams cad 'dus//'dus nyid gan su thabs pa yis//thams cad
357b5(rgyud): de lta bu yi ngang //mnyam gnyis dbyer med sus mi tshugs//de nyid sems dpa' bzhugs gnas yin//de ltar rtogs pa'i rigs mchog de//sems dpa' nyid dang rigs 'thun pa/
357b6(rgyud): de nyid rdo rje zhal mthong yin//rgyur byas phung po khams rnams la//gzhi rtsa de bzhin nyid du gcig/sgyu mar sna gzugs brnyan tshul//snang ba nyid ni dngos po med//ngos nyid nyid sna chog ston//
357b7(rgyud): rung po lnga nyid de bzhin gshe//dbang rje sems byang chub sems//yul dus bod chen mo yin//bdag rtog rnam pa khro ba yin//rtag tshad mu ba ni khro mo yin//de sems rang rig nyid rje bya/
358a1(rgyud): thams cad dbyings 'gyur kun tu bzang //de nyid rdo rje sems dpa' yin//gang gis de ltar rtogs gyur na//sems dpa' nyid dang dgongs 'thun pa//
358a2(rgyud): de nyid rdo zhal mthong yin//chos rnams mo lus thams cad kun//ming dang tshig dang yi ge dang //sgra yis mtshon nas don bstan pa//kun kyang yi ge ming gcig bzhin//
358a3(rgyud): gang yang dngos po ma yin te//dngos med de nyid sna tshogs snang //snang ba nyid na gang yang med//bya byed sna tshogs kun byed kyang //dngos po med de yang dag nyid//de ni cis kyang //
358a4(rgyud): mi tshugs pa'i//sa rdo dran med ma yin te//de nyid shin tu 'od gsil yin//rdo rje sems dpa' de ltar gnas//gang gis de ltar rtogs pa ni//rigs mchog dam pa
358a5(rgyud): rgyu yon te//rdo rje'i rigs dang dbyer med phyir//de nyid rdo rje zhal mthong yin//skyes bu blo rtsal rab ldan pas//kun dang dbyer med don rtogs te//'bras bu mngon du ma gyur
358a6(rgyud): byang chub sems la gnas bcos pas//dper na mngal dang sgo nga yi//mdun du ma gyur pa sgribs gyur kyang //rtsal tshon 'dus pa 'byung ba bzhin//rnam rtog gzugs na
358a7(rgyud): bopor ma thag/thams cad kun la dbang sgyur zhing //rigs mchog dam pa 'dzin par 'gyur//rdo rje sems dang mnyam pa yi//dngos grub mchog rnams yongasu rdzogs//
358b1(rgyud): bde ba can gyi zhing yang thob//byang chub mchog la rol par 'gyur//lha mi rnams kyi ston pa po//lus ngag sems la dbang thob nas//ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub//tshad med/
358b2(rgyud): bzhi la dbang byed 'gyur//bde ba'i ro mchog kun la spyod//tha mar skye rgyun mchil sogs pa'i//sdug bsngal zad pa'i go 'phang thob//rdo rje rigs mchog 'dzin 'gyur te//thugs
358b3(rgyud): rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis//'gro ba ma lus thams cad kun//rdo rje rigasu 'dren par byed//bdud sde tshar gcod nyon mongs 'dul//chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag bskor//'gro
358b4(rgyud): ba ma lus thams cad la//mi rtag pa yi tshul yang ston//nyan thos rnams la dgra bcom tshul//byang chub rnams la rang byung tshul//bla med theg pa sangs rgyas tshul//lhun grub rnams/
358b5(rgyud): la rdo rje dbyings//kun la 'thun pa'i tshul yang ston//rang bzhin dbyings las g.yas pa med//mi g.yos bzhin du kun tu ston//chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun//de lta bu
358b6(rgyud): yi ngang du gnas zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o//nyid la nyid de skad ces brjod do//gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las skyes bu dam pa blo rtsal rab gcig gis rdo rje sems dbyi/
