358b7(rgyud): zhal mthong ba'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa bdun pa'o////de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las sngags 'chang rnams don yod par bya ba'i phyir/
359a1(rgyud): dam tshig bum brgya'i rtsa ba mdor bsdus nas sngags 'chang rnams kyi don du ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do//phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rdul snyed du//log
359a2(rgyud): rtog me bzad rdul phran snyed//rtog 'dul gnyen po bsam mi khyab//'dul ba sdom pa bsam yas dang //rdo rje theg mchog mang po kun//nyid las g.yos shing spros med kyang /
359a3(rgyud): rang rig 'khrul po'i rtog pa yis//lta ba mthon dman pas mi mi khyab//de 'dul dan phyir 'tsham par bstan//yang dag nyid dang log rtogs nyid//ngo bo nyid kyis gnas gyur
359a4(rgyud): na/de la bcos shong bsgyur du med//ye nas ngo bo yod min na//nyon mongs spangs shing byang chub med//thams cad ma lus ro gcig 'gyur//kun rdzob chu zla lta yin pa
359a5(rgyud): cir yang 'gyur zhing cir yang 'grub//rnal 'byor de nyid rtogs pa yis//don dam skye 'gag med pa ste//kun rdzob sgyu ma cir yang 'grub//gnas ngan dus na log rtogs
359a6(rgyud): nyid//gzung 'dzin bral ba nyid rtogs nas//bdag med ye shes rang bzhin nyid//snying rje thabs mkhas ting 'dzin gyis//cir yang dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub//so so rang
359a7(rgyud): bzhin nges zhe na//yang dag lam nyid bcosu med//de bas yang dag blo chen gyis//thams cad dngos po med par bshad//dper na dug gi rigs shes pas//dug gis
359b1(rgyud): mi tshugs bzhin du snang //haM la ha la'i dug rnams kyang //bsgrubs na ra sa ya na'i sman//bdud rtsi'i 'gyur la tshe ring 'grub//nyon mongs rang dang spyi bstan pa//mtshan nyid ma nor rtogs
359b2(rgyud): pas na//rnam par byang ba'i lam du 'gyur//sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub kyang //pang na med de de yin te//nang gi chen po lnga nyid kyang //rang dang spyi yi don brtags na//mtshan//
359b3(rgyud): nyid med pas rnam par dag/so so'i rtsal rnams 'dzin gyur pas//thabs chen du ni rnam par spro//mtshan rnams rang bzhin mi gnas pas//shes rab dbyingasu rnam par sbyor//
359b4(rgyud): gti mug ces ni brjod pa ni//ma rig ming gi rnam grangs te//gnyis med don cig yin par bshad//rang gi mtshan nyid brjod pa ni//chos dang bdag dang dngos po rnams//ngo bo nyid
359b5(rgyud): la sogs brtags pa//rtog nyid sgyu ma klung gyur te//log rtogs pa yi rgyun yin la//thams cad chos dbyings ro gcig ste//bzod pa'i chos nyid mig gcig yin//spyi
359b6(rgyud): yi mtshan nyid brjod pa ni//mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med//ma rig pa ni spang du med//rig pa yang dag bsgrub du med//thams cad dbyingasu rogacig thim//sgyu ma dngos por rtog pa
359b7(rgyud): ni//sgyu ma rtog nyid mi dmigs pa//mi dmigs de nyid sna tshogs snang //skyes po nyid na chos nyid gcig/dbyings nyid mi dmigs de bzhin nyid//de nyid chos sku phyag rgya che//mi
360a1(rgyud): dmigs sgyu mar dngos po la//rtog pa'i yul gyi dngos nyid kyang //chos nyid mi dmigs yenas dag/sgyu ma mi dmigs dbyer med phyir//yod na
360a2(rgyud): gnyi ga dbyer med pas//ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang sgyur nas//thugs kyi phyag rgya chen po yin//chos nyid dmigasu med pa ste//mi dmigs bzhin du sgyu mar spros//'dul bya'i
360a3(rgyud): bya ba bsgom mi khyab//gsung gi phyag rgya chen po'o//de ltar gti mug spang du med//rnam par snang mdzad rgya chen yin//zhe sdang rang dang spyir bstan pa//kun nas mnar sems
360a4(rgyud): rtog pa yi//sgyu ma'i dngos po thams cad kun//'jig par mos pa'i rang bzhin can//spyi yi mtshan nyid brjod pa ni//mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med//zhe sdang snying rje spangs
360a5(rgyud): bsgrub med//chos kyi dbyingasu ro gcig phyir//rgyu ma rang bzhin mnar sems pa//dngos po thams cad 'jig rtogs na//sgyu mar snang ba thams cad kyang //chos kyi dbyings la
360a6(rgyud): mi gzhan ste//mi dmigs pa nyid sgyu mar skyes//chos rnam thams cad rang bzhin ni//bdag srog gso ba'i rang bzhin med//snang ba thams cad chos kyi dbyings//mnar sems sgyu mi
360a7(rgyud): chos nyid do//thams cad mi dmi gos de bzhin yin//kun kyang dbyer med chos phyag rgya//me dmigs sgyu ma kun nas mnar//rtog pa kun nas mnar sems te//chos nyid sgyum/
360b1(rgyud): mi dmigs te//chos nyid sgyu ma ma dmigs byung//don du mthun dz+nye rogacigA ste//ting 'dzin gyimadabang bsgyur na//thugs kyi byud rgyu chen po yin//ma da migs kun nas man+tar
360b2(rgyud): pa//'dul ba'i bya ba bsam mi khyab//gsung gi phyag rgya chen po'o//zhe sdang spyi yi mtshan nyid ni//yang dag nyid kyis rab brtags na//rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid de//gnyis med//
360b3(rgyud): zhe sdang sprang du med//nga rgyal mtshan nyid bshad pa ni//khong nas 'gying zhing khongs sems pa//pha rol zil gyis gnon par byed//spyi yi mtshan nyid bshad pa ni//mi rtag sdug
360b4(rgyud): bsngal stong bdag med//nga rgyal spangs nas zhi bsgrub med//chos kyi dbyingasu ro gcig pas//kun rdzob sgyu mar khong 'gying zhing //de bzhin nyid las mi gzhan te//chos nyid mi
360b5(rgyud): dmigs 'gying par skyes//skye 'gying nyid na chos nyid do//'gying ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs dag/'agling dang mi 'gying dbyer med phyir//chos sku phyag rgya chen po yin//mI dani/
360b6(rgyud): pa nyid sgyu ma 'gying //'byung bso zil gyis gnon pa nyid//chos kyi dbyings las mi gzhan te//sgyu mchos nyid dbyer med phyir//don dam kun rdzob gnyi ga gcig/ting 'dzin gyis
360b7(rgyud): dbang sbyor na//thugs kyi phyag rgya chen po yin//mi dmigs sgyu mar 'gying nga ni//nga rgyal 'dul bangs ma mi khyab/gsuM ni phyag rgya chen po yin//nga rgyal rang spyi'i mtshan
361a1(rgyud): nyid ni//rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid yin//zhi bsgrub nga rgyal spang du med//'dod chags rang spyi'i mtshan nyid ni//sreg pa kun la zhen pa ste//sgyu ma
361a2(rgyud): mtshan nyid bshad pa ni//mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med//chags spangs ma tshogs bsgrub du med//chos kyi dbying su ro gcig phyir//kun rdzob sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du//'dod//
361a3(rgyud): cing chags pa sgyu ma sred//mi dmigs pa las mi gzhan phyir//mi dmigs de nyid sgyu mar skyes//chos rnams bdag las mi gzhan phyir//mi dmigs de nyid sgyu mar skyes//
361a4(rgyud): spyod pa sgyu ma ro gcig phyir//chos nyid chos can dmigasu med//rgyal ba kun dang dbyer med pa'i//chos kyi sku yi phyag rgya yin//mi dmigs sgyu mar 'dod cing tshogs//'dod
361a5(rgyud): chags chos nyid mi dmigs te//sgyu ma mi dmigs dbyer med phyir//bden pa gnyi gar dbyer med gcig/ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur na//thugs kyi phyag rgya chen po
361a6(rgyud): yin//mi dmigs dbyings nyid 'dod tshogs spros pa ni//'dul ba bsam gyis mi khyab ste//gsung gi phyag rgya chen po yin//'dod chags rang dang spyi yi mtshan//rnam par byang ba'i
361a7(rgyud): mtshan nyid yin//chags dang ma chags gnyis med pas//'dod chags mtshan nyid spang du med//phrag dog kun gyi mtshan nyid ni//gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa la//sems/
361b1(rgyud): don rtog pa sgyu ma gzhan//thabs kyis sbyor ba sgyu ma'i rang bzhin can//phrag dag spyi mtshan bshad pa ni//mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med//phrag dog spang zhing yang bsgrub med//chos
361b2(rgyud): nyid du nir gcig phyir//kun rdzob sgyu ma gzhon gyi thun sum la//phyug dag ga pa sgyu ma'i rang bzhin nyid//mi migs pa las mi bzhin//mi dmigs pa nyid sgyu mar skyes//thun
361b3(rgyud): sum tshogs pa'i ltog par sbyor ba yi//thabs kyi rtogs pa sgyu mo'i chos nyid de//dus gsum rgyal kun dbyer med pas//chos sku phyag rgya chen po yin//mi dmigs sgyu ma
361b4(rgyud): gzhan gyis phun sum la//phrog dog rtog par 'dzin pa dang //rtog dang phrag dog mi dmigs te//sgyum+bi dmigs dbyer med pa'i//badren pa gnyi gar ro gcig pas//ting 'dzin gyi
361b5(rgyud): dbang sgyur na//thugs kyi phyag rgya chen po yin//mi dmigs gzhan gyi phun sum la//phrag dog rnam par spros nas ni//gdul ba'i bya ba bsam mi khyab//gsung gi phyag rgya chen
361b6(rgyud): po yin//phrag dog rang dang spyi brtan pa//rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid yin//dog pa spang zhing yang bsgrub med//sems can rnam pa mang po kun//nang gi chen po lnga sogs bston//
361b7(rgyud): rang spyi'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya//thabs dang shes rab ma rtogs pas//ma grol khams gsum 'khor ba yin//de ltar nges par ci mthong na//sngags kyis yongasu zin po'i na/
362a1(rgyud): kun la gnod par byed mi nus//de bzhin thabs dang shes rab rtogs//dug gsum sdug bsngal gnod mi 'gyur//thabs la mkhas pas ma zin na/
362a2(rgyud): gyi dge spyang stegs bcas kyang //mtho ris lha dang mi ru skyes//skye shi med pa'i sa mi thog//thabs mkhas snying rjes zin pa ni//mtshams med sems can ma lus kun//byang/
362a3(rgyud): chub sems dpa'i snying rjes bsad//bsod nams dpag tu med pa thobo//ma bsad na yang sems can yal bor te//snying rje med de sdig yod 'gyur//'dod chags zhe sdang gti
362a4(rgyud): mug dang //nga rgyal phrag dog chen po dag/gang phyir byang chub sems de ni//rdo rje de bzhin gshegs par gsal//nyon mongs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs//ngo bo yin par
362a5(rgyud): gsal por gsungs//chos kun rang bzhin dag po'i phyir//'khor ba yongasu dag par 'gyur//thabs dang shes rab ldan pa la//nyon mongs thams cad byang chub rgyu//'khro
362a6(rgyud): ba'i rang bzhin bdag med pas//de phyir de bzhin gshegs bsam yas//thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur pas//phyin ci log nyid byang chub lam//'khor ba'i rang bzhin mi
362a7(rgyud): dmigs phyir//mya ngan 'das pa yod ma yin//gsang sngags bla na med pa yi//thabs kyis ji ltar zin bzhin 'grub//bsam gyis mi khyab nges pa med//don dam cir
362b1(rgyud): yang mag+hu //sna ma'i sprul pa bsam mo khyo//thabs chen dgags zin pan//nyon mongs lam yang rnam par zlog//thabs chen dag gis mthonan//dge ba stsa kyang gropa ma Sh+Ta
362b2(rgyud): rlu 'byor don ma ldan pa smos//nyon mos 'tshos da //rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba yin//'a'ung ba dang ni mya ngan sa//gtig da pa ma yin nos//ma
362b3(rgyud): gas pasan//dz+nyAn m+b+ha n+tu sa ma la//nam ma skyon rgya gi rnams pa//thabs la mangs sa zin gyur mang//rnal la thar par mi 'gyur na//byang chub
362b4(rgyud): rnams rdzus//sprul ba'i bang gis bye byed pan//rdzun dang mang tshong ston pa'i /byang chub sems 'i ltung tshul bzung /dkyil med pyas mi rlung ni//sdug so mchog shis
362b5(rgyud): rab ba yis//skye bzhin gyis b+ha ba b+h+yo//bdud n+ti dang du rdzus par gsu ma//mnyam dang mi mnyam ra med ni//skrag dung rdo rje dbang zlo 'gyur//byu d+hAs de phyi
362b6(rgyud): sus/sa nyim bya ma n+tag na/khyim nga sa nga lda 'gyur yang//hU~M che thAg rdzun dade//jisrid ma bar du 'du ba skyed byed ni//dong/
362b7(rgyud): la pa mas bsha//chos rnangs pams cid pa sri ga ma// mdzin gas na// sa pa zhini ga pa dang / sa sa srigs
363a1(rgyud): rgyu yi mtshan nyid rnam par dag/phyi rol chen po lnga rnams te//sems nyid gzung 'dzin gnyis snang ba//gzung ba'i yul nyid 'byung ba che//rgyud nyid
363a2(rgyud): rang gi sems yin pas//'byung ba chen po rgyu las dag/'bras bu yongasu dag pa ni//sems can kun gyi rus pa ste//rdo rje byang chub sems yin te//sha nI pad+ma rag ti yin//dri
363a3(rgyud): chen dri chu gur gum chu//so so'i lus la gnas pas dag/don dam dmigs med pus ni//phyi nang chos rnams thams cad kyang //gang gi ngo bo ma yin te//skye 'gag
363a4(rgyud): med pas yi nas dag/kun rdzob ye nas dag pa ni//sgyu mo'i rang bzhini thams cad snang //chu zla'i tshul du mi dmigs gnas//mi dmigs pa nyid sna tshogs snang //de bzhin
363a5(rgyud): gshegs par ye nas mnyam//de bas gtsang sme med par spyod//sems can rtog pa bzlog phyir sman//gtso ru dang du blang bar bya//de bas sems can phyin ci log/chos
363a6(rgyud): rnams thams cad dag par ma shes te//thabs dang shes rab don ma rtogs//khwa cig gis ni 'tsho bya'i bar du zos//kha cig gis ni drang srong ji bzhin du//sha spangs rtswa dang chu
363a7(rgyud): la zos//zos kyang ma grub don ma rtogs//rnal 'byor thabs ldan rnams kyis ni//rang bzhin yongs kyis dag pa'i phyir//mnyam po'i dbyings kyis rab rtogs pas//thabs
363b1(rgyud): dang shes rab 'brel ba yi//the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur//dngos dang dngos med rtogs pa mtshan//gtsang dang mi gcang rtags pa mtshan ma nyid kyang rnam spangs te//mkhyen pas dal//
363b2(rgyud): la gnas mi 'gyur//bsgrub pa'i rdzasu yang dag gsungs//byang chub sems dang sha chen dang //dri chen dri chu rag ta dag/sgrub pa pos ni nan tan bya//dngos grub ya mtshon chen po 'grus
363b3(rgyud): che la dbang dang reg pa 'dzin//mkha' la 'phyo dang thogs mod 'grub//mthar ni skye med rdo rje yis//gzhan yang ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin//'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med//gsang
363b4(rgyud): ba'i snying po'i don nyid kyis//yi dam mi spang rtag bsgom zhing //ya nas lha yi mtshan nyid ni//dus gsum gshegs pa thams cad kyi//lte spangs dge spyad don med 'gyur//
363b5(rgyud): lha ni mi spang don nyid ni//lhuni grub ye shes thams cad kyi//bdag dang gnyis med so so ma yin pa'i//dus gsum bde gshegs dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi//sku gsung thugs
363b6(rgyud): kyi rdo rje bdag po ste//yongasu rdzogs par bsgom pa'i don//dkon mchog gsum spangs tshangs par spyad pa'i don med 'gyur//bdag nyid lha dang mnyam sbyor na//yon tan chung yang /
363b7(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur//ye nas mnyam nyid sbyor na su//lha nyid du ni rtag tu bsgom//bde gshegs kun dang mnyam par 'gyur//sku gsung ye shes lnga rdzogs grub//rdo rje slob dang /
364a1(rgyud): smad mi bya//byang chub ston pa 'dren pa po//long ba dmigs bu 'dren dang 'dra//nyon mongs sdug bsngal mtsho skems yin//slob dpon de la smod
364a2(rgyud): dper na mun khung sgron bsad nas//mthong ba'i don ni mi rtogs bzhin//sdug bsngal nyam thag yun ring su//bskal pa mang por myong bar mngon//de bas de la gus pa rtag tu gyis//
364a3(rgyud): lus la dbang ba'i rgyal po bas//shin tu gtso bor blang bar bya//dran chags bskyed pa'i pha ma bas//shin tu lhag pa'i ri mo bya//rdo rje mched dang lcam dral ni//bla med byang
364a4(rgyud): chub zhing 'gro ba'i//chos nyid dam tshig smon lam mthus//byang chub rin chen sar nges pas//de la ldog cing 'khu ba ni//rang la rang gis mtshon btab na//rang srog
364a5(rgyud): tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar//rang gis srog gcod phung bar 'gyur//tshe 'di mi bde sna tshogs pa//mi bde bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur//'jig rten pha rol dag tu yang //ngan
364a6(rgyud): srong gsum dang mi khom pa'i//sdug bsngal kha brgyud myong bar 'gyur//yun rings rtag tu mi thar pa'i//shin tu nyam thag myong bar 'gyur//grub pa gcig bzhin lhan
364a7(rgyud): cig spyod//gnyis med dang bas rjes spyod spun//bde gshegs dkyil 'khor bla med yin//shes rab gsal bas rtag tu gdungs zhes gsungs//gsang ba gzhan
364b1(rgyud): sgrags na//skyugs thugs du mats+tshag rnams//nal b+h+yor mnyam pon pa gnyis kyis//'dus dang shos bya 'grob rtogs nas//mnyam pa'i spyod bas pa dang/
364b2(rgyud): dang mi 'dri yang dag rtogs//mi rtogs pa yi phyogs rnams da //skye ba kun la rab tu ku //gsang ba'i brje dag sna tshogs gdu sa//thabs lha mkhas pas byas pa yin/
364b3(rgyud): gzhig sa na / 'bru na la bsgrags 'gyur // na ga na sa//na nga ga par da//bzhan yang rdzog
364b4(rgyud): gyur pa bzhin//chos ngan bzang po mo dang 'dra//bskul pa chung zhing shes rab dmun//b+hUM na rgyu 'bras rmongs pa rnams//mnyam pa nyid la skur 'dribs pas//ngan song gsu
364b5(rgyud): langs par 'gyur//sa den martogs sreg bcwol myong gyi //gsang na ma par byed pa song //skye byed kyil zhing dz+nyAn //drug jal chen gyi byung ba gagyur//de
364b6(rgyud): ra phyir gas//rlung byags tsam du brjod ma bya//sngags da byug rgya rgyun mi gcad //sngags zhes rab tu bsgrags pa ni//dan de mgun rdzob dbye med pa'i//mnyam
365a1(rgyud): de'i dkyil 'khor chen po ru//sku gsung thugs kyi yi ge oM//de la sogs pa bzhi bcu gnyis//phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid ni//phyogs bcu dus dran
365a2(rgyud): gshegs pa yi//sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lnga//bdag dang dbyer med phyag rgya che//gsal la brtson pa'i yon tan ldan//yid bzhin ma chags dbang bskur te//gom+ba shi/
365a3(rgyud): brtan par bya ba yin//de bas bar chad brtson med na//dper na sa bon tshig po las//'bras bu 'dod pa dang 'dra ste//bsgrub pa 'bras bu med par 'gyur//mi khom 'khor
365a4(rgyud): byar gnas 'gyur te//rnal 'byor chen po la zhugs pas//phyi nang chos rnams thams cad la//dmigs med gcig dang du mir bral//mtha' dbus gang yang mya yin pa'i//
365a5(rgyud): ngo bo nyid med mtshan nyid med//mnyam pa'i phyag rgya chen po yis//phyogs bcu dus bzhi thams cad dang //'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i//yon tan skyon rnams skye
365a6(rgyud): 'gag med//gang gi ngo bor ma grub mnyam//kun rdzob chos rnams skye 'gag med//mi dmigs gang gi ngo bo min//chu zla'i tshul du sna tshogs par//snang zhing bya ba byed
365a7(rgyud): nus pa'i//phyag rgya chen po'i phyogs bcu dang //dus gsum khamaso gsum thams cad dang //'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das//yon tan skyon rnams thams cad dang //
365b1(rgyud): sgyu mar mnyam par ye nas gnas//sngags 'chang rgyal po'i rtogs byas nas//bdag nyid chos nyid skye 'gag med//dang las ma g.yos par gnas na//phyag rgya chen po zad kyang //
365b2(rgyud): rdzogs par phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs//thams cad dbyer med ye mnyam la//ma 'dres brgya yongs ma chad pa'o//gozhal yas khong dang
365b3(rgyud): nyi zla yi//dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun grub ni//sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan bsam mi khyab//mnyam pa'i dbyings chen rdzogs par bsgom//de ltar dam tshig 'di gsum ste/
365b4(rgyud): de la gnas na 'grub par 'gyur//yan lag ma nyams sngags bzlas shing //'dod pa kun la longs spyod bya//lus dang ngag sems brtan 'gyur na//byang chub rab 'byams thob
365b5(rgyud): par 'gyur//dum tshig chen po las 'das nas//nyen+da ni shin tu che bar gsungs//sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //sngags kyi spyod pa don grub bo//rmongs pa so gal te
365b6(rgyud): 'dus byas na//de yi srog kyang der zad 'gyur//dam tshig bsrungs dang sngags bzlas dang //phyog d+ha rkyen mi gcad pa bzhi//brtson 'grus che zhing brten pas gzung //rnal 'byor
365b7(rgyud): brtson 'grus chung gyur ni//mi 'grub nyen yang che bar gsungs//ji ltar rel bri so la nan tan du//skyes bus myur du ma bzung na//lag pa nges par tshod par 'gyur//de bzhin
366a1(rgyud): nan tan med pa'i gsang sngags la//'chi'am yang na 'bras bu med par 'gyur//rnal 'byor dam pa rnams kyis ni//sngags kyi yan lag ma nyams
366a2(rgyud): gsal//don dam ma nyams dag byas shing //brtson 'grus cher skyed myur bar 'grub//sngags bsgom ma nyams phyag rgya gsal//cho ga yo byad gtsor ma gsungs//tshogs na
366a3(rgyud): yang na nyes pa med//mchogaso na yang nyes pa med//mchogason yang 'grub par 'gyur//bdag nyid rang gis lhor sbyor bas//dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur cho ga
366a4(rgyud): lhag gam ma tshang na'ang //'grub par 'gyur te nyes skyon med//ces gsang ba'i tshig tu'o//dam tshig sum brgya pa rtsa bo bco lnga mdo bshad pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa brgyad pa'o///
366a5(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de gyes pa chen pos bzhugs gnas dang /spyod lam dang /lta stangs bstan pa/theg pa chen po'i lhun grub don 'dod na//rgyal chen zab yangs
366a6(rgyud): shes rab myur//zab pa'i don rtogs mi ldog bde//de dang bdag med yangs pa bde//gnasu chos dbyings gnyis med bstan//thabs chen kun mdzad 'od gsal byams//thaMd
366a7(rgyud): dgyes mdzod dbyings ma gtum//che chung byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor//g.yog 'khor lho srin sde mang gtso//bdag gi mtshan gzur shin tu spug/chos dbyings mkha' dkyi
366b1(rgyud): ba la//shes rab myur du mngon 'gro ba//'gro med 'od med mo gnas pa//byang chub sems mchog a re bde//shes rab zad med dkyil 'khor lo//thugs rje rol pa'i ye shes 'phyo//
366b2(rgyud): gnyis med dbyings sbyor a re bde//ma rig 'khrul pa'i 'dam dbyingasu//ye shes sgron me'i mnga' 'phangs nas//ti mug mun pa rnam bsal te//rang bzhin 'od gsal ba
366b3(rgyud): ba'i mchog/dge dang mi dge gnyi su med//rnam rtog mtshan ma yongs mi 'dzin//rang bzhin ye nas 'od gsal ba'i//dge sdig med pas shin tu bde//bde dang ma bde gnyis med pa
366b4(rgyud): ye shos chags med rnam par dag/thams cad dbyer med ye shes yin//sems nyid dang bas a re bde//rgyan du dkyil 'khor thams cad mdzes//ye shes rgyu las grub pa yi
366b5(rgyud): phyi nang sgrib med gsal ba'i dang //ye shes blo brtan shin tu bde//longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad la//gtsang dang smra bo'i blo mi 'dzin//thams cad chos nyid ro gcig pas//gaunyis
366b6(rgyud): mang bas ni shin tu bde//shes rab chung tshun ting 'dzin gyis//thams cad mo nor gzhung lugs bzhin//'khro ba mi spangs sdug bsngal med//gnyis med tshim pas a re bad//thaMd
366b7(rgyud): ma lus gcig pa'i dang /lha dang lta ba gnyis ka med//ye shes sgron ma bsgreng bar ni//phyo gros bcu'i zhing khams thams cad mthong //'di dang pha rol gnyis med phyir//'gro dang
367a1(rgyud): 'gro bar bya ba min//sman lag sgrubs chen ma mchongs par//phyogs bcu snong khams thams cad na//klub mchog ston pa'i spyod yul no//ji ltar dmigs/
367a2(rgyud): babazhin du 'grub//chos rnams thams cad dmig su med//chos nyid sgyu ma cir yang 'grub//zug med zab pas don brtags na//dag par ma gyur gang yang med//ye shes
367a3(rgyud): ma bcas kun tu gsal//rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i//ye nas de ltar gnas mod kyang //ma rig rmongs pa'i ling tog gis//gsal ba'i sgrol ma bsgribs gyur te//khams
367a4(rgyud): gsum mun nig rgyun tu 'khor//rnam rtog mtshan mar 'dzin pa yis//lus dang longs spyod gnas dang ni//bde dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs myed//de la su zhig byed pa yod//
367a5(rgyud): yang dag ma chen smras ma byas//ring la rang gis bcings par zad//thams cad ma lus tshi su cog/snying po yod pa ma yin te//sgyu ma mig yor sprul pa dang //sdig
367a6(rgyud): 'ja'i mtshan chu blo'i tshul//de ltar gang gi slar rab rtogs pa//de nyid sangs rgyas yin par bshad//sangs rgyas sa la gnas pa yin//skye med phun sum tshogs yin te//
367a7(rgyud): byed med pa yi mchog kyang rdzogs//zhes nyid la nyid brjod do//sgyu 'phrul dri ba las bzhugs gnas khang pa bstan pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa dgu pa'o//
367b1(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gra shogs pa thams cad kyis mi 'tsho ba'i rdo rje bsgrub pa 'di gsungaso//rdo rje zhong tshon bsgrub 'dod pas//thams cad skyo shi med pa'i tshul//mnyam nyid dag pa nyi du ba ma/
367b2(rgyud): khro bo bdud rtsi'i khyil ba yis//dzaHhUM baM hos dgug par bya//bdag dang khro bo gnyis med per//yang nis yang du bsgrub par bya//sku rnams gsal bar gyur pa dang //zhing chen 'og tu
367b3(rgyud): gzugs par bya//dkyil 'khor ma lus der bkod nas//khro bo khro mo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom//mngag pa'i pho nyi phyogs bcur gtang //thams cad ma lus dbang du sdud//bsku
367b4(rgyud): ba ga cig gam yang na gnyis//gsum dang lnga ru bsgom par bya//pho nya mang pos ni bkug nas//zhing la yang nas yang du gzhug/snar dang ser dang mdog snum 'byung //de ni
367b5(rgyud): bdud rtsi'i ting 'dzin gyis//lan grangs 'bum phyag mang po rin//bzlas pa'i tshul yang rnam gsum dag/rdo rje sngags bzlas rtse mo gsum//de yi bar nas bzlas pa 'byung /
367b6(rgyud): 'od zer lnga dang ldan par bya//zhing da ldem ldem por gyur pa dang //bdud rtsi lnga yis bskul bar bya//de nas yi ge 'bru lnga dgod//gsal zhing 'tsher bar bsgom par bya//dbang po
367b7(rgyud): lnga dang dbang po'i tshul//yan lag lnga la rigs lnga'i tshul//rdo rje ting 'dzin de yis bsgom//de nas zhing de 'gul 'gyur nas//zhing de drag tu 'gul ba dang //shin tu zhags pa
368a1(rgyud): sam sbyar bya//yan 'gu rnams kyang gzhum par d+ha//phyogs pad+mo dag tu thod pa bstan//tA ya grI bI'i skur bsgoms shong //sngags ni 'bum phrog/
368a2(rgyud): mang du bzlas//phyogs bcur spro zhing zhing la bstim//de nas zhing de drag 'gul nas//rdo rje ting 'dzin de yis ni//brtan pa nyid du bsgom par bya//de nas par par byed pa dang /
368a3(rgyud): a nI dr-i du gang yin pa//rdo rje drag tu brdeg cing dpag//thod pa'i kha nas ni phyung nas//rdo rje ting 'dzin so yis bcad//rdo rje sngags zos khong du bstim//gnyi su med par/
368a4(rgyud): bsgom par bya//de nas zhing de langs pa dang //rdo rje dbyings nas dbang yang bskur//bdud rtsi chu yang blud par bya//las rnams thams cad byed du gzhug/zhing des rab tu
368a5(rgyud): smras pa'i tshig/dpa' bo ci bgyi mi rgas skye med chos rnams dang //las rnams ma lus kun bgyi //de ltar bsgrub pa'i rigs mchog gyis//thal ba thams cad sos
368a6(rgyud): par 'gyur//bsgrub pa'i sa ni dur khrod dang //ri brag gnyen po bgegs gnas dang //nags khrod stong pa tsher ma tsa na//ri bos bskor ba'i lcug ma can//rab tu rnam par
368a7(rgyud): dben pa dang //gnod sbyin srin po 'byung ba'i gnas//de dag tu ni bsgrub par bya//dgu dang bcu gnyis bcu gsum dang //bcu drug man chad bsgrub par bya//the tshom med par
368b1(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur//phyi nang 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnams//lam lnga'i zhing dang sman lngar bcas//'bru rnams thams cad bcang bar bya//rtag tu tshogs tshan mchod par bya//gsum dang
368b2(rgyud): lha chu bar mi bcod//kha zas rnams kyang thod par bza'//btung ba dag kyang de bzhin te//mar mi rtag par gtang bar bya//rgyu ni ni yi mar las bya//yan lag bslu ba yang de bzhin
368b3(rgyud): to//sdong bu pad+ma'i rgyu las bya//gnod ni dung chen srubs med pa//lcang lo'i yod dang med kyang rung //de byi pu tra ma byung ba//mdog ni ban lang can la yod//rdo rje bsgrub pa bar gcod
368b4(rgyud): phyir//rtag tu mtshoms ni gcad par bya//nri yi rkang pa g.yas g.yon nas//sbom po ma yin phra ba nyid//de la ki la ya byas nas//phur ba'i sngags dang khro sngags kyis//
368b5(rgyud): ldan 'bum du ni bzlas pa bya//lag pa g.yas g.yon thal sor la//khro bo bcu dang khro mo bcu//'od 'bar gzungs kyi sku ru bsgom//de nas gnyis med sbyor tshul du//sgrub po
368b6(rgyud): rdo rje bsgom par bya//bsgrub pa dngos la ma gtogs pa//phyogs bcu rnamasu mtshams kyang bcad//dngos grub ma thob bar du ni//bsgom dang bzlas dang phyog rgya gsum//bag
368b7(rgyud): yod mgo la me 'bar bzhin//bar mtshams med par bsgrub par bya//de ltar bsgrub pa'i rigs mchog gis//lha ma srin rnams bran bzhin 'khol//'jig rten dbang phyug dbang du
369a1(rgyud): sdud//rdo rje rigs mchog 'khor rkyen rnams//yid bzhin du ni 'byung bar 'gyur//rdzu 'phrul chen po 'di dag ni//lus skyed nus nas mngon du dbyung //
369a2(rgyud): de ma yin par shin tu gsang //sku'i bsgrub pa nges pa'i don du bka' stsal to//ro langs bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bdun cu pa'o///gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las
369a3(rgyud): bro bar gar rtse 'jo bro gar gyi dam tshig ces bya ba nges par ched du brjod do//phyogs bcu mtha' yas dus bzhi yi//thams cad dbyer med maN+Da la'i//nyi zla shar ba'i gzhal
369a4(rgyud): yas la//pad+ma chags med gdan gtang naso//rin chen zad mang pho brangs//che chung dpag tu med pa yi//byang chub bde ldan dkyil 'khor la//bde ldan byang chub rab bkad
369a5(rgyud): nas//ma lus kun bsdus dbyings bsdus te//lus bskyod yan lag bskul bsdigs dang //dang po lnga yi lta spyod kun//phyag rgya chen po yin par bshad//gong gi dkyil
369a6(rgyud): 'khor chad nyi zla//mi 'phrugs pa yi sa gzhi la//pad+ma ma chags gdan bting nas//thabras dang shes rab chags med tshul//yan lag dbang po thams cad kun//rang
369a7(rgyud): bzhin yongasu dag pa dang //ting 'dzin de bzhin gshegs lnga'o//ye nas ma bcings yongs kyis te//lhag pa'i ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor gyis//dbu la de bzhin gshegs
369b1(rgyud): khor//yan lag 'ani la rigs bzhi 'khor//kha dog dbyibs dang phyug rgya dang //babs dang shes rab gsal bsgoms te//phyonas bcur spu nang ngan sang spyod //gan su 'bru
369b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor smra//'das drung ma 'das thams cad thun/ shen pazhing du rnam byur sbyar//yan la rkyen gyi lnga bskyed no//gis sde kyil lakhor ma lus k+ta gi/
369b3(rgyud): byang chub lam du mdzad//snyigs ma lnga yang rnam par dag/bzang mdzes legs pa'i go pa dgas nA//'od zer sna tshags 'dra bar 'gyur//de nas mthar thug meng pa'i bar//yis
369b4(rgyud): lnga yis brgyan par 'gyur//skyes bu TI rtsal rab ldan pas//rtag tu dkyil 'khor da ltar bsgom//tshig tsam ma yini blo gting du//bdag dang dbyer med nyid dur//thabs dang shes ra
369b5(rgyud): ldan gyur nas//shar gyi phyog su khwa bstan te//seng ge'i stabs na mtshang bar bya//sngags kyi mig dz+riM bskams la//hU~M ni 'bum drag posamA yas deng//rje yang bsam gyis
369b6(rgyud): mau Sh+T+r-iH/phyogs bcu dros bzhi pasam+b+ha yis//gsung gi dkyil 'khar 'od 'azer /gsung gcig dkyil 'khor yan lag no//bsam gyis mi khyab kun tu grags//sku
369b7(rgyud): dang ming tshig so sor gsal//ljags kyi dbang po bkram nas gsungs//thar dang mthar gnyi ga brjod//nges pa kho bo na yang dag tu//de bzhin nyid kyis yang mi gsungs/
370a1(rgyud): yi dbang po'i dkyil 'khor du//drug yig 'bru gsal bsgoms nas//dkyil 'khor phyogs bcu su bzhi yI//mtha' yas dasam gyis mi khyab ste//
370a2(rgyud): tra yang bsam pas 'od 'phro 'bar//phyogs dus dkyil 'khor ma lus thos//'gro drug 'khor ba'i gnas kyang thos//sgra dang thos pa gnyis med pa'o//de bzhin dri dang ro reg
370a3(rgyud): rnams//so so'i mtshan nyid gsal bsgoms nas//yig 'bru'i snying po de bzhin dgod//sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus kun//chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis rol//
370a4(rgyud): dri la sogs pa bde mchog gis//kun la tshim par yang dag mi chog/'gro drug ma lus thams cad la//ji ltar 'tsham pa'i don yang byed//thabs mkhas thugs rjes dri
370a5(rgyud): ltar ston//de bzhin rigs dang rdo rje'i rigs//ma chags la sogs shes rab ldan//gtso bo lnga dang gtso mo lnga//thabs dang shes rab ldan bsgoms te//tshom bu gcig
370a6(rgyud): gom yang na gsum//lnga yi dkyil 'khor rab bsgoms te//thabs dang shes rab phan tshun du//lha gsal 'od 'phro bstim byas te//dkyil 'khor 'od zer 'bar bar bsgom//
370a7(rgyud): titenge 'dzin shin tu gsal gyur nas//bdag dang phyogs bcu'i dbyer med par//gnyi mu med par bsgom par bya'o//de nas thabs dang shes rab gnyis//lta spyod ya char ma
370b1(rgyud): gyur par//dkyil 'khor dag la bsal bsgoms na//dbus nas shar phyogs kha bstan nas//rkang pa'i stabs chen bskyod byas shing //lag gi 'du byed kun bskyod nas//blo dang gar gyi
370b2(rgyud): phyug rgyar bya//dkyil 'khor 'od zer dkar po dang //byang chub sems dpa' rnam pararaM dag/shin tu gsal dang 'od zor 'bur//thabs dang shes rab de grub shig/cis kyang mi tshug
370b3(rgyud): rdo rje yi//bdud bzhi dpa ni 'jom par byed//theg mchog rdo rje'i rigs 'dzin pa//thabs dang shes rab de grub shog/bdag nyid rig pa'i rdo rje yis//nyon mongs sdug bsngal med pa bzhin/
370b4(rgyud): me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis//thabs dong shes rab gsal gyir shog/nyon mongs sdug bsngal rtsad bcad nis//ma rig mun pa med par byed//thugs rje'i 'od zer nyi sher bar//
370b5(rgyud): dang shes rab 'od 'bar shog/shin tu sra zhing skye shi med//rdo rje'i thugs rje rol ston pa//'gro la thugs rje yongs kyis 'byung //thabs dang shes rab byams ldan shog/thabs
370b6(rgyud): dang shes rab ldan gyur pas//yon tan phyogasu kha bstan te//lus bskyod yan lag bskul bsigs nas//stobs chen dag kyang brdung bar bya//dkyil 'khor ma lus 'byung ba'i
370b7(rgyud): gter//zad med nor bu rin po che//ma lus kun gyi re ba skang //thabs dang shes rab de grub shog/nam pa'i dkyil gyi mdog bstan pa//yang na thams cad gser btsom//
371a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bsam yas zad mi shes//thabs dang shes rab myur grub shod//yon tan rin chen bsam yas kyang //thams cad mnyam pa'i ngang gnas
371a2(rgyud): nas//de bzhin mnyam nyid ye shes te//thabs dang shes rab mnyam gyur shog/bder gshegs yon tan rmed po che//ye nas chags med byang chub zhing //yang dag nyid du//
371a3(rgyud): thams cad gnas//thabs dang shes rab myur grub shog/thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur pas//nub phyogasu ni kha bltas nas//yan lag dang po bskyed byas te//gar rnams
371a4(rgyud): shin tu gsal byas nas//stobs chen dag kyang brdung bar bya//chos rnams ma lus kun spyod kyang //pad+ma la ni 'dam bzhino//chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas//thub
371a5(rgyud): dang shes rab de grub shog/las dang nyon mongs nub gyur pa'i//bag chags mtshan ma rdul tsam med//thabs dang shes rab myur grub shog/byang chub chags med dkyil
371a6(rgyud): 'khor ni//gang nas ma 'ongs nyid kyi dbyings//mi gnas tshul gyis dbyings na bzhugs//thabs dang shes rab myur grub shog/thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur pas//byang
371a7(rgyud): phyogasu ni kha bltas te//lus bskyod yan lag gar byed cing //phyag rgya so sor gsal gyur nas//rkang pa'i stabs chen brdung bar bya//yang dag rtogs pa'i shes rab kyi
371b1(rgyud): bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i//sgrib pa thams cad byang byas nas//thabs dang shes rab myur grub shog/sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs kyis//bdud bzhi bcom nas mi mthun
371b2(rgyud): bstsal//bya byed med la don rnams grub//thabs dang shes rabau myur grub shog/thams cad ma lus rdzogs byed pa//sna tshogs ma lus 'gyur ba'o//ljang gu'i tshul du mdog bstan pa//
371b3(rgyud): thabs dang shes rab myur grub shog/thams cad ma lus don grub pa//las rnams ma lus rdzogs par byed//nan tan chen po bya ba rdzogs pa//thabs dang shes rab myur grub
371b4(rgyud): shog/sdug bsngal dri ba tshir bcad //dkyil 'khor ma lus kun byas kyang //gang nas ma 'ongs gar mi 'gro/thabs dang shes rab myur grub shog/bde gshegs ma lus thaMd kun//
371b5(rgyud): phyogs dus kun tu bdag nyid che//mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du//ma lus kun 'dus rnam par dag/thabs chen dkyil 'khor yang dag pas//bder gshegs kun la rnam
371b6(rgyud): par 'phro//thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis//bde ba'i dkyil 'khor mkhas pas bsdu//thams cad ma lus rigs bzhi yi//nang du ma lus gang yang med//de nyid bde gshegs
371b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor nyid//thabs dang shes rab bde grub shog/rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor dbur bsdu zhing //ye shes lnga yi 'od zer 'phro//phyogs bcu gsal bar gang gyur nas//
372a1(rgyud): thabs dang shes rab 'od 'bar shog/de bzhin rigs mchog 'dzin pa yi//thams cad ma lus dbyings bsdus te//thams cad kun tu bzang por ston//
372a2(rgyud): thabs dang shes rab gtser grub shog/thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis//phyogs dus gnas pa ma lus la//chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor//thabs dang shes rab
372a3(rgyud): mchog 'grub shog/'gro ba ma lus thams cad la//ngo bzhin nyid kyi sku yod pas//ma mthong rmongs la na mkha'i mdog/thabs dang shes rab dbyings grub sheg/sku ni
372a4(rgyud): sna tshogs cir yang snang //thabs chen rnams la mnyam pa'i tshul//nyan thos rnams la dgra bcom tshul//rang rgyal rnams la bse ru'i tshul//pha rol phyin rdzogs shAkya
372a5(rgyud): tshul//lha mi rnams la dge bcu tshul//dud 'gro rnams la e na ya//gzhan yang 'gro ba thams cad la//ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du ston//de lta bu yi sku ston pa//thubs
372a6(rgyud): dang shes rab sku grub shog/thabs dang shrIs rab ldan bsgoms nas//rgyan lnga yis ni rnam par brgyan//yan lag lnga la dkyil 'khor bkod//ye shes rgyan gyis pho brang
372a7(rgyud): brdung //gnyis ming dkyil 'khor zlum po'i tshul//mtha' dbus med pa'i dkyil 'khor du//lhun grub tshogs chen byang chub tu//thabs dang shes rab myur 'grub shog/
372b1(rgyud): chos dpyongos dam pa bdag med pa//mi dmigs dbyi su ma lus 'dus//mnyam dang mi mnyam dbyer med pas//thabs dang shes rab dbyings brub shog/bde gshegs dkyil 'khor/
372b2(rgyud): dbu bskyod na//sangs rgyas zhing khams ma lus g.yo//lag gi 'du byed bskul bskyod na//rigs 'dzin zhing khams dag par byed//rkang chen dag gis stag 'chongs na//'gro
372b3(rgyud): drug gnas rnams stongs par byed//spyan gyis phyogs bcu blta byas na//bdud bzhi dpung rnams pham par byed//thabs dang shes rab ma lus kun//de lta bu yi don grub shog/zad
372b4(rgyud): me lus de bzhin te//de ni gang yang mi dmigs la//skye dang 'gags dang gnas pa dang //'od dang 'gro ba'i dngos po med//rnal 'byor bro gar rtse 'jo yis//sna tshogs byed la byas
372b5(rgyud): pa med//de nyid rnam pa sna tshogs pa//rnal 'byor las rnams grub par shog/thabs dang shes rab thams cad kyis//de lta bu yis longs spyod na//sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor
372b6(rgyud): ma lus mnyes//srid gsum 'gro rnams thams cad las//dga' ba chen pos khyab par 'gyur//lus ma spangs par rig 'dzin sa//yun rings chos kyi bod spyad nas//bla//
372b7(rgyud): med rdo rje sems dpa' yis//dpe byed mtshan gyis rnam par brgyan//mngon shos drug ldan thams cad mkhyen//tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs par rel//sangs rgyas
373a1(rgyud): la dbang sgyur te//spyod yul kun tu mardzal//ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub//rnal 'byor la su rung rnams kyis//'di lta bu yi las rnams
373a2(rgyud): bya//'bras bu mngon du ma gyur kyang //lus ngag yid la dbang thob nas//sangs rgyas 'byung dang dkar mi 'gyur//theg pa dman par yong mi byed//ngan song gsum du
373a3(rgyud): yong mi ltung //gnas ngan longs spyod mi bde ba'i//ngan pa'i sa ru yong mi ltung //rdo rje theg mchog brjed mi 'gyur//tshe ring bde ba phun sum chags//lus byad bzang
373a4(rgyud): zhing yan lag rdzogs//dbang po tshang zhing lhag chad med//skad gdangs snyan zhing 'gro don byed//bdag gi longs spyod thams cad kun//gzhan la gnod pa med par 'grub//
373a5(rgyud): chen po che yi mthu stobs ldan//'gro ba'i don du yang dag byed//gzhan la gnod pa yongs mi byed//snying rje che zhing shes rab ldan//mthu stobs che zhing thabs ldan pa/
373a6(rgyud): bdag dang gzhan de ni rdzogs par spyod //mthar ni skye shi med pa'i sa//sangs rgyas yon tan rin po che//bkod pa'i gzhal yas thams cad laM//dbang sgyur spyod pa'i dngos
373a7(rgyud): grub thob//rnal 'byor gang zhig 'di 'dra'i don//ljags kyi dbang po bkram nos ni//gsang don nges pa'i don ston pa//bla med mchog tu grub par shog/dbyer med
373b1(rgyud): byang chub thor tshugs can//shin tu bstan pa'i ri bo gnas//mu stegs rlung gis tshugs mi 'gyur//theg mchog rdo rje de lta bu//dkyil 'khor mi zad 'byung ba'i gter//yid bzhin
373b2(rgyud): nor bu rin po che//bye dor ma byas shin tu gsal//bskal pa grangs med gnas bcas kyang //sku ni shin tu gzhan ngo'o tshul//skye shi med pa rdo rje yi//thams cad 'byung ba'i gter
373b3(rgyud): yin to//sngon phun sum tshogs dang ldan//bla med byang chub 'grub 'gyur nas//ye shes rdo rje lhun grub shog/tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs gyur cig/thams cad kun gyi ston
373b4(rgyud): pra po//thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang brnyes//sangs rgyas zhing la dbang byed shog/de rtogs kun kyang rdo rje'i rigs//sku gsung thugs kyang grub par shog/rnal 'byor pa thabs
373b5(rgyud): dang shes rab ldan pa rnams kyis dus thams cad 'dod yon lnga spyod cing blo thabs bya'o//gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las bre gar rtse 'jo'i le'u ste bdun cu rtsa gcig pa'o///
373b6(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las sku'i dkyil 'khor mngon du phyung ste 'di skad ces gsungaso//de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings ldan pas//sgyu dang dran pa 'dral
373b7(rgyud): 'gyur nas//sku mchog rdo rje 'di snang bas//'thun pa'i rdo rje rang snang ngo //rgyud drug 'khor ba'i lus snang ba//rnam rtog 'thun pa'i las snong //de bzhin sku mchog dri bral dang /
374a1(rgyud): bder gshegs sku lhur mdor bsdus te//bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub gzugs//bla med gzugs dang rdo rje sku//de la sogs de skabasam
374a2(rgyud): yas//phyogs bcu dus bzhi sku ston pa//thabs kyis 'gro 'dul sku ston te//byang chub mchog gi rdo rje sku//chags med zhing du sku ston cing //dbyings las ma g.yos bzhin
374a3(rgyud): du snang //sku snang de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings//rnam dag sku ston ma yin te//log 'gro rtag pa thams cad la//so sor 'dul ba'i skur yang ston//de tshe skye shi med pa'i sku///
374a4(rgyud): las dang mtshogs pad+ma'i sku//thar dang mthar sna tshogs kyang //sna tshogs snang la gnas pa med//snang dang mi snang ginyi ga med//de ltar rtog pa'i rigs mchog ni/
374a5(rgyud): badz+ra zhes ni gdags pa yin//ji snyed sku ston bsam yas pa//thams cad ma lus rdo rje bsdus//'khor lo zhes kyang brjod pa ni//de la sogs te sku bsam yas//byang
374a6(rgyud): chub thabs kyi dkyil nas byung //sku ni sna tshogs thams cad kyang //'ja' tshen chu zla 'dra shes na//dbyings nyid las ni dbyings snang zad//thugs nyid gsung gi dkyil
374a7(rgyud): 'khor snang //gsung nyid sku yi dkyil 'khor te//dbyer med de bzhin yong gis//dkyil 'khor bzang po 'grub 'dod pas//rtag tu dus gsum thams cad du/
374b1(rgyud): bdag dang dag gi dbyer myed pas//yenas dkyil la byor yin par brtag/byin pa sa grub mchog yin par//s+yAd t+yA N+Dal rjes de skad pa shad//rgyud kyi rgyal po chen posgyu 'phrul/
374b2(rgyud): dra ba las sku'i dkyil 'khor mngon du byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u sku'i dkyil 'khor zab tu ni rgyud kyi rgyal po phyi ma las bshad de/bod la ma gyur zhes 'byung ngo //rang bzhin sgo'i dkyil
374b3(rgyud): 'khor du bsdu ba'i le'u ste bdun cu rtsa gnyis pa'o///de nas de bzhin gshegs pu rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las ting nge 'dzin gyi rim par sbyar zhing dngos gru
374b4(rgyud): myur du len pa'i thebs dra baM las 'di skad ces gsung so//dkyil 'khor bsam yas dngos grub ni//mi dmigs dbyings nas don 'byin to//ma bcos ji bzhin dang bzhag dang //lhun
374b5(rgyud): gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'byung //mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las//ti nge 'dzin gyis dbang sgyur na//ye shes sprul pa sna tshogs 'grub//spyod yul thams cad maN+Dal
374b6(rgyud): ye shes dkyil 'khor thar byed skyong //longs spyod sku dang sangs rgyas zhing //ji ltar 'dod pa smon pas 'grug/yangs shing rgya che lhun grub ni//phyi nang snod bcud ye nas dag/dag rtog/
374b7(rgyud): nyid kyang dbyings nyid yin//de nas rdo rje mnyam yin ni//dngos grub myur du 'grub 'dod na//shin tu bri zhing zab par bsgom//bdag dang bdag gi gzhan rnams na//shin tu
375a1(rgyud): mi dmigs dbyingasu bsgom//tang 'dzin nga ni goms pa dang //thams cad sgyu ma mig yor dang //sprul pa'i tshul du shes par bya//de bzhin yang
375a2(rgyud): nas yang goms nas//de nas phra mo'i ting 'dzin bsgom//phyi nang snod bcud hUM du bsdu//gang bsgrubs yi ge so so ste//spyir na gang bsgom kun tu 'dra//rdo rje sems dpa'
375a3(rgyud): nyid du 'du//yan lag lnga dang rnam shis nyid//yi ge hUM du shin tu bsdu//nr-i yi mig gis bltar yod par//yang nas yang du 'dres pa dang //'od zer mang po 'phro bar bya/
375a4(rgyud): phyogs bcu dus bzhi gang ba dang //slar yang hUM la bstim par bya//hUM nyid mi dmigs dbyingasu thim//thim 'gyur dbyings nas a kar 'bar//shin tu 'tsheng bar gsal/
375a5(rgyud): bsgoms la//thams cad a ru gyur par bsgom//de bzhin nyid du 'dris 'gyur nas//oM las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor spro//e ma gsal bar 'byor 'gyur nas//nyi zla gang
375a6(rgyud): ba'i nyi zlar bsgom//hri gsal pad+ma chags med bsgom//rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas bsgom//nyi zla gdan dang gzhal yas khang //thams cad sdu zhing phra bar bsgom/
375a7(rgyud): de bzhin yi ge hUM gnas pas//mthing ka 'tsher la gnas pa yi//'od zer 'phro ba rnam par bsgom//'od 'phro dbyingasu slar bsdus nas//shin tu rdo rje 'od zer 'phro bar
375b1(rgyud): bsgom//rdo rje 'ad 'phro gsal 'bar nas//dbyingasu yang ni bstim par bya//de nyid sems dpa'i skur gyur nas//shin tu phra zhing 'dus par bsgom//de bzhin gnyis med gsal
375b2(rgyud): 'gyur nas//sku gcig rdo rje dril bur bsgom//de bzhin nyid du gyur pa dang //dbu gsum phyag drug nyid du bsgom//gzhan yang khro 'dul sna tshogs bsgom//blo yi shes rab
375b3(rgyud): rgyu chung las//rim pa bzhin du bsgom par bya//yang na gcig tshor bskum pAr bya//nyi zla gza skor dus gau d+h+r-ig tu//chung kyil dang skye par gsal ba bzhin//de ltar goms rtogs
375b4(rgyud): rigs mchog des//ji ltar dbang bsgyur bzhin du 'grub//mkha' la 'phyo dang rigs 'dzin gnas//chu rgyun bzlog dang rlung mi 'gul//ri blag la sogs thogs med 'dzul//chu la mi
375b5(rgyud): 'bying mes mi tshig/dug dang mtshon gyis 'jig mi 'gyur//mi snang ba dang mang por sprul//gzhan yang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin//lha srin rnams la dbang sgyur zhing //tshe dang dus
375b6(rgyud): la bsring bstud dang //stong gsum yungs 'brur bskyed pa dang //ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub//sbrul dang gcan zan gdug pa rnams//khyi bzhin phyi bzhin 'brang bar
375b7(rgyud): 'gyur//bdud dang gdug pa la sogs pas//tshugs par mi 'gyur bran bzhin 'gyur//lus ma spangs par rigs 'dzin sa//ye shes bsod nams longs spyod kyis//
376a1(rgyud): yo go 'khor lo tshogs mchog brnyes//thugs rje sprul pa'i byin brlangs kyis//so sor thar pa'i lam yang skyon//'gro ba ma lus don yang byed//lA
376a2(rgyud): rnams thams cad kun byas nas//skye 'chi med pa'i g.yung drung thog/mtshan dang dpe byad kun gyis brgyan//bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen ldan//mthar phyin byab
376a3(rgyud): med pa 'grub//bsgrub mod spangs med chos kyi dbyings//'gro med 'ong med de bzhin nyid//de ltar bsgrubs te bsgoms byas na//'bras bu mngon du ma gyur kyang //
376a4(rgyud): skye ba thams cad du//las ngan kun tu skye mi 'gyur//thig pa dman par yong mi 'gyur//rdo rje rigs mchog 'dzin par 'gyur//zhes rdo rje gsang po'i tshig tu'o//rgyud
376a5(rgyud): kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las shin tu gsang bar bya ba rgyud dngos grub thob par bya ba'i le'u ste bdun cu rtsa gsum pa'o///de nas de bzhin gshegs
376a6(rgyud): pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las ho ma rnams 'phrin las 'di gsung so//dang por de bzhin nyid du gsal zhing 'dres par bsgom//de nas bdag gi stong kha ra a gsal
376a7(rgyud): shing 'tsher ba gtsog bsgom mo//a de shin tu gsal bar gyur pa dang phyogs bcur 'od du 'phros par bsgom//'od de slar a la bsdu zhing bstim//ma dang a la nyi ma/
376b1(rgyud): dang zlag la ma na/'tshar la gsal byung ba s+ho//dz+ha las pa rtsol 'amamags lta bar banam/rgyu shin tu 'ad 'bar 'asgom//sbyong gi dkyil la khor du rdo rje sems
376b2(rgyud): dpa'i mtshon gang ba gcig phyag rgya dang bcas par bsgom//yin bcu rtsa gnyis kyi sngags dang //yig 'bru dang /phyag rgya yang gsal bar bzlas//'bru gsum dang 'bru lnga yang
376b3(rgyud): pazlas/'jug 'bru bzhis mtshams gcad//rtag tu hom bya/tshogs dang mchod pa yang bya//mang po mi nus po'i don du hom gang bgyi yang rlung //dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi
376b4(rgyud): gtso bor sbyin rdo rje sems dpa' drag po yang dza/dbyung bad+d+ha ts+tsha//rgyas pa rang na te ru ka/zho ba byad d+hA d+he ru ka/spyan drang bi ne e h+ye tI mad+na kA ru Nika nas tom gang byed pa'i sgra
376b5(rgyud): bo nas spyan dang /mchod pa dang arka bul ba ni drag po'i mgor ni sngags ril tu/zhi ba la mgor rol oM/bar mo rnams lnga yang de bzhin sbyar//spyan drang ba ni gang mdzad pa
376b6(rgyud): gtso bo nas zhi la shan ting bstan//spyi la so so rang sngags rdzogs//drag pa ste/dbang nub/rgyas pa byang /zhi ba sher/spyi gang yang rung glu gsum dang thad pa kha gdangs//zla
376b7(rgyud): dang /pad+ma dang /chags med de//phyag rgya rnam pa bdun la phyag rgya chen po dang /chos nyid kyi phyag rgyo dang /dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /lis kyi phyag rgya dang //thabs dang shes
377a1(rgyud): sa rgya dang/ T+wA~M b+hU m+b+ha du/rdzun gyi spyan rgyal/rdzu nag sgyus du lku cos man su du
377a2(rgyud): 'dun nu rtswa bzhi pa'o///de nas de bzhin gro shogs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phru lo dra bi las rmad du byung ba'i dam tshig bco lnga mdo 'di ltar yang bA shwad de/
377a3(rgyud): mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis//thams cad mnyam pa'i drung nyid du//dbyisu ro gcig de bsdus te//don du me'i gyur yong ma gsungs//yon tan mchog gi 'dod pa ni//sna
377a4(rgyud): srong ma lus thams cad kun//mnyam pa'i zhing du sbyor bas ni//tshogs pa med pa'i tshul du spyod//'do ni rnam dag legs pa'i lam//byang chub mchog tu 'gro ba'i gan
377a5(rgyud): bde chen mi zad gter du 'gyur//cis kyang mi tshugs rdo rje'i sku//nyon mongs sdug bsngal 'dod chags ni//lus drang zas kyis bsgribs 'gyur te//yi dgas gnas nas gan su 'gro/
377a6(rgyud): skom dang bkres pas nyon mongs 'gyur//rnag khrag ngan skyugs rtag tu mthong //bde ba spyod pa'i dbang yang med//rtsub cing gdug pas bsrung bar 'gyur//thugs rje chen po'i zhe sdang na
377a7(rgyud): 'khor ba'i mya ngan sgo bcad cing //bde gshegs lam du 'dzud par byed//yang dag don dang ldan par 'gyur//thugs rjes tshul gyis khro ston zhing //shin tu mnyam po'i ngang du
377b1(rgyud): 'jug/rdo rje sems dpa'o zhi ba yis//yang dag mchog gi bde ba 'grub//ye shes gsal ba'i bded ni//bdag dang bdag gi dbyer med do//rang bzhin meng pa'i dbyung su rol//
377b2(rgyud): brjod du med pa'i ngang //kun dutu khyab pa'i sku mnga' ba/shin tu 'od gsol rnam dag lam//byang chub sems dpa'i sgrib pa sbyong //sems can nyon mongs dug sel 'gyur//tha~Md 'a
377b3(rgyud): sbyong nga rgyal ni//yon tan bskyod pa'i mdzod yin te//nga med bdag med mi dmigs la//su zhib de la nga rgyal bskyed//dang bzhi'i tshogs kyis mi thub pa'i//shin tu rgyal
377b4(rgyud): bo'i khyu mchog 'grub//lha sron bdud sde cher bcad pa'i//dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin stob//phrag dog yangs pa'i don sbyor ba//nga dang bdag med don rtogs na//da gdong
377b5(rgyud): yangs pa gnyis med//bad mchog dkyil 'khor yangs pa 'grub//phrag dag dngos po mi shes shing //de dang bdag tu 'dzin 'gyur na//lha ma yin gyi gnasu skye//de nas yi
377b6(rgyud): dgas gnasu 'gro/gal te yul sa rnyed gyur na//shin tu mi bode dag par 'gyur//gzhan yang longs spyod thams cad la//dbang byar med cing gzhan dbang 'gyur//mdor na nyon
377b7(rgyud): mongs sdug bsngal 'grub//phrag dog yang dag rtogs pa ni//nga dang bdag tu 'dzin pa dang //phyin ci log la phrag dog ste//thams cad gnyisu med par sbyor//bde ba mchog kyang
378a1(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur//gnyis med don yang rtogs par 'grub//nga med bdag med dbyingasu thim//lhun grub don mchog 'grub par 'gyur//yid la lta
378a2(rgyud): ni rtag bsgoms na//rgyu 'bris lhun gyis grub pa yi//bdag gis kun tu dbang sgyur te//rigs 'dzin gnasu skye bar 'gyur//rdo rje rigs kyis bsgrub bya ba//sgrol dang
378a3(rgyud): sbyor bas mthar phyin 'gyur//sbyor ba nyid ni sgrol ba yin//rang bzhin gyis ni sbyor sgrol dang //sgrol ba nyid na sbyor ba yin//tingange 'dzin gyis spyir sgrol dang //dbang
378a4(rgyud): pa'i yul dus sbyor sgrol dang //thabs chen dag gi sbyor sgrol dang //mngon du phyung ba'i sbyor sgrol lo//yang na sbyor sgrol bdag la sogs//shes rab dbyings dang bdag tu
378a5(rgyud): sbyor/|thabs tshon sprul pa bsam mi khyab//dbyings dang dbyingasu thams cad sgol//rol pa'i phrin las bsam mi khyab//thugs rje sprul pa bsam mi khyab//sbyor sgrol pan
378a6(rgyud): los bdag la rdzogs//byang chub semos sprul phyogs btsor 'phro//ngan song gnas rnams stongs par byed//rigs 'dzin bde ldan thib par byed//bla med zhing rnams
378a7(rgyud): dag par byed//sku gsung lhun grub phyogs bcur 'dul//rdo rje zhes ni mtshan bsgrags te//theg dman rnams kyang rdo rjer dgod//zad mi shes pa'i gter yang 'grub/
378b1(rgyud): gapa 'dun //rnams cad byor mod mnyam pa'os//mas da sa byon pa'i yo shes m+b+ha ts+tshag/thugs sa pa dang mod sa//ts+tsho d+hA/dus gnas ma lu snya ma khyen/
378b2(rgyud): ba nyid na nyid kyi sku//nyon mongs byang chub la me du mkhyen//'khor ba nyid ni bdo gnaso//chos kyi dbyings dang sems can mtha'//dbyer med yang dag nyid du'o//rgyud kyi rgyal po chen
378b3(rgyud): sgra 'phrul dra ba las rmad du byung ba'i dam tshig bco lnga 'di ltar yang bshed pa'i le'u ste bdun cu rdulnga pa'o////de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rmyil po sgra 'phrul dras
378b4(rgyud): las dam tshig rnam par spros pa 'di nyid las chung ngu brjod pa 'ang brjod do//spros pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni//zhe sdang rdo rje'i thugs rje'i dang //dmyal ba'i gnas rnams cher
378b5(rgyud): gcod pa'i//brgyad gnyis bcu drug zhing du sbyor//che ba rnams la bsil ba'i sman//glang po rnams la dro ba'i sman//bsil de 'jam rtsub cha snyoms pa//thugs rje'i byin rlabs
378b6(rgyud): de ltar ston//byon brlangs ya mtshan rmad po che//chags pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni//chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis ni//'dod pa kun la longs spyad bya//ji ltar byed
378b7(rgyud): bai'ir mying zhing //rgya tshar nyid na rang bzhin med//chags pa med pa'i ye shos kyis//yi dgas gnas rnams cher gcing cing //lus deng zos kyis bsgrubs ma//nyin mo
379a1(rgyud): gnyig meng par ston//gti mug ces byu ba'i dam tshig ni//da dang bdag med gnyis med pa'o//shes rang chen po'i 'od gsal gyis//dun smra med/
379a2(rgyud): pa'i sdug bsngal bsal//rmongs med sgrib pa dag par byas//ye shes gsal ba'i thugs rje yis//bya byed med par nyon mongs sgrol//byol song gnas ni stongs byed cing //
379a3(rgyud): thugs rje'i sgron ma de ltar ston//phrag dog ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni//yangs pa chen po'i ye shes kyis//nga dang bdag 'dzin rnams la ni//thugs rjes gnyis med mnyam
379a4(rgyud): sbyor zhing //dogs dang yangs pa gnyis ga med//rgya chen yangs pa'i blo ldan pas//'di la mi chud gang yang med//thams cad yangs pa nyid du sbyor//lha ma yin
379a5(rgyud): rnams sbyongs par byed//nga rgyal bde mchog ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni//ye nas chos nyid mnyam pa la//nga dang khyod ces bya ba med//thams cad dbyingasu ro gcig ste//
379a6(rgyud): gnyis med mtshan nyid bsnun du med//che chung me dro pa'i ngang yin pas//bya ba dag ni med par bstan//nga rgyal bdog med rtogs pa yis//dregs pa'i gnas rnams stongs
379a7(rgyud): par byed//rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni//'jig rten 'di na ci yod pa//ming dang tha snyad 'dzin pa dag/so so'i mtshan nyid gzhag byas na/
379b1(rgyud): rang bzhin mod de yang dag nyid//rang byung chen po'i ye shes kyis//thams cad sangs rgyas zhing du sbyor//ma bcos ma byas dang gis glas la//ye nas 'od gsal sangs rgyas zhing //
379b2(rgyud): nyid kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni//rang bzhin nyid la gnas pa yi//sus kyang ma byas rang byung ste//thams cad de bzhin nyid du sbyor//gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du
379b3(rgyud): thim//rang byung ye shes dkyil 'khor gyis//ma lus de bzhin nyid du sdud//sdud dang mi sdud gnyis ga med//yang dag kho na nyid du'o//bde ngo'i ngang nyid ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni//
379b4(rgyud): thams cad ma lus rnam par dag/nyid kyi dbyings las mi gzhan phyir//bde dang mi bde ga nyi ga med//thams cad dbyingasu ro gcig ste//ji bzhin nyid kyi ngang brtsan par//yang
379b5(rgyud): dag nyid kyis de skad gsungs//bshad dang nyan pa'ang gnyi ga med//de bzhin nyid du gnyi ga 'du//dus bzhi rgyal mcho go ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni//gong na med pa'i ye shes mchog/
379b6(rgyud): thams cad kun la dbang sgyur te//thams cad mnyam pa nyid du sbyar//'das dang ma 'das thams cad dang //'byung dang 'byung bar ma nges pa'i//ye shes rtogs pa'i khyad par gyis//
379b7(rgyud): dus bzhi snga phyi med pa yi//mnyam pa nyid du lhan ner sbyor//ljon grub ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni//'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i//thams cad dbyer med byang chub ste//ye nas
380a1(rgyud): rnam par dag pa'i chos//mA bcos lhun gyis grub pa yi//byang chub lam chen 'di yin te//thams cad dbyer med nyid du 'dus//byang chub don
380a2(rgyud): grub ye nas rdzogs//mnyam pa'i zhing du thams cad thim//rdo rje skye gnas zhes bya ba'i dam cho ga ni//theg pa che mchog rigasu nges//rigs te byang chub bston pas gzung /
380a3(rgyud): thams cad mnyam pa'i dbyings shes nas//rigs mchog kun gyi skye gnas yin//skyes pa nyid na skyes pa med//las dang las kyi bag chags med//ces kyang ma gos tha~Md
380a4(rgyud): 'joms//skyo shi med po'i sa yang yin//byang chub kyi zhing bkod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba ni//phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'o//snang grags bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i//
380a5(rgyud): phyi dang nang gi gnas pa dag/de bzhin nyid kyi dbyingasu thim//mdor na zhing khams ma lus par//yon tan rin chen bkod pa yi//ye shes rgyan gyis spros pa rnams//
380a6(rgyud): zhing de yon tan bsam mi khyab//ye shes bzhugs gnas shes bya ba'i dam tshig ni//gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes ni//de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas//gsung
380a7(rgyud): sngags chen po grub 'dod pos//gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes thob//chos kyi dbyings gnas sems can ni//gnyis med de bzhin nyid du gcig/de ltar rtogs pa'i
380b1(rgyud): skyes byan//rdo dashugs gnas yin par ba shad//mi 'jigs pa'i rgyal mchog ces byung nga chan na//rnam par byung dang nyon mongs gnyis//tsa ba yod pa ma yin //nyon nos
380b2(rgyud): nyin pos bcos meng//thams cad dbyi su rlo gcig d+has//de la gnas pa'i gnyen po med//ces kyang ma tshugs gang na rnyed//mchog tu dade ba'i zhing yang yin//nga med bdag med
380b3(rgyud): rgyal ba'i mchog/gzhal yas khang portan zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni//phyogs bcu dus pa ni thams cad kun//rgyal ba'i zhing du sbyor ba ni//dog yangs tshad kyang dngag tu med/
380b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas spyi gtsug lta bu'i mtshan//ye shes skya las grub pa'o//ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub//zag pa zad las grub po yi//nams kyang 'jigs med chos kyi dbyings//
380b5(rgyud): sna tshogs kun sbyor zhes bya ba'i dmachog ni//gdol pa can gyi chos min pas//ci ltar bsams pa bzhin du 'grub//rig pa ra dbang gyur pas na//stong par bya ba'am mi spyong bya/
380b6(rgyud): thams cad dbyer med dang yin pas//kha dag dbyibs dang rin po che//thams cad khyab par yungs 'bru tshul//bsam yang mtha' dbus med pa'o//'dren byed gnas stobs
380b7(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ngom tshig na//ma rig lag rtogs pos ma yis kyis//'jig rten khams rnams nges ma yis pa//'khor ba'i rgyu dang 'dris bu gnyis//gon rtsa med pa'i rnyed ces/
381a1(rgyud): yang dag byang chub sems rig na//ma rig rgyu 'bras rnam par dag/nyon mongs pa nyid byang chub ste//thams cad ma lus bde gnaso//lam lnga ston byed
381a2(rgyud): ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni//ting 'dzin rnam gsum bsgom byas te//nyon mongs lam lnga'i sgo bklag nas//lam lngar snang ba rnam rtog yin//rtog dang mi rtog gnyi ga med//
381a3(rgyud): gnyis med de ni yang dag lam//thabs dang shes rab dang nyid du//shin tu mnyam bzhag rtogs bya zhing //bla na med pa ston par bya//yang dag don ston zhes bya ba'i dam/
381a4(rgyud): tshig ni//theg pa bsam yas ston pa yang //de bzhin nyid kyis ma brjod kyang //sems can blo'i rim pa bzhin//so sor 'tshom par kun la gsal//'di ni rdo rje
381a5(rgyud): theg mchog ste//rgya mtsho klung du chu 'bab bzhi//thams cad chu yi ngo bo nyid//theg pa thams cad rdo rje'i sa rab tu rtogs byed bya ba'i dam chog ni//shes rab blo tsha ni
381a6(rgyud): rab ldan pas//don du mi 'gyur yang ma gsungs//srid gsum 'gro ba bas ma ya su//thugs rje snyoms par bsam mi khyab//don dang thun pa 'ba' zhig ston//mi mthun
381a7(rgyud): zhags pa 'khor ba gcod//bder gshegs zhing rnams dag par byed//thams cad dbyingasu dag par 'dus//sbyar byed byang chub ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni//rang rig
381b1(rgyud): soshes dbang thod nas//dkar bo chen gyis mdog myur bzhin//dug kyang kun du 'gyur ba dang //de bzhin byang chub drug gsums//2 lA byad chu lam du sbyor//nyonams dun//
381b2(rgyud): bsngal bar byed las//thar dang mthar gnyis med ni//thams cad ma lus byang chub rgyu//mnyam rdzogs lhun grub ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni//ye shes sgyu mar snang ba dang //log
381b3(rgyud): rtog sgyu mar sAr+Naganyis//sgyu ma yin pas rang bzhin mnyam//mnyam pa nyid na mi gnas pa'i//bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs te//ye shes gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor la//theg
381b4(rgyud): mchog rdo rje mi lus rdzogs//dpe byad bzang po dpag tu med//thams cad dbang sgyur zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni//shin tu rtogs pa'i khyad par gyis//spyod yul thams cad smon na
381b5(rgyud): mkhyen//de bzhin nyid dang kun rtog la//gnyisu med pas dbang sgyur te//ma mus thams cad bde ldan zhing //thams cad byang chub mchog tu 'gyur//ye nus dngos po med pa
381b6(rgyud): la//ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub//rigs 'dzin gnas stobri pra bya ba'i dam tshig ni//shes rab rnams gsum goms byas nas//ting 'dzin mnyam pa'i don rton te//rtag tu
381b7(rgyud): yangs pa chen po bsgom//rgyu 'bras dus gcig rdzogs pa yi//rang rig nyid la dbang thob ste//tshe ni bcu dang drug pa yin//brgya brgya dag tu bskur zhing gnas//lus mthor
382a1(rgyud): bar sangs rgyas pa'o//zad med gter ldan zhes bya ba'i dam chog ni//shes rang chen po rnam dag pas//spyod yul thams cad dag par 'gyur//shes dang //
382a2(rgyud): spyod yul gnyisu med//de bzhin nyid du ro gcig ste//thams cad rgyal ba'i zhing sbyor bas//zad med rin chen gter du 'gyur//mi zad par ldan dam tshig mchog/'og min
382a3(rgyud): mtha' dbus bsam mi khyab//bsgrub med mnyam rdzogs zhes bya ba'i//dam tshig ni/thams cad mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor la//rang byung ye shes 'phyo ba yi//dbyings dang
382a4(rgyud): rig pa gnyis med pa'i//de bzhin nyid de rdo rje'i rigs//thams cad gnyi su med pa la//bsgrub dang sgrub pa yod ma yin//ye nas lhun gyis grub pa la//de la lam gyis bcos
382a5(rgyud): su med//thams cad byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni//chos rnams ye dag gyur pa yang //phyin ci log gi blo log nas//log rtogs gnas na longs spyod pa//
382a6(rgyud): ma rig 'khrul 'khor bsam mi khyab//'khrul rtog ngan pa bzlog pa'i phyir//thugs rje chen po thabs mkhas pas//nyon mongs 'dren cing mtho ris gnas//byang chub lom chen
382a7(rgyud): rtogs par ston//gsung mchog mtha' yas zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni//chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun//ming dang tshig tu brtags nas ston//ji snyed mang po'i don brjod
382b1(rgyud): kyang /rdo rje gsung la spros pa med//spos med de ni sna tshogs pa'o//kun tu brda' 'jal yo shes gsung //sgra dang mi chog kun las 'das//thams cad pad+ma chags med pa'o//bsgyur ba
382b2(rgyud): zad med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni//thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis//snang srid ma lus thams cad kun//de bzhin nyid kyis dbang bsgyur te//thams cad ye shes dbyingasu bstim//
382b3(rgyud): zad med ye shes gter ldan pas//thugs rje byin rlabs bsam mi khyab//'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten po'o//so sor don rtogs rnam par dag/thams cad skad 'jal zhes bya ba'i drim
382b4(rgyud): tshig ni//thar pa'i dkyil 'khor 'bum phrag dang //'gro drug dus gnas ma lus la//gsung cig tshig tu ma brjod kyang //sngon gyi thugs rje byin rlabs kyis//thar dang mthar gnyi ga
382b5(rgyud): la//so so ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin//chos kyi gsung mchog dam pa yis//thar pa bskul zhing ngan song sbyong //rang rig dbang du sgyur zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni//phyogs dus bsam gyis mi
382b6(rgyud): khyab pa//de na ji snyed yod pa yis//mtshan ma sna tshogs brtags pa yang //rang rig rnam par rtogs pa nyid//sangs rgyas zhing khams rab 'byams na//de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil
382b7(rgyud): 'khor dang //sprul pa bsam yas 'byung ba yang //ye shes sprul par dag pa'i yul//yi ge med mjal zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni//yi ge tshig dang sgra spangs pa'i//brjod med dang du
383a1(rgyud): gnas pa no//gsung nyid dang blazhin med pa yi// sgra rnams thams cad ya nas pa//thams cad drugs gyur byas na//sgra dang tshig la gnas pa smin/
383a2(rgyud): thugs la thugs ni mi gnas pa'o//bdud sde cher gcod ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni//nyon mongs pa nyid rnam par dag/phung nyid mngon sas rgyas//bdag nyid lce'i nga
383a3(rgyud): 'khor te//skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung gnas//bdud bzhi bcom pa'i skyes mchog gis//dregs pa chen po thams cad bcom//ma rig log 'dren 'dul bcad de//chos kyi
383a4(rgyud): dbyingasu thams cad thim//stong gsum kun grags zhes bya ba'i//dam cho gas ni/thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis//phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rdul snyeng du//'gro ba'i phrin
383a5(rgyud): las bsam mi khyab//sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang //lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes kyi//thams cad gdul bya chung ma zos//ngan song sbyong zhing byang chub zhing //ye shes
383a6(rgyud): rdzogs chen kun tu ston//mi shes gsung mchog ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni//'das dang ma 'das thams cad kun//yod dog shes pas rab rtags no//rang bzhin med la cir yang snang /
383a7(rgyud): snang ba nyid na dbyings nyid de//de ltar rtogs pa'i ye shes ni//kun la dbang sgyur rang dbang can//thams cad tshig gi sgra ltar snang //'di ni ye shes gsung mchog yin//bsam
383b1(rgyud): yas ye shes rdo rje gsung zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni//chos rnams bsam gyis mo khyab ste//mtha' dang dbus myod kun tu khyab//khyab dang khyab med rdo rje'i gsung //sgra skad sna tshogs bsgrags pa
383b2(rgyud): dang //dngos po med la dngos po'i sgra//ji ltar pi bang lag thogs na//sgra ni sna tshogs 'byung 'gyur yang //dngos po med pa de bzhin nyid//phyogs dus dbyer med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni//phyogs/
383b3(rgyud): bcu ma lus thams cad dang //dus bzhir 'byung ba ma lus kun//phyogs dang snga phyi med pa yi//thams cad de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings//'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i//so sor snang
383b4(rgyud): pa thams cad kun//rang rig rgyal por yang dag 'du//rang rig de nyid thams cad yin//'jigs med rdo rje zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni//'dus ma byas nyid 'dus byas yin//'dus byas snang
383b5(rgyud): dang mi snang gnyi ga min//yod dang med pa'ang dbyer med de//rang bzhin ye nas dag pa yi//ma bcos ma byas ngang gis gsal//'jig dang bzhig par bya ba min//cis kyang mi chugs
383b6(rgyud): rdo rje'i bdag ces gsungs//de bzhin sku nyid ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni//de bzhin zhing khams bsam yas dang //'gro ba ma lus thams cad la//thar pa rnams la dag pa'i sku/
383b7(rgyud): rtog pa can la 'khor ba lus//so sor 'tsham par don ston cing //stong pa nyid la dngos po med//chu zla'i tshul du kun la snang //kun la de ltar rtogs par byos//lhun grub bde
384a1(rgyud): branas zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni//chos rnams ma lus thams cad la//byang chub snying po yod pa ltar//rang bzhin ye nas 'od gsal ba'o//byang chub skyong /
384a2(rgyud): por thams cad 'dus//phyi nang ma lus thams cad kun//bdag gi ngang du gnas pas na//bdag la bdag gis dbang bsgyur nas//spyod yul thams cad smon mi dgos//che mchog
384a3(rgyud): rnam dag ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni//rig pa'i rgyal po rang gyur pas//thams cad kun la dbang bsgyur te//gong na med pa'i sa mnan pas//thams cad kun gyi gtso bo yin//thad
384a4(rgyud): ma lus gnyis med pas//sgo dang bsgo bar bya ba min//de bzhin nyid la dbang bskur bas//thams cad dbyingasu ro gcig go/chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i dam tshig
384a5(rgyud): ni//phyi nang snang bcung bdag rnams la//rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ye nas gnas//chen po'i gzugs snang thams cad ni//de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid//sgyu mi'i
384a6(rgyud): rtsal rnams 'dzin 'gyur ba'i//de bzhin yum gyi dkyil 'khor ro//rang rig byang chub dkyil 'khor te//thams cad kun las 'khyil bar gnas//zad med gtor tshano zhes
384a7(rgyud): bya ba'i dam tshig ni//zag bcas gnod sbyin nor dang 'dra//sems can 'phel 'grib zad 'gyur gyi//de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan ni//zad med 'phel 'grib med pa yi//
384b1(rgyud): mang po spros pas 'gro mi 'gyur//nyung ngu bsdus pas sbom po min//zang med rin chen gter yin pas//thams cad kun la khyab pa'o//rnam dag byang chub ces bya ba'i dam chog ni/chos rnam
384b2(rgyud): ma lus thams cad kun//ye nas rnam par dag pa la//rnam rtog rkyen gyis blo bur du//khams gsum 'khor ba'i btson rar gnas//rang rig slob med dag po yin//mya ngan 'das dang
384b3(rgyud): 'khor ba gnyis//rang bzhin med par don rtogs na//sangs rgyas zhing du rnam par dag/gzung 'dzin dri ba byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni//phyin ci log tu rnam brtags no//bdag dang bad
384b4(rgyud): gir so sor snang //de la 'dzin pa gnyis zhugs nas//rang bzhin med bzhin so sor snang //yang dag rtogs pas rab brtags na//dngos po thams cad stong pa yin//dngos dang dngos
384b5(rgyud): nyid mi gnas pa//de rtogs sdug bsngal bral byed yin//yum 'gyur dbyings phyug ma'i dam tshig ni//'byung ba lnga la brten 'gyur na//thams cad 'byung zhing ma lus gnas//skye 'khrung
384b6(rgyud): ma lus gzhi yang yin//thams cad kun gyi rgyu yang yin//de bzhin shes rab rnam gsum gyis//le lo med pa'i brtson pa 'bad//de bzhin dbyings nyid rtogs gyur na//bla med byang chub
384b7(rgyud): 'byung ba'i gnas//chos la skyon med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni//bla na med pa'i dkyil 'khor dang //ngan song gnas rnams ma lus kun//rgyu nyid rang bzhin gnyig ma/rang bzhin yo
385a1(rgyud): /de bzhin no//'bras bu rnam par dag pa yi//'jig rten pa nag po la sogs pa//snang ba nyid na ngo bo med//de nyid chos sku chen po yin//sems can ngan
385a2(rgyud): byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni//byang chub semasu don gcig pas//rtsa ba snying rje chen po 'byung //thabs kyis pha rol phyin pa spyod//nyon mongs lam nas 'gro bar byed//nyon mongs
385a3(rgyud): khams gsum gnas pa yang //phyin ci log nyid snang ba yin//der rtogs mtho ris thar pa'o//rtogs nas don 'dzin ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni//thams cad lhun gyis grub pa dang //
385a4(rgyud): sgyu ma mig yar tshul shes pa//gnyi ga rang rig nyid du 'dus//de nyid yang dug yin par bshad//sgra dang tshig tu brjod pa ni//yang dag don gyi snying po 'byin//ming tshig sgra la mi
385a5(rgyud): rten par//blo'i gting du go bar bya//sems la gnas bcas zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni//thams cad ma lus chos so cog/sems nyid las ni gzhan na med//sems dang
385a6(rgyud): chosu dbyer med pas//byang chub lam de ring ba min//gang nas ma 'ongs gar mi 'gro/rtog med rang rig kho na tsam//sangs rgyas sems can sems la gnas/brjod med spros med/
385a7(rgyud): bya ba'i dam tshig ni//'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i//sna tshogs ji snyed brjod pa yang //so so'i mtshan nyid ma rtogs pa//ba spu tsam yang brjod pa med//bsod nams
385b1(rgyud): tshon pos bstangs pa yi//sangs rgyas zhing nying dag pa'o//las ngan dag gis khams gsum gnas//de nyid dbyings las spros pa med//mi 'gyur rdo rje gsung zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni//rnam
385b2(rgyud): dag sku gsung sprul pa dang //che mchog sna tshogs bstan pa yang //byang chub sems la snang 'gyur te//snang ba nyid na dbyingasu 'ub//phyin ci log g.yo bsam yas kyis//khams
385b3(rgyud): gsum gnas dang lam lngar 'khor//de nyid log rtogs sna tshogs snang //de las ma gtogs gang yang med//ye nas ma bcos zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni//blo med byang chub smon mi dgos//
385b4(rgyud): 'gro lnga ma lus thams cad kun//ye nas byang chub snying por gnas//de bzhin dbyings kyis kun tu khyab//ji lta ba yi dang gnas la//de ltar rtogs pa'i blo 'jug pas//gnyisu med par
385b5(rgyud): rtags 'gyur na//su zhig bcos shing su yis rtags//rang bzhin 'od gsal zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni//chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun//rang rig ye nas dag pa yi//sus kyang
385b6(rgyud): ma bcos dang gis gsal//ma chags pad+ma 'dra ba yi//ye shes can gyi spyod yul dro//kun dang thun mong de ma yin//de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul de//skyes bu blo rtsal rab kyi
385b7(rgyud): rtogs//thams cad dbyings phyug ma zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni//mi zad yon tan gter gyur pa//zad pa'i dus med yid bzhin mdzod//bdag dang bdag gi med pa yi//shin tu zab
386a1(rgyud): pa'i blo las byung //chos dbyings zab mo'i don rtogs na//sku dang ye shes bsam mi khyab//rang rig ye shes don rtogs na//skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung thog/
386a2(rgyud): byang chub sdom byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni//gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes kyis//chags med dbyings la mnyam bzhag na//thams cad de bzhin nyid kyi zhing //nyon mongs sdug
386a3(rgyud): bsngal 'byung mi 'gyur//chos kyi rang bzhin ji lta bur//bdag gis yang dag rdzogs byas te//theg pa dman dang phyin ci log/thams cad mnyam pa'i dbyingasu dgod//phyogs
386a4(rgyud): dus gnyis med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni//phyogs bcu dus bzhi thams cad kyang //rtogs pa'i mtshan ma so sor snang //snang ba nyid na dbyer med de//mtha' dang dbus med
386a5(rgyud): zlum po yi//de bzhin rang gis rig pa yang //mtha' dang dbus med du ma min//gang du mo 'gro kun tu khyab//kun la bde sbyin mi gnas pa'o//thams cad 'byor ldan zhes bya ba'i
386a6(rgyud): da ma tshig ni//chos rnams so sor rtogs byas shing //thams cad gnyis med dbyings shes na//mi zad par ldan rgyan thob ste//kun tu zad med rin chen gter//de bzhin nyid la
386a7(rgyud): gnas bcas na//nyon mongs sdug bsngal mi 'byung ste//rtag tu bde gnas byang chub nyid//mtshan dang dpe byad kun dang ldan//thabs nyid shes rab ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni//ji ltar/
386b1(rgyud): snang ba thams cad kun//thams cad thabs kyi rang bzhin te//thabs la thabs ni rnam par sbyor//sbyor dang sbyor ba gnyi ga med//sna tshogs snang ba thams cad kyang //snang ba nyid na rang bzhin
386b2(rgyud): med//de nyid shes rab yin par bshad//rtag tu thabs nyid mi dmigs pa'o//shes rab nyid lo thabasu sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni//de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid las//rol pa sna
386b3(rgyud): tshogs cir yang 'byung //'byung ba nyid na rang bzhin med//med pa nyid na sna tshogs snang //thabs dang shos rab dbyings las byung //mnyan bsams bsgoms pa'i shes
386b4(rgyud): rab kyis//shes rab thab su don rtogs byos//kun la de ltar 'byor par gyis//gnyis med byang chub sems zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni//thabs dang shes rab ldan 'gyur na//gnyis med
386b5(rgyud): byang chub sems 'phros na//kun gyi 'byung gnas byed pa po//de yis ma byas gang yang min//kha dog dbyibs rigs gang yang myin//shin tu brtags dka' sus mi rigs//bdag gis
386b6(rgyud): bdag kyang mi mthong na//gzhan gyis rtogs par ga la 'gyur//thams cad sbyor ces bya ba'i dam tshig no//ye nas lha dang lha mo yin//dkyil 'khor yang dge sbyor ba dang //dbang po
386b7(rgyud): yul du sbyor ba'o//phung po lnga nyid de bzhin gshegs//'byung ba lnga nyid yum du sbyor//dus bzhi'i lha mo nyid du sbyor//rtag chad mu bzhi'i khro mo'o//thams cad ma lus 'byung
387a1(rgyud): kun//mnyam pa'i dbyangs dang rigs par sbyor//yang na shes rab dbyings la la//bde gshegs dkyil 'khor kun bkod la//bdag nyid rig pa'i ltar
387a2(rgyud): bsgoms te//gnyi su med par ldan par bya//rdo rje dril bu ldan gyur nas//byang chub pad+ma shin tu spro//phyogs dus dkyil 'khor mnyes pa dang //'gro ba mang po bde thob nas//slar//
387a3(rgyud): yang gnyis med dbyingasu bstim//thim 'gyur dbyings nas phyag rgyar 'bar//bder gshegs thabs dang shes rab rdzogs//phyag rgya drug kyang yang dag rdzogs//bsod nams
387a4(rgyud): tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs//thams cad dbyingasu 'byor pas na//ngan 'gro mi ltung yang dag 'grub//'di ni bsgral ba chen po yin//sgrol ba nyid ni sbyor ba yin//sbyor ba
387a5(rgyud): nyid ni ma lus bsgral//thams cad ma lus par bsgral byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni//phyi nang snod bcud ji snyed pa//gnas pa'i sems can ma lus kun//bdag nyid chen por
387a6(rgyud): rtogs pa yis//dbyangasu yang ni bsgral bar bya//shin tu khro bo chen po yis//thabs kyis lha chen bsgral ba ltar//chos nyid rtogs pa'i ting 'dzin gyis//gnyisu med
387a7(rgyud): par thabs kyis bsgrol//thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis//lam lnga'i sems can kun bkug nas//thams cad ma lus bsgral bar bya//ri rab chen po'i gling bzhi la//
387b1(rgyud): gnas pa'i sems can ma lus kun//thugs rje chen pos byin rlabs te//ye shes me chen bsgom byas na//thams cad ma lus bsreg par bya//dbyengasu yang ni bstim pas te//de
387b2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs par byin gyis rlabs//rgyal ba'i srasu dbang yang bskur//de ltar bsgral bar kun byas kyang //bsgral ba'i dngos po gang yang med//phung po lnga po bshig phra la//bshag/
387b3(rgyud): nas 'byung ba bag la zhe//ma bshig na yang 'byung ba yin//rnam shes med pas bsad byas na//gnas pa nyid na dngos po med//sems kyi rang bzhin de la ni//dus gsum sang+yas//
387b4(rgyud): dgrar langs kyang //sus kyang mi zin song pa med//'o na thugs rjes gang bsgral ba//rnam rtog mtshan ma thams cad kun//phyin ci log las bzlog byas te//ting 'dzin sngags dang
387b5(rgyud): phyag rgya dang //shin tu goms pas dbang bskur te//byang chub zhing la dgod par bya//daM ts+yai ma~M la ni bsgral zhes gdags//bsgral ba nyid na sbyor ba yin//nyon mongs sdug bsngal
387b6(rgyud): rtsod bcad nas//byang chub gnasu bsgral bsan//gnyis med dbyingasu sbyor ba yin//thabs nyid shes rab nyid thabs te//gnyisu med pa nyid byang chub kyi sems//sbyor
387b7(rgyud): ba ni lha dang lha mor sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor dang //dbang po yul du sbyor ba dang /chen po lnga de bzhin gshegs pa lngar sbyor ba dang //so so rtsal sgyu ma tsam du yod pa yum du sbyor/
388a1(rgyud): ba dang /dbang po yul dus lha dang lha ma sbyar ba dang /rtag chad du ngan zhag na ma sbyar ba dang /mngon sum du sbyor bar//sgrol ba ni mas/
388a2(rgyud): kyis bsgrol ba dang /'pho bas bsgral ba dang /dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid du bsgral ba dang /thams cad ma lus par dbyingasu dus gcig bsgral ba dang /thams cad thugs
388a3(rgyud): rje chen ngas gnyi su med par sgrol ba'o//'di gnyis dus gcig tu mdzad de/ya char ma gyur par bya'o//dngos grub mchog kyang der thob ces de bzhin gshegs pa nyid
388a4(rgyud): la de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis bshad//ma byin par len pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i//chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun//bdag
388a5(rgyud): dang bdag gi gzhan na med//rang bzhin rang gis bdag med pa//kun la thogs med spyad 'gyur yang //spyad dang spyod pa gnyi ga med//thams cad ye nas stod pa la//gang gi
388a6(rgyud): len cing gang la spyod//snang sring ma lus thams cad la//thogs pa med pa'i spyod 'gyur yang //bcing bar mi 'gyur bsod nams tshogs//chags med ye shes chen
388a7(rgyud): por yin//ma lus thams cad chos kyi dbyings//de ltar rang rig yin par bshad//gnyisu med par rtogs gyur na//blangs pa nyid na kun tu bzang //brdzun du smra ba
388b1(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni//chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun//ye nas dngos po yod ma yin//rang rig dang gis 'od gsal la//ming tsam tshig gis mtshon mod kyis//
388b2(rgyud): ming dang tshig la dngos po med//ma rig pa yis 'khrul rtog gis//nga dang bdag tu med pa la//so so mtshan ma dngos por bzung //'dzin pa'i dngos po yod med de//chos
388b3(rgyud): rnams thams nad ming tshig tsam//ji snyed mang po brjod pa yang //brjod par byed dang brjod pa med//chos rnams thams cad brdzun du snang //brdzun nyid pa ni brdzun spyod de//
388b4(rgyud): brdzun zhes bya ba brtags pa tsam//thams cad brdzun gyi tshig yin no//rdo rje 'joms byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni//thog ma med nas phyin ci log/bdag dang bdag go med
388b5(rgyud): pa la//rnam rtog mtshan ma so sor 'dzin//'dzin pa'i dngos po yod pa yin//mi mthun mtshan ma gzhom pa'i phyir//rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis//bdag rtog bag chags
388b6(rgyud): kun bcom nas//rdo rje dbyings su thim par bya//chos kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni//thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis//khams gsum nyon mongs 'khor ba rnams//
388b7(rgyud): gzhan gyis bcings te 'khor ba min//'dzin rtog chags pa nyid kyis 'khor//blo chen rab tu ldan pa yis//chos kyi ngon po mchog nyon la//'khor ba spangs med sangs rgyas
389a1(rgyud): dang //thams cad ma smras chos ts+tsho rtogs//rnamatshun 'byung ba sa dum rdzunan//rna na /dun ldan//da
389a2(rgyud): btsal bar mi rnyed de//sgra gsung thugs 'das mi dmigs pa'o//chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis ni//gnyis med par 'gyur byas na//nar bdun chen pa 'byung bar 'gyu
389a3(rgyud): mtshan dang dpe byed sna tshogs ldan//pad+ma chags med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni//'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i//chos rnams ma lus thams cad la//bsgo
389a4(rgyud): bsgo bar bya ba med//pad+ma'ang me nus skyes pa 'dra//ji ltar snang ba mtha' yas kun//bdag las gud na gcig kyang med//bdag nyid shin tu mi dmigs pas//ljon
389a5(rgyud): mongs nyid kyang byang chub zhing //don rnams bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni//rdo rje rigs kyis thams cad bcom//rin chen rigs kyis yon tan 'byin//pad+ma rigs
389a6(rgyud): kyis chags mdo 'gyur//sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lo//thams cad don rnams rdzogs par byas//gzung dang 'dzin pa rnams spangs te//mnyam po'i dbyings kyi
389a7(rgyud): sems kyis ba'aM/skye tsho med par lhun gyis grug/sku gsung thugs dang yon tan deng //phrin las rmad 'byung kun grags pa//gzhan na yid 'ong mo yin te/
389b1(rgyud): rang byung yo shes gnas med yin//mthong ba'i tshul gyis gzugs snang dang //bla mang byang chub bskur sna ra//mo long lta ngu'i tshul bzhin du//sna tshogs kha dog dbyib su sdung /
389b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rnams ni/sgra dang ming tshig kun las 'das//brjod med rang bzhin kun tu go/nyon mongs med cang bla med sgra//mi brjod stong gsum grags pa
389b3(rgyud): yi//gsungs brjod bsam gyis mi khyab pa//brjod pa nyid na steng gsum med//de nyid sna tshogs brjod pa'o//thams cad mkhyen pa'i thugs ldan pa//yang dag rtogs pas rab
389b4(rgyud): rtags pa//bzhi rtsa med dbyings skad cig ma//mtha' dang dbus kyang rtag tu med//de nyid sna tshogs 'byung ba'i rgyu//sus kyang mo bcos ma byas pa//bdag gis bdag kyang dmigs
389b5(rgyud): mi 'gyur//dngos med kun la dbang sgyur ba//sku gsung yang dag ldan gyur na//stan na ma khwa mtha' dang mnyam//mi 'gyur sangs rgyas zhing du 'ug//spyod yul ma lus thams cad
389b6(rgyud): la/ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'byung //mi zang po'i gter chen 'grub//gzhan gyis dbrog tu med pa yid//bo de'i bkar ni rin po che//thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis
389b7(rgyud): bya byed med par rnams bzhi mdzad//mdzad dang mdzad par bya ba med//ye nas lhur grub sangs rgyas chos//sgyu ma'i tshul du kun la spyod//spyod med dang go dkyil 'khor
390a1(rgyud): la//chags med tshul du rnam par rol//bya byed rnam pa sna tshogs kyang //byed pa nyid na chu zla'i tshul//gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes ni//rtsa ba lnga zhes brjod
390a2(rgyud): mod kyi//brjod pa nyid na yong med de//mtshan nyid med pa sna tshogs snang //de nyid thams cad mkhyen nyid yin//kun la khyab cing mi gnas pa//de ni rig pa rang dbang 'gyur//bas
390a3(rgyud): gyis mi khyab kun tu khyab//nam mkha' snang byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni//chos rnams ma lus thams cad la//de bzhin nyid kyis kun tu khyab//snod bcud ma lus thams cad la//
390a4(rgyud): snang ba chen pos khyab par 'gyur//na mkha' gzung du med pa ltar//snang srid thams cad de dang 'dra//chos rnams thams cad sems yin te//sems ni na mkha'i rang bzhin
390a5(rgyud): no//rten byed sa tshon zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni//ji ltar sa gzhi chen po la//sems kyis zin dang ma zin pa'i//skye 'khrungs ma lus thams cad 'byung //thams cad kun gyi gnas
390a6(rgyud): rten to//de bzhin theg cheni bla med la//byang chub sangs rgyas kun kyang gnas//theg pa mthon dman thams cad 'byung //thams cad theg chen dbyingasu 'dus//sreg byed ye
390a7(rgyud): shes me zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni//bdag med ye shes rang rig gis//dngos dang dngos med bag chags bsregs//rang dang spyi'i chos rnams dang //sems kyi phrag dag tha~Md
390b1(rgyud): kun//dngos po med par rtogs byas na//'khor ba ma spangs rnam par dag/mya ngan me 'da' ye nas gnas//'gro dang gnas par bya ba min//rtog pa thams cad ye nas tshogs//thad
390b2(rgyud): 'khru byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni//sems can ma lus thams cad ni//sgrib gnyis dag gis 'khor bar 'gyur//mnyan bsams bsgoms pa'i shes rab kyis//bdag med
