390b3(rgyud): gnyis ni rtogs byas na//pha rol phyin rdzogs sa bcu bsgrubs//sa gsum yang dag rdzogs byas te//mnyam pa'i zhing la thams cad 'god//khrus kyis mchog ni 'di yin no//
390b4(rgyud): g.yed byed chen po zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni//sems can ye nas dag pa la//bdag 'dzin rdul snyed g.yogs par 'gyur//sems dang rdul rnams med rtogs pas//ye shes rlung gis
390b5(rgyud): bag chags gtor//chos rnams ye nas rlung dang 'dra//de la gzung du med pa ltar//kun la de ltar 'byor par gyis//ma bcos ye nas de ltar gnas//thams cad kun la dbang
390b6(rgyud): sbyar zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni//rang rig phyin tsa ma log pa'i//gzung 'dzin gnyis med rtogs pa yis//thams cad mnyam pa'i dang 'gyur na//thams cad ma lus bdag yin pas//
390b7(rgyud): thams cad kun la dbang sgyur te//ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub//ji ltar spyad kyang bsod nams tshogs//mnyam rig ye shes chen po yin//chos thams cad gzugs brnyan
391a1(rgyud): ltar shes par bya ba'i dam tshig no//thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas yon to//snang ba nyid ni 'ja' tshon bzhin//rang bzhin med par kun tu snang //de nyid
391a2(rgyud): chos sku yin par bshad//cis kyang ma gros ma spangs pa'o//so so snang zhing 'thun pa'i gzugs//bdig dang bdag tu ma rtags pa//de lta bu yi ngang du snang //ches rnams
391a3(rgyud): sgra ltar shes par bya ba'i dam tshig ni//sgra rnams ji snyed brjod pa yang //dngos po med las dngos po sgra//badz+rod dang sgra'i dngos po man//chos rnams sgra ltar shes par
391a4(rgyud): byos//thams cad ma lus don 'byung ba//tshig gis mtshon las gud na med//sgra nyid don gyis dngos po min//don nyid sgra las gung na med//chos rnams dri'i mtshan nyid
391a5(rgyud): do/shes par bya ba'i dam tshig ni//chos rnams thams cad dngos med par//sna tshogs 'byung zhing rnam par 'gro//de bzhin dri yi dngos po yang //yod pa ma yin kun tu
391a6(rgyud): mnam//the tshom med pa'i shes rab kyis//chos kun de ltar shes par gyis//dri yis rab tu tshim 'gyur yang //dri dang dngos po gnyi su med//dngos grub thams cad de ltar//
391a7(rgyud): chos thams cad ro ltar shes par bya ba'i dam tshig ni//chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun//gzhi rtsa med las thams cad 'byung //de bzhin dbang po dngos med dang //rdzas
391b1(rgyud): spyad sa sa 'o//rnam shes pa tshugs na//ngo ma dang thams du 'brug/rang du rgyas pa ma// na ma ska tsugan//rgyas rnams rnams /
391b2(rgyud): lta/ bya bar dam tshig ni//gzugs rnams pa bye rnas pa l+la//rkye ba chu bur phyin//mtshan 'dzin gyi/shin du gnas//rnam shes mes dang
391b3(rgyud): rlonas byung ma tshugs sa ming ni mam chogs rten ni/ rjems ni
391b4(rgyud): 'dus byas rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni//yang dag nyid la gnas byas na//phyi na snod 'byud rnam par dag/rag par snang ba de bzhin gshegs//sgyu mar 'dzin pa sum gyi dbye
391b5(rgyud): gzugs ni mtshan mdangs pa myod//kluts+tshag la yang shig pa dang //thams cad na ma dang du gnas//nam tha' de bzhin rjes kyi sa//'dus byasany-id kyi dngas gru ga/
391b6(rgyud): sa ma 'thung ba zhes bya ba dam tshig ni//gshegs su sgyu mar snang ba dang //lag rtogs ts+tsho mer snang ba gnyis//bzhi rtsa meng do rang banan stong //rigs dang rgyung du rgyu/tu
391b7(rgyud): rigs dang kha dog dbyibs med pas//phyi nang snod bcud rnam par snang //snang ba nyid na chos kyi sku//ci re yang 'gyur zhing thams cad 'grub//kun 'byung dngos grub de ltar ro//grang
392a1(rgyud): dun nan tu ma tshun du//mams ldanam sa sa smra sa na//rnam na du bya mangs sa smra//
392a2(rgyud): dam byed//bya byed mang pos g.yengs par gnas//bya byed meng po bdag med pas//ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur ni//mtshan ma mnyam pa'i dbying su gnas//'du byed
392a3(rgyud): tshogaso mig so borten//dbang lnga rdzogs pa zhes bya dimachog ni//chos rnams thams cad skye med pas//shin tu brtan pa'i dbang thob 'gyur//rang ri//ye shes
392a4(rgyud): 'dag pa 'a//thams cad ma khyen pa dbang yang thog//sa rnams pas s+yAd da da ste//kun la spyod du'i dris po ste//sbyi chags pa med pa'i spru/
392a5(rgyud): byin kyi rang bzhin yenas zlum//thams cad rgyus 'debs shes bya ba'i dam tshig ni//phyogs pazhi mtshams pa ni steng 'og bcu//rang bzhin chen pos kun tu khyuH/
392a6(rgyud): nyid mi rnyed pa banA b+h+rU~MHga na te//rnam de nyid /la gnas shing /ma pa'i skyes
392a7(rgyud): sa kyinas kyi rkyen na//senas kyis su ga son //dal nga ngos sa rkyen /
392b1(rgyud): rang bzhin rnam par dag pa la//gtsang dang spro ba'i blo tsam med//thams cad bdo gshegs snying po bas//rkyen gyi rdul gyis ga la 'go/shes rab mchog gis de ltar
392b2(rgyud): rtogs//ma lus kun 'dus dbyings shes byos//thams cad 'jigs byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni//shes rab blo rtsal ldan pa yis//brtan rtog mtshan mo kun
392b3(rgyud): bshig pas//mtshan ma med pa'i phyag rgya ru//thams cad 'dus par yang dag rtogs//rtog pa nyid kyang dngos med la//de nyid sna tshogs par snang ba'i//
392b4(rgyud): snang ba nyid na byang ba med//de nyid 'jig pa'i phyag rgya yin//gsung drung tshe 'phel zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni//chos rnams thams cad bdag yin pas//gang du
392b5(rgyud): 'gro zhing gang du skye//'jig dang skye ba'i dngos po med//dngos med de la su zhig gsod//gang zhig gnyis su 'dzin pa la//skye dang 'chi ba de la yod//ye shes can
392b6(rgyud): gyis brtags pas na//skye 'jog nyid na dngos po med//thams cad mi 'gog pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni//mchog gsum rdzogs pa man chad nas//ngan song gnas
392b7(rgyud): rnams yan chad du//yong dag par ni dbyer med de//gang yang spang bar bya ba min//theg pa mthon dman bsam yas pa//don tu mi 'gyur yong ma gsungs//
393a1(rgyud): ngan song gnas rnams thams cad kun//bla med byang chub rgyu yod pa'o//thams cad spyod pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni//thams cad kun tu bzang
393a2(rgyud): yi//'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams la//thogs pa med par spyad byas te//bsod nams tshogs chen yin par brtog/de bzhin gshegs pa lngar yang brtags//gzhan
393a3(rgyud): yang stong khams thams cad ni//shes rab dbyings dang 'dod yin rnams//rab 'bring tha ma thams cad spyod//thams cad mi chud pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni//phyogs
393a4(rgyud): dus mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor du//rdo rje rigs mchog ma rtogs par//theg pa dman dang lta ba du man//des ni theg mchog rtogs mi 'gyur//mi mnyam pa la
393a5(rgyud): don nyid kun khyab kyang //nyon mongs sdug bsngal nyid kyis bsgribs//de yis yang dag nyid mi mthong //ma mthong ba la ma chud bya//thams cad bsrung du med ces bya
393a6(rgyud): ba'i dram tshig ni//thams cad ma lus sangs rgyas la//bsgrub cing bsrung bar bya ba med//dge dang mi dge gnyi ga med//nyon mongs spangs zhing byed bsgrub med//
393a7(rgyud): de bzhin nyid kyi glong gyur na//bde dang mi bde dbyer med de//ye nas dag mnya mo nyid du gnas//de la bsrung bya rdul rtsam med//thams cad bsrung ba med pa zhe bya ba'i
393b1(rgyud): dam tshig ni//sems can khams gsum 'khor ba yi//thog ma med nas 'khor ba yi//phyin ci log la 'jol nyag spyod//gzung 'dzin don la shin tu chags//des rna la ba
393b2(rgyud): bar rtag tu 'phyan//de bas rang sems rtogs byas te//le lo med par yongs spangs te//nga med bdag med mnyam par bsrung //thams cad 'dzegs par byed pa zhes bya
393b3(rgyud): ba'i dam tshig ni//rdo rje sems dpas bkas bcad pa//sdom pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kun//don bzhin du ni ma bsrungs na//yak+Sha khro bo med dpal gyis//snying nas dngos
393b4(rgyud): te khrag 'thungs nas//ngan song gsum du skye bar 'gyur//de yi sdug bsngal bzod brlag chad//dam tshig 'di ni rdo rje che//dam rdzas so sor spyod pa zhes bya ba'i dam
393b5(rgyud): tshig ni//rigs lnga so sor dbye ba ya//rdo rje sems dpa' glang po'i sha/rin po che ni rta'i sha/pad ma rigs ni a ri ka'i sha/don yod nam mkha' lding gi shwa/
393b6(rgyud): bder gshegs rigs ni sha chen no//dbye ba 'am yang na mi dbye bar//nges par dang du blangs pa'o//yang na thams cad gcig tu bsdu//yang ni mtshan nyid
393b7(rgyud): med par rtag/ting nge 'dzin phyag rgya'i dam tshig ni//bde gshegs dkyil 'khor ma lus kun//ye nas rang bzhin gsal ba las//thams cad kun la yod par ba
394a1(rgyud): rgya sems pa stod//blan mdzan rnan ma d+ha// napa mchog thams byud sa//2ramargyad pa rta tu bstsug+sa//byung chu
394a2(rgyud): shing drung skye bar 'gyur//bla med byang chub mchog kyang 'grub//skye 'chi med pa'i bde 'grub ste//sems la dbang yang thob par 'gyur//spyod yul thams cad smon na shes//
394a3(rgyud): rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las dam tshig rnam par spros pa'i le'u ste bdun cu rtsa drug pa'o////gang zhig dkyil 'khor 'di spangs na//nyon mongs dran song
394a4(rgyud): gan su skye//byang chub 'bras bu thob mi 'gyur//bla med 'gro ba'i rgyu yang tshad//rigs tshad nyid du skye bar 'gyur//rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrub 'dod pas//rtag tu mnyam pa'i
394a5(rgyud): dron rtogs la//sku ni 'ja' tshon tshul 'dra bar//snang la rang bzhin med par bsgom//'khor rnams chu zla'i tshul shes par//gsal yi rang bzhin med par bsgom//lha
394a6(rgyud): yi sku rnams ga stsal bsgom ni//bsod nams tshogs chen thob par 'gyur//de nyid gzugs brnyan tshul shes na//ye shes tshogs chen thob par 'gyur//rnal 'byor
394a7(rgyud): pas ni rtag tu bsgom//yi dam lha de spangs byas na//ngan song mi bde rtag tu myong //sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi gcad pa'i don ni//sngags dang phyag rgya bar mi gcad//rna lo 'byor
394b1(rgyud): 'grub pa'i lam yang yin//mi gtong sdom zhing 'dren pa'ang yin//don mchog rdzogs pa'i gnas yin te//rtag tu mnyam bzhag phyag rgya yin//dug gsum gting 'byin sngags//
394b2(rgyud): yin te//yang dag don chen klung 'dod pas//dus mtshams med par phyag rgya sngags//yid brtan drag tu bzlas brjod bya//yon tan na mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam//phyag rgya bskyod
394b3(rgyud): dang yi ge o//rdo rje slob dpon mtshan nyid bstan pa//bla med dkyil 'khor ston pa po//yon tan zad med sbyin pa yin//byang chub lam chen 'dren mdzad pa//chags med zhing du
394b4(rgyud): 'grod pa yin//nyon mongs sdug bsngal rtsad gcod cing //'khor ba'i lam rnams stong par byed//ma rig mun sol sgron me yin//long ba rnams kyi dmigs bu mkhan//de la rtag
394b5(rgyud): tu mchod byas na//sangs rgyas byang chub thag me ring //rdo rje mched dang lham dral gyi mtshan nyid bstan pa//rdo rje rigs kyi spyan yin te//thog ma med nas las 'thun pas//lha
394b6(rgyud): spyad 'thun pas 'dir skyes te//gcig la cig ni mig dang 'dra//shin tu gdung zhing brtse bar bya//dam tshig ngan sems dbye byas nas//dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur//
394b7(rgyud): da bas dam tshig 'da' mi byed//gsang ba'i dam tshig bstan pa ni//de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor ni//srid gsum mo lus kun la khyab//phyin ci log gis rab bsgri
395a1(rgyud): nas/dbul po gtor dang gyad kyi nor bu 'dra//de bas rdo rje gsang mchog 'ang //thams cad ma byon pa'i thugs rje yis//chos la skyon yod ma yin te//sems/
395a2(rgyud): can don phyir shin tu gsang //theg pa dman dang phyin ci log/de la gsang don bstan gyur na//rang bzhin gsang don mi shes par//'phral gyi spyod yul de dag la//shin
395a3(rgyud): tu nges pa'i don bzung nas//gsang don de nyid log par khring //ma rtogs de nyid dmyal bar 'khor//de bas shin tu gsang bar bya//thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas//thar lam
395a4(rgyud): kun la mkhas par bya/shes rab mchog dang ldan pas na//sems can snod kyi rim pa bzhin//theg pa mthon dman don nyid ni//so sor 'tsham par bstan dgoso//dang
395a5(rgyud): du blang dang mi spang bo//rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu spyad//chags pa med par gyur pa dang //dngos grub ya mtshan chen po ni//dam tshig mdo bshad nang nas 'byung //ma rtog
395a6(rgyud): pa zhes spyad gyur na//yi dgas srin po'i nang du skyo//yong na dam tshig 'di lta bur//ji ltar spyad kyang sdom pa mi 'da' ste//byed gcod tshogs chen gnyi su 'gyur//'gro dang
395a7(rgyud): nyal dang 'dug pa na//mnyam pa de'i dbyings ni gnas//shes rab mchog gis rtag tu gyis//chos rnams ma lus thams cad la//bya lam na mkha' gtsang bzhin gyis
395b1(rgyud): 'dzin chags ma lus thams cad kun/mkha' la rung tshon 'phro ba bzhin//yid b+hU rtog chags ma lus pa//chu la nya tshon 'phro ba ltar//rnal 'byor lta ba de ltar ltos//de ltar rtag
395b2(rgyud): pa'i shes rab kyis//tshig tsam ma yin blo gting spos//rdo rje theg mchog kha chos la//mnyam pa'i don nyid mi shes par//gsang sngags drim tshig mnyam zer zhing //thugs
395b3(rgyud): thub dag gis spyad byas pa//dmyal khams dag tu rgyud par 'gyur//mnyam pa'i don nyid ji lta bu//mnyam dang rtogs pa gang yang mid//ji lta mi gnas yul la spyod//spyod
395b4(rgyud): par byed dang spyod pa med//de ltar rtogs pa'i rigs mchog ni//rdo rje rig 'dzin skye ba na//'jigs med kun tu bzang por sbyar//yon tan mi zad gnas pa yin//mnyam pa'i
395b5(rgyud): don nyid mi shes shing //kun rdzob don dam gnyis med la//chos dang gang zag gnyis med na//'di ni byang chubs pa yin//las dang nyon mongs thams cad la//mnyam pa'i
395b6(rgyud): don du mi shes shing //rten 'brel rgyu 'bras yong 'dzin na//'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyis//chos rnams mau lus thams cad la//bden bzhi'i dngos po yod lta zhing //sbrang dang
395b7(rgyud): mi spong byed 'gyur ba//'di ni nyan thos sa pa yin//dge bcu dag la gtsor len cing //dge dang mi dge mi mnyam pas//lha dang mi'i skye gnas te//'dong khams dag tu 'khor ba
396a1(rgyud): ba'i sa//mnyam pa'i don nyid mi rtogs shing //tshad med bzhi dang bsam gtan bzhi//rim par so sor bdag 'dzin cing //gzugs tshogs dag la bdag tu
396a2(rgyud): rtog/'di ni tshangs gnas rim par skye//mnyam dang gzugs med ma rtogs par//ming bzhi med par ma shes te//skye mched bzhi la gnas 'gyur bas//sred pa'i rtse mo'i
396a3(rgyud): swa ru skye//thams cad mnyam par ma shes na//ma lus kun la zhe sdang zhing //snying rje yang dag med 'gyur na//'di ni mo zad chen po yi//dmyal khams bcu drug gnas pa
396a4(rgyud): yin//tshogs med dngos po mi shes nas//thams cad kun la 'dod chags shing //lus kyis bsgribs dang zas kyis bsgribs//yi dgas chen po'i gnasu ste//nga dang bdag
396a5(rgyud): med ming shes shing //chos rnams kun la rmongs byas pas//shes rab mi gsal don med pas//dge sdig gnyis kyi don ma rtogs//'di ni byol song gan su ste//shin tu nga rgyal
396a6(rgyud): cher skye cing //thams cad bdag gir gzung bas na//kun drang rtsod pa'i las byed pa//lha ma yin gyis gran su skye//thig mchog mthon dman thams cad dang //'jig rten lta ba
396a7(rgyud): thams cad kun//ye shes chen pos rab rtags na//rang bzhin med la cir yang 'grub//rang bzhin dbyings las nyams pa med//shes rab chen po mig ldan pas//mthon
396b1(rgyud): dman gnas dang lam drug dang //rang bzhin med la cir yang 'grub//so sor de bzhin 'khor bar gzigs//sngags mchog bla na med pas ni//mtshan ma kun dang mi rtag par//mtshan
396b2(rgyud): ma kun dang thams cad med//kun dang mnyam pa nyid yin pas//'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'o//so ser lta ba brjod mi bya//spyi ni log rtog bsam yas pa//ya nas yod pa//
396b3(rgyud): ma yin te//so so'i rnam rtog bag chags kyis//gzung 'dzin dra bas bsgribs 'gyur te//ci yang med la cir yang snang //sdong po nyid na rang bzhin med//de ltar rtogs na 'gro hA/
396b4(rgyud): gnas//rdo rje can gyis de ltar rtogs//rnal 'byor chen po'i lta spyod ni//cir yang spyod kyang rang bzhin med//mkha' la bye chen lding ba bzhin//chu la sbyar chen 'phyo ba bzhin///
396b5(rgyud): mkha' la rlung chen 'gro ba bzhin//rnal 'byor lta ba de ltar blta//rnal 'byor spyod pa chen po ni//thams cad kun la dbyer med spyod//bde ba'i ro mchog myong bar 'gyur//de la su
396b6(rgyud): zhig chags par byed//spyod bzhin mchags ye shes yin//bde ba'i mchog nyid bsod nams tshogs//de lta bu'i ngang du spyod//'di ni spyod pa rlabs chen yin//lte spyod ya tshar
396b7(rgyud): ma gyur par//sngags 'ching rnams kyis rtag tu spyad//kha cig lta ba mnyam gnas kyang //spyod pa dag dang yang mi mthun//kha cig spyod pa rdzogs byed kyang //mnyam pa'i lha
397a1(rgyud): ba yong mi shes//kha cig lha spyod gnyi ga med//yang dag skyes mchog dam pa yin//don dam kun rdzob dbyer med pas//yod dag nyid du rab tu rtogs//bla med thog
397a2(rgyud): chen dang gnas ni//don dam kun rdzob dbyer med de//kun rdzob tsam du thams cad la//ngag dang ma drag gnyis kar 'dzin//thabs kyi theg pa chen po ni//rnam par byang dang sdug
397a3(rgyud): bsngal dag/kun rdzob tu'ang dbyer med//lta ba mthon dman de tsam//thabs kyi lta spyod chen po ni//bla med theg pa las 'phags pa//don dam du ni ner bdun//kun rdzob du ni
397a4(rgyud): mnyam rdzogs so//mnyam pa nyid la ma g.yas bzhin//thabs kyi phyag rgya chen po ston//thabs dang shes rab rnam par dag/thams cad dag ces bya ba yang //dngos po gsal
397a5(rgyud): dag ma yin te//snang spyod gnyis na rnam par dag/dam tshig chen po'i mdo rnams las//rigs lnga dag tu bstan pa ni//chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun//rigs chen
397a6(rgyud): dadug tu zad par 'dres//mA lus chos kun dbyer mi dmigs//cis kyang mi tshugs rdo rje yin//rigs ngan 'joms pas rdo rje yin//mi dmigs dbyings nas kun 'byung ba//
397a7(rgyud): yon tan chen po gnas yin te//zhing khams mi bzad gnas kyang yin//'di ni rin chen rigasu gsungs//chos rnams thams cad dbyer med pas//chags dang tshigs par
397b1(rgyud): byu med//de bzhin nyi du gcig pa ste//nyes pas mI gos pad+ma bzhin//thams cad ma lus dbyings 'dus pas//'di la bya ba rdul tsam med//ma byas bzhin du don grub pa//dz+nyAn
397b2(rgyud): yon byang chub nyid du sbyor//'di ni las rnams grub pa yin//chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun//mtha' deng dbus med du maur bral//gang yang ma yin de bzhin nyid//dbyer med pa yi
397b3(rgyud): tshul rtogs te//'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs//snang srid ma lus thams cad la//gsal zhing dro ba'i gnas byed cing //mtshan ma bag chags sreg byed pa//'di ni me'i rigasu
397b4(rgyud): bshad//chos rnams ma lus thams cad la//dngos por snang la gzung du med//skyod na thams cad kun smra te//'di ni rlung chen yin par bshad//dam tshig chen po'i mdo rnams
397b5(rgyud): las//'byung ba lnga rnams bshad pa ni//thams cad ma lus 'byung ba'i gnas//thams cad kun gyi mdzod skyong yin//chos rnams ma lus thams cad la//sra zhing rtan pa'i gnas yod
397b6(rgyud): pas//dngos po med pa'i tshul rtogs te//'di ni sa chen yin par bshad//chos rnams ma lus thams cad la//de bzhin na mkha' chen po yis//phyi dang nang gi go 'byed pa'o//thams
397b7(rgyud): cad gsal ba'i ngang nyid//'byung ba bzhi po thams cad kyang //thams cad na mkha'i nga du thim//chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun//de bzhin nyid kyi dbyingasu 'ug//nyon mongs lnga pa
398a1(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni//ma rig pa ni rig par 'gyur//phyin ci lo ga ni yang dag ste//nyon mongs lnga po de bzhin gshegs//dngos med rtogs na byang chub
398a2(rgyud): lam//ma rtogs ngan song gsum du 'gro//de bas thos bsams bsgoms pa yis//yang dag don nyid rtogs byas te//thams cad sangs rgyas nyi sbyor//'dod chags rang bzhin
398a3(rgyud): med pas na//yang dag don la chags byed//chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas//ma chags pa la chags pa dang //shin tu chags mchog chen po yon//rgyal ba'i zhing khams
398a4(rgyud): 'byung 'gyur te//snang ba mtha' yas zhing dag yin//thams cad pad+ma rdzus skyes yin//rdo rje 'dzin gyis ru ste//zhe sdang chen po'i mtshan nyid ni//phyin ci log lo zhe sdang zhing //zhe sdang
398a5(rgyud): dngos po med shes na//sdang dang mi sdang mnyam shes te//cis kyang mi tshugs rdo rje yin//mnyam pa chen po'i ngang nyid ni//thams cad kun la dbyer med//de ltar ma rtags kun la
398a6(rgyud): snang //de bzhin phal gyis mnyam mi shes//des nI zhe sdang nyid du mthong //yang dag rtogs pas rab rtags na//zhe sdang thugs rje chen po yin//gti mug rmongs pa zhes brjod pas//
398a7(rgyud): chechos rnams ma lus thams cad kun//don dam du ni dbyer med la//kun rdzob sgyu ma mig yor tshul//snang ba nyid ni dngos med pas//de la su zhog bdag tu 'dzin//thams cad dbyer/
398b1(rgyud): med mi dmigs pa//shes rab can gyi gti mug yin//de rtogs de bzhin gshegs pa'o//nga rgyal mtshan nyid brjod pa ni//mnyam pa nyid la gnas byas nas//phyin ci lob dang theg dman
398b2(rgyud): la/shin tu nga rgyal chen por snang //nga rgyal zhi ba so so min//rang bzhin med pas dbyingasu 'dus//'di ni yon tan 'byung gnas yin//de bzhin dag par shes par byas//phrag dog mtshan
398b3(rgyud): nyid brjod pa ni//nga dang bdag tu 'dzin pa ste//'dzin nyid dngos po yod ma yin//mnyam mi shes la phrag dog cing //thams cad mnyam pa nyid 'dus//mnyam pa la shin tu sdom//de bas
398b4(rgyud): phrag dog chen po yin//phyin ci log tu bdag tu bcings//gzung dang 'dzin pas shin tu dog/gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes ni//dog yangs med de thams cad mnyam//de nyid shes pa
398b5(rgyud): las rab 'grub//phung po lnga zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni//phung po lnga por snang ba yang //kun rdzob bye ba sna tshogs byed//bde ba'i yul dang mi bde'i yul//so so'i ro rnams myong byed cing
398b6(rgyud): lnga po'i mtshan nyid bshig byas nas//so so'i mtshan nyid dngos po med//gang gis de la dngos bzung na//dran song gsum du skye bar 'gyur//de la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid ni//sang ba nyi
398b7(rgyud): ni rang bzhin mod//snang med de nyid sna tshogs ston//snang dang mi snang gnyisu med//de rtogs rnam par thar pa'i gnas//gzugs nyid long spyod rdzogs pa'i sku//tshor ba'i mtsho ni nyid brjod
399a1(rgyud): nga ni//kun la rnams gsum 'byung mod kyi//bde dang mi byede dngos po med//gnyi ga ma yin lung ma bstan//sna tshogs tshor ba 'byung 'gyur yang //tsher dang 'byung ba
399a2(rgyud): gnyi ga stong //stong nyid dngos po yod ma yin//de rtogs chos kyi go bgos yin//'du shes mtshan nyid bshad pa na//gsum tshogs mtshan mar 'dzin pa yin//so so mtshan nyid
399a3(rgyud): shig pa na//dngos po med de de bzhin nyid//dngos po de ni sna tshogs pa//bya byed med par kun tu 'jug/khams gsum ma lus thams cad la//mtshan mche chung bsam mi khyab
399a4(rgyud): khyab med dngos po yod ma yin//de ltar rtogs na sangs rgyas mtshan//'du byed mtshan nyid 'di ltar gnas//rtsa ba brgyad pa'i grangs 'gyur te//lnga bcu rtsa gcig kun la 'phyo///
399a5(rgyud): dor rtogs rtsa ba yod ma yin//med bzhin ldog g.yo rnam par 'byung //de la dngos por 'dzin pa ni//rtag tu nyon mongs g.yengs gyur nas//khams gsum brtson ra kun tu 'khor//
399a6(rgyud): yang dag don phyir rig pas ni//'pho ba'i gzhi rtsa de bzhin de//de la rnam rig 'byung ba ni//dngos po mi de skad cig ma//ye shes dbyings la rol pa mdzad//sprul pa'i tshogs chen
399a7(rgyud): yin par bshad//kun gyi 'byung gnas rnam shes te//de yi dngos po'i rang bzhin ni//kha dog dbyibs dang rig rgyun min//gang yong ma yin nyid mi dmigs//'di ni kun la dbang
399b1(rgyud): sbyar to//mtho ris 'gro 'am ngan sdeng 'gro/rtags dang ma rto blas khyad pa'o//bzhi po mnyam pa'i ngang shos na//'di ni yo shes chen po yin//kha dog lnga yi dam chog na//sems can ma lus
399b2(rgyud): thams cad la//ye shes lnga yis kun khyab kyang //rang gi rnam rtog bsgribs byas te//ye shes lnga yi don ma mthong //ma mthong rmongs pa thams cad la//ye shes mtshan nyid bstun
399b3(rgyud): pa'i phyir//dkar dang dmar dang ser ba dang //ljang khu la sogs nag por bstan//chos rnams bdag med rtogs byas nas//byang chub sems nyid dag pa'i phyir//shin tu mdog ni
399b4(rgyud): dkar bstan pa//de rtogs bya phyir dag pa'i mdog/chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun//pad+ma rA ga zhes brjod do//chags dang chags par bya ba med//chags med phyir yang dmar po'o///
399b5(rgyud): yon tan gter chen zad mi shes//thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas yin te//de bzhin nyid dbyings ma lus la//zad med rin chen gter 'gyur ba//mdog ni gser gyi mdog tu bstan//
399b6(rgyud): chos rnams phyin ci log rnams la//thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis//dbyingasu yang dog bsdu dgos pas//las rnams ma lus rdzogs par byed//kun tu las ni ljang gu'i mdog/
399b7(rgyud): de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid las//cis kyang mi tshugs bco su med//kha dog nag pa dngos po la//mtshon gzhan dag gis bsgyur du med//de bzhin kun la shes par byos//phyogs lnga
400a1(rgyud): /zhes bya bya ba'i dam tshig ni//mtha' dang dbus mod de bzhin du//dbyer med ngang du gnas pa la//ye shes rtogs pa'i don bya phyir//phyogs dang dbusu ga
400a2(rgyud): par bya//sems can mi rig mdongs pa la//nyon mongs ma rig gsal bya'i phyir//ye shes sgrol ma 'od 'bar bas//ma rig mun pa sel ba ri byed//de phyir de la shar zhes
400a3(rgyud): byu sems can ma lus thams cad la//nyon mongs sdug bsngal mi gnas shing //ma rig mun pa nub 'gyur bas//de la nub kyi phyogs zhes bya//sems can kun gyi nyon
400a4(rgyud): mongs kun//ye shes chen po bdag med pas//sdug bsngal rab tu byung byas nas//de la byang gi phyogs shes brjod//de ltar ma lus thams cad la//thugs rje shar dang
400a5(rgyud): sgrib pa nub//rnam rtog mtshan nyid byang gyur na//dri'i yon tan chen po rdzogs//de ltar chos rnams ma lus kun//rang bzhin nyid kyi dbyingasu 'dus//phyogs rnams ma lus
400a6(rgyud): thams cad kun//de bzhin nyid du zlum pa'i tshul//phyogs rnams kun la de ltar blta//ma rig phyin ci log rnams kyis//phyogs rnams so sor gzung 'gyur na//rtag tu nyon mong
400a7(rgyud): 'khor bar 'gyur//dbang po lnga zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni//yul lnga dag la dbang byed cing //phyin ci log ni dngos por 'dzin//dngos por gzung bas khams gsum 'khor//
400b1(rgyud): gzugs rnams ma lus thams cad la//snang zhing dngos po med pa dang //rtswa dang lha maud dngos por rgyug/ba dag dang lha nyid gnyis pa'o//sgra rnams sna tshogs grags pa yang //
400b2(rgyud): dngos po med par shes//sgra brjod ma smras thams cad ni//chos kyi sgra cheni sde tshogs yin//de'i dngos par snang ba yang //dri nyid nga bzhin gung yang med//de snam chos kyi
400b3(rgyud): yin te//shes rab chen pas de ltar rtogs//ro yi dngos po snang ba yang //ri yi rang bzhin yod ma yin//ro bI de bzhin nyid kyi ro//bde bya de yis tshim par byed//reg bya sna tsho/
400b4(rgyud): snang ba yang //reg bya'i dngos po yong med//reg byar snang ba ling spyod yin//bde ba chen po chos kyi sku//mi shes phyin ci log rnams kyis//dbang po yul la chags 'gyur na//
400b5(rgyud): rtog tu 'dod dang mi 'bral zhing //ngan song gsum dang mi khom brgyad//rtsu ba sogs ma'i me bzhin du//khams gsum dag tu 'khor bar 'gyur//dra bas ye shes tshogs
400b6(rgyud): med rtogs//byas la mi stsogs bsod nams byis//kun la spyod cing mi gas pas//ye shes chen po rtag tu sboms//mnyam pa lnga zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni don dam skye ba med
400b7(rgyud): par mnyam po dang /kun rdzob sgyu mar mnyam po dang /don dam pa dang kun rdzob tu dbyer med par mnyam pa dang /chen po lnga de bzhin gshegs pa lngar mnyam pa dang /rnam
401a1(rgyud): par shes pa brgyad ye shes lngar mnyam pa'o//de la don dam par skye ba med par mnyam pa ni//chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun//de bzhin nyid dang stong //
401a2(rgyud): pa'i mtha'//yang dag pa dang chos kyi dbyings//mtshan nyid med cing dmigasu med//gzung du med cing smon pa med//ye nas mya ngan 'das pa yin//thams cad na mkha'i mtshan/
401a3(rgyud): nyid/na mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med//kun rdzob sgyu mar mnyam pa dang //'dus byas dngos po sna tshogs ni//sgyu ma'i tshul du thams cad snang //'phral gyi bya ba kun kyang byed//
401a4(rgyud): rtog pa kun gyi mtshan ma snang //'di dag thams cade gzugs brnyan te//bya byed snang zhing dngos po med//chu zla 'i tshul du thams cad gnas//thams cad snang la rang bzhin
401a5(rgyud): med//don dam kun rdzob dbyer med na//chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun//gzhi rtsa med las thams cad 'byung //yod dang med pa gnyi ga min//don dem kun rdzob
401a6(rgyud): dbyer med//'dus ma byas nyid 'dus byas snang //snang ba nyid na dngos po med//dngos med de nyid sna tshogs te//de nyid sgyu ma mig yor tshul//'byung ba chen po lnga de bzhin /
401a7(rgyud): gshegs pa ldir mnyam pa ni//sa chu mo rlung na mkha' las//ya mtshan sna tshogs 'byung 'gyur ba//gzhi rtsa yod pa mi yi na te/rang bzhin dang gos de ltar 'byung //sau ri
401b1(rgyud): /rlobs tshogs snang ba ni//thabs chen dag tu rtag tu mnyam//mtshan nyid so sor gnas pa ni//she sA raH dbyings kyi dang du mnyam//rnam par shes pa brgyad ye shes lngar mnyam pa ni/rnam
401b2(rgyud): rtog kun gzhi ma yin pa//rang bzhin med pa don gyi gzhi//'di ni chos kyi dbyings zhes bya//de bzhin nyid kyi ye she so//chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun//nga dang bdag tu mi 'dzin
401b3(rgyud): cing //kun kyang dbyer med pa yin pas//thams cad me long lta bu'i tshul//thams cad kun la yud rtog cing //rtog dang dag par bya ba med//dus gdum kun tu mi dmigs pa//'di//
401b4(rgyud): ni mnyam nyid ye shes yin//log rtogs dbang po'i spyod yul spangs//dbang po'i yul rnams dngos med par//thams cad dbyer med de bzhin nyid//so sor rtog pa'i ye shes
401b5(rgyud): yin//mnyam pa rnam lnga de ltar brtags//chos rnams ma lus thams cad la//ye nas rang bzhin med pa dang //thabs chen lhun gyis grub par rtags//'di ni yang dag rtogs pa
401b6(rgyud): yin//tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni//bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs te//rang rig mtha' dbus med pa'i dkyil//ye shes bzhi 'phro 'khor lo'i tshul/
401b7(rgyud): yang na rdo rje sems dpa' nyid//rigs bzhi'i lha dang lha mo dang //'khor gyi khro bo khro mo dang //yang na 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid//'jig rten tshogs 'khor yi no//tshogs kyi
402a1(rgyud): mchod pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni//thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur cing //byang chub sems dang ma chags pa'i//gnyisu med par thim gyur na//tshogs chen
402a2(rgyud): gnyis kyang rdzogs par ldan//'dod yon lnga po thams cad dang //sna tshogs snang ba thams cad kun//de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang //gzugs mdzes lha dang lha
402a3(rgyud): mor brtags//thams cad ma lus sgra rnams ni//chos kyi gru chen yin pa dang //dran song sbyong zhing thar lam ston//stong gsum grag pa'i sgra chen dang //thams cad 'jal ba'i sgra
402a4(rgyud): yang yin//bde ba tshi ma byed bsod nams te//brjod med mi gnas ye shes yin//'di ni chags med pad+ma'i gsung chos nyid dngos po med pa la//dri yis mchog tu
402a5(rgyud): tshim byed pa//bsod nams tshogs chen yin par bshad//chags med ye shes tshul yin te//de bzhin dri yis mnyes mchod na//rigs 'dzin sa rnams bskul bar
402a6(rgyud): 'gyur//ngan song gsum du chos kyi dri//kun tu bde gnas thob par byed//bder gshegs dkyil 'khor ma lus pa//bde ba'i ro yis mchod par 'gyur//tshi mi byed bsod
402a7(rgyud): nams tshogs chen 'gyur//dngos por mi 'dzin bsod nams tshogs//de lta bu yi ro mchog gis//thams cad kun la tshim par 'gyur//yi dgas dan du lo spyod ljon//
402b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor ma lus mchod pa yin//bde ba chen po rdzogs pa'o//rnal 'byor la su rung rnams kyis rnam pa mang pos brgyan pa dang /sbyor mchod dag gis longs spyod na//dkyang/
402b2(rgyud): 'khor bas ma yas lhun grub 'gyur//bde chen dkyil 'khor 'bar gyur nas//sdig pa'i mun nag sel bar byed//dpung gi tshogs kyis mi thub pa'i//mthu chen drug kyang 'grub
402b3(rgyud): par byed//tshogs kyi phrin las zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni//byed pa med pa'i tshul gyis ni//kun la thogs pa med par spyad//thams cad ma lus 'dul bar byed//mi mthun phyogs
402b4(rgyud): nas dbang du byed//yon tan chen po 'phel bar byed//khro bo gtum pa'ang zhi bar byed//thams cad kun la spyad bde bo//chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas//dbyingasu bsdus
402b5(rgyud): pas dkyil yin te//'phro 'du mang po'i 'khor gyis bskor//mnyam pa chen po'i nga nyid ni//de lta bu yi tshul du gnas//'khor gyi 'phra men tshim byed ces bya ba'i dam tshad
402b6(rgyud): ni/bdag nyid 'dul ba'i dbang phyug tu//rtag tu mnyam bzhag khro bo'i tshul//'khor gyi khro rnams de bzhin to//mdog dang phyag rgya thams cad dang //sngags mchog dam pa
402b7(rgyud): ma lus 'don//de nas 'phra min 'khor bsdus nas//so so'i las dang 'thun byas te//so so'i gan su bzhag par bya//dbang du bsdu dang bsgom pa'i thabs//ji ltar 'tsham pa bzhin
403a1(rgyud): du bya//ma lus thams cad byos shog par//lhag ma byin nas dbang yang bskur//gzhan yang 'gro ba thams cad la//'dod yon lnga yi sbyin pa gtang //
403a2(rgyud): de nas las rnams rdzogs byas nas//dbang phyug chen po'i gnas brtan nas//rigs lnga ye shes lnga la sogs//'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa//bdag la thams cad bsdu bar//
403a3(rgyud): bya//de ltar bsgrub pa'i drang 'chang ba/ye shes tshogs gnyis rdzogs byas nus//rig 'dzin rig pa'i sa la gnas//theg dman spyod pa'i yong mi 'gyur//mi khom gnasu skye mi
403a4(rgyud): 'gyur//skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung thob//sangs rgyas zhing yang sbyong bar byed//ngan song gnas rnams stongs par byed//yang dag mchog gi snying po 'grub//dbang po yul du
403a5(rgyud): snang ba kun//yul rnams yod pa ma yin te//kun gzhi rnam par shes pa nyid//dngos po sna tshogs ber snang ste//snang ba'i dngos po rnams bshig na//so so'i mtshan nyid rnam
403a6(rgyud): bi shig nas//gzhigs na na mkha'i ngang du zhi//nam mkha' de nyid lngas gzhigs na//mtshan nyid med pa'i dbyingasu thim//thams cad kun gyi 'byung gnaso//gzhi rtsa med pa'i skad
403a7(rgyud): gcig ma//snang ba mi 'gog thabs yin te//rang bzhin med pa shes rab nyid//nyon mongs rnam par shes pa ni//kun gzhi nyid snang spyad yul la//nga dang bdag tu rnam par rtogs//
403b1(rgyud): bde sdug mtshon ma so sor 'dzin//kun gzhi dngos po med pa la//bag chags stsogs pa'i gnas med//snang ba'i dngos po med pa la//nyan mongs blo yis blang du med//sgo dang bsgo bar
403b2(rgyud): bya ba med//de ltar sgo byed dngos po med//med bzhin sems kyis log brtags pa//khams gsum durtson rA rtag tu 'khor//yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni//snang dang mi snang gnyi ga la//skad
403b3(rgyud): cig yud tsam rtog par yin//rtog pa nyid kyang ma 'grub na//yul gyi dngos po ga la 'grub//yid kyi de bzhin rgyun nyid ni//snga ma 'das shing mi dmigs pa//phyi ma ma byung brtags tu med/
403b4(rgyud): de ltar rang bzhin dmigasu med//rtsi shing kha na rlung 'phyo 'dra//rgyud ni yongasu ma chad pa//'di ni kun tu 'byung ba yin//de ltar don rnams dngos po meng //chu dong rlung dang rlabs 'dra ba//de
403b5(rgyud): gsum gcig dang so so min//de bzhin kun gzhi nyon mongs ying //gcig pa ma yin so so min//chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i dbyings//thams cad ye shes dbyer mod cing //
403b6(rgyud): gcig tu yang ni brjod pa med//de ltar ma rtogs sems can yin//rtogs na sangs rgyas gud na med//byang chub sems kyi de bzhin ni//shin tu mi dmigs brtag dka' ba//yangs
403b7(rgyud): la rgya che gtong zab pa//shes rab zab pas rtogs 'gyur te//gang nas ma 'ongs gar mi 'gro/'ong dang 'gro bar bya ba min//shin tu brtag dka' mi dmigs pa//mtha' dang dbus
404a1(rgyud): gan //rlung 'ad rgyu //migs sang tshul dud sna spyod//ngas dadu sa kya sa //nga /ldan nas dran
404a2(rgyud): / sa s+ho myed pa de/ / slo rgyam smra ma
404a3(rgyud): drug pa mchags par//nyon mings la ma lis rmil byed cing //byam kyi dag gis menyes par gyi //de bzhini 'khor ba'i btsun ra la//snying rje'i zhugs pa cher babyung nag
404a4(rgyud): songs 'dum nas 'dren par byed//snying rje chen po sgyu ma byed//de bzhin sgyu phyul rnams la//las kyi sgrib pa bya mi gos shing //thams cad mngon par sangs rgyas pa/
404a5(rgyud): bdag la 'byed pa med/ tshon dang bye na ma la//blogs rnaMs ni nyi rgyun po'i byed// ga cig 'dri bar tshwa blanan bya/thams cad dri ma med par bya//chos rnams thams
404a6(rgyud): da stod pa d+hi//de la dngos dang rten pa med//dge la rdo rdzing du nas 'o/ ni 'i skyed dum pa/sa rnams thams cad mtshan nyid med//snang ba thams cad dngas
404a7(rgyud): 'di ngos//seMd dang med pathams cad bum/khotshan nyid med pa sa mi dmig sa/'jig rten 'das kyim rten pa//ches rnams sna tshogs snang po dang //dgalas
404b1(rgyud): pa ma yin pas//kun la smon cing chagasu med//byang chub sems rnams thams cad ni//shin tu rtags dka' gting zab pas//rtog ge'i spyod yul de ma yin//ma dmigs mi dmi
404b2(rgyud): dmigasu med//sems nyid de nyid ji lta bu//byang chub de nyid sems yi no//sems dang byang chub dbyer med pas//sems can ma lus thams cad dang //dus gsum chos rnams
404b3(rgyud): thams cad yin//thams cad ma lus cho so cig/sems dang byang chub nyid du 'ub//bo d+hi chen pos de skad bshad//skyes bu blo rtsal rab ldan pas//ci la'ang thogs pa med
404b4(rgyud): par spyad//spyad pa nyid na chags pa myed//dus mtha' med par ma nyams gnas//'di ltar snang ba thams cad la//mngon sum tshad masna rtag mthong yang //snang ba nyid na dngos
404b5(rgyud): po mdo//de bzhin yang dag nyid du rtogs//gang zhig stong pa'i ngang yod ces//med pa'i rang bzhin rtogs pa de//ri bong rA dang mo sham bu//tshig tsam gdag su rung mod kyi//thams
404b6(rgyud): cad ming tsam stong nyid med//thams cad ma lus stong zhes ste//dran med brdos pa ma yin pas//rtogs med rang bzhin 'od gsal zhing //'di ltar snang ba thams cad kun//brdos
404b7(rgyud): pa tsam gyi chos medo//shes pa 'ba' zhig kho na'o//thams cad gnyis med rtogs gyur na//de nyid don dam dbyings yin te//gzhan nas btsal zhing gzhag tu med//yod las
405a1(rgyud): btsal na smr-i btags 'gyur//med lus btsal na bskur btab ste//yod med gnyis las btsal byas na//de ni lung du ma bstan 'gyur//rnam par rtog pa
405a2(rgyud): mi mnga' ste//de yis mi mkhyen ci yang med//rnal 'byor lta ba de lta bu//tshig gis lnga phyi yod mod kyang //don gyis cig char rdzogs par bsgoms//de lta bu'i don rtogs
405a3(rgyud): kyang //'gro nyal 'dug sdod longs spyad kyang //theb chen sgom las nyams pa med//gong gi don ltar ma rtogs pa'i//blo ngan mnyam par khungs phyung nas//ma rtogs la
405a4(rgyud): lo sgom las byas//don ma grub par ngan song 'gro/sems kyis mnyam par ma rtogs na//tshig gis mnyam pas sangs mi rgya//de bas don tshig ldan par byos//'on
405a5(rgyud): tang the tshom med par 'grub//rnal 'byor don chen rtogs pa yis//dus mtha' mod par de ltar bsgom//yon tan na mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam//spyod yul sangs rgyas nyid
405a6(rgyud): du cig/rtag tu bsod nams tshigs tshon ldan//bya byed med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis//des ni byang chub snying po len//zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu'o//rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul
405a7(rgyud): dra ba las dbang po dang yul du 'dus pa bsten pa'i le'u ste bdun cu rtsa bdun pa'o////de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las
405b1(rgyud): sngags 'chang rnams don yod par bya ba'i phyir thams cad phyag rgyar 'dus shing phyi nang snod bcud thams cad la 'di ltar brtags shing phyag rgya'i dam tshig bsrung ba dang /dam tshig
405b2(rgyud): ni gnas yin//phyag rgya bsdus shing spros pa yang 'di yin te//ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do//gsang ba de nyid kho na las//byang chub mchog 'di bstan pa'o//mnyam pa chen po'i
405b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor ni//phyogs bcu dus bzhi ma lus pa'i//'das dang ma 'das thams cad kun//yaM nas dbyer med de bzhin nyid//mnyam dang mi mnyam bya ba min//de bzhin nyid kyi
405b4(rgyud): ngang du 'ub//'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i//brjod pa ma lus thams cad kun//chos nyid dang las ma rtogs pa//logs rtogs nyan mongs rdul tsam med//phyag rgya sna tshoDa
405b5(rgyud): 'od 'bar yang //de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos te//bdag nyid dbyangs las mi gzhan phyir//mnyam la mnyam par gnas pa yi//rnam gsum tshal gyis bsgom byos shing //
405b6(rgyud): phyag rgya skyed cing log 'dul ba//bya byed med pa'i tshul gyi su//las rnams ma lus rdzogs par byed//de ltar rtogs shing rigs kyi mchog/bdag nyid phyag rgya kun gyi bdag/ye
405b7(rgyud): nonas rang bzhin 'od gsale bas//byang chub skye 'khrung rgyu yang yin//'bras bu yang dag nyid du'o//rgyu 'bras dbyer med rdo rje'i sa//bcu gsum don grub de gnas pa//mthar phyin
406a1(rgyud): gang la'ang mi gnas pa'o//rang bzhin phyag rgya chen po ni//phyi nang snod bcud thams cad kun//thams cad shes rab dang du gnas//rigs lnga bder gshegs/
406a2(rgyud): yab yum du//ma bcos ye nas de ltar gnas//thabs dang shes rab nyid la rol//bde mini ma chags tshogs chen po//yang dag nyid la rab tu rdzogs//lhag pa'i phyag
406a3(rgyud): rgya chen po ni//nang gi rtags ni phyir byung ste//mdor bsdus phyag rgya chen po dang //gzhan yang phyag rgya sna tshogs pa//lag gi 'du 'phro bsam yas dang //yan lag stabs
406a4(rgyud): chen bskul bsigs kun//nyid kyi dbyings las ma g.yos kyang //rang bzhin nyid kyis de ltar gnas//'joms shing cis kyang mi tshugs pa//rang byung chen po lha yi
406a5(rgyud): lha//thams cad kun la 'bigs par byed//dpa' bo zhes kyang gdags par bya'o//las dang las kyis mi gos pa//gnyis med dbyings kyi don rtogs shing //mchags
406a6(rgyud): pa la chags pa dang //shin tu rnam par dgu pa yi//de bzhin nyid dbyings dkyil 'khor la//sku gsung thugs ldan zad mi shes//yon tan mI zad gter du 'gyur//gzhi ni mi
406a7(rgyud): zad par ldan pa'o//sku gsung las rnams rdzogs byed pa'o//rnam par rtog med tshul gyis ni//thams cad kun la chags med rol//'dul ba'i don lan bsam mi khyab//
406b1(rgyud): 'joms dang ma chags kun 'byung dang //thams cad dbang spras don 'grub pa//ma lus kun 'dus rnam par dag/kun nas zlum zhing 'od zer 'phro//rigs bzhi ma lus thams cad kun//
406b2(rgyud): mnyam rdzogs dbyingasu thams cad 'dus//rigs rnams gcig med gcig pa ste//lha ni grub dkyil 'khor dang nyid du//phyag rgya'i dam tshig mtshan nyid ni//thugs kyi rtag su bstan
406b3(rgyud): pa yin//dper na rgyal pos rgyas btab na//sems can kun gyis yong mi 'da'//de bzhin mnyam nyid phyag rgya yin//kun la khyab cing thams cad snang //sku gsung thugs kyi rgyus
406b4(rgyud): btab ni//bdud dang mu stegs mang po kun//mi mthun phyogs kyis dbang byar med//rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs nges na//'di lta bu la rtag tu gnas//de lta bu'i blo med na//rdo rje
406b5(rgyud): rigasu yang mi bshad//gsang ba'i snying po de kho ni nyid nges pa las phyag rgya'i dam tshig gi le'u ste bdun cu brgyad pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po
406b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la bsang sngags kyi rgyal po brtan par gzung ba 'di che du brjod do//rgyu kye phyogs bcu dus bzhi rang bzhin 'di//de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid//
406b7(rgyud): gzung 'dzin spros la 'chel ba yi//rnam rtogs zhags pas so sor zin//sa rnams khyad par bkod po yang //gsang ba'i snying por 'gro ba'i lam//ye shes ngo mtshar rab
407a1(rgyud): 'byam gyus//don du mi 'gyur yong ma gsung //de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis//phyag rgya gsang tshon stong po 'di//rtogs nas smra bar byed pa glang //
407a2(rgyud): nyid nga yin dbang yang rdzogs//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la//gsang ba 'di las gzhan mi mnga'//sgro dang skur bzhi ba yi//gsang ba'i snying po de kho na//de nyid nges
407a3(rgyud): pa'i dbyings las phyung //de ni nges par lung bstan te//sras ni thugs las skyes pa yin//sa rab rig pa 'dzin las de nas zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
407a4(rgyud): cad dbyer med par dgyes nas dus gzhi mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings sku gsung thugs kyi lhun stug po bkod pa'i brgyan nyid zhug so//gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa
407a5(rgyud): las yongasu gzung ba'i le'u ste bdun cu dgu pa'o////'phags pa'i rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i stong phrag brgya pa las mtshan nyid dang rgyud thams cad kyi lung gi spyi///
407a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges po'i le'u lis thams cad ma lus par spros te 'khor lo bskor ba de dag gi 'bras
407a7(rgyud): bu mchog/gsang ba chen po 'di yod par//me mar mun gyi dongs 'bogs shing //spu gri so ni gtams las kyang //'dzegs nas buM dag 'gro bar byos//khong na gnas pa'i
407b1(rgyud): yang khong na//lcags kyi sgrom bu kha bsdu ma//thams cad la yang me long bzhin//bltas kyang gzugs brnyan mo snang //ye shes 'phrul gyi sgo mig gas//rdo rje tha mas d+ham phywa dang /
407b2(rgyud): yid bzhin rin chen gtIr byung ba//bskul ldan mchog gis spyad du gsol//yi ga kun la mi snang zhing //bla me'i thugs la gnas pa ni//sbrul ldan mchog ga spyod su mohUM/
407b3(rgyud): kun dang thun mong de ma yin//dper na seng ge'i 'o ma ni//gser gyi phyis dus 'dzin 'gyur gyi//snong gzhan dag tu byugs pa ni//snod kyang 'chag la 'o ma yang 'pho//yang gis
407b4(rgyud): gser gyi rang bzhin la//dbyibs kyi khyad par cir yang snang //gser las gyur pa rdul tsam med//de bzhin chos kyi mtshan nyid kyang //mtshan ma sna tshogs cir snang yang //nyid
407b5(rgyud): las gyur pa rdul tsam med//gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las chos nyid kun tu mi 'gyur bar bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad cu pa rdzog so////'phags pa thabs
407b6(rgyud): gyi zhags pa pad+mo'i phreng zhes bya//dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshalo//'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng gi don bsdus pa/de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun
407b7(rgyud): rig rnam par snang mjedzod la bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas rig pa'i byin rlabs las byung ba'i mchod pa rgya yongasu ma chad pa'i gzhal yas khang dang /bla bras
408a1(rgyud): dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /bdugs dang /sgeg mo la sogs pa nang gi mchod pa bzhi dang /bdug spos la sogs pa phyi'i mchod pa bzhis mchod
408a2(rgyud): de/lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas so so ma yin pa'i rig pa'i 'dud pas phyag 'tshal te spyan sngar 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kyis dus
408a3(rgyud): gsum du bshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyod yul nyan thos dang thun mong me lags pa thabs
408a4(rgyud): gang gis rtogs pa de tshe 'di nyid la thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang thob pa'i don du ba sha du gsol/de skad ces gsol pa dang /cang mi gsung bar 'dzum pa
408a5(rgyud): mdzad de//'di skad ces bka' stsal to//sems dpa' chen po nyon cig/dron 'di dang phyo nang gi tshes thams cad 'dra ste bden pa gnyisu 'duso//bden pa gnyis la yang
408a6(rgyud): tshul 'di ltar shes par bya'o//bden gnyis rgyu dang 'bras bu'i tshul//de bzhin nyid la gnas byas nas//phyi nang snod bcud rnam par dag/byed spyod thams cad tshogs
408a7(rgyud): gnyis 'gyur//pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs pa ste//sa bcu rim gyis baM skrod pa la//mnyam nyid rig pa'i rdo rje yis//sa rnams mnyam pa nyid du sbyor//rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes kyis
408b1(rgyud): chos kun sgyu mar rig du'i phyir//dngos dang dngos myod bag chags bskyogs//yang na yo shos mo zhes bya//rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rnam smon no//yod mon rgyu 'bras 'thun par 'brub//ngo bzhin mnyam
408b2(rgyud): nyid ye shes kyis//rig pos chog su 'gyur bas so//lam gyi nang na nye lam bde rjongs pa//thabs kyi nang ni ma nor dam pa ste//bsgrubs na tshe 'dis sangs rgyas chu ba yang //blad dang med pa'i
408b3(rgyud): sku gsum rdo rjes thog//'phags pa thabs kyis zhags pa pad+mo phreng las bden pa gnyis bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o////sems dpa' chen pos dam tshig 'di dag ni bdag dang
408b4(rgyud): zhan la phan pa'i phyir ngas pa shA //gti mug zhu sbyang da kyil dang //'dod chags phrag do'i chen po ni//bsrung ba med pa'i sdom pa n+dan//de ni dam tshig rdo rje yin//'jigs pa thabs
408b5(rgyud): kyis zhags pa pad+mo phreng las dam tshig bsten pa'i li'u ste gnyis pa'o////sems dpa' chen po dbang 'di dag ni rang rig pa'i rtsal gyis 'thob//thabs dang shes rab dbang chen
408b6(rgyud): /rdo rje dril bu rig pas 'dzin//mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba yi//chos la 'dod bzhin dbang byed do//'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phrad las dbang gi le'u ste gsum pa'o//
408b7(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po mchod pa'i mchog ni 'di ltar rig par bya'o//bdag mtshad kun mnyes thams cad 'drangs//kun la phan pa'i sman yin te//rnal 'byor bdag nyid chen po las/
409a1(rgyud): thams cad bza' zhing brgyan par bya//'phags pa thabs kyi zhugs pa pad+mo p+tang las mchod pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o///kun tu 'od kyis las 'das//pad+ma
409a2(rgyud): spyan du gyur pa na//rig pa'i byin rlabs chen po las//rang 'byung dkyil 'du 'phro yi tshul//yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen to//mtshan dang dpe byad kun las grol//rngam zhing gtum pa'i
409a3(rgyud): gzugs can dang //mgyogs ma mgyogs ma'i pho nyar ldan//de ni thig le rdo rje yin//'di zhes gang zag bdag med par//rtogs par bya phyir ngas bshad//mkhas pas del 'byor
409a4(rgyud): par gyis//'phags pa thabs kyis zhags pa pad+mo phreng ting 'dzin gyis dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o///sems dpa' chen po spyod yul thams cad ni 'di ltar rig par
409a5(rgyud): bya'o//chen po lnga yang de bzhin gshags//gcig la'ang lnga lngar rig par gyis//khams gsum bdag nyid yin pa ste//sku gsung thugs kyang de la bya//ye shes lnga dang 'gro
409a6(rgyud): bo lnga//mnyam pas so so dbyer med de//sngags dang phyag rgya dbang bsgyur nas//spyod yul kun tu maN+Dal//'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las gzugs brnyan gyi
409a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste drug pa'o////sems dpo' chen po zhes rdo rje sems dpa' thos nas bshad//rgyal ba'i rgyal ba rnams kyi sku//sna tshogs cir yang snang mod kyi/
409b1(rgyud): kun tu rin chen lta bu ste//don dang las yin bsgoms pas 'grub//dbu mig rna ba sna lce la//oM zhes bya ba lnga bzhag ste//gtso bo lnga dang gtso mo lnga//sbyor ba'i tshul du bsgoms par bya/
409b2(rgyud): log pa g.yas pa'i ser mo le//hUM zhes bya ba lnga bzhag ste//sems dpa' lnga dang sems ma lha//sbyor ba'i tshul du sgom par bya//lag pa g.yon pa'o ser mo le//traM zhes bya ba
409b3(rgyud): lnga bzhag ste//sems dpa' lnga dang sems ma lde//sbyor ba'i tshul du bsgom par bya//rkang pa gson po'i sor mo la//hrIHzhes bya ba lnga bzhag ste//sems dpa' lnga dang sems
409b4(rgyud): ma lnga//sbyor ba'i tshul du bsgoms par bya//rkang pa g.yos pa'i sor mo la//a zhes bya ba lnga bzhag ste//sems dpa' ldi dang sems ma lnga//sbyor ba'i tshul du bsgoms par bya//
409b5(rgyud): 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las lha'i mtshan nyid dang dkyil 'khor dgod pa'i rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o////sems dpa' chen po nyon cig ces
409b6(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' bos nas bashrad//rnal 'byor rig 'dzin mar ldan pas//lnga zhing lnga dang 'byor pa yi//tshom bu lnga yi lha bsgoms na//thams cad bdag nyid chen por 'gyur//
409b7(rgyud): rin chen pad+ma'i dkyil 'jam 'di//'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'bul lags kyis//dgyes pa'i rdo rje rab gsor nas//byang chub sems sprin dbab par gsol//rdo rje gsor ba'i
410a1(rgyud): dgra' mchog 'di//'dzum zhing 'khyil ba'i gnasu gsor//mi dmigs bde dang 'pho ba ni//rdo rje 'dzin mar ldan las byung //rnal 'byor rig 'dzin mar ldan
410a2(rgyud): pas//na bza' dang ni zhal zas rnams//grub pa'i rdzasu dbang bskur nas//gsol na dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur//rnal 'byor rig 'dzin mar ldan pos//klu dang tshig gi sgra
410a3(rgyud): rnams yin//gsung gi ngo bor byin rlabs te//bsgrags na dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur//rnal 'byor rig 'dzin mar ldan pas//bro dang gar gyis bskyod byas te//'od kyi 'du
410a4(rgyud): 'phro byin gyis rlabs//dngos grub mchog kyang 'thob par 'gyur//'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phyeng las dngos grub bsgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o///
410a5(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung //oM badz+ra bai ro tsa na oM//oM satwa badz+ra hUM/oM ra da na badz+ra traM/oM d+harma badz+ra hrIH/oM karma
410a6(rgyud): badz+ra a/oM badz+ra a k+Sho b+h+yaHhUM/oM badz+rI satwa hU~M/oM badz+ra rA dza hUM/oM badz+ra rA ga hUM/oM badz+ra sA d+hu hUM/oM badz+ra rad nAM saM b+hA badz+dza/oM badz+ra rAd nA traM/oM badz+dzi sur+yA traM/aM
410a7(rgyud): badz+ra d+h+wa dza traM/oM badz+ra hA si tri/oM badz+ra a mr-i tA b+hA hU~M/oM badz+ra tik+Sh+Na hrIH/oM badz+ra tsakr-i hrIH/oM badz+ra pA sha hrIHoM badz+ra a ma~M g+ha si d+hi ha/oM badz+ra karma ha/oM be dz+ra rak+Shaha/
410b1(rgyud): d+hAl na chu/oM bad+d+hA n+na hA/ha~Mbat+tA shUr+ya d+hA d+hA/oM badz+ra dudad+hamUHnA d+hA/oM bad+hAm+b+ha ma ts+tsha/mab+h+yadz+dza ban d+hA na sin+naH/mo badz+ras ma sa twArAH/oM bad+d+hAn+ta
410b2(rgyud): hUM/oM bad+d+ha d+hu paM hUM/oM badz+ra oM kr-i sha hU~M/oM badz+ra dwe shwa re b+h+yaHdaM hU~M/oM badz+ra ma laM traM/oM badz+ra pr-iSh+mi traM/oM badz+ra pAM shA trUM/oM badz+ra rad na rAtI trAM/oM badz+ra grA N+yai hrI/oM badz+ra
410b3(rgyud): I lo kamoM badz+ra s+tho tam+b+hiH/oM badz+ri ni d+h+ye hA/ai badz+re gaun d+haM hAM/oM dadz+r-i g+h+nAn Duh+Na/oM badz+ro ti he/oM badz+re mUSh+Ti hUM/oM badz+re muSh+NI tr-i/oM badz+ra maSh+Ti hU~M/oM bar+d+ha
410b4(rgyud): muSh+NIhi/'jigs pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo pUng las sngags kyi le'u skye dgu pa'o////sems dpa' chen po nyin cig ces rdo rje sems dpa' la bris nas bshad//
410b5(rgyud): lha dad lha mo'i ngang nyid du//yan lag lnga la 'byor pas ni//bskyod pa thams cing phyag rgya yin//de skad dpa' bos bka' stsal to//de la phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ni//thabs
410b6(rgyud): dang shes rab dang nyid du//lag gi 'du byed bsgoms nas ni//thal mo dam sbyar rtse bsnol gshibs//rdo rje thal mor bka' stsal to//sor mo nang du bsnol nos bkan//gung
410b7(rgyud): 'dzub mthe bo mthe chung rnams//so sor rtsi spyad phyir bskyed do//srin lag gshings bsgreng dam tshig rgyu//rkang sor g.yas kyis g.yon pa mnan//lag mthil g.yas kyis
411a1(rgyud): nayon du mnan//mthe bo rtsu spyad pang du blang //rnam par snang mdzad rgya chen yon//rdo rje khu tshur byabyangs pa las//g.yas kyi 'dzub myo g.yon gyis bzung //
411a2(rgyud): tshogs pas gcig la cog bzung ba//'di ni sbyor ba'i rgya mchog go//mthe bo gnyis dang mthe bo chung ba nyoso//so sor rtse sprang zlum po ste//lhag ma 'od 'phro rnyed phye ba//mi
411a3(rgyud): bskyod pa yi phyag rgya yin//rting sprad gung mo rtse sbyor te//'dzub mo tshigs bcag gung la sbyar//srin mthob rtse sprad mthe chung ste//rin chen 'byung ba'i phyag rgya yino//gung
411a4(rgyud): 'dzub srin log rtse sprad do//mthe chung ngos la sbyor bar bya//mthe bo rtse sprad zlum po ste//snang ba mtha' yas phyag rgya yin//thal mo sbyar nas so sor sprang //bskyod nas
411a5(rgyud): 'khor lo ltar byas te//glog gi phreng bas 'khor bar bya//don yod grub pa'i phyag rgya yin//phyag rgya'i rgyal po 'di dog no//thugs kar cing zhing nyid du mos//'du 'phro sgrol zhing
411a6(rgyud): mkha' la dgro'o//las dang thun ming nyid du bshad//rdo rje dril bu bzung nas ni//thugs kar rang ni dgur bstan nas//bcu thabs zur gyis lta ba ni//rdo rje sems dpe'i rgya
411a7(rgyud): chen yin//lag pa bsnol nas khu tshur bcang //gung mo gnyis ni brkyang bar bya//'dzub mo lcags kyu ltar byas pa//rdo rje rgyal po rgya chen yin//lag pa khu tshur
411b1(rgyud): bcangs pa la//g.yon gyi 'theb 'jub rtse sprad de//g.yas kyi gung mo brgyad nas gdeng //rdo rje 'dod pa'i rgya chen yin//lag pa gnyis kyi sor mo rnams//so so'i gung mo tshogs dang
411b2(rgyud): por//ngos bzhi nas ni rtse mo gzugs//rdo rje legs pa'i rgya chen yin//rting sbyar gung mo'i rtse sprad de//thob 'dzub srin lag chags bcag ste//drug char rtse sprang mtha chung
411b3(rgyud): sbas//rdo rje rin chen rgya chen yin//mthe bo mthe chung rtse sprad nas//lu gu rgyud du sbrel bar bya//lhag ma 'od ltar byas pa ni//rdo rje nyi ma'i rgya chen yin//lag ngar g.yon pa
411b4(rgyud): bsgreng nas mi//rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las//g.yas pa gru mor gzung bar bya//rdo rje rgyal mtshan rgya chen yin//g.yon gyi steng du g.yas bzhag nas//sor mo'i tshogs bcag
411b5(rgyud): sprad byas te//kha ye thAd ker bzung bar bya//rdo rje bzhad pa'i rgyu chen yan//g.yon gyi sor mo'i rtse rnams yin//ma phrad tsam du bsdus pa las//g.yas kyis 'byed pa ltar
411b6(rgyud): byas pa//rdo rje chos kyi rgya chen yin//g.yas kyi lag ngar bsgreng ba la//mthe bo mthe chung rtse sprad de//lhag ma gsum yang bsgreng bar bya//g.yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten pa//
411b7(rgyud): rdo rje rnon po'i rgya chen yin//lag brgya gram rtse bsnol nas//mtho ngos gnyis kyi rtse spang ngo de//bskar ba lta bur byas pa ni//rdo rje 'khor lo'i rgya chen yin//sor mo nang du bsnol
412a1(rgyud): ba las gung mau hUM spyang 'dzub sbyar to//mtho bos gung mo mnan pa ni//rdo rje smra ba'i rgyu chen yin//lag pa'i 'khrig ma bsnol ba las//gung mo gnyis kyi
412a2(rgyud): tshigs dang por//ngos bzhir sa yi so ma brtan//rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya yin//lag pa gnyis kyi sor mo rnams//phan tshun thagasu btags pa las//mthe bo gnyis ni bsgreng
412a3(rgyud): bar bya//rdo rje gsung ba'i phyag rgya yin//rdo rje khu tshur bcangs po las//'dzub mo gnyis ni bsgreng nas kyang //kha 'gram gnyisu bzung bar bya//rdo rje gnod sbyin rgya chen yin//
412a4(rgyud): rdo rje khu chur bcangs pa las//bsnol te kha ni sbyar nas kyang //thugs kar dam du gzung bar bya//rdo rje khu tshur rgya chen yin//rigs kyi phyag rgya bsgoms nas ni//lag gi 'du
412a5(rgyud): shes 'di dag gis//'du 'phro mos po bskyed nos ni//bcing zhing mkha' la dgrol bar bya//mthe bo mthe chung nang du spang //gung mo rtse sbyar bzhi yang sgreng //rdo rje 'dzin
412a6(rgyud): ltar snying sprad pa//rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya yin//rting skyur 'theb 'dzub rtse sbyar te//'dzub mo'i mig tu mthe chung drang //lhag ma rtse gsum ltar byas pa//rdo rje spyan gyi
412a7(rgyud): phyag rgya yin//lag dar g.yon pa bsgreng nas kyang //sor mo ut+pal ltar byas po//g.yas kyi sor mo gzung bar bya//rdo rje sgrol ma'i phyag rgya yin//rkang pa gnyis kyi pus
412b1(rgyud): mau dang //lag pa gnyis kyi gru mo rnams//sprad nas lag pa gdengs pa na//kun tu bzang mo'i phyag rgya yin//rdo rje khu tshur dkur brten nas//ldan pa gla ya su bye ba las//chags pa'o/
412b2(rgyud): mig gis lta ba ni//rdo rje sgeg mo'i phyag rgya yin//g.yon pa skong skong po byas te//g.yas pas gru mo bzung nas kyang //dkor zhing sor mo 'phro ba ni//rdo rje gdug pa'i phyag rgya
412b3(rgyud): yin//lag pa gnyis ni rgyab sbyar nas//rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las//mtho chung sbrel nas 'dzub mo sbrang //rdo rje lcags kyu ma yi rgya//mthe chung lu gu rgyud du sbrel//sor mo
412b4(rgyud): rnams ni so sor bsgreng //thal mo bkan te lta ba nIni//rdo rje sgrol ma'i phyag rgya yin//srin lag dang ni mthe bo gnyis//so sor rtse mo spyad pa las//'phral po'i thad kar drangs pa
412b5(rgyud): yi//rdo rje phreng ba'i phyag rgya yin//'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las phyag rgya'i le'u ste bcu pa'o////de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha dang lha mo rnams la phyag na

419a7(rgyud): tu brdabs pa ni//rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya yin//lag pa g.yos g.yon mthe bo yis//mthe'u chung sen mo'i mthil du gnan//gdangs pa'i thabs bsgreng ba ni//dbrug
419b1(rgyud): sngon can gyis phyag rgya yin//lag pa g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyis//rdeg pa'i thab su gdengs pa dang //g.yon pa sku la brtertan pa ni//gshin rje 'joms pa'i phyag rgya yin//lag pa
419b2(rgyud): g.yas pa'i thal mo yin//bangab pa'i thab su gdengs pa dang //g.yon gyis 'dzin pa ltar byas pa//mi g.yo mgon gyi phyad rgya yin//lag pa thal mo spyod nas ni//gung mo
419b3(rgyud): rgyab tu bsnol bar bya//mthe po gnyis kyang phral te bsgreng //spyi bor bzhag pa gre bya'i rgya//rkang pa g.yas pa'i thur du gzugs//lag pa g.yas pa gyen du bsgreng //g.yon pa'i
419b4(rgyud): brkang pa lag phyar ba'i//gzhan gyis mi thub phyag rgya yin//lag pa g.yas g.yon bskur brten te//rkang pa gshibs te mchongs pa ni//bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i phyag rgya zhes//
419b5(rgyud): dpa' bo chen pos yang du bshad//lag pa g.yas g.yon bsnol ba dang //rkang pa brkyang bskum byas pa ni//khams gsum rgyal ba'i phyag rgya zhes//mgon po dpa'i bos yang du
419b6(rgyud): bshwad//lag pa g.yas payon sprugs pa dang //lus kyang dri ba du gsogs pa ni//rdo rje phra man ma rnams kyi//phyag rgya yin par 'dren pas bshad//phyag rgya 'di dag bci
419b7(rgyud): nas ni//stabs chen drag du mchongs byis na//khams gsum dag las mchongs par 'gyu re//gzhan yang go 'phangs thams cad kun//grub par gyur te the tshom med//rig pa'i
420a1(rgyud): skyes bu chen pos bshad//'phags pa thabs kyi zhugs pa pad+mo phreng las phyag rgya'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o////'khor lo chen po rtsibs brgyad
420a2(rgyud): pa'i//dkyil du khrag 'thung spyan drangs te//mdun du hUM yang spyan drang ngo //rgyab du stobs chen spyan drangs nas//'khi ra li rtsibs kyi steng dag tu//bcu po rnams kyang go/
420a3(rgyud): rims bzhin//so so'i gnasu spyan drangs te//dmar gyi arga gsol nas ni//mchod yon gzhan yang dbul bar bya//rdo rje dbyangs kyis bstod byas te//de nas las
420a4(rgyud): rnams bsgrub par bya//zhe sdang rdo rje 'khor bcas pas//'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams kun//khros pas yud tsam rlig mdzad de//brlag par ma gyur gang yang
420a5(rgyud): myed//'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las las kyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o///rdo rje 'phra min sbyor ba yis//yud tsam gyis ni de bkug nas/
420a6(rgyud): rtod pa'i tshul du rab bstabs na//lha yang rung ste brlag par 'gyur//'ug pa'i mgo can la sogs pa'i//'phro men mi rnams spang byas te//mig dang rna ba sna
420a7(rgyud): lho//de yi sems 'phrogs bsgoms nyams 'gyur//'phra men rnams ni spang byas te//de yi sgrub pa'i par gcod cing //gsang ste 'khrug por bsgom byas na//sgrub pa nyams
420b1(rgyud): shing 'bye bar 'gyur//'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las drag po'i las kyi le'u ste bcwo brgyad pa'o////hom khung zur gsum gdengs pa la//rdo rje
420b2(rgyud): madra' gzhu ldan byas te//thod pa dag gis rnam par brgyani//spyan drangs bsregs na lha yang 'chi//'phra men mngags te bkug nas ni//thabs kun bsregs na mod la
420b3(rgyud): 'chi/gsur dang bsros pa'i sha rnams kyis//lha rnams thams cad mchod par bya//rdo rje glu ni blangs na su//'byung po'i sha ni shin tu zhim//'byung po'i khrag ni shin
420b4(rgyud): tu zhim//'byung po'i rus pa zhim pa ste//gsol ste thams cad dgyes par mdzod//'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo 'phreng las drag po hom gyi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o///
420b5(rgyud): lcags sam nag po'i shing rnams la//mgo bo rgya mdud rtse zur gsum//khro bo khro mo rnams bsgoms te//btab na lho yang brlag par 'gyur//'phags pa thabs kyi
420b6(rgyud): zhags pa pad+mo phreng las drag po phur pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o////lcags phye drug dang rdo phye dang //khrag las+dza smras te bsres pa dang //mung ga'i chan dang sbyor ba
420b7(rgyud): dang//sbyor bas gtor na de brlag 'gyur//'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+ma phreng las drag po'i gtor ma'i le'u ste nyi shu gcig pa'o////khro mo'i dkyil 'khor
421a1(rgyud): kArbAnA khung du//khyo Sh+Ti To bAs bAr+d+ha s+yA p+tA yaM//rdo rjekad+hAn phyugs pam+WAm zlas ma//m+b+ha yang rAd+yA s+t+wa~M bAd+hA sa par 'gyur//2phagad pa gas
421a2(rgyud): pA pad+ma phreng las drag pa'i spyir bI'i la'u s+yA shu gnyis pa'o///drug pa'i las kyis bsgrungs pa'i rnams//kho ban+d+he lAm ste bcad nas//rnamaldan
421a3(rgyud): gis bri stes btums te//'og min bla med gnas mchog na//gtso bo lnga dang gtso mo lnga//sems dpa' dang ni sems ma dang //khro bo dang ni khro mo rnams//sbyor ba'i lhun chu
421a4(rgyud): phaT kyis 'phang //'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las gnas bstabs pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o//zlagam dkyil 'khor rtsi bsdu brgyad pa//
421a5(rgyud): khro mo spyan drangs te//mchod pa glu la sogs pas mchod//de nas lus rnams brnam par bya//chags pa'i rdo rje 'khor bcas pa//'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams
421a6(rgyud): kun//tshogs pas yud la dbang mdzad//dbang du ma gyur gang yang med//rdo rje 'phra men mngags nasu//bkug nas khro bo chen po yis//chags pa'i tshul gyis de lus
421a7(rgyud): las//dpa' dang gzi brjed bsdus nas 'grub//'phro mon rnams kyi mngags na sa//de yi mig rna sna dang lce//lus dang sems bsgyur rnams bsgoms na//kun la mdzes shing
421b1(rgyud): dga' bar 'gyur//'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las dbang gi las bstan pa'i le'u b+ha nyi shu bzhi pa'o////hom khung zla gam gdeng sa pa la//rdo rje zhags pas
421b2(rgyud): brgyan par bya//de nas lha rnams spyan drangs te//mi phin rnam rtog bsregs na 'grub//'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las dbang gi hom gyi le'u ste nyi shu lnga pa'o///
421b3(rgyud): zangs sam kha dog dmar po'i shing //mgo bo rgya mdud rtse zla gam//mgo la khro bo'i 'khor bsgoms te//btab na nges par de dbang bsgyur//'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+ma phreng
421b4(rgyud): las dbang gi phung pa'i las bshad pa'i le'u n+d+ha nyi shu drug pa'o///zangs bye dang ni bu ma dang //dmar po'i 'bras can ma stsogs pa//sbyar byas gtor ma byutang bar bya//
421b5(rgyud): mthong bas nges par da dang 'gyu //2gas pa zangs kyi zhags pa pad+ma las dbyung g-i ma la'u sgra ny+tsi shu bdun pa'o//khro mo rnams kyi dkyis ma
421b6(rgyud): dru// ba dgal /re 'asams byasan//sgra yang rlung ste dbang du 'gyur//da ni bde ba chen po ston//'phags pa zla ste ga zhigs pa pad+ma pAng+tha las debang gi sbyong pa'i la
421b7(rgyud): shu brgyad pasgon kyil la myed / rnams sa ces spyan pas te//mchod ba zlu mi sogs pas /
422a1(rgyud): las rnams brtsam par bya//du rgyu la rdo rje 'khor bcas pas//'jig rten khams ni rab 'byams kun//dpal dang gzi brjid chen po
422a2(rgyud): rnams//yud tsam gyis ni rgyas par mdzod//khro bo khro mo 'khor bcas dang //rdo rje 'phra mon 'khor bcas paso//dpal dang gzi brjid 'brel bsgoms na//
422a3(rgyud): bdag nyid chen por de 'gyur ro//'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las rgyas pa'i las kyi le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o////hom
422a4(rgyud): khung gru bzhi gdengs pa la//rdo rje 'khor los brgyan par bya//de nas lha rnams spyan drangs te//bsregs pas mchod cing dpal 'phel bsgom//'phags
422a5(rgyud): pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las rgyas pa'i hom gyi le'u ste sum cu pa'i////gla sor ram ser po'i shing rnams lnga//mgo bo rgyu mdud rtse zur bzhi//
422a6(rgyud): lha rnams bsgoms te gdab par bya//'di ni rgyas pa'i las la shis//'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las rgyas pa'i phur pa'i le'u ste sum bcu
422a7(rgyud): gcig pa'o///gser phyo 'bras chan ser po rnams//'o ma sbrang rtsi gtor ma ni//rgyas par 'gyur ba'i gtor ma ste//mkhas pas rgyas par bsgom
422b1(rgyud): no ston//'phags pa b+hA ba stsu \u0f7f zhugs bya bad+ma 'phrong las rgyus pa mdus smras drug rgyas pag//lha mo rnams sto nga
422b2(rgyud): kau yi dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bsgom// chub snrums ni 'phro bsgoms na//b+h+r-i de na rgyas pa'i las 'grub bo//'phags pa thabyas kyi zhags pa dang
422b3(rgyud): mo phreng las rgyus byu'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste sum cu gsum pa'o//rnam pa'i dkyi la khor rtsibs brgyad pur//lha rnams 'khor bcas spyan drangs
422b4(rgyud): //dkar bI'i yon gyis mchod pa b+h+rU~M//de nas las rnams brnam par bya//gti mug rdo rje 'khor bcas pas//'jig rte khams ni rab 'byams kun//lung
422b5(rgyud): tsam nyid la zhi mdzad de//zhi bar gyun pa phyag 'tshal lo//lha rnams 'khor bcas thams cad kyis//'khrug pa thams cad zhi mdzad par//bsgoms ni thams
422b6(rgyud): cad yud tsam gyis//zhi bar 'gyur te the tshom med//'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo 'phreng las zhi ba'i las kyi le'u ste sum cu bzhi pa'i/
422b7(rgyud): ho ma khring b+h+yAm b+h+yo gdengs pa la//rdo rje pad+mos brgyan par bya//phur pa dkar po drug btib ti//spyan drangs rdul phyo sogs pas mchod//'phags pa thabs
423a1(rgyud): kye zhags pa pad+mo phyeng las zhi ba'i hom kI le'u ste sum cu lnga pa'o///phur pa kha dog dkar po la//mgo do rgyu mdud rtsi zlum por//
423a2(rgyud): lha rnams bsgoms la gdab par bya//'di ni zhi ba'i las la shis//'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo 'phreng las zhi ba'i phur pa'i le'u skye sum cu drug pa'i//
423a3(rgyud): dngul dang 'bras chen dkar po rnams//'o mar sbyar ba'i gtor ma ni//zhi bar 'gyur ba'i gtor ma te//mkhas pas zhi bar bsgoms shing gtar//'phags
423a4(rgyud): pa thabs kyi zhugs pa pad+mo phreng las zhi ba'i gtor ma'i le'u ste sum cu bdun pa'o///lha mo rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du//lha yi grub pa bsgom
423a5(rgyud): par bya//byin gyis thams cad zhi bsgoms na//lha rnams kun kyang zhi bar 'gyur//'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad+mo phreng las zhi ba'i spyod pa las kyi
423a6(rgyud): le'u ste sum cu brgyad pa'o////mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgya dang //de las dngos 'byung phyag rgya rnams//nges par med par dpa' bos ba shad//
423a7(rgyud): mkhas pas ci dga' bsgyur na 'grub//'phags pa thabs kyi zhagaso pa pad+mo phreng las las bsdus po'i le'u ste sum cu dgu pa'o////drag
423b1(rgyud): pos thams cad 'dul bar 'gyur//dbang gis 'byor pa mchog kyang 'grub//rgyas pas kla ni brjid rnam par 'phrul//zhi bas bde ba'i mchog kyang
423b2(rgyud): 'grug//'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo 'phreng las las sgrub pa'i phan yin b+hi le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o////dkyil 'khor
423b3(rgyud): 'di'i mtshan ni dbang chen bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor te//de la dkyil 'khor gyi gzhi zlum por bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings spros pa med pa'i don no//
423b4(rgyud): 'khor lo brtsibs zur can dri bya ba gzhi zlum po'i nang na gnas pa ni chos kyi dbyings spros pa med bzhin du byin gyis brlabs kyi lha dang /
423b5(rgyud): mo dang /khro bo dang /khro mo dIng /bonya l-I sogs pa dang nyid nis 'phro badzAM ngan no//rnam pa gcig tu tshe sa kyi dbyings rnam par rtog pa med
423b6(rgyud): bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni yang mkhyen pa ldan gyis grub pa'i don no//mtha' glu bzhi bya ba ni//phyogs bcu'i smod dang bcud
423b7(rgyud): 'jig rten thams cad lo dbang bsgyur bas bde ba chen po rgyas pa'i don/dkyil nas lha mo lnga phyir lta bo//lha mo ni dbyings nyid nye ba'i bin rlabs
424a1(rgyud): tre//sems drapas dbyings nyid dang nye ba mthong ba'i don no//sems dpa' lnga nad du lta ba ni dbyings nyid nye ba la lta ba'i don no//sems
424a2(rgyud): dpa' gzhan phyir lta ba ni//dbyings nyid thams cad dus rdo ba lta bu bems pa ma yin gyi mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ljon zhing sems dpa' nyid dbyings las
424a3(rgyud): mi gzhan pa'i tha tshig go//sems ma gzhan nang du lta ba ni mkhyen pa'i ye shes dngos po la sogs pa thams cad du rnam par rtog pa ma yin gyi dbyings
424a4(rgyud): nyid dang ldan zhing dbyings nyid kyang mkhyen pa'i ye shes las mi gzhan pa'i tha tshig go/rnam pa gcig tu sems dpa' phyir lta ba ni snod dang bcud
424a5(rgyud): kye 'jig rten thams cad dbang bsgyur ba'i don//sems ma nang du lta ba ni snod dang bcud kyi 'jig rten thams cad dbang du 'dus pa'i don//sems
424a6(rgyud): dpa' dang sems ma phyi nang du gtso ga la gcig gzigs pa ni mnyes par byed pa'i tha tshig go/khro bo dang /khro mo ril phyir lta ba ni phyi'i dngos po dang
424a7(rgyud): rgol ba la sogs po 'joms shing 'dul ba'i don//de la dbyings ni dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ba lta bu'o//mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni nyi ma'i
424b1(rgyud): 'od snang zhing gsal ba lta bu'o//de'i skyon nubyas nr-i dro zhing 'jam pa lta drug//b+h+r-i'i dngos po la stsogs pa 'joms shing 'dul ba no N+Do shing bskams pa dang chug
424b2(rgyud): pa lta bu ste/lha mo dang sems mo ni chos kyi dbyings rig pa'i don snyoms la snang ba'o//lha dang sems dpa' ni dbyings la snang ba'i don mthong
424b3(rgyud): ba'o//dbyings la snang ba dang mthong ba'i byin rlabs kyi ngang gis dngos po dang rgol ba'i rang bzhin lhun gyis 'jomaso shing /dbyings su sbyor
424b4(rgyud): byar 'dul ba ni//khro bo dang khro mo las rlom bzhi rang bzhin du mdzad cing thugs rjes 'jig rten skyong ba'i don no//'jig rten spyong
424b5(rgyud): stsogs po ni byin gyis rlabs las pho nya ltar gnas pa yin/rnam pa gcig tu 'jig rten TI lha mthu bo che 'khor du 'dus par bstan pa'i don
424b6(rgyud): no//bkra shis brgyad ni thams cad la drabang bsgyur zhing 'khor ba la spyod kyang nyon mongs pa'i 'a ching bAr mi 'gyur b+h+r-i da mya ngan las 'das
424b7(rgyud): pa la spyod kyang nyan thos kyi zhi ba phyogs gcig pa cir mi 'gyur te/gtsogs kyang zil gyis mi non pa'i phyir bkra shis so//de la dpal ba'u ni
425a1(rgyud): mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i bAkra shis so//'khor lho ni thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba dang /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ban
425a2(rgyud): bkra shis so//rin po che ni zad mi shes par dang ldan pa'i bkra shis so//pad+mo ni 'khor bas ma zin pa'i bkra shis so//gdugs ni nyon mongs
425a3(rgyud): pas ma gdungs pa'i bkra shis so//bum pa ni bdud rtsi mchog dang ldan pa'i bikra shis so//dung ni sgo thams cad spa dkong bar sgra sgrogs pa'i bkra
425a4(rgyud): shis so//nya ni lam rgyud lnga'i sems can gyi don mdzad kyang nyam nga ba med pa'o//klong bzhi ni rigs lnga'i byin rlabs yin pa 'am lam
425a5(rgyud): rgyud lnga'i sems can la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin yod par bstan pa 'am/thugs rjes de dag gi don mdzad pa'i tha tshig go/rnam
425a6(rgyud): gcig tu thams cad dbang du 'dus pa'i don/de la gtso mo'i 'khor lU lnga dang bcus pa ni ci yang mi mdzad do//sems dpa' sems ma
425a7(rgyud): nyi shu ni kun la bu gcig bzhin no//de ltar byas pa'i shugs kyis khro bo dang khro mo 'khor dang bcas pa ni phyin pa thams cad kyi dngos po la
425b1(rgyud): dz+nyAn dum dgas mtha ba bzhon na//dUny+dza sha snang ga shugs zlos thams cad+ma d+ha brgyad sa skAr ra/'byur nu la bar ba rgyas sa spyod byung byung
425b2(rgyud): smad rten pa ste/nyon mangs pa'i 'tshong byar mi 'gyur bas de ltar sgrub pa ni 'dong chags so//chos kyo dbyings dang gisuM gas bI br-i g+sa dag
425b3(rgyud): chos nyid spros pa med pas g+hAt+ti mug go//chos nyid de lta bu khams gsum las rgyal bas nga rgyal lo//de la glatso bo ni 'khor lnga'i byin rna
425b4(rgyud): ni thams cad la khyab mod kyi nye ba'i ni dbu dang /mdun du/thong ka yan chad/rgyab 'jug yan chud do//mi 'khrugs pa'i 'khor lde'i byin
425b5(rgyud): rlabs ni phyag g.yas pa dang rtsibs logs g.yas so//rin chen 'byung ldan 'khor lnga'i byin rlabs ni phyag g.yon dang rtsibs lcogs g.yon no//
425b6(rgyud): 'od dpag med 'khor lnga'i byin rlabs ni zhabs g.yon nus rkang pa g.yon man chad do//don yid grub po 'khor lnga'i byin rlabs ni zhabs g.yas
425b7(rgyud): rked pa g.yon ma chad de//khro bo dang khro ma thams cad ni rigs so so'i byin rlabs bzhin na//de ltar 'khor lnga po gcig la yang lnga lngar 'gyur te/
426a1(rgyud): sra ba'i bya ba byed pa thams cad ni rdo rje rigs so//dro ba'i bya ba byed pa thams cad ni rin po che'i rig so//sher ba'i bya ba byed pa thams
426a2(rgyud): cad ni pad+ma'i rigs so//bstod pa'i bya ba byed pa thams cad ni lngas kyi rigs so//de rnams cha mnyam pa las spyir grub pa ni dngos su zhugs pa/de bzhin
426a3(rgyud): gshegs pa'i rigs so//thams cad bdag nyid ma'i 'khor lnga'i byin rlabs ni/dbus su gyur pa thams cad do//smra ba'i rang bzhin med pa ni yangs pa'i spyan
426a4(rgyud): 'khor lnga'i byin rlabs so//dro ba'i rang bzhin med pa nI mA ma kI 'khor lha'i byin rlab so//gshor ba'i rang bzhin med pa ni gos dkar mo 'khor lnga'i byin rlab so//
426a5(rgyud): bskyed pa'i rang bzhin med pa ni sgrol ma'i 'khor lnga'i byin rlabs so//don du bya ba byed nus pa sems dpa'o//de bzhin med pa ni sems na'o//de ltar rigs pa ni
426a6(rgyud): khro bo dang /khro mo'o//de la bsdu zhing spro ba yang thams cad de ltar bya'o//phyi nang gis chos thams cad la yang de ltar blta'o//de skad ces dpal rnam
426a7(rgyud): par snang mdzad kyis bka' stsal pa la/rdo rje gzhon nu sde 'dum phrag du ma yi rangs te 'di skad ces bstod do//hUM bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar
426b1(rgyud): ba yi//'od zer 'du 'phro klong dkyil na//khro bo khro m+bu rnams bzhugs pa//skur d+he cir yang bsgyur ba'i gzugs//phyu dbu skra kham gnas
426b2(rgyud): ral pa can//gyen du 'khyil ba sring rtser 'bar//mri mnyam khri gnyer sdang sme ba ni//khro ga par lta ba 'dul ba'i mtshan//hUM mche
426b3(rgyud): bzang yag gtsigs pris ni//skye shi rtsa ba gcod pa'i tshul//sku gsung thugs kyi rkyen rlabs ni//phyag rgya sna tshobyas cir yang snang //hUM
426b4(rgyud): thugs rje'i byin rlabs sprin ltar 'khrogs//byams pa'i 'od zer glo ge bzhin 'gyu//rngamya pa'i sgra skad 'brug ltar sgrogs//sprul pa'i thog
426b5(rgyud): thog char bzhin 'bebs//hUM sngon gyis thugs dam chen po ni//glan ka chen po bdud la tshol//rkyal ka chen po bgegs la mo dzad//dam
426b6(rgyud): tshig can la dngos brub stsol//hUM thubs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis//bdag gis lhag pa'i bsam pa rnams//grub par byin gyis rlabs
426b7(rgyud): du gsol//'khyil cing rkyen yang 'khyil ba la//sems kyi chos pas sku mi mnga'//sgra las 'das pa'i sbyor ba ste//bsam dang bral po'i ye shes
427a1(rgyud): lags//hUM srid gsum 'joms pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo//mnyam nyid dang gis khro la phyag 'tshalo//khros pas longs
427a2(rgyud): spyod mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo//rdo rje 'du 'phro khro la phyag 'tshal lo//ces bstod de nyid kyis thugs kar zhugs nas mi snang bar gyur to//'phags
427a3(rgyud): po thabs kyi zhogs pa pad mo 'phreng //rdzogs so///sarba mang+ga laM//
